<p>25a.4</p>na yang thung ngu rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ dbugs thung ngu phyung na yang dbugs thung ngu phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ dbugs ring du rngubs na dbugs ring du rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyung na dbugs
<p>25a.5</p>pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ sarba kA ya pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sa na sarba kA ya pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ sarba kA ya pra ti sam+be dI pra shwa sa na sarba kA
<p>25a.6</p>ring du phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ lus kyi las las zhes pa'i skad dod ma byung / thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs na lus kyi las thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ lus kyi las thams cad yang dag bar myong zhing dbugs
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>ya pra ti saM be dI pra shwa swa mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ pra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA ra nA shwa sam+p+ra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA ra nA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ bra sra b+d+h+ya kA
<p>25b.2</p>phyung na lus kyi las thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs na lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ lus kyi 'du byed
<p>25b.3</p>ya saM skA rAna? pra shwa sana? pra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA rAna? pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ prI ti pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? prI ti pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM bra dzA nA ti/ prI ti
<p>25b.4</p>shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs na dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ dga' ba
<p>25b.5</p>pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sana? prI ti pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ 
<p>25b.6</p>yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung na dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs na sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be dI pra shwA sanra?tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ pra sab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rA nA shwa sana? pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rA nA shwa sA
<p>26a.2</p>tu shes/ sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung na sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs [(]phyud [,]phyung [)]ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs na sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas
<p>26a.3</p>mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rAna? pra shwa saM pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rAna? pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ tsit+ta pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? tsit+ta pra ti saM be d+yA
<p>26a.4</p>dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs na sems yang dag
<p>26a.5</p>shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ tsit+ta pra ti saM be+e dI pra swa san+tsIt+ta pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam pa bcu drug tu phye ba'i ming la/ tsa twA r+YAr+Ya sat+yA ni/ duHkhaM/ a ni t+yaM/ shU n+yaM/ 
<p>26a.6</p>par myong nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung na sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi/ sdug bsngal ba/ mi rtag ba/ stong ba/ 
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>a nAt+ma kaM/ sa mu dayaH/ pra b+ha baH/ he tuH/ pra t+ya yaH/ ni ro d+haH/ shAn+taH/ pra NI taH/ niHsa ra NaM/ mArgaH/ n+yA yaH/ pra ti bat+tiH/ nai r+YA Ni kaH/ A nan+tar+Ya mAr+g+gaH/ bi mug+ti mAr+g+gaH/ a b+hi sa ma yAn+ti kaM ku sha la mU laM/ k+Sha ya dz+nyA naM lA
<p>26b.2</p>bdag med pa/ kun 'byung ba/ rab tu skye ba/ rgyu/ rkyen/ 'gog pa/ zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ nges bar 'byung ba/ lam/ rigs pa/ sgrub pa/ nges par 'byin pa/ bar chad med pa'i lam/ rnam par grol ba'i lam/ mngon par rtogs pa'i mjug la 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ zad pa shes pas
<p>26b.3</p>b+hi kaM ku sha la mU laM/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rim pa'i ming la/ nirbe d+ha b+hA gI yaH/ uSh+ma ga taH/ mUr+d+hA naH/ k+ShAn+tiH/ lau ki kA gra d+har+m+maH/ /sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug gi ming la/ duH khe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ duHkhe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/ duHkhe\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA nak+ShAn+tiH/ 
<p>26b.4</p>thob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ dro bar gyur ba/ rtse mo/ bzod ba/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mchog/ sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/ sdug bsngal la chos shes pa/ sdug bsngal la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod ba/ 
<p>26b.5</p>duH khe\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/ sa mu da ye d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ sa mu da ya d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/ sa mu da ye\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ sa mu da ye\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM ni ro d+he d+har+m+ma dz+nyA nak+ShAn+tiH/ ni ro d+he d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/ ni ro d+he\u0f85n+wa
<p>26b.6</p>sdug bsngal la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/ kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/ kun 'byung la chos shes pa/ kun 'byung la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod pa/ kun 'byung la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/ 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/ 'gog pa la chos shes pa/ 'gog pa la rjes su rtog
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ ni ro d+he\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/ mArge d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ mArge d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/ mArge\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/ mArge\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/ /shes pa bcu'i ming la/ d+har+m+madz+nyA naM/ pa ra tsit+ta dz+nyA naM/ a n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/ saM
<p>27a.2</p>par shes pa'i bzod pa/ 'gog pa la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/ lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/ lam la chos shes pa/ lam la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod pa/ lam la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/ chos shes pa/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa/ rjes su rtog par shes pa/ kun
<p>27a.3</p>br-i ti dz+nyA naM/ duHkha dz+nyA naM/ sa mud ya dz+nyA naM/ ni ro d+ha dz+nyA naM/ mArga dz+nyA naM/ k+Sha ya dz+nyA naM/ a nut+pA da dz+nyA naM/ lam bzhi'i ming la/ duHkhA pra ti pa dwa n+wA b+hi dz+nyA/ duHkhA pra ti pat+k+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA/ su khA pra ti pa dwa n+wA b+hi dz+nyA/ su khA pra ti pat+k+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA/ /
<p>27a.4</p>rdzob shes pa/ sdug bsngal shes pa/ kun 'byung shes pa/ 'gog pa shes pa/ lam shes pa/ zad pa shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa/ mngon par shes ba bul la dka' ba'i lam/ mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam/ mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam/ mngon par shes ba myur la sla ba'i
<p>27a.5</p>theg pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ ma hA yA nama?/ pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha yA nama?/ shrA ba ka yA nama?/ hI na yA nama?/ pra de shi ka yA nama?/ e ka yA nama?/ /dbang po'i rim pa'i ming la/ in+d+ri ya bai mAtra tA/ mr-i dwin+d+ri yaH/ ma d+h+yen+d+ri yaH/ tIk+Sh+Nen+d+ri yaH/ /rigs lnga'i ming la/ shrA ba ka yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/ pra
<p>27a.6</p>lam/ theg pa chen po/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa/ theg pa dman pa/ nyi tshe ba'i theg pa/ theg pa gcig pa/ dbang po'i rim pa/ dbang po rtul po/ dbang po 'bring po/ dbang po rnon po/ nyan thos kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/ rang
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>t+ye ka bud+d+ha yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/ ta thA ga ta yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/ a ni ya ta go traH/ a go tra kaH// /dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming la/ sU traM/ ge yama?/ byA ka ra NaM/ gA thA/ u dA naM/ ni dA nama?/ a ba
<p>27b.2</p>sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/ ma nges ba'i rigs/ rigs med pa/ mdo'i sde/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad ba'i sde/ lung du bstan pa'i sde/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde/ ched du brjod ba'i sde/ gleng gzhi'i sde/ rtogs pa
<p>27b.3</p>dA nama?/ i ti br-it+ta kama?/ dzA ta kama?/ bai pu l+yaM/ ad+b+hu ta d+har+m+maH/ u pa de shaH/ bra h+ma tsa r+YaM/ A dau ka l+yA NaM/ ma d+h+ye ka l+yA NaM/ baR+Ya ba sA ne ka l+yA NaM/ swar+thaM/ su byany+dza naM/ ke ba laM/ pa ri
<p>27b.4</p>brjod ba'i sde/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde/ skyes pa rabs kyi sde/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde/ rmad du byung pa'i sde/ gtan la dbab pa'i sde/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa skabs gzhan du 'ba' zhig tu 'ang gdags/ yongs su
<p>27b.5</p>pUr+NaM/ pa ri shud+d+haM/ par+Ya ba dA taM/ a b+hi ba da mA nA a b+hi ba dan+ti/ swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+maH saM dr-iSh+Ti kaH/ nir+dz+wa raH/ A kA li kaH/ u pa nA yi kaH/ e hi pa sh+yi kaH/ pra t+yAt+ma be da nI yo bi dz+nyaiH/ 
<p>27b.6</p>rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba/ 
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+ma bi na yaH su pra be di taH/ nai r+YA Ni kaHsaM bo d+hi gA mI/ a b+hin+naHsastU paH/ sa pra ti sha ra NaH/ shAstA tsA s+ya ta thA ga to\u0f85r+hana?samyak+saM
<p>28a.2</p>bcom ldan 'das kyi legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par bstan pa/ nges par 'byung ba rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/ mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa/ brten pa yod pa/ 'di ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
<p>28a.3</p>bud+d+haH/ swA khyA to me b+hi k+Sha bo d+har+m+maH/ ut+tAnaH/ bi br-i taH/ ts+tshin+na p+lo ti kaH/ yA bad+de ba ma nu Sh+ye b+h+yaHsamyak+su pra kA shi taH/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i ming la/ tri pa ri bar+t+ta dwA da shA kA ra d+har+m+ma tsakra bar+t+ta naM/ Ar+Ya sat+yA nAM pra tha ma
<p>28a.4</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ gsal ba/ phye ba/ rgyu ba bcad pa/ lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa/ lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor pa/ 'phags nga'i bden pa rnams bzlas
<p>28a.5</p>pa ri bar+t+to daR+sha na margaH/ i dma? duHkhama?/ a yaM sa mu da yaH/ a yan+ni ro d+haH/ i yaM duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti pata?/ sat+yA nAM dwi tI ya pa ri bar+t+to b+hA ba na mAr+g+gaH/ duHkha mAR+Ya sa t+yaM pa ri dz+nye yaM/ duHkha sa mu da yaHpra hA ta
<p>28a.6</p>pa dang po ste mthong ba'i lam/ 'di ni sdug bsngal/ 'di ni kun 'byung ba/ 'di ni 'gog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bzlas pa gnyis pa ste bsgom pa'i lam/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spang
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>byaM/ duHkha ni ro d+haHsA k+ShAt+kar+t+ta byaM/ duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti pata? b+hA yi ta byaM/ Ar+Ya sa t+yA nAM tri tI ya pa ri bar+t+to\u0f85shaik+Sha mArgaH/ duHkhaM pa ri dz+nyA taM/ sa mu da yaHpra dI NaH/ ni ro d+haHsA k+ShA tra kr-i taH/ duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti
<p>28b.2</p>bar bya/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon du bya/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom par bya/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bzlas pa gsum pa ste mi slob pa'i lam/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes/ kun 'byung ba spangs/ 'gog pa mngon du byas/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam
<p>28b.3</p>bad+b+hA bi tA/ /dam pa'i chos kyi ming la/ sha ta sA ta sri kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ pany+tsa biM sha ti sA ha sri kA/ aSh+Ta sA ha sri kA/ bud+d+hA ba taM sa kaM/ bo d+hi satwa pi Ta kaM/ la li ta bi sta raH/ sa mA d+hi rA dzA/ pi tA pu tra sa mA ga maH/ lo kot+ta ra pa ri bar+t+taH/ sada? d+har+m+ma
<p>28b.4</p>bsgoms/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ nyi khri lnga stong pa/ brgyad stong pa/ sangs rgyas phal po che/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod/ rgya cher rol pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ yab sras mjal ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u/ dam pa'i
<p>28b.5</p>puN+Da rI kama?/ ga ga na gany+dzaH/ rat+na me g+haH/ laM kA ba tA rama?/ su bar+N+Na pra b+hA sot+ta maM/ bi ma la kIr+t+ti ni rde shaH/ gaN+Da byU haH/ g+ha na byU haH/ A kA sha gar+b+haH/ a k+Sha ya ma ti ni rde shaH/ u pA ya kau sha l+yaM/ d+har+m+ma saM
<p>28b.6</p>chos pad+ma dkar po/ nam mkha' mdzod/ dkon mchog sprin/ lang kar gshegs pa/ gser 'od dam pa/ dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa/ sdong po bkod pa/ stug po bkod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po/ blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa/ thabs la mkhas pa/ chos yang dag
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>gI tiH/ su bi krAn+ta bi krA mI/ ma hA ka ru NA puN+Da rI kama?/ rat+na ke tuH/ da sha b+hU mi kaH/ ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru NA ni rde shaH/ dru ma kin+na ra rA dza ba ri pr-its+tshaH/ a dzA ta sha tru kau kr-i t+ya bi no da naH/ san+d+hi nirmo tsa naM/ bud+d+ha
<p>29a.2</p>par sdud pa/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po/ rin po che'i tog /sa bcu pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba/ dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa/ sangs
<p>29a.3</p>saM gI tiH/ rASh+Ta pA la ba ri pr-its+tshA/ sarba d+har+m+mA pra br-it+ti ni rde shaH/ rat+na tsU Da pa ri pr-its+tshA/ rat+na kU TaH/ ma hA yA na pra sA da b+hA ba nama?/ sUr+Ya gar+b+haH/ bud+d+ha b+hU miH/ ta thA ga tA tsin+t+ya gu h+ya
<p>29a.4</p>rgyas yang dag par sdud pa/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa/ chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa/ theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa/ nyi ma'i snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi
<p>29a.5</p>nirde shaH/ sU raM ga ma sa mA d+hi nirde shaH/ sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/ shA listam+ba kama?/ ma hA yA no pa de shaH/ brah+ma bi she Sha tsin+ti pa ri pr-its+tshA/ pa ra mAr+tha saM br-i ti sa t+ya nir+d+de shaH/ many+dzu shrI bi hA raH/ ma hA pa ri nirbA NaM/ 
<p>29a.6</p>khyab pa bstan pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa/ sA lu ljang pa/ theg pa chen po'i man ngag /tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pa/ 'jam dpal gnas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po/ 
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>a bai bar+t+ta tsakrama?/ kar+m+ma bi b+haM gaH/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA bany+tsa sha ti kA/ tri sha ti kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ ra t+nolkA/ go tsa ra pa ri shu d+d+haM/ pra shAn+ta bi ni sh+tsa ya prA ti hAr+Ya nirde shaH/ ta thA ga tot+pat+ti saM b+ha ba nirde shaH/ b+ha ba saM krAn+tiH/ 
<p>29b.2</p>phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo/ las rnam par 'byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sum brgya pa/ dkon mchog ta la la/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa/ rab tu zhi ba rnam par gdon mi za ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa/ srid pa 'pho
<p>29b.3</p>pa ra mAr+tha d+har+m+ma bi dza yaH/ many+dzu shrI bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Na byU haH/ bo d+hi bak+Sh+ya nirde shaH/ kar+m+mA ba ra Na pra ti pra srab+d+hiH/ tri skan+d+ha kama?/ sarba bai da l+ya saM gra haH/ saM g+hA Ta sU traM/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA sa mA
<p>29b.4</p>ba/ don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs nges par bstan pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa/ phung po gsum pa/ rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa/ zung gi mdo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i
<p>29b.5</p>d+hiH/ badzra me ru shi kha ra kU TA gA re d+hA ra NI/ a na ba tap+ta nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/ sarba bud+d+ha bi Sha yA ba tA ra dz+nyA nA lo kA laM kA raH/ sab+ta sha ti ka pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ byA sa pa ri pr-its+tshA/ su bA hu pa ri pr-its+tshA/ siM ha pa ri br-its+tshA/ ma hA
<p>29b.6</p>ting nge 'dzin/ rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang pa'i rgyan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya ba/ drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa/ lag bzang gis zhus pa/ seng ges zhus pa/ stong chen
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>sA ha sra pra mard nama?/ u gra pa ri pr-its+tshA/ shrad+d+hA ba lA d+hA nama?/ aM gu li mA lI yaM/ hasti ka k+Sh+yaM/ ak+Sha ya ma ti pa ri br-its+tshA/ b+hai Sha dz+yA gu ru bai DUR+Ya pra b+haH/ ar+tha bi nish+tsa yaH/ ma tA ba la sU traH/ bI ra dat+ta gr-i ha pa ti pa ri
<p>30a.2</p>mos rab tu 'joms pa/ drag shul can gyis zhus pa/ dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa/ glang po'i rtsal/ blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa/ sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya 'od/ don rnam par nges pa/ stobs po che'i mdo/ khyim bdag dpas byin gyis
<p>30a.3</p>pr-its+tshA/ rat+na ka raN+Da kama?/ bi kurba Na rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/ d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU rA/ tri pi Ta kaH/ sU traM/ a b+hi d+har+m+maH/ bi na yaH/ pra dz+nyAp+ti shAs+t+rama?/ saM gI ti pA r+YA yaH/ d+har+m+maskan+d+haH/ d+hA tu kA yaH/ dz+nyA na pras+thA
<p>30a.4</p>zhus pa/ dkon mchog za ma tog /rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan/ sde snod gsum/ mdo sde/ chos mngon pa/ 'dul ba/ gdags pa'i gtsug lag gam bstan bcos/ bgro pa'i rnam grangs/ chos kyi phung po/ khams kyi tshogs/ ye shes la
<p>30a.5</p>nama?/ pra ka ra Na pA daH/ e kot+ta ri kA ga maH/ ma d+h+ya mA ga maH/ dIr+g+hA ga maH/ saM yuk+tA ga maH/ bi na ya bi b+ha gaH/ bi na ya bstu/ bi na yak+Shu dra kama?/ ut+ta ra gran+thaH/ rA dzA ba bA da kama?/ zhal nas gsungs pa dang tshig le'ur byas ba la sogs ba'i ming la/ kaN+Thok+taH/ A ga maH/ 
<p>30a.6</p>'jug pa/ rab tu byed pa'i rkang pa/ gcig las 'phros pa'i lung / lung bar ma/ lung ring po/ yang dag par ldan pa'i lung / 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi/ 'dul ba phran tshegs/ gzhung bla ma/ rgyal po la gdams pa/ zhal nas gsungs pa/ lung / 
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>AR+ShaH/ pra ba tsa naM/ shA sa nama?/ sU trAn+ta/ sU trama?/ sid+d+hAn+taH/ sa ma yaH/ a nu shA sa nA/ a ba bA daH/ daR+sha kaM/ ma taM/ shAs+t+raM/ pra ka ra NaM/ pra kr-i yA/ sU trama?/ kA ri kA/ Tip+pi Ta
<p>30b.2</p>gtsug lag /gsung rab/ bstan pa'am bcos pa/ mdo sde/ mdo/ grub pa'i mtha'/ gzhung lugs sam sngags kyi skabs su dam tshig /rjes su bstan pa/ gdams pa/ lta ba/ lugs/ bstan bcos/ rab tu byed pa/ lo rgyus/ mdor byas pa/ tshig le'ur byas pa/ mdor bshad pa'am
<p>30b.3</p>kaH/ br-it+tiH/ bi ba ra NaM/ pany+dzi kA/ b+hA ShaM/ byA khyA naM/ bAr+t+ti kaM/ bad+d+ha ti/ mi shra kaM/ TI kA/ TI kA TI kA/ sh+lo kaHgA thA/ ga d+yaM/ ba d+yaM/ pr-it+taM/ ts+tshan+daH/ daN+Da kaM/ gran+thaH/ pa ri
<p>30b.4</p>sa bcad/ 'grel pa/ rnam par 'grel pa/ dka' 'grel/ bshad pa/ rnam par bshad pa/ rnam 'grel/ gzhung 'grel/ spel ma/ 'grel bshad/ 'grel bshad kyi bshad pa/ tshigs su bcad pa/ rkyang pa/ tshigs su sbyar ba/ sbyar ba/ sdeb sbyor/ rgyun chags/ tshig gam gzhung ngam le'u grangs/ 
<p>30b.5</p>bar+t+taH/ A shwA sa kaH/ pa ri ts+tshe daH/ sar+g+gaH/ ba Ta laH/ A d+h+yA yaH/ ts+tshan+do bi tsi tiH/ biN+Do d+dA naM/ an+ta rod+dA naM/ ud+dA naM/ /bsam gtan bzhi la sogs ba'i ming la/ bi bik+taM kA mair+b+bi bik+taM pA pa kai ra ku sha le d+har+m+maiHsa bi tarkaM sa bi tsA raM bi be ka dzaM
<p>30b.6</p>le'u/ tshigs/ le 'ur bcad pa/ le 'ur phye ba/ rim bar phye ba/ brjod le'u/ sdeb sbyor bsdus pa/ bsdus pa'i sdom/ bar sdom/ sdom skabs kha cig tu mdor yang gdags/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dbyod pa dang
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>prI ti su khaM pra tha maM d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa bi tarka bi tsA rA NAM byu pa sha mA dad+h+yAt+maM saM pra sA dA ts+tse ta sa e ko tI b+hA bA da bi tarka ma bi tsA raM sa mA d+hi dzaM prI ti su khaM dwi
<p>31a.2</p>bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
<p>31a.3</p>tI yan+d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa prI te rbi rA gA du be k+Sha ko bi ha ra ti smr-i tis+saM pra dzA naM su khaM tsa kA ye na bra ti saM be da ya ti yat+ta dA r+YA A bak+Sha te u be k+Sha kaHsmr-i ti mAM su kha pi hA rI ti niSh+p+rI ti kaM
<p>31a.4</p>ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa
<p>31a.5</p>tri tI ya d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa su kha s+ya tsa bra hA NAd+duHkha s+ya tsa pra hA nAt+pUrba me ba tsa sau ma na s+ya daurmA na s+ya yo ra staM ga mA ta a duH khA su kha mu be k+ShA smr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haM tsa tur+tha d+h+yA na mu ba saM pa d+ya bi ha
<p>31a.6</p>ste dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub bas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>ra ti/ /prAn+ta ko Ti ka d+h+yA nama?/ a nA ga myaM/ d+h+yA nAn+ta rama?/ sA man+ta kaM/ mau laM/ A s+pha ra Na ka sa mA d+hiH/ bra ti saM la yanaH/ sa mA hi taH/ sa ta ta sa mi ta sa mA hi ta tsit+taH/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ming la/ sarba so rU ba saM
<p>31b.2</p>bar byas te gnas so/ /rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan/ mi lcogs pa med pa/ bsam gtan gyi khyad par can/ nyer bsdogs/ dngos gzhi/ mkha' khyab ting nge 'dzin/ nang du yang dag 'jog /mnyam par gzhag /rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag ba/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi
<p>31b.3</p>dz+nyA nAM sa ma ti kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA ma staM ga mAtu nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa sarba sha A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta nama? sa ma ti
<p>31b.4</p>'du shes rnams las yang dag bar 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
<p>31b.5</p>kra myA nan+taM bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa sarba sho bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nAsti kiny+tsi di t+yA kiny+tsi t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ sa sarba
<p>31b.6</p>yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>sha A kiM tsi t+yA ya ta na sa ma ti kra mya nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ byu ta krAn+ta sa mA pat+tiH/ byA skand ka sa mA pa t+tiH/ na bA nu bUrba bi hA ra sa mA pat+tiH/ ni ro d+ha sa
<p>32a.2</p>pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa/ thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ 'gog pa'i snyoms
<p>32a.3</p>mA pat+tiH/ ma hA b+hU ta sa ma sA d+ha naM/ a saM dz+nyA sa mA pat+tiH/ tshad med bzhi'i rgyud kyi ming la/ mai trI/ ka ru NA/ mu di tA/ u pe k+ShA/ sa mai trI sa ha ga te na tsit+te nA be re NA saM sam bat+ta rtsod par 'jug pa de yin nam slar brtag /pan+ne nA byA bA d+he na bi pu le na ma hang+ga te nA pra mA Ne nA dwa ye na su b+hA bi te
<p>32a.4</p>par 'jug pa/ 'byung ba chen po mthun par sgrub pa/ 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ byams pa/ snying rje/ dga' ba/ btang snyoms/ de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa chen por gyur pa tshad med pa mi gnyis ba shin tu bsgoms pas
<p>32a.5</p>nai kaM di sha ma d+hi mu ts+ya s+pha ri twa pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/ ta thA dwi tI ya ta thA tr-i tI yan+ta thA tsa tur+tha mi t+yUr+d+d+ha ma d+ha stir+Ya kra sarba saH sar+b+ba ban+ta mi maM lo kaM/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming la/ rU pI rU pA Ni ba sh+yaM t+ya yaM bra tha mo bi
<p>32a.6</p>phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang de bzhin du gsum pa dang de bzhin du bzhi pa dang bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>mo k+ShaH/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hi r+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yaM t+ya yaM dwi tI yo bi mo k+ShaH/ shu b+haM bi mo k+ShaM kA ye na sA k+ShA t+k+r-i two pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM tri tI yo bi mo k+ShaH/ sa sar+b+ba sho rU pa saM dz+nyA nAM sa ma ti
<p>32b.2</p>dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag
<p>32b.3</p>kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA ma staM ga mAta? nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yany+tsa tu rar+tho bi mo k+ShaH/ sa sarba sha A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti
<p>32b.4</p>par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
<p>32b.5</p>kra myA nan+taM bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na sa mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM pany+tsa mo bi mo k+ShaH/ sa sarba sho bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nA sti kiM tsi di t+yA kiM tsi t+yA ya ta na mu pa
<p>32b.6</p>mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM ShaSh+Tho bi mo k+ShaH/ sa sarba sha A kiM tsi t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM sap+ta mo bi mok+ShaH/ sa sarba
<p>33a.2</p>skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa
<p>33a.3</p>sho nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya saM dz+nyA be di ta ni ro d+haM kA ye na sA k+ShAta kr-i two ba saM ba d+ya bi ha ra t+ya ya maSh+Tha mo bi mo k+ShaH/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi ming la/ a d+h+yAt+maM rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hi r+d+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti pa rit+tA ni su
<p>33a.4</p>thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog
<p>33a.5</p>bar+N+Na durbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU pA nya b+hi b+hU ya dzA nAn+t+ya b+hi b+hU ya ba sh+yan+t+ye baM saM dz+nyI tsa b+ha ba tI daM pra tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hir+d+hA rU bA Ni ba sh+yan+ti ma had+ga tA ni su bar+N+Na durbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU
<p>33a.6</p>ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes bar 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>pA N+ya b+hi b+hU ya dzA nAn+t+ya b+hi b+hU ya pa sh+yan+t+ye baM saM dz+nyI tsa b+ha ba tI daM dwi tI ya ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hir+d+hA rU bA Ni ba sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la bar+N+NA ni nI la ni daR+sha nA ni nI la nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA
<p>33b.2</p>lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la
<p>33b.3</p>u ma kA puSh+paM sam+pan+naM bA bA rA Na se yaM bas+t+raM nI laM nI la bar+N+NaM nI la ni daR+sha naM nI la nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la bar+N+NA ni nI la ni daR+sha nA ni nI la nir+b+hA sA nI daM tri tI ya ma b+hi b+h+wA
<p>33b.4</p>lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis
<p>33b.5</p>ya ta nama?/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti pI tA ni pI ta bar+N+NA ni pI ta ni daR+Sha nA ni pI ta nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA kar+N+Ni kA ra puSh+paM samAn+naM bA pA rA Na se yaM bas+t+raM pI taM pI ta bar+N+NaM pI ta ni
<p>33b.6</p>gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na dong ka'i mdog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>daR+sha naM pI ta nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa si dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti bI tA ni bI ta bar+N+NA ni pI ta ni daR+sha nA ni pI ta nir+b+hA sA nI daM tsa tur+tha ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU ba saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA bA Ni pa sh+yan+ti
<p>34a.2</p>'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog
<p>34a.3</p>lo hi tA ni lo hi ta bar+N+NA ni lo hi ta ni daR+sha nA ni lo hi ta nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA ban+du dzI ba ka puSh+pa sam pan+naM bA bA rAn se yaM bas+t+raM lo hi taM lo hi ta bar+N+NaM lo hi ta ni d+haR+Sha naM lo hi ta nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti lo hi tA
<p>34a.4</p>dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na ban bu 'dzi bka'i me tog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po
<p>34a.5</p>ni lo hi ta bar+N+NA ni lo hi ta ni daR+sha nA ni lo hi ta nir+b+hA sA nI daM pany+tsam ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+t+ya ba dA tA ni a ba dA ta bar+N+NA ni a ba dA ta ni daR+sha nA n+ya a ba dA ta nir+b+hA saM ni tad+ya thA u sha na stA ra kA yA bar+N+Na
<p>34a.6</p>dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na skar ma pa bsangs kyi mdog dkar po kha
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>a ba dA to\u0f85ba dA ta bar+N+Nonyab dA ta ni daR+sha nonyab dA ta nir+b+hA sa e ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+t+ya ba dA tA n+ya ba dA ta bar+N+NA n+ya ba dA ta ni daR+sha nA ni a ba dA ta nir+b+ha sA nI daM ShaSh+Tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ sa sarba sho rU ba saM dz+nyA nAM sa ma
<p>34b.2</p>dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
<p>34b.3</p>ti kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA mastaM ga maM nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra tI daM sab+ta ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ sa sarba sa kA shA nan+t+yA
<p>34b.4</p>rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad
<p>34b.5</p>ya ta naM sa ma ti kra myA nan+ta bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM ba d+ya bi ha ra tI da maSh+Tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/ /zad bar gyi skye mched bcu'i ming la/ nI la kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ pIta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ lo hi ta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ 
<p>34b.6</p>du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ /zad par sngon po'i skye mched/ zad par ser po'i skye mched/ zad bar dmar po'i skye mched/ 
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>a ba dA ta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ pr-i thi bI kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ A pa kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ te dzaHkr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ bA yu kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ A kA sha kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ bi dz+nyA na kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/ pr-i thi bI kr-it+s+nA mi t+ye ke saM dzA na te i d+yur+d+ha ma d+ha stir+Ya ga dwa
<p>35a.2</p>zad par dkar po'i skye mched/ zad par sa'i skye mched/ zad par chu'i skye mched/ zad par me'i skye mched/ zad par rlung gi skye mched/ zad par nam mkha'i skye mched/ zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched/ la lar zad par sa'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing
<p>35a.3</p>ya ma pra mA NaM/ apa? te dzo bA yu nI la pI ta lo hi tA ba dA ta kr-it+s+nA mi t+ye ke saM dzA na te i t+yUr+d+ha ma d+ha stiR+Ya ga dwa ya ma pra mA NaM/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyi ming la/ shU n+ya tA/ a ni mit+taM/ a pra Ni hi taM/ rton pa bzhi'i ming la/ ar+tha pra ti sa ra Ne na b+ha pi ta byaM na byany+dza na pra ti sar Ne
<p>35a.4</p>tshad med par 'du shes su byed/ la lar zad par chu dang me dang rlung dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med bar 'du shes su byed/ stong pa nyid/ mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa/ don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru la rton par mi bya/ 
<p>35a.5</p>na/ d+harma pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM na pung+ga la pra ti sar Ne na/ dz+nyA na pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM na bi dz+nyAn pra ti sar Ne na/ nI tAr+tha sU traM pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta b+h+yan+na ne yAr+tha sU tra bra ti sar Ne na/ /shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi ming la/ shru tA ma yI pra dz+nyA/ tsin+tA ma yI pra dz+nyA/ b+hA ba nA ma yI pra dz+nyA/ /rig pa'i gnas
<p>35a.6</p>chos la rton par bya'i gang zag la rton bar mi bya/ ye shes la rton par bya'i rnam shes la rton bar mi bya/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton bar bya'i drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la rton par mi bya/ thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab/
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>lnga'i ming la/ shab+da bi d+yA/ he tu bi d+yA/ A d+h+yA Na bi d+yA/ tsi kit+sa bi d+yA/ shi lpa kar+m+mas+thA bi d+yA/ /chos yang dag par len pa bzhi'i ming la/ tsa twA ri d+har+m+mas mA dA nA ni/ bra t+yut+pan+na su kha mA ya t+yAM duHkha bi pA kaM/ pra t+yu t+pan+na duHkha mA ya t+yAM su kha bi pA kaM/ pra
<p>35b.2</p>sgra'i rig pa/ gtan tshigs kyi rig pa/ nang gi rig pa/ gso ba'i rig pa/ bzo'i gnas kyi rig pa/ chos yang dag par len pa bzhi/ da ltar byung ba la bde la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba/ da ltar byung ba la sdug bsngal la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa bde ba/ da ltar byung ba
<p>35b.3</p>t+yut+pan+na su kha mA ya t+yAM su kha bi pA kaM/ pra t+yut+pan+na duHkha mA ya t+yAM duHkha bi pA ka/ /nor bdun gyi ming la/ shra d+hA d+ha naM/ shI la d+ha naM/ hrI d+ha naM/ a ba tA bya d+ha naM/ shru ta d+ha naM/ t+yA ga d+ha naM/ pra dz+nyA d+ha naM/ /bla na med pa drug gi ming la/ daR+sha nA nu t+ta r+YaM/ shra ba
<p>35b.4</p>la'ang bde la phyi ma la'ang rnam par smin pa bde ba/ da ltar byung ba la'ang sdug bsngal la phyi ma la'ang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba/ dad pa'i nor/ tshul khrims kyi nor/ ngo tsha shes pa'i nor/ khrel yod pa'i nor/ thos pa'i nor/ gtong ba'i nor/ shes rab kyi nor/ mthong ba bla na med pa/ thos pa
<p>35b.5</p>NA nu t+ta r+YaM/ lA b+hA nu t+ta r+YaM/ shi k+ShA nut+ta r+YaM/ pa ri tsaR+YA nu t+ta r+YaM/ a nu smr-i t+ya nu t+ta r+YaM/ /byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi'i ming la/ sa t+yA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ t+yA gA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ u pa sha mA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ pra dz+nyA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ mchog tu dga' ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos dgu'i ming la/ na ba bra mo d+ya pUrba kA
<p>35b.6</p>bla na med pa/ rnyed pa bla na med pa/ bslab pa bla na med pa/ rim gro bya ba bla na med pa/ rjes su dran pa bla na med pa/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs/ gtong ba'i byin gyis brlabs/ nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyis brlabs/ shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs/ mchog tu dga' ba sngon du 'gro
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>d+har+m+mAH/ bra mu di ta s+ya prI ti dzA ya te/ prI ti ma na saHkA yaHpra srab+d+h+ya te/ pra srab+d+ha kA yaHsu kha be da ya ti/ su khi ta tsit+taM sa mA d+hI ya te/ sa mA hi ta tsit+to ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti ya thA b+hU taM
<p>36a.2</p>ba'i chos dgu/ rab tu dga' ba la dga' ba skye'o/ /yid dga' ba'i lus shin tu sbyangs par gyur to/ /lus shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba myong bar byed do/ /bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog go/ /sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so yang dag pa ji lta ba
<p>36a.3</p>pa sh+ya ti/ ya thA b+hU ta daR+shI nirbi d+ya te/ ni bir+N+No bi ra dz+ya te/ bi rak+to bi mu ts+ya te/ bi muk+ta s+ya bi muk+to\u0f85smI ti dz+nyA na daR+sha naM b+ha ba ti/ /'byung bar 'os pa'i khams drug gi ming la/ Sha?T ni s+sa ra NI ya d+hA ta paH/ byA pA da
<p>36a.4</p>bzhin du mthong ngo / /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /skyon 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bral nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol na bdag rnam pa grol lo snyam pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'byung ngo / /'byung bar 'os pa'i khams drug /gnod sems
<p>36a.5</p>s+yA byA pA do niHsa ra NaM mai trI/ bi hiM sA s+sa ra NaM ka ru NA/ a ra ti nis+sa ra NaM mu di tA/ kA ma niHsa ra Na mu pe k+ShA/ bi tsi ki t+sA nis+sa ra Na masmi mA na sa mut+g+hA taH/ ni mit+ta naMHsa ra Na ma ni mit+taM/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi 'khor lo bzhi'i ming la/ 
<p>36a.6</p>las 'byin pa ni gnod sems med pa ste byams pa/ rnam par 'tshe ba las 'byin pa ni snying rje/ mi dga' ba las 'byin pa ni dga' ba/ 'dod pa las 'byin pa ni btang snyoms/ the tshom las 'byin pa ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yang dag par 'joms pa/ mtshan ma las 'byin pa ni mtshan ma med pa/
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>pra ti rU pa de sha bA saH/ sat+pu ru ShA shra yaM/ At+ma nas+sa myak+p+ra Ni d+hA naM/ bUr+b+be tsa kr-i ta pu N+ya tA/ /dka' thub la gnas pa dang sdom pa 'dzin cing spyod pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ e ka de sha kA rI/ pra de shakA rI/ yad+b+hU yaskA rI/ a ba ri bUr+N+Na kA rI/ ba ri pur+N+Na kA rI/ saM ya maH/ da maH/ su bi nI taH/ 
<p>36b.2</p>mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa/ skyes bu dam pa la brten pa/ bdag nyid yang dag pa'i smon lam/ sngon yang bsod nams byas pa/ sna gcig spyod pa/ nyi tshe spyod pa/ de bas mang du spyod pa/ ma chub bar spyod pa/ chub bar spyod pa/ legs par sdom pa/ dul ba/ shin tu dul ba/ 
<p>36b.3</p>ta paswI/ bra tI/ ya ti/ ats+tshi draM/ a khaN+DaM/ a sa ba laM/ a kal+mA ShaM/ b+hU dzi Sh+yaM/ a ba rA mr-iSh+TaM/ su sa mA p+taM/ su sa mA rab+d+haM/ AR+Ya kAn+taM/ u pa bA sa mu pa
<p>36b.4</p>dka' thub can/ brtul zhugs can/ sdom brtson/ skyon med pa/ ma nyams pa/ 'dres bar ma gyur pa/ thun tshags ma yin pa/ rang dbang can/ nog nog por ma gyur ba/ legs par 'dzin pa'am legs par chub pa/ legs par brtsams pa/ 'phags pa bzhed pa'am 'phags pa dgyes pa/ bsnyen gnas la
<p>36b.5</p>nye ba san+ti/ tsA ri tra sam+ban+naH/ bA ri trA saM pa n+naH/ A ya t+yAM saM ba ra mA pa h+ya te/ sa mA dA ya bar+t+taM te/ sA d+hu da maH/ sA d+hu sha maH/ sA d+hu saM yA maH/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi yan lag gi ming la/ yo gA tsA raH/ yo gI/ yo gaH/ yo ni sho ma na si kA raH/ pra
<p>36b.6</p>bar gnas pa/ cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/ bzlog pa phun sum tshogs pa/ phyis sdom pa 'dzin pa/ yang dag par bzung nas gnas pa/ dul ba legs/ zhi ba legs/ yang dag par sdom pa legs/ rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnal 'byor ba/ rnal 'byor/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa/ nang
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>ti saM la ya naM/ dr-iSh+Ta d+har+m+ma su kha bi hA raH/ A swA da na saM pra yuk+ta d+h+yA naM/ b+hA ba nA rA ma tA/ a b+hi Sh+yan+da ya ti/ ba ri Sh+yan+da ya ti/ ba ri prI Na ya ti/ ba ri sba ra ti/ e kA ki no ra ho ga tA/ s+thU la b+hit+ti ka tA/ 
<p>37a.2</p>du yang dag 'jog /mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas/ myong ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan/ sgom pa la dga' ba/ mnyen par byed/ yongs su mnyen par byed/ yongs su tshim par byed/ kun du rgyas par byed/ gcig pu dben pa'am lkog tu song ste/ rtsig pa stug po lta bur/ 
<p>37a.3</p>o dA ri ka tA/ duHkha li tA/ a mo g+hA/ a ban+d+h+yaM/ sa pha laM/ e ko tI b+hA baH/ /lung bstan pa bzhi'i ming la/ e kAM sha byA ka ra Na ma?/ bi b+ha dz+ya byA ka ra NaM/ ba ri pr-its+tsha byA ka ra NaM/ s+thA pa nI ya byA ka ra NaM/ /mtshan nyid gsum gyi ming la/ pa ri ka lpi ta lak+Sha NaM/ pa ra tan+t+ra
<p>37a.4</p>rags pa/ tha ba ngan pa ltar/ don yod pa/ 'bras bu yod pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ rgyud gcig tu gyur pa/ mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa/ rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa/ dris nas lung bstan pa/ gzhag par lung bstan pa/ kun btags pa'i mtshan nyid/ gzhan gyi dbang
<p>37a.5</p>lak+Sha NaM/ pa ri niSh+pa n+na lak+Sha NaM/ /dgongs pa bzhi'i ming la/ sa ma tA bi prA yaH/ kA lAn+ta rA b+hi prA yaH/ ar+thA n+ta rA b+hi prA yaH/ pung+ga lAn+ta rA b+hi prA yaH/ /ldem por dgongs pa bzhi'i ming la/ a pa tA ra NA b+hi san+d+hiH/ lak+Sha NA b+hi san+d+hiH/ pra ti bak+ShA b+hi san+d+hiH/ pa ri NA ma
<p>37a.6</p>gi mtshan nyid/ yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid/ mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa/ dus gzhan la dgongs pa/ don gzhan la dgongs pa/ gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa/ gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pa/ mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa/ gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa/ bsgyur ba la
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>nA b+hi san+d+hiH/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa'i ming la/ sha ma thaH/ bi ba sh+ya nA/ yo ga/ yo ni sho ma na skA raH/ /mi dge ba bcu'i ming la/ trI Ni kA ya dush+tsa ri tA ni/ tsa twA ri bAg+dush+tsa ri tA ni/ trI Ni ma no dush+tsa ri tA ni/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi ming la/ kA ya su tsa ri ta ma?/ brA NA ti g+hA tA dwi ra tiH/ a dAt+tA dA nA dwi ra tiH/ 
<p>37b.2</p>ldem por dgongs pa/ zhi gnas/ lhag mthong / rnal 'byor/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa bzhi/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa/ srog gcod pa spong ba/ ma byin par len pa spong
<p>37b.3</p>kA ma mi th+yA tsA rA dwi ra tiH/ bAk+su tsa ri taM/ mr-iSha bA dAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/ bA ru ShAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/ ba shU n+yAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/ saM b+hin+na pra lA bAt+b+ra ti bi ra tiH/ ma na su tsa ri taM/ a b+hi d+h+yA yAHpra ti bi ra tiH/ byA bA dAta? pra ti bi ra tiH/ mi th+yA dr-iSh+TeHpra ti bir tiH/ /bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ming la/ bu nya kr-i
<p>37b.4</p>ba/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba/ tshig rtsub por smra ba spong ba/ phra mar smra ba spong ba/ tshig bkyal spong ba/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa/ brnab sems spong ba/ gnod sems spong ba/ log par lta ba spong ba/ bsod nams
<p>37b.5</p>yA bstuH/ dA na ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/ shI la ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/ b+hA ba nA ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/ au ba d+hi kaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/ gu NAH/ /don dam pa'i ming la/ ba ra mar+thaH/ tatwaM/ b+hU ta ko TiH/ ta tha
<p>37b.6</p>bya ba'i dngos po/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ yon tan/ don dam pa/ de kho na/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/ de bzhin
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>tA/ a bi ta tha tA/ a na n+ya ta tha tA/ shU n+ya tA/ d+harma d+hA tuH/ d+harma ni yA ma tA/ a tsin+t+ya d+hA tuH/ a bi pa r+YA sa ta tha tA/ a dwa yaM/ a dwau d+hI kA raM/ d+har+m+ma s+thi ti tA/ s+thi tai ba d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+thi ti
<p>38a.2</p>nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ stong pa nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid/ gnyis su med/ gnyis su byar med/ chos gnas pa nyid/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul ni gnas
<p>38a.3</p>tA/ ai kai bai ShA ta thA tA/ d+har+m+ma d+hA twa sam+b+he daH/ a dwa ya me ta da dwau d+hA kA ra ma b+hin+na ma ts+tshin+naM/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ ni rbA NaM/ sau pa d+hi she Sha nir+b+bA NaM/ ni ru ba d+hi she Sha ni rbA
<p>38a.4</p>pa nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig pa nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'am dbyer med pa/ 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
<p>38a.5</p>nama?/ a pra tiSh+Thi ta nir+b+bA Nama?/ ni shri ya saH/ a pa brgaH/ a b+hi sa ma yaH/ shai k+ShaH/ a shai k+ShaH/ nai ba shai k+Sha na shai k+ShaH/ samyak+t+wa ni ya ta rA shiH/ mi th+yA twa ni ya ta rA shiH/ a ni ya ta rA shiH/ /skyabs rnams kyi ming la/ sha ra NaM/ nA thaH/ pa rA
<p>38a.6</p>'das pa/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa/ nges par legs pa/ byang grol/ mngon par rtogs pa/ slob pa/ mi slob pa/ slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po/ ma nges pa'i phung po/ skyabs/ mgon/ dbung
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>ya NaM/ trA NaM/ pa ri trA naM/ tA yI/ la ya NaM/ ga ti/ dwI paH/ tA ra kaH/ ut+tA ra NaM/ pa ri trA tA/ ri mor bya ba'i rnam pa'i ming la/ ban+da naM/ pU dza nA/ mA na nA/ artsa nA/ a btsA ya nA/ tsit+ti kA raH/ sat+kA raH/ gu ru kA raH/ 
<p>38b.2</p>gnyen/ skyob pa/ yongs su skyob pa/ skyob ston/ gnas/ rten/ skyabs dang gling skabs dang sbyar/ sgrol byed/ bsgral ba po/ skyob par byed pa/ phyag 'tshal ba/ mchod pa/ ri mor bya ba/ brjed pa/ gsol ba/ gces par byed pa/ bkur stir bya ba/ bla mar bya ba'am btsun par
<p>38b.3</p>u pas+thA naH/ bar+Yu pA sa naM/ A da raH/ gau ra baM/ aM dza li karmA/ pra t+yut+thA naM/ sA mI tsI/ pra Na myaM/ a b+hi na ma naM/ sA mi tsI ka ra NI yaH/ A ha ba nI yaH/ brA ha ba nI yaH/ b+hak+ti gu ruH/ gu ru shru
<p>38b.4</p>bya ba/ rim gro/ bsnyen bkur/ gus par bya ba/ zhe sa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ mngon du ldang ba/ 'dun pa'am mthun pa/ rab tu 'dud pa/ mngon par 'dud pa/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ kun du sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ bla ma la gus pa'am snying nye ba/ bla ma la srid
<p>38b.5</p>shru ShA/ sa bra tI shaH/ sa gau ra baH/ se ba naM/ b+ha dza naM/ bar+Yu bA sa naM/ u pA sa naM/ saM se ba naM/ u pa se ba naM/ ba hu mA naH/ pra Ni pa t+yaM/ a b+hi pA da naM/ pUr+b+bA b+hi lA bI/ /spro zhing brtson pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ ut+s+r-i tsi taH/ ut+sA haH/ 
<p>38b.6</p>zhu che ba/ zhe sa dang bcas pa/ gus pa dang bcas pa/ bsten pa/ bsnyen pa/ bsnyen bkur byed pa/ bsnyen bkur byed pa/ yang dag par bsten pa/ nye bar bsten pa/ ri mor bya ba'i rin po cher bya ba/ phyag 'tshal lam btud nas/ gus par smra ba/ gsong por smra ba/ spro ba'am/ brtson pa/ 
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>A ram+b+haH/ a tan+d+ri taH/ sat+k+r-i t+ya kA rI/ sA tan+t+ya kA rI/ ni ya kaH/ pra ti dz+nyot+ta ra kaH/ As+thi ti kr-i yA/ a b+hi yo gaH/ u d+yo gaH/ yo ga mA pan+ta byaM/ d+harmA
<p>39a.2</p>rtsom pa/ mi g.yel ba'am snyoms las med pa/ gus par byed pa/ rgyun du byed pa/ rtag 'grus che/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus pa/ nyams su len pa'am zhen par byed pa/ mngon par brtson pa/ brtson pa/ brtson par bya rnal 'byor du bya sbyor bar bya skabs dang sbyar zhing gdags/ 
<p>39a.3</p>nu d+har+m+ma pra ti pat+tiH/ A dIp+ta shi ra sh+tse lo ba maH/ ot+suk+taM/ pa rA kra maH/ A tA yI/ A tap+ta kA rI/ u d+ya taH/ ni ra taH/ as+thI kr-i t+yaH/ pra ti
<p>39a.4</p>chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu/ spro ba'am brtson pa skabs dang sbyar/ brtul ba'am pha rol gnon pa'am dpa' ba/ rtun pa/ brtun cing byed pa/ brtson pa'am zhugs pa/ 'bad pa'am brtson pa/ ru shing ltar 'dzin pa'am ched cher 'dzin pa/ nan tan snying
<p>39a.5</p>pat+ti sA raH/ na byA hA ra ru ta bAk+pa ra maH/ byab sA yaH/ a b+h+yut+sA haH/ san+nA ha san+nad+d+haH/ dr-i D+ha sA raM/ ut+tap+taH/ ud+ya maH/ mi 'dzem pa'i ming la/ a b+hI ru tA bi sA ra daH/ ats+tsha b+hI/ nir+b+ha yaH/ a bi ShA daH/ 
<p>39a.6</p>por byed pa/ brjod pa'i sgra dang smra ba lhur byed pa ma yin/ 'bad pa'am rtsol ba/ mngon par spro ba/ go cha bgos/ sra zhing brtan pa/ 'bar ba'am gsal ba'am sbyangs pa'am skabs dang sbyar/ nan tan nam 'bad pa/ mi 'jigs pa/ bag tsha ba med pa/ 'jigs pa med pa/ zhum pa med pa/ mi
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>no trA sa ti na san+t+rA sa ti/ na san+t+rA sa mA pa d+ya ti/ na lI ya te/ na saM lI ya te/ na dze hrI ya te/ nArti ya te/ phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i ming la/ pany+tso pA dA na skan+d+hAH/ rU pa skan+d+haH/ be da na skan+d+haH/ saM dz+nyA skan+d+haH/ saM skA ra skan+d+haH/ bi dz+nyA na skan+d+haH/ /gzugs kyi phung po so sor phye ba'i ming la/ tsatwA ri ma hA d+hU tA ni/ 
<p>39b.2</p>skrag mi dngangs/ dngangs par mi 'gyur/ mi zhum/ mi 'gong / mi 'dzem/ mi ldog /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga/ gzugs kyi phung po/ chor ba'i phung po/ 'du shes kyi phung po/ 'du byed kyi phung po/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi/ 
<p>39b.3</p>pr-i thi bI d+hA tuH/ ap+d+hA tuH/ te dzo d+hA tuH/ bA yu d+hA tuH/ kak+kha Ta twaM/ dra ba twaM/ uSh+Na twaM/ lag+hu sa mu dI ra Na twaM/ u pA dA ya rU paM/ dza na naM/ ni shre yaH/ s+thA naMH/ u pastam+b+haH/ u nga br-i ha NaM/ tsak+Shu rin+d+ri yaM/ shro ten+d+ri yaM/ g+h+rA Ne n+d+ri yaM/ dzi hwen+d+ri yaM/ kA
<p>39b.4</p>sa'i khams/ chu'i khams/ me'i khams/ rlung gi khams/ srab nyid/ gsher ba nyid/ tsha ba nyid/ yang zhing g.yo ba nyid/ rgyur byas pa'i gzugs/ skyed pa/ rten gnas/ rton pa/ 'phel bar byed pa/ mig gi dbang po/ rna ba'i dbang po/ /sna'i dbang po/ /lce'i dbang po/ lus
<p>39b.5</p>yen+d+ri yaM/ rU pa pra sA daH rU paM/ shab+daH/ gan+d+haH/ rasaH/ spraSh+Ta byaM/ bar+N+Na rU paM/ nI laM/ bI taM/ lo hi taM/ a ba dA taM/ aphAM/ d+hU maH/ ra dzaH/ ma hi kA/ ts+tsha yA/ A tA baH/ A lo kaH an+d+ha kA raH/ saM s+thA na rU paM/ dIr+g+haM/ hra swaM/ prit+taM/ pa ri maN+Da laM/ 
<p>39b.6</p>kyi dbang po/ /gzugs dang ba/ gzugs/ sgra/ dri/ ro/ reg bya/ kha dog gi gzugs/ sngon po/ ser po/ dmar po/ dkar po/ sprin/ du ba/ rdul/ khug rna/ grib ma/ nyi ma/ snang ba/ mun pa/ dbyibs kyi gzugs/ ring po/ /thung ngu / lham ba/ zlum po/ phya le
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>shA taM/ bi shA taM/ b+hau ti ka rU baM/ un+na taM/ a ba na taM/ tsa tu ra sraM/ bi dz+nyA pra tI/ sa ni daR+sha naM/ a ni darga naM/ sa pra hi g+haH/ a pra ti g+haH/ a nu pAt+ta ma hA b+hU ta he tu kaH/ satwA
<p>40a.2</p>ba'am mnyam pa/ phya le ba ma yin pa'am mi mnyam pa/ 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs/ mthon po/ /dma' ba/ gru bzhi/ rnam par rig byed/ bstan du yod pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa dang bcas pa/ thogs pa med pa/ ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba/ sems can
<p>40a.3</p>khyo\u0f85sa twA khyaH/ ma no dz+nyA ma no dz+nyAsh+tsa/ u bAt+ta ma hA b+hU ta he tu kaH/ satwA khyo satwA khyaH/ ma no dz+nyA ma no dz+nyAsh+tsaH/ su gan+d+haH/ durgan+d+haH/ sa ma gan+d+haH/ bi Sha ma gan+d+haH/ ma d+hUraH/ am+laH/ la ba NaH/ ka Tu kaH/ tik+taH/ 
<p>40a.4</p>ston pa dang sems can du mi ston pa/ yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba/ zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba/ sems can du ston pa dang sems can du mi ston pa/ yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang / dri zhim pa/ dring ba/ dri mnyam pa/ dri mi mnyam pa/ mngar ba/ skyur ba/ lan tshwa/ tsha ba/ kha ba/ 
<p>40a.5</p>ka ShA yaH/ sh+lak+Sh+Na twaM/ karka sha twaM/ gu ru twaM/ lag+hu twaM/ shI taM/ bu b+huk+ShA/ dzi g+hat+sA/ bi bA sA/ a bi dz+nyAp+tiH/ tshor ba'i phung po so sor byed pa'i ming la/ su khA/ duHkhA/ a duHkhA su khA/ /'du shes kyi phung po so sor bye ba'i ming la/ pa rIt+tA/ ma hAd+b+hu tA/ a pra mA nA/ /sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'du
<p>40a.6</p>bska ba/ 'jam pa/ rtsub ba/ lci ba/ yang ba/ grang ba/ bkres pa/ bkres pa'am ltogs pa/ skom pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin/ bde ba/ sdug bsngal/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ chung ngu / chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ 
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>byed dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byad kyi ming la/ tsai ta si kA d+harmAH/ spaR+shaH/ saM dz+nyA/ be da nA/ ma na skA raH/ tse ta nA/ ts+tshan+daH/ a d+hi mo k+ShaH/ smr-i tiH/ pra dz+nyA/ sa mA d+hiH/ shrad+d+hA/ hrIH/ a ba trA byam/ a lo b+haHku sha la mU laM/ a dwe ShaHku sha la mU laM/ a mo haH
<p>40b.2</p>sems las byung ba'i chos rnams/ reg pa/ 'du shes/ tshor ba/ yid la byed pa/ sems pa/ 'dun pa/ mos pa/ dran pa/ shes rab/ ting 'dzin/ dad pa/ ngo tsha shes pa/ khrel yod pa/ ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ gti mug
<p>40b.3</p>ku sha la mU laM/ bI r+YaM/ pra sab+d+hiH/ a bra mA daH/ u pek+ShA/ a hiM sA/ rA gaH/ bra ti g+haH/ mA naH/ a d+hi mA naH/ mA nA ti mA naH/ asmi mA naH/ a b+hi mA naH/ U na mA naH/ mi th+yA mA naH/ a bi d+yA/ dr-iSh+TiH
<p>40b.4</p>med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ brtson 'grus/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ bag yod pa/ btang snyoms/ mi 'tshe ba/ 'dod chags/ khong khro ba/ nga rgyal/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal/ log pa'i nga rgyal/ ma rig pa/ lta ba/ 
<p>40b.5</p>sat+kA ya dr-iSh+TiH/ an+ta grA ha dr-iSh+TiH/ mi th+yA dr-iSh+TiH/ dr-iSh+Ti pa rA maR+shaH/ shI la bra ta pa rA maR+shaH/ bi tsi kit+sA/ kro d+haH/ u pa nA haH/ mrak+ShaH/ pra dA saH/ iR+ShA/ mat+ma r+YaM/ mA yA/ shA d+h+yaM/ ma daH/ bi hiM sA/ a hrI kyaM/ a na pa trA byaM/ a
<p>40b.6</p>'jig tshogs la lta ba/ mthar 'dzin par lta ba/ log par lta ba/ lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa/ the tshom/ khro ba/ khon du 'dzin pa/ 'chab pa/ 'tshig pa/ phrag dog /ser sna/ sgyu/ g.yo/ rgyags pa/ rnam par 'tshe ba/ ngo tsha med pa/ khrel med pa/ ma
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>shrad+d+h+yaM/ kau shI d+yaM/ pra mAdaH/ mu Shi ta smr-i ti tA/ bi k+ShepaH/ a sam+p+ra dza n+yaM/ aud+d+ha t+yaM/ kau kr-i t+yaM/ s+t+yA naM/ mi d+d+haM/ bi tarkaH/ bi tsA raH/ prAp+tiH/ a prAp+tiH/ a saM dz+nyAM sa mA bat+tiH/ ni ro d+ha sa mA pat+ti/ a saM dz+nyi kaM/ 
<p>41a.2</p>dad pa/ le lo/ bag med pa/ brjed ngas pa/ g.ying ba/ shes bzhin ma yin pa/ rgod pa/ 'gyod pa/ rmugs pa/ gnyid/ rtog pa/ dpyod pa/ 'thob pa/ 'thob pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 'du shes med pa/ 
<p>41a.3</p>dzA+e bi ten+d+ri yaM/ ni kA ya sa b+hA gaH/ dzA tiH/ dza rA/ s+thi tiH/ a ni t+ya tA/ nA makA yaH/ pa da ka yaH/ byany+dza na kA yaH/ e baM b+hA gI yA/ bra br-it+tiH/ pra ti ni ya maH/ yo gaH/ dzA baH/ a nu kra maH/ kA laH/ de shaH/ saM khyA/ b+he daH/ sA ma grI/ pra ban+d+haH/ 
<p>41a.4</p>srog gi dbang po/ rigs mthun pa/ skye ba/ rga ba/ gnas pa/ mi rtag pa/ ming gi tshogs/ tshig gi tshogs/ yi ge'i tshogs/ de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa/ 'jug pa/ so sor nges pa/ 'byor 'brel/ mgyogs pa/ go rims/ dus/ yul/ grangs/ tha dad pa'am bye brag/ 'du 'phrod dam tshogs pa/ rgyun/ 
<p>41a.5</p>a n+ya thA twaM/ pra ban+d+ho par maH/ byany+dza naM/ a k+Sha raM/ bar+NaH/ /rnam par shes pa'i ming la/ A la ya bi dz+nyA naM/ A dA na bi dz+nyA naM/ kliSh+Ta mnaH/ tsak+Shu rbi dz+nyA naM/ shro tra bi dz+nyA naM/ g+h+rA Na bi dz+nyA naM/ dzi hwa bi dz+nyA naM/ kA ya bi dz+nyA naM/ ma no
<p>41a.6</p>gzhan du 'gyur ba/ rgyun chad pa/ gsal byed/ yi ge/ brjod pa/ kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa/ len pa'i rnam par shes pa/ nyon mongs pa can gyi yid/ mig gi rnam par shes pa/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa/ yid kyi
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>bi dz+nyA naM/ /skye mched bcu gnyis kyi ming la/ tsak+Shu rA ya ta naM/ rU pA ya ta naM/ shro trA ya ta naM/ shab+dA ya ta naM/ g+h+rA NA ya ta naM/ gan+d+hA ya ta naM/ dzi hwA ya ta naM/ ra sA ya ta naM/ kA yA ya ta naM/ sbraSh+Ta byA ya ta naM/ ma na A ya ta naM/ d+harmA ya ta naM/ /khams bco brgyad kyi ming la/ tsak+Shu r+b+hA tuH/ rU pa
<p>41b.2</p>rnam par shes pa/ mig gi skye mched/ gzugs kyi skye mched/ rna ba'i skye mched/ sgra'i skye mched/ sna'i skye mched/ dri'i skye mched/ lce'i skye mched/ ro'i skye mched/ lus kyi skye mched/ reg bya'i skye mched/ yid kyi skye mched/ chos kyi skye mched/ mig gi khams/ gzugs
<p>41b.3</p>d+hA tuH/ tsak+Shurbi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/ shro tra d+hA tuH/ shab+da d+hA tuH/ shro tra bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/ g+h+rA Na d+hA tuH/ gan+d+ha d+hA tuH/ g+h+rA Na bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/ dzi hwa d+hA tuH/ ra sa d+hA tuH/ dzi hwa bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/ kA ya d+hA tuH/ spraSh+Ta bya d+hA tuH/ kA ya bi dz+nyA na d+hA
<p>41b.4</p>kyi khams/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rna ba'i khams/ sgra'i khams/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ sna'i khams/ dri'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lce'i khams/ ro'i khams/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lus kyi khams/ reg bya'i khams/ lus kyi rnam par shes
<p>41b.5</p>tuH/ ma no d+hA tuH/ d+harma d+hA tuH/ ma no bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/ /dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi ming la/ tsak+Shu rin+d+ri yaM/ shro tren+d+ri yaM/ g+h+rA Nen+d+ri yaM/ dzi hwe n+d+ri yaM/ kA yen+d+ri yaM/ ma na in+d+ri yaM/ pu ru Shen+d+ri yaM/ s+t+rIn+d+ri yaM/ duHkhen+d+ri yaM/ su khen+d+ri yaM/ sau ma na s+yen+d+ri yaM/ daurma
<p>41b.6</p>pa'i khams/ yid kyi khams/ chos kyi khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ mig gi dbang po/ rna ba'i dbang po/ sna'i dbang po/ lce'i dbang po/ lus kyi dbang po/ yid kyi dbang po/ pho'i dbang po/ mo'i dbang po/ sdug bsngal gyi dbang po/ bde ba'i dbang po/ yid bde ba'i dbang po/ yid mi
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>na s+yan+d+ri yaM/ u pe k+Shen+d+ri yaM/ shrad+d+hen+d+ri yaM/ bI r+Ye n+d+raM yaM/ smr-i tIn+d+raM yaM/ sa mA d+hIn+d+ri yaM/ bradz+nyen+d+ri yaM/ a nA dz+nyA ta mA dz+nyA s+yA mIn+d+ri yaM/ A dz+nyen+d+ri yaM/ A dz+nyA tA bIn+d+ri yaM/ dzI bi ten+d+ri yaM/ /phung po khams dang
<p>42a.2</p>bde ba'i dbang po/ btang snyoms [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]dbang po/ dad pa'i dbang po/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po/ dran pa'i dbang po/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po/ shes rab kyi dbang po/ mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po/ kun shes pa'i dbang po/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po/ srog gi dbang po/ 
<p>42a.3</p>skye mched dang dbang po bshad pa'i nang nas 'byung pa'i ming sna tshogs la/ a ba d+hA ra NaM/ A shra ya b+hU ta rU pa NA ta?/ su bar+NaM/ durba NaM/ paN+Du raM/ sh+yA maM/ sha ba laM/ piM ga laM/ tsa tuHpar+sh+waM/ A
<p>42a.4</p>nges par 'dzin pa'am dbye ba/ rten du gyur pa gzugs su yod pa'i phyir ra ma gzhag tu rung ba'i phyir/ kha dog bzang po'am mdog bzang po/ kha dog ngan pa'am mdog mi sdug pa/ skya'o/ /sngo bsangs/ sre bo'am khra bo'am stag ri'am 'dres pa/ ser skya/ ngos gzhi/ sgrin
<p>42a.5</p>b+ho gaH/ a b+hi lA ShaH/ saM stu taM/ a saM pra mo ShaH/ bi hi taM/ a b+hi sam+p+ra t+ya yaM/ ladz+dzA/ sa m+p+ra ti pat+tiH/ ut+sA haH/ pra sha ThatA/ dau Sh+Thu l+yaM/ karma nya tA/ A g+hA taH/ shre yaH/ ba hun+ta ra
<p>42a.6</p>ba'am 'jug pa'am gzo ba/ 'dod pa/ 'dris pa/ mi brjed pa/ byas pa'am bskyed pa/ mngon par yid ches pa/ 'dzem pa'am ngo tsha ba/ yang dag par rtogs pa/ spro ba/ rnal du bab pa'am 'dug pa/ gnas ngan len/ las su rung ba/ kun nas mnar sems/ legs pa'am dge ba'am che ba/ khyad ches
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>bi shaSh+TaH/ a pa kA raH/ bai rA nu ban+d+haH/ tsaN+Da ba tso dA shi tA/ byA ro ShaH/ A gra haH/ bany+tsa nA/ pa r+YA dA naM/ bi he Tha nA/ bi bra ti sA raH/ ma no dzalpa/ ma hAb+hU mi kaH/ sa ha dzaH/ ba ri kalpi haM/ At+ma mo haH/ 
<p>42b.2</p>'phags pa/ gnod par byed pa/ mdud par 'dzin pa/ tshig brlang pos zher 'debs pa/ khong nas 'khrug pa/ kun du 'dzin pa/ slu pa/ yongs su gtugs pa'am 'phyos pa/ tho 'tshams pa/ yid la bcags pa/ yid la brjod pa'am rtog pa/ sa chen po pa/ lhan cig skyes pa/ kun du brtag pa/ bdag tu rmongs pa/ 
<p>42b.3</p>At+ma dr-iSh+TiH/ At+ma mA naH/ At+ma sne haH/ san+tA nA nu br-it+tiH/ e ka dzA tI ya bi dz+nyA naM/ sa b+hA gaH/ tat+sa b+hA gaH/ nirbitra/ kAM k+ShaH/ bi ma tiH/ a nu na yaH/ kA ma rA gaH/ b+ha ba rA gaH/ saM yo dza naM/ 
<p>42b.4</p>bdag tu lta ba/ bdag tu nga rgyal/ /bdag la chags pa/ rgyun chags par 'jug pa/ rnam par shes pa rigs gcig pa/ bsten pa dang bcas pa/ de'i bsten pa dang bcas pa/ yid 'byung ba/ so ma nyi'am nem nur/ yid gnyis/ rjes su chags pa/ 'dod pa la 'dod chags/ srid pa'i 'dod chags/ kun du sbyor
<p>42b.5</p>ban+d+ha naM/ a nu sha yaH/ par+Yu N+th+'a naM/ u pa kle shaH/ par+Ya bas+thA naM/ par+Ya ba na d+d+haM/ A shra baH/ o g+haH/ yo gaH/ u pA dA naM/ gran+thaH/ ni ba ra NaM/ kA ma pra ti saM yuk+taM/ rU pa bra ti saM yuk+taM/ ArU bya bra ti saM yuk+taM/ daR+sha na pra hA ta byaM/ 
<p>42b.6</p>pa/ 'ching ba/ bag la nyal dang phra rgyas skabs dang sbyar/ kun nas ldang pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa/ kun nas dkris pa/ yongs su dkris pa/ zag pa/ chu bo/ sbyor ba/ nye bar len pa/ mdud pa/ sgrib pa/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa/ gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzugs med ba dang ldan pa/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba/ 
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>b+hA ba na pra hA ta byaM/ kA mAp+taH/ kA ma d+hA tu par+YA pan+naH/ kA mA ba tsa raH/ ur+d+ha b+hA gI yaH/ a pa ra b+hA gI yaH/ ang+ga NaM/ sa ra NaM/ a haM kA raH/ ma ma kA raH/ dIr+g+hA
<p>43a.2</p>sgom pas spang bar bya ba/ 'dod par bsdus pa/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa/ 'dod pa na spyod pa/ gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa/ tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa/ nyon mongs pa'i ming ste 'od man skor ba/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ ngar 'dzin pa'am nga rgyal/ bdag gir 'dzin pa/ ring du
<p>43a.3</p>nu pa ri bar+t+tI/ sa dA nu bad+d+ho b+ha ba ti/ pra ti san+d+hiH/ saM sA raH/ san+d+him+bA p+no ti/ sa ma nu ban+d+haH/ tsit+tA nu pa ri bar+t+tI/ a nu sa hi taMH/ sa ma gra sA ma grI/ pra ti sa m+ba d+hA ti/ a pra ti san+d+hiH/ a nu bar+t+ta naM/ san+tA na
<p>43a.4</p>rjes su 'brang ba/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang par 'gyur/ nying mtshams sbyor ba/ 'khor ba/ 'brel par byed pa/ rjes su 'brang ba/ sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ rjes su 'brel pa/ 'du ba tshogs pa/ nying mtshams sbyor ba'am 'brel bar byed pa/ mtshams sbyor ba med pa/ rjes su 'jug pa/ rgyu la 'bras bu
<p>43a.5</p>bar+t+tI/ A nuts+tsha bi kaH/ a nu san+d+hiH/ sA nu tsA raH/ pra bA haH/ a nu ban+d+haH/ a dza srama?/ a nu ga taH/ a b+hU twAb+hA baH/ ya thA yo gaM/ a saM skr-i taM/ pra ti saM khyA ni ro d+haH/ a pra ti saM khyA
<p>43a.6</p>rgyud la yod pa skad dod dang 'di 'grig kyang don thob kyis dkyus bzhin 'gyur bcos pa'ang mchad/ yod pa/ 'phrod pa'am 'byor pa/ mtshams sbyor ba/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ rgyun/ rgyun chags pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'am khor mor/ rjes su song ba'am rjes su zhugs pa'am rjes su mthun pa/ ma byung ba las byung ba/ ci rigs par/ 'dus ma byas/ so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa/ so sor brtags pa ma
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>ni ro d+haH/ suM skr-i taH/ sA sa baH/ a nA sra baH/ /chags pa dang zhen pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ rak+taH/ sak+taH/ gr-id+d+haH/ graM thi taM/ mU r+ts+tshi taM/ ad+h+ya ba si taH/ ad+h+ya ba sA na mA pan+naH/ a bya ba sA naM/ bi ni ban+d+hAM/ pa ri gred+haH/ saM rA gaH/ lo lu paH/ 
<p>43b.2</p>yin pa'i 'gog pa/ 'dus byas/ zag pa dang bcas pa/ zag pa med pa/ chags pa/ zhen pa/ chums pa'am mkhron pa/ mdud pa bor ba/ brgyal ba/ lhag par chags pa/ lhag par chags par gyur pa/ lhag par zhen pa/ rnam par bcings pa/ yongs su zhen pa/ kun du 'dod chags/ bskam pa/ 
<p>43b.3</p>g+hasma raH/ lam+pa TaH/ lub+d+haH/ saM rak+taH/ rany+dza nI yaH/ b+hU ya skA ma tA/ yA dr-its+tshi kaH/ its+tshan+ti kaH/ b+hU yats+tshan+di kaH/ b+hU yo ru tsitA/ b+hU yo\u0f85b+hi prA yaH/ swA
<p>43b.4</p>lto che ba'am za phod pa/ dad che ba'am lto che ba/ brkam chags/ kun du chags/ chags pa 'gyur ba/ yang 'dod pa'am phyir zhing 'dod pa'am mang du 'dod pa'am 'dod pa/ 'dod rgyal/ 'dod chen/ phyir zhing sred pa'am phyir zhing 'dun pa/ phyir zhing dad che ba/ phyir zhing sems pa'am mang du sems pa/ myang bar
<p>43b.5</p>du kA ma tA/ bi tsi tA hA ra tA/ ne ta re ta re Na san+tuSh+TiH/ nan+dI rA gaH/ kA mats+tshan+daH/ a b+hi ni be shaH/ As+thA/ spr-i hA/ ro tsa naH/ its+tsha n+ti kaH/ ya' dr-its+tshi kaH/ tIpre Nats+tshan+de na/ A hA re gr-id+d+hir+b+ha ba tiH/ 
<p>43b.6</p>'dod pa'am zhim por 'dod pa/ zas 'dam pa/ ngan ngon gyis chog mi shes pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa/ mngon par zhen ba/ chags pa'am zhen pa/ 'dod pa'am re ba'am dga' ba/ 'dod pa'am sred pa/ 'dod chen pa/ 'dod rgyal ba/ 'dun pa drag pos/ kha zas la brkam par 'gyur/ 
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>gAr+d+d+hama?/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi ming la/ duHkha duH kha tA/ saM skA ra duHkha tA/ bi ba ri NA ma duHkha tA/ /sdug bsngal brgyad kyi ming la/ dzA ti duHkhaM/ dza rA duHkhaM/ byA d+hi duHkhaM/ ma ra Na duHkhaM/ pri ya bi bra yo go duHkhaM/ a pri ya saM pra yo
<p>44a.2</p>zhen pa/ sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal/ 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal/ rga ba'i sdug bsngal/ na ba'i sdug bsngal/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal/ sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal/ mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug
<p>44a.3</p>go duHkhaM/ ya da pIts+tsha paR+Ye Sha mA No na la b+ha te ta da pi duHkhaM/ saM k+She pe Na pany+tso pA dA na skan+d+ha duHkhaM/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ming la/ a bi d+yA/ saM skA raH/ bi dz+nyA naM/ nA ma rU paM/ Sha DA ya ta naM/ spaR+shaH/ be da nA/ triSh+NA/ u bA dA naM/ b+ha baH/ dzA tiH/ dza rA ma ra NaM/ sho
<p>44a.4</p>bsngal/ gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed par de yang sdug bsngal/ mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal/ /ma rig pa/ 'du byed/ rnam par shes pa/ ming dang gzugs/ skye mched drug/ reg pa/ tshor ba/ sred pa/ len pa/ srid pa/ skye pa/ rga shi/ mya
<p>44a.5</p>kaH/ pa ri de baH/ duHkhaM/ daurman s+yaM/ u bA yA saH/ /rgyu drug gi ming la/ kA ra Na he tuH/ sa hA b+hU he tuH/ bi pA ka he tuH/ sam+p+ra yuk+ta ka he tuH/ sarba tra ga he tuH/ sa ma b+hA ga he tuH/ /rkyen bzhi'i ming la/ he tu pra t+ya yaH/ sa man n+ta ra pra t+ya yaH/ A laM ba na pra t+ya yaH/ a d+hi pa
<p>44a.6</p>ngan/ smre sngags 'don pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yid mi bde ba/ 'khrug pa/ byed pa'i rgyu/ lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu/ rnam par smin pa'i rgyu/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu/ kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu/ skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu/ rgyu'i rkyen/ de ma thag pa'i rkyen/ dmigs pa'i rkyen/ bdag
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>te prat+ya yaH/ /'bras bu lnga'i ming la/ ni Sh+yan+da pha laM/ a d+hi pa ti pha laM/ pu ru Sha kA ra pha laM/ bi pA ka pha laM/ bi saM yo ga pha laM/ /skye gnas bzhi'i ming la/ dzA rA yu dzA/ aN+Da dzA/ saM swe da dzA/ u ba bA du kA/ /zas bzhi'i ming la/ 
<p>44b.2</p>po'i rkyen/ rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu/ bdag po'i 'bras bu/ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu skabs gzhan du skyes bu'i mthur yang gdags/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu/ bral ba'i 'bras bu/ mngal nas skye ba/ sgo nga las skye ba/ drod gsher las skye ba/ rdzus te skye ba/ 
<p>44b.3</p>ka ba ti kA hA raH/ spaR+ShA hA raH/ ma na saM tse ta nA hA raH/ bi dz+nyA na mA hA raH/ /sems can gyi gnas dgu'i ming la/ na ba sa twA bA sAH/ nA nA twa kA yAH/ nA nA twa saM dz+nyi naH/ tad+ya thA ma nuSh+yA e ka t+yush+tsa de bAH/ nA nA twa ka yAH/ e ka twa saM dz+nyi naH/ tad+ya thA de ba brah+ma kA yi kAHbra tha mA b+hi nir+b+r-it+tA/ e ka
<p>44b.4</p>kham gyi zas/ reg pa'i zas/ yid la sems pa'i zas/ rnam par shes pa'i zas/ sems can gyi gnas dgu/ lus tha dad cing / 'du shes tha dad ba dag/ dper na mi rnams dang lha kha cig go /lus tha dad la/ 'du shes gcig pa dag/ dper na tshangs ris kyi lha dag dang por 'byung pa'o/ /lus
<p>44b.5</p>twa kA yAH/ nA nA twa saM dz+nyinaH/ tad+ya thA A b+hA swa rAH/ e ka twa kA yAH/ e ka twa saM dz+nyi naH/ tad+ya thA de bA shu b+ha kr-it+s+nAH/ A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta naM/ bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya naM/ A kiny+tsa n+yA ya ta naM/ nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta naM/ a saM
<p>44b.6</p>gcig la/ 'du shes tha dad pa dag /dper na 'od gsal ba rnams so/ /lus gcig la/ 'du shes gcig pa dag /dper na dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched/ 'du shes med
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>dz+nyi sa twA/ /mi khom pa brgyad kyi ming la/ aSh+TA bak+ShaNAH/ na ra kA/ tir+Ya ny+tsaH/ pre tA/ dIr+g+hA yu Sho de bA/ bra t+yan+ta dza na pa daM/ in+d+ri ya bai ka l+yaM/ me th+yA da R+sha naM/ ta thA ga tA nA ma nu t+pA daM/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ dr-iSh+Ti d+ha rma pe da nI yaM/ u pa
<p>45a.2</p>pa'i sems can/ mi khom brgyad/ sems can dmyal ba/ dud 'gro/ yi dgas/ lha tshe ring po/ /mtha' 'khob kyi mi/ dbang po mtshang ba/ log par lta ga de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba/ mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba/ skyes
<p>45a.3</p>pa d+ya be da nI yaM/ a pa ra par+YA ya be da nI yaM/ ni ya ta be da nI yaM/ a ni ya ta be da nI yaM/ karma swa kaH/ karma dA ya daH/ kar+m+ma yo niH/ karma pra ti sa ra Na ma?/ pra yo gaH/ mo laM/ pr-iSh+TaM/ A se bi taM/ b+hA
<p>45a.4</p>nas myong bar 'gyur ba/ lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/ myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa/ myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa/ las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal spyod pa/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las brten par bya ba/ sbyor ba/ dngos gzhi/ 'jug /bsten pa'am bsnyen ba/ bsgom pa'am goms
<p>45a.5</p>bi taM/ ba hu lI kr-i taM/ /mtshams med lnga'i ming la/ mA tr-i g+hA taH/ a r+had+ba d+haH/ pi tr-i g+hA taH/ sang+g+ha b+he daH/ ta thA ga ta s+yAn+ti ke duSh+Ta tsit+ta ru d+hi ro t+bA da naM/ /mtshams med pa dag nye ba lnga'i ming la/ mA tu rar+haMn+t+yA du Sha NaM/ ni ya ta b+hu mi s+thi ta s+ya bo d+hi satwa s+ya nA ra NaM/ 
<p>45a.6</p>par byas pa/ lan mang du byas pa/ ma bsad pa/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa/ pha bsad pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba/ ma dgra bcom ma sun phyung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i sa la gnas pa bsad pa/
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>shai k+Sha s+ya mAr NaM/ saM g+hA ya dwAR+Ya ha ra NaM/ stU pa b+he da naM/ /snyigs ma lnga'i ming la/ A yu ska ShA yaH/ dr-iSh+Ti ka ShA yaH/ kle sha ka ShA saH/ sa twa ka ShA yaH/ kalpa ka ShA yaH/ /'jig rten chos brgyad gyi ming la/ lA b+haH/ a lA b+haH/ ya shaH/ a ya shaH/ nin+dA/ pra shaM saH/ su khaM/ duH khaM/ 
<p>45b.2</p>slob pa bsad pa/ dge 'dun gyi 'du ba'i sgo phrog pa/ mchod rten 'jig pa/ tshe'i snyigs ma/ lta ba'i snyigs ma/ nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma/ sems can gyi snyigs ma/ dus kyi snyigs ma/ rnyed pa/ ma rnyed pa/ snyan pa/ mi snyan pa/ smad pa/ bstod pa/ bde ba/ sdug bsngal/ 
<p>45b.3</p>yon tan sna tshogs kyi ming la/ d+harmAr+thi kaH/ bo d+hi tsit+tA sam+p+ro mo ShaH/ a ni shri taH/ u dA rA d+hi muk+ti kaH/ A tsA ra shI laH/ A tsA ra s+thaH/ kr-i ta be dI/ kr-i ta dz+nyaH/ A dz+nyA ka raH/ su kha saM bA saH/ sU ra haH/ bai sa laH/ r-i dzu tsit+taH/ 
<p>45b.4</p>chos don du gnyer ba'am chos 'dod pa/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa/ mi gnas pa'am mi brten pa/ rgya chen po la mos pa/ cho ga'i ngang tshul can/ cho ga la gnas pa/ byas pa tshor ba/ byas pa gzo ba/ bka' bzhin byed pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ nges pa/ nges pa'am gya nom pa/ sems drang po/ /
<p>45b.5</p>Ardza baH/ mArda baH/ pra dak+Shi Na grA hI/ su ba tsA/ bra tits+tshan+da ka l+yA NaH/ alba ka ra NI yaH/ a lba kr-it+YaH/ a lwets+tshaH/ Ar+Ya baM sha san+tuSh+TaH/ d+harma lA b+ha san+tuSh+TaH/ tsI ba ra san+tuSh+TaH/ biN+Da pA tra san+tuSh+TaH/ sha la nA sa na san+tuSh+TaH/ su po
<p>45b.6</p>gnas po/ /mnyen pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ bka' blo bde ba/ dge ba mi choms pa/ byed pa nyung ba/ bya ba nyung ba/ 'dod pa chung ba/ 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog shes pa/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa/ gos kyis chog bar 'dzin pa/ bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa/ mal stan gyis chog shes pa/ gso
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>Sha tA/ su b+ha ra tA/ nan+da b+hA Sh+yo b+ha ba ti/ na tsa pa re ShAM do ShAn+ta ras+kha li ta ga be ShI/ ka l+yA Na mi tre Na pa ri gr-i hI taH/ ba hu shru taH/ iM gi ta dz+nyaH/ su bra bud+d+haH/ ut+g+haT+Ti ta dz+nyaH/ bi
<p>46a.2</p>sla ba/ dgang sla ba/ nyung du smra ba yin/ gzhan dag nyes pa'i skabs dang 'khrul pa mi tshol/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ mang du thos pa/ zur tsam gyis go ba/ legs par sad pa'am legs par khong du chud pa/ mgo smos bas go ba/ rnam par spros pas go
<p>46a.3</p>pany+tsi ta dz+nyaH/ su shru taH/ de sha dz+nyaH/ lo ka dz+nyaH/ At+ma dz+nyaH/ kA la dz+nyaH/ be la dz+nyaH/ sa ma ya dz+nyaH/ mA tra dz+nyaH/ A rA ga ya ti/ na bi rA ga ya ti/ a pa ra pra t+ya yaH/ a pa rA d+hI naH/ a pa ra
<p>46a.4</p>ba'am zhib tu bshad na go ba/ legs par mnyan pa/ yul shes pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ bdag shes pa/ dus shes pa/ tshod shes pa/ dus man shes ba/ drod rig pa'am tshod shes pa/ mnyes par byed/ thugs dbyung par mi byed/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog ba/ gzhan lar gam las pa/ gzhan gyi dring la
<p>46a.5</p>pra Ne yaH/ a na n+ya ne yaH/ bi kra mI/ bI raH/ shU raH/ bi hA ya sa gA mI/ prA sA di kaH/ a pag ta b+h+r-i ku Ti kaH/ ats+tshi dro pa tsA raH/ a mA ya bI/ ya thA bA dI ta thA kA rI/ dr-i D+ha sa mA dA naH/ b+ha ya
<p>46a.6</p>mi 'jog pa/ gzhan gyis mi dkri ba'am gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba/ rtsal chen po/ dpa' ba'am rtul phod pa/ dpa' bo/ nam mkha' 'gro ba/ tshul du shis pa'am mdzes pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ nye bar spyod pa la skyon med pa/ sgyu med pa/ ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa/ yi dam la brtan pa/ 'jigs
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>daR+shI/ ba tsa sA pa ri dzi taH/ pa ri dzi taH/ su sa mAp+taH/ su sa mA rab+d+haH/ ma na sAnyan+wI k+Shi taH/ dr-iSh+T+yA su pra ti bid+d+haH/ bI ta tr-iSh+Na m+b+ha bA b+ha be/ yA nI kr-i taH/ bstu kr-i taH/ a nuSh+Thi taH/ 
<p>46b.2</p>par lta ba/ kha ton byang ba/ legs par byang ba/ shin tu rdzogs par byas pa/ legs par brtsams pa/ yid kyis brtag pa/ mthong bas shin tu rtogs pa/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la sred pa dang bral ba/ lam du byas pa'am bgrod bar byas pa/ dngos por byas pa'am rten du byas pa/ nan tan du byas pa/ 
<p>46b.3</p>sa ma ba han+ti/ A d+hu nA ti/ sarba ka ShaT+TaM shA Da ya ti/ shushrU Sha mA NaH/ a nu bi d+hI ya mA naH/ a nu sU yA/ a nu pA laM b+ha pre k+Shi NaH/ a ba hi ta sro traH/ A ba dzi ta mA na saH/ d+harmo d+harma lab+d+haH/ ni kA ma lA
<p>46b.4</p>yang dag par 'dzom pa'am sel ba/ sprug pa/ snyigs ma thams cad sel ba/ nyan 'dod pa'am gus ba/ bsgo ba bzhin nyan pa'am rjes su 'jug pa/ ma rangs pa med pa'am mi bzod pa med pa/ klan ka mi tshol ba/ rna blags pa/ sems btud pa'am sems bsdus pa/ chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis thob ba/ ci 'dod pa bzhin thob
<p>46b.5</p>b+hI/ a kr-its+tsha lA b+hI/ a ki sa ra lA b+hI/ ku la dz+yeSh+Tho pa tsA ya kaH/ shAstuHshA sa na ka raH/ a ni rA kr-i to d+h+yA yI/ br-iM ha yi tA shU n+yA b+hA rA NAM/ swa kAr+tha yo gam nu yuk+taH/ a mo g+ha rASh+Ta piN+DaM ba ri
<p>46b.6</p>pa/ dka' ba med par thob pa/ tshegs med par thob pa'am ngan ngon ma yin par thob pa/ rigs kyi nang nas rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa/ ston pa'i bstan pa spyod pa/ mi gtong bar bsgom pa/ khyim stong pa rgyas par byed pa/ rang gi don sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>b+huk+taM/ u pa ro d+ha shI laH/ /skyon du brtsi ba'i ming la/ bi Sha ma lo b+haH/ mi th+yA d+harma pa rI taH/ At+mot+kaR+Sha/ pa ra paM se kaH/ A b+hi mA ni kaH/ ku Ti la tsit+taH/ hI nA d+hi muk+ti kaH/ gra hi kaH/ kha Tung+kaH/ ud+d+ha taH/ un+na taH/ 
<p>47a.2</p>'bras bu yod par za ba/ ngo mi chod pa'am ngo mi zlog pa/ mi rigs par chags pa/ chos log pas dkris pa/ bdag la bstod pa/ gzhan la smod pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can/ sems gya gyu can/ dman pa la mos pa/ dus po che/ dmu rgod/ rgod pa/ pho che ba'am khengs pa/ 
<p>47a.3</p>karka shaH/ pa ru ShaH/ nI tsa br-it+tiH/ lA b+he na lA b+ha niSh+tsi kIR+ShA/ a b+hA dza na b+hu ta satwaH/ alpa shru taH/ a brA h+ma N+yaM/ a shram N+yaM/ a pi tr-i dz+nyA/ a mA tr-i dz+nyA/ a d+harma ka maH/ pA pa d+harmaH/ dz+nyA tra kA maH/ ba hu
<p>47a.4</p>brlangs pa'am rtsub pa/ zhe gcod pa'am rtsub pa/ dman pa la 'jug pa/ rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa/ sems can snod du ma gyur pa/ thos pa nyung ba/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa/ sdig pa'i chos can/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa/ bya ba
<p>47a.5</p>kr-it+yaM/ ba hu ka ra NI yaH/ pradz+nyA daurba l+yaM/ duHshI laH/ duSh+p+ra dz+nyA/ mnad pra dz+nyA/ duSh+po Sha tA/ dur+b+ha ra tA/ saM kIr+No bi ha ra ti/ A mi Sha kiM tsing+ka he toH/ duHshru taM/ pa da pa ra maH/ a saM pra ka? khyA naM/ a b+hA bi ta kA yaH/ pra gal+b+haH
<p>47a.6</p>mang ba/ byed pa mang ba/ shes rab zhan pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ shes rab 'chal pa/ shes rab zhan pa/ gso dka' ba/ dgang dka' ba/ 'dres par gnas pa/ zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ mnyan nyes pa/ tshig la 'chel pa/ mi gsal ba/ lus ma bsgoms pa'am lus ma sbyangs pa/ spyis brtsan pa'am spyi
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>d+hAr+Sh+T+rA/ mu kha raH/ a k+Sha d+hUr+t+taH/ g+hasma raH/ mAt+sa raH/ ka da yaM/ kha laH/ sha ThaH/ d+hUr+t+taH bi TaH/ mA yA bI/ ku ra ku tsiHdam+b+haHku ha naM/ la ba naM/ nai mit+ti ka twaM/ nai Sh+ye shi ka twaM/ lA b+he na lA b+ha ni Sh+pa da nA/ satwa bi kra yaH/ shas+t+ra bi kra
<p>47b.2</p>rtol che ba/ mu cor smra ba'am kha drag pa/ rgyan po la dor ba/ lto che ba/ ser sna can/ 'jungs pa/ mi srun pa/ g.yo sgyu can/ g.yo can/ sgyu byed pa/ ngan g.yo'am tshul 'chos ba ngan pa/ kha gsag gzhogs slongs/ thob kyis 'jal ba/ rnyed pa las rnyed pa sgrub pa/ sems can 'tshong ba/ mtshon cha 'tshong
<p>47b.3</p>yaH/ bi Sha bi kra yaH/ maM sa bi kra yaH/ ma d+ya bi kra yaH/ durman+kuH/ Shad+b+ho gA nA ma pA yas+thA nA ni/ ma d+ya pA naM/ d+yU taM/ bi kA la tsar+Ya/ pA ba mi tra tA/ sa ma dzA daR+sha naM/ A la s+yaM/ /bla na med pa dang mchog tu brtsi ba'i rnam grangs dang dag pa dang grol ba la sogs pa'i ming las/ a nut+ta raH/ ni rut+ta raH/ 
<p>47b.4</p>ba/ dug 'tshong ba/ sha 'tshong ba/ chang 'tshong ba/ gnong mi bskur ba/ longs spyod bri ba'i gnas drug /chang 'thung ba/ rgyan po/ mtshan mo 'phyan pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa/ 'dus pa la lta ba/ le lo/ bla na med pa dang mchog tu brtsi ba'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/ bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ 
<p>47b.5</p>a nut+ta maH/ ut+ta raH/ ut+ta maH/ dz+yeSh+ThaH/ shreSh+ThaH/ ba raH pra ba raH/ a graH/ bi shiSh+TaH/ pra d+hA naM/ pa ra maH/ utra kr-iSh+TaH pra kr-iSh+TaH/ pra NI taH/ a sa maH/ a sa ma sa maH/ a pra ti sa maH/ suSh+ThuH/ a t+yan+taM/ sarbA kA
<p>47b.6</p>ltag na med pa/ bla ma/ dam pa/ thu bo'am rgan rabs/ gtso bo/ rab/ rab mchog /mchog /khyad par du 'phags pa/ gtso bo'am gces pa/ dam pa'am dbyig /mchog tu byung ba/ gya nom pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ zla med pa/ rab tu/ mchog tu/ rnam pa thams cad kyi
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>ra ba ro be taM/ praSh+Tha/ /dag pa dang grol ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ su ba ri shud+d+haM/ tr-i maN+Da la pa ri shud+haM/ a nu bA dA ya A shra be b+t+yaHtsit+tA ni bi muk+tA ni/ pa ri mo tsa yi ta byaM/ pi mu ts+ya te/ shrI tI b+ha ba ti/ 
<p>48a.2</p>mchog dang ldan pa/ mchog gam gtso bo/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa/ len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba/ yongs su thar bar bya ba'am yongs su grol ba/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ bsil bar gyur pa/
