<p>48a.3</p>kr-i ta pa ri karmA/ ni r+YA NaM/ ni r+YA taH/ ni r+YA ti/ /spangs pa dang dor ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ pra ti ni sr-i dz+nyaM/ bAn+tI kr-i taM/ sarbo pa d+hi pra ti ni sargaH/ bya n+tI kr-i tama?/ bi skaM b+ha NaM/ riny+tsa ti/ ts+tsho ri tA/ bA hi
<p>48a.4</p>yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'am byi dor byas pa/ nges par 'byung ba/ nges par byung ba/ mthar phyin pa'am nges par byung ba/ spangs te/ bsal ba'am sbyangs pa/ phung po kun spangs pa/ mtha' med par byas pa/ rnam par gnon pa'am rnam par sel ba/ 'dor ba'am spong ba/ bor ba'am btang ba/ sdig pa
<p>48a.5</p>tA pA paH/ bya ti br-it+taH/ pra ti ni sr-i dza ti/ pra ti bi ni sr-i dza ti/ ut+s+ra dz+ya ti/ pa ri t+yA gaH/ dzA hA ti/ pra ti k+She paH/ a pra kaR+Sha NaM/ pra ti krAn+taH/ a pa kaR+Sha/ U na twaM/ a yo gaH/ bi yo gaH/ bi saM yo gaH/ bi
<p>48a.6</p>spangs ba'am sbyangs pa/ shin tu 'das pa/ 'dor ba/ 'or cig gam thong zhig/ gtong ba'am 'dor ba/ yongs su gtong ba'am 'dor ba/ spong ba'am 'dor ba/ spong ba/ bsal ba/ phyir log pa'am spangs pa 'bri ba'am 'grib pa/ 'grib pa/ mi ldan pa/ bral ba/ mi ldan pa'am bral ba/ bye
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>sh+le ShaM/ bi gats+tsheta/ bi b+hU taM/ an+tar+d+d+ha naM/ a pa krAn+taH/ be pa ri Na taM/ A shra ya ba rA br-it+taM/ pa ri Na taM/ ba ri N+ya maH/ dzI bi tAt+b+ya ba ro pa ye tra/ par+YA dA naM gats+tsha tiH/ bi hI naM/ 
<p>48b.2</p>ba'am bral ba'am gyed pa/ bral bar 'gyur ram med par 'gyur/ bral ba'am zhig pa/ nub pa'am mi snang ba/ phyir byung ba'am med par gyur pa/ rnam par gyur pa/ gnas gyur pa/ yongs su gyur pa/ gyur pa/ srog dang phral/ ma lus pa'am gtan nas sam rim gyis zad par 'gyur/ nyams pa'am ma tshang
<p>48b.3</p>pa ri b+huk+taM/ astaM gats+tsha ti/ bi d+ha ma ti/ a pa ri bi dwaM/ ga rA ni sU da naM/ bar+Yud staH/ s+thi te ra n+ya thA twaM/ na rA shi b+hA baH/ pra b+haM gu raM/ pr-iSh+ThI b+ha ba ti/ ko lA
<p>48b.4</p>ba/ yongs su spyad pa'am zos pa/ nub pa'am med pa'am zhig par gyur pa/ sel ba'am 'joms pa/ bor ba/ 'dod chags sel ba/ bstsal ba/ gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa/ spungs pa'i dngos po med pa'am phung por gyur pa ma yin pa/ rab tu 'jig pa/ rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur/ bstsal ba'am
<p>48b.5</p>yi ta byaM/ uts+tshet+s+ya ti/ bi ti mi ra ka raM/ a nu na yA\u0f85sam+bu k+Sha Na tA/ ni rli khi taM/ sa ma bA han+ti/ su pra k+ShA li taM/ su d+ho taM/ nir+d+hAn+taM/ bAn+tI b+hA baH/ pa ri t+ya k+taM/ 
<p>48b.6</p>bcos pa/ chad par 'gyur/ rab rib med par byed pa/ rjes su chags pa bdo bar ma byas pa/ shin tu phyis pa'am bsrabs pa'am bzhar ba/ yang dag par 'joms pa'am spong pa/ legs par bkrus pa'am bshal ba/ sbyangs pa'am dul ba/ btso ma/ bstsal pa'am skyugs pa/ yongs su spangs pa/ 
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>ut+s+r-iSh+TaM/ bra t+yA khyA taM/ ut+sardza naM/ sho ka bi no da naM/ pra bi dza h+yaM/ a naM ga NaH/ ni ha taH/ /bstod pa dang smad ba dang grags pa'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/ kIr+t+tiH/ pra shaM sA/ ya shaH/ stu ti/ sto Shi taM/ 
<p>49a.2</p>btang ba'am spangs pa'am bor ba/ phul ba/ gtang ba/ mya ngan bsal ba/ rab tu spangs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ bcom pa/ grags pa'am brjod pa/ rab tu bsngags pa/ snyan pa'am grags pa/ bstod pa/ bkur ba ma 'dom na bstod
<p>49a.3</p>pra shaM si taH/ bar+Ni taH/ shab+daH/ sh+lo kaH/ bar+N+NaH/ pan+ni taH/ a b+hi nan+di ta ya shaH/ b+hU ta bar+N+Na nish+tsA ra ya ti/ pra sid+d+haH/ pra thi taH/ pra tI taH/ a nu
<p>49a.4</p>pa/ rab tu bstod pa/ bsngags pa/ sgra/ tshigs su bcad pa/ bsngags pa'am snyan par brjod pa/ bsngags pa/ mngon par bstod pa'i grags pa/ yang dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa/ rab tu grub pa'am grags pa/ gsal bar grags pa/ kun la grags pa/ sra sid+ha dang ma 'dom na grags par gdags/ 
<p>49a.5</p>shaM sA/ a bar+N+NA/ do ShaH/ b+haN+Da naM/ paM sa naM/ nin+bA/ dzu gup+sA/ bi gar+hA/ kut+sa naM/ a ba sA daH/ a ba saM s+ya ti/ bi mA na ya ti/ pa rA b+ha baH/ kut+sa nI yaM/ a ba d+h+yA yan+ti/ k+Shi pan+ti/ bi bA tsa yaM ti/ pa ri b+hA ShA/ /
<p>49a.6</p>phan yon/ mi snyan par brjod pa/ skyon nam nyes pa/ 'tshang 'bru ba/ bshung ba'am smad pa/ smad pa/ skyon du bgrang ba/ dgongs pa'am smad pa/ ngan par rtsi ba/ smad pa'am spyo ba/ smod par byed/ khyad du gsod par byad/ brnyas pa/ smad par bya ba/ smod pa'am 'phya ba/ gzhog 'phyas zer/ kha zer/ spyo ba'am brgyad pa/ 
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>mthun pa dang mi mthun pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ a nu kU laH/ pra ti kU laM/ pra ti lo maH/ a nu lo maH/ a nu sro to gA mI/ pra te sro to gA mI/ bya staM/ sa ma staM/ A yaH/ durla b+haH/ su
<p>49b.2</p>mthun ba/ mi mthun pa/ rjes su mi mthun pa'am lugs su mi 'byung ba/ rjes su mthun pa'am lugs su 'byung ba/ chu'i 'bab phyogs su 'gro ba/ chu'i bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba/ so so'am re re/ bsdus pa'am mtha' dag/ 'byung ba'am 'du ba/ rnyad par dka' ba'am dkon pa/ rnyed
<p>49b.3</p>la b+haH/ a d+hi mA traM/ mA d+h+yaM/ mri duH/ su sA d+h+yaM/ duHsA d+h+yaM/ A raM/ pA raM/ pra bar+t+ta naM/ ni bar+t+ta naM/ a bad+d+ha muk+taM/ ni miny+tsi taM/ un+mi dzi taM/ sam+p+ra khyA naM/ a sam+p+ra khyA naM/ a nu gu N+yaM/ a nu bA taH/ pra ti bA taH/ sa ma nu
<p>49b.4</p>sla ba'am mod pa/ che ba'am rab/ 'bring / chung ngu'am tha ma/ sgrub sla ba/ sgrub dka' ba/ chu rol/ pha rol/ 'jug pa/ bzlog pa/ ma bcings ma grol/ btsums pa/ phye ba/ shin tu gsal ba'am shin tu dran pa/ shin tu gsal ba'am shin tu dran pa/ rjes su mthun pa/ rdzi phyogs/ rdzi phyogs ma yin pa/ rjes su
<p>49b.5</p>pa sh+ya ti/ na sa na nu ba sh+ya ti/ a nu lo mi kI/ /che chung dang mtho dman la sogs pa'i ming la/ A A maM/ bi skam+b+he Na/ bistA raM/ dair+g+h+yaM/ A ro ha pa ri NA ha saM pan+naH/ A ro haH/ pa ri NA haH/ A ro ha pa ri Na haH/ saM ban+naM/ bi stIrnaM/ u dA raH/ 
<p>49b.6</p>mthong / rjes su mi mthong / mthun pa/ mchur/ zhing du'am sboms su'am zabs su/ zheng du'am rgyar/ srid du/ mchu dang zheng du ldan pa/ 'khrun tam 'phang ngam srid/ zheng ngam sboms sam kho lag /chu zheng gam ba/ phun sum tshogs pa/ rgya che ba/ rlabs po che'am rgya che ba/ 
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>bi shA laM/ bi pu laM/ o dA ri kaM/ pri thu/ alpaM/ alpa ta raM/ alpa ta maM/ ba hu ta raM/ b+hU yiSh+ThaM/ ma hat+ta maM/ i twa raM/ lu haH/ a ba bar kaM/ baurbA bar+YaM/ a pU rba ma tsa ra maM/ sUk+Sh+maM/ s+thU laM/ dab+b+h+raM/ 
<p>50a.2</p>yangs pa/ rgyas pa'am yangs pa/ rigs pa'am che long / yangs pa'am rgya che pa/ chung pa/ ches chung pa/ chung ches pa/ ches mang / mang po pa/ chen po pa/ ngan pa'am tha ma/ ngan pa/ ngan ngon/ snga phyi/ snga phyi med/ phra mo'am zhib mo/ sbom pa'am rags pa/ nyung ba'am chung ba/ 
<p>50a.3</p>a da b+h+raM/ ut+kU la ni kU laM/ /bshes pa'i rim ba dang ngas kyi rgol ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ A lap+ta kaH/ sa lap+ta kaH/ sastu ta kaH/ sa pre ma kaH/ pre maH/ Ap+taM/ bi shwasta mA na saM/ saM hA yIb+hA baM gats+tsha ti/ kAn+taM/ pri yA/ 
<p>50a.4</p>mi nyung ba'am mi chung ba/ shang shong ngam 'bar 'bur ram mtho dman/ gtam 'dres pa/ phebs par smra ba/ smod 'drin/ 'grogs bshes/ byams pa'am mdza' 'am sdug pa gcugs pa'am yid brtan pa/ yid brtan pa'am yi gcugs grogs su 'gyur/ sdug pa/ phongs pa'am sdug
<p>50a.5</p>pra Na yaH/ pa ra ma ma no dz+nyaH/ mi traM/ su hr-itra/ hr-i d+yaM/ aM mi traM/ pra t+ya mi traH/ ku mi traH/ pa ra pra bA dI/ pra t+yar+thi kaH/ pra t+ya nI kaH/ pa ra tsa kraM/ bai rI/ sha trUM/ ku sa hA yaH/ /dge ba dang shis pa'i ming la/ A shIrbA daH/ A
<p>50a.6</p>pa/ mdza' gcugs mchog tu yid 'thad pa/ mdza' bo/ mdza' bo'am snying sdug/ snying sdug/ mi mdza' ba/ dgra bo/ bshes gnyen ngan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba/ phyir rgol ba/ phas kyi dgra/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs/ sha khon nam mkhon yod pa/ dgra/ grogs ngan pa/ shis par brjod pa/ legs
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>shi shaH/ bar+N+Na bA dI/ shrIH/ lak+Sh+mIH/ maM ga laM/ ku tU ha laM/ pra shastaH/ swasti/ swas+t+yA ya naM/ sau bsti kaH/ ka l+yANaM/ sh+lAg+h+yaM/ ku sha laM/ shre yAma?/ dz+ye
<p>50b.2</p>su smon pa/ bsngags pa smra ba/ dpal lam g.yang / dpal lam shis pa/ bkra shis sam ltas/ dge mtshan nam ltad mo/ dge shis/ dge legs sam dge ba/ dge legs su 'gyur ba/ bde legs brjod pa/ dge legs sam dge ba/ legs pa/ dge mkhas bde ba skabs dang sbyar/ mchog tu bkrabs pa/ mchog
<p>50b.3</p>yAna?/ swa d+hA/ ba shaT/ oM/ swA hA/ chos smra ba dang nyan pa dang sgra skad kyi ming la/ pra Ne tA/ a bi pa ri ta mArga dai shi kaH/ saM gI ti kA raH/ d+harma ka thi kaH/ d+harma b+hA Na kaH/ daR+sha yi tA/ shro tA/ b+hA Sha te dzalpa ti/ la pa ti/ de sha ya ti/ ut+tA
<p>50b.4</p>tu btu ba/ gzhi srung / gzhi mi 'grib pa/ rab bsngags/ gzhi tshugs/ byed pa'am ston pa/ lam ma nor bar ston pa/ yang dag par sdud par byed pa/ chos sgrog pa/ chos smra ba/ ston par byed pa'am mthong bar byed pa/ nyan pa/ smra ba'am brjod pa/ smras pa'am brjod pa/ ston pa/ gsal
<p>50b.5</p>nI ka ri Sh+ya ti/ sUk+taM/ su b+hA Shi tama?/ su byA khyA taM/ bya ba hA raH saM ke taH/ ud+di sha ti/ u pa di sha ti/ u dI ra ya ti/ saM pra kA sha ya ti/ pra ti man+t+ra yi ta byaM/ ud+diSh+TaM/ A tsaSh+Te/ pra k+ShA b+ha naM/ swa
<p>50b.6</p>bar byed pa/ legs par bshad pa/ gsungs pa'am legs par smra ba/ gsungs pa'am legs par smras pa/ tha snyad/ brda/ lung nod pa'am 'bogs pa/ lung 'bogs pa/ smra ba'am brjod pa/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ slar smra bar bya ba/ brjod pa'am ston pa'am smras pa/ smra bo/ byugs pa/ sgras
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>re NA b+hi bi dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ki li ki lA yi taM/ ka la ka laH/ ash+lI laM/ s+pho TaM/ ko lA ha laH/ ka la swa raH/ e ka ba tsa no dA hA re Na/ a la ma ne na bi bA de na/ bi Sha mo\u0f85ya mu ba n+yA saH/ a b+hi la pa na tA/ bra t+yu dI ra ya ti/ pra
<p>51a.2</p>mngon bar go bar byed pa/ dar dir ku co ca co/ ca co/ tshig dor ba'am mi gshe ba/ sgra gsal ba/ ku co/ skad snyan/ tshig gcig brjod pas/ brtsad pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhe'am brtsad ba 'di thong / bzhag pa'am/ smras pa 'di ni mi mthun pa'o/ /mngon par brjod pa/ slar smra ba'am slar zlos ba/ slar
<p>51a.3</p>t+yuts+tsA raH/ ut+kA sha nA shab+daH/ hA hA kA ra ki li ki lA pak+Sh+we Di ta shab+daH/ ats+tsha TA shab+daH/ A biska ra NaM/ bra t+yA khyA naM/ bya ba de shaH/ bA tso yuk+tiH/ tso da ya ti/ bau
<p>51a.4</p>gsungs pa/ gsung bstsal ba'am skad bstsal ba/ a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra pra k+She Di kha cig tu 'ur sgrar yang gdags/ se gol gyi sgra/ 'chags pa'am smra ba/ 'bul ba'am spong ba/ brjod pa'am snyad 'dogs pa'am lce rten/ smra ba'i tshul/ bskul ba'am rtsod pa/ pho brang 'khor gyi skad dam 'khor
<p>51a.5</p>rI/ sA t+ka th+yaM/ A de ya bA kyaM/ ma d+hu raH swa raH/ /sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe'i ming la/ mA yA/ ni rmi taH/ u da ka tsan+d+raH/ a k+Shi pu ru ShaH/ ma rI tsi/ mr-i ga tr-i Sh+Ni kA/ ma ru ma rI tsi kA/ gan+d+ha rba na ga raM/ pra ti bim+baM/ pra ti b+hA saH/ swap+nama?/ 
<p>51a.6</p>du grags pa/ 'bel ba'i gtam/ tshig gzung ba'am ma btsun ba/ sgra mnyen pa'am snyan pa/ sgyu ma/ sprul pa/ chu zla/ mig gi skyes bu/ smig rgyu/ ma ri tsi dang ma 'dom na smig rgyu 'dom na ri dgas skom/ mya ngam gyi smig rgyu/ dri za'i grong khyer/ gzugs brnyan/ mig yor/ rmi lam/
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>pra ti shrut+kA/ pra ti shab+dA/ bud+du daH/ kad lI skan+d+haH/ a ba sh+yA ya bin+duH/ in+d+ra dzA laM/ ban+d+h+ya pu traH/ kha puSh+paM/ rik+ta muSh+TiH/ a lA ta tsa kraM/ ar+ha Ta g+haTi tsakraM/ kheT piN+DaH/ phan biN+DaH/ ka
<p>51b.2</p>brag ca/ brag ca'i ming ste pra ti shru tuta? ka dang 'dom na sgra brnyan du gdags/ chu'i chu bur/ chu shing gi phung po/ zil pa'i thigs pa/ mig 'phrul/ mo gsham gyi bu/ nam mkha'i me tog /chang pa stong pa/ mgal me'i 'khor lo/ /zo chun rgyud pa'i 'khor lo/ mchil ma'i thal ba/ wu brdos pa/ skra shad
<p>51b.3</p>shoN+Da kaM/ na Ta rang+gaH/ tU la pi tsuH/ u dA ha ra NaM/ pra t+yu dA ha ra NaM/ dr-iSh+TAn+taH/ u pa mA/ /gtong ba dang mchod skyin byed pa la sogs pa'i ming la/ muk+ta t+yA gaH/ pra ta ta pA NiH/ bya ba sarga rataH/ yA ya dzU kaH/ dA ne
<p>51b.4</p>'dzings pa/ gar gyi ltad mo pa/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma/ dper brjod pa/ so so'i dper brjod pa/ dpe/ dpe'am nye bar 'jal ba/ lhug par gtong ba/ lag brkyang ba/ rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba/ mchod sbyin khor mor byed pa'am sbyin pa mi 'chad par byed pa/ 
<p>51b.5</p>sam+bi sAg ra taH/ bi b+hA dza te/ sam+bi b+hA dza te/ yaSh+TaH/ su yaSh+TaH/ hu taM/ su hu taM/ yA ga ma yaM/ yA ba da n+ya ta rA n+ya ta ra pa ri skA raM da dA ti/ pA naM pAnAr+thi b+h+yaH/ an+na man+nAr+thi b+h+yaH/ pra ti saM sta raM/ 
<p>51b.6</p>sbyin ba la 'gyed par dga' ba/ 'gyed/ rnam par 'gyed pa/ mchod sbyin byas/ mchod sbyin legs par byas/ sbyin sreg byas/ legs par sbyin sreg byas/ mchod sbyin las byung ba/ yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod pa la skom/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ so sor 'gyed
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>de yaM/ dA ya kaH/ dA na pa tiH/ dA tA/ pra ti grA ha kaH/ brA dA taM/ krat+tuH/ ni rarga ta yadz+nyA/ shrAd+d+ha ma nu bra dA s+yan+ti/ bra yats+tsha ti/ /phan pa dang phan pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ hi ta ma?/ At+ma hi taM/ ba ri hi tama?/ u
<p>52a.2</p>pa/ sbyin par bya ba/ sbyin pa po/ sbyin bdag/ sbyin bar byed pa/ len pa/ byin no/ mchod sbyin/ gtan ba sri ba med ba'i mchod sbyin/ dad pa'i rjes su sbyin par byed pa/ sbyin par byed pa/ phan pa/ bdag la phan pa/ gzhan la phan pa/ phan
<p>52a.3</p>pa kA raH/ u pa yu dz+ya te/ pra t+yu pa kA ra kAM k+ShA/ a pra t+yu pa kAraH/ /bla dang bye brag phyed pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ bud+d+hiH/ ma teH/ ga tiH/ ma taM/ dr-iSh+TaM/ a b+hi sa mi tA bI/ sa myag ba bo d+haH/ su
<p>52a.4</p>gdags pa/ phan 'dogs pa'am nye bar sbyor ba/ lan du phan 'dogs su re ba/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba/ blo/ blo gros/ rtogs pa/ bye brag phyed pa'am rtogs pa/ mthong ba/ mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag par rtogs pa'am yang dag par khong du chud pa/ 
<p>52a.5</p>pra ti bid+d+haH/ a b+hi la k+Shi taH/ ga tiM ga taH/ a ba bo d+haM/ pra t+yA b+hi dz+nyA/ me ni re/ /mkhas pa'i rnam grangs kyi la/ paN+Di taH/ bi tsak+Sha NaH/ paN+Di ta dzA tI yaM/ pra bi NaH/ 
<p>52a.6</p>legs bar rtogs pa/ mngon par rigs pa'am mngon par snang ba'am ngo shes pa/ rtogs par khong du chud pa/ rtogs pa'am khong du chud pa/ ngo shes pa/ shes par 'gyur/ mkhas pa'am mdzangs pa/ mkhas pa'am rtogs pa/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can/ mkhas pa/ 
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>niSh+NA taH/ byak+taH/ me d+hA bI/ bud+d+haH/ bud+d+hi mAna?/ pradz+nyA/ bod+d+hA/ pra dz+nyA bAna?/ bid+bAna?/ ni pu NaH/ bidz+nyaH/ A kr-iSh+Ti mAna?/ pha TuH/ tsa tu ra sraH/ dak+ShaH/ /zab pa'i rnam srangs kyi ming la/ 
<p>52b.2</p>byang ba/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ rtogs pa/ blo dang ldan/ shes rab can/ khong du chud pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa'am rig pa brtags pa'am rtogs pa'am mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa'am shes pa/ ldob rkyen pa/ g.yer po/ grims pa/ mkhas pa'am shes nyen can/ 
<p>52b.3</p>gam+b+hI ro gam+bI rA ba b+hA saH/ dur+d+d+r-i shaH/ dur ba bo d+haH/ dur nu bo d+haH/ sUk+Sh+ma ne pu Na paN+Di ta bi dz+nya be da nI yaH/ a tarkyaH/ a tarkA ba tsa raH/ a ni daR+sha naH/ a ba gA haH/ shi baH/ a pra pany+tsaH/ niH
<p>52b.4</p>zab pa zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ zhib mor brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/ brtag par mi nus pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ gting dpag dka' ba/ zhi ba/ spros pa med pa/ spros pa
<p>52b.5</p>pra pany+tsaH/ a bi pra pany+tsaH/ durbi gA h+yaM/ /dga' ba'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/ tuSh+TaH/ u da graH/ At+ta ma nAH/ bra mu di taH/ prI ti sau ma na s+ya dzA taH/ haR+Sha dzA taH/ hr-i Shi ta tsit+taH/ pra mo d+yama?/ san+tuSh+TaH/ ba ri to ShaH/ aud+d+hi l+ya
<p>52b.6</p>dang bral ba/ rnam par spros pa med pa/ rtogs bar dka' ba/ tshim pa'am dga' ba/ mgu ba/ yi rangs pa/ rab tu dga' ba/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes/ rangs ba skyes/ sems rangs par gyur/ mchog tu dga' ba/ chog shes pa/ yongs su mgu ba/ shin tu dga' bar
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>ka rI/ ba hu dza na pri yA/ saM rany+dza nI yaH/ sam+mo da nI yaH/ A rA d+ha naH/ a b+hi rA d+ha nA/ a b+hi nan+da yi Sh+ya ti/ /khro zhing rnam pa dang gnod pa'i ming la/ rau
<p>53a.2</p>byed pa/ skye bo mang po dga' ba/ yang dag par sdug par 'gyur ba'am chags par 'gyur ba/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mgu bar bya ba'am mnyes bar bya ba/ mngon par mgu ba'am mnyes pa/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ zhe gnag pa'am
<p>53a.3</p>draH/ tsaN+DaH/ u graH/ krU raH/ duSh+Ta tsit+taH/ rau dra tsit+taH/ pra ti ha ta tsit+taH/ kha raH/ niSh+Thu raH/ dA ru NaH/ tI praH/ tsaN+Da mr-i gaH/ u pA dro tA raH/ a nar+tho pa sa hi taM/ 
<p>53a.4</p>drag pa/ gtum pa/ drag shul can/ ma rungs pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brlang po/ sri ba med pa/ mi bzad pa/ drag po'am bdo pa/ gcan gzan khro bo/ gnod par byed pa'am brjed pa'am 'tshe ba/ gnod pa dang bcas pa/ 
<p>53a.5</p>bi he Tha kAH/ ku pi taH/ pra ko paH/ ka Tu kaH/ a b+hi Shak+taH/ ra b+ha saH/ sA ha si kA/ /gang zag bzhi'i ming la/ ta masta ma pa rA ya NaH/ ta mo dz+yo tiSh+pa rA ya Na/ dz+yo tista ma parA ya NaH/ dz+yo ti r+dz+yo tiSh+pa rA ya NaH/ 
<p>53a.6</p>'tshe ba'am co 'dri ba/ 'khrugs pa/ 'khrugs pa'am khong nas ldang ba/ spro thung ba/ nang pa/ brtun ngas pa'am gzu lums can/ tsham tshom med pa/ mun khrod nas mun khrod du 'gro ba/ mun khrod nas snang bar 'gro ba/ snang ba nas mun khrod du 'gro ba/ /snang ba nas snang bar 'gro ba/ 
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>tshe 'di dang phyi ma dang 'chi 'pho ba'i rnam pa'i ming la/ dr-iSh+Ti d+harmaH/ i ha traH/ a mu traH/ i ha dza n+maH/ A ba t+yAM/ pA ra dzan+mi kaH/ dzA ti bya ti br-it+taM/ sAm+pa rA yi kaH/ sam+pa rA yaH/ dzA ti pa ri bar+t+taH/ ts+yu ti/ ts+ya ba naM/ ts+yu ti sa kra maM/ dben pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ prAn+taMsha y+yAs naM/ brAn+ta ban
<p>53b.2</p>mthong ba'i chos/ 'di la/ phyi ma/ tshe 'di/ phyi ma/ tshe gzhan/ tshe 'phos pa'am tshe brjes pa/ tshe phyi ma pa/ tshe phyi ma/ tshe rabs brje ba'am 'pho ba/ ma 'dom na 'chi 'pho/ 'do man ts+ya ba nam 'chi ba/ 'chi ba dang 'pho ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal/ nags
<p>53b.3</p>pras+thA/ prAn+taH/ a ra N+yaM/ kAn+ta raM/ ba naM/ u pa ba naM/ /gnas bzhi'i ming la/ gAr+ha s+thaH/ brah+ma tsa r+YA shra maH/ bA na pras+thaH/ b+hai k+Shu kaH/ sa g.yos pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ kam+pi taH/ bra kam+pi taH/ sam+b+ra kam+pi taH/ tsa li taH/ pra tsa li taH/ saM pra
<p>53b.4</p>khrod/ bas mtha'/ dgon pa/ 'brog dgon pa/ nags sam tshal lam nags tshal/ skyed mos tshal lam nags 'dab/ khyim na gnas/ tshangs bar spyod pa la gnas/ nags khrod na gnas pa/ spong ba ba/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du
<p>53b.5</p>tsa li taH/ be d+hi taH/ pra be d+hi taH/ saM pra be d+hi taH/ k+Shu b+hi taH/ pra k+Shu b+hi taH/ saM pra k+Shu b+hi taH/ ra Ni taH/ pra ra Ni taH/ saM pra ra Ni taH/ gardzi taH/ pra gardzi taH/ saM pra gardzi taH/ pUrbA di ga ba na ma ti bash+tsi mA di gun+na ma ti/ bash+tsi mA di ga pa Na
<p>53b.6</p>rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>ma ti bUrbA di gun+na ma ti/ dak+Shi NA di ga ba na ma ti ut+ta rA di gun+na ma ti/ ut+ta rA di ga ba na ma ti dak+Shi NA di gun+na ma ti/ an+tAd ba na ma ti mad+h+yA dun+na ma ti/ ma d+h+yAd ba na ma ti an+tA dun+na ma ti/ a bra kam+b+yaM/ /'od kyi ming la/ pra b+hA/ rasmi/ A lo kaH/ 
<p>54a.2</p>dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/ mi bskyod pa'am mi bsgul ba'am bskyod mi nus pa/ 'od/ 'od zer/ snang ba/ 
<p>54a.3</p>ma rI tsiH/ aM shuH/ te dzaH/ dz+wA laH/ d+yu tiH/ stong che chung dang gling bzhi dang khams gsum dang 'jig rten pa'i lha sA ha sra tsU Di ko lo ka d+hA tuH/ dwi sA ha sro mad+h+ya mo lo ka d+hA tuH/ tr-i sA ha sra ma hA sA ha sre lo ka d+hA tuH/ /
<p>54a.4</p>mun sel lam 'od/ 'od dam gsal ba/ 'bar ba'am gzi brjid/ 'bar ba/ gsal ba'am 'od dam zer/[ X ]la sogs pa'i ming las/ stong che chung la sogs pa'i ming la/ stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ gling bzhi'i
<p>54a.5</p>ming la/ tsa tur+d+wI pa ko lo ka d+hA tuH/ pUrba bi de haH/ de haH/ bi de haH/ dzam+bu dwI paH/ dzam+bu ShaN+DaH/ tsA ma raH/ a pa ra tsA ma raH/ a ba ra go dA nI yaH/ shA ThA/ ut+ta ra man+t+ri NaH/ ut+ta ra ku ruH/ ku ra baH/ kau ra baH/ lo ka d+hA tuH/ lu dz+ya ta
<p>54a.6</p>gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ shar gyi lus 'phags/ lus/ lus 'phags/ 'dzam bu gling / dzam bu'i tshal/ rnga yab/ rnga yab gzhan/ nub kyi ba lang spyod/ gyo ldan/ lam mchog 'gro/ byang gi sgra mi snyan/ sgra mi snyan/ sgra mi snyan gyi zla/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'jig
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>i ti lo kaH/ lo kAn+ta ri kaH/ sarba lo ka d+hA tu pra sa raH/ bud+d+ha bi Sha yaH/ bud+d+ha k+She traM/ sa hA lo ka d+hA tuH/ a ba mUr+d+haH/ bya ba tastaH/ tir+Ya glo ka d+hA tuH/ /khams gsum pa'i rim pa'i ming la/ kA ma d+hA tuH/ rU pa d+hA tuH/ 
<p>54b.2</p>pas na 'jig rten/ 'jig rten gyi bar/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi yul/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / mi mjed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ spyi'u tshugs/ snrel gzhi/ thad ka ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'dod pa'i khams/ gzugs kyi khams/ 
<p>54b.3</p>a rU pa d+hA tuH/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ming la/ b+hau mAH/ an+ta rik+Sha bA si naH/ tsa turma hA rA dza kA yi kAH/ tra yas+t+riM shAH/ yA mAH/ tu Shi tAH/ nirmA Na ra ta yaH/ pa ra nirmi ta ba sha brti naH/ /bsam gtan dang po'i sa'i ming la/ brah+ma kA yi kAH/ brah+ma pA ri Sha d+yAH/ brah+ma bu ro hi tAH/ ma hA
<p>54b.4</p>gzugs med pa'i khams/ sa bla/ bar snang la gnas pa/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris/ sum cu tsa gsum pa/ 'thab bral/ dga' ldan/ 'phrul dga'/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed/ tshangs ris/ tshangs 'khor/ tshangs ba mdun na 'don/ tshangs
<p>54b.5</p>brah+ma NaH/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa'i ming la/ pa rIt+tA b+hAH/ apra mA NA b+hAH/ a b+ha swa rAH/ /bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa'i ming la/ pa rI ta shu b+hAH/ a pra mA Na shu b+hAH/ shu b+ha kr-it+s+nAH/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa'i ming la/ an b+h+ra kAH/ pu N+ya pra sa bAH/ br-i hat+pha laH/ /gnas gtsang ma'i sa'i ming la/ a br-i hAH/ a ta pAH/ su dr-i shAH/ su daR+sha
<p>54b.6</p>pa chen po/ 'od chung / tshad med 'od/ 'od gsal/ dge chung / tshad med dge/ dge rgyas/ sprin med/ bsod nams skyes/ 'bras bu che/ mi che/ mi gdung / gya nom snang / shin
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>nAH/ a ka niSh+ThAH/ a g+ha niSh+ThAH/ ma hA ma he shwa rA ya ta nama?/ /gzugs med pa'i sa'i ming la/ A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta nama?/ bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta nama?/ A kiny+tsa n+yA ya ta nama?/ nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta nama?/ /'jig rten ba'i lha'i ming la/ brah+mA/ 
<p>55a.2</p>tu mthong / 'og min nam/ gzugs mtha'/ dbang phyug chen po che ba'i gnas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched/ tshangs pa/ 
<p>55a.3</p>ha ra n+ya gar+b+haH/ bra h+mA sa hA m+pa tiH/ a shwi ni ku mA rau/ ma he shwa raH/ ma hA de baH/ sham+b+huH/ pa shu pa tiH/ tr-i pu ra bid+d+h+waM sa kaH/ shU la pA NiH/ t+r+ya m+wa kaH/ shaM ka raH/ sma ra sha truH/ sharbaH/ ru daH/ I shwa raH/ biSh+NuH/ 
<p>55a.4</p>dbyig gi snying po/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ tha skar gzhon nu/ dbang phyug chen po/ lha chen po/ bde 'byung / phyugs bdag/ sum brtsegs 'jig byed/ lag na mdung thogs/ chung ma gsum yod pa/ bde byed/ 'dod dran dgra/ 'tsho byed/ drag po/ dbang phyug /khyab 'jug/ 
<p>55a.5</p>kr-iSh+NaH/ bA su de baH/ kA ma de baH/ mA raH/ su nirma na ra ti de ba pu traH/ su sI ma de ba pu traH/ san+tu Shi ta de ba bu traH/ su yA ma de ba pu traH/ sha kro de ben+d+raH/ da sha sha ta na ya naH/ sha kraH/ 
<p>55a.6</p>khyab 'jug gi ming ste 'dom na nag po/ nor lha'i bu ste khyab 'jug gi ming / 'dod pa'i lha/ bdud/ lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga'/ lha'i bu mtshams bzang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ brgya byin 'dom na mig stong pa/ brgya byin/ 
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>kau shi kaH/ sha ta kra tuH/ bur nA raH/ lo ka bA laH/ bi shra ba NaH/ b+h+r-i ta rASh+TaH/ bi rU D+hakaH/ bi rU pA k+ShaH/ ka ro Ta bAN yo de bAH/ mA lA d+hA rAH/ sa dA ma dAH/ i shA naH/ in+d+raH/ ya maH/ ni r-i tiH/ pa ru NaH/ bA yuH/ ku be raH/ 
<p>55b.2</p>brgya byin/ mchod sbyin brgya ba/ brgya byin na mkhyer 'jig /'jig rten skyong / rnam thos kyi bu/ yul 'khor srung / 'phags skyes po/ mig mi bzang lag na gzhong thogs/ phreng thogs/ rtag tu myos/ dbang bdag /dbang po/ gshin rje/ bden bral/ chu lha/ rlung / lus ngan/ 
<p>55b.3</p>bai shwA na raH/ kAr+t+ti ke yaH/ ma hA kA laH/ nan+di ke shwa raH/ b+h+r-iM gi ri tiH/ bi nA ya kaH/ d+ha na daH/ de bI/ sur ba d+hU/ a bsA rA/ de bka n+yA/ du rgA de bI/ u mA/ gi ri su tA/ sha tsI/ pig+h+naH/ /gza' dgu'i ming la/ A di t+yaH/ sau maH/ aM gA ra kaH/ bu d+haH/ br-i haspa tiH/ shu kraH/ sha naish+tsa raH/ 
<p>55b.4</p>pa/ mi/ smin drug bu/ nag po chen po/ dga' byed dbang phyug /b+h+r-ing gi ri ti/ log 'dren/ nor sbyin/ lha mo/ lha'i bu mo/ lha'i bu mo/ lha'i bu mo/ rdzong gi lha mo/ dka' bzlog/ ri'i sras mo/ bde sogs/ bgegs/ nyi ma/ zla ba/ mig dmar/ gza' lhag /phur bu/ pa ba sangs/ spen pa/ 
<p>55b.5</p>rA huH/ ke tuH// /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi ming la/ kr-it+ti kA/ ro hi NI/ mr-i ga si rA/ A r+d+rA/ pu narba suH/ pu Sh+yaH/ a sh+le ShA/ ma g+hA/ pUrba pa lgu nI/ ut+tar pha lgu nI/ ha stA/ tsitrA/ swA ti/ bi shA khA/ a nu rA d+hA/ dz+yeSh+ThA/ mU laM/ pU bA ShA D+hA/ ut+ta ra ShA D+hA/ shra ba nA/ a b+hi dzi ta/ sha ta b+hi ShA/ d+ha niSh+ThA/ pu rba b+ha dra ba dA/ 
<p>55b.6</p>sgra gcan/ mjug rings/ smin drug /snar ma/ mgo/ lag /nab so/ rgyal/ ska ga /mchu/ gre/ dbo/ me bzhi/ nag pa/ sa ri/ sa ga /lha mtshams/ snron/ snubs/ chu stod/ chu smad/ gro bzhin/ byi bzhin/ mon gre/ mon gru/ khrums stod/ 
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>ut+ta ra b+ha dra pa dA/ re ba tI/ a shwi nI/ b+ha ra NI/ /lha dang klu la sogs pa'i ming la/ de baH/ nA gaH/ yak+ShaH/ gan+d+harbaH/ a su raH/ dai t+yaH/ ga ru DaH/ kin+na raH/ ma ho ra gaH/ kum+b+hAN+Da/ //klu'i rgyal po'i ming la/ shaM kha bA lo nA ga rA dzA/ karka Ta ko nA
<p>56a.2</p>khrums smad/ nam gru/ tha skar/ bra nye/ lha/ klu/ gnod sbyin/ dri za/ lha ma yin/ lha ma yin 'dom na sbyin byed ma'i bu/ nam mkha' lding / mi'am ci/ lto 'phye chen po/ grul bum/ klu'i rgyal po dung skyong / klu'i rgyal po
<p>56a.3</p>ga rA dzA/ ku li ko nA ga rA dzA/ pad+mo nA ga rA dzA/ ma hA pad+mo nA ga rA dzA/ bA su kI nA ga rA dzA/ a nan+to nA ga rA dzA/ tak+Sha ko nA ga rA dzA/ ba ru Na nA ga rA dzA/ ma ka ro nA ga rA dzA/ sA ga ro nA ga rA dzA/ lam+bu ko nA ga rA dzA/ a na ba ta p+ta nA ga rA dzA/ 
<p>56a.4</p>stobs kyi rgyu/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha/ klu'i rgyal po chu srin/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho/ klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa/ 
<p>56a.5</p>piM ga lo nA ga rA dzA/ nan+do nA ga rA dzA/ su ba hu rnA ga rA dzA/ narda no nA ga rA dzA/ tsi trAk+Sho nA ga rA dzA/ rA ba No nA ga rA dzA/ paN+DurnA ga rA dzA/ kr-i mirnA ga rA dzA/ saM kho nA ga rA dzA/ paN+Da ra ko nA ga rA dzA/ kA lo nA ga rA dzA/ u pa kA lo nA ga rA dzA/ 
<p>56a.6</p>klu'i rgyal po ser skya/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo/ klu'i rgyal po lag bzangs/ klu'i rgyal po sgra 'byin/ klu'i rgyal bo mig bkra/ klu'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs/ klu'i rgyal po skya bseng / klu'i rgyal po srin bu/ klu'i rgyal po dung / klu'i rgyal po dkar gsal/ klu'i rgyal po nag po/ klu'i rgyal po nye nag/ 
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>gi ri ko nA ga rA dzA/ a ba lo nA ga rA dzA/ shaM ka ro nA ga rA dzA/ b+hAN+Di nA ga rA dzA/ pany+tsA lo nA ga rA dzA/ kA li ko nA ga rA dzA/ kiny+tsa na ko nA ga rA dzA/ ba li ko nA ga rA dzA/ ut+ta ro nA ga rA dzA/ mA taM go nA ga rA dzA/ e Do nA ga rA dzA/ sA ga ro nA ga rA
<p>56b.2</p>klu'i rgyal po ri bo/ klu'i rgyal po stobs med/ klu'i rgyal po bde byed/ klu'i rgyal po spyad sprel/ klu'i rgyal po lnga len/ klu'i rgyal po dus can/ klu'i rgyal po chung zad/ klu'i rgyal po stobs can/ klu'i rgyal po ltag ma/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che/ klu'i rgyal po lug /klu'i rgyal po dug
<p>56b.3</p>dzA/ u pen+d+ro nA ga rA dzA/ u pa na ro nA ga rA dzA/ e Da bar+N+No nA ga rA dzA/ bi tsi tro nA ga rA dzA/ rA g+ha bo nA ga rA dzA/ hasti kats+tsho nA ga rA dzA/ e la pa tro nA ga rA dzA/ am+b+ra tIr+tho nA ga rA dzA/ a ba la lo nA ga rA dzA/ tsAm+pe yo nA ga rA dzA/ a
<p>56b.4</p>can/ klu'i rgyal po nye dbang / klu'i rgyal po mi dang nye/ klu'i rgyal po lug mdog /klu'i rgyal po ris bkra/ klu'i rgyal po rtogs pa'i bu/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i mtshan/ klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab/ klu'i rgyal po a mra'i bu/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med/ klu'i rgyal po tsam ba skyes/ klu'i
<p>56b.5</p>li ko nA ga rA dzA/ pra mo k+Sha ko nA ga rA dzA/ s+pho Ta no nA ga rA dzA/ nan+do pa nan+do nA ga rA dzA nau/ hu lu Do nA ga rA dzA/ u lu ko nA ga rA dzA/ paN+Da ro nA ga rA dzA/ tsits+tsha ko nA ga rA dzA/ a ra bA Do nA ga rA dzA/ pa ra bA Do nA ga rA dzA/ ma na swI nA ga rA dzA/ 
<p>56b.6</p>rgyal po khra/ klu'i rgyal po shin tu mthar byed/ klu'i rgyal po rgyas byed/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po hu lu ru/ klu'i rgyal po gsal mthong / klu'i rgyal po skya'o/ klu'i rgyal po bsags rgyas/ klu'i rgyal po rtsi bas ra/ klu'i rgyal po rab bzang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can/ 
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>shob lo nA ga rA dzA/ ut+pa la ko nA ga rA dzA/ bar+d+d+ha mA na ko nA ga rA dzA/ bud+hi ko nA ga rA dzA/ na kha ko nA ga rA dzA/ e Da me to nA ga rA dzA nau/ a ts+yu to nA ga rA dzA/ kam+pa lA shwa ta ro nA ga rA dzA nau/ su daR+sha no nA ga rA dzA/ pa
<p>57a.2</p>klu'i rgyal po nya lcibs/ klu'i rgyal po ut+pa la/ klu'i rgyal po 'phel ba po/ klu'i rgyal po blo can/ klu'i rgyal po sen mo can/ klu'i rgyal po lug dang 'du ba gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po ma nyams pa/ klu'i rgyal po kam+ba la dang a shwa tar gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po shin tu mthong / 
<p>57a.3</p>ri kU To nA ga rA dzA/ su mu kho nA ga rA dzA/ A daR+sha mu kho nA ga rA dzA/ gan+d+ha ro nA ga rA dzA/ dra mi Do nA ga rA dzA/ ba la de bo nA ga rA dzA/ kam+ba lo nA ga rA dzA/ shai la ba hurnA ga rA dzA/ bi b+hi Sha No nA ga rA dzA/ gaM gA nA ga rA dzA/ 
<p>57a.4</p>klu'i rgyal po yongs su brtsegs pa/ klu'i rgyal po bzhin legs/ klu'i rgyal po me long gdong / klu'i rgyal po spos 'dzin/ klu'i rgyal po 'gro lding / klu'i rgyal po stobs lha/ klu'i rgyal po kam+pa la/ klu'i rgyal po brag lag /klu'i rgyal po rnam par 'jigs byed/ gang gA'i klu'i rgyal po/ 
<p>57a.5</p>sin+d+hu rnA ga rA dzA/ si tA nA ga rA dzA/ pak+Shu nA ga rA dzA/ maM ga l+yo nA ga rA dzA/ /klu la la ba'i ming la/ in+d+ra se naH/ na DaH/ sun+da raH/ hasti kar+N+NaH/ tIk+Sh+NaH/ piM galaH/ bi d+yu dz+dz+wa laH/ ma hA bi d+yu t+p+ra b+haH/ b+ha ru kats+tshaH/ a mr-i taH/ tIr+tha kaH/ bai DUR+Ya
<p>57a.6</p>sain+d+hu'i klu'i rgyal po/ si ta'i klu'i rgyal po/ bag shu'i klu'i rgyal po/ klu'i rgyal po bkra shis/ dbang po'i sde/ 'dam bu/ rab mdzes/ glang chen rna ba/ rnon po/ ser skya/ glog 'bar/ glog gi 'od chen/ dam pa 'gebs/ bdud rtsi can/ mu stegs can/ bai DUR+Ya'i
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>pra b+haH/ su bar+N+Na ke shaH/ sUr+Ya pra b+haH/ u da ya naH/ gadza shIR+ShaH/ shwe ta ka kA la kaH/ ya maH/ shra ma NaH/ maN+DU kaH/ ma Ni tsU DaH/ a mo g+ha daR+sha naH/ i shA d+hA raH/ tsi tra se naH/ ma hA pA shaH/ k+She maM ka raH/ ma hA pha Na kaH/ gam+b+hI ra ni r+g+ho ShaH/ 
<p>57b.2</p>'od/ gseng mdog ska/ nyi ma'i 'od/ 'char ba/ ba lang mgo/ /dkar po/ nag po/ gshin rje/ dge sbyong / sbal pa/ gtsug na nor bu/ don yod mthong / gshol mda' 'dzin/ sna tshogs sde/ zhags pa chen po/ bde byed/ gdengs ka chen po/ dbyangs zab/ 
<p>57b.3</p>ma hA ni na dI/ pi na rdi taH/ ma hA bi kra maH/ b+hU dzaM ga maH/ ma hA ba laH/ bis+phU rdzi taH/ bi sbA Ta kaH/ pra s+phA Ta kaH/ me g+haM saM b+ha baH/ swa sti kaH/ baR+Sha d+hA raH/ ma Ni kaN+ThaH/ su pra tiSh+Thi taH/ shrI b+ha draH/ ma hA ma Ni tsU DaH/ i rA pa NaH/ 
<p>57b.4</p>char sgrogs/ rnam par dgra 'byin/ rtsal chen/ lag 'gro/ stobs can/ mthu bsgyings/ rnam par 'joms/ rab 'joms/ sprin byung / bkra shis ldan/ char ba'i rgyun/ mgul na nor bu/ shin tu brtan pa/ dpal bzang / gtsug na nor bu chen po/ sa srung gi bu/ 
<p>57b.5</p>ma hA maN+Da li kaH/ in+d+rA yu d+ha shi khI/ a ba b+hA sa na shi khI/ in+d+ra yaSh+TiH/ dzam+bu d+h+wa dzA/ shrI te dzA/ sha shi ta dzA/ tsU Da ma ni d+ha raH/ in+d+ra d+h+wa dzA/ dz+yo tI ra saH/ so ma daR+sha naM/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i ming la/ 
<p>57b.6</p>dkyil 'khor chen po can/ 'ja'i gtsug phud can// /snang ldan gtsug phud can/ dbang po'i mchod sdong / dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan/ dpal gyi gzi brjid/ zla ba'i gzi brjid/ gtsug na nor bu thogs pa/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan/ skar ma la dga' ba/ zla mthong / 
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>bai shra ba NaH/ ma hA g+ho She shwa raH/ d+ha ra Ni su ro drA yu d+haH/ ma hA ma tiH/ ar+ts+tsi ne trA d+hi pa tiH/ badzra dr-i D+ha ne traH/ a gra bI ra bA huH/ ma hA se na byU ha pa rA kra maH/ me ru ba la pra mardI/ d+hA ra NI su b+ha kA yaH/ 
<p>58a.2</p>rnam thos bu/ sgra chen po'i dbang phyug /sa steng mtshon cha mchog tu mi zad pa/ blo gros chen po/ 'od 'phro mig bdag /rdo rje ltar sra ba'i mig /mchog tu dpa' ba'i lag pa/ dmag chen po'i g.yul gnon pa/ lhun po'i stobs 'joms/ lus sa ltar bzang ba/ 
<p>58a.3</p>A Ta ba ka yak+ShaH/ rA ba NaH/ pA ny+tsi kaH/ /dri za'i dbang po'i ming la/ d+h+r-i ta rASh+TaH/ dru ma kin+na ra pra b+haH/ shu tsi ne tra ra ti sam+b+ha baH/ puSh+ba dru ma ku su mi ta ma ku TaM/ ra ti tsa ra Na sa man+ta swa raH/ pra mu di ta pralam+ba su na ya naH/ ma no dz+nya ru ta siM ha d+h+wa dzA/ 
<p>58a.4</p>gnod sbyin 'brog gnas/ sgra sgrog gi bu/ lngas rtsen/ yul 'khor srung / mi'am ci ljon pa'i 'od/ mig gtsang dga' 'byung / me tog sdong po rgyas pa'i cod pa na can/ dga' bas 'gro ba kun du dbyangs/ mig bzang ring dga'/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ 
<p>58a.5</p>sa man+ta rat+na ki ra Na muk+ta pra b+haH/ badzra dru ma ke sa ra d+h+wa dzA/ sarba byU ha ra ti swa b+hA ba na ya san+daR+sha naH/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i ming la/ rA huH/ be ma tsi traH/ sham+ba raH/ ban+d+hiH/ bai ro tsa naH/ dr-i D+ha badzraH/ su tsi trAM gaH/ br-i hA dA raH/ ba la
<p>58a.6</p>rin chen 'od bzhin du kun du gzer gtong / rdo rje ljon pa'i ze ba'i rgyal mtshan/ bkod pa kun la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa/ sgra gcan/ thags bzangs ris/ bde ba'i mchog /'ching ba/ rnam par snang byed/ rdo rje sra ba/ lus shin tu dgra ba/ rtsibs chen/ stobs
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>bi pu la he tu ma tiH/ bat+sa shI sam+ba baH/ su bra ta swa raH/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i ming la/ ma hA be ga lab+d+ha s+thA mA/ a b+he d+ya rat+na tsU DaH/ bem la beg shrIH/ a ni bar+t+ta nI ya tsit+ta b+hU Sha NaH/ ma hA sA ga ra pra b+hA rtogs pa dang 'dom gar snang gum+b+hi ra <p>]b+hArnyaH[</p>/ d+harma dri D+hA b+he d+ya su
<p>58b.2</p>yangs rgyu'i blo gros/ gzhon nu dpal 'byung / brtul zhugs rab kyi dbyangs/ shugs chen mthu thob/ mi phyed gtsug na rin po che/ dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi dpal/ mi bzlog pa'i sems kyi rgyan/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i 'od zab mo 'chang ba/ chos la brtan zhing mi phyed
<p>58b.3</p>ni lam+b+haH/ bi tsit+ta mau li shrI tsU DaH/ sa man+ta s+pha ra NaM mu kha daR+sha naH/ sa man+ta byU ha sA ga ra tsaR+YA bya ba lo ka naH/ /mi'am ci'i dbang po'i ming la/ dru ma kin+na ra rA dzA/ de ba ma ti pra b+haH/ ku su ma ke tu maN+Da lI/ bi tsit+t+ra b+hU Sha naH/ ma no dz+nya ni rnA
<p>58b.4</p>par shin tu ston pa/ cod paN sna tshogs dpal gyi gtsug /bzhin kun du khyab par ston pa/ kun du bkod ba rgya mtsho'i spyod ba la rnam par lta ba/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ljon pa/ lha'i blo gros 'od/ me tog rtog gi dkyil 'khor can/ rgyan sna tshogs can/ sgra dbyangs
<p>58b.5</p>da swa raH/ dru ma rat+na shA khA pra b+haH/ su daR+sha na prI ti ka raH/ b+hU Sha Nen+d+ra pra b+haH/ su re Nu puSh+pa d+h+wa dzA/ d+ha ra NI ta la shrIH/ u ra gA d+hi pa tiH/ /lto 'phyo sin po'i dbang po'i ming la/ su ma ti re NuH/ bi ra dza ste dzaHswa raH/ a gra ma ti tsi tra tsU DaH/ su ne trA d+hi pa tiH/ 
<p>58b.6</p>yid du 'ong / rin chen yal ga'i ljon pa'i 'od/ legs mthong dga' byed/ rgyan gyi dbang po 'od/ rdul mdzes me tog rgyal [(]mtshen[,]mtshan[)]/ sa steng dpal/ lto 'phye bdag po/ blo gros zhi ba mchog /gzi brjid rdul med dbyangs/ blo mchog sna tshogs gtsug /mig bzang bdag po/ 
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>pra dI pa sha ra Na d+h+wa dzA/ A lo ka su be ga d+h+wa dzA/ siM ha ba t+saH pi tsi t+t+rA laM kA swa raH/ su me ru ba t+saH/ ru tsi ra bra b+ha sa saM b+ha baH/ /grul bum gyi dbang po'i ming la/ bi rU D+ha kaH/ nA gA d+hi pa tiH/ su tsIr+N+Na b+d+d+wa dzA/ hi ta tsa ra na saM kra maH/ b+hI mot+ta
<p>59a.2</p>skyabs sgron rgyal mtshan/ snang ba shugs mchog rgyal mtshan/ bu seng ge sna tshogs rgyan gyi dbyangs/ bu ri rab/ snang ba mdzes 'byung / 'phags skyes bo/ klu bdag /shin tu spyad pa'i rgyal mtshan/ phan par spyad pa la zhugs pa/ 'jigs su rung
<p>59a.3</p>raH/ shA la su tsin+t+raH/ me ru su saM b+ha baH/ bI ra ba huH/ a nan+ta shu b+ha na ya na ke sa rI/ a nan+ta mu kha de bA su ra ne trA su raH/ drang srong chen po'i ming la/ su shru taH/ hA rI taH/ ha ri sh+tsan+d+raH/ b+h+r-i guH/ d+han+dan+ta riH/ dzA dr-i kar+N+NaH/ b+he
<p>59a.4</p>ba'i bla ma/ legs pas shin tu bkra ba/ lhun po shin tu 'byung ba/ dpa' ba'i lag pa/ dge ba mtha' yas pa'i mig gam gser/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'dren pa'i lha ma yin/ legs thos/ ljang sngo'i bu/ seng ge zla ba/ ngan spong / thang la bar/ rgya skyegs rna/ gzings
<p>59a.5</p>DaH/ kA sh+ya paH/ a ga stiH/ sa na ta naH/ sa natra ku mA raH/ khA ra nA dI/ A tre yaH/ pra dzA pa tiH/ pa rA sha raH/ ka pi la ma hAR+SheH/ ka nA da ma hA riShaH/ a k+Sha pA daH/ byA saH/ b+hA ra d+h+wa dzaH/ ba siSh+ThaH/ nA ra daH/ 
<p>59a.6</p>can/ 'dro ba skyong bu/ ri byi/ g.yung drung / kun 'gyed gzhon nu/ sgra drag gi bu/ rgyun shes kyi gu/ skye dgu bdag /rtsib logs skyes/ drang srong chen po ser skya/ drang srong chen po gzegs zan/ rkang mig can/ rgyas pa/ b+hA ra rgyal mtshan/ gnas 'jog/ /mis byin gyi bu
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>ag+ni bi shaH/ a ra ni miH/ /sngon gyi ma ban bo'i ming la/ nA gA rdzu naH/ nA gA hwa yaH/ A r+YA de baH/ A r+YA saM gaH/ bsu ban+d+huH/ A r+YA shU raH/ a shwag+ho ShaH/ di g+mA gaH/ d+harma pA laH/ d+harma kI r+t+tiH/ s+thi ra ma ti/ saM g+ha b+ha draH/ gu na pra b+haH/ bsu mi traH/ 
<p>59b.2</p>me bzhin 'jug /rtsibs kyi mu khyud/ klu sgrub/ klus bod/ 'phags pa lha/ 'phags pa thogs med/ dbyig gnyen/ 'phags pa dpa' bo/ rta skad/ /phyogs glang / chos skyong / chos grags/ blo brtan/ 'dus bzang / yon tan 'od/ dbyig bshes/ 
<p>59b.3</p>gu Na ma tiH/ shAkya bud+d+hiH/ de ben+d+ra bu d+hiH/ dz+nyA nagar+b+haH/ shan+ta rak+Shi taH/ tsan+d+ra go mI/ bud+d+ha pA li taH/ b+ha byaH/ ba ra ru ciH/ pA Ni niH/ pA taN+dza li/ tsan+d+ra kIr+t+tiH/ bi ni ta de baH/ nan+daH/ d+harmot+ta raH/ shA kya mi traH/ dz+nyA na dat+taH/ pra b+hA ka ra sid+d+haH/ 
<p>59b.4</p>yon tan blo gros/ shAkya blo/ lha dbang blo/ ye shes snying po/ zhi ba 'tsho/ btsun pa zla ba/ sangs rgyas skyong / skal ldan/ mchog sred/ pA Ni ni/ chur lhung / zla grags/ dul ba lha/ dga' bo/ chos mchog /shAkya bshes gnyen/ ye shes byin/ 'od byed grub/ 
<p>59b.5</p>shI la b+ha draH/ daM Sh+Ta se naH/ d+harma trA taH/ bi she Sha mi traH/ ra bi gup+taH/ bA b+ha TaH/ /ya mtshan can gyi ming sa/ tI r+th+ya ka raH/ tIr+thi kaH/ a rA DaH kA lamaH/ u dra ko rA ma bu traH/ mI mAnas kaH/ bai she Sha kaH/ saM khyaH/ lo kA ya taH/ kA NA
<p>59b.6</p>ngang tshul bzang po/ mche ba'i sde/ chos skyo ba/ khyad par bshas gnyen/ nyi ma sbas pa/ pha kho la/ mu stegs byed/ mu stegs can/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod/ spyod pa ba/ bye brag pa/ grangs can pa/ 'jig rten rgyang pan gzegs
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>dA/ pa ri bra dza kaH/ bai d+yaH/ pA ShaN+Di kA/ shai baH/ pA shu pa tiH/ ka pA lI/ a tse la kaH/ nir+g+ran+thaH/ k+Sha pa NaH/ Ar+ha taH/ ma hA bra tI/ rA ma bra tI/ mr-i g-i shrAM ga bra tI/ kr-iSh+Na mu khaH/ ma yU
<p>60a.2</p>zan pa/ kun du rgyu/ sman pa/ ya mtshan can/ zhi ba pa/ phyugs bdag pa/ thod pa can/ gos med/ gcer bu pa/ zad byed pa/ mchod 'os/ brtul zhugs chen po pa/ rangs byed kyi bu brtul zhugs can/ sha ru'i brtul zhugs can/ ngo gnag /rma bya'i
<p>60a.3</p>ra bra tI/ pAN+Da ra b+hi k+ShuH/ tri daN+Di/ e ka daN+DI/ dwi daN+DI/ go shriM ga bra tI/ ke shol+lu tsa naM/ /mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gi ming la/ pU ra NaHkA sh+ya paH/ maska rI go shA lI pu traH/ sany+dza yI bai raT+TI pu traH/ a dzi taHke sha kam+ba
<p>60a.4</p>brtul zhugs can/ srong ba dkar po/ dbyig gu gsum pa/ dbyig gu gcig pa/ dbyig gu gnyis pa/ glang ru'i brtul zhugs can/ skra 'bal pa/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed/ kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can/ mi 'pham skra'i la
<p>60a.5</p>laH/ a ku daHkA t+yA ya naH/ ni gran+tho dz+nyA ti pu traH/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi ming la/ ma hA sam+ma taH/ ro tsaH/ ka l+yA NaH/ ba ra ka l+yA NaH/ u po Shad+haH/ mUr+d+hA taH/ mAn+d+hA taH/ tsA ru/ u pa tsA ru/ tsA ru maM taH/ mu tsiH/ mu tsi lin+daH/ sha ku niH/ ma hA sha ku niH/ 
<p>60a.6</p>ba can/ ka t+ya'i bu nog can/ gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu/ mang pos bkur ba/ 'od mdzes/ dge ba/ dge mchog /gos sbyong 'phags/ spyi bo skyes/ nga las nu/ mdzes pa/ nye mdzes/ mdzes ldan/ btang pa/ btang bzung / sha ku ni/ sha ku ni chen po/ 
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>ku shaH/ u pa ku shaH/ ma hA ku shaH/ su daR+sha naH/ ma hA su daR+sha naH/ bA ma ka /aM gi raH/ b+h+r-i guH/ me ruH/ n+yaM kuH/ pra NA daH/ ma hA pra nA daH/ shaM ka raH/ di sham+ba tiH/ re NuH/ b+ha ra taH/ ma hA de baH/ ne miH/ b+hi maH/ 
<p>60b.2</p>ku sha nye ba'i ku sha /ku sha chen po/ legs mthong / legs mthong chen po/ gnod sel/ shes ldan/ ngan spong / lhun po/ nges 'gro/ rab tu sgra bsgrags/ rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po/ bde byed/ phyogs bdag /rdul bzang / rgyas byed/ lha chen po/ mu khyud/ 'jigs byed/ 
<p>60b.3</p>b+hI ma ra thaH/ sha ta ra thaH/ da sha ra thaH/ pany+tsa la rA dzA/ ka liM ga rA dzA/ asma ka rA dzA/ kau ra ba rA dzA/ ka pA la rA dzA/ ge ya rA dzA/ ma ga d+ha rA dzA/ ta mA li p+ta ka rA dzA/ i k+Sh+wo ku nA ma rA dzA/ pi rU D+ha kaH/ siM
<p>60b.4</p>'jigs byed shing rta/ shing rta brgya pa/ shing rta bcu pa/ lnga 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ ka ling ka'i rgyal po/ asma ka'i rgyal po/ sgra mi snyan gyi rgyal po/ thod pa can gyi rgyal po/ klu dbyangs kyi rgyal po/ /mA gad+ha'i rgyal po/ ta ma li sta'i rgyal po/ /rgyal po bu ram shing skyes/ 'phags skyes po/ sang ge
<p>60b.5</p>ha ha nuH/ shud+d+ho da naH/ shu klo da naH/ dro No da naH/ a mr-i to da naH/ sid+d+hAr+thaH/ nan+daH/ tiSh+yaH/ b+ha dra kaH/ ma hA nA maH/ a ni rud+d+haH/ a nan+daH/ de ba dat+taH/ rA hu laH/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yon tan dang / swa yaM yA naM/ pra t+yu d+yA naM/ ka la ha dzi taH/ shas+t+ra
<p>60b.6</p>'gram/ zas gtsang ma/ zas dkar/ bre 'o zas/ bdud rtsi zas/ don grub/ dga' ba/ rgyal/ bzang ldan/ ming chen/ ma 'gags pa/ kun dga' bo/ lhas byin/ sgra gcan 'dzin/ rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i ming la/ rang 'du ba/ pas su pa/ 'thab mo bshams nas phebs pa/ mtshon cha
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>dzi taH/ tsa tu ran+to bi dze tA/ d+harmi ko d+harma rA dzA/ mardi ta kaN+Da kaH/ bi dzi ta bi dza yaH/ sap+ta rat+na sam n+wA ga taH/ tsa kra rat+naM/ hasti rat+naM/ a shwa rat+naM/ 
<p>61a.2</p>brtsams pas phebs pa/ mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ gnod pa choms pa'am tsher ma dkrugs pa/ rnam par rgyal bar byas pa las rnam par rgyal ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan/ 'khor lo rin po che/ glang po rin po che/ rta mchog rin po che/ 
<p>61a.3</p>ma Ni rat+naM/ s+t+ri rat+naM/ gr-i ha pa ti rat+naM/ pa ri NA ya ka rat+naM/ /bu stong du tshang par 'gyur ba'i ming la/ shU raH/ bI raH/ pa rAM ga rU pI/ pa ra sai n+ya pra mardI/ a dzi haM dza ya ti/ dzi ta ma d+h+yA ba sa tiH/ sa i mA me ba
<p>61a.4</p>nor bu rin po che/ bud med rin po che/ khyim bdag rin po che/ blon po rin po che/ dpa' ba/ brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi snge rab tu 'joms pa/ ma phebs pa 'bebs/ phebs pa'i sar gnas 'debs/ de rgya mtsho la thug
<p>61a.5</p>sa mu dra par+Ya n+tAM ma hA pr-i thi bI a khi lAM a kaN+Da kAM a nut+pi tAM a daN+De nA sha s+t+re Na d+harmi Na sa me nA b+hi ni rdzi t+yA d+h+yA ba sa ti/ /dbung tshogs yan lag bzhi'i ming la/ tsa tu raM ga ba la kA yaH/ hasti kA yaH/ a shwa kA yaH/ ra tha kA yaH/ 
<p>61a.6</p>pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas pa'o/ /dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ slang po che'i tshogs/ rta'i tshogs/ shing rta'i tshogs/
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>pat+ti kA yaH/ rgyal po phal pa'i ming la/ rA dzA sa ha srA nI kaH/ rA dzA sha tA nI kaH/ rA dzA brah+ma dat+taH/ rA dzA\u0f85nan+ta ne miH/ rA dzA bim+ba sA raH/ rA dzA pra d+yo taH/ rA dzA pra se na dzi ta?/ u da ya na bat+sa rA dzA/ kr-i kI rA dzA/ shre Ni kaH/ shre N+yaH/ 
<p>61b.2</p>dpung bu chung gi tshogs/ rgyal po dmag stong pa/ rgyal po dmag brgya pa/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin/ rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po/ rgyal po rab snang / rgyal po gsal rgyal/ rgyal po shar ba'i bu/ rgyal po kr-i kri/ bzo sbyangs/ bzo sbyangs/ 
<p>61b.3</p>a sho kaH/ sAn+ti bA ha naH/ ka ni skaH/ /skya seng gi bu la sogs pa'i ming go mthun la/ paN+Da bAH/ yu d+hiSh+Thi raH/ b+hI ma se naH/ na ku laM/ sa ha de baH/ a rdzu naH/ ka ra kar+N+NIH/ hasti ni yaM saH/ pra kr-i ti rmA taM ga dA ri kA/ tri shaM kuH/ s+tha pa
<p>61b.4</p>mya ngan med pa/ mthar 'gro zhon/ ka ni ska/ skya bseng gi bu/ g.yul ngor brtan pa/ 'jigs sde/ rigs med/ lhar bcas/ srid sgrub/ lo tang nyan/ glang po che 'dul ba/ gdol ba'i bu mo byad bzang mo/ phur bu gsum pa/ btsun mo'i zhal lta ba'am
<p>61b.5</p>tiH/ mr-i gA d+hA ra mA tA/ /me'i rim pa dang lus kyi yan lag dang yul 'khor [X] rAM dzA/ pAr+thi baH/ rA dzAk+Sha tri yo mUr+d+hA b+hi Shik+taH/ yu ba rA dzA/ mAN+Da li ka rA dza/ sA man+taH/ rA dza mA traH/ koT+TA rA dzaH/ man+t+ri paR+ShA d+h+ya k+ShaM/ 
<p>61b.6</p>phya mkhan/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma la sogs pa'i ming las/ mi'i rim pa'i ming la/ rgyal po/ sa bdag rA dzA dang ma 'dom na rgyal po/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ rgyal tshab/ rgyal phran/ chab 'og gi rgyal phran nam/ blon po chen po/ khams kyi rgyal po'am rgyal phran/ nang blon spyan/
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>ma hA mA traH/ man+t+ri/ A mA t+yaH/ pu ro hi taH/ rA dza na kaH/ daN+Da mu khyaH/ daN+Da nA ya kaH/ sa nA ba tiH/ bik+She pA d+hi ba tiH/ a d+h+ya k+ShaH/ A Ta bi kaH/ an+ta rba shi kaH/ sAn+d+hi bigra hi kaH/ ga Na nA pa ti/ ga Na ka ma hA mA traH/ ak+Sha pa Te li
<p>62a.2</p>sna chen po la gtogs pa/ bka' la gtogs pa/ blon po/ 'dun na 'don/ zhang blon/ dbang blon/ dbang blon/ dmag dpon/ dmag dpon/ spyan/ nags khrod bdag /nang pa'i bla/ phrin blon/ rtsis kyi bla/ rtsis mkhan chen po/ 'du 'god kyi rtsis
<p>62a.3</p>kaH/ pra ti hA raH/ d+harmA d+hi ka ra NaH/ pra deSh+TA/ nA ya kaH/ a shwa pa tiH/ pI lu pa tiH/ ga dza pa tiH/ kham+b+hA ra pa tiH/ na ra pa tiH/ koT+Ta pA laH/ an+ta pA laH/ durga pA laH/ shreSh+ThI/ bi Sha ya pa tiH/ na ga ra pa tiH/ grAm pa tiH/ 
<p>62a.4</p>pa/ sgo dpon chen po/ chos bzhin gcod pa/ pra deSh+TA dang ma 'dom na zhal che bar gdags zhal ce pa/ sde sna'am sde dpon/ chibs kyi bla/ dkor gyi bla/ glang po che 'i bla/ mngan/ rgyal po'am mi'i bla/ rtse rje/ so srung / rdzong srung / tshong dpon/ yul dpon/ grong khyer gyi bla/ grong dpon/ 
<p>62a.5</p>bau ra bya ba hA ri kaH/ nA ya kaH/ ni yuk+ta kaH/ b+ha Ta ba lA graH/ sa mA ha r+t+r-iH/ bra shAstA/ san+ti d+hA tA/ b+haN+DA ri kaH/ rA dza dwA ri kaH/ ga Na kaH/ dz+yo ti ShaH/ b+hi Shaka?/ bai d+yaH/ ta la brkaH/ pA ri d+h+wa dzi kaH/ ts+tshat+t+ra d+ha raH/ tsi h+na d+ha raH/ 
<p>62a.6</p>grong gi bla/ sde dpon/ snar bskos pa/ khrom gyi ru/ sdud sna/ mthong slebs kyi dpon/ dkor 'drub pa/ mdzod pa/ pho brang 'khor du bka' 'dzin pa/ rtsis mkhan/ skar mkhan/ sman pa/ sman pa/ skru srung / rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ gdugs thogs pa/ rtags thogs pa/ 
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>tsA ma ri kaH/ kA ra bA li kaH/ khAD+gi kaH/ prA si kaH/ pAr+sh+wa d+hi kaH/ tsA kri kaH/ phA ri kaH/ tsai tra daN+Di kaH/ yASh+TI kaH/ dwA ra bA laH/ dau bA ri kaH/ she Sha pa tiH/ sU tsa kaH/ daN+Da bA si kaH/ se ba kaH/ b+haT+TaH/ 
<p>62b.2</p>rnga yab thogs pa/ ral gri kyog po thogs pa/ ral gri pa/ mdung pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ 'khor lo thogs pa/ phub thogs pa/ dbyig gu thogs pa/ dbyug pa thogs pa/ sgo srung / sgo ba/ gnyer ba/ log pa'am 'dam po pa/ yul srung / zham 'bring pa/ shor ba'am bkrabs
<p>62b.3</p>i shwas+t+rA tsAR+YaH/ nA si raH/ nai ga maH/ dza na pa daH/ dai ba ku li kaH/ mA yA kA raH/ aR+YaH/ man+t+ra bA dI/ kr-i ya bA dI/ kha n+ya bA dI/ d+hA tu bA dI/ lub+d+ha kaH/ mAt+si kaH/ shA kun+ti kaH/ o ra b+h+r-i ka/ baT+Ti kaH/ sau ka ri kaH/ go g+hA ta kaH/ pA gu ri kaH/ 
<p>62b.4</p>pa/ 'phong gi slong dpon/ snga tshoms/ grong mi/ yul gyi mi/ lha khang srung ba/ sgyu ma mkhan/ jo bo'am rje'o/ gsang sngags smra ba/ bcos ma byed pa/ gter lta shes pa/ nor sgyur mkhan/ rngon pa/ nya ba/ bya ba/ shan pa/ phag 'tshong / ba lang gsod pa/ rgyas 'tshor ba/ 
<p>62b.5</p>kauk+ku Ti kaH/ nA ga ban+d+ha kaH/ nA ga maN+Da li kaH/ A hi tuN+Di kaH/ b+h+raiM ga ri kaH/ sU pa kA raH/ ra dza kaH/ s+tha pa tiH/ tak+Sha kaH pa la gaN+DaHpar+d+ha kaH/ sU tra d+hA raH/ yA ba si kaH/ kaSh+Tha hA ra kaH/ mA lA pA raH/ sauN+Di kaH/ kal+la bA laH/ 
<p>62b.6</p>bya gag 'tshong ba/ glang po che 'dzin pa/ sbrul tshogs can/ sbrul khas bsdigs pa/ phyag tshang skyems mal ba/ phyag tshang chang mang pa/ btso blag mkhan/ pha gru brtsigs mkhan/ phya mkhan/ shing mkhan/ thig mkhan/ rtswa 'tshong / shing thun/ me tog phreng rgyud/ chang 'tshong / chang 'tshong / 
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>A yu d+ha dzI bI/ gan+d+hi kaH/ tsit+t+ra kA raH/ shi lA kuT+TaH/ tan+t+ra bA yaH/ su bar+N+Na kA raH/ sau bar+N+Ni kaH/ lo ha kA raH/ kaM sa kA raH/ ma Ni kA raH/ shaulbi kaH/ sU tsikaH/ pat+t+ra ts+tshe da kaH/ nai mit+ti kaH/ bai pany+tsi kaH/ tsarma
<p>63a.2</p>mtshon chas 'tsho ba/ spos 'tshong / ri mo mkhan/ lto mkhan/ tha ga pa/ gser mgar/ gser spyod/ lcags mgar/ 'khar ba mgar/ nor bu mkhan/ zangs mkhan/ tsham bu mkhan/ glegs 'dra mkhan/ ltas mkhan/ mtshan mkhan/ lham mkhan
<p>63a.3</p>kA raH/ mo tsi kaH/ ra tha kA raH/ be Nu kA raH/ khA ta rU pa kA raH/ kum+b+ha kA raH/ bA Ni gra/ shaulki kaH/ gaul+mi kaH/ tA ra pa N+yi kaH/ he riH/ tsa raH/ a ba tsa rakaH/ mauSh+Ti kaH/ bi dU ShaH/ mau dri kaH/ kA yas+thaH/ A tsIr+N+Na dan+ta
<p>63a.4</p>nam ko lpags mkhan/ lham mkhan/ shing rta mkhan nam lham mkhan/ smyug ma mkhan/ rko mkhan nam tshud mo mkhan/ rdza mkhan/ tshong pa/ sho gam pa/ la gcan pa/ gru btsas gcod pa/ nyan rna/ nyan rna/ bya ma rta/ zol pa/ bzhad gdab/ yi ge pa/ yi ge pa/ dbyig pa gcod
<p>63a.5</p>tA/ dU taH/ ka th+yA yit+taH/ kASh+Thi kA bin+taH/ lo hA riHle kha hA ri kaH/ ku Tu m+bi kaH/ ku Tum+baH/ kany+tsu li/ an+taH bu raH/ mahal+laH/ karmAn+ti kaH/ kAR+Shi kaH kr-i ShI ba laH/ A b+hIraH/ go pA laH/ sha rI ra rak+Sha kaH/ ba ri bA raH/ dA saH/ dA sI/ karma ka raH/ bau ru She yaH/ b+h+r-i
<p>63a.6</p>pa/ pho nya/ rang rta/ rang rta/ 'phar ma'am bang chen pa/ khyim khol/ bza'/ nyung rum pa/ nyung rum pa/ nyung rum pa/ zhing pa/ zhing rmod pa/ phyugs rji/ ba lang rdzi/ lus srung / g.yog /bran nam khol po/ bran mo/ las byed pa/ zho shas 'tsho ba/ gla
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>t+yaH/ ban+d+han pA la kaH/ ba d+h+ya g+hA ta kaH/ kA ra N+ya kA ra kaH/ ba d+ha kaH/ ha na naM/ kalbi kA raH ka pyA riH/ u d+yA na pA laH/ A rA mi kaH/ gr-i hI/ gr-i ha s+thaH/ mA Na ba kaH/ na ga ra g+hA ta kaH/ grA ma g+hA ta kaH/ dza na pa da g+hA ta kaH/

<p>63b.3</p>nA bi kaH/ A hA ra kaH/ nir+hA ra kaH/ kar+N+Na d+hA ra kaH/ ra Na d+hA ra kaH/ kau bar+t+taH/ /mi'i rigs sna tshogs la/ tsa twA ro bar+N+NAH/ brAh+ma NaH/ k+Shat+t+ri yaH/ bai sh+yaH/ shU draH/ k+Shat+t+ri ya ma hA sA la ku laM/ brA h+ma Na ma hA sA la ku laM/

<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>pra pi tA ma haH/ pi tA ma hI/ pra bi tA ma hI/ pu traH/ du haM tA/ dz+yeSh+Tha b+h+rA tA/ ka nI yaM b+h+rA tA/ b+h+rA tA/ b+ha gi nI/ nap+ta/ nap+tI/ shwa shu raH/ shwa sA/ mA tu laH/ b+hAR+YA ba t+nI dA rAH ka la traM/ mA tr-i shwa sA/ pi tr-i shwa sA/ sa pat+nI/ an+ta pu raM/ ba d+hU/ dzam+pa

<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>kraM/ la lA TaH/ b+h+rUH/ pa k+Sh+mA/ tA ra kaH/ mu khaM/ sr-i kwaNI/ tsi pu kaM/ grI bA/ ka po laM/ gaN+DaH/ ha nuH/ shaM khaH/ dzam+b+hiH/ dan+taH/ tA luH/ oSh+ThaH/ daMSh+TA/ sham shruH/ gaN+ThaH/ kaN+Tha nA li kA/ kaN+Tha ma NiH/ hr-i da yaM/ kr-i kA T-i kA

<p>65a.1</p>pA daH/ U ruH/ dzA nuH/ dza nu maN+Da laM/ dzaM g+hA/ gu l+phaH/ pAR+Sh+NiH/ pA da ta laM/ klo ma kaH/ phu b+phus/ ya kr-itra/ blI haH/ pit+taH/ br-ik+kaH/ an+t+raM/ an+ta gu NA/ A mA sa yaH/ pa t+k+wA sha yaH/ o da rI ya gaM /mAn+saH/ ku k+ShiH/ twaka? /as+thi/

<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>ta ru NaH/ yo ba naM/ yu bA/ da hraH/ yu ba ti/ ku mA ri/ /rgas pa dang na pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/ gup+dzaH/ dzIr+N+Na tA/ ba lI bra tsu ra tA/ pA li t+yaM/ daN+Da a baSh+TaM lha na tA/ khA li t+yaM/ kA saH/ khu ru khu rA ba sak+ta kaN+ThaH/ prA g+b+hA re Na kA ye na daN+Da ma baSh+Ta b+d+haH/ d+ha ma

<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>ba tI/ lum+bi nI/ in+d+ra shai la gu hA/ ku sha na ga raM/ u shI ra gi riH/ udz+dzA ya nI na ga rI/ ka ling+gaH/ mr-i ga dA baH/ r-i Shi ba da naM/ r-i shi pa ta naM/ ko sa lA/ sA ke tama?/ a ban+tiH/ tsam+pA/ pany+tsA laH/ a Ta ka ba tI/ 
<p>66a.2</p>can/ lum bi nI/ dbang po'i brag phug /ku sha'i grong khyer/ u shi ra'i ri/ grong khyer 'phags rgyal/ ka ling ga /ri dgas kyi gnas/ drang srong smra ba/ drang srong lhung ba/ ko sa la/ gnas bcas/ srung byed/ tsam pa/ lnga lan/ lcang lo can/

<p>66a.6</p>ma la ya/ 'bigs byed/ ngos yangs/ lus 'phags pa'i ri/ ri rab kyi bang rim/ chu dang gling la sogs pa'i ming la/ rgya mtsho/ dug can/ chu 'dzin/ chu chen/ chu gter/ tshwa mtsho 'di rnams 'dom na 'di ltar bsgyur ma 'dom na rgya mtsho/ chu bo/ klung ngam 'bab chu/ chu bran/ mtsho/ mtshe'u/ 
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>b+hilbaM/ ut+saH/ hra daH/ ku l+yaH/ ut+b+hi daH/ A li/ puSh+ka ri NI/ uSh+NA+o da gama?/ kU paH/ u da pA nama?/ Ur+m+miH/ man+dA ki nI/ pA ram+pA a pA ra m+pA/ ni sa ra d+hA rA/ u da ka d+hA rA/ kAny+tsa na bA lu ka stIr+N+NaH/ tI raM/

<p>66b.4</p>chu gling / nai ra dzA na'i klung / chu bo rab med/ dga' ba'i tshal/ 'dres pa'i tshal/ rtsub 'gyur tshal/ shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal/ yongs 'dus brtol/ me tog gi shing / 'bras bu'i shing / spos kyi shing / shing gel pa/ shug pa/ thang shing / skyer pa/ ba lu/ 
<p>66b.5</p>pA le ba taH/ br-ik+ShaH/ tsan+da nam/ kha di raH/ dA Di ma br-ik+ShaH/ piN+Da khardzu ra br-ik+ShaH/ ba na spa tiH/ ba na ShaN+DaM/ baM shaH/ be NuH/ biN+Da be NuH/ be traM/ n+ya gro d+haH/ i k+Shu ba naM/ shA li ba naM/ be ta saH/ na Da ba naM/ sA la br-ik+ShaH/ nA ga br-ik+ShaH/ pr-ik+ShaH/ tsab+b+yaH/ dzA tiH/ 
<p>66b.6</p>ku shu/ shing / tsan dan/ seng ldeng / bal po se'u shing / 'bra go'i shing / nags/ nags khrod/ smyig ma/ smyig ma/ 'od ma/ sba/ ne gro ta/ bu ram shing gi tshal/ 'bras kyi tshal/ lcang ma/ 'dam bu'i tshal/ shing sA la/ klu shing / ljon pa/ sbyi mo/ sri shing sna ma/ 
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>pAN+Du pa lA shaH/ shI Na pa lA shaH/ kaN+Da kaH/ tA laH/ la tA bal+lI/ ka rI raH/ /sngags kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i ming la/ tan+t+raM/ ut+tar tan+t+raM/ man+t+raM/ bi d+yA/ d+hA ra NI/ maN+Da lama?/ shAn+ti kaM/ A kaR+Sha NaM/ pauSh+Ti kaH/ A b+hi tsa ru kaH/ ba shI
<p>67a.2</p>lo ma ser/ 'dab ma lhags/ tsher ma/ shing ta la/ 'khri shing ngam lcug ma/ smyig ma'i ldum bu/ sngags kyi rgyud/ rgyud bla ma/ gsang sngags/ rig sngags/ gzungs sngags/ dkyil 'khor/ zhi ba/ dgug pa/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ dbang
<p>67a.3</p>ka ra NaH/ ho maH/ u pa tsA raH/ bi d+hiH/ bi d+hA naMH/ kalpaH/ dzA paH/ ho mo pa ka ra NaMH/ A hu ti dra byaM/ ho tA/ ha ba naM/ dzu ha yAtra/ a b+hi She kaH/ a b+hi Shik+taH/ a bA ha naM/ A kaR+Sha NaM/ 
<p>67a.4</p>du bya ba/ sbyin sreg /bya ba'i cho ga'am yo byad ces skabs dang sbyar/ cho ga /cho ga zhib mo/ cho ga zhib mo/ bzlas brjod/ sbyin sreg gi yo byad/ sreg blugs kyi rdzas/ sbyin sreg byed pa/ bsreg pa/ sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba/ dbang bskur ba/ spyan drangs pa/ dgug pa/ 
<p>67a.5</p>bi sardza naM/ ban+d+ha naM/ uts+tsA Ta naM/ garbaH/ a d+hiSh+ThA naM/ man+t+ra tsar+Ya/ A lI D+haM/ pra t+yA lI D+haM/ bra se naM/ sid+d+hiH/ man+t+rI/ bi d+yA d+ha raH/ sA d+h+yaM/ sA d+ha kaH/ ut+ta ra sA d+ha kaH/ e ka dzA TI/ mA sa kI/ mUr+d+d+ha
<p>67a.6</p>slar gshegs su gsol ba/ bcing ba/ dgar ba/ bsnyems pa'i tshul/ byin rlabs/ sngags kyi spyod pa/ g.yas brkyang / g.yon brkyang / gsal snang / dngos grub/ sngags pa/ rig sngags 'chang / bsgrub bya/ sgrub pa po/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog /ral gcig ma/ bdag gi ma gtsug
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>Ta kaH/ bud+d+ha lo tsa nA/ paN+Da ra bA si nI/ tA rA/ badzra b+h+r-i ku TiH/ Ar+Ya b+h+r-i ku TiH/ badzrA m+bu dzA/ badzrAng+ku shI/ o dzaH pra t+yA hA ri NI/ hA sa ba tI/ rat+nolkA/ A d+hA ra NI/ sa man+ta b+ha drA/ ra ti rA gA/ badzra d+hA twI shwa rI/ 
<p>67b.2</p>spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan/ gos dkar can/ sgrol ma/ khro gnyer can/ 'phags ma khro gnyer can/ rdo rje pad+ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu/ so sor ma dngas 'phrog ma/ bzhad ldan ma/ rin chen sgron ma/ kun 'dzin ma/ kun du bzang mo/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags ma/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ 
<p>67b.3</p>sarba tsakrA/ rat+not+ta mA/ sA ha srA bar+t+tA/ sA d+hu ma tI/ sid+d+hot+ta mA/ d+hA ra NI mu drA/ badzra sa twa dz+nyA na mu drA/ ma hA tuSh+Ti dz+nyA na mu drA/ ma hA bra b+hA maN+Da la byU ha dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba d+har+m+ma
<p>67b.4</p>'khor lo thams cad ma/ mchog gi rin chen ma/ stong 'khyil ma/ legs pa'i blo gros ma/ grub mchog ma/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ dgyes ba chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ 'od chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ chos thams cad
<p>67b.5</p>sa ma tA dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na mu drA/ ma hA prI ti be ga sam+b+ha ba dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga tA shA pa ri pU ra Na dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma
<p>67b.6</p>mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ dga' ba'i shugs chen po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>yA d+d+hiSh+ShA na dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzrA b+hi She ka dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma bAg+niSh+p+ra pany+tsa dz+nyA
<p>68a.2</p>thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig spros pa med
<p>68a.3</p>na mu drA/ ma hA tsakra pra be sha dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta bi shwa kar+m+ma dz+nyA na mu drA/ du ra yo d+ha na bIR+Ya dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba mA ra maN+Da la bi d+h+wan+sa na dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta
<p>68a.4</p>pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ 'thab dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs
<p>68a.5</p>thA ga ta ban+d+ha na dz+nyA na mu drA/ sarba ta thA ga ta su ra ta su khA/ sarba ta thA ga tA kaR+Sha NI/ sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga NI/ sarba ta thA ga ta san+to Sha NI/ ma hA d+hi pa tI/ ma hA d+yo
<p>68a.6</p>pa thams cad bsdams pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa mchog gi bde ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes byed ma/ bdag mo chen mo/ gsal byed chen
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>tA/ ma hA rat+na baR+ShA/ ma hA brI ti haR+ShA/ ma hA dz+nyA na gI tA/ ma hA g+ho ShA nu gA/ gan+d+ha pa tI/ ma hA po d+h+yang+ga ba tI/ tsa k+ShuSh+ma tI/ satwa ba tI/ sum+b+haH/ ni sum+b+haH/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ dzam+b+ha laH/ uts+tshuSh+maM/ Ar+Ya ya mAn+ta
<p>68b.2</p>mo/ rin chen char 'beb sam/ dga' ba chen po sa tshim pa/ ye shes chen po'i glu dbyangs/ sgra chen po'i rjes su 'jug ma/ spos ldan ma/ byang chub yan lag che ldan/ mig ldan ma/ snying stobs ldan/ gnod mdzes/ nges par gnod mdzes/ bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor/ rmug 'dzin/ 'chol ba/ 'phags pa gshin rje
<p>68b.3</p>kaH/ shaM ka raH/ pi nA kI/ bai ba shwa tI/ gu h+ya kA d+hi pa tiH/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa tiH/ ya dz+nyo pa bI taM/ ku sha ba pi tra d+hA ra kaH/ tr-i puN+Da ga tsi h+ni taM/ shr-ing+ga Ta ka ba/ ti tsi h+ni taM/ dza TA ba lam+bi taM/ sa mi d+haH/ in+d+ha naM/ ag+ni kuN+DaH/ pUr+N+NA hu ti/ shru ba
<p>68b.4</p>sel/ bde byed/ gzhi thogs/ nyi ma'i bu/ gsang ba'i bdag bo/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon chen po/ mchod phyir thogs/ ku sha gtsang bsrel/ thal ba'i sor ris gsum mtshan can/ sum mdo'i ri sa mtshan can/ ral pa 'phyang / yam sreg shing / bud shing / me thab/ bkang blugs/ blugs
<p>68b.5</p>kaM/ pA trI/ tso da naM/ bi dar+b+ha NaM/ ar+g+haH/ ni be d+yaM/ ba li/ u paspr-i sh+yaH/ A tsa ma naM/ bro k+Sha NaM/ be di kA/ u pAM shu/ ni r+Yu haH/ pra dak+Shi Na paT+Ti kA/ a b+h+yan+ta ra baT+Ti kA/ ba hi baT+Ti kA/ A pyA ya naM/ prat+yA ya naM/ paT+Ti saM/ stam+b+ha
<p>68b.6</p>gzar/ dgang gzar/ bskul ba/ smos pa/ mchod yon/ lha bshos/ gtor ma/ nye reg /'thor 'thung / bsang gtor/ kha ran nam kha khyer/ pu shu/ sgo khang ngam ba gam skabs dang sbyar/ khor sa/ nang rim/ phyi rim/ yongs su rgyas bya/ phyir glan pa/ rtse gsum kha gdeng / reng sa
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>naM/ dzam+b+ha na/ mo ha naM/ o ha naM/ kr-i t+yA/ karmaH/ ki ra NaH/ kA kho rdaH/ be tA DaH/ tsits+tshaH/ pre Sha kaH/ dush+tsa rdi taM/ dur+b+hu k+taM/ durlaM g+hi taM/ durli khi taM/ duSh+p+re k+Shi taM/ dush+tshA yA/ bi ka rA la bi kr-i
<p>69a.2</p>byed/ rmug byed/ rmongs byed/ 'khrul byed/ gshed byed/ bsgyur ba'i las/ g.yengs byed/ byad/ ro langs/ sems bsgyur ba/ rbod gtong / skyug nyes/ bza' nyes/ bsgoms nyes sam smyung nyes/ bri nyes/ gnod ltas/ gnod grib/ mche ba 'jigs su rung
<p>69a.3</p>ta daM Sh+T+rA/ bi kr-i ta ba da naH/ kI laH/ /ltas dang mtshan mar gzung pa'i ming la/ nir+g+hA taH/ ulkA pA taH/ in+d+ra tsA paM/ sUr+Ya pa ri be shaM/ sha ku naM/ dz+yo ti ShaM/ swa p+nA d+h+yA yaH/ sha ku na ru taM/ biSh+TiH/ bya tI pA taH/ ut+pA taH/ a riSh+TaM/ 
<p>69a.4</p>zhing mi sdug pa/ bzhin 'jigs su rung bar bsgyur ba/ phur ba'am phur bu/ gnam grum pa'am sgra drag po/ skar mda' ltung ba/ 'ja'/ nyi ma 'khyims pa/ la nye/ skar ma'i yi ge/ rmi ltas kyi spyad/ bya skad kyi brda/ 'jug phod/ rnam par ltung byed/ ltas su 'byung ba/ 'chi ltas/ 
<p>69a.5</p>la g+nA/ yo gaH/ daN+Da b+hA saH/ /tshad ma dang rtog ge pa'i gzhung las 'byung ba'i ming la/ tat+p+ra t+ya k+Sho pa lab+d+hi la k+Sha NaM/ ta dA shri ta pra t+ya k+Sho pa la b+d+hi lak+Sha NaM/ swa dzA tI ya dr-iSh+Tan+to pa saM hA ra lak+Sha NaM/ pa ri ni Sh+pan+na lak+Sha NaM/ su bi shud+d+hA ga mo pa de sha
<p>69a.6</p>dus 'byor ba/ sbyor ba/ breng der snang ba/ de mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ de la gnas pa mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid/ yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid/ lung shin tu rnam par dag pas gtan la dbab pa'i
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>lak+Sha NaM/ ta da n+ya sA rU pyo pa lab+d+hi lak+Sha NaM/ ta da n+ya bai rU pyo pa lab+d+hi lak+Sha NaM/ sarba sA rU pyo pa lab+d+hi la k+Sha NaM/ sarba bai rU byo pa lab+d+hi lak+Sha NaM/ a n+ya dzA tI ya dr-iSh+TAn+to pa saM hA ra lak+Sha NaM/ a pa ri niSh+pan+na
<p>69b.2</p>mtshan nyid/ de gzhan dang mthun bar dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ de gzhan dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid/ gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid/ yongs su ma grub pa'i
<p>69b.3</p>lak+Sha NaMH/ a bi shud+d+hA ga mo pa de sha lak+Sha NaM/ tarkaH/ tArki kaH/ pra t+ya k+Shama?/ a nu mA nama?/ A ga maH/ u pa pat+tiH/ he tuH/ a n+wa yaH/ bya ti re kaH/ a sid+d+haH/ bi rud+d+haH/ a nai kAn+ti kaH/ dr-iSh+TAn+taH/ sA d+har+m+m+ya pa tra/ bai d+har+m+m+ya
<p>69b.4</p>mtshan nyid/ lung rnam par ma dag pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid/ rtog ge/ rtog ge pa/ mngon sum/ rjes su dpag pa/ lung / 'thad pa'am gtan tshigs/ gtan tshigs/ rjes su 'gro ba/ ldog pa/ ma grub pa/ 'gal ba/ ma nges pa/ dpe/ chos mthun pa can/ chos mi mthun ba
<p>69b.5</p>batra/ he twA b+hA saH/ dr-iSh+TAn+tA b+hA saH/ sA d+ha nam/ sA d+h+yaH/ du Sha NaM/ swa pak+ShaH/ pa ra pak+ShaH/ bA dI/ pra ti bA dI/ ti rU pa ling+gaH/ swa lak+Sha NaM/ sA mA n+yama?/ pUrba pak+ShaH/ ut+ta ra pak+ShaH/ tso d+yama?/ pa ri hA raH/ sa mA d+hA nama?/ a nu me ye
<p>69b.6</p>can/ rgyu ltar snang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ba/ dpe ltar snang ba/ sgrub pa/ bsgrub bya/ sun dbyung / rang gi phyogs/ gzhan gyi phyogs/ rgol ba/ phyir rgol ba/ tshul gsum pa'i rtags/ rang gi mtshan nyid/ spyi/ phyogs snga ma/ phyogs phyi ma/ brgal ba/ lan/ lan gdab ba/ rjes su dpag par bya ba
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>sa twama?/ sa pak+She sa twama?/ a sa pak+She tsA sa twama?/ sam+b+ha bat+p+ra mA Nama?/ A d+he yA ti sha yaH/ a nAd+he yA ti sha yaH/ ni ga ma nama?/ u pa na yaH/ u pa saM hA raH/ swa b+hA ba he tuH/ kAr+Ya he tuH/ dz+nyA pa ka he tuH a nu pa
<p>70a.2</p>yod pa/ mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa/ srid pa'i tshad ma/ bsgyur du rung ba/ bsgyur du mi rung ba/ mjug sdud/ nye bar sbyar ba/ nye bar sbyor ba/ rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs/ 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs/ shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs mi
<p>70a.3</p>lab+d+hiH/ byany+dzaka he tuH/ kA ra ka he tuH/ pra ti dz+nyA/ ar+tha sA mA n+yama?/ a b+hi lA pa sA mA n+yama?/ kalpa nA po Ta lak+Sha NaM/ a b+h+rAn+ta lak+Sha NaM/ samyag+dz+nyA nama?/ mi th+yA dz+nyA naM/ sa bi kalpa kama?/ nirbi kalpa kama?/ sA kA rama?/ ni rA kA rama?/ 
<p>70a.4</p>dmigs pa/ gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu/ byed pa'i rgyu/ dam bca' ba/ don gyi spyi/ brjod pa'i spyi/ rtog pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid/ ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid/ yang dag pa'i shes pa/ log pa'i shes pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam pa dang bcas pa/ rnam pa med pa/ 
<p>70a.5</p>a n+yA kA rama?/ sat+tA/ bA ts+yama?/ bA tsa kaH/ a bi nA b+hA baHsam+ban+d+haH/ swa taHpra mA Nama?/ pa ra taHpra mA Nama?/ ta dAt+m+ya lak+Sha NaH sam+ban+d+haH/ ta dut+pat+ti lak+Sha NaH sam+ban+d+haH/ dwiSh+Tho hi sam+ban+d+haH/ pi pI li kotsha ra NaH/ mat+s+ya bi kA raH/ 
<p>70a.6</p>gzhan gyi rnam pa/ yod pa/ brjod par bya ba/ rjod par byed pa/ med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel ba/ rang gi tshad ma/ gzhan gyi tshad ma/ de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa/ de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa/ 'brel ba ni gnyis la gnas pa/ grog ma gyen du 'dzeg pa/ nya 'phar ba/ 
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>ma hA na saM/ nI hA raH/ bASh+paH/ tu ShA raH/ sa ha kA ri pra t+ya yaH/ u pA dA na ka ra NaM/ pra yat+nA nan+ta rI ya kaH/ a n+ya ta rA sid+d+haH/ swa to\u0f85sid+d+haH/ pa ra to\u0f85sid+d+haH/ u b+ha yA sid+d+haH/ A shra yA sid+d+haH/ swa yaM bA d+ya sid+d+haH/ bra ti bA R+Ya sid+d+haH/ sa dzA
<p>70b.2</p>tshad mang / khug rna/ rlangs pa/ ba mo/ lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen/ nye bar len pa'i rgyu/ brtsal ma thag tu byung ba/ gcig la ma grub pa/ rang la ma grub pa/ pha rol la ma grub pa/ gnyis ka la ma grub pa/ gzhi ma grub pa/ rgol ba bdag nyid la ma grub pa/ phyir rgol ba la ma grub pa/ 
<p>70b.3</p>tI yaH/ bi dzA tI yaH/ shap+da brah+mA/ byA br-it+ti/ a po haH/ a n+ya po haHshab+dAr+thaH/ saM ke taH/ pra sadz+dza pra ti She d+haH/ bra r+Yu dAs pra ti She d+haH/ a lo ki kAr+tho t+pat+tiH/ swap+nAn+ti ka rU pama?/ pi phra kaR+ShaH/ swa sam+be da nama?/ pak+Sha d+har+m+ma twama?/ kra ma yau ga
<p>70b.4</p>rigs mthun pa/ rigs mi mthun pa/ sgra'i tshangs pa/ ldog pa/ sel ba/ gzhan sel ba'i sgra'i don/ brda/ med par dgag pa/ ma yin par dgag pa/ 'jig rten pa'i don ma yin pa byung ba/ rmi lam du rmis pa'i rdzas/ bskal pa/ rang rig pa/ phyogs kyi chos/ rim dang
<p>70b.5</p>pa d+yama?/ mA tu luM gama?/ ka da lI/ kan+daH/ a sa many+dzA saH/ pra saM gaH/ tsi tra pa tang+gA/ shA lu kaH/ /mu stegs rigs pa can gyi gzhung las 'byung ba/ Sho Da sha pa dAr+thAH/ pra mA Nama?/ pra me yama?/ saM sha yaH/ pra yo dza nama?/ dr-iSh+TAn+taH/ sid+d+hAn+taH/ a ba yabaH/ 
<p>70b.6</p>cig car/ ma tu lung ga /chu shing / rtsa ba/ 'chal pa'am 'khrugs pa'am cal col du gyur pa/ thal 'gyur/ phye ma leb khra 'o/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba/ tshig gi don bcu drug /tshad ma/ gzhal bya/ the tshom/ dgos pa/ dpe/ grub pa'i mtha'/ cha shas/ 
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>tarkaH/ nir+Na yaH/ bA daH/ dzalbaH/ bi taN+DaH/ he twA b+hA saH/ ts+tsha laH/ dzA tiH/ dzAt+yut+ta raH/ ni gra has+thA nam/ in+d+ri yAr+tha san+ni kaR+Shot+pan+na dz+nyA naM/ pra t+ya k+ShaM/ a bya pa de sh+yama?/ 
<p>71a.2</p>rtog ge/ gtan la dbab ba/ rtsod pa/ brjod pa/ sun ci phyin du rgol ba/ rgyu ltar snang ba/ tshig dor/ ltag chod/ ltag chod/ chad ba'i gnas/ dbang po dang don du phrad pa las byung ba'i shes pa/ mngon sum/ stan du med pa/ 
<p>71a.3</p>a bya b+hi tsA rI/ bya ba sA yAt+ma kam/ /grangs can gyi gzhung las 'byung ba/ tsai ta n+ya ma?/ pra d+hA nama?/ sa twama?/ ra dzaH/ ta maH/ ma hAna?/ a haM kA raH/ pany+tsa bud+d+hIn+d+ri yA Ni/ pany+tsa tan+mA trA Ni/ a Ni mA/ la g+hi mA/ ma hi mA/ i shi twaM/ ba shi twaM/ 
<p>71a.4</p>'khrul pa med pa/ rtogs ba'i bdag nyid/ shes pa yod pa/ gtso bo/ snying stobs/ rdul/ mun pa/ chen po/ ngar 'dzin/ blo'i dbang po lnga/ de tsam lnga/ phra ba/ yang ba/ mchod par bya ba/ bdag por gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ 
<p>71a.5</p>prAp+tI/ prA kA myama?/ ya tra kA mA ba sA yi twaM/ a b+hi bya k+tiH/ a b+hir+b+hA baH/ ti ro b+hA baH/ pa ri NA maH/ la yaH/ bAka /pA NiH/ pA daH/ pA yuH/ u pas+thama?/ sin+ni kr-iSh+TaH/ bi pra kr-iSh+TaH/ bI taH/ A bI taH/ 
<p>71a.6</p>gar yang phyin pa/ 'dod dgur ldan pa/ dga' dgur ldan pa/ mngon pa/ mngon par 'byung ba/ mi mngon par gyur pa/ yongs su gyur pa/ zhab/ ngag gam tshig /lag pa/ rkang pa/ rkub/ mdoms/ nye ba/ rgyang ring ba/ rnam par ldan pa/ bsal te 'ongs
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>sa ha tsa ra sam+ban+d+haH/ g+hA t+ya g+hA ta ka sam+ban+d+haH/ swa swA mi lak+Sha Na sam+ban+d+haH/ A d+hA rA d+he ya lak+Sha Na sam+ban+d+haH/ kAr+Ya kA ra Na lak+Sha Na sam+ban+d+haH/ a ba ya bA ba ya bI lak+Sha Na sam+ban+d+haH/ /dpyod ba can gyi gzhung las 'byung ba/ sa t+saM
<p>71b.2</p>pa/ lhan cig 'grogs pa'i 'brel pa/ gnod bya gnod byed kyi 'brel pa/ rje khol gyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa/ gzhi dang rten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa/ bya ba dang byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa/ cha shas dang cha shas can gyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa/ yod pa dang
<p>71b.3</p>pra yo ge pu ru Sha s+yen+d+ri yA NAM bud+d+hi dzan+ma pra t+ya k+ShaM/ ar+thaM lo tsa na dz+nyA nama?/ prA ga b+hA baH/ pra d+h+waM sA b+hA baH/ i ta re ta rA b+hA baH/ a t+yan+tA b+hA baH/ shAb+dama?/ u pa mA nama?/ ar+thA pat+tiH/ a b+hA baH/ smr-i tiH/ shru tiH/ a pau ru She
<p>71b.4</p>phrad na skyes bu'i dbang po rnams kyi blo skye ba ni mngon sum mo/ don la lta ba'i shes pa/ snga na med pa/ zhig nas med pa/ gcig la gcig med pa/ gtan med pa/ sgra las byung ba/ nye bar 'jal ba/ don gyis go ba/ dngos po med pa/ dran pa/ thos pa/ skyes bus ma
<p>71b.5</p>yaH/ dur+b+ha Na twama?/ /bye brag pa'i tshig gi don drug [x]dra byama?/ gu NaH/ karmaH/ bi she ShaH/ sA mA n+yama?/ sa ma bA yaH/ pa ri mA Nam/ saM khyA/ saM yo gaH/ bi b+hA gaH/ pr-i thaka?twama?/ pa ra twama?/ a pa ra twaM/ its+tshA/ dra ba twaM/ sne haH/ a
<p>71b.6</p>byas pa/ bzlas dka' ba/[ X]la sogs pa'i ming la/ rdzas/ yon tan/ las/ bye brag /spyi/ 'du ba/ bong tshod/ grangs/ phrad pa/ bye ba/ so so ba/ pha rol/ pha rol ma yin pa/ 'dod pa/ khu ba'am zhuba'am gsher ba/ snum pa'i gsher ba/ chos ma
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>d+harmaH/ saM skA raH/ pra yat+naH/ u tra k+She pa Nama?/ a ba k+She ba NaM/ A kuny+tsa NaM/ pra sA ra Nama?/ ga ma nam/ dwIn+d+ri ya grA h+yama?/ pAr+thi baHpa ra mA NuH/ ma hA sat+tA/ a bAn+ta ra sA mA n+yama?/ ma hA sA mA n+yama?/ sat+kAr+Ya ma/ a sat+kAr+Ya ma/ 
<p>72a.2</p>yin pa/ byas pa'i shugs/ 'bad pa/ 'deg pa/ 'jog pa/ bskum pa/ rkyang ba/ 'gro ba/ dbang po gnyis kyis gzung ba/ sa'i rdul phra rab/ yod pa chen po/ nyi tshe ba'i spyi/ spyi chen po/ 'bras bu snga na yod pa/ 'bras bu snga na med pa/ 
<p>72a.3</p>At+men+d+ri yAr+thA d+ya dut+pan+naM dz+nyA nam+p+ra t+ya k+Shama?/ lam+bAm+bu da daR+sha nAd+baR+ShA nu mA nama?/ na dI pU ra daR+sha nA du pa ri br-iSh+T+ya nu mA nama?/ me g+hon+na ti daR+sha nAta?/ /e ti h+yama?/ prA ti
<p>72a.4</p>bdag dang dbang po dang don las gang byung ba'i shes pa mngon sum/ sprin gyi rtsa ba nar bar snang ba las char 'bab par rjes su dpag pa/ chu brub par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpag pa/ sprin 'khrigs par snang ba'am mthong ba las/ de lta bu yod ces grags pa/ mthangs
<p>72a.5</p>b+hama?/ /lta ba sna tshogs kyi ming la/ At+ma grA haH/ e ka twa grA haH/ kar+t+r-i twa grA haH/ piN+Da grA haH/ dr-iSh+Ti pra skan+taH/ dr-iSh+Ti ga ha ni/ dr-iSh+Ti kAn+tA rama?/ bi Sha ma dr-iSh+TiH/ ku dr-iSh+TiH/ dr-iSh+Ti saM ka TaH/ dr-iSh+Ti kr-i taM/ 
<p>72a.6</p>kyis tshor ba/ bdag tu 'dzin pa/ gcig tu 'dzin pa/ byed par 'dzin pa/ ril por 'dzin pa/ lta ba bying ba/ lta ba thibs po/ lta ba'i dgon pa/ mi mthun par lta ba'am lta ba mi bzad pa/ lta ba ngan pa/ lta ba yang ba/ lta bar gyur pa'am lta bar byas pa/ 
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>dr-iSh+Ti ga taM/ /lung du ma bstan pa'i chos bcu bzhi'i ming la/ shA shwa to lo kaH/ a shA shwa to lo kaH/ shA shwa tash+tsa shA shwa tash+tsa/ nai ba shA shwa tash+tsa na shA shwa tash+tsa/ an+ta bAM lo kaH/ sa nan+ta bAM lo kaH/ an+ta bAM sh+tsa a nan+ta bAM/ 
<p>72b.2</p>lta ba'i rnam pa'am lta bar gyur ba/ 'jig rten rtag /'jig rten mi rtag /rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag /rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten mtha' yod pa/ 'jig rten mtha' yod pa ma yin pa/ mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med
<p>72b.3</p>sh+tsa/ nai bAn+ta bAM sh+tsa a nan+ta bAM sh+tsa/ b+ha ba ti ta thA ga taHpa ram+ma ra NAta/ na b+ha ba ti ta thA ga taHpa ram+ma ra NAtra/ b+ha ba ti tsa na b+ha ba ti tsa ta thA ga taHpa ra m+ma ra NAtra/ nai ba b+ha ba ti tsa na b+ha ba ti tsa ta thA ga taHpa ram+ma ra NA ta/ sa
<p>72b.4</p>kyang med/ mtha' yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas med/ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas yod kyang yod la med kyang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ srog
<p>72b.5</p>dzI bstats+tsha rI raM/ a n+yo dzI bo\u0f85n+ya ts+tsha rI raM/ /mu stegs can gyi bdag tu brjod pa'i ming la/ At+mA/ sa twaH/ dzI baH/ dzan+tuH/ po ShaH/ bu ru ShaH/ pung+ga laH/ ma nu dzaH/ mA na baH/ kA ra kaH/ kA rA pa kaH/ be da kaH/ dzA na ka /pa sh+ya kaH/ ut+thA pa kaH/ sa
<p>72b.6</p>de lus de yin/ srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan/ bdag /sems can/ srog /skye ba bo/ gso ba/ skyes bu/ gang zag /shed las skyes/ shed bu/ byed pa po/ byed du 'jug pa po/ tshor ba po/ shes pa po/ mthong ba po/ slong ba po/ kun
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>mut+thA pa kaH/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba nyi shu'i ming la/ biM sha ti shi kha ra sa mung+ga taHsat+kA ya driSh+Ti shi laH/ rU pa mAt+mA swA mi bta/ rU ba bA nAt+mAnyalang+kA ra bta/ At+nI yaM rU paM b+h+r-i d+ya batra/ rU pe Ad+mA b+hA dza na batra/ 
<p>73a.2</p>nas slong ba po/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ bdag gzugs yin te bdag po dang 'dra/ bdag gzugs dang ldan te rgyan dang 'dra/ gzugs bdag gi yin te bran dang 'dra/ gzugs la bdag gnas te snod dang 'dra/ 
<p>73a.3</p>be da nA t+mA/ be da nA bA nAt+mA/ At+mI yA be da nA/ be da nA yA mA t+mA/ saM dz+nyAt+mA/ saM dz+nyA bA nAt+mA/ A t+mI yA saM dz+nyA/ saM dz+nyA yA mA t+mA/ saM skA rA A t+mA/ At+mI yAHsaM skA rAH/ saM skA re
<p>73a.4</p>bdag tshor ba yin/ bdag tshor ba dang ldan/ tshor ba bdag gi yin/ tshor ba la bdag gnas/ bdag 'du shes yin/ bdag 'du shes dang ldan/ 'du shes bdag gi yin/ 'du shes la bdag gnas/ 'du byed bdag yin/ 'du byed bdag gi yin/ 'du byed la bdag
<p>73a.5</p>Sh+wAt+mA/ bi dz+nyA na mAt+mA/ bi dz+nyA na bA mAt+mA/ At+mI yaM bi dz+nyA naM/ bi dz+nyA ne At+mA/ /byA kar Na'i skad kyi ming la/ sU traM/ d+hA tuH/ ni pA taH/ a n+wA khyA naM/ u pa sargaH/ bA kyo pa n+yU saH/ u pa saM khyA naMH/ sa mA saH/ 
<p>73a.6</p>gnas/ bdag rnam par shes pa yin/ bdag rnam par shes pa dang ldan/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi yin/ rnam par shes pa la bdag gnas/ mdor byas pa/ skad kyi dbyings/ tshig gi phrad/ rjes su bshad pa/ nye bar bsgyur ba/ tshig gi lhad/ tshig kha skong ba/ tshig sdud pa/ 
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>sa mastaH/ karma/ b+hA baH/ saMskr-i taM/ prA kr-i taM/ a pa b+h+raM shaH/ bai shA tsi kaH/ kri yA pa daM/ a na bas+thA pra saM gaH/ a ti pra sang+gaH/ pra saM gaHbra sa dz+ya te/ bi gra haH/ dwan+d+waH/ d+bi guH/ tat+bu ru ShaH/ ba
<p>73b.2</p>tshig bsdus pa/ las/ dngos/ legs par sbyar ba/ tha mal pa/ zur chag pa/ sha za'i skad/ byed ba'i tshig /thug pa med par 'gyur/ thal ches par 'gyur/ thal bar 'gyur/ tshig rnam par sbyar ba/ zlas dbye ba/ ba gnyis pa/ de'i skyes bu/ 'bru
<p>73b.3</p>hu br-I hiH/ a byA yI b+hA baH/ karma d+hA ra yaH/ sa mA nA d+hi ka ra NaH/ kA ra kaH/ pra tha ma pu ru ShaH/ ma d+h+yam pu ru ShaH/ ut+ta ma pu ru ShaH/ /rnam par dbye ba'i tshig bdun gyi ming la/ br-ik+ShaH/ br-ik+Shau/ br-ik+ShAH/ br-ik+ShaM/ br-ik+Shau/ br-ik+ShAna?/ br-ik+She Na/ br-ik+ShA b+h+yAM/

<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>na ra kaH/ ya ma lo kaH/ pi tr-i bi Sha yaH/ tiR+Ya gyo ni ga taH/ /yi dgas su gtogs pa'i ming la/ pre taH/ kum+b+haN+DaH/ bi shA tsaH/ b+hU taH/ pU ta naH/ kaT pU ta naH/ un+mA daH/ skan+daH/ a pasmA raH/ ts+tshA yA/ rAk+Sha saH/ re ba

<p>74a.3</p>tI gra hA/ sha ku ni gra ha/ brah+ma rA k+Sha saH/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs ba'i ming la/ siM ha dzA ne yaH/ ai rA ba Na ha steH/ has+t+yA dzA ne yaH/ kan+tha kaH/ a shwA dzA ne yaH/ ba lA ha kA shwa rA dzA/ shwA pa daH/ siM haH/ shArdUl/ byA g+h+raH/ dwI pI/ rIk+ShaH/

<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>ri NI/ ke re NuH/ a shraH/ tu raM kaH/ ha yaH/ ba Da bA/ uSh+TaH/ tsa ma raH/ goH/ ba li brdaH/ ma hi ShaH begs raH/ gard b+haH/ a shwatarI/ kar b+haH ki sho raH/ ka la b+haH/ ka dza po taH/ sU ka raH/ e Da kaH/ u ra b+h+raH/ ts+tsha ga laH/ a dzaH/ prA Na kaH bA naraH/ marka TaH/ ka piraH/ mU ShaH

<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>tsa TakaH/ su par+NiH/ bar+hI si khI/ ma yU raH/ dzI baM dzI ba kaH/ gr-i d+h+raH/ tsA shaH/ shu kaH/ ku NA laH/ rA dza haM saH/ d+hArta rASh+TaH/ haM saH/ krauny+tsaH/ tsakra bA kaH/ sA ra aH/ shA ri kaH/ ko ki laH/ ba kaH/ pa lA kaH/ tit+ti riH/

<p>75a.3</p>ka piny+dza laH/ kra ka raH/ kang+kA raH/ tsa ko raH/ u lU kaH/ droN kA kaH/ kA kaH/ ba ya saH/ ka bo taH/ pA rA ba taH/ pa de kaH/ sai naH/ kuk+ku TaH/ tsil+laH/ tsA ta kaH/ pak+Sha gup+taH/ ka daM baH/ prA Na ka dzA taH/ kuk+ku raH shwA na/ khany+dzang+kaH/ kA raN+Da baH/ ti tI laH/

<p>75a.6</p>pha wang / tshad pa'i/ byi'u/ srog chags su gyur pa'am srog chags 'byung ba/ sril lam mug pa/ ba'i ming las tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i ming la/ yang sos/ thig nag /bsdus 'joms/ ngu 'bod/ ngu 'bod chen po/ tsha ba/ rab tu tsha ba/ mnar med pa/ chu
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>arbu daH/ nira? budaH/ aT TaH/ ha ha baH/ hu hu baH/ ut+pa laH/ pad+maH/ ma hA pad+maH/ kuk+kul ma?/ ku Na bama?/ k+Shu ra d+hA rA/ a si d+hA rA/ a yaHshal+ma li ba nam/ a si pat+t+ra ba nama?/ a yo gu TaH/

<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>muSh+Ti ban d+haH/ shi khA ban+d+haH/ pA da ban+d+haH/ aM ku sha gra haH/ sA rau/ pA sha gra haH/ to ma ra gra haH/ iSh+Tha stA tsA r+YaH/ ni r+YA NaM/ a pa yA naM/ ts+tshe d+yaM/ b+he d+yaM/ be d+yaM/ dU ra be d+haH/ shab+da
<p>76a.2</p>'dzin stangs/ thor tshugs/ gom stabs/ lcags kyus bsgyur thabs/ ral gri'i thabs/ zhags pa gdab ba/ mda' bo che 'phen thabs/ 'phong gi slob dpon/ mdun du snur ba/ phyir snur ba/ gcad pa/ dral ba/ dbug pa/ rgyang nas phog pa/ sgra
<p>76a.3</p>be d+haH/ marma be d+haH/ ak+Shu Na be d+haH/ dr-i D+ha pra hA ri tA/ pany+tsa sus+thA ne Shu kr-i tA bi saM br-it+taH/ laM g+hi taM/ sA laM b+haH/ dza bi taM/ p+la bi taM/ ta ra NaM/ hasti grI bA/ a shwa pr-iSh+ThaH/ ra thaH/ d+ha nu ska la Sha/ bA hu byA yA
