<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>d+yaM/ bI NA/ baM saH/ /glu dbyangs kyi ming la/ ma d+h+yA maH/ r-i Sha b+haH/ gAn+d+hA raH/ Shadz+dzaH/ pany+tsa maH/ d+hai ba taH/ ni ShA daH/ /gar thabs kyi rnam grangs kyi ming la/ shr-iM gA raH/ bI raH/ bI b+hat+saH/ rau draM/ hA s+yama?/ b+ha yA na kaH/ ka ru NA/ ad+b+hu taM/ 
<p>76b.2</p>mo'i sgra/ pi wang / gling bu/ bar me/ drang srong / sa 'dzin pa/ drug ldan pa/ lnga pa/ blo gsal/ 'khor nyan/ steg pa'am sgeg pa'am 'dzin pa/ dpa' bo/ mi sdug pa/ drag shul can/ bzhad gad/ 'jigs su rung ba/ snying rje ba/ brdams pa/ 
<p>76b.3</p>shAn+taH/ tAN+Da baH// /bram ze'i gtsug lag dang las kyi ming la/ r-ig+be daH/ ya dzurbe daH/ sA ma be daH/ a tharba bai daH/ ni g+haN+TuH/ kai Ta b+haH/ A yurbadaH/ bAstu bi d+yA/ ang+ga ma Ni bi d+yA/ pi l+yA d+h+yA yaH/ bA ya sa bi d+yA/ 
<p>76b.4</p>zhi ba/ gar/ nges brjod kyi rig byed/ mchod sbyin gyi rig byed/ snyan tshig gi rig byed/ srid srung gi rig byed/ sgra nges par brjod pa/ shes gsal/ tshe'i rig byed/ khyims brtags pa'i dpyad/ sha mtshan gyi dpyad/ sme ba'i dpyad/ khwa skad shes pa/ 
<p>76b.5</p>sha ku na bi d+yA/ dz+yo tirbi d+yA/ sa mu dra lak+Sha NaM/ a shwa me d+ha ya dz+nyA/ pu ru Sha me d+ha ya dz+nyA/ ya dz+nyA iSh+TaH/ /bram ze'i las rnam pa drug gi ming la/ ya dza naM/ yA dza naM/ a d+h+ya ya naM/ a d+h+yA ya naM/ dA naM/ pra ti gra haH/ /skad go mthun
<p>76b.6</p>la nye'am ltas kyi rig pa/ skar ma'i rig pa/ rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi spyad/ rta gtsang gi mchod sbyin/ mi gtsang gi mchod sbyin/ mchod sbyin byas/ mchod sbyin/ mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa/ tshig 'don pa/ tshig 'don du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa/ len pa/ 
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>gyi ming la/ a ne kaM/ brgaH/ ni tsa yaH/ sai n+yaM se nA/ yU gaH/ ga NaH/ saM g+haH/ br-in+daH/ b+hU yiSh+ThaH/ saM khyA ma piH/ ka lA ma pi/ ga Na nA ma pi/ u pa mA ma pi/ 
<p>77a.2</p>du ma/ sde'am tshan nam tshogs/ mang po'am phal po che'am phung po/ sde'am dmag /mang po/ tshogs/ dge 'dun nam mang po'am tshogs/ tshogs sam khyu'am 'dus pa/ mang du'am phal cher/ grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / 
<p>77a.3</p>u pa ni Sha da ma pi/ no pai ti/ nak+Sha ma te/ lak+Sh+yaMH/ se nA ka thA/ kaN+Da mUr+d+ha mu khaM k+Ship+taM/ swargo pa gaH/ gats+tsha ti/ A gats+tsa ti/ A ga ma ni rga mau/ pra ti kra ma ti/ a b+hi kra ma ti/ a pra t+yu dA bar+t+ta nI
<p>77a.4</p>rgyur yang / mi phod dam nye bar mi 'gro ba'am mi chog /mi bzod/ 'ben/ dmag gi gtam/ mda' gnam rgyang du 'phangs pa'am mda' rtse mo gyen du bstan te 'phangs pa/ mtho ris su 'gro ba/ 'gro/ 'ong / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba/ phyir ldog pa/ mngon du 'ong ngam 'ong / phyir bzlog
<p>77a.5</p>tu yaH/ a pra kra mi ta byaM/ san+ni kr-iSh+TaH/ bi pra kr-iSh+TaH/ sany+tsa ra ti/ u pa sarba ti/ a nu yA tri kaH/ pra t+yu dA br-it+taH/ pA rA ya NaM/ b+h+ra ma yan+taM/ a san+ti b+hU taH/ a pra ti nirbA ti/ u pa ru taH/ nA ti dU raM/ nA t+yA
<p>77a.6</p>mi rung ba/ nur ba'am phyir 'gyed par bya ba/ nye ba/ rgyang ring ba'am skal ba/ rgyu/ nye bar 'gro/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba/ phyir log /pha rol tu 'gro ba/ 'phyan pa'am 'khyam pa/ nye bar gyur tam bsten/ mi ldog pa/ zhig pa'am med par gyur pa/ ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>san+naM/ pa ri b+h+ra ma te/ pra t+yA ga ma naM/ a n+wA hi N+yaH/ pra yA NaM/ a n+we tiH/ saM ko tsaH/ saM sr-iSh+TaH/ mi shrI b+hU taH/ sam+b+he daH/ a sam+b+he daH/ ud+g+ha na naM/ sa mud+b+ha na naM/ bi k+Shi
<p>77b.2</p>mi nye/ kun du 'khyam/ phyir 'ong ba/ bskor nas sam byul nas/ 'gro ba'am 'jug pa/ rjes su 'gro/ bskum pa'am zhum pa/ 'dres/ 'dres par gyur pa/ 'dres pa'am dbye ba/ ma 'dres pa'am dbyer med pa/ rgod byed/ yongs su rgod byed/ rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa'am
<p>77b.3</p>pa ti/ bi k+Ship+ta tsit+taH/ dur+d+ha ShaH/ akam pa tsit+taH/ ang+ga pra t+yang+gA ni ts+tshin+da yaH/ a na ba mard nI yaH/ dzi h+mI kr-i taM/ a saM hA r+YaH/ nak+Shu b+h+ya tiH/ ka ba
<p>77b.4</p>rnam par 'thor bar byed pa/ sems g.yeng ba'am sems 'khrugs pa/ thub par dka'/ sems mi g.yo ba/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs kyang / mi choms pa'am mi brtul ba'am mi rdzi ba/ zil gyis gnon pa'am spa bkong ba/ mi 'phrog pa/ 'khrugs par mi 'gyur/ ya lad
<p>77b.5</p>tsi taH/ barmi taH/ a ni bA r+YaM/ tsA pau da ni/ tsA ru daR+sha nA/ na ba na li na pa tra su bi shud+d+ha na ya nA/ pim+poSh+ThI/ mA ya kr-i ta mi ba bim+baM/ b+hA dza te/ A kr-i tiH/ A le khya
<p>77b.6</p>bgos/ go cha bgos/ mi bzlog pa/ rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba/ blta na mdzes pa/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar spyan shin tu rnam par dag pa/ mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/ gzugs sgyu 'phrul du byas pa bzhin/ mdzes pa'am ta ler gyur pa/ byad gzugs sam byad bzhin/ bu don du
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>tsit+t+ri te ba daR+sha nI yaH/ ban+d+hu ramra/ pra sA raH/ ut+k+She paH/ pra k+She paH/ pras+thaH/ pra pA taH/ gar+t+taH/ pa ri khA/ mArga dzi naH/ mArga de shi kaH/ mArga dzI biH/ mArga dU ShI/ shro ta A pat+ti pra ti pan+na kaH/ shro ta A pan+naH/ 
<p>78a.2</p>bris ba bzhin du lta na sdug pa/ legs pa'am mdzes pa/ brkyang ba/ ldeg pa/ 'jog pa/ gad ka /g.yang sa/ dong / 'obs/ lam rgyal ba/ lam ston pa/ lam gyis 'tsho ba/ lam sun par byed pa/ rgyun du zhugs pa la 'jug pa/ rgyun du zhugs pa/ 
<p>78a.3</p>sa kr-i dA gA mi pra ti ban+na kaH/ sa kr-i dA gA mI/ a nA gA mi pra ti pan+na kaH/ a nA gA mI/ ar+hata pra ti pan+na kaH/ ar+hana?/ A saM g+haH/ AR+Ya ga NaH/ sU tra d+ha raH/ bi na ya d+ha raH/ mA tr-i ka d+ha raH/ mA d+h+yA mi kaH/ bi dz+nyA na bA
<p>78a.4</p>lan cig phyir 'ong ba la 'jug pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba/ phyir mi 'ong ba la 'jug pa/ phyir mi 'ong ba/ dgra bcom pa la 'jug pa/ dgra bcom pa/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun/ 'phags pa'i tshogs/ mdo 'dzin/ 'dul ba 'dzin/ ma mo 'dzin/ dbu ma pa/ rnam par shes pa tsam du
<p>78a.5</p>dI/ bA h+ya r+tha bA dI/ sau trA n+ti kaH/ bai b+hA Shi kaH/ ni kA yAn+ta rI yAH/ bai yA ka ra NaH/ ba lama?/ s+thA maH/ a nu b+hA baH/ pra b+hA baH/ shak+tiH/ kr-i pA/ da yA/ prA sA di kaH/ a b+hi rU paH/ daR+sha nI yaH/ pa ra ma yA shu na bar+Na puSh+ka
<p>78a.6</p>smra ba/ phyi rol gyi don yod par smra ba/ mdo sde ba/ bye brag tu smra ba/ sde pa gzhan dag /brda sprod pa/ stobs/ ma 'dom na mthu 'dom na stobs/ mthu/ mthu stobs/ nus pa'am mthu/ snying rje ba'am/ snying brtse ba/ mdzes pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>la ta yA sa man+bA ga taH/ ma hA b+ha gaH/ b+ha byaM/ yo gyaM/ dr-iSh+Ti bi ShaH/ A shI bi ShaH/ shwA sa bi ShaH/ uts+tshar g+ha naM/ ul+la pa naM/ ka la ha ya ti/ ka li ka la ha bi gra ha bi bA daH/ do Sha mut+bA da ya ti/ 
<p>78b.2</p>mchog dang ldan pa/ dbang thang che ba'am skal ba che ba'am dpal cha/ skal ba can dang sbu la 'bab pa/ sbu la 'bab pa dang rung ba/ mig gdug pa/ so gdug pa'am sbrul gdug pa/ dbugs gdug pa/ 'phya ba/ rnying pa/ 'thab pa /'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa/ zhe sdang bskyed dam skyon 'dogs
<p>78b.3</p>tsit+ta mA g+hA ta ya ti/ pra ti ni sra k+Sha ti/ a b+h+yA khyA naM/ A le khyo bi le khyo bi pra ti sA raHkau kr-i t+yaM/ shai k+ShA b+hi ni kU dzi taM/ pra ti bA niH/ pra ti kU la tA/ ha n+yata/ bin+d+hI yata/ pra pA sa yeta/ sa daN+DaH/ a nu sa ra NaH/ saM ba raH/ a b+hi ni
<p>78b.4</p>pa/ sems kyis kun nas mnar ba/ 'dor bar 'gyur/ skur ba 'debs pa/ 'gyod pa dang yid la gcags pa'i rnam grangs/ slob ma ldongs shes zer ba/ mi 'phrod pa/ mi mthun pa/ so rtsig /chings shig /spyugs shig /chad phab/ rjes su 'brang ba/ bde ba'i mchog /mngon
<p>78b.5</p>dzi taH/ d+hU mA ya ti/ A dIp+taH/ pra dIp+taH/ saM pra dIp+taH/ saM pra dz+wa li taH/ e ka dz+wA lI b+hU to d+h+yA ya ti/ ma shi ra ma pi na pra dz+nya ya te/ ts+tshA yi ka ma pi na pra dz+nyA ya te/ gi riH/ shai laH/ parba taH/ prA g+b+hA raH/ da rI/ shwa d+h+raM/ ku shwa
<p>78b.6</p>par rgyal/ du ba 'thul/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar/ me lce gcig tu gyur cing bsreg go/ du ba yang med/ thal ba yang med/ ri'am ri bo /brag gam ri/ ri/ bya skyibs/ ri sul/ ngam grog gam g.yang sa/ ngam grog
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>b+h+raM/ ma hA shwa b+h+raM/ pra pA taH/ de shaH/ aT bI/ kAn+tA raM/ pra t+yan+taH/ si kha raM sA nuH/ barba ta kan+da raH/ droNI/ hi ma bAn parba taH/ durgaH/ un+na taM/ nim+naM/ s+thA lI/ ma ruH/ shai la
<p>79a.2</p>chung ngu / ngam grog chen po/ g.yang sa/ yul/ 'brog /dgon pa/ mtha' 'khob/ zom mam rtse mo/ ri khrod/ lung ba/ gangs sam ri kha ba can/ rdzong ngam bgrod dka' ba/ sgang ngam mtho ba/ gshong ngam dma' ba/ dbye'am thang / mya ngam/ brag
<p>79a.3</p>gu hA/ gi ri ga hwa raH/ ni tam+baH/ u pat+t+ya kA/ karba Ta bra de shaH/ gi ri kuny+dzA/ ut+ka To nA ma dro Na mu khaM/ pr-i thi bI rA saH/ pr-i thi bI parba Ta kaH/ ba na la tA/ pr-i thi bI maN+DaH/ pr-i thi bI o dzaH/ k+She traM/ su k+She traM/ kuk+She traM/ na dI mA tr-i kaH/ a
<p>79a.4</p>phug /ri khrad khrod dam tshang tshing / ri zhol/ ri rtsa/ ri brags sam ri 'or gyi phyogs/ sman ljongs/ shas che ba zhes bya ba lung pa'i mda'/ sa'i bcud/ sa zhag /myu gu'i tshal/ sa'i snying khu/ sa gshin pa/ zhing / zhing bzang po/ zhing ngan pa/ zhing chu ma/ ser
<p>79a.5</p>nU paH/ de ba mA tr-i kaH/ a de ba mA tr-i kaH/ U thA rA/ dzang+ga lA/ pra ti kuSh+TA/ pA ba b+hU miH/ pA ShA NaH/ sharka rA/ ka Thal+laH/ lo Sh+TaH/ shi lA ta lama?/ u ba lama?/ me di nI/ pA ShI/ a kr-i Sh+Top+ta taN+Du la pha la shA liH/ su br-iSh+TiH/ 
<p>79a.6</p>can nam gsher che ba/ char ma/ gnam stong ma yin pa/ tsha sgo can/ dgon dung / tha chad/ sdig pa can gyis/ rdo/ gseg ma/ gyo mo/ bong ba/ rdo leb/ pha bong ngam rdo ba/ sa/ lud/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru/ char 'bab mkhas
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>dur+b+r-iSh+TiH/ sA yaM lU naHkA l+yaM bi bar+d+ha te/ a ba la pa shwa na pra dz+nyA ya te/ /k+She trA Ni mA pa yan+ti/ mar+Ya dAM bya ba s+thA pa yan+ti/ sA mud+d+ri ka nA baH/ sa mA graH/ bya graH/ 
<p>79b.2</p>pa/ char 'bab mi mkhas pa/ nub brngas na nang skye/ brngas par yang mi mngon/ zhing 'jal zhing dgod ba/ zhing gi skabs su mu thug bres khrims kyi skabs su bka' khrims bcas/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo che/ tshogs pa'am mthun pa/ mi mthun pa'am rad rod du gyur pa'am phan phun
<p>79b.3</p>balka laM/ bi bA haH/ A bA haH/ yo ta kaM/ a ti thiH/ shi bA ru taM/ mA taM giH/ sasnA/ ka ku dma?/ khu raH/ shr-ing+gaHbi ShA NaM/ laM gu laH/ pan+thAH/ ar+b+bA ba dwa ti/ bar+t+ta niH/ a nu gan+ta byaH/ protra
<p>79b.4</p>du gyur pa/ shing shun/ bag ma len pa/ bag ma gtong ba/ khud pa'am rdzongs/ 'gron/ ce spyang mo'i skra/ gdol ba'am glang mo/ lkog shal/ nog /rmig pa/ rwa/ mjug ma/ lam/ lam/ lam/ rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'am rjes su rtogs par bya ba/ shin tu byung
<p>79b.5</p>khA taM/ pi ro li taH/ an+tar+d+hA nang+ga tama?/ bar+t+ta te/ bi d+hU ta pA baH/ saM kar+Yamra/ ma ra NAM shi kaM /u ba pat+t+yaM shi kaM /d+ha nu rA ro pa naM/ i shu k+She baH/ ut+thA pa NaM/ 
<p>79b.6</p>ba'am bton pa/ dkrugs pa'am bsrubs pa/ mi snang bar gyur pa/ 'gyur ba'am 'jug pa'am long pa/ sdig pa rnam par sbyangs pa/ 'dres pa'am 'chol pa/ 'chi ma'i char gtogs pa/ skye ba'i char gtogs pa/ gzhu brdung ba/ mda' 'phang ba /slong ba'am ldang bar byed pa/ 
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>tsau raH/ ba ri pan+than+tiSh+Tha ti/ ste ya saM khyA taH/ ha taH/ pI Da ya ti/ ku daN+DaH/ u pA lam+bA b+hi prA yaH/ a ba tA ra pre k+Shi NaH/ ni gra hI ta byaH/ sa
<p>80a.2</p>chom rkun/ lam gcod cing 'dug pa/ rku bar bgrang ba/ brdegs pa'am bsnun pa'am btab pa/ 'tshir ba'am gnod par byed pa/ mi rigs pa'i chad pa'am stong / klan ka chol ba'i bsam pa/ glags lta ba/ chad pa bcad pa'am tshar bcad pa skabs dang sbyar/ kun du
<p>80a.3</p>ma b+hi dru taH/ bi he Tha nA/ san+d+hi ts+tshe da kaH/ gran+thi mo tsa kaH/ ni rlo pa hA ra kaH/ pa ri pan+tha kaH/ ha ra NaM/ ni rlA paM ha ra ti/ 
<p>80a.4</p>gnod par gyur pa'am kun du gtses pa/ 'tshe ba'am mtho 'tshams pa/ khyim 'bugs pa/ mdud pa 'grol ba'am bcings pa 'grol ba'am 'khrol ba/ rim gyis phrogs pa'am rku ba/ lam 'gog pa'am bar chad byed pa/ 'phrog ba/ rim gyis sam rlings kyis sam ma lus par 'phrog pa/ sdang
<p>80a.5</p>dwiSh+TaH/ bi dwe ShaH/ /mtho ris dang 'dong ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ di biH/ swargaH/ su ga tiH/ saM ga ti/ de ba lo kaH/ b+hU bi/ ma nu Sh+ya lo kaH/ a b+h+yu da yaH/ bany+tsa kA ma guNAH/ ba d+ha kAHkA mAH/ A dIp+tAHkA mAH/ d+hi k+kA
<p>80a.6</p>ba'am 'gras pa/ rnam par sdang ba/ lha yul/ mtho ris/ bde 'gro/ bzang 'gro/ lha'i 'jig rten/ sa'i steng / mi'i 'jig rten/ mngon par mtho ba/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ 'dod pa rnams ni gsod pa/ 'dod pa rnams ni kun du 'bar ba/ 'dod pa
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>mAM/ kA mA la yaH/ kA ma ni yan+tiH/ durgan+d+hAHkA mAH/ pU ti kAHkA mAH/ ag+ni dz+nyA lo pa mAH sarba shIR+Sho pa mAH/ shU lo pa mAH/ a si d+hA ro pa mAH/ tan+t+rA dza la dzA tAH/ gu DA guny+dzi ka b+hU tAH/ muny+dzA pa lwa dza dzA tAH/ A dzA bany+dza ba sa mA
<p>80b.2</p>ngan pa/ 'dod pa la zhen pa/ 'dod pa la 'chums pa/ 'dod pa ni dri nga ba/ 'dod pa ni rul ba lta bu/ me 'bar ba lta bu/ sbrul gyi mgo/ gsal shing lta bu/ ral gri lta bu/ thags 'khrugs pa lta bu/ dru gu 'dzings pa lta bu/ rtsa mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar
<p>80b.3</p>pan+nAH/ /skabs skabs nas tshig gi phrad du 'byung ba'i ming la/ ka ra NaH/ e baM rU baM/ a ta e tasmAt+kA ra NAta/ a tra/ ta tra/ i ha/ asmiM/ ta thA/ ya thA/ bA/ tsa/ e ba/ ya smAta/ kin+tar+hi/ tata/ ya ta/ 
<p>80b.4</p>gyur pa/ skabs/ de lta bu/ des na de'i phyir/ 'dir/ de la/ 'di la/ 'dir/ de bzhin/ ji lta ba'am ji ltar ram ji nas sam 'di ltar/ 'am rung / dang ngam yang / nyid/ gang gi phyir ram 'di ltar/ de lta mod kyi/ de/ gang yin pa'am
<p>80b.5</p>kiM/ na nu/ kiny+tsa/ a n+ya tsa/ a pi tu/ kin+tu/ tad+ya thA/ yad+na tA a tha/ i me/ a mI/ e baM/ b+hU yo\u0f85bi/ b+hU yaH/ ka dA tu ka dA
<p>80b.6</p>gang / ci/ 'am ste 'dri ba'i tshig /'di ltar yang / gzhan yang / yang ngam mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngam mod kyi/ 'di lta ste'am dper na/ de nas sam ci ste/ 'di dag /'di rnams /'di skad dam 'di ltar ram de bzhin/ yang ngam gzhan yang / yang ngam phyir zhing / nam zhig gam/ 
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>ya dA/ ta dA/ ka thaM/ e baM hi/ ta to pi/ ta thA hi/ e ba me ba/ sa tsetra ya di/ pe yA laM/ bUrba batra/ u tA ho a tha bA a ho swi ta/ nA ma/ ba
<p>81a.2</p>gang gi tshe/ de'i tshe'am de'i dus/ ji ltar/ de ltar na/ de bas kyang / 'di ltar/ de bzhin du/ gal te/ de bzhin du sbyar ba'am gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba/ gong ma bzhin nam snga ma bzhin/ yang na de na ni 'on te'am de ste/ gyur du zin kyang ngam chug kyang / kye ma'am kye hud dam ma la'am
<p>81a.3</p>ta/ a ho/ hA/ d+h+ru paM a ba sh+yaM/ nU naM/ a pi sa ha sa/ sA kama? sAr+d+haM/ han+ta/ a n+ya tra/ ta thA pi/ ya di daM/ a tha bA/ a
<p>81a.4</p>ji yang rung / e ma'am a la la/ kye hud dam kye ma/ los kyang dam los te'am nges pa/ nges bar ram gor ma chag pa'am snyam/ kyang ngam yang lhan cig gam bcas sam dang / lhan cig gam thabs cig /'on tang ngam 'o na/ gzhan du'am ma gtogs/ de lta mod kyi/ 'di lta ste'am gang 'di/ yang na/ 'on kyang ngam
<p>81a.5</p>tha tsa/ ki la/ s+thA pa yi twA/ hi twA/ kiny+tsA taH/ ye ShAM kr-i ta shaH/ ta tra tA bta/ yA bta/ a pi tsa/ kA tsita/ ya thA pi nA maH/ ke tsitra/ ye ke tsita/ yaHkash+tsita/ kwa tsa
<p>81a.6</p>de lta yang de lta la/ lo grag ce'o/ /ma gtogs pa'am bzhag ste/ bor te'am ma gtogs pa/ de la cir 'gyur zhe'am 'o na cir 'gyur/ gang dag gi phyir/ de la re zhig gam de srid/ /ji srid/ gzhan yang zhe'am 'on kyang / gang yang / dper na zhe'am ji ltar yang / kha cig /gang su dag /gang la la/ gang
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>na/ ke tsa na/ a yaM/ i daM/ i yaM/ ka s+ya/ ke na tsitra ke na ye na/ ta yA/ a ne na a na yA/ ka ti/ ye ShAM/ te ShAM/ ya s+ya/ ta s+ya/ a s+ya/ ka s+ya tsitra/ kwa tsitra/ ku ta/ ku taH/ 
<p>81b.2</p>na/ gang dag /pho 'di /ma ning 'di/ mo 'di/ su'i/ gang gis kyang / gang gis sam gang gi phyir/ des/ 'dis/ du /gang rnams kyi/ de rnams kyi/ gang gi'am gang la/ de'i 'am de la/ 'di'i 'am 'di la/ gang la la'i/ la lar/ gang du/ gang las sam gang las shig /
<p>81b.3</p>ka thaM tsitra/ ka dA tsitra/ /mkhar dang gnas la sogs pa'i ming la/ ko traH/ durgaH/ pUrba dzi nA d+h+yu Shi taM/ pai dza yan+taHprA sA daH/ de ba sa b+hA/ a su ra sa b+hA su d+ha nA/ li pi shA lA/ ku TA gA raM/ a pa sa thaH/ grA maH/ grA mo pa bi tsA raH/ 
<p>81b.4</p>ji ltar yang / nam zhig gi tshe/ mkhar/ rdzong / sngon gyi rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa/ lha'i 'dun sa/ lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa nor bzang / yi ge slob pa'i grwa khang / khang ba brtsegs ba/ 'dug gnas/ grong / grong gi nye 'khor/ 
<p>81b.5</p>na ga raM/ ni ga maH/ dza na pa daM/ rASh+TaM/ rA dzA d+hA nI/ pu raM/ prA sA daH/ besh+maH/ gr-i haM/ a gA raM/ ge haM/ b+ha ba naM/ g+ha raM/ la ya naM/ harmyama?/ harmya si kha raM/ aTa?/ 
<p>81b.6</p>grong khyer/ grong rdal /ljongs sam yul gyi skye bo'i gnas/ yul 'khor/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor/ grong khyer ram pho brang / khang pa'am khang bzangs/ khang pa/ khyim/ khyim/ khyim/ gnas sam khang pa/ khang khyim/ gnas khang / pu shu'am bsil khang ngam yang thog/ /pu shu'i steng / yang thog /
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>aSh+Tha laH/ o bi d+h+ya na khA/ ni r+Ya haH/ bA tA ya naM/ ga bA k+ShaM/ to ra NaM/ kho Ta kaH/ pa raM khA/ pat+ta naM/ ha TA/ mA l+yA paNaH/ paN+yA pa NaH/ gr-i hA bA
<p>82a.2</p>dgra khang ngam ba gam/ mda' yab bam ba gam/ ba gam mam sgo khang skabs dang sbyar/ skar khung / skar khung dra ba can/ rta babs/ lcog gam shing thags skabs dang sbyar/ 'obs/ tshong rdal la 'tshong 'dus/ tshong 'dus/ me tog phreng ba'i tshong khang / zong dgram pa'am tshong khang / khyim gyi
<p>82a.3</p>saH/ maN+Da la mADaH/ ko shaH/ koSh+ThA gA raM/ b+hit+tiH/ prA kA raH/ pra ti prA kAraH/ kha ra gr-i haM/ paT ku Ti/ ya ba ni kaH/ tr-I Na ku Ti/ kA ya mA NaM/ rang+ga shA lA/ mA TA/ bA Da daD+Di kA/ bA tA grat+pa ti kA /daN+Da ts+tsha da naM/ pha la
<p>82a.4</p>gnas/ 'khor gyi khyams/ mdzod dam shugs sam sbubs/ bang ba/ rtsig pa/ ra ba/ phyir/ gur/ sgra/ yol ba/ spyil po'am rtsa khang / sab mo/ ltad mos/ rnga khang / sab mos bskor ba'am rib mas bskor ba/ sgo khang steng gi bsil khang / yol khang / spang
<p>82a.5</p>kats+tsha da naM/ b+hU mi gu hA/ shai la gu hA/ gi ri gu hA/ par+Na ku Ti kA /kr-i ta tsaM kra ma NA/ kr-i ta prAg+b+hA raH/ ku tU ha la shA lA/ sa b+hA maN+Da paH/ as+thA na maN+Da paH/ maN+Da paH/ saM gI ti prA sA dA/ ni la yaH/ u pa s+thA
<p>82a.6</p>leb khang / sa phub/ brag phub/ /ri phug /lo ma'i spyil po/ 'chag sar byas pa/ bya skyibs su byas pa/ rtog khang / 'dun khang / gdan la gshegs pa/ /mdun khang ngam bkad sa/ bgro ba'i khang pa'am glu dbyangs kyi khang pa/ gnas sam tshang / rim gro'i
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>na shA lA/ dwA raM/ dwA ra ka pA TaM/ ka pA Ta pu TaM/ dwA ra sha khI/ a ba ShaM gaH/ N+ya saH/ s+thu NA/ stam+b+haH/ kum+b+ha kaH/ kr-i ka Ta kaM /shIR+Sha kaM /go sA ra kaH/ d+ha ra NI/ ku TaH/ go pA na sI/ arga DaH/ in+d+ra bI laH/ be di kA dzA laM/ stam+b+ha kaH/ saM kra ma Na kA ni/ 
<p>82b.2</p>gnas/ sgo/ sgo glegs/ sgo 'phar/ sgo skyes/ ya phubs/ them pa/ ka ba'am bzu ba/ ka ba/ ka rten/ ka zhu/ bre phul/ gdung / phyam /phyam gyi spyi rten/ phyam slu bo/ gtan pa/ 'khor gtan nam sgo'i them pa/ lan kan gyi dra ba/ lan kan gyi ka ba/ bsti khang / lan kan
<p>82b.3</p>be di kA sU tsa kaH/ shang+ku/ A ram+ba Na kaM /sU tsi kaM /a d+hiSh+ThA naM/ so pA naM/ bi tardiH/ A rA maH/ bA DI/ shA kha bA Ti kaH/ pha lA rA maH/ su si k+taM/ su sho d+hi taM/ su sho
<p>82b.4</p>nam kha khyer ram stegs bu'am gzungs gzer/ gzer bu'am phur bu/ gdang bu/ shar ba/ lan kan gyi rten ma/ them skas/ stegs bu/ kun dga' ra ba/ ldum ra/ ra ba/ bza' shing ra ba/ chag chag legs par btab pa/ phyag dar legs par byas pa/ legs par shin
<p>82b.5</p>b+hi taM/ tsa tuR+Shu ko Ne Shu/ siM hA sa naM pra dz+nyAp+taM/ ar+d+ha yo dza na pA ri sa man+ta kaH/ yo dza na muts+tsaM/ sa ma pA Ni ta la dzA taH/ rat+na ma yaHsaM s+thi to\u0f85b+hUta/ tsa lat+thA/ lA lA piN+DaH/ hasti shA lA/ a shwa shA lA/ kha ra shA lA/ go shA lA/ 
<p>82b.6</p>tu mdzes par byas pa/ grwa bzhir/ seng ge'i khri bshams pa/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ gzhi rin po cher gyur to/ /bres/ bres kyi rgyu/ glang po che'i bres/ rta'i bres/ bong bres/ glang bres/ 
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>a dza shA lA/ u d+yA naM/ an+ta rA pa NaM/ bI thI/ ra th+yA/ bat+sa shA lA/ ban+thA/ tsa twa raH/ shr-iM gA Ta kaM /Aspa daM/ ni ke taH/ ni shra yaH/ graiSh+mi kA bA saH/ bAR+Shi kA bA saH/ hai man+ti kA bA saH/ /shing rta la sogs nye bar mkho
<p>83a.2</p>ra lug gi bres/ skyed mos tshal/ grong bar/ srang ngam khyams skabs dang sbyar/ /lam po che/ be'u ra ba/ lam/ bzhi mdo/ sum mdo/ gnas sam rten/ gnas/ gnas sam rten/ dpyid sa/ dbyar sa/ dgun sa/

<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>bal+laH/ ka raN+Da baH/ ko dra baH/ /dus ston gyi ming la/ ma hA ma haH/ dzA ti ma haH/ dzA Ta ma haH/ tsU DA ma haH/ pany+tsa baR+Shi ka ma haH/ Sha?T paR+Shi ka ma haH/ ku TI ma haH/ ut+sa baH/ barbaH/ /zho mar dang zas skom gyi ming la/ g+h+r-i taM/

<p>84a</p>

<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>ka Tu ka tai laM/ tA lI saH/ sharka rA/ go ro tsa nA/ baM sa ro tsa nA/ ta ga raM/ nA ga raM/ shuN+ThI/ pip+pa lI/ ma ri tsaM/ ba he DaM/ bi b+hI ta ka /ha rI ta kI/ A ma la kaM/ a dza dzI/ dzI ra kaM /yaSh+TI ma d+hu/ kuSh+ThaM/ pe pha laM/ pU ga pha laM/ twaka? /twatsa?/

<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>le kha niH/ ka lA maM/ sU traM/ kI la kaM /Tang+ga Na k+ShA raH/ sha lA kA/ tA la kaM /pra ti tA la kaM/ ni shre NiH/ A daR+shaH/ A raH/ Tang+gaH/ tsany+tsaH/ sa mung+gaH/ pi Tha rI/ pany+dza raH/ rang+gaH/ la k+ShA/ many+dziSh+Tha/ pat+tang+gA/ ku suM b+haH/ nI lI/ rA dzA paT+TaM/

<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>dz+yo tI ra sa ma NiH/ me tsa kaM /ma hA nI laM/ a nan+ta bar+N+Na rat+naM/ dzam+bu na da rat+naM/ puSh+pa rA gaH/ kA tsa kaH/ tr-i Na kuny+tsa kaM /s+pha Ti kaM /dzam+bu na da su bar+N+NaM/ su bar+N+NaM/ he maM/ ka na
<p>86a.2</p>nor bu skar mdog /gzi/ rin po che mthon ka chen po/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas/ rin po che dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ dun las sam sbur long / 'ching bu'am do zan/ sbur long / shel/ dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ gser/ gser/ gser ram sa
<p>86a.3</p>kaM /dzA ta rU paM/ rU pyaM/ ra dza taM/ ku ru pin+daH/ lo haH/ tAm+m+raM/ tra puH/ sI saM/ rai t+yaM/ kaM saM/ rat+na sam+ma taM/ /dung la sogs pa'i ming la/ dak+Shi NA bar+t+ta shaM khaH/ shaM khaH/ shaM khaH/ suk+ti kA/ ka brdi kA/ boN+DaH/ a b+h+ra kaM /kha Ti kA/ pra le
