<p>86a.5</p>pa kaH/ /rgyan gyi rnam pa'i ming la/ a laM kA ra/ A b+ha ra NaM/ byU haH/ bi b+hU Sha NaM/ maN+Da naM/ he ma niSh+kaH/ ma NiH/ ka Ta kaMH/ /ba la yaM/ ke yU raH/ aM ga daH/ ar+d+ha hA raH/ hA raH/ nU pu raM/ kuN+Da laM/ 
<p>86a.6</p>gyi bye ma/ rgyan/ phyang phrul lam spud pa'am ma 'dom na rgyan/ bkod pa/ lhab lhub/ rgyan po'i cho lo/ gser gyi rgyan/ nor bu/ gdu bu rgyan can/ gdu bu/ dpung rgyan/ dpung rgyan/ se mo do/ /rgyan phreng ngam do shal/ rkang gdub/ rna cha gdub skor/ cod pan
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>mu ku TaM/ ki rI TiH/ mau liH/ pa TaH/ haR+ShaH/ pa ri ha Ta kaM /til kaM /kar+Ni kaM /tsan+d+ra kaM/ /na ku la kaH/ mu dri kA/ aM gu lI ya kaM /pA la kaH/ pa ri hA ra kaM /tA
<p>86b.2</p>dang dbu rgyan zla ba can skabs dang sbyar/ cod pan dang dbu rgyan rtse bran/ cod pan dang dbu rgyan rtse gsum skabs dang sbyar/ dar thod/ mgul gdub/ gdu bu/ thig le lta bu rgyan tam mdongs/ rna cha/ rgyan zla gam/ rgyan ne'u le can/ sor gdub rgya/ sor gdub/ sor gdub /gdub bu tham pa/ rgyan ta
<p>86b.3</p>la kaM /pAR+sha sU tra kaM /ba li ta kaM /niSh+kaH/ me kha lA ra sha nA kAny+tsI/ su bar+Na sU traM/ go Na sI kaM su bar+N+Na dA maM/ hastA b+ha ra NaM/ pA dA b+ha ra NaM/ mUr+d+hA b+ha ra NaM/ kaN+ThA b+ha ra NaM/ u rats+tsha daH/ tsi ta bista raH/ trai kun+da kaM /she kha raM/ a ba taM sa kaM /mu kha phul+la kaM mu kha puSh+pa kaM/ 
<p>86b.4</p>la 'dab/ se ral phreng / lcam khris can/ do shal/ gser gyi 'og pag /gser skud/ gser gyi mon lhas/ lag rgyan/ rkang rgyan/ mgo'i rgyan/ mgul rgyan/ gya do/ chong tshong gshibs pa/ rgyan rtse gsum pa/ me tog 'od/ me tog rna rgyan phal bo che/ me tog rgyan/ 
<p>86b.5</p>hasto pagaH/ pA do pa gaH/ byo ma kaM /rat+na ma ya bi ShA NaM/ pra t+yup+taM/ kha tsi taM/ A tsi taM/ ra tsi taM/ a ba sak+ta paT+Ta da ma ka lA paH/ puSh+pA b+hi kIr+N+NaM/ kalpa br-i k+ShaiHnA nA laM kA ra puSh+pa pha la ba na tA gra
<p>86b.6</p>lag rgyan/ rkang rgyan/ mkha' rten/ rin po che'i bya ru/ spras pa/ 'phra bkod pa'am/ spras pa/ spras pa'am bsrings pa'am bkod pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po btags pa/ me tog mngon par bkram pa'i chal par bkram pa/ rgyan dang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i lo ma dud par
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>bi Ta paiH/ u pa sho b+hi taM/ A pI Di ka dzA taM/ ASh+TA pa da ni bar+d+d+haM/ paM k+tiH/ sa muts+tshi taM/ pra kIr+N+NaM/ saM s+t+ri taM/ su bi b+hak+taM/ sa man+tAt+pa ri k+Ship+taM/ puSh+pA
<p>87a.2</p>gyur pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dag gis/ mdzes par byas pa'am brgyan pa/ phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa/ mig mangs ris su bris pa/ phreng ba'am gral/ bsgreng ba'am btsugs pa/ bkram pa/ bting ba/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ me tog bkram
<p>87a.3</p>b+h+ya ba kIr+NaM/ bai dza yan+tI pa tA kA/ /go mtshon gyi ming la/ ka ba tsaH/ barmaH/ san+nA ha/ bA li kA san+nA ha/ baT+Ti kA san+nA ha/ shIR+Sha kaH/ ka tha ti/ ka ba tsi ka /pha raH/ prA saH/ kun+taH/ ka Na yaH/ k+Shu ra praH/ khe Ta kaH/ shU laM/ tri
<p>87a.4</p>pa'am gtor ba/ ma 'dom na ba dan nam 'dom na rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan/ ya lad/ go cha/ go cha/ tshem tshem/ khrab/ rmog gi chem bu/ 'thab/ 'thab/ phub /mdung ngam thag mdung / mdung / rdo rje rtse gcig /ste'u ka nya/ phub zlum/ gsal shing / mdung rtse
<p>87a.5</p>shU laM/ pa ra shuH/ to ma raH/ shak+tiH/ khaD+gaH/ ts+tshU ri kA/ ka ra bA laH/ ka Din+ta laH/ d+ha nuH/ sha raH/ nA rA tsaH/ ar+d+harnA rA tsaH/ bat+sa dan+ta kaH/ ti la ko tsa ba kaM /b+hal+laH/ mung+ga li kA/ DA b+hA/ b+hiN+Di pA laH/ A yu d+haM
<p>87a.6</p>gsum pa/ dgra sta/ mda' bo che/ mdung thung / ral gri/ chu gri/ ral gri dgu bo/ ral gri dgu bo/ gzhu/ mda'/ lcags mda'/ mda' phyed lcags las byas pa/ mde'u be'u so 'dra ba/ mde'u zur bzhi pa/ ste'u ka ma/ mde'u bye'u snying ma/ 'phang mdung / mtshon rtse gcig /mtshon cha'am
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>bra ha ra NaM sha s+t+ri/ /mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ming la/ ts+tsha traM/ d+h+wa dzaH/ pa tA kA/ tsUr+N+NaM/ puSh+pa pu TaM/ gan+d+haH/ bi le pa naM/ u pa le pa naM/ mA l+yaM/ dI paH/ bi tA naM/ bi tA na bi ta taM/ sa muts+tshi tats+tsha tra d+d+h+wa dza pa tA kA/ kiM ka NI dzA laM mu kha rA/ he ma dA maM/ muk+tA
<p>87b.2</p>lag cha'am mtshon/ gdugs/ rgyal mtshan/ ba dan/ phye ma/ me tog gi phur ma/ spos/ byug pa/ byug pa/ phreng ba/ mar me/ bla re/ bla rer bres pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba/ gser gyi chun po'am phreng ba/ mu tig
<p>87b.3</p>dA maM/ ma Ni dA maM/ he ma dzA laM/ paT+Ta dA maM/ pra lam+bi taM/ lam+ba te/ pra lam+ba te/ a b+hi pra lam+ba te/ gan+d+ha mA l+ya na ma hI ya te/ a b+h+yar+hi taM/ d+hU ba ni r+d+hU pi taM/ saM pU dzi taM/ pU dz+ya pU dzi taM/ ma hi taM/ 
<p>87b.4</p>gi chun po/ nor bu'i chun po/ gser gyi dra ba/ dar gyi lda ldi/ rab tu dbyangs pa/ 'phyang / rab tu 'phyang / mngon par rab tu 'phyang / dri dang phreng bas mchod pa/ mngon par mchod pa'am drin che ba'am btsun pa/ bdug spos kyi bdug pa/ legs par mchod pa/ mchod par 'os pas mchod pa/ mchod par byas/ 
<p>87b.5</p>a b+hi bra ki ran+tisma/ a b+h+ya ba ki ran+tisma/ dzI bi to pa ka ra NaM/ glA na pra t+ya ya b+h+yai Sha dz+yaM/ su kho pa d+hA naM/ me tog sna tshogs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]ming la/ dza la dzaM/ sha ta pa traM/ ut+pa laM/ pad+maM/ ku mu daM/ puN+Da rI kaM /sau gan+d+hi kaM /mr-i du gan+d+hi kaM /s+tha la dzaM/ 
<p>87b.6</p>mngon par rab tu gtor/ mngon par gtor/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad/ na ba'i gso sman/ bde ba'i yo byad dam bde ba'i 'tsho chas sam bde bar sbyar ba skabs dang sbyar/ chu las skyes pa/ pad+ma/ ut+pa la/ pad+ma/ ku mu da/ pad+ma dkar po/ dri mchog /dring da 'jam pa/ skam las skyes pa/ 
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>tsam+pa kaH/ ku ra ba kaH/ pAR+Shi kI/ ma hA pAR+Shi kI/ mal+li kA/ na ba mAl+li kA/ dzA ti ku su maM/ su ma nA/ yU thi kA/ d+hA nu skA rI/ kun+daM/ pA ru Sha kaM /ma hA pA ru Sha kaM /many+dzu Sha kaM /mahA many+dzu Sha kaM /a sho kaM /mu tsi lin+daM/ 
<p>88a.2</p>tsam pa ka/ ku ra ba ka/ bar shi ki/ bar shi ki chen po/ /ma li kA/ na ba ma li ka /sna ma'i me tog /sna ma'i me tog /yug ti ka /d+ha nu kA ri/ kun dam/ pa ru sha ka /pa ru sha ka chen po/ many+dzu sha ka/ many+dzu sha ka chen po/ mya ngan 'tshang / btang bzung / 
<p>88a.3</p>ma hA mu tsi lin+daM/ mu tsu kun+daH/ ba ku laH/ a sa naH/ pr-i yaM guH/ pun+nA gaH/ ka dam+baH/ d+ha nu ke ta kI/ kar+Ni kA ra puSh+paM/ e DA k+Shi puSh+paM/ ta ga raH/ ke sha raH/ ta mA la pa traM/ laM ga lI puSh+paM/ staM ba kaM /ro tsaH/ ma hA ro tsaH/ s+thA laM/ ma hA
<p>88a.4</p>btang bzung chen po/ mu tsu kun+da/ ba ku la/ a sa na/ pr-i yang+ku/ pun+na ga /ka dam pa/ d+ha nu ke ta ki/ dong ka'i me tog /me tog lug mig /ta ga ra/ ke shar/ tam la'i lo ma/ laM ga li'i me tog /me tog gi dog pa /me tog mdog mdzes/ mdog mdzes chen po/ s+tha la/ s+tha la chen
<p>88a.5</p>s+thA laM/ tsakra bi ma laMH/ tsakra sha ta pa traM/ sa ha shra pa traM/ sha ta sa ha sra pa traM/ sa man+ta pra b+hA/ sa man+ta gan+d+haM/ sa man+tas+thu lA ba lo ka na/ na ya nA b+hi rA maH/ muk+ta pha la kaM/ dz+yo tiHpra b+haH/ dz+yo tiHka raH/ a ti muk+ta kaM /pA Ta laM/ ma hA pA Ta laM/ tsi tra pA Ta laM/ ma hA tsi tra pA Ta laM/ 
<p>88a.6</p>po/ 'khor lo dri med/ 'khor lo 'dab brgya/ 'dab stong / 'dab 'bum/ kun tu 'od/ kun tu bsung / kun tu cher snang / mig tu sdug /mu tig 'bru/ skar 'od/ 'od byed/ a ti mug ta ka /skya snar/ skya snar chen po/ skya snar khra bo/ /skya snar bkra chen/
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>man+dA ra baH/ ma hA man+dA ra baH/ karka ra baH/ ma hA karka ra baH/ de ba su ma nA/ ta ra NiH/ go ta ra NiH/ ba li/ tin+tu kaH/ kiM shU kaH/ bal+laH/ ba ka buSh+paM/ ka dam+ba ka puSh+paM/ ku ba la puSh+paM/ a dza dzI puSh+paM/ arka puSh+paM/ /me tog gi rtsa ba la sogs pa'i
<p>88b.2</p>man dA ra ba/ man dA ra ba chen po/ mdog dkar/ mdog dkar chen po/ lha yid dga'/ ta ra Ni/ go ta ra Ni/ ba li/ tin du ka /kim shu ka /ba la/ pra ba'i me tog /ka dam pa'i me tog /ma 'dom na me tog ut+pal 'dom na ku ba la/ go snyod kyi me tog /arka'i me tog/ 
<p>88b.3</p>ming la/ bi saM/ br-in+taM/ mr-i NA laM/ nA laM/ daN+DaH/ pat+t+raM/ bi Ta paH/ dzA la ka dzA taM/ k+ShA ra ka dzA taM/ kA li kA dzA taM/ kut+mal kadza taM/ mu ku la dzA taM/ kA kA s+ya kaM /sarba pa ri phul+laM/ phU li taM/ bi ka si taM/ puSh+paM/ ke sa raM/ kiM dzalkaM/ kar+N+Ni kA/ 
<p>88b.4</p>pad+ma'i rtsa ba/ rtsa ba'am thag pa/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag /chu ba/ sdong bu/ 'dab ma/ lo ma/ sbal mig 'thon pa/ sbal mig bye ba/ me tog kha 'bus pa/ me tog kha bye ba/ me tog 'dab ma thams cad rgyas pa/ rgyas sam kha bye ba/ rgyas sam kha bye ba/ me tog/ ze ba/ ze 'bru/ snying po/ 
<p>88b.5</p>karka TakA/ ba rA gaH/ /me tog gi yon tan gyi ming la/ sha ka Ta tsakra pra mA NaM/ bai DUR+Ya daN+DaH/ in+d+ra nI la karka Ti kA/ asma ga /r+b+ha ke sha raM/ shA lU kaM/ /spos kyi rnam pa'i ming la/ ba ya nama?/ tsan+nga na ma?/ a ga ruH/ tu ru skaH/ kr-iSh+NA ga ruH/ tamA la pa traM/ u ra ga sA ra tsan+da naM/ kA lA nu
<p>88b.6</p>snying po/ 'thul ba/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ sdong bu ni bai DUR+Ya/ snying po ni in+d+ra nI la/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba/ rgya spos/ tsan dan/ a ga ru/ du ru ka /a ga ru nag po/ /ta ma pa'i 'dab ma/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po/ /dus kyi rjes
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>sA ri tsan+nga naM/ kar+pU raH/ kum+ku mama?/ gug+gu luH/ kun+du ruH/ sardza ra saH/ /skad go 'dud gyi ming la/ d+harma paR+YA yaH/ ar+d+ha tra yo da sha sha tA ni/ nA nA bud+d+ha k+She tra sa ni pa ti tAH/ ma hA tA tsabo d+hi sa twa ga Ne na sAr+d+ha ma/ saM ba hu laH/ 
<p>89a.2</p>su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan/ ga pur/ gur kum/ gu gul/ sog /sra rtsi bog/ chos kyi rnam grangs/ stong nyis brgya lnga bcu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig /rab tu mang po/ /
<p>89a.3</p>e bam+p+ra mu khAH/ gaN pra mu khaH/ pUrbang+ga maH/ sAr+d+haM/ bi bi d+ha sam+mo da na ka thA mu pa sa kr-it+t+ya/ ba ri br-i taH/ pu ra skr-i taH/ triHpra dak+Shi NI kr-i t+ya/ e kaM sa mut+ta rA saM gaM kr-i twA/ da k+Shi NaM dza nu maN+Da laM
<p>89a.4</p>de la sogs pa/ tshogs kyi gtso bo/ sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa/ thabs cig gam lhan cig /kun dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas/ yongs su bskor/ mdun du bdar ba'am mdun gyis bltas pa/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
<p>89a.5</p>pr-i thi byAM pra tiSh+ThA pya/ ye na b+ha ga bAM ste nAn+dza lim+p+ra Na mya/ tasmi n+paR+Shat+san+ni pA te sAn+ni ShaN+NaH/ n+ya ShI data/ ten kha lu pu naHsa ma ye na/ siM hA sa naM pradz+nyAb+tiH/ n+ya shi da t+par+Ya ng+ka mA b+hu dz+ya/ alpA bA d+ha tAM/ alpA taM ka tAM/ yA trAM/ 
<p>89a.6</p>lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud/ 'khor 'dus pa der bzhugs sam 'dug/ yang de'i tshe zhe'am de'i tshe/ seng ge'i khri bshams pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ 
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>la g+hUt+thA na tAM/ ba laM su khAspaR+sha bi hA ra tAM tsa/ b+hA sa te/ ta pa ti/ bi ro tsa te/ pu na re ba smi ta ma ka rota/ uSh+NI Sha bi ba rAn+ta rAta/ rasmirni sh+tsar ti/ sa rasmi ni sh+tsar+Ya/ A b+ha yA/ pa ri s+phu To\u0f85b+huta?/ a ba b+hA si taH/ te na rasmya ba b+hA se na spr-i Sh+TaH/ 
<p>89b.2</p>bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge / yang 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/ 'od zer byung / 'od de byung nas/ 'od kyis/ yongs su khyab pa'am rgyas par gyur pa/ snang bar byas/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas /
<p>89b.3</p>ya tra sUr+Ya tsan+d+ra ma sAM pra b+hA yA ga tirnAsti/ ko he tuH/ kaHpra t+ya yaH/ pu na ra pyA ga t+ya/ uSh+NI Sha bi ba re Shu pra bi sha ti/ mu kha dwA re NA nu pra bi sha tisma/ na tsa b+ha ga ba to mu kha dwA ra s+yon+mi dzi tam+bA ni mi ny+dzi tam+bA pra dz+nyA ya tesma/ a ba b+hA saH/ sa man+tA ba b+hA saH/ dzi g+ha t+si tAHpUr+Na
<p>89b.4</p>gang na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mi 'bab pa/ rgyu gang / rkyen gang / slar log nas/ gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs/ zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum bar yang mi mngon no/ /snang ba/ kun tu snang ba/ bkres pa rnams ni 'grangs par gyur ce'am
<p>89b.5</p>gA trAb+ha ban+ti sma/ tr-iShi tA bi ga ta pi pA sA b+ha ban+tisma/ ro gaspr-iSh+TA bi ga ta ro gA b+ha ban+tisma/ bi ka len+d+ri yAHba ri pUr+N+Ne n+d+ri yA b+ha ban+tisma/ sa tset+p+r-iSh+TaHprash+na byA ka ra NA ya/ a ba kA shaM kuR+YAta kany+tsi de ba bra de shaM/ a man+t+ra ya
<p>89b.6</p>ltogs pa rnams ni lus rgyas par gyur/ skom pa rnams ni ngoms par gyur/ nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po tshang bar gyur/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ skabs phye na phyogs 'gal zhig /bka' stsal pa'am smras
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>tesma/ sA d+hu kA ra ma dAtra/ sA d+hu sA d+hu/ te na hi shr-i Nu sA d+hu tsa suSh+Thu tsa sa ma na si ku ru/ b+hA Shi Sh+ye\u0f85han+te/ b+ha ga ba taHpra ti shru t+ya/ tsit+ta mA rA d+ha yi Sh+ye/ tiSh+Tha ti/ d+h+r-i ya te/ yA ba ya ti/ d+harmany+tsa de
<p>90a.2</p>pa'am bod pa/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sems rangs par bya'o/ /bzhugs/ 'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /chos kyang ston
<p>90a.3</p>sha ya ti/ ya s+ye dA nIM kA laM ma n+ya se/ ya du ta/ bud+d+ha ne trI/ tat+kim+ma n+ya se/ no hI dma?/ sarba ban+taM paR+Shad+maN+Da laM/ a b+he d+ya pa ri bA ra/ b+ha ga ba tA nu dz+nyA taH/ an+ta shohAs+ya pre k+Sha N+ya pi/ dzI bi ta
<p>90a.4</p>to/ /de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul lam lugs/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ de ma lags sam de ma yin nam/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/ mi phyed pa'i 'khor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba/ tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsam ste/ 'tsho ba'i
<p>90a.5</p>he to ra pi/ ad+hi ba tsa naM/ ma no ra thA shA pa ri pU ri/ bi na ya ti ni be sha ya ti/ pra tiSh+ThA ba ya ti/ pras+thA pa ya ti/ au ba yi kama?/ a bya ti kra ma Nama?/ A ga ta pha laM/ saM gu ha yama?/ 
<p>90a.6</p>srog gi phyir yang / tshig bla dgas/ yid la bsam pa bzhin re ba yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'gong / rab tu brtan par byed pa/ brtan par byed pa/ cho ga'am thabs/ mi 'da' ba/ 'bras bu lag tu 'ongs pa'am thob pa/ legs par sbed pa'am gsang thub pa/ sbas
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>gup+taH/ pra bi be ka dzA/ dzu Shi tu kA maH/ uSh+NI Sha bi ba ramUr+d+h+nA san+d+hiH/ pra be shaH/ a ba tA raH/ bra gu NI ka ra Nama?/ pra gu NaH/ e kA ma bi tsa tu Sh+pA di kaM gA thA mu gr-i h+ya/ ma hA yA na pa ri grA ha kaH/ 
<p>90b.2</p>pa'am bsrungs pa/ rab tu dben pa las skyes pa/ sten par 'dod pa'am gnas par 'dod pa/ dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb/ 'jug pa/ 'jug pa'am gshegs pa/ drang por srong ba/ dang po/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang gzung nas/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa/ 
<p>90b.3</p>sad+d+har+m+ma pa ri grA ha kaH/ sad+d+har+m+ma br-iSh+TiH/ sad+d+har+m+mash+tsa tsi ras+thi ti ko b+ha ba ti/ a nut+ta rA yAM sa myak+saM bo d+hA b+hi saM bud+d+haH/ tsUDi kA ba bud+d+haH/ a nut+k+She pA pra k+She baH/ nA ti shI taM/ nA t+yuSh+Nama?/ 
<p>90b.4</p>dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi char/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ byur bur gyur pa/ gdegs pa med pa dang bzhag pa med pa/ ha cang mi grang / ha cang mi dro/ rnam
<p>90b.5</p>bi b+hA ba nA/ sa tAM/ u pa lab+d+hiH/ u pa lam+b+haH/ niSh+ThA ga taH/ a biSh+ThA nama?/ a sraM sa nama?/ a graHa ra NA bi hA ri NAM/ rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+tiM saM bi d+hA s+yA ma he/ ma hA br-i thi bIn+ni shrA yas ma grI ba she na sarba
<p>90b.6</p>par 'jug pa'am rnam par bsgom pa/ dam pa rnams kyi'am mkhas pa rnams kyi/ dmigs/ dmigs pa/ mthar phyin pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa/ ma btang ba/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog /bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bya'o/ /sa chen po la brten nas tshogs pa'i dbang gis
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>pI dzA ni bi ro han+ti/ tso k+Sha sa mu drA tsA raH/ alpa kr-its+tshe Na/ nA gA ba lo ki te na ba lo kya/ b+ha ga bAM i ma me bAr+thaM b+hU ya s+yA mA tra yA a b+hi d+yota ya mA na gA thA b+hi gI ten sam+p+ra kA sa ya ti sma/ ya thA shru tama?/ ya thA
<p>91a.2</p>sa bon thams cad rnam par skye'o/ /gtsang sbra spyod pa/ tshegs chung ngus/ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bstan pa/ ji ltar thob pa bzhin nam thos pa bzhin/ so so
<p>91a.3</p>pra t+yar+hama?/ bi sta re Na sam+p+ra kA shi tama?/ bi sta re Na sam+p+ra kA sha yi Sh+ya ti/ a d+h+yA pa yA mA sa/ ya dA tsa b+ha ga bA nA dz+nyA sIt+sa de ba kaM lo kaM san+ni pa ti taM/ a sa ma sa maH/ tas+ye ya mI dr-i sho\u0f85nu b+hA baH/ pra b+hA Sh+ya te/ pra
<p>91a.4</p>ji rigs par/ rgya cher rab tu bstan/ rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ klog tu bcug pa'am slob tu bcug pa/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten tshogs par mkhyen pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ de'i mthu 'di 'dra/ phye ba'am rab tu bzhag pa/ re bar
<p>91a.5</p>ti kAM k+Shi ta byaH/ tr-iSh+NA pau nar+b+ha bi kI/ nan+dI rA ga sa ha ga tA/ pu N+yo pa gaH/ a pu N+yo pa gaH/ A ni dz+yaM/ a b+h+yung+ga taH/ sa mung+ga taH/ ShaSh+Th+yaM ga sa ha sro be ta swa raH/ 
<p>91a.6</p>bya'am 'dod par bya ba'am shes bar bya ba/ yang 'byung ba'i srid pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyis mod la skyes pa/ bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mngon par 'phags pa/ yang dag par 'phags pa/ dbyangs yan lag drug stong dang ldan ba/ 
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>ba ta mAR+ShAH/ ba ta hA tA kaSh+Tama?/ a nun+na to na ba na taH/ u pa saM hA raH/ mA ra d+haR+Sha nama?/ ta s+yai ba m+b+ha ba ti/ ma hA to dza na kA ya s+ya/ hi tama?/ su khaM/ yo ga k+She maH/ an+ta rI k+Sha pra de shaH/ na
<p>91b.2</p>kyi ma grogs po dag/ /kye ma'am kyi hud dam e ma kyi hud/ ma khengs sam ma dud dam me mtho mi dma'/ btul ba'am nye bar sbyor ba'am nye bar bsgrub pa/ bdud gdul ba/ de 'di snyam du sems/ skye bo phal po che'i/ phan pa/ bde ba/ grub pa dang bde ba/ par snang gi phyogs/ shes pa yang med
<p>91b.3</p>pra dz+nyA ya te/ bi krI D-i tama?/ sarbe Na sarbaM/ sarba thA sarba/ sarba thA/ pra s+thA pa nama?/ o dzaH/ ma ho dzaSh+kaM ma ho dzaSh+kaH/ ma he sA khya ma he sA khyaH/ alpe shA khyaH/ r-id+d+haH/ s+phI taM/ k+She maM/ su b+hi k+ShaH/ 
<p>91b.4</p>dam mi mngon pa'am mi snang pa/ rnam par rol pa/ thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad dam ye/ rab tu bzhag pa/ mdangs sam gzi brjid/ gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba/ dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang chung bar grags pa/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ 
<p>91b.5</p>AkIr+Na ba hu dza na ma nu Sh+ya/ e kA yA maH/ A dz+nyA byA ka ra Nama? u dA hA ra Na yo ge na/ ka biH/ kA byama?/ sa mA ra kaM /sa bra h+ma kaM /sa sra ma Na brA h+ma Ni kAHpra dzA yA a b+hi b+hU ya ni r+YA s+ya ti/ bya ba sA yaH/ A bad+d+ha pa ri
<p>91b.6</p>skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ bgrod pa gcig pa/ shes pa brda sprod pa/ dper brjod pa'i tshul gyis/ snyan dngags mkhan/ snyan dngags/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu zil gyis mnan te nges par 'byung / btsal bar bya ba'am 'bad par bya ba/ ci la yang ma reg par
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>ka raH/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu pa ra maH/ A kA shad+hA tu paR+Ya ba sA naH/ as+thA na me tata?/ ut+thA pu nama?/ sa d+hA ma d+h+ya ga to pA/ rA dza ku la ma d+h+ya ga to bA/ paR+Sham+ma d+h+ya ga to bA/ yuk+ta ku lam d+h+ya ga
<p>92a.2</p>ches pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ de ni gnas ma yin/ bslang ba'am drang ba'am bskyed pa/ 'dus pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi nang na 'dug kyang rung / 'khor gyi nang na 'dug kyang rung / rigs tshogs pa'i nang na 'dug
<p>92a.3</p>to bA/ dz+nyA ti ma d+h+ya ga to bA/ a tI tAM sha ga tA/ na ke na tsi dwi d+hI ya te/ a ba kA shaHprastA baHa ba saraH/ ba nAd+ni rba na mA ga taH/ kA me ShunaiSh+k+ra myama?/ shai la muk+ti mi ba kAny+tsa naM/ ni se bi taH/ dzihwen+d+ri yaM ni rnA ma yA mA sa/ a b+ha ya
<p>92a.4</p>kyang rung / nye du'i nang na 'dug kyang rung / 'das pa'i char gyur pa/ gang gis kyang mi bya'o/ /go skabs sam par ram par skabs/ nags tshal nas nags tshal med par gshegs par/ 'dod pa las spags pa/ ri las thal ba'i nyi ma bzhin/ bsnyen pa/ ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ 'jigs pa'i dbang
<p>92a.5</p>ba sha bar+t+ti tA/ sarba satwA nAM kiM kA ra NI ya tA/ ba hu dza n+yama?/ pa ram+pa ra yA/ tuSh+NIm+b+hA benA d+hi bA sa ya ti/ samul+lo ki ta mu khaH/ samyak+p+ra t+yAt+maM dz+nyA na daR+sha ni pra bar+t+ta te/ A yuHsaM skA rA nut+s+r-i dza ti/ uSh+ma hA niH/ ma nu Sh+yA NAM sa b+hA ga tA yA
<p>92a.6</p>du gyur ba ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yong snyam pa/ skye bo mang po pa/ gcig nas gcig tu/ cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang / zhal du bltas ba/ bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes pa mthong ba 'jug pa/ tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba/ drod yal ba/ mi dang skal ba mnyam par
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>mu pa pan+naH/ bi k+Sho b+ha NA bA ta maN+Da lI/ pa ra ma nu bi d+hA ya/ na shra ba Na pa tha mArga mi Sh+ya ti/ kA yi kaM ba la/ kA yi kaM daurba l+yaM/ kA yi kaM kle shaH/ a k+Shu Na byA ka ra Nama?/ su nish+tsi taM/ bi br-i tama?/ phye ba'am gdangs ba/ 
<p>92b.2</p>skyes/ rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ pha rol gyi mda' dang mthun par byas te/ rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur/ lus kyi stobs/ lus nyam chung ba/ lus kyi ngal ba/ phyad par lung ston pa/ shin tu nges pa'am shin tu gtan la phab pa'am shin tu brtags pa/ 
<p>92b.3</p>a pA braM tama?/ s+yAta?/ sam+bA d+haH/ bi b+ha baH/ saM tsin+t+yaM/ a mu kaH/ tu la nA/ mA pa ya ti/ nir+m+mA tA/ sraSh+TA/ rat+nama?/ dkon mchog gam rin po che/ rat+na
<p>92b.4</p>phye ba/ 'gyur ba'am yod pa/ dogs pa'am nyam nga ba/ 'byor pa'am 'jig pa/ bsam pa bzhin/ che ge mo zhig /gzhal ba/ gzhal ba'am byed pa/ 'phrul ba po'am 'phrul byed/ 'byin ba po'am 'byin byed/ gzhi rin po che'am rin po che las grub pa'am rin po che las
<p>92b.5</p>ma yaH/ siM ha bi kra maH/ shu tsiH/ a nan+tA par+Ya n+taH/ a n+ya ta mA n+ya tama?/ sa mA dA nama?/ no ba gats+tsha ti/ sa ha ga tama?/ bra ti ban+naH/ lo ka yA trA/ 
<p>92b.6</p>byas pa'am rin po che'i rang bzhin/ seng ge'i rtsal/ gtsang ba'am gtsang sbra che ba/ /mtha' yas mu med/ gang yang rung ba/ yang dag par blangs ba'am yi dam/ nye bar mi reg gam nye bar mi 'gro ba'am khas mi len/ mod las skyes pa'am ldan pa/ zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi tshul lam spyod pa/ 
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>dzA tI yaH/ bA lA graH/ bA lA gra ko TiH/ bA la ba thaH/ s+pha ra Nama?/ s+phu TaM/ pA ri sA man+taH/ sa man+taH/ pra dz+nyA pa nama? pra dz+nyAp+ti/ b+hU ya s+yA mA tra yA/ kra maH/ u
<p>93a.2</p>rang bzhin can/ skra'i rtse mo/ /skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'a'am cha shas/ skra'i khyon nam byis pa'i lam/ khyab pa'am rgyas pa/ rgyas pa'am gsal ba/ khor yug gam nye 'khor/ kun nas sam khor khor yug /gdags pa'am bca' ba/ rgyas par/ rim/ phung po'i rdzas
<p>93a.3</p>pa d+hiH/ ni ya maH/ ni yA maH/ n+yA maH/ n+yA mA ba krAn+taH/ pra ti bad+d+haH/ bi ban+d+haH/ pra ti ban+d+haH/ pra t+ya bas+thA nama?/ aM shaH/ pra t+yaM shaH/ b+hA gaH/ 
<p>93a.4</p>sam nyon mongs pa/ mi 'gyur ba/ nges par gyur pa/ skyon med pa/ skyon med par zhugs pa/ rag lus pa'am 'brel ba'am bgegs su gyur pa/ /bgegs sam gegs/ phyir 'jil ba'am bgegs byed pa'am bar chad byed ba/ phyir gzhil ba'am so sor bzhag pa/ cha/ bgo skal la ma so so'i cha/ skal ba'am
<p>93a.5</p>ni ba ra Nama?/ A ba ra Nama?/ se tuH/ kau laH/ nau nA baH/ ga tiH/ a laM/ nir+dz+wa raH/ a ro gaH/ de hI/ swA pa te yaH/ sa mut+thAnama?/ pa li
<p>93a.6</p>cha/ chod pa'am sgrib pa/ sgrib pa/ stegs sam zam pa/ gzings/ gru /'gro ba'am rnam pa'am rtogs pa'am rten/ rgyan nam nus pa'am chog pa/ rims nad med pa'am nad med pa/ nad med pa/ lus can/ bdag dbang ba/ kun nas slong ba'am kun nas ldang byed/ kun nas sbrags pa'am ma byi ba'am
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>go d+haH/ A tsAr+Ya muSh+TiH/ d+har+m+mAn+ta rA yaH/ bits+tshan+da ya ti/ bi tsak+ShuH ka ra NA ya/ bre Shi tA/ pra kIr+NaH/ bi pra kIr+NaH/ pa ri dzA yaH/ a
<p>93b.2</p>ma bkrus pa'am tshigs pa'am 'bral pa/ slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa/ mos pa bzlog pa/ mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir/ skur ram btang / bkram ba'am 'thor ba/ rnam par 'thor ba'am rnam pa bkram pa/ yongs su byang bar bya ba'am 'dris par bya ba/ mngon du'am
<p>93b.3</p>b+hi mu khaM/ a ba bA daH/ saM sargaH/ dA ho bi gats+tsha ti/ b+ha smai naM ku r+YA tra/ rA dz+yama?/ rA dz+ye shwa r+YA d+hi ba t+yaM kA ra ya ti/ sam+m+rA dz+yaM/ sArba b+hau maH/ tsa tu ran+taM bi dzi ta bAM/ 
<p>93b.4</p>phyogs pa/ gdams pa/ 'du 'dzi/ tsha ba med pa'am gdung ba med par 'gyur/ 'di thal bar blags pa'am rlog pa'am rlog par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i srid dam thabs/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur/ rgyal srid rgyas pa/ sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal po/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ 
<p>93b.5</p>a d+h+yA ba sa ti/ pa ra mar+tha sa t+yama?/ sam+d+r-i ti sa t+yama?/ bya ba hA raH/ sAM ke ti kaM /ma hA t+m+yama?/ pUrbi kA/ ma d+h+ya pa da lo paM kr-i twA/ e ka tra sa me t+ya sam+b+hU ya/ e ka b+hU twA/ tadz+dza tI ya/ ta
<p>93b.6</p>rnal du bkod/ don dam pa'i bden pa/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa/ tha snyad/ brdar btags pa/ che ba'am bdag nyid che ba/ sngar byas pa'am sngar drangs pa'am sngon 'dren pa/ bar gyi tshigs mi smos par byas te/ gcig tu 'dus sam phrad nas/ gcig tu 'dus nas/ de dang 'dra bar/ de la rag lus
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>dwi d+he ya twA/ a n+war+thaH/ yu gaM /yu ga pU ta/ lo ka saM dz+nyA/ A shu ta ra br-it+tiH/ i ta re tarAn+ta r+b+hA baH/ kA dA tsit+ka pa
<p>94a.2</p>zhe'am bskos pa bzhin byed ba/ don dang mthun pa/ zung ngam phrugs/ cig car zhe'am lan cig ce'am mnyam ba/ 'jig rten gyi ming du btags pa'am 'jig rten gyi tha snyad/ shin tu myur par 'jug pa/ gcig gi nang du gcig bsdu ba/ res 'ga' 'byung ba zhe'am lan 'ga' 'byung
<p>94a.3</p>twAta/ pra ti pA d+yaM/ saM pra d+hAr+Ya mra/ ya thA yo gama?/ a g+haH/ a ba d+hA ra Nama?/ nir+d+hA ra Nam/ a thi ni r+b+hA ga bar+t+tiH/ sang+kA shaH/ A nu lo mi kI k+ShAn+tiH/ 
<p>94a.4</p>ba'i phyir/ gos par bya ba'am bsgrub par bya ba'am bstan par bya ba/ legs par 'gro ba'am legs par dpyad pa/ ji ltar rigs pa'am ji ltar 'byor ba/ bsags pa'am sdig pa/ nges par gzung ba/ dmigs kyis dbye ba/ tha dad du mi 'jug pa'am mi gnas pa/ 'dra ba/ rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa/ 
<p>94a.5</p>pr-iSh+Tha lab+d+haH a ba gA h+ya/ duSh+p+ra sa haH/ du rA ba sa daH/ iSh+TaH/ a niSh+TaH/ A kA raH/ pra kA raH/ nai ka shaH/ b+ha gi no b+ha ban+ti/ ka than+nI ya te/ a b+hi sam+ba d+h+ya te/ 
<p>94a.6</p>rjes la thob pa/ zhugs nas sam rtogs nas/ bzod par dka' ba/ bsnyen par dka' ba/ 'dod ba'am sdug pa/ mi 'dod pa'am mi sdug pa/ rnam ba'am byad bzhin nam tshul/ rnam ba/ re rel sam yin nam rnam pa gcig tu ma yin/ skal ba can du 'gyur/ ji ltar drang ngam ji ltar bshad/ sbyar ro/ /
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>a b+hiSh+yan+ti taH/ bi sa dr-i shaHpA ko bi pA kaH/ u dA ra bi pA kaH/ a drAk+ShI ta/ pre k+ShAn+tesma/ pa ri hA raH/ bi sardza ya ti/ bi sardza nama?/ bi sardzi taH/ pra ti bi d+hA nama?/ bA sa nA/ pa ri bA si taH/ nirga taH/ 
<p>94b.2</p>brlan pa'am sbangs pa/ mi 'dra bar smin pas na rnam par smin pa/ rnam par smin pa rgya che ba/ mthong ngo / /bltas so/ /lan/ lan ldon/ lan ldon pa'am gtong ba/ slar btang ba'am lan btab ba/ phyir bcos pa'am lan gdab pa/ bag chags/ yongs su bskos/ byung ba'am 'das pa/ 
<p>94b.3</p>sau ra t+yama?/ nA bA d+ha ya tisma/ saM tsAr+Ya/ saM tsAr ya tisma/ nirbi kA raH/ u pa gr-i TaH/ pra ti be da ya swa/ sha lo dwa ra Nama?/ bra ma tha naM/ bra ti han+ti/ pra ti ba ha nama?/ nir+g+hA ti taH/ ku ga Na pra tA pa naH/ dz+yo
<p>94b.4</p>des pa/ gnod par ma gyur to/ /bskyod nas sam spos nas/ spos so/ /mi 'gyur ba/ bskor ba'am dkris pa/ mkhyen par mdzod cig sbron cig /zug rngu 'byin pa/ rab tu 'joms pa/ phyir ba cil/ slar bzlog pa/ bcom pa/ tshogs ngan pa rab tu gdung bar byed pa/ skar ma'i tshogs sam
<p>94b.5</p>ti rga NaH/ tsit+ta mA k+Ship+ta ma?/ A ga ma ya swa/ A ga ma ya mA naM tiSh+Tha ti/ tiSh+Tha ti pra tI k+Sha mA NaH/ u pa dza gA ma/ a b+hi mu kha mu pa ga tama?/ pra tI k+Sha ti/ u pa bi ba sha/ prA tiSh+Tha na?/ sa ma nudz+nyA/ a sh+le ShaH/ a g+ni kha dA/ be Sha/ b+h+yA mI
<p>94b.6</p>snang bar byed ba'i tshogs/ sems khrid/ sdong cing / sdod cing 'dag /nye bar song / mngon du nye bar song / sdod/ 'dug go /'khod do/ /gnang ba'am 'brang ba'am mthun par gnang gam chags ba'am ma 'byar ba/ me ma mur gyi 'obs sam dong / cha byad/ mog mog
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>ka ra NaM/ d+h+yA mI kri tama?/ b+ha ba kAn+tA raH/ b+ha ba tsA ra kaH/ saM sa rit+tA/ a b+haT+Ti taH/ prA kr-i taH/ d+hika?/ saM khyAM gats+tsha ti/ A lo ki taH/ bi lo ki taH/ 
<p>95a.2</p>por bya ba/ mog mog por byas pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa/ srid pa'i btson ra/ 'khor nas/ ma bcad pa'am ma phye ba'am ma bkrol ba'am ma brdungs pa/ bal ba/ ngan ba 'di/ grangs su 'gro'o/ /kun tu lta ba'am mdun du lta ba/ rnam par lta ba'am g.yas g.yon du lta ba/ 
<p>95a.3</p>ul+lo ki taH/ ut+ta rot+ta raM/ a b+hI k+Sh+Na ma?/ ni rud+d+haM a ba swA ba nama?/ swa p+nAn+ta ra ga tama?/ ut+tiSh+Tha/ ut+tiSh+Tha ti/ ut+thA s+ya ti/ us+thi taH/ ut+s+Tha ya/ e ta yU yaM/ gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ A nI ya tAM/ ki
<p>95a.4</p>gyen du blta ba'am yar blta ba/ gong ma'i gong ma'am gong nas gong du/ yang dang yang du'am phyir zhing / 'gags gnyid kyis log pa/ rmi lam na'am rmi lam du rmis pa/ longs/ ldang / ldang bar 'gyur/ langs/ langs nas/ khyed tshur shog /song / tshur shog /khyer te shog /snyoms
<p>95a.5</p>lA saH/ tan+d+rI/ pra s+thA nama?/ u dIr+NaH/ a nA b+hA saH/ ni rA b+hA saH/ a ni mi ShaH/ ud+di sha ti sma/ na tsa ba ri prA pa ya ti/ a pU rbA tsa ra maH/ a saM mU TaH/ a twa raH/ saM b+h+ra maH/ ruN+Na na ya naM/ ya thartu
<p>95a.6</p>las/ g.yel ba'am snyoms pa/ 'phags pa'am cha ba'am 'jug ba/ 'phyos pa'am drag pa/ mi snang ba/ snang ba med pa/ mig mi 'dzum pa/ lung phog ba/ mi sleb pa/ snga phyi med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ me rings pa/ brtags pa'am gus par bsgrim ba/ mig mchi ma phyung ba/ dus ji lta ba
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>kama?/ A ha ra NaM/ sa ha sA/ a kasmAta/ bi kr-i taH/ bi saM s+thi taH/ bI b+hAt+sA/ le paH/ ni ru pa le paH/ e ka taHpiN+DI kr-i t+ya/ saM k+Shi bya piN+Da yi twA/ dwa yo sh+tsit+ta yosas ma ba d+hA naM nA sti/ 
<p>95b.2</p>bzhin/ len pa'am 'dzin pa/ ba bcol lam bab bab pa'am 'phral/ glo bur/ cha lugs ngan pa/ tshul mi sdug par 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa/ rnyong ngam byug pa'am skyang nul/ chags pa med pa'am gas pa med pa/ gcig tu bsdus nas/ bsdus te bsdongs nas/ sems gnyis phrad ba med pa/ 
<p>95b.3</p>nirbi she ShaH/ bya sa nama?/ duSh+ka ra kA ra kaH/ duSh+ka ra tsar+YA/ ki yats+tsi raM tsa ri tama?/ na tsI rA yi ta kA yaH/ a gA ra ma d+h+yA ba saM/ nA mo pa de she na/ nA ma d+he ya ma nu bi tarki taM/ i ma mar+tha ba shaM sam+ba sh+ya mA naH/ 
<p>95b.4</p>bye brag med pa'am khyad par med pa/ zhugs pa'am zhen pa'am phongs pa'am nyon mongs pa/ dka' ba byed pa/ dka' ba spyad pa/ yun ji srid nas spyad/ lus ma dral ba'am ma gshegs pa/ khyim na gnas shing / ming bstan pas/ ming rjes su brtags pa/ don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/ cung
<p>95b.5</p>a kiM tsit+sa mar+thaH/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA pra ti bar+N+Ni kaH/ shra ma Na pra ti rU pa kaH/ mArga pra ti rU pa kaH/ ro ma haR+ShaH/ nir ba ya baH/ tsit+tAn+ta rama?/ a de shas+thaH/ a pra de shas+thaH/ a ba Tu pra tsA raH/ ni ran+ta ram/ kA rit+t+rama?/ 
<p>95b.6</p>zad kyang mi nus sam ci yang mi nus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa/ dge spyod ltar btsos pa/ lam ltar bcos pa/ spu zing zhes byed pa/ cha med ba/ sems gzhan/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas/ spyod pa mi gsal ba/ bar chad med pa/ byed pa/ 
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>a bi nA b+hA baH/ puSh+ka lama?/ piM pama?/ sha ka li kaH/ pa rit+ta sha ka li gA g+niH/ ut+l+lu b+h+ya/ saM dz+nyA ga taH/ nAm+nA ya te/ A liM gi taH/ a ba lam+b+ha nama?/ ung+ku nu kA sa nama?/ med+h+yaH/ pa ta ti/ 
<p>96a.2</p>med par mi 'byung ba/ rgyas pa'am rdzogs pa/ gzugs/ dum bu'am zhogs ma/ spur ma'i me chung ngu / rgal ba'am mchongs/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa/ ma brjod ba'am mi 'byung / 'khyud pa/ 'jungs pa sbyangs pa/ tsog tsog por 'dug /gtsang ma/ ltung / 
<p>96a.3</p>bi sha ti/ mU D+haH/ ba ri b+hA bi taH/ ta ru Na bra NaH/ tri kAN+Da kaM /sA ha tsar+Ya mra/ A b+hi prA yig/ A bi lama?/ shAb+di kaH/ kA ra Na sro taH/ b+hin+na kra maH/ kr-i tA ba d+hiH/ pra ba ti taH/ mAb+haiSh+Ta/ abika laH/ pA ra
<p>96a.4</p>'jug /rmongs pa'am rmong ba/ bsgres pa'am spags pa/ rma sar pa/ dum bu gsum pa/ lhan cig spyod pa/ dgongs pa'i/ rnyog pa/ sgral mkhas pa/ rgyu'i rgyun/ rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba/ mtshams bcad/ rdeg 'chos ba'am lhung ba/ ma 'jigs zhig /mtshang med pa/ gcig nas/ 
<p>96a.5</p>m+par+Ya Na/ da ma thaH/ par+YA ban+naH/ pa la me kaM /ar+d+ha ba laM/ saM sli Sh+ya mA NaH/ pA dau naHkro shaH/ e ka t+yaH/ sa p+tAng+ga su pra tiSh+Thi TaH/ an+tarmu kha pra pr-it+t-ima?/ pra sA ri taH/ saM kuny+tsa nama?/ d+hA tu sha tama?/ i dan+ta be daM ma me ti/ b+hauH he reH/ 
<p>96a.6</p>gcig tu zhe'am brgyud pa/ dul ba'i gnas/ gtogs pa/ srang cig /srang phyed/ 'byar ba/ rgyang grags kyi gzhi char med pa/ kha cig gam la la/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ nang du blta ba/ brkyang ba/ bskum ba/ tshon sna brgya/ 'di ni khyod kyi 'di ni nga'i zhes/ kye/ 
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>a re/ ma b+hU ya e baM ka ri Sh+ya tha/ e kad+d+h+yam b+hi saM k+Shi pya/ A kaR+Sha ya ti/ pa rA kaR+Sha ya ti/ su dzuSh+TaH/ a be k+Sha bAna?/ sa ha b+ha bya tA/ sA mi ShA/ ni rA mi ShA/ A mi ShA/ u pa yAn+ti/ k+ShI raM s+yaM da ti/ ut+saM gaH
<p>96b.2</p>kwa'i/ phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /gcig tu bsdus te/ tshur 'dren/ phar 'dren/ shin tu bstan/ lta ba dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang bcas pa'am skal ba mnyam ba/ zang zing dang bcas pa/ zang zing med pa/ zang zing ngam sha'am zas/ 'bab bam nye bar 'gro/ 'o ma 'dzag /pang pa/ 
<p>96b.3</p>saM grA maH/ bi grA haH/ pa ri ShaN+DaH/ marka Ta dzA lama?/ o tsa kaH/ uts+tshu Sh+ya te/ a pa dIR+Yan+te/ san+ni d+hi kA raH/ kaR+ShaH/ dro NaM/ ni k+Ship+te pA de a ba na ma ti/ ut+k+Shi p+te bA de un+na ma ti/ iSh+Ta kaH/ mnad man+t+ra e bA b+hUta?/ pa ra maH/ gu ru kaH/ a t+ya r+thama?
<p>96b.4</p>g.yul/ lus sam tshig sbyor ba/ bang rim/ bang rgya/ bsdus pa/ skam par 'gyur/ gzhom pa'am dral ba/ sogs pa/ zho/ bre bo/ rkang pa bzhag na ne ma zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na spar zhes byed/ so phag /brjod pa nyung bar gyur/ lhur len pa/ gdu ba/ shin tu te por rab
<p>96b.5</p>b+h+r-i sama?/ bA Tama?/ d+yu tiH/ d+hAriH/ pa ri marda naM/ sam+bA ha nam sna ba nama?/ ut+sa da nama?/ ni rA ma gan+d+haM/ pa dma?/ sam+ba da nama?/ sam+mA rdza nama?/ pra t+yung+ga mnaM/ pra t+yung+ga mya/ dwi dzaH/ 
<p>96b.6</p>tu/ dam pa'am drag pa'am sra ba'am te por ram tshabs che ba/ snang ba'am 'od/ 'chang ba'am 'dzin pa/ mnye ba/ bkru ba/ dril ba/ dring ba med pa'am dri bshul ba med pa/ tshig gam go 'phang ngam gnas sam gom ba/ tsham du 'bebs ba/ phyag pa/ bsu/ bsu nas/ bya'am bram
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>brgaH/ gu h+yama?/ ra ha s+yam/ sa ma yo\u0f85s+ya ni be shan d+harma kar+t+taM/ bat+sa laH/ bra ti rU paH/ gr-i hAM ga NaH/ ba Da
<p>97a.2</p>ze/ sde'am chan/ gsang ba/ gsang chen/ 'di'i khyim dbub pa'i dus la bab/ byams pa'am sdug par sems pa'am mnyes gshin pa/ thab rir bab pa'am 'tsham pa/ lha khang dam mchod rten gyi skabs su ni ang ga na 'khor sa'am nye 'khor du gdags khyim gyi dgar/ 
<p>97a.3</p>bA mu khaMH/ ku la shulkaM/ /rash+miHpra gra haH/ a ba mUr+b+ha kA/ pAta kI/ br-i shalI/ li bi phal kaH/ ni mit+taM/ ta paspI/ dusas ma ti kra maH/ ba Di shaH/ ud+d+hig+na mA na saH/ saM be gaH/ nirbitra/ 
<p>97a.4</p>rgya mtsho'i klong gi grong gi sgo'am rta rgod ma'i kha/ gnyod/ srab skyogs/ spyi'u tshugs/ sdig to can/ dmangs mo/ mi ge shing / mtshan ma'am ltas/ dka' thub can nam nyon mongs pa/ rgal dka' ba'am 'da' bar dka' ba/ mchil ba/ yid 'byung ba'am skyo ba/ kun du skyo ba/ yid 'byung ba/ 
<p>97a.5</p>udwe gaH/ pa ri khe daH/ na pa ri ta s+ya ti/ hre pa NaM pra skan+d+haH/ saM stu taH/ k+Shub+b+haH/ lu Di taH/ r-i tu pa ri bar+t+taH/ na biSh+Thi ra Na ti na biSh+Thi ha ti/ a ba ra mA tra ka pra sA daH/ a be t+ya pra sA
<p>97a.6</p>skyo ba/ yongs su skyo ba'am mi dga' ba/ yongs su yi mi chad pa/ ngo tsha ba/ 'jug pa'am 'gro ba'am skem pa/ 'dris pa/ 'khrug ba/ dkrugs pa'am glongs pa/ dus 'gyur/ mi 'gyur ram mi thogs sam mi sdod dam rgyun mi 'chad pa/ ngan ngon tsam gyis dad pa/ shes nas dad
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>daH/ a b+he d+ya pra sA daH/ sI mA bad+d+haH/ ma nonyanu kU lama?/ ma na A paH/ ka l+yA Na mi trA rA ga NaH/ dak+Shi NI yaH/ mi th+yA twa ni ya taH/ sam+p+ra haR+Shamra/ san+to Sha ya ti/ sa mA dA pa ya ti/ sa mu te
<p>97b.2</p>pa/ dad pa mi phyed pa/ mtshams bcad pa/ yid dang 'thad pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar bya ba/ sbyin gnas/ log pa nyid du nges pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ yang dag par
<p>97b.3</p>tshim par byed pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug gam byed du 'jug /yang dag par dza nama?/ sany+tsod nama?/ ro ma kU paH/ many+dza rI/ bi tsi taH/ nish+tsi taH/ pra sa ri taH/ bi shuSh+TaHbi khyA taH/ sa mu dA ga maH/ sa mu dA ga taH/ 
<p>97b.4</p>gzengs bstod/ yang dag par bskul/ ba spu'i khung bu/ snye ma'am dog pa/ bdams pa'am btus pa'am brtags pa'am rnam par phye ba/ bsags pa/ mchod pa'am khebs pa'am rgyas pa/ rnam par grags pa/ yang dag par 'grub pa'am 'thob pa/ yang dag par grub pa'am thob pa/ 
<p>97b.5</p>lo ka bi b+ha baH/ lo ka sam+b+ha baH/ ha byama?/ ka byaM/ saM kuT+Ta kaH/ k+Shi pra ta ram/ be gaH/ ta ra sA/ A shu/ shI g+h+rama?/ dza baH/ A k+She paH/ A be d+haH/ 
<p>97b.6</p>'jig rten 'jig pa/ 'jig rten 'byung ba/ lha la gtor ba/ mtshun la gtor ba/ brdung ba/ ches myur ba'am ches mgyogs pa/ shugs sam mgyogs pa/ shugs kyis sam mgyogs pa/ myur ba/ myur pa/ mgyogs pa/ shugs sam 'phen pa/ shugs sam 'phen pa/ 
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>pra sa b+haM/ Am+nA taH/ goSh+ThI/ pa ri tsa yaH/ gran+thaH/ la lA maH/ an+ti ma mA tri grA ma b+hA baH/ A NI bra t+yA NI ni r+hA ra yo ge na/ shU raH/ 
<p>98a.2</p>nan gyis sam ngo mthon/ grags ba'am brjod pa/ dge 'dun nam tshogs zhing 'du ba/ 'dris ba/ mdud pa'am gos/ rgyal mtshan nam grags pa/ bud med kyi lus kyi tha mar gyur pa/ khye'us khye'u 'byung ba'i tshul du/ /bI ra dang ma 'dom na dba' ba 'dom na rtul po dpa' mnyam rtsal che ba/ 
<p>98a.3</p>pa ri s+phu TaM/ A bar+t+ta nama? pa ri bar+t+ta nama?/ bi tsa ra Nama?/ b+hUmyA kra ma Nama?/ b+hU mair+b+hU myAn+ta ra saM kra ma NaM/ bA saM ka lpa ya ti/ a sam+b+hin+naH/ sam+b+hin+naH/ ta lama?/ sa mA d+hi maN+Da
<p>98a.4</p>yongs su rgyas par 'gengs ba'am yongs su khyab/ yongs su bskor ba'am bsgyur ba/ rnam par rgyu ba/ sa gnon pa/ sa nas sa gzhan du 'phar ba/ gnas 'cha'/ ma 'dres ba'am dbyer med pa/ 'dres par ma tha dad ba/ ngos sam steng ngam gzhir ma mthil/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
<p>98a.5</p>lama?/ ka ra ta lama?/ br-i k+Sha ta lama?/ kra ma ta lama?/ b+hU mi ta lama?/ A kA sha ta lama?/ sa man+ta ta lama?/ skad go 'dun la/ ut+sargaH/ a pa bA daH/ sa mu dA yAr+thaH/ tsA tuSh+ko Ti kaH/ praSh+Na ni r+N+Na yaH/ ni br-i tA byA kr-i tAH/ 
<p>98a.6</p>'khor/ lag mthil/ shing drung ngam ljon ba'am 'og /zhabs kyi mthil/ sa'i steng ngam sa'i gzhi/ nam mkha'i dkyil/ kun gyi dkyil/ spyir btang / dmigs kyis bsal ba/ spyi'i don/ mu bzhi'am mtha' bzhi/ dris pa gtan la dbab pa/ bsgribs pa'i lung du mi ston pa/ 
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>a ni pr-i tA byA kr-i tAH/ a b+hi sa ma yAn+ti kaH/ kiM nA nA ka ra NaM/ a sam+p+ra dz+nyA naM/ ni rA swA daH/ kA mA ba tsa raH/ rU bA pa tsa raH/ o mi t+yA ha/ dI baH/ ulkA/ ulkA
<p>98b.2</p>ma bsgribs pa'i lung du mi ston pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba/ tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ shes bzhin ma yin pa/ ro bro ba med pa/ 'dod pa na spyod ba/ gzugs na spyod pa/ de bzhin no zhes smras so zhe'am smras pa de bzhin no/ /mar me/ skar ma'am sgron ma'am tal la/ skang mda'i
<p>98b.3</p>mu khama?/ pra dI paH/ sa mu di taH/ sh+li Shok+tiH/ pra br-id+d+haM/ a b+hi saM b+hot+s+ya te/ bo d+hi ma b+hi sam+bud+d+haH/ a b+hi sam+bud+d+h+ya ti/ bud+d+ha twa ma bA b+no ti/ bi d+yo ti
<p>98b.4</p>gdong ngam sna/ sgron ma'am mar me/ shar ba'am 'dus pa'am spyi/ tshig zur gnyis su sbyar ba/ 'phel ba'am skyes pa/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba/ sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /rnam par snang bar
<p>98b.5</p>taH/ pa ri dz+nyA/ sam+b+ha pa ti/ a sam+b+ha baH/ A kra ma Nama?/ A kra ma ya ti/ a ba kra ma ti/ A ya taH/ pra b+hA ba nA/ bya bas+thA nama?/ bIb+sA/ k+Sha Ni kaH/ A lam+ba te/ 
<p>98b.6</p>byas/ yongs su shes pa/ 'byung ngam srid pa/ mi srid pa'am mi 'byung ba/ gnon pa/ gnon par byed pa/ 'gro ba'am 'jug pa/ yun ring po'am rgya che ba'am yangs pa/ brjod pa/ rab tu phye ba'am rab tu bzhag pa'am rnam par bzhag pa/ zlos pa/ skad cig pa/ grib so babs/ 
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>a d+h+yA lam+b+ha te/ a b+hi pra lam+ba te/ kr-it+t+r-i mama?/ sup+taH/ pra ro da nama?/ a d+ha raH/ sha y+YA/ A san+diH/ A bA shra yaM/ kha T+wAng+gaH/ mung+ga raH/ bra to daH/ pra t+ya graH/ pU ti pI dza ma?/ A
<p>99a.2</p>grib so cher babs/ grib so mngon par rab tu babs pa/ bcos ma/ nyal ba'am gnyid log pa/ du ba/ 'og ma/ mal/ khri'u/ rgyab rten/ khri shing / tho ba/ gzugs ba btsugs pa gdab ba/ sar ba'am khye'u tshang / sa bon rul pa/ glo bur du
<p>99a.3</p>gan+tu kaH/ luny+tsa te/ kr-i shaH/ sa ma ba d+hA nama?/ bishwa kar+m+mA/ An+wA hiN+Da yi twA/ a karmA ra kr-i tra/ pA Ta nama?/ ku TA ya ti/ bi ta ta ba li kA/ bra ti bub+dzi taH/ a b+hi rU TaH/ 
<p>99a.4</p>'ongs sam glo skyes sam thor bu/ 'bal lam thog /skem pa/ 'grogs pa pa'am phrad pa/ las sna tshogs can nam bzo sna tshogs can/ bskor nas/ mkhan bzos ma byas pa/ gzal ba'am bkas ba/ brdungs ba'am 'thub pa/ gnyer ma rangs/ bskor ba'am gang ba/ 'dzegs sam zhon/ 
<p>99a.5</p>pa ri Sh+yan+daH/ pra mA das+thA nama? k+Ship+ta tsit+toH/ un+mu kha dzA taH/ un+mA daH/ bi hwa lI b+hU taH/ sAM ka raH/ d+har+m+ma bya sa na sam+par+t+ta nI ya/ bi Sha mA ba ri hA raH/ a ba mA na naM mA na naM/ dzi dz+nyA sA/ bi Da m+ba nA
<p>99a.6</p>brlan pa'am gsher ba/ bag med pa'i gnas/ sems khral khrul du gyur ba/ han tang gis btab pa'am blong bar gyur ba/ myos pa/ rmugs shes song ba'am blong ba/ 'dres pa/ chos kyis 'phongs bar 'gyur ba/ yang ba mi spongs pa/ brnyas pa'am khyad du gsod pa/ sad pa'am bgam pa/ co 'dri ba/ 
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>byA DaH/ a bi d+yAN+Da ko Sha pa Ta laM/ duHkhAM tI brAM kha rAM ka Tu kAM/ nA da ti/ mI TaHbi TaH/ prag+g+ha ra ti/ ki yan+taH/ lU naH/ khA NuH/ dzi bu sA hwa yaH/ ud+dA yA daH/ d+harmA lo ka mu
<p>99b.2</p>ma rungs pa'am gdug ba'am sbrul/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i spubs kyi sgrib pa/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba/ grag ba'am sgra 'byin pa/ mi gtsang ba'am phyis/ rab tu zag /ji snyed dam ji tsam/ brdas/ bcad 'phro'am khyi'u kha/ 'dzam bu zhes bya ba/ rabs chad pa/ chos snang ba'i
<p>99b.3</p>khaM/ brah+ma pa tha ko bi daH/ lak+Sh+yaM/ lak+Sha NaM/ kA ra Ne kA r+Yo pa tsA raH/ kA r+Ye kA ra No pa tsA raH/ u pa pat+ti pra ti lam+b+hi kaH/ d+har+m+ma tA pra ti lam+b+haH/ d+har+m+ma tA pra ti lA b+hi kaM /bi d+hA nama?/ sA khi l+yaM/ pra t+ya yi taH/ a bra byA
<p>99b.4</p>sgo/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi/ mtshan nyid/ rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa/ 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa/ skye bas thob pa/ chos nyid kyis thob pa/ chos nyid kyis rnyed pa/ gcad pa'am dgag pa/ bshes pa'i tshig /yid ches pa'am yid brtan pa/ shin tu brjod
<p>99b.5</p>hA raH/ s+tha lam/ d+ha n+wa ni/ ra Na shauN+DaH/ di na ka raH/ a d+yA lam+b+ha nama?/ sA k+Shi bya ba diSh+TA/ sA k+Shi pr-iSh+Ta smAna?/ a dzi nama?/ a nA swa stAM sa twa nA shwA sa ye maH/ br-i thi byA ma pa
<p>99b.6</p>tu med pa/ thang ngam skam/ skam la'am thang la/ g.yul ngor 'dor ba'am brtul ba/ nyi ma'am nyin byed/ lhag par dmigs pa/ dbang por phul ba/ dbang por 'dris pa'am che bzhi rmas ba/ g.yang gzhi'am pags ba/ sems can dbugs ma byung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ngo / /sa la mi ltung
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>ta nA ya/ A gA Ti ka ri Sh+ya ti/ na ba yA na sam+p+ra s+thi taH/ stU paHtsai t+yama?/ tsai t+yAng+ga NaH/ ba suH/ tsa ra ma b+ha bi kaH /ni kA ya sa b+hA ga s+yA be d+haH/ u pa bA saH/ A hA re pra ti kU la saM dz+nyA/ sarba lo
<p>100a.2</p>bar bya ba'i phyir/ dam por byed pa'am sra bar byed pa/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa/ mchod rten/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa/ dbyig gam nor/ srid pa tha ma pa/ ris mthun par 'phen pa/ za gcig gam smyung ba/ zas la mi 'phrod pa'i 'du shes/ 'jig rten
<p>100a.3</p>ke a na b+hi ra ti saM dz+nyA/ si k+ShA pa dma?/ shI lama?/ sam+ba raH/ d+hu ta gu NaH/ saM le khaH/ saM ya maH/ a ya spra pA Ti kaH/ sh+yA mi kaH/ yuk+taiHpad byany+dza naiH/ sa hi taiH/ A nu lo mi kaiH/ A nuts+tsha bi kaiH/ au
<p>100a.4</p>thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes/ bslab ba'i gzhi/ tshul khrims sam ngang tshul/ sdom pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan/ yo byad bsnyungs pa/ yang dag par sdom pa/ lcags kyi tsha tsha/ g.ya'/ tshig 'bru 'byor pa/ 'brel pa/ rjes su mthun pa/ rjes su 'phrod pa/ thabs
<p>100a.5</p>pa yi kaiH/ pra ti rU paiH/ pra dak+Shi NaiH/ ni pa ka s+yAng+ga sam+b+hA raiH/ nA ti dzalpeta?s/ nA ti sa retra/ e ba mA r+YA NAM man+t+ra NA/ lab+h+yA mi th+yA dr-iSh+TiH pra hA tuM/ mA pung+ga laHpung+ga lam+p+ra mi no tu/ pung+ga
<p>100a.6</p>dang ldan pa/ 'tsham pa/ mthun pa/ 'grus skyong gi yan lag gi tshogs/ ha cang smra ba mang du mi bya/ ha cang 'phro bar mi byed/ de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi smra ba'am 'gro ba'am brjod pa/ log bar lta ba spong bar nus pa'am spang par rung ba/ gang zag gis gang zag la tshod ma gzung
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>le bA mA pra mA Na mung+g+r-ih+nA tuH/ k+Sha N+ya tai/ pa rA mr-iSh+TaH/ a pa rA mr-iSh+TaH/ a b+h+ya ba hA raHka ba laH/ a tAR+ShI ts+tsakuShuHsa mu draM/ sau rmi kaM /sA bar+t+taM/ sa grA haM/ sa ma yA pA
<p>100b.2</p>zhig/ /gang zag la tshad kyang ma 'dzin cig /nyams par 'gyur/ phyis pa'am nogs pa/ ma 'bags pa'am ma phyis pa'am ma nogs pa/ m+za' ba'am mid pa'am bdeg pa/ kham des mig gi rgya mtsho las rgal/ dba' rlabs dang bcas pa/ glong dang bcas pa/ 'dzin khri dang bcas ba/ pho ba'i drod
<p>100b.3</p>tsan+yA gra ha N+yA sa man+bA ga taH/ a si ta pI ta khA di tA swA di tA nis+samyak+Shu khe na pa ri pA kaM gats+tsha ti/ nA d+hi bA sa ya ti/ byan+tI b+ha pa ti/ a byan+tI kr-i ta na byan+tI ka ro ti/ na de sha ya ti/ kA ya s+ya b+he dAtra/ ban+b+h+yaH/ 
<p>100b.4</p>snyoms shing 'ju bar byed pa dang ldan pa/ zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju/ dang du mi len/ mthar byed pa'am byang bar 'gyur/ byang bar ma byas pa byang bar mi byed/ mi 'chags/ lus zhig nas/ 'bras bu med pa'am myig long ba'am
<p>100b.5</p>i Shi kA mA pi tA b+ha ban+ti/ su ni khA tA/ A rAtra/ da bI yatra/ su kha s+yA d+hA raH/ a t+ya yaH/ swa bA hu ba lo pArdzi tama?/ swe da ma lA bak+Ship+taH/ d+h+r-i tiH/ b+haT+TA ra kaH/ d+har+m+ma paT+TA ba bad+d+haH/ 
<p>100b.6</p>mo sham/ shing btags btsugs/ ring du brkos pa/ ring ba'am thung bskabs dang sbyar/ shin tu ring ba/ bde ba'i gzhi/ 'das pa'am nyes pa/ bdag gis lag mthus bsgrubs pa/ rdul cing dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa/ mos pa'am brtan pa/ rje btsun/ chos kyi cod pan bcings pa/ 
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>sA mut+kaR+Shi kaH/ kA ma d+he nu/ ru tsi raH/ ba hu ka raH/ ka l+ya tA/ yaSh+TiH/ yU paH/ u pA dA na he tuH/ bra d+hA na he tuH/ sa ha kA ri pra t+ya yaH/ a pak+ShA laH/ dauSh+p+ra dz+nyA/ dauH shI l+yaM/ 
<p>101a.2</p>yang dag phul/ 'dod bzho/ mdzes pa'am 'od chags pa/ gces spras byed pa/ nyams bde ba/ srog shing ngam yu ba/ mchod sdong / len ba'i rgyu/ rgyu'i gtso bo/ grogs byed pa'i rkyen/ skyon/ 'chal ba'i shes rab/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims/ 
<p>101a.3</p>mu suN+Di kA/ sA rU pyaM/ a n+ya tra/ tsA ri traM/ A tsa raM/ sa pan+nI/ tsit+ta tsa ri taM/ tr-i b+taH/ tsi ra tr-i ShArtaH/ pa rA kra maH/ ma n+ya nA/ sha l+ya ma?/ ba Than+ti/ bi d+hu raH/ myu khyA/ 
<p>101a.4</p>khu tshur/ tshul dang 'dra ba/ gzhan du'am ma gtogs pa/ spyod pa/ cho ga /'gran zla/ sems kyi spyod pa/ ngoms/ yun ring po nas skom pas gdungs/ pha rol gnon pa'am brtul ba/ rlom sems/ zug rngu/ 'don pa'am brjod pa/ 'gal ba'am ma tshang ba/ gtso bo'am dang po/ 
<p>101a.5</p>gau NaH/ au pa tsA ri kaH/ au pa tsa yi kaH/ pa ri b+hA ShA/ bra ti kr-i ti/ but+ta liH/ bal+mI kaH/ sa mA brdza nama?/ d+har+m+ma shAs+t+raM/ a pye ka t+ya/ A bid+d+haH A k+Ship+taH/ bA la dzA tI yaH/ ma n+yuH/ gan+d+ha yuk+tiH/ 
<p>101a.6</p>btags pa'am phal ba/ nye ba btags pa/ rgyas pa las byung ba/ 'thams pa'am spyo ba/ gzugs brnyan/ gzugs su byas pa/ grog mkhar/ 'dun par bya ba/ chos khrims/ 'on kyang kha cig ni/ 'phangs pa/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ khro ba'am brtse ba/ spos sbyar ba/
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>kr-iShi kar+m+mAn+taH/ sU tsi karmA/ mr-i ta gr-i haM/ ka Ta sI/ gartA/ ts+tshi traM/ ha rita shA dwa laM/ pu li naH/ uts+tshiSh+TaH/ s+tha ba raH/ ji ga maH/ ya thA kra mama?/ ma d+hUts+tshiSh+TaH/ sik+tha kama?/ a d+h+yA sha yaH/ A sha yaH/ A shA/ A
<p>101b.2</p>zhing blas/ 'drubs su bya ba'am skud ris/ chad pa/ dur khrod/ khung ngam dong / bu ga /ne'u bsing / gling ma/ lhag ma/ gnas pa'am brtan po/ 'gro ba/ go rims bzhin/ sbrang rtsi'i tshig ma'am pra tshil/ bra tshil/ lhag pa'i bsam pa/ bsam pa/ re ba/ bsam
<p>101b.3</p>shA ya taH/ a b+hi pre taM/ AR+Sha b+has+thA naM pra ti dzA nI te/ mang+gu b+hU taH/ prasta skan+d+haH/ niSh+Tha ti b+hA naM/ a d+ho mu khaH/ pra d+h+yAn pa raH/ pAN+Da kam+pa la shi lA ta lama?/ A khyA naM/ pu rA NaM/ phu rA NaM/ i
<p>101b.4</p>pa thag pa nas/ bsam pa'am 'dod pa/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' 'am zhal gyis 'ches pa/ spa gong ngam yul yul bur gyur ba/ phrag pa bcum/ spobs pa med pa/ mgo smad pa/ sems khong du chud pa/ ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/ gtam rgyud/ gna'i rabs/ de lta
<p>101b.5</p>ti hA saH/ hA s+yaM/ lA s+yaM/ bi kan+thA naM/ bar+N+Na bA shI/ maN+Da taM/ la Di taM/ u pau Sha d+haH/ ni kU dza ya ti/ d+hA tu pa ti taH/ su pa ri d+ha rdzi tA/ ud+d+h+r-i taM/ pa ri hA NiH/ saM
<p>101b.6</p>bu byung bar brjod pa/ bzhad gad/ 'jo'am sgeg pa/ spyoms pa'am smod pa/ dor ba/ cha ba'am bzhag pa/ sgeg pa'am rol pa'am mdzes pa/ nye bar gso sbyong byed pa/ skad 'byin/ khams su gtogs pa/ legs par brngos pa/ btus sam phyung ngam bcus pa/ yongs su nyams pa/ bsdams
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>pr-i tama?/ bI dzaM bA pa ya ti/ bi Shama?/ hA lA ha laM/ pra t+yA pa rAr+thaH/ ga No nA sa ma ti kran+taH/ sa mu dra tI rI ya kA nAM/ u pa lama?/ a k+Sha mA trA b+hir+d+hA rA b+hiH/ pr-i tha g+dzA naH/ gar+b+hA ba krAn+ti/ 
<p>102a.2</p>ba'am sbas pa/ sa bon 'debs su 'jug /dug /dug ha la ha la/ yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs na gnas pa rnams kyi/ rdo ba/ shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi rgyun/ so so'i skye bo/ mngal lam lhums sam rum du 'jug
<p>102a.3</p>su kha saM spaR+shaH/ nA nA byA d+hi pa ri ga taM/ na lal+lau b+ha ba ti/ daN+DaH/ ma hi kA/ nI hA raH/ dza lam+bi gA h+ya/ kwa thi tama?/ kwa tha yi twA/ a b+hi bisma yaH/ ad+b+hu taM/ /bya pa kr-iSh+TaH/ a
<p>102a.4</p>pa/ reg na bde ba/ nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ dig pa'am ldib par mi 'gyur/ dbyug pa'am chad pa/ na bun rmug pa/ khugs rna/ chu 'bogs te/ bskol ba'am bsdus pa/ bskol te/ ya mtshan che/ rmad du byung ba/ ngo mtshar/ 'du 'dzi med pa'am dben pa/ mi
<p>102a.5</p>na ba kr-iSh+TaH/ kA l+ya me ba/ a ra NiH/ ma tha naH/ At+mo pa kra maH/ pra skan+naHsu khal+li kA/ u d+yo dzi taH/ ka TA k+ShaH/ ni kr-in+tan+ti/ b+hai ra bama?/ b+ho gaH/ pha NA/ 
<p>102a.6</p>dben pa'am 'du 'dzi can/ nang par kho na'am nang bar sngar/ gtsub shing / btsubs ba'am bsrubs pa/ bdag la gnod pa/ rab tu zhugs pa'am bying ba bsod nyams/ char bcug gam byed du bcug /mig zur/ gcod pa/ 'jigs 'jigs lta/ sbrul gyi lus bskyil ba/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka/ 
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>ko Ta raH/ ya ba saH/ ba th+ya da nama?/ nir+b+han+si taH/ bi dzIM b+ha NaH/ kAN+Da na ma hIn+d+hi li kha ti/ durdi naM/ paN+yama?/ do ha naH/ bi hA ya sA/ arbAbra/ /A bi laH/ a d+hi pa te yaH/ saM
<p>102b.2</p>khong stong / rtsa/ lam rgyags/ spyos ba'am brgyad pa'am tshar bcad pa/ bya rmyangs sam bsgyings pa'am glal/ mdas sa rko/ yul ngan nam rmus pa/ tshang zong / bzho bzho pa/ nam mkha'/ tshu rol lam tshun chad/ skyon nam rnyog pa/ dbang du 'gyur ba'am dbang du bya ba/ tshogs
<p>102b.3</p>b+h+ya/ a saM b+h+ya/ sa mA sa taH/ saM k+She pa taH/ par+Ya nu yo gaH/ kAr+Ya mra/ kA ra Nama?/ he yo bA de yama?/ ut+mi ShaH/ ni mi ShaH/ ki ta baH/ ke ta bama?/ kA ra NI yama?/ a kA ra NI yama?/ bar+d+ha te/ bai mA tra ma ni sta
<p>102b.4</p>bar dbyung / tshogs bar mi dbyung ba/ mdor bsdu na/ mdor na/ brgal zhing brtag pa/ 'bras bu'am bya ba/ rgyu'am byed pa/ blang ba dang dor ba/ phye ba/ btsum pa/ rgyan 'gyed pa/ rgyan la rtseg pa/ bya ba/ bya ba ma yin pa/ 'phel ba/ bye brag gam rim pa zin ba'am mthar phyin pa'am nges
<p>102b.5</p>raH/ dur b+hi saM b+ha baH/ su mu dA na ya naM/ a rdza nama?/ d+hU raH/ a ni ke taH/ u pa ro d+ha bA saH/ a br-i Ta shA l+yama?/ san+d+hu k+Sh+Nama?/ iny+dzi tama?/ gyan+di tama?/ sa muts+tsh+ra yaH/ sa muts+tsh+ri taH/ ni k+She paH/ 
<p>102b.6</p>bar brgal ba/ 'byung bar dka' ba/ sgrub pa'am sbyar ba/ sgrub pa/ brtson ba'am gces pa/ gnas med pa/ bskor te 'dug ba'am gzung ste 'dug pa/ zug rngu byung ba/ me sbar ba/ g.yo ba/ g.yos pa/ lus sam mtho ba/ bsgreng ngam btsug pa/ bzhag pa'am gtams pa/ zhig
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>lup+taH prAn+taH/ be da nA d+h+yA pa ya ti/ san+ni shri taH/ pra h+lA daH/ ba lA d+hA na ma?/ A kA k+ShaM mA NaH/ uts+tsha li taH/ bya yaH/ bi ni bad+d+haH/ bi Tha pa na pra t+yu pa s+thA na lak+Sha NaM/ 
<p>103a.2</p>ba'am mi snang ba/ mtha'/ rig byed klog tu 'jug /gnas pa'am brten pa/ rab tu sim pa/ stobs skyed pa/ 'dod na/ bskyod pa'am 'phags pa/ zad pa'am god ba'am 'jig pa/ 'brel ba/ rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid/ 
<p>103a.3</p>m+lA nama?/ shIr+NaH/ a bya ba kIr+N+NaM/ sA ba d+yama?/ a na ba d+yaM/ nirga taH/ bra b+h+raSh+TaH/ pra d+h+yA yan+taH/ dak+Sho mA yA kA ro mA yA kA rAn+te bA sI bA/ pra bar+t+ta kaM /a nu bar+t+ta kaM saM ro d+haH/ 
<p>103a.4</p>rnyis pa/ dengs pa'am rnyis pa'am lhag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ kha na ma thob dang bcas pa/ kha na ma tho ba med/ byung / lhung ba'am bo ba/ sems ba'am sems khong du chud pa/ sgyu ma byed pa'am sgyu ma byed pa'i slob ma mkhas pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ rjes su 'jug pa/ yongs su 'gog
<p>103a.5</p>bi kan+thi taM/ ling+gaM/ bra ti k+She pa Na sA ba d+yaM/ ni rA ka ra NaM/ kA ri traM/ tseSh+Ti taM/ dr-ig+g+he yaM/ b+hA ba nA he yaM/ a s+yAM/ A s+yaM/ pa TuH/ prAp+t+ya nu Shang+gaH/ pu N+yA b+hi Sh+yan+daH/ 
<p>103a.6</p>pa/ rnam par brjod pa/ mtshan nam rtags/ bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa/ bzlog pa'am bshig pa/ byed pa/ g.yos pa'am spyod pa'i tshul/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba/ sgom pas spang bar bya ba/ gnas/ kha/ sgrin po/ 'thob pa dang 'brel ba/ bsod nams rgyun byas/ 
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>A dz+nyA tsit+te na/ sarba tse ta sA man+tsA hri t+ya/ pra ti bra tA/ sa ta ta sa mi taM/ kle sha ba hu laH/ tA bra rA gaH/ tI pra dwe ShaH/ tI bra mo haH/ dI naH/ 
<p>103b.2</p>shes par bya bar sems pa/ sems kun gyis bsams te/ khyim thab las mi 'phro ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa/ nyon mongs pa che ba'am mang ba/ 'dod chags che ba'am bdo ba/ zhe sdang bdo ba'am zhe sdang shas che ba/ gti mug bdo ba'am shas che ba'am mi bzad pa'am tsha ba/ zhan pa/ 
<p>103b.3</p>hI naH/ lI naH/ bi ShA daH/ a ba sA da mA pa d+ya te/ bi ShaN+Na ma na saH/ tsit+ta nA ba lI ya te na saM lI ya te/ na bi pr-iSh+ThI b+ha ba ti a s+ya mA na saM/ e Sha NA/ Sha NA/ a n+we Sha NA/ sa ma n+we Sha NA/ mr-i ga ya te/ 
<p>103b.4</p>dman pa'am ngan pa/ zhum pa/ yi bsad/ spa bkod bar 'gyur zhe'am yi bsad par 'gyur/ yi bsad pa'am sgyid lug pa/ sems mi zhum kun nas mi zhum/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ tshol ba/ yongs su tshol ba/ rjes su tshol ba/ kun du rjes su tshol ba/ tshol/ 
<p>103b.5</p>bra t+ya nu b+ha ba ti/ be da ya ti/ saM be da ya ti/ pra ti saM be da ya ti/ ni t+yaH/ d+h+ru baH/ shA shwa taH/ a bi ba ri NA ma d+harmA/ kUT s+thA/ a ba kalpa nA/ sam+b+hA ba nA/ tse ta saH bra sA daH/ ats+tshaH/ bi pra san+naH/ 
<p>103b.6</p>so sor myong bar 'gyur/ myong bar 'gyur/ kun du myong bar 'gyur/ kun du so sor myong bar 'gyur/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ ther zug /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can/ ther zug tu gnas pa/ nges par rtog pa'am lags par rtog pa/ srid pa/ sems dang ba/ dang ba/ rnam par dang ba/ 
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>swats+tshaH/ pra san+naH/ a nA bi laH/ a nA ra tA/ a bi ra tA/ a pra ti bi ra tA/ a nu pa ra tA/ kun+taM/ pra t+ya yaH/ A ka raH/ ni d+hA naM/ d+ha naM/ dra byaM/ d+har+m+mi kI k+Shi ti ma nu pra dA s+yA maH/ ni g+ha/ A dI na baH/ 
<p>104a.2</p>shin tu dang ba/ dang ba'am gsal ba/ rnyog pa med pa/ mi spong ba/ ma spangs pa/ phyis kyang mi spong ba/ mi 'dor ba/ dpya/ dpya bla skyes/ 'byung khungs sam 'byung gnas/ gter/ nor/ rdzas/ chos bzhin du khwa'am cha 'bul/ sdig pa/ nyes dmigs/ 
<p>104a.3</p>kilbi ShaM/ a pa rA d+haH/ bA lol+lA pa nama?/ mr-i ShA mo Sha d+har+m+mi NaH/ bi pa ri Na taM/ rik+taH/ tuts+tshaH/ ba shi kaH/ a sA raH/ ni rI hA/ nish+tseSh+TaH/ baM kaH/ bak+k+raH/ dzi h+maH/ ku
<p>104a.4</p>sdig pa'am gdug pa/ nyes pa/ byis pa brid pa/ brdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can/ rnam par myur/ gsog /gsob/ ya ma rla/ snying po med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ /yon po/ ya yo ma 'dom na yon po/ 'gras 'grus sam gya gyu'am ya yo'am g.yon can/ gya
<p>104a.5</p>Ti laH/ tsak+k+ri kaH/ /ku sr-i tiH/ dzi g+han+si taH/ pi pA si taH/ ku prA ba ra NaH/ ku tse laH/ kr-i pa NaH/ ba nIR+Ya kaH/ artaH/ d+ha ni ka b+ha ya b+hI ta yaH/ kla ma thaH/ kla maH/ garbi
<p>104a.6</p>gyu can/ thabs su sbyar ba'am g.yor bskyims ba'am sbyor ka byed pa/ ngan g.yo/ bkres pa/ skom pa/ bgo ba ngan pa/ gso ngan pa/ bkren pa/ sdug phongs pa/ nyam thag pa/ bu lon pas 'jigs shing skrag pa/ snyom pa'am dub pa/ ngal ba'am dub pa/ dreg pa'am
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>taH/ staM b+haH/ bispar+d+hA/ bi krI Da mA naH/ sa lI laM/ darbi taH/ mat+taH/ a k+Sha krI DA/ ri raM sA/ krI Da ti/ ra ma ti/ ba ri tsA ra ya ti/ kan+duH/ pra he li kaH/ ga ha naM/ g+ha ni/ a nu pa ha taM/ 
<p>104b.2</p>snyems pa/ khengs pa'am rengs pa/ rnam par 'gran pa/ rnam par rtse ba/ 'jo bag can nam 'chos pa/ rgyags pa'am dregs pa/ myos pa/ cho los rtse ba/ rtse 'dod/ rtse/ dga'/ dga' mgur spyod/ pho long / lde'u'am sku ska/ thibs po/ stug po/ ma nyams pa/ 
<p>104b.3</p>a k+Sha taM/ a tr-ib+taM/ ud+d+hu raH/ sat+pu ru ShaH/ bu ru Sha br-i Sha b+haH/ pu ru Sha pung+ga baH/ ma hA pu ru ShaH/ sAr+tha bA haH/ na kuN+Do b+ha ba ti/ na laM go b+ha ba ti/ na bak+Sha ha to b+ha ba ti/ na bi ka len+d+ri yo b+ha ba ti/ b+ho
<p>104b.4</p>ma smas pa/ mi ngoms pa/ gsal bar byed pa'am brtson pa'am btang ba/ skyes bu dam pa/ skyes bu khyu mchog /skyes bu skyes mchog /skyes bu chen po/ ded dbon/ lag rdum du mi 'gyur/ rkang rdum du mi 'gyur/ gzhogs byed skam bar mi 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ longs

<p>104b.6</p>spyod/ nye bar spyod pa/ yongs su spyod pa 'di rnams dang ma 'dom na longs spyod/ phyug po/ nor che ba'am nor chen po/ nor mang po/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa/ 'byor ba'am phul ba'am gtad pa/ 'byor ba'am ldan pa'am rig pa/ ldan pa/ sdug
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>pe taHduHkha s+yAn+ta ka raH/ par+Ya ba ro d+haH/ Ir+Ya pa thaH/ go tsaraH/ mA ra tsamUH/ kriSh+Na ban+d+huH/ a nu pa ri pA la ya ti/ sA sra ba dz+nyA naM/ a nA sra ba dz+nyA naM/ 
<p>105a.2</p>bsngal mthar 'byin pa'am sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa'am bkag pa/ spyod lam/ spyod yul/ bdud kyi sde/ bdud dam nag po'i rtsa lag /rjes su yongs su skyong / zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa/ zag pa med pa'i shes pa/ 
<p>105a.3</p>bi pat+tiH/ bra dA li tA/ bi ki ra NaM/ bi ga taH/ bi d+h+wan+sa na d+har+m+maH/ b+he da naM/ mA ru taH/ ti thiH/ hu tA sha naHhu ta b+hukra A kA shaM/ ga ga naM khaM/ bai shwA na raH/ a na
<p>105a.4</p>rgyud pa/ rab tu gshegs pa'am btsal ba/ 'thor/ bral ba/ gyes pa'am 'jig pa'i chos can/ 'jig pa/ rlung dmar ram rlung / tshes grangs/ ma 'dom na me 'dom na gcig sreg za/ ma 'dom na nam mkha' 'dom na go 'byed/ nam mkha'/ me/ sa'i ming ste
<p>105a.5</p>laH b+hU ta d+hA trI/ a ni laH/ su dzA taH/ su pa ri Na taH/ a nu dzA taH/ bra sU taH/ a nu shang+gi kaH/ su saM s+thi taH/ he tu kaH/ prA yo gi kaH/ swa ra sa ni ro d+ha/ na ni
<p>105a.6</p>'dom na 'byung po'i rten/ rlung / legs par skyes pa/ legs par smin pa/ rjes su skyes pa'am mthun par skyes pa/ byung ngam btsas sam skyes pa/ zhar la byung ba/ legs par gnas/ rgyu las byung ba/ sbyor ba las byung ba/ rang gi ngang gis 'gag pa/ mi
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>bar+t+ta ya ti/ nir+hA raH/ a b+hi ni rbar+t+ta kaH/ a ba ro bi ta ku sha la mU laH/ pra ti pat+ti sam+pata/ ka Ta sI bar+d+hi tA/ sany+dzA na naM/ sa mu dA na nA
<p>105b.2</p>skye'am mi 'grub/ sgrub pa/ mngon par 'grub par byed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'am bskyed pa/ sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa/ dur khrod bskyed pa/ kun nas sam legs par ram yongs su bskyed ba/ legs par sbyar ba'am legs par bsgrub /pa'am legs
<p>105b.3</p>ya/ b+hA bI/ pa ri kalpa sa muts+tshi taH/ bar+t+ta te/ A sA da naM/ A sA d+ya/ prAb+taH/ ar+pa NA/ byarba NA/ pra b+hA ba
<p>105b.4</p>par bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba'am 'gyur ba/ yongs su rtog pa las byung ba/ 'gyur ro'am 'dug go spyod do/ /thob par byed pa/ brten nas sam phrad nas sam thob nas/ thob pa/ 'bul ba'am gtod pa/ rnam par 'bul lam rnam par gtod/ rab tu byed do'am
<p>105b.5</p>yan+ti/ sa mu dA tsA raH/ pra ti pA da ya ti/ pra ti lab+d+haH/ u pa nA ma ya ti/ br-id+d+haM bi rU D+hiM/ bi pu la tA mA ba d+ya te/ Atsa yaH/ u pa tsa yaH/ A tsi taH/ pUr+Na twaM/ a
<p>105b.6</p>rab tu 'jog go'am rab tu bskyed do/ /kun du 'byung ba/ 'bul lo'am go bar byed do/ /thob pa'am rnyed pa/ 'bul/ 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur/ bsags pa/ rgyas pa'am 'phel ba/ bsags pa/ gang ba'am rdzogs pa/ rgyas
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>nu she ra te/ ut+kaR+ShaH/ u pa br-iM ha ya ti/ bi bar+d+ha naM/ sany+tsi taM/ br-id+d+hi pra sar+pa NaM/ bi sar+pa NaM/ u pa tsi ta ta raM/ tsa yaH/ a pa tsa yaH/ ni
<p>106a.2</p>par 'gyur/ 'phel ba'am skye ba/ 'phel bar byed pa'am rgyas par byed pa/ rnam par 'phel ba/ bsags/ skye ba dang 'phel ba/ 'phel/ cher bsags pa'am shin tu bsags pa/ 'phel ba'am sogs pa/ 'grib pa'am 'bri ba/ nges
<p>106a.3</p>rU pa NA/ nirbi kalpaM a bi kalpaM/ sa bi kalpaM/ yo ni shaH u pa pa rI k+Shi ta byA/ pra rU pa NA/ u pa pa rI k+Shi NAM/ a b+hi ni rU pa NA/ bya ba tsA ra yi ta byA/ u pa ni d+h+yA ta byaH/ ni d+h+yA p+ti/ pra t+ya be
<p>106a.4</p>par rtog pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'am rnam par mi rtog pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa/ tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /rab tu rtog pa/ nye bar rtog pa/ mngon par rtog pa/ rnam par dpyad par bya/ nges par brtag par bya/ nges par sems pa/ so sor
<p>106a.5</p>k+Sha yi ta byaM/ ni d+h+yA ya ti/ a nu gan+ta byaM/ A dz+nyA pa yatra/ saM dz+nyA pa yetra/ ni d+h+yA pa yetra/ U ha nA/ U hA yo ha sa mar+thaH/ u pa lak+Sha NaM/ pre k+Sha te/ ni tI
<p>106a.6</p>brtag par bya/ nges par sems bar byed/ rtog par bya/ kun shes par gyis shig /yang dag par shes par gyis shig /nges par soms shig /brtag pa/ brtag cing bzhig nus pa/ nye bar brtags pa'am nye bar mtshon pa/ lta ba'am rtog pa/ nges par rtog ba'am
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>ra NaM/ bi tsA ra NaM/ sa mo da ha naH/ a n+wo dA ha naM/ pany+tsa skan+d+ha ka pra ka ra NaM/ A b+hi saM k+She pi kaM /A b+h+ya ba kA shi kaM /sa mA dA ni kaM /pa ri kalpi taM/ bai b+hu twi kaM /sAM bya ba hA ri kaM /
<p>106b.2</p>phyi ste rtog pa/ dpyod pa/ legs par rab tu rtog pa/ rjes su rab tu rtog pa/ phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa/ bsdus pa las gyur pa/ mngon par skabs yod pa/ yang dag par blangs pa las byung ba/ kun brtags pa/ dbang 'byor ba/ kun du tha snyad 'dogs pa/ bstan
<p>106b.3</p>shAs+t+rI yAH/ sAr+d+raM sA d+yaM/ a nu b+huM ti/ a nu b+ha ba ti/ bi d+hA naM/ A dr-i ya te/ kha raH/ krU raH/ pa ru ShaM/ rU k+ShaM/ byA pr-i taH/ byut+pan+naH/ byut+pa
<p>106b.4</p>bcos las 'byung ba rnams rlan dang bcas pa/ ljid gnon/ nyams su myong ba/ myong bar byed pa/ sgrub pa'am bzhag pa/ gus par byed pa/ 'khrang ba/ 'thas pa/ rud rud po/ hud hud po/ zhugs pa/ byang ba'am rtogs pa'am shed bye ba/ bye brag tu rtogs par
<p>106b.5</p>t+ti/ pra kr-i tiH/ swa b+hA baH/ swa rU paM/ a nu bi d+hA naM/ pu raH sa raH/ bi na swa raM/ swa tan+t+raH/ a nu s+yu ti/ asmiM sa tI daM b+ha ba ti/ as+yo t+pa dA di da mut+pa d+ya te/ dzA
<p>106b.6</p>byed pa'am bye brag tu sgrub pa/ rang bzhin/ ngo bo nyid dam rang bzhin/ rang gi ngo bo'am rang bzhin/ rjes su byed pa'am rjes su 'jug pa'am rjes su 'gyur ba/ sngon du 'dren pa/ 'jig pa'i ngang can/ rang dbang / rjes su 'brel ba/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye/ rgyal
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>ya ka raH/ ma d+hu ka raH/ sarbAr+tha sA d+ha kaM /ba ri ga NaH/ a d+h+yA si taH/ A tsAm maN+DaH/ ni sha dA shi lA/ ni sha dA bu traH shi lA pu traH/ g+ha raT+TaH/ A tA naM/ bi tA naM/ nA li/ be maM/ tu riH/ s+yAr+d+wA daH/ sa mA rU D+haM/ a ku
<p>107a.2</p>bar byed/ sbrang rtsir byed/ don kun sgrub pa/ khang khyim/ ldan ba'am gnas pa/ 'bras khu/ mchig gam gtun gyi gzhi/ mchig gu'am gtun bu/ rang thag /rgyu/ spun/ son pa/ thags bzang / tshig pa/ gal gnyis su smra ba/ zhugs pa'am zhon pa'am non pa/ ma rul ba'am ma
<p>107a.3</p>thi taM/ A kasmi kaM /ra NaH/ a kr-i tA b+h+yA ga maH/ kr-i ta bi kra NA shaH/ a nan+ta ra dzan+maH/ kr-iSh+Na shu klaM/ gu ru ta raM b+ha ba ti/ b+sanaH/ A be d+haH/ pa rA dz+nyA pa? ti sAM tse ta nI ya tA/ pa ra
<p>107a.4</p>zhig pa/ 'phral lam glo bur ram gyina'am rgyu med par byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'am 'thab pa'am g.yul/ ma byas pa dang phrad pa/ byas pa chud za ba/ gzhan gyis mchod pa'i tshe la/ dkar nag /nang na lci ba/ chags zhe na/ 'phen pa'am shugs/ gzhan gyis bsgo ba sems pa las gyur pa/ gzhan gyis
<p>107a.5</p>saM dz+nyAp+ti sAM tse ta nI ya tA/ pha la bi pA ka sam+mo haH/ ta twAr+tha sam+mo haH/ byA se kaH/ be d+hiH/ dai baM/ bi mA la nA/ bya ba ki ra NA/ spaR+sha rU pa NA/ de sha ni rU pa NA/ kr-i t+yA ti bat+tiH/ tsak+Shu saM spaR+sha dzA be da nA
<p>107a.6</p>gsol ba btab pa sems pa las gyur ba/ 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rmongs pa/ de kho na'i don la rmongs pa/ 'phyar ba/ sko sham pa/ gnam gyis bskos pa/ sbyong ba/ 'dres pa/ reg pas gzugs su rung ba/ yul brtags pas gzugs su rung ba/ bya ba shor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>su khA pi duHkhA pya duHkhA su khA pi/ shro tra g+h+rA Na dzi hwA kA ya ma naHsaM spaR+sha dzA be da nA su khA pi duHkhA pya duHkhA su khA pi/ su khA pi kA yi kI duHkhA pya duHkhA su kha pi
<p>107b.2</p>ba bde ba 'ang rung sdug bsngal ba 'ang rung sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa 'ang rung / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'ang rung sdug bsngal ba 'ang rung sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin ba 'ang rung / lus kyi bde ba 'ang rung lus kyi sdug bsngal yang rung sdug
<p>107b.3</p>kA yi kI/ su khA pi tsai ta si kI duHkha pya du khA su khA pi tsai ta si kI/ su khA pi sA mi ShA duHkhA pya duHkhA su khA pi sA mi ShA/ su khA pi gre d+hA shri tA duHkhA
<p>107b.4</p>bsngal yang ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa'ang rung / sems kyi bde ba 'ang rung sems kyi sdug bsngal yang rung sdug bsngal ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa 'ang rung / zang zing dang bcas pa'i bde ba 'ang rung zang zing dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal yang rung sdug bsngal ba 'ang ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa 'ang rung / zhen pa la brten pa'i
<p>107b.5</p>pya duH khA su khA pi gre d+hA shri tA/ su khA pi naiSh+k+ra myA shri tA duH khA pya duHkhA su khA pi naiSh+k+ra myA shri tA/ bA kya she ShaH/ bI
<p>107b.6</p>bde ba 'ang rung zhen pa la brten pa'i sdug bsngal yang rung sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa 'ang rung / mngon par 'byung ba la brten pa'i bde ba 'ang rung mngon par 'byung ba la brten pa'i sdug bsngal yang rung sdug bsngal ma yin bde ba 'ang ma yin pa'ang rung / tshig gi 'jug gam lhag ma/ phyir bsnyags
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>p+sA/ u pa ni ban+d+ha naM/ bi ba k+ShA/ balga nA/ a pa spo Ta naM/ rU pa NAtra/ rU pya te/ tsi trI kA raH/ bi dz+nyA na nA lak+Sha NaM/ saM dz+nyA na nA lak+Sha NaM/ d+har+m+mA
<p>108a.2</p>pa'am bsnan pa'am zlos pa/ bshad sbyar/ brjod par 'dod pa/ 'ber ba/ sprugs gsigs/ gzugs su yod pas/ gzugs su rung ba/ mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang 'dom na bkra bar 'dzin pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ 'dus te shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ chos kyi skye
<p>108a.3</p>ya ta ni kaM/ /bar+N+Na ni b+haM/ bi b+hA ShA/ u pa de shaH/ Am+nA yaH/ sid+d+ho pa nI taH/ pA ri NA mi kaH/ saM yo gi kaH/ sh+la tha ma sh+la thaM/ U rdzA/ shu maH/ bi shra maH/ mUts+tshA
<p>108a.4</p>mched/ kha dog dang 'dra ba'am lta bu/ bye brag tu bshad ba'am smra ba/ lung phog pa/ man ngag /grub pas bstan pa'am brtags pa/ bsgyur ba las byung ba/ sbyar ba las byung ba/ lhod pa dang lhod pa ma yin pa/ spungs skyes ba'am pag rtsa skyes pa/ ngal sos ba/ brgyal ba'am mi dran pa'i myog
<p>108a.5</p>tr-ip+tiH/ ba laM/ daurba l+yaM/ A ba s+thi kaM /u tsit+taM/ a nu tsi taM/ pra yuk+taH/ A t+yan+ti kaH/ e kan+ti kaH/ a
<p>108a.6</p>ces byed pa ngom pa'i tshim pa'am rgyas pa/ nyam yod pa/ nyam chung ba/ gnas skabs las gyur ba/ nar ma'am 'dris pa/ nar ma ma yin pa'am ma 'dris pa/ zhugs pa'am brtson pa'am sbyor ba'am sbyar ba/ gtan du ba/ gcig tu nges pa/ dus sam gnas sam tshe'i gnas
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>bas+thA/ bA daH/ bA dA d+hi ka ra NaM/ bA dA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ bA dA laM kA raH/ bA dA ni gra haH/ bA da niH sa ra NaM/ bA de ba hu ka rA d+har+m+maH/ pra bA daH/ bi bA daH/ a pa bA daH/ a nu bA daH/ a ba bA daH/ bya pa kaR+Shi taM/ A dz+nyA mArA
<p>108b.2</p>skabs/ smra ba/ smra ba'i zhal che pa/ smra ba'i gzhi/ smra ba'i rgyan/ smra ba chad pas bcad pa/ smra ba las byung ba/ smra ba gces spras la dgos pa'i chos/ rmad khyer ba smra ba/ rtsod pa smra ba/ tshig ngan smra ba/ mthun par smra ba/ gdams pa smra ba/ rnam par spangs pa/ kun shes pa
<p>108b.3</p>ga ya ti/ sa ma ba sargaH/ prA tik+She pi kaM /bi hA n+yA/ saM ka la na pra hA NaM/ pA mA Ni kA sa hA ya kA/ bA dA bi d+hi dz+nyA na b+ha bi ta byaM/ At+ma kA maH/ no tu bi gr-i h+ya bA daH/ rA dzA ku laM/ yuk+ta ku laM/ 
<p>108b.4</p>thob par byed/ rgyun yang dag par bcad pa/ bsal ba las gyur pa/ rnam par nyams par byas pa/ bsdoms te spong ba/ tshad mar rung ba'i zla grogs/ smra ba'i tshul shes par bya ba/ bdag legs su 'dod pa/ brtsad cing smra bar mi bya/ rgyal po bzhugs pa/ bskos pa 'du ba'i sa/ 
<p>108b.5</p>sa b+hA/ dr-iSh+TAn+te na a dr-iSh+Ta s+yAn+ta sa mI ka ra Na sa mA khyA naM/ e kA ba tsA ra kaH/ pUrba pa da kaH/ pash+tsAt+pa da kaH/ ung+kA ri kaH/ kA ba de shaH/ yA pa de shaH/ su sat+p+ra kA shA b+h+rAn+to\u0f85r+thaH/ muSh+Ti yo gaH/ 
<p>108b.6</p>'dus pa/ mtha' mthong ba dang mtha' ma mthong ba mtshungs par sbyar zhing bstan pa/ gcig nas rtog pa/ tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba/ tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba/ de bzhin no zhes bya ba/ ci zhes bstan pa/ gang zhes bstan pa/ bdag nyid yod bar smra ba ma nor ba'i don/ mkhyud spyad/
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>diSh+T+ya/ he tuH/ kA ra NaM/ ni mit+taM/ kAnas ba d+haH/ rat+nA ha ra NaM/ si tA ha ra NaM/ dzan pa da ka l+yA NaM/ rug+mi nIharaNaM/ u pa d+ha no pa rA
<p>109a.2</p>dga' bas/ rgyu'am gtan tshigs/ byed pa'am rgyu he tu dang ni mi tA dang 'dom na byed rgyu/ mtshan ma'am rgyu he tu dang kar Na dang 'dom na rgyu mtshan/ khar ba bsad pa/ rin po che phrogs pa/ rol snyed phrogs pa/ yul gyi bzang mo/ gser ldan ma phrogs pa/ nye bar bzhag pas kha
<p>109a.3</p>gaH/ a d+hi kA raH/ pra t+yA san+ti/ niSh+pu laM/ a pa ga ta phalguH/ kiT+TaH/ kaShaT+Ta?H/ pra t+ya te/ byA ti re ba ya taH/ k+She paH/ byA ha taM/ bya ba sI pan+te/ be
<p>109a.4</p>bsgyur ba/ ched du bya ba'am gzhi'am dbang du bya ba/ rab tu nye ba/ shin te ma med pa'am snyigs ma med pa/ snying po ma yin pa med par gyur/ so dog/ snyigs ma'am tshigs ma/ nan tan du bya'o zhe'o brtson par byed do/ /med par gyur/ sdod pa/ rnam par nyams par 'gyur ba'am 'gal ba/ rnam par rtogs so/ /rig
<p>109a.5</p>d+yaM/ be da kaM/ bit+ti/ a b+hi drug+d+haM/ a pa lA paM/ a pra ti bA ni/ kany+tsa na gar+b+hA mr-it+ti kA/ a sranas nama?/ A na ya ti/ a b+hi dz+nyA dz+nyA naM/ bra ti b+hU/ sh+leg+ha mA ne na/ dzI No/ br-id+d+ho/ ma hAl+la ka/ a
<p>109a.6</p>par bya/ rig par byed/ rig pa/ rnogs pa'am 'khus pa/ snyon pa/ phyir mi nur ba/ sa khongs na gser yod pa/ rgyun mi gcod pa'am mi gtong ba'am mi lhod pa/ gtod pa'am sgrub pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes/ snying rdeng ngam gnya'/ 'dod cing ngam sdod cing / rgan po/ 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa/ dus
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>d+h+wa ga taM/ ba yo\u0f85nu prAp+ta/ lo b+ha yata?/ u b+ha ya to lau hi ta kr-i to pa d+hA naM/ A s+pha' la naM/ sau r+Yo da yi kA/ pra t+ya nu yuk+taH/ a nu yuk+taH/ pra ti ni sargaH/ byan+tI b+hA baH/ byu pa sha maH/ bA hI kaH/ grangs dang bsgre ba dang dus dang phyogs kyi ming las phal chen sha taM/ sa ha sraM/ ko TiH/ a yu tama?/ 
<p>109b.2</p>yol ba/ dgog tu phyin pa/ brong ngam brngod skabs dang sbyar/ gnyis su rgyab rten dmar po bzhag pa/ rdob pa'am phul ba/ nyi ma shar ba/ phyir brgal/ brgal ba/ nges par spangs pa/ byang bar gyur pa/ rnam par zhi ba/ mi rmun po/ /gyi grangs kyi le'u las 'byung ba'i grangs kyi ming la/ brgya/ stong / bye ba/ ther 'bum/

<p>110b.1</p>a sa man+ta pa ri bar+t+taH/ ag Ne yaM/ ag Ne ya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a tu l+yaM/ a tu l+ya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a tsin+t+yaM/ a tsin+t+ya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a me yaM/ a me yaM pa ri bar+t+taH/ a na b+hi lA pyaM/ a na b+hi lA pya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a na b+hi lA byA na b+hi lA pya

<p>110b.3</p>pa ri bar+t+ta nirde shaH/ sdong po bkod pa las byung ba'i grangs kyi ming la/ e kaM/ da shaM/ sha taM/ sa ha sraM/ ko Ti/ a yu taM/ ni yu taM/ bim+ba raH/ kaM ka raH/ A gA raH/ pra ba raM/ ma ba raM/ a ba raM/ ta ba raM/ sI maM/ po maM/ ne maM/ a ga baM/ mri ga baM/ bi rA gaM/ bi ga bama?/ saM kra maM/

<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>bi k+Shob+haM/ ha li b+haM/ ha riH/ A lo kaH/ dr-iSh+TAn+taH/ ha tu naM/ e laM/ du mai laM/ k+She puH/ e la daM/ mA lu daM/ sa ma tA/ bi ma daM/ pra mA traM/ a man+d+raM/ b+h+ra maM traM/ ga maM traM/ na maM traM/ na hi maM traM/ bi maM
<p>111a.2</p>'brug g.yos/ rmo yas/ thing yug /shugs 'phyo/ yid 'phyo/ phyin spyod/ thal thal/ yal yal/ bzod yas/ thal yas/ thal yas/ rtogs yas/ dga' yas/ gzhal 'phyos/ gzhal yas/ gzhal thim/ gzhal 'khor/ gzhal med/ gar gzhal/ gzhal
<p>111a.3</p>traM/ pa ra maM traM/ shi man+t+raM/ e luH/ be luH/ ge luH/ shwai luH/ ne luH/ b+he luH/ ke luH/ se luH/ pa luH/ me luH/ sa ra NaM/ me ru duH/ khe lu duH/ mA lu duH/ sam+ba laM/ a ya baH/ ka ma laM/ ma ga baM/ a ta ruH/ he lu buH/ ka
<p>111a.4</p>sangs/ gzhal thag /gzhal phul/ yal/ dus rlabs/ phyag phyig /zal zul/ gtang yas/ nyar nyer/ sal sal/ yad yod/ phyol yas/ 'phrad yas/ brjod yas/ rdzi phyod/ rdzi phyod phyod/ ma gzhal/ dpag 'byam/ zab bgrang / dga' brkyang / brtag yas/ bsgral yas/ 'ol phyod/ cha
<p>111a.5</p>Sha tsaM/ ha ba baH/ ha ba laM/ bi ba raM/ bim+baM/ mi ra baH/ tsa ra NaM/ tsa ra maM/ d+ha ba raM/ d+ha ma naM/ pra mA daH/ ni ga maM/ u pa bar+t+taM/ nirde shaH/ ak+Sha yaM/ sam+b+hU taM/ a ma maM/ a ba daM/ ut+pa laM/ pad+maM/ saM khyaM/ u pag maM/ ga tiH/
