<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>u pa myaM/ a saM khye yaM/ a saM khye ya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a pra mA NaM/ a pra mA Na pa ri bar+t+taH/ a pa ri mA NaM/ a pa ri mA Na pa ri bar+t+taH/ a par+Ya n+taH/ a par+Ya n+ta pa ri bar+t+taH/ a sa man+taH/ a sa man+ta ba ri bar+t+taH/ ag Ne yaM/ ag Ne ya ba ri bar+t+taH/ a tu l+yaM/ a tu l+ya pa ri
<p>111b.2</p>dpe yas/ bgrang du med pa/ bgrang du med pa las bsgres pa/ tshad med pa/ tshad med pa las bsgres pa/ dpag yas/ dpag yas las bsgres ga mu med/ mu med las bsgres pa/ thug med/ thug med las bsgres pa/ brtsis yas/ brtsis yas las bsgres pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal du med pa las
<p>111b.3</p>bar+t+taH/ a tsin+t+yaM/ a tsin+t+ya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a mA pyaM/ a mA pya ba ri bar+t+taH/ a na b+hi lA byaM/ a na b+hi lA pya pa ri bar+t+taH/ a na b+hi lA pyA na b+hi lA pyaM/ a na b+hi lA pyA na b+hi lA pya pa ri bar+t+taH/ rgya cher rol pa las byung ba'i grangs dang rtsis kyi ming la/ 
<p>111b.4</p>bsgres pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa las bsgres pa/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba las bsgres pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod du med pa las bsgres pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa/ 
<p>111b.5</p>sha taM ko TI nA ma yu taM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha ta ma yu tA nAn+na yu taM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM na yu tA nAM kaM ka raM NA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM kaM ka rA NAM bim+ba ran+nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM bim+ba rA NAM ak+Sho b+h+yaM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha ta ma k+Sho b+h+yA nAm+bi pA ho nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM bi bA hA nA muts+tshang+go nA mo
<p>111b.6</p>bye ba phrag brgya na ther 'bum zhes bya'o/ /ther 'bum phrag brgya na khrag khrig ces bya'o/ /khrag khrig phrag brgyan gtams pa zhes bya'o/ /gtams pa phrag brgya na dkrigs pa zhes bya'o/ /dkrigs pa phrag brgya na mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /mi 'khrugs phrag brgya na khyad byin zhes bya'o/ /khyad byin phrag brgya na pang stengs
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>ts+ya te/ sha ta muts+tshang+gA nAm+ba hu laM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM ba hu lA nAn+nA ga ba laM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha tan+nA ga ba lA nAM Ti Ti lan+nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM Ti Ti lA nAM bya ba s+thAn pra dz+nyAp+tirnA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM bya bas+thAn pradz+nyAp+tI nAM he tu hi laM
<p>112a.2</p>zhes bya'o/ /pang stengs phrag brgya na mang 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /mang 'dzin phrag brgya na glang po'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /glang po'i stobs phrag brgya na ngogs thob ces bya'o/ /ngogs thob phrag brgya na rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgya na
<p>112a.3</p>nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM he tu hi lA nAM ka ra phurnA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM ka ra phU nAM he twIn+d+ri yaM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM he twIn+d+ri yA NAM sa map+ta laM b+ho nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM sa mAp+ta laM b+hA nAM gaN nA ga tirnA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM ga Na nA ga tI nAM nI bar Na nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM nI bar NA nAM mu drA ba laM nA mo ts+ya te/ 
<p>112a.4</p>rgyu rig 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /rgyu rig 'dzin phrag brgya na lag byin zhes bya'o/ /lag byin phrag brgya na rgyu dbang zhes bya'o/ /rgyu dbang phrag brgya na rdzogs 'thob ces bya'o/ /rdzogs thob phyag brgya na bgrang rtogs zhes bya'o/ /bgrang rtogs phrag brgya na sgrib pa zhes bya'o/ /sgrib pa phrag brgya na rgya stobs zhes bya'o/ /
<p>112a.5</p>sha taM mu drA ba lA nAM sarba ba laM na mo ts+ya te/ sha taM sarba ba lA nAM bi saM dz+nyA ba ti nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM bi saM dz+nyA ba tI nAM sarba saM dz+nyA na mo ts+ya te/ sha taM sarba saM dz+nyA nAM bi b+hU ti ga maM nA mo ts+ya te/ sha taM bi b+hU ti ga mA nAM ta l+lak+Sha NaM nA mo ts+ya te/ i ti hi tal+lak+Sha Na ga Na na
<p>112a.6</p>rgya stobs phrag brgya na kun stobs zhes bya'o/ /kun stobs phrag brgya na rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o/ /rnam par brda shes ldan phrag brgya na brda shes kun zhes bya'o/ /brda shes kun phrag brgya na rnam 'byung zhes bya'o/ /rnam 'byung phrag brgya na de'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>yA su me ru parba ta rA dzA lak+Sha ni k+She pa kr-i ya yA pa ri k+Sha yaM gats+tshe tra/ a to\u0f85byut+ta ri d+h+wa dzA gra ma Nirna ma ga Na nA/ d+h+wa dzA gra ni shrA ba NI nA ma ga Na nA/ bA ha na pradz+nyA p+tiH/ IT+TA/ ku kaT+TA/ ku kaT+TA bi tA/ 
<p>112b.2</p>ba'i rtsis kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs/ ded 'dren zhes gdags/ gtan la 'bebs pa/ gcod rtogs/ gcod rtogs ldan/ 
<p>112b.3</p>sarba bi k+She pa tA/ a gra sA rA/ ta to\u0f85pyut+ta ri pa ra mA Nu ra dzaHpra be sho nA ma ga Na nA/ chos mngon pa las byung ba'i grangs kyi ming la/ e kaM/ da sha/ sha tama?/ sa ha srama?/ bra b+he daH/ lak+Shama?/ a ti lak+ShaH/ ko TI/ mad+h+yaH/ a yu taH/ ma hA yu taH/ na yu taH/ ma hA na yu taH/ pra su taH/ ma hA
<p>112b.4</p>thams cad rnam par 'gyed/ snying po mchog /de'i gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /gcig /bcu/ brgya/ stong / khri/ 'bum/ sa ya/ bye ba/ dung phyur/ ther 'bum/ ther 'bum chen po/ khrag khrig /khrag khrig chen po/ rab bkram/ rab
<p>112b.5</p>pra su taH/ kaM ka raH/ ma hA kaM ka raH/ bim+ba raH/ ma hA bim+ba raH/ a k+Sho b+h+yaH/ ma hA \u0f85k+Sho b+h+yaH/ bi bA haH/ ma hA bi bA haH/ ut+sang+gaH/ ma hot+sang+gaH/ bA ha naH/ ma hA bA ha naH/ ti Ti b+haH/ ma hA ti Ti b+haH/ he tuH/ ma hA he tuH/ ka ra b+haH/ ma hA
<p>112b.6</p>bkram chen po/ gtams/ gtams chen po/ dkrigs/ dkrigs chen po/ mi 'khrugs/ mi 'khrugs chen po/ khyad phyin/ khyad phyin chen po/ pang stengs/ pang stengs chen po/ ded 'dren/ ded 'dren chen po/ mtha' snang / mtha' snang chen po/ rgyu rig/ rgyu rig chen po/ 'od mdzes/ 'od
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>ka ra b+haH/ in+d+raH/ ma hen+d+raH/ sa mAp+taH/ ma hAs mAp+taH/ ga tiH/ ma hA ga tiH/ nim+ba ra dzaH/ ma hA nim+ba ra dzaH/ mu drA/ ma hA mu drA/ ba laM/ ma hA ba laM/ saM dz+nyA/ ma hA saM dz+nyA/ bi b+hU taH/ ma hA bi b+hU taH/

<p>113a.3</p>ba lAk+ShaM/ ma hA ba lAk+ShaM/ a saM khyAM/ a pra mA NaM/ a pra me yaM/ a pa ri mi taM/ a pa ri mA NaM/ a tul+l+yaM/ a mA pyaM/ a tsin+t+yaM/ 'jig rten pa'i grangs kyi ming la/ e kaM/ da sha/ sha taM/ sa ha sraM/ a yu taM/ lak+ShaM/ ni yu taM/ ko TI/ arbu daM/ n+yarbu daM/ pad+maM/ kharbaM/ 
<p>113a.4</p>stobs mig /stobs mig chen po/ grangs med pa/ tshang med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bskyod du med pa/ dpag yas/ gzhal du med/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gcig /bcu/ brgya/ stong / khri/ 'bum/ sa ya/ bye ba/ bye ba/ dung phyur/ ther 'bum/ shu rngogs/ 
<p>113a.5</p>ni kharbaM/ ma hA pad+maM/ shad+kuH/ sa mu draM/ ma d+h+yaM/ at+taH/ ba rAr+d+haH/ e kaH/ dwau/ trI Ni/ tsa twA ri/ pany+tsa/ ShaTa?/ sap+ta/ aSh+Tau/ na ba/ da sha/ e ka da shaH/ dwA da shaH/ tra yo da shaH/ tsa turd shaH/ pany+tsa da shaH/ Sho Da shaH/ sap+ta da shaH/ aSh+TA da shaH/ e koM na biM sha ti/ biM sha ti/

<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>aka biM ga ti/ dwA biM sha ti/ tra yo biM sha ti/ tsa turbiM sha ti/ pany+tsa biM sha ti/ ShaTa? biM sha ti/ sap+ta biM sha ti/ aSh+TA biM sha ti/ e koM na triM sha ti/ triM shatra/ e ka triM shata?/ dwA triM shata?/ tra ya triM shata?/ tsa tu s+t+riM shata?/ pany+tsa triM shata?/ ShaTa? triM shata?/ sap+ta triM shata?/ aSh+TA triM shata?/ e koM na tsa twA riM shata?/ tsatwA riM sha

<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>sap+ta tiH/ e kon+na shI tiH/ A shI tiH/ e kA shI tiH/ dwA shI tiH/ t+yA shI tiH/ tsa tu rA shI tiH/ pany+tsA shI tiH/ Sha DA shI tiH/ sap+tA shI tiH/ aSh+TA shI tiH/ e kon+na ba tiH/ na ba tiH/ e ko na ba tiH/ dwA na ba tiH/

<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>d+ha nuH/ pany+tsa sha tA ni/ kro shaH/ yo dza naM/ stobs bcur bsgyur te bsgre ba'i ming la/ prA kr-i ta hasti ba laM/ gan+d+ha hasti ba laM/ ma hA nag+na ba laM/ ba rAM ga pa laM/ praskan+di ba laM/ tsA NU ra ba laM/ nA rA ya Na ba laM/ dus kyi ming la/ kA laM/ be la/

<p>114b.3</p>sa ma yaH/ k+Sha Nama?/ la baH/ mu hur+t+taH/ r-i gi ti/ dz+hi Ti ti/ sa ma nan+ta rama?/ ats+tsha TA saM g+hA ta mA tama?/ ra dzA nI/ pra shAn+tA rA tri/ pUrba rA traH a pa ra rA traH/ pra tha me yA me/ ma d+h+ya me yA me/ pash+tsi me yA me/ pra hA raH/ ta s+ya e ba rA t+yA
<p>114b.4</p>tshod/ sa ma ya tshod dam tshe skabs dang sbyar te gdags/ skad cig /thang cig /yud tsam/ yud ces sam spyod ces/ de ma thag /se gol gtogs tsam/ mtshan mo/ mi nyal tsam na'am mtshan mo rab tu zhi ba/ nam gyi cha stod/ nam gyi cha smad/ thun dang po la/ gung thun la/ thun tha ma la/ mel tshe/ de nyid kyi mtshan

<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>gr-ISh+mA NAM pash+tsim mA se/ phalgu naH/ tsi traH/ bai shA khaH/ dz+yeSh+ThaH/ A ShA D+haH/ shrA ba NaH/ b+hA dra pa daH/ a shwinaH/ kAr+t+ti kaH/ mArga shIR+ShaH/ phau ShaH/ mA g+haH/ mA saH/ e ka

<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>sI tre/ te na kA le na/ te na sa ma ye na/ bar+t+ta mA naH/ pra t+yut+pa n+naH/ a nA ga taHkA laH/ pash+tsi ma kA laH/ A gA mI/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ dIrga rA tama?/ tsi ra kA laH/ tri ya d+h+wa tri skA laH/ san+d+h+ya kA laH/ tri san+d+hiH/ parbaH/ phyogs dang mtshams kyi ming la/ dika?/ pUrbA/ dak+Shi NA/ bash+tsimA/ ut+ta rA/ pUrba dak+Shi NA/

<p>115b.5</p>yai/ saM g+ha s+ya spaR+sha bi hA rA ya/ dUrmang+gU nAM pung+ga lA nAM ni gra hA ya/ ladz+dzi nAM spaR+sha bi hA rA ya/ an b+hi pra san+nA nAM a b+hi pra sA dA ya/ a b+hi pra san+nA nAM b+hU yo b+hA bA ya/ dr-iSh+Ta d+harmi kA NA mA swa
<p>115b.6</p>par bya ba'i phyir/ dge 'dun bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ gnong mi bkur ba'i gang zag rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ ngo tsha shes pa rnams bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon bar ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ mthong ba'i chos kyi zag
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>bA NAM sam+ba rA ya/ sam+ba rA yi kA NAM se tu sa mutra g+hA tA ya/ bra h+ma car+Ya ny+tsa me tsiras+thi ti kaM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ ltung byed sde lnga dang ma nges pa'i ming la/ tsa twA raHpA rA dzi kA d+harmA/ tra yo da sha saM g+hA pa she ShA/ pA pat+ti kA/ tsa twA raHpra ti de sha nI yAH/ sam+ba hu lAHshai Sh+ya d+har+m+mAH/ 
<p>116a.2</p>pa rnams bsdam ba'i phyir/ tsher bas phyi ma'i rnams chu lon gyis bzlog pa'i phyir/ nga'i tshangs par spyid ba yun ring du gnas par 'gyur/ phas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi/ dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum/ ltung byed/ so sor bshags pa bya ba bzhi/ bslab pa'i chos
<p>116a.3</p>pas pham pa bzhi'i ming la/ a bra h+ma tsar+YaM/ a da t+tA dA n+naM/ ba d+haH/ ut+ta ra ma nu Sh+ya d+harma pra lA paH/ dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum dang ma nges pa gnyis la/ shu kra bi sr-iSh+TaH/ kA la saM sargaH/ me thu nA b+hA Sha NaM/ ba ri tsar+YA saM saM bar+Na naM/ sany+tsa ri traM/ ku Ti kA/ ma hA l+la kaH/ a mU la kaMH/ lai shi kaM/ 
<p>116a.4</p>mang po/ mi tshangs par spyod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ gsod pa/ mi'i chos bla ma smra ba/ khu ba 'byin pa/ lus kyi reg pa/ 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba/ bsnyen bkur bsngags pa/ /smyan byed pa/ khang ba/ khang chen pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ bag tsam pa/ 
<p>116a.5</p>saM g+ha b+he daH/ tad nu bar+t+takaH/ ku la dU Sha kaH/ daurba tsa s+yaM/ dwA ba ni ya tau/ spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu'i ming la/ nais+sargi ka bA bat+ti kA /dra tha maM da sha kaM/ d+hA ra NaM/ bi pra bA saH/ ni k+She paH/ d+hA ba naM/ pra ti gra haH/ yAts+Na/ sAn+ta rot+ta raM/ tse ta na kA ni/ 
<p>116a.6</p>dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa/ de'i rjes su phyogs pa/ khyim sun 'byin pa/ bka' blo mi bde ba/ ma nges pa gnyis/ spang ba'i ltung byed/ bcu pa dang po la/ 'chang ba/ 'dral pa/ 'jog pa/ 'khrur 'dug pa/ len pa/ slong ba/ smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs su bcas pa/ rin thang
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>pra t+ye kaM/ pre Sha NaM/ dwi tI yaM da sha kaM/ kau she yaM/ shud+d+ha ka/ kA la kA nAM/ dwi b+hA gaH/ ShaD+baR+ShA Ni/ bi ta stiH/ a d+h+wor+N+Nau TiH/ ur+NA pa ri karma NaM/ dzA ta rU pa ra dza ta spaR+Sha naM/ rU bi ka bya ba hA raH/ kra ya bi kra yaM/ tr-i tI yaM da sha kaM/ 
<p>116b.2</p>so so ba/ bskur ba/ bcu pa gnyis pa la/ mon dar/ bal/ nag po 'ba' zhig /cha gnyis bsre ba/ lo drug tu 'chang ba/ mtho gang / lam na bal thogs pa/ bal rmel du 'jug pa'i spang ba/ gser dngul la reg pa/ mngon tshan can gyi spyod pa/ nyo 'tshong byed pa/ bcu pa gsum pa la/ 
<p>116b.3</p>pA tra d+hA ra NaM/ pA tra pa rISh+TiH/ d+hA ya naH/ U ya mA na bar+d+ha naM/ da twA dA naM/ kAr+t+ti kA t+ya yi kaM/ sap+ta rA tra bi pra pA saH/ baR+Sha shAT+yA kA lA pa rISh+Ti d+hA ra NaM/ pa ri NA mama?/ san+ni d+hI kA raH/ ltung byed dgu bcu'i ming la/ shud+d+ha prA yash+tsit+ta kaH/ mr-i ShA/ U na
<p>116b.4</p>lhung bzed 'chang ba/ lhung bzed tshol pa [*]'thag tu 'jug pa/ /'thag pa bskyed pa/ byin 'phrog/ ston zla tha chungs la thal ba/ zhag bdun na bral ba/ dbyar gyi ras chen dus ma yin par tshol pa dang 'chang ba/ bsngos pa las bsgyur ba/ gsog 'jog/ ltung byed 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba rnams la/ brdzun/ skyon
<p>116b.5</p>bA daH/ b+hik+Shu pai shu n+yaM/ kho TA naM/ duSh+Thu lA ro tsa naM/ ut+ta ra ma nu Sh+ya d+har+m+ma ro tsa naM/ ShaT+pAny+tsi kA yA bA ro d+harmA de sha nA yA/ sa ma pa do dra de sha dA naM/ saM stu tiHTi/ bi taN+Da naM/ dwi tI yaM da sha kaM/ bI dza grA ma b+hU ta grA ma bi nA sha naM/ 
<p>116b.6</p>nas smra ba/ dge slong la phra ma byed pa/ skyo rngogs byed pa/ gnas ngan len brjod pa/ mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa/ tshig drug gam lnga las lhag par chos bshad na/ tshig mthun pa dang tshig lhag par slob pa/ bshes ngor byed ba/ khyad du gsod pa/ bcu pa gnyis pa la/ sa bon gyi tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>a ba d+h+yA naM/ A dz+nyA bi he Tha naM/ maN+tsaH/ saM sta raH/ niSh+kaR+Sha NaM/ a nu praSh+ka n+t+yA pA taH/ A hAr+Ya pA da kA ro hIH/ sa prA Ni ko pa b+ho gaH/ dau bA tra yo bAts+tsha da na pa maR+YA dA ta byAH/ tr-i tI yaM da sha kaM/ a sam+ma tA ba bA daH/ asta mi tA ba bA daH/ A mi Sha/ 
<p>117a.2</p>'jig pa/ 'phya ba/ bsgo ba bcag pa/ khri/ gding pa/ skrod pa/ phyis gnon pa/ rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa/ srog chags dang bcas pa la spyod pa/ rim pa gnyis sam gsum brtsig pa/ bcu pa gsum pa la/ ma bskos par ston pa/ nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa/ zas cung
<p>117a.3</p>kiny+tsi kA ba bA daH/ tsI ba ra dA naM/ tsI ba ra ka ra NaM/ b+hik+Shu NI sAr+the na sa ha ga ma naM/ sa b+hi k+Shu NI kA dza lA yA no TiH/ ra ha si ni Sha d+yA/ ra ha si s+thA naM/ b+hik+Shu NI pa ri pA tsi ta piN+Da pa tro pa b+ho gaH/ tsa tur+thaM da sha kaM/ pa ram+pa ra b+ho dzA naM/ e kA ba sa thA bA saH/ 
<p>117a.4</p>zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa/ gos sbyin pa/ gos 'tshem pa/ dge slong ma'i mgron po mang po dang lhan cig 'gro ba/ dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa/ dben pa na 'dug pa/ dben pa na 'greng ba/ dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za ba/ bcu pa bzhi pa la/ yang yang za ba/ gnas gcig na gnas pa/ 
<p>117a.5</p>dwi tri pA tra pU rA ti rik+ta gra ha NaM/ a kr-i ta ni rik+ta khA da naM/ a kr-i ta ni r-ik+ta pra bA ra NaM/ gaN b+ho dzA naM/ a kA la b+ho dzA naM/ san+ni hi ta brdza naM/ a pra ti grA hi ka b+huk+tiH/ pa NI ta bi dz+nyA pa nam/ sa prA NI dza lo pa b+ho gama?/ sa b+ho dzA na ku la ni/ 
<p>117a.6</p>lhung bzed do gsum las lhag par len pa/ lhag mar ma byas pa'i bza' ba/ lhag mar ma byas pa stob pa/ 'dus shing za ba/ dus ma yin par za ba dang / gsog 'jog spang ba/ sbyin len ma byas par za ba/ zas gsod pa slong ba/ srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa/ nyal po byed po bshoms pa'i
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>Sha d+yA/ sa b+ho dza na ku las+thA naM/ a tsai la dA naM/ se nA daR+sha naM/ se nA ba saH/ u d+yu thi kA ga ma naM/ pra da ra dA naM/ ud+gu ra NaM/ duSh+Thu lA pra tits+tshA da naM/ b+hak+tats+tshe da kA ra NaM/ ag+ni br-it+tama?/ ts+tshan+da pra d+yud+d+hA raH/ a nu pa sam+pan+na sa ha
<p>117b.2</p>khyim na gnas pa/ nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba/ gcer bu pa la sbyin ba/ dmag la blta ba/ dmag gi nang na gnas pa/ g.yul bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro ba/ brdeg pa/ gzas pa/ gnas ngan len 'chab pa/ zas gcod du 'jug pa/ mi 'bud pa/ dad pa phyir bsgyur ba/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa
<p>117b.3</p>swap+naH/ dr-iSh+Ti ga tA nuta rgaH/ ut+k+Ship+tA nu br-i t+tiH/ nA shita saM gra haH/ a rak+ta bas+t+ro pa b+ho gaH/ rat+na saM spaR+shaH/ snA tra prA yash+tsit+ti kaM/ tir+Ya g+ba d+haH/ kau kr-i t+yo pa saM hA raH/ aM gu li pra b+ho dA naM/ u da ka haR+Sha NaM/ mA tr-i grA me na sa ha swap+naM/ b+hISha NaM/ 
<p>117b.4</p>dang lhan cig nyal ba/ lta bar gyur pa mi 'dor ba/ spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa/ bsnyil ba sdud pa/ kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa/ rin po che la reg pa/ khrus byed pa'i ltung byed/ dud 'gro gsod pa/ 'gyod pa bskyed pa/ mdzub mos ga ga tshil byed pa/ chu la rtse ba/ bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba/ sdangs par byed
<p>117b.5</p>go pa nama?/ a pra t+yur+Ya pa ri b+ho gaH/ a mU la kA b+h+yA khyA naM/ a pu ru Sha yASh+t+ri yA mArga ga ma NaM/ ste ya sAr+tha ga ma naM/ U na biM sha baR+Sho pa saM pA da naM/ khan naM/ pra bA ri tAr+thA ti se bA/ u pa shra ba ga tama?/ si k+Shau pa saM hA raHpra ti
<p>117b.6</p>pa/ sbed pa/ phyir ma blangs par spyod pa/ gzhi med par skur ba 'debs pa/ skyes pa med par bud med dang lam du 'gro ba/ rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba/ nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa/ sa brko ba/ mgron gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa/ nyan rna las gyur pa/ bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>k+She paH/ tuSh+Ni be kra ma NaM/ a nA da ra br-it+tama?/ su rA mai re yA ma d+ya pA naM/ a kA la tsar+YA/ ku la tsar+YA/ rA dza ku la rA tri tsar+YA/ shik+Sha pa da dra bya tA d+h+ya ba tsA raH/ sU tsi gr-i ha ka sum+pA da naM/ pA da ka saM pA da naM/ a ba
<p>118a.2</p>spong ba/ mi smra bar 'gro ba/ ma gus pa'i tshul/ 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par gyur pa 'thung ba/ dus ma yin par 'gro ba/ grong rgyu ba/ rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba/ bslab pa'i tshig gi dngos po la khyad du gsod pa/ khab ral 'chos pa/ khri'i rkang pa 'chos pa/ shing bal
<p>118a.3</p>nA haH/ ni Sha da na ga taM/ baR+ShA shA TI ga tama?/ kaN+Du pra tits+tshAd na ga tama?/ su ga ta tsI ba ra ga tama?/ so sor bshags pa'i chos bzhi'i ming la/ pra ti de sha nI yA ni/ b+hik+Shu NI piN+Da ka gra ha NaM paM k+ti rai Sha mya bA dA ni bA ri ta twe b+huk+tiH/ ku la
<p>118a.4</p>gyis gos par bya ba/ gding ba las gyur pa/ dbyar gyi ras chen las gyur pa/ g.yan pa dgab pa las gyur pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa/ so sor bshags pa/ dge slong ma las zas lag tu len pa gral rims su ma bab par 'grim du 'jug pa la ma bzlog par za ba/ 
<p>118a.5</p>shik+ShA b+hang+ga pra br-it+tiH/ ba na bitsa ya ga taM/ bslab pa'i chos mang po'i ming la/ ni bA sa ne na sop+taH/ pa ri maN+Da la ni bA sa naM/ nA t+yut+k+r-iSh+TaH/ nA t+yu pa kr-iSh+TaM/ na ha sti shuN+DA ba lam+bi taM/ tA la br-ind kaM/ na kul+mA sa piN+Da kaM/ na nA ga shIR+Sha kaM ni bA sa naM ni bA sa yiSh+yA
<p>118a.6</p>khrims dral te grong du 'gro ba/ nags tshal brtag pa las gyur pa/ sham thabs la rnam pa bdun/ sham thabs zlum por bgo ga ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa/ ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa/ glang po che'i sna ltar nar ba ma yin pa/ ta la'i lo ma ltar ltab pa/ 'bru'i phur ma ltar ma yin pa/ sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar smad g.yogs
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>mI ti sik+ShA kA ra Ni yA/ nA t+yut+k+r-iSh+TaM tsI ba raM/ nA t+yu pa kr-iSh+TaM tsI ba raM/ pa ri maN+Da laM tsI ba raM/ su saM braM tA/ su pra tits+tshan+nA/ alpa shap+tA/ a nut+k+Ship+ta cak+Shu ShaH/ yu ga mA tra daR+shi na/ nong+guN+ti ka yA/ not+k+r-iSh+Tha ka yA/ not+sak+ti ka yA/ not+b+ya sti ka
<p>118b.2</p>mi bgo bar bslab par bya/ chos gos ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin/ chos gos ha cang 'jol ba ma yin/ chos gos zlum por bgo ba/ shin tu bsdams pa/ legs par bgos pa/ sgra bskyung ba/ mig g.yeng bar mi bya ba/ gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba/ mgo mi g.yog /mi rdze/ mi gzar/ gnya' gong du
<p>118b.3</p>yA/ na par+Ya sti ka yA/ noT+TAM ki ka yA/ noj+dzaM ki ka yA/ nol+laM g+hi ka yA/ not+ku Tu ki ka yA/ na skam+b+hA kr-i tA/ na kA ya pra tsA la kaM/ na ba hu pra tsA la kaM/ na shIR+Sha pra tsA la kaM/ nAM soD+hau ki ka yA/ na ha sta saM lag+ni ga yA/ nA na nu dz+nyA tA/ na pra t+ya be k+Sho\u0f85 sa naM/ na sarba kA
<p>118b.4</p>mi bsnol/ phrag pa gnyis ka la mi gzar/ brang bas ma yin/ 'jal thabs su ma yin/ mi 'chong / tsog pus ma yin/ dkur mi bstan/ lus mi bsgyur/ lag pa mi bskyod/ mgo mi bsgyur/ phrag pa mi sprad/ lag pa mi sbrel/ ma bsgo bar/ stan la ma brtags par/ lus thams
<p>118b.5</p>yaM sa ma bar+d+hA ya/ na pA de pA da mA d+hA ya/ na sag+tha ni sag+th+yA d+hA ya/ na gul+phe gul+pha mA d+hA ya/ na saM k+Shi pya pA dau/ na bi k+Shi pya pA dau/ na bi daM gi ka yA/ sat+k+r-i t+ya piN+Da pA traM pra ti gra hi Sh+yA maH/ na sa ma tit+ti kaM/ na sa ma sU pi kaM/ sA ba dA naM/ pA tra saM dz+nyi
<p>118b.6</p>cad kyis ljid kyis mi dbab/ rkang pa mi bsnol/ brla mi bsnol/ long bu'i steng du long bu mi bzhag /rkang pa mi dgug /rkang pa mi gdang / mdoms mi snang / legs par zas blang ba/ mu dang kha da chad du ma yin/ tshod ma dang mnyam par ma yin/ mthar chags/ lhung bzed la
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>naH/ nA nA ga te khA da nI ye b+ho dzA nI ye pA tra mu pa nA ma yi Sh+yA maH/ nod nen sU pi kaM pra tits+tshA da yi Sh+yA maHsU pi ke na bA o da naM/ sat+k+r-it+ya piN+Da pA traM pa ri b+ho k+Sh+yA maH/ nA ti khun+tan+na kai rA lo paiH/ nA ti ma hAn+taM/ pa ri maN+Da la mA lo pAH/ nA nA ga te A lo be mu kha dwA raM bi ba ri Sh+yA maH/ na sA lo
<p>119a.2</p>blta ba/ bza' ba dang bca' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed mi bzed/ 'bras chan gyis tshod ma'am tshod mas 'bras chan mi dgab/ legs par zas bza'/ kham ha cang chung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang chen po ma yin/ kham ran po/ kham ma gzas par kha mi gdang / kha kham
<p>119a.3</p>pe na mu khe na bA raM pra byA ha ri Sh+yA maH/ na tsuts+tsu kA ra kaM/ na shush+shu kA ra kaM/ na thut+thu kA ra ka/ na pup+pu kA ra kaM/ na dzi hwA nish+tsA ra ka piN+Da pA traM b+ho k+Sh+yA maH/ na sit+tha pr-i thak+kA ra kaM/ nA bar+Na kA ra kaM/ na gal+lA pa hA ra kaM/ na ka ba Da ts+tshe da kaM/ na dzi hwA s+pho Ta kaM/ na hastA ba le ha kaM/ na pA trA pa le ha kaM/ na hasta saM d+hU na kaM/ 
<p>119a.4</p>gyis bkang ste mi smra/ tsug tsug mi bya/ cag cag mi bya/ hu hu mi bya/ phu phu mi bya/ lce phyung ste zas mi za/ 'bru nas tha dad du mi bya/ phyas mi gdags/ mkhur ba mi spo/ kham 'phro mi bcad/ rkan mi tog /lag pa mi blta ba/ lhung bzed mi byog/ lag pa mi sprug /
<p>119a.5</p>na pA tra saM d+hU na kaM/ nastU pA kr-i ti mi ba mr-id+ya piN+Da pA traM pa ri b+ho k+Sh+yAmaH/ na sA mi She Na bA Ni nA u da kas+thA la kaM gra hi Sh+yA maH/ na sA mi She No da ke nAn+ta ri kaM b+hik+Shu s+ye ta k+Sh+yA maH/ nA ba d+yAn pre k+Shi N+yon+ta ri ka s+ya b+hi k+ShoHpA tra ma ba lo ka yi Sh+yA maH/ na sA mi Sha u da kaM
<p>119a.6</p>lhung bzed mi skyom/ mchod rten 'dra bar byas te zas mi bza'/ lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi gzung / drung na 'dug pa'am dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chus mi gtor/ drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta/ khyim du 'dug pa la
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>an+tar+g+r-i he ts+tshor yi Sh+yA mas+san+taM gr-i hi Na ma na ba lo kyA/ na bA tre Na bi g+ha saM ts+tsho ra yi Sh+yA maH/ nA nA stIr+N+Na pr-i thi bI pra de she pA traMs+thA pa yi Sh+yA maH/ not+thi tA pA traM nirmA da yi Sh+yA maH/ na ta Te na pra pA te na prag+b+hA re pA traM s+thA pa yi Sh+yA maH/ na na d+yA
<p>119b.2</p>ma dris par zas dang 'bags pa'i chu khyim pa'i khyim du mi dbo/ /lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi 'dor/ 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi bzhag /'grengs te lhung bzed mi dkru/ gad kha ma yin pa dang g.yangs ma yin pa dang dkan gzar bo ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya/ 
<p>119b.3</p>hAr+Ya hA ri N+yAM pra ti shra ta pA tre No da ka gra hi Sh+yA maH/ not+thi to ni ShaN+N+yA yA glA nA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na ni ShaN+Na ni pan+nA yA glA nA ya d+harmaM de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na nI tsa sta ra ke A sa ne ni ShaN+Na uts+tsa ta ra ke A sa ne ni ShaN+NA yA glA nA ya d+harmaM de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na pr-iSh+Tha to gats+tsha taHpur to gats+tsha te aglA nA ya d+harmaM de
<p>119b.4</p>'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu mi bcu/ min bar 'dug pa la 'grengs te chos mi bshad/ min bar nyal ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad/ mi na bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad/ mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos mi
<p>119b.5</p>sha yi Sh+yA maH/ not+pa the na gats+tsha taHpa the na gats+tsha te aglA nA ya d+harmaM de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ nong+guN+Thi kA kr-i tA yAglA nA ya d+harmaM de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ no ta kr-iSh+Ti kA kr-i tA yAglA nA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ not+sak+ti ka kr-i tA yAglA nA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na bya sti kA kr-i ta yAglA nA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na par+Ya sti kA kr-i tA
<p>119b.6</p>bshad/ mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad/ mi na bar mgo g.yogs pa la chos mi bshad/ mi na bar brdzes pa la chos mi bshad/ mi na bar gzar ba la chos mi bshad/ mi na bar gnya' gong du bsnol ba la chos mi bshad/ mi na bar
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>yAglA nA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ noSh+NI Sha shi ra se d+harman+de sha yi Sh+ya maH/ na khau lA shi ra se d+harman de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na mau li shi ra se d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na beSh+Ti ta shi ra se d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na ha s+t+yA rU D+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ nA shwa rUT+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na shi bi kA
<p>120a.2</p>phrag pa gnyis ka la gzar ba la chos mi bshad/ skra do ker can la chos mi bshad/ zhwa gyon pa la chos mi bshad/ mgo cod pan can la chos mi bshad/ mgo dkris pa la chos mi bshad/ glang po che la zhon pa la chos mi bshad/ rta la zhon pa la chos mi bshad/ khyogs
<p>120a.3</p>rUD+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na yA nA rUD+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na pA da kA rU D+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na daN+Da pA Na ye d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ nats+tsha tra pA Na ye d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na shas+t+ra pA Na ye d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na khaD+ga pA Na ye d+harman+de sha yi
<p>120a.4</p>na 'dug pa la chos mi bshad/ bzhon pa'i steng na 'dug pa la chos mi bshad/ lham mthon po gyon pa la chos mi bshad/ lag na 'khar ba thogs pa la chos mi bshad/ lag na gdugs thogs pa la chos mi bshad/ lag na mtshon thogs pa la chos mi bshad/ lag na ral gri thogs pa la
<p>120a.5</p>Sh+yA maH/ nA yu d+ha pA Na ye d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na san+nad+d+hA ya d+harman+de sha yi Sh+yA maH/ na glA na ut+thi ta uts+tsA ra pra srA baM ka ri Sh+yA maH/ nA glA na u da ka uts+tsA ra bra srA baM khe TaM si g+hA Na kaM bAn+taM bi rik+taM tso ra yi Sh+yA maH/ nA glA nA sa ha ri ta pr-i thi bI pra de she uts+tsA ra bra srA baM khe TaM siM g+hA Na kaM
<p>120a.6</p>chos mi bshad/ lag na dgra cha thogs pa la chos mi bshad/ go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad/ mi na bar 'greng ste gshang gci mi bya/ mi na bar chu'i nang du gshang gci dang mchil ma dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang kha nas byung ba mi dor/ mi na bar rtswa sngon po yod pa'i phyogs su gshang gci dang mchil ma
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>bAn+taM bi rik+taM ts+tsho ra yi Sh+yA maH/ na sA d+hi ka pau ru Sh+yaM br-i k+Sha ma bi ro k+Sh+yA ma a n+ya trA pA da i ti shi k+ShA ka ra NI yA/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun la/ saM mu kha bi na yaH/ smr-i ti bi na yaH/ a mU D+ha bi na yaH/ yad+b+hU yaHI shI kI yaH/ ta tra
<p>120b.2</p>dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang kha nas byung ba mi dor/ gnod pa byung ba ma gtogs par shing la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzeg pa la bslab par bya/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa/ dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa/ ma myos par 'dul bar 'os pa/ gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os pa/ de'i
<p>120b.3</p>swa b+hA bai ShI yaH/ tr-i Na prastA ra kaH/ pra ti dz+nyA kA ra kaH/ chad pas bcad cing gso ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ bi na yA ti sA ri NI yaH/ de sha nA ka ra NI yaH/ sam+ba ra ka ra NI yaH/ tardza nI yaM/ ni gar+d+ha NI yaM/ pra bA sa nI yaM/ prati saM ha ra NI yaM/ uta k+She pa nI yaM/ nA sha nI yaM/ ut+ba t+ti
<p>120b.4</p>ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug bar 'os pa/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa/ khas blang bar 'os pa/ 'dul ba dang 'gal ba/ ba shags par bya ba/ bsdam par bya ba/ bsdigs pa/ smad pa/ bskrad pa/ phyir gyed pa spang ba/ gnas nas dbyung ba/ bsnyil ba/ ltung ba
<p>120b.5</p>byut+thA naM/ pa ri bA saH/ mU la pa ri bA saH/ mU lA pa kaR+Sha pa ri bA saH/ mA nA pyaM/ mU la mA nA pyaM/ mU lA pa kaR+Sha mA nA pyaM/ tsir+Na mA nA pyaM/ A bar+ha NaM/ ts+tshan+da pa ri shud+d+hiH/ gsol ba dang las la sogs pa'i ming la/ muk+ti kA dz+nyAb+tiH/ dz+nyAp+ti karmAH/ dz+nyA p+ti
<p>120b.6</p>las bslang ba/ spo ba/ gzhi nas spong ba/ yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba/ mgu bar bya ba/ gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba/ yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba/ mgu ba byas/ dbyung ba/ dad pa dang yongs su dag pa/ gsol ba gcig pu/ gsol ba'i las/ gsol
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>dwi tI yaM/ dz+nyAp+ti tsa tur+thaH/ karma bA tsa nA/ pra tha mA karma bA tsa nA/ dwi tI yA karma pA tsa nA/ tr-i tI yA karma bA tsa nA/ ts+tshA yA/ pany+tsa sa ma yAH/ pany+tsa sa ma yAH/ tsa twA ro ni shra yaH/ br-i k+Sha mU laM/ piN+Da pA traH/ pAM suk+ku laM/ pU ti muk+ta b+hai Sha dz+yAM/ pA ta nI yA d+harmAH/ shra ma Na kA ra
<p>121a.2</p>ba dang gnyis/ gsol ba dang bzhi/ las brjod pa/ las brjod pa dang po/ las brjod pa gnyis pa/ las brjod pa gsum pa/ grib tshod/ dus lnga/ gnas bzhi/ shing drung / bsod snyoms/ phyag dar khrod/ sman bskus te bor ba/ ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos/ dge sbyong byed
<p>121a.3</p>kAH/ po Sha d+haH/ mang+ga la po Sha d+haM/ Arbat+poSha d+haM/ sha lA kA/ u pa ga tiH/ baR+Sho pa nA yi kA/ pra bA ra NaM/ pra bA ra kaH/ pra bA ri taM/ ka Thi nA sta ra NaM/ ka Thi naM/ ka Thi nA sta ra kaM/ skyabs gsum du 'gro ba'i ming la/ tr-i sha ra Na ga ma NaM/ bud+d+haM sha ra NaM gats+tsha mi
<p>121a.4</p>pa/ gso sbyong / bkra shis kyi gso sbyong / mi bde ba la gso sbyong bya ba/ tshul shing / gnas par dam bcas pa/ dbyar sbyor/ dgag dbye/ dgag dbye byed pa/ dgag phye/ sra brkyang gdeng ba/ sra brkyang / sra brkyang gding ba/ skyabs gsum du 'gro ba/ rkang gnyis kyi mchog
<p>121a.5</p>dwi pA dA nA ma g+r+yama?/ d+harmaM sha ra NaM gats+tshA mi bi rA gA Na ma g+r+yama?/ saM g+haM sha ra NaM gats+tshA mi ga NA nA ma g+r+yama?/ bslab ba'i gzhi brgyad la sogs pa'i ming la/ prA NA ti g+hA ta bi ra tiH/ a dat+tA dA na bi ra tiH/ a bra h+ma tsaR+Ya bi ra tiH/ mr-i ShA bA da bi ra tiH/ ma d+ya pA
<p>121a.6</p>sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshogs kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /srog gcod spong ba/ ma byin par len pa spong ba/ mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba/ myos par gyur
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>na bi ra tiH/ gan+d+ha mA l+ya bi le pa na bar+Na ka d+hA ra Na bi ra tiH/ uts+tsha sha ya na ma hA sha ya na bi ra tiH/ bi kA la b+ho dzA na bi ra tiH/ sa man+bA ha ra A tsAr+Ya/ shr-i No tu b+ha dan+tA saM g+haH/ yA badz+dzi bama?/ ul+lum+pa tu mAma?/ a nu shik+She/ a nu
<p>121b.2</p>pa'i btung ba spong ba/ spos dang kha dog dang byug pa dang phreng ba thogs pa spong ba/ khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po spong ba/ dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba/ slob dbon dgongs su gsol/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ bdag drang du gsol/ rjes su slob bo/ rjes su
<p>121b.3</p>bid+hI ye/ a nu ka ro mi/ dge sbyong du byed pa'i chos bzhi'i ming la/ tsa twA raHshra ba Na kA ra kA d+harmAH/ A kruSh+Te nan pra t+yA kroSh+Ta byaM/ ro Shi te na na pra ti ro Shi ta byaM/ b+haN+Di te na na pra tI Di ta byaM/ rab tu byung ba la sogs pa'i ming la/ pra bra dzi taH/ u pa sam+ban+naH/ shra ma NaH/ b+hi k+ShuH/ 
<p>121b.4</p>sgrub po/ rjes su bgyid do/ /dge sbyong du byed pa'i chos bzhi/ gshe yang slar mi gshe/ khros kyang slar mi khro bar bya/ mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'bru bar bya/ brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg par bya/ rab tu byung ba/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa/ dge sbyong / dge slong / 
<p>121b.5</p>d+hi k+Shu NI/ shra ma Ne raH/ shra ma Ne ri kA/ shik+Sha mA NA/ ma hAl+la kaH/ shi k+ShA dat+ta kaH/ u pA sa kaH/ u pA si kA/ po Sha d+hi kaH/ u pA d+h+yA yaH/ A tsAr+YaH/ karma kA ra kaH/ ra ho\u0f85nu shA sa kaH/ ni shra ya dA pa kaH/ pA ThA tsAr+YaH/ s+tha bi raH/ da hraH/ na ba karmi kaH/ bai yA br-i t+ya ka raH
<p>121b.6</p>dge slong ma/ dge tshul/ dge tshul ma/ dge slob ma/ rgan zhugs/ bslab ba byin pa/ dge bsnyen/ dge bsnyen ma/ gso sbyong ba/ mkhan po/ slob dpon/ las byed pa/ gsang ste ston pa/ gnas sbyin pa/ klog pa'i slob dpon/ gnas brtan/ gzhon rabs/ lag gi bla/ zhal ta pa/ 
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>shi Sh+yaH/ pra shi Sh+yaH/ an+ta bA sI/ pa sh+tsA T+shu ma NaH/ ma d+h+yaH/ na ba kaH/ br-id+d+hAn+taH/ na bAn+taH/ nai bA si kaH/ A gan+tu kaH/ ga mi kaH/ A ga mi kaH/ kA la pat+t+ri kaH/ saM dz+nyA bi k+ShuH/ pra ti dz+nyA b+hi k+ShuH/ b+hi k+Sha ta i ti b+hi k+ShuH/ 
<p>122a.2</p>slob ma/ yang slob/ nye gnas/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong / bar ma/ gsar bu/ rgan rims/ gzhon rims/ gzhi ba/ glo bur du 'ongs pa/ 'gro bar chas pa/ 'ongs pa/ lhung bzed nag po can/ ming gi dge slong / khas 'che ba'i dge slong / slong ba'i phyir dge slong / 
<p>122a.3</p>b+hin+na kle sha twAtra b+hi k+ShuH/ dz+nyAp+ti tsa tur+tha karma No pa saM pan+no b+hik+ShuH/ rab tu byung ba'i gzhi la/ ste ya saM bA si kaH/ nA nA saM bA si kaH/ a saM bA si kaH/ tIr+thi kA ba krAn+ta kaH/ mA tr-i g+hA ta kaH/ pi tr-i g+hA ta kaH/ ar+hata? g+hA ta ka /saM g+ha b+he da kaH/ ta
<p>122a.4</p>nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong / gsol ba bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyir dge slong / rku thabs su gnas pa/ tha dad du gnas pa/ gnas par mi bya ba/ mu stegs can zhugs pa/ ma gsod pa/ pha gsod pa/ dgra bcom pa gsod pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa/ de
<p>122a.5</p>thA ga ta s+yAn+ti ke duSh+Ta tsit+ta ru d+hi rot+pA da kaH/ b+hik+Shu NI dU Sha kaH/ pu ru ShaH/ s+t+rI paN+Da kaH/ dzA ti paN+Da kaH/ pak+Sha paN+Da kaH/ A sak+ta pra dur+b+hA nI paN+Da kaH/ IR+Sh+ya paN+Da kaH/ A pat+paN+Da kaH/ ShaN+D+haH/ u b+ha ya byany+dza naH/ ang+gu lI pha Na hasta kaH/ a
<p>122a.6</p>bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag 'byin pa/ dge slong ma sun phyung ba/ skyes pa/ bud med/ ma ning / skyes nas ma ning du gyur pa/ ma ning zla phyed pa/ 'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning / ma ning phrag dog can/ nyams pa'i ma ning / za ma/ mtshan gnyis pa/ lag pa'i sor mo zlum por 'jas pa/ mchu
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>noSh+Tha kaH/ tsi trAng+gaH/ a ti br-id+d+haH/ a ti bA la kaH/ khaN+dzaH/ khe laH/ kAN+Da ri kaH kA NaH/ kU NiH/ kub+dzaH/ bA ma NaH/ ma la gaN+DaH/ mU kaH/ ba d+hi raH/ pI Tha sarbI/ sh+lI pa dI/ s+t+rI ts+tshin+naH/ b+hA ra ts+tshin+naH/ mArgats+tshin+naH/ tA la muk+taH/ kan+da lits+tshan+naH/ 
<p>122b.2</p>med pa/ lus rma mtshan can/ rgan ches pa/ gzhon ches pa/ theng po/ gyol bo/ smad 'chal/ zhar ba/ la gsor rdum po/ sgur bo/ mi'u thung / lnga ba/ lkugs pa/ 'on pa/ rten 'phye/ rkang 'bam/ bud med kyis dub pa/ khur gyi dub pa/ lam gyi dub pa/ ya za ma lug /gta' gam pa/ 
<p>122b.3</p>rA dza b+ha TaH/ tsau ra d+h+wa dzA bad+d+ha kaH/ ha ri dra ke shaH/ ha ri ha ke shaH/ a ba dA ta ke shaH/ nA ga ke shaH/ ha ri ke shaH/ ka pi la ke shaH/ a ke sha kaH/ g+hA TA shi raH/ bat+tu shi rA/ a ti s+thU laH/ a ti hra swaH/ a ti dIr+g+haH/ kr-i shA la kaH/ bi kaT kaH/ 
<p>122b.4</p>rgyal pos bkrabs pa/ chom rkun bar grags pa/ skra ser ba/ skra ljang gu ba/ skra dkar ba/ skra ba lang gi spu 'dra ba/ skra ser skya/ skra ser/ skra med/ mgo 'bar 'bur can/ glang po che/ ha cang sbom pa/ ha cang thung ba/ ha cang ring ba/ skem po/ lus nyams pa/ 
<p>122b.5</p>nI lats+tsha bi ba r+N+NaH/ pI tats+tsha bi bar+N+NaH/ lo hi tats+tsha bi bar+N+NaH/ a ba dA tats+tsha bi bar+N+NaH/ be pA Ta kaH/ kha ra shIR+ShaH/ sU kar shIR+ShaH/ dwi shIR+ShaH/ shwa shIR+ShaH/ a shIR+Sha kaH/ hasti kar+NaH/ a shwa kar+N+NaH/ go Na kar+N+NaH/ marka Ta
<p>122b.6</p>sha mdog sde ches pa/ sha mdog ser ches pa/ sha mdog dmar shas che pa/ sha mdog dkar ches pa/ lus slebs pa 'dra ba/ mgo bong bu'i lta ba/ mgo phag gi lta bu/ mgo gnyis/ mgo khyi'i lta bu/ mgo'u chung / rna ba glang po che lta bu/ rna ba rta'i lta bu/ rna ba glang gi lta bu/ rna ba spre'u'i
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>kar+N+NaH/ kha ra kar+N+NaH/ sU ka ra kar+N+NaH/ e ka kar+N+NaH/ a kar+N+NaH/ lo hi tAk+ShaH/ a ti ban+tA k+ShaH/ tsul+lA k+ShaH/ a ti ping+ga lAk+ShaH/ kA tsA k+ShaH/ skan+d+hA k+ShaH/ bud+bu dA k+ShaH/ e kA k+ShaH/ a na k+Sha kaH/ a shwa nA saH/ hasti nA saH/ go Na
<p>123a.2</p>lta bu/ rna ba bong bu'i lta bu/ rna ba phag pa'i lta bu/ rna gcig pa/ rna med pa/ mig dmar ba/ mig ha cang che ba/ mig chung / mig ha cang ser ba/ shel mig /phrag mig /mig chu bu ra lta bu/ mig gcig pa/ mig med pa/ sna rta'i lta bu/ sna glang po che'i lta bu/ sna ba
<p>123a.3</p>nA saH/ marka Ta nA saH/ kha ra nA saH/ sU ka ra nA saH/ e ka nA saH/ a nA saH/ hasti dzo DaH/ a shwa dzo DaH/ go Na dzo DaH/ marka Ta dzo DaH/ kha ra dzo DaH/ sU ka ra dzo DaH/ e ka dzo DaH/ a dzo DaH/ hasti ngan+taH/ 
<p>123a.4</p>glang gi lta bu/ sna spre'u 'i lta bu/ sna bong bu'i lta bu/ sna phag gi lta bu/ sna sbubs gcig pa/ sna med/ ko sgo glang po che'i lta bu/ ko sko rta'i lta bu/ ko sko ba lang gi lta bu/ ko sko spre'u'i lta bu/ ko sko bong du'i lta bu/ ko sko phag gi lta bu/ kos smyung / kos med/ so glang po che'i
<p>123a.5</p>go Na dan+taH/ a shwa dan+taH/ kha ra dan+taH/ marka Ta dan+taH/ sU ka ra dan+taH/ e ka dan+taH/ a dan+taH/ a ti grI baH/ a grI baH/ lAng+gu la ts+tshin+naH/ bA tA N+DaH/ e kAN+DaH/ a naN+Da kaH/ a ti ki lA sI/ an+d+ha laH/ dzA t+yan+d+haH/ 
<p>123a.6</p>lta bu/ so ba glang gi lta bu/ so rta'i lta bu/ so bong bu'i lta bu/ so spre'u'i lta bu/ so phag gi lta bu/ so gcig pa/ so med/ mgul rings ches pa/ mjing nub/ pho mtshan chad pa/ rlig rlugs/ rlig gcig /rlig med/ ma 'os par ngal skyen pa/ long ba'am ldongs pa/ dmus long / 
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>kuN+DaH/ phak+kaH/ pAng+guH/ tsi p+pi tanA saH/ bi ra la dan+taH/ dan+tu raH/ ke ka raH/ To rAk+ShaH/ pi ts+tsa DaH/ ba kra ni tam+baH/ tun+di laH/ saM ku tsi taH/ khak+kha laH/ dzA DaH/ gil+la peT+TaH/ lam+bo daraH/ pu ruShA nu kr-i tis+t+rI/ s+t+ya nu kr-i ti pu ru ShaH/ pA pa lak+Sha NaH/ 
<p>123b.2</p>lag rdum/ grum po/ zha bo/ sna le ba/ so brod/ so sto/ mig yo ba/ mig nongs pa/ tshag po/ rked mchu/ lte 'bur/ rkang lag 'khums pa/ dig pa/ glen pa/ gsus 'phyang / gsus 'phyang / skyes pa 'dra ba'i bud med/ bud med 'dra ba'i skyes pa/ sdig sdig lta'i mtshan nyid/ 
<p>123b.3</p>shwa mu khaH/ b+hin+na kalpa dwI pAn+ta ra dzaH/ kar+N+Na prA ba ra NaH/ e ka na khaH/ sa mu dra ka le khaH/ pak+Sha ha taH/ liM ga shi raH/ gul+ma ke shaH/ an+taHkub+dzaH/ ba hi kub+dzaH/ dwi kub+dzaH/ sa hi tAng+gu liH/ a naM gu liH/ Sha DaM gu 'iH/ bak+Sh+mA k+ShaH/ 
<p>123b.4</p>gdong khyi'i lta bu/ gling gzhan nas skyes pa tshul byad mi 'dra ba/ rna gyon/ sen mo gcig pa/ lag pa 'jas te ltebs pa/ gzhogs phyed 'jas pa/ mgo smyung / skra sgra sgre can/ sgur po/ sgye'o/ /dgye gur gyur ba/ sor mo 'byar ba/ sor mo med pa/ sor mo drug pa/ rdzi ma nang du 'dzug pa/ 
<p>123b.5</p>na ku lAk+ShaH/ kim+pi lAk+ShaH/ bi pa rI tAk+ShaH/ mi li tAk+ShaH/ shikyA k+ShaH/ a k+ShA k+ShaH/ ak+Shi shA laH/ a k+Shi shat+t+raH/ ak+Shi bi tsa rtsi kaH/ ak+Shi dar+d+ruH/ nA Di kar+N+NaH/ aN+Da lAM gU la pra tits+tsha naH/ mU D+haH/ e ka pA daH/ e ka hastaH/ a hastaH/ 
<p>123b.6</p>mig ne'u le'i lta bu/ 'ug mig po/ mig phyin ci log /mig bar 'dzings pa/ mig rlo/ mig zlum po/ mig po che/ mig mdzer can/ mig 'brum can/ mig shu can/ rna mchog sbu 'chas/ rlig pa'i nang du mtshan ma nub pa/ glen pa/ rkang gcig pa/ lag pa gcig /lag med/ 
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>a pA daH/ kaSh+mI li tA k+ShaH/ sam+b+hin+na byany+dzarnA/ sa dA pra sra ba NI/ a lo hi nI/ nai mit+ti kI/ byany+dzA na pa ri bar+t+ta te/ yo byad bcu gsum gyi ming la/ saM g+hA TI/ ut+ta rA saM gaH/ an+ta rbA saH/ saM ka k+Shi kA/ pra ti si ka k+Shi kA/ ni bA sa na/ pra ti ni bA sa na/ 
<p>124a.2</p>rkang med/ mig sle'o/ /sle 'dams pa/ rtag tu zla mtshan zag pa/ zla mtshan med pa/ mtshan tsam yod pa/ mtshan 'gyur/ snam sbyar/ bla gos/ mthang gos/ rdul gzan/ rdul gzan gyi gzan/ sham thabs/ sham thabs kyi
<p>124a.3</p>ke sha pra ti gra ha NaM/ snA tra shA Ta kaM/ ni Shad naM/ pra t+yAstA raH/ kaN+Du pra tits+tshA da naM/ baR+ShA shA TI tsI ba raM/ pa ri skA ra tsI ba raMH/ dge slong gi yo byad kyi ming la/ pA traM/ ku pA traM/ shi kyaM/ pA tra po Ni kaH/ pA tra s+tha bi kaH/ pA tra ka Ta kaM/ tsa ko ra kaM/ tra pu maN+Da la kaM/ 
<p>124a.4</p>gzan/ skra bzed/ khrus ras/ gding ba/ g.yan pa dgab pa/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen/ yo byad kyi gos/ lhung bzed/ lhung bzed chung ngu / dra ba/ lhung bzed kyi snod/ lhung bzed kyi snod/ lhung bzed bzhag pa'i gdub bu/ skon bu kha sbyar/ zha nye'i dbyar 'dab
<p>124a.5</p>kha k+kha raM/ sar kaM/ b+hai Sha dz+ya sha ra ba kaM/ ka lA tsi kaH/ pA tra ba sh+yA pa kaM/ piN+Do pa d+hA naM/ mu kha pots+tsha nama?/ kuN+Di kA/ barba ni kA/ pra ti gra haH/ lak+ka NaH/ k+Sha m+paNama?/ me lan+du kaM/ pU lA/ maN+Da pU lA/ u pAnata?/ pA da beSh+Ta ni kA/ sU tsI/ sU tsI gr-i ha kaM/ mu drA/ dzi hwa nirle kha ni kA/ 
<p>124a.6</p>'khar bsil/ por bu/ sman por/ kha gzar/ lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs/ lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs/ gdong phyis/ ril ba spyi blugs/ ril ba/ chol zangs/ 'ur rdo/ ram phyis/ lham sgrog gu can/ lham yu can/ mchil lham/ 'bob/ khab/ khab ral/ rgya/ lce gzhar/ 
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>shas+t+ra kaM/ kA ka tsi tsu kaM/ kuk+ku Ta pak+Sha kaM/ ts+tsA traM/ sUr+Ya kAn+taH/ tsan+d+ra kAn+taH/ na ma taM/ ko tsa ba kaM/ prA bA ra kaM/ tsi li mi ni kA/ bi ra li kA/ bi d+ha ma naM/ byaM dzA naM/ ma sha ka bA ra NaM/ bim+bo pa d+hA naM/ si ro pa d+hA naM/ tu li kA/ bri si kA /tsa tur shra kaM/ ka lan+da kaM/ kA ya ban+d+ha naM/ paT+Ti kA/ lo ThA
<p>124b.2</p>gri'u/ gri bya rog gi mchu lta bu/ gri bya gag gi gshog pa lta bu/ gdugs/ me shel/ chu shel/ phying pa/ la ba/ be'u ras/ par thang / seng ras/ bsil yab/ sbrang yab/ sdas nang tshangs can/ stan nang tshangs can/ gong bu/ ska rags/ shur bu/ lcags
<p>124b.3</p>kaM/ aSh+kuny+tsa kaM/ ma ru tsi kA/ be NiH/ lAm+pa kaM/ ku sU la kaM/ kA yong+g+ha R+Sha NaM/ mas ka ku Ti/ kho lA/ ko la ha la s+tha bi kA/ tsI ba ra br-i si kA/ ka ra kaM/ kuN+Da la kaM/ ka TA ha kaM/ a yo dro Ni kA/ aM gA ra s+thA pa naM/ sha ka Ti kA/ pa tsa ni kA/ ka pha li kA/ 
<p>124b.4</p>pod/ rgya cang / shur bu phre'u/ lan bu/ stod kor nang tshangs can/ shing nga dpung bcad/ rnag gzan/ sbrang skyabs/ zhwa/ ras ma snod/ chos gos kyi gtor bu/ bya ma bum/ zangs bum/ zangs sam rdza bo/ lcags kyi gzhong rings/ zhugs ling / dog la/ sla nga / na la
<p>124b.5</p>ka Tats+tshuH/ b+hai Sha dz+yAM dzA na nA li kA/ shuk+tiH/ ku tu paM/ kats+tsa buT+TaM/ la ba Na pA ta li kA/ sh+leSh+ma ka TA ha kaM/ pa ri srA ba NaM/ khal+la kaM/ kuN+Di kA/ parma kA na kaM/ ra ba Na kaM/ mo tsa na paT+Ta kaM/ daN+Da pho NaM/ d+hA ra Na pA traM/ sa ra kaM/ pA nI yas+thA la kaM/ 
<p>124b.6</p>ze/ mig sman snod dong bu/ nya phyis/ 'bru mar snod/ mchan khug /tsha khug /mchil ma'i snod/ chu tshags/ chu tshags gru gsum/ ril tshags/ ril ba zhabs tshags can/ bum tshags gce'u can/ bsal tshags/ spyangs tshags/ tshags rten snod/ phor bu/ chu rdza/ 
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>a nu pA ra paT+Ta kaM/ a ya spiN+DaM/ shr-iM kha li kA/ nai tri kaM/ nastaHka ra NaM/ ka The naM/ kAn+tA ri kA/ tsar+pa Ta kaM/ ku ThA ri kA/ ab+dzA na sha lA kA/ tsI ba ra baM shaH/ kha T+wA/ many+tsaH/ pA+e Thi kA/ pra ti pA da kaM/ a dzA pa da ka daN+DaH/ nA ga dan+ta kaM/ darbi kA/ s+phi dzi
<p>125a.2</p>phul ba'i btung phor/ lcags kyi gar bu/ lcags thag /sman gce'u/ snar blugs pa'i spyad/ sra brkyang / gzar thag /dbang bu/ sta re/ bsku ba'i thur ma/ gos kyi gdang / khri/ khri'u/ skra'i rkang rten/ dbyugs gu skam kha/ zung nga / gzar bu/ thal phyag /
<p>125a.3</p>karmA ra b+haN+Di kA/ nA pi ta b+haN+DaM/ g+ha Ta b+he da na kaM/ karba raH/ u da ka b+hAN+DA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ pA dA d+hiSh+ThA naM/ gang zag bcu gnyis kyi ming la/ bi hA rod+de sha kaH/ b+ha k+Shod+de sha kA/ ya bA gU tsA ra kaH/ khA d+ya ka tsA ra kaH/ pha la tsA ra kaH/ yat+ki ny+tsi ts+tsA ra kaH/ b+hAN+Da go pa kaH/ b+hAN+Da b+hA dzA kaH/ baR+ShA shA TI
<p>125a.4</p>mgar spyad/ 'dreg mkhan gyi lag cha/ rdza gzong / dbyib mo'am gyo mo/ chu snod kyi gzhi/ rkang rten/ gnas khang bsko ba/ zas la bsko ba/ thug pa 'grim pa/ bag chos 'grim pa/ shing thog 'grim pa/ phran tshegs 'grim pa/ snod spyad 'drub pa/ snod spyad 'ged pa/ dbyar
<p>125a.5</p>go pa kaH/ tsI ba ra go pa kaH/ tsI ba ra b+hA dzA kaH/ u ba d+hi bA ri kaH/ bre Sha kaH/ b+hA dzA na bA ri kaH/ pA nI ya bA ri kaH/ prA sA di bA ri kaH/ pa ri ShaN+Da bA ri kaH/ sha ya nA sa na bA ri kaH/ muN+Da sha ya nA sa na bA ri kaH/ ts+tshaN+Di kA bA ri kaH/ sde bzhi rnam pa bco brgyad du gyes ba'i ming la/ A r+Ya sarbA
<p>125a.6</p>gyi ras chen sbed pa/ gos sbed pa/ gos 'ged pa/ dge skos/ mang ga gzhug pa/ sdeng spyad kyi zhal ta ba/ chu'i zhal ta pa/ mdzes 'chos/ bang rim gyi zhal ta pa/ mal stan gyi zhal ta pa/ mal stan gyi phyogs kyi zhal ta pa/ sge'u chung bsrung ba/ 'phags pa thams cad
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>sti bA dAH/ mU lasarbA sti bA dAH/ kA sh+ya pI yAH/ ma hI sA sa kAH/ d+har+m+ma gup+tAH/ ba hu shru tI yAH/ tA mra shA TI yAH/ bi b+ha dz+ya bA di naH/ A r+Ya sam+ma tI yAH/ kau ru kul+la kAH/ A ban+ta kAH/ bAt+sI pu trI yAH/ ma hA sAM g+haM
<p>125b.2</p>yod par smra ba'i sde/ gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde/ 'od srung ba'i sde/ sa ston sde/ chos srung sde/ mang du thos pa'i sde/ gos dmar sde/ rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde/ 'phags pa kun gyis bkur ba'i sde/ sar sgrogs rigs kyi sde/ srung ba pa'i sde/ gnas ma bu pa'i sde/ dge 'dun phal chen
<p>125b.3</p>kAH/ pUrba shai lAH/ a pa ra shai lAH/ hai ma ba tAH/ lo kot+ta ra bA hi naH/ pradz+nyA p+ti bA hi naH/ A r+Ya s+thA bi rAH/ ma hA bi hA ra bA si naH/ dze ta ba nI yAH/ a b+ha ya gi ri bA si naH/ bzhi bcu bdun la/ pra bra dz+yA bstuH/ po Sha d+ha
<p>125b.4</p>pa'i sde/ shar gyi ri bo'i sde/ nub kyi ri bo'i sde/ gangs ri pa'i sde/ 'jig rten 'das smra'i sde/ btags par smra ba'i sde/ 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i sde/ gtsug lag khang chen gnas sde/ rgyal byed tshal gnas pa'i sde/ 'jigs med ri gnas sde/ rab tu byung ba'i gzhi/ gso sbyong gi
<p>125b.5</p>bstuH/ baR+ShA bstuH/ pra bA ra Na bstuH/ ka Thi na b+s+tuH/ tsI ba ra bstuH/ tsarma bstuH/ b+hai Shadz+ya bstuH/ karma bstuH/ pra ti kri yA bstuH/ kA lA kA la sam+pA ta bstuH/ b+hU myan+ta ras+tha tsa ra Na bstuH/ pa ri karma Na bstuH/ karma b+he da bstuH/ 
<p>125b.6</p>gzhi/ dbyar gyi gzhi/ dgag dbye'i gzhi/ sra brkyang gi gzhi/ gos kyi gzhi/ ko lpags kyi gzhi/ rtsi'i gzhi/ las kyi gzhi/ phyir bcos pa'i gzhi/ dus dang dus ma yin pa dang sbyar ba'i gzhi/ sa gzhan du spo ba'i spyod pa'i gzhi/ yongs su sbyangs pa'i gzhi/ las mi mthun ba'i gzhi/ 
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>tsakra b+he da bstuH/ a d+hi ka ra Na bstuH/ sha ya nA sa na bstuH/ chu rung ba rnam pa lnga'i ming la/ saM g+ha kalpaH/ pung+ga la kalpaH/ pa ri swA ba Na kalpaH/ a ho rA tra kalpaH/ u da pA na kalpaH/ dge sbyong gi skyon du brtsi ba'i ming la/ a b+hi k+ShuH/ a shra
<p>126a.2</p>'khor lo mi mthun pa'i gzhi/ rtsod pa'i gzhi/ mal cha'i gzhi/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba/ gang zag gis rung ba/ chu tshags kyis rung ba/ nyin zhag gis rung ba/ khron pas rung ba/ dge slong du mi rung ba'am dge slong ma yin pa/ dge sbyong du mi rung
<p>126a.3</p>ma NaH/ a shA kya /pu trI yaH/ d+h+wa s+ya te b+hik+Shu b+hA bAtra/ ha ta ma s+ya b+ha ba ti shrA ma N+yaM/ d+h+wa staH/ ma thi te/ pa ti taM/ pa rA dzi taM/ a pra t+yud+d+hAR+Ya ma s+ya b+ha ba ti shrA ma N+yaM/ tad+ya thA tA le masta kAts+tshin+na
<p>126a.4</p>ba'am dge sbyong ma yin pa/ shAkya'i bur mi rung ba'am shAkya'i bu ma yin pa/ dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur/ de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur/ nyams pa/ bcom pa/ ltung ba/ pham par gyur pa/ de'i dge slong gi tshul phyir bslang du med par 'gyur/ dper na shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin
<p>126a.5</p>a b+ha byo ha ri ta twA ya/ duHshI laH/ pA pa d+har+m+maH/ an+taHpU tiHa pa shru taH/ ka sham+ba ka dzA taH/ shang+kha swA ra sa mA tsA raH/ a shra ma NaHshra ma Na pra ti dz+nyA/ a bra h+ma tsA ri bra h+ma tsA ri pra ti dz+nyAH/ shI la bi pan+naH/ 
<p>126a.6</p>sngon por 'gyur du mi rung ba'am mi btub/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos can/ khong myags shing phyir 'dzag pa/ shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/ lus bong ltar spyod pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge spyod du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/ tshul khrims nyams pa/ 
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>dr-iSh+Ti bi pan+naH/ A tsA ra bi pan+naH/ A dzI ba bi pan+naH/ shik+ShA b+h+raSh+TaH/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i ming la/ gan+d+ha ku TI/ bi hA raM/ la ya nam/ baR+Sha kaH/ gaN+DI/ gaN+D+YAko Ta na kaM/ bai lA tsakraM/ gos kyi gzhi'i ming la/ aur+Na kaM bA saH/ shA na kaM/ k+Shau ma kaM/ dau gU la kaM/ koT+Tam+pa kaM/ kar+pA
<p>126b.2</p>lta ba nyams pa/ cho ga nyams pa/ 'tsho ba nyams pa/ bslab pa zhig pa/ dre gtsang khang / gtsug lag khang / gnas khang / dbyar khang / gaN+Di/ gaN+Di'i the'u/ nyi tshod kyi 'khor lo/ /mal gos/ sha na'i ras/ zar ma'i ras/ do gu la'i ras/ ko tam pa'i ras/ ras
<p>126b.3</p>sa kaM/ kau she ya kaM/ aM shu kaM/ paT+Ta kaM/ pa TaH/ pa Ta kaM/ shA Ta kaM/ prA bA raH/ A mi laH/ kr-i mi li kA/ kr-i mi bar+NA/ sau mi li kA/ kA shi ka sUk+Sh+maM/ sa ma bar+NA/ durbar+NA/ A pa ran+ta kaM/ e ra kama?/ me ra kama?/ s+yan+d+ra ra kama?/ 
<p>126b.4</p>gos/ mon dar/ dar la/ dar/ snam bu/ ras yug chen/ ras yug phran/ be'u ras/ be 'u ras yug chen/ be'u ras dmar po/ /la dmar/ be'u phrug /yul ka shi ka'i ras phran/ kha dog ran ba/ kha dog ngan pa/ nyi 'og gi gos/ bal stan/ shing shun gyi gdan/ srin bal gyi gdan/ 
<p>126b.5</p>man+du ra kama?/ mr-i ta pa riSh+kA raH/ sha ma sA man+ta kaM/ yu gA/ dwi pu Ta saM g+hA TiH/ tr-i pu Ta saM g+hA TiH/ d+ha ni kaH/ tsI ba ra shro NI/ A nan+du paT+Ti kaH/ pha la kaH/ gaN+DU shi kaH/ u pa ni shra yaH/ A shra ya NI yaM/ kalpi kaM/ ut+ka tsaH/ pra ka tsaH/ 
<p>126b.6</p>ras bal gyi stan/ shi ba'i nor rdzas/ gru gang 'khor yug /zung / snam sbyar nang shun can/ snam sbyar sum rim pa/ cha ga stab pa/ chos gos kyi tshal bu/ mtha' bskor/ sgro gu'i rten ma/ lhan ba glon pa/ re zhig gnas bca' ba/ gnas bca' ba/ rung ba/ /skra gyen du sgreng ba lta bu/ skra zhig pa
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>ro ma pA taH/ 'dul ba las btus pa'i skad thor bu ba la/ dzA nan+ta gr-its+tshan+ti/ dzA nan+to nyapi na pr-its+tshan+ti/ kA le pr-its+tshan+ti/ ku la bar+YA ye Na sha lA kA tsAR+Ya te/ kA lA ti krAn+taM na pr-its+tshan+ti/ ar+tho ba saM hi taM pr-its+tshan+ti/ a nar+tho ba si hi taM na pr-its+tshan+ti/ shik+Sha pa da bradz+nyAp+tiH/ a s+yA mut+pat+tau/ 
<p>127a.2</p>lta bu/ spu sa la lhung ba lta bu/ mkhyen bzhin du 'dri/ mkhyen kyang mi 'dri/ dus su 'dri/ khyim rim gyis thur mas 'drim/ dus las yol bar mi 'dri/ don dang ldan par 'dri/ don dang mi ldan par mi 'dri/ bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba/ byung ba 'di la/ 
<p>127a.3</p>asmin+ni dA ne/ asmiM pra ka ra Ne/ asmin+ba stu ni/ pradz+nyAp+tiH/ a nu pradz+nyAb+tiH pra ti k+She paH/ a b+h+ya nu dz+nyA/ pra ti mo k+ShaH/ da k+Shi NI yaH/ sa bra h+ma tsA ri/ b+ha dan+taH/ A yuSh+mAnra/ A pat+tiH pA pat+ti kA/ s+thU lA t+ya ya/ duSh+k+r-i taM/ pra biSh+TaH
<p>127a.4</p>gleng gzhi 'di la/ skabs 'di la/ dang po 'di la'am gzhi 'di la/ bcas pa/ rjes su bcas pa/ so sor spang ba/ gnang ba/ so sor thar pa/ sbyin gnas/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ltung ba/ ltung byed/ nyes pa sbom po/ nyes byas/ bcug reg
<p>127a.5</p>spaR+ShasbI kr-i tau/ pra srA ba ka ra Ne pra srA ba ka ra Na s+ya mu khe bats+tso mArge bA/ a dat+ta s+ya/ pany+tsa mA Sha kA deH/ ste ya tsin+te na/ ma nu Sh+ya ga tiHpa ri gr-i hi ta s+ya/ tat+saM dz+nya yA/ ha ra Na hA ra Na yoH/ dU te nA pi/ dzI bi to pa ro d+haiH/ tats+tsin+te na/ ma nu Sh+ya ga teH/ 
<p>127a.6</p>nyams su myong bar byas/ zag byed du zag byed dam kha'am bshang ba'i lam du/ ma byin pa/ ma sha ka lnga la sogs pa/ rku sems kyis/ mi'i rgyud kyis yongs su bzung ba la/ der 'du shes bas/ rku'am rkur bcug pa dang / mngag pas kyang / srog bcad na/ de ltar bsam bas/ mir gyur pa/ 
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>ma nuSh+ya bi gra haH/ bi ni d+hA ya saM dz+nyA/ tat+saM dz+nya yA/ ut+ta ra ma nu Sh+ya d+harma yuk+ta tok+tA bAt+ma naH/ pa rA ba ga me/ a nA pat+tiH/ A di kArmi kaH/ ut+man+ta kaH/ bi k+Ship+ta tsit+taH/ be da nA b+hi tun+naH/ pra yo gi kI/ gurbI/ lag+h+wI/ sA ba she ShA/ 
<p>127b.2</p>mir chags pa/ 'du shes bsgyur ba/ de ltar 'du shes pas/ bdag mi'i chos bla ma dang ldan par smras pa/ pha rol gyis go ba/ ltung ba med pa/ las dang po pa/ myos pa/ sems 'khrugs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba/ sbyor ba las byung ba/ lci ba/ yang ba/ lhag ma yod pa/ 
<p>127b.3</p>ni ra ba she ShA/ A sap+ta maM yu ga mu pA dA ya/ pA tra ni kup+dzA naM/ sA shang+kaM/ sa pra ti b+ha ya b+hai ra ba saM ma taM/ Shad+bArgi kAH/ bi tsa Ta naM/ A ko Ta nam/ d+hA ba yetra/ rany+dza yetra/ A ko Ta yi tra/ gr-i ha byA ku li kA/ pu rA Nad+d+hi tI yA/ g+haN+D+d+yA ba g+ho Sha
<p>127b.4</p>lhag ma med pa/ pha ma'i rigs bdun rgyud tshun chad/ lhung bzed khas dbub pa/ dogs pa dad bcas pa/ bag tsha ba dang 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa/ drug sde/ rmal pa/ bcag pa/ 'khrur 'jug /'tshed du 'jug /'chag tu 'jug /khyim so/ /sngon gyi chung ma/ dril sgra las
<p>127b.5</p>NaM/ kAR+ShA pa NaM/ mA Sha kaM/ sam+p+ra dzA na mr-i ShA bA daH/ a gA ma kaH/ adz+nyA pa kaM/ sa ma graH/ bya graH/ pUrba tsa ra maH/ mr-i ta bai b+ha bang+gu kaH/ sAr+d+haM bi hA rI/ pra ti ban+d+haH/ ut+ku Tu kas+thaH/ 
<p>127b.6</p>bsgrags pa/ kaR+Sha paN/ ma sha ka /shes bzhin gyi rdzun smra ba/ go bar byed pa ma yin pa'am mi go ba/ shes par byed pa ma yin pa/ mthun pa/ mi mthun pa/ dang po dang tha mal sbyin pa/ shi ba'i nor bgo ba/ lhan cig gnas pa/ 'gog ba'am bgegs sam bar du gcod pa/ tsog pur 'dug pa/ 
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>an+taHsI mA/ kr-i te dam+be Sha ma/ pany+tsa maN+Da la ke na ban+da naM kr-i ta/ pra gr-i hi tA ny+dza li/ saM gtA d+hI naH/ pu rA kalpaH/ hai man+ti kaH/ grI Sh+maH/ bAR+Shi kaH/ mr-i ta bAR+Shi kaH/ dIr+g+ha bAR+Shi kaH/ po Sha d+has+tha pa naM/ tsUr+N+NaM/ 
<p>128a.2</p>mtshams kyi nang / cha byad 'di bzhin bya ba/ yan lag lngas phyag byas/ thal mo sbyar/ dge 'dun la rag lus pa/ sngon gyi cho ga /dgun gyi dus/ dpyid kyi dus/ dbyar gyi dus/ dbyar thung ngu'i dus/ dbyar ring po'i dus/ gso sbyong bzhag pa/ 'dag pa'i
<p>128a.3</p>phye dzon+ta kaH/ u da ka b+h+ra maH/ ku ru bin+daH/ la ya na pa ri hA raH/ ut+thAn kA ra kaH/ dan+ta kASh+Thamra/ A ro tsa nama?/ A ru NaM/ nI lA ru NaH/ pI tA ru NaH/ tA mrA ru NaH/ nai pats+tsh+ya ma/ tIr+thi kA/ a ba s+thaH/ arbAka/ ni mit+ta bi d+hi bar+YA
<p>128a.4</p>ma/ bsro khang / gtor khung / zha nye gdar/ gnas khang spags pa/ lag gi las byed pa/ so shing / gsol ba gdab pa/ skya rengs/ skya rengs dang po shar ba/ skya rengs bar ma/ skya rengs tha ma/ cha lugs/ mu stegs can gyi gnas/ tshu rol can nam tshun chad/ rtsod pa'i mtshan ma
<p>128a.5</p>yaH/ pra Ni d+hi karmA/ ka la ha kA ra kaH/ a ba sA ra Nama?/ prA ya sh+tsit+ti kaH/ shud+d+ha pA yat+ti kaH/ nai sargi kA pA ya ti kA/ kA kot+tA ya na sa mar+thaH/ tsa tuSh+kum+b+hi ka yA sarba ti/ ba ri b+hA btamra/ saM kA raH/ sa mArdza nI/ shautsa nama?/ b+h+r-i ku Ti/ bi lo maH/ pra ti lo
<p>128a.6</p>las bsgyur ba/ nan tur du bya ba/ 'thab krol byed pa/ bzod pa gsol ba/ ltung ba/ ltung ba ma 'dres pa/ spang ba'i ltung byed/ bya rog gam khwa skrod nus pa/ rkang lag bzhi yis 'phye ba/ bsgos pa/ phyag dar/ phyag ma/ bkru ba/ khro gnyer/ mi mthun pa/ mi mthun
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>maH/ pa ri dza naH/ ShaDa d+har+m+mAH/ Sha Da nu d+har+m+mAH/ pra ti gra haH/ a nu saM gaH/ an+ta rA yi ka d+har+m+maH/ ut+tha nama?/ a bi go pi taH/ pra kr-i tis+thaH/ ra tha kA raH/ saM bA d+ha pra de shaH/ bra Na sA man+ta kaH/ na go lo ma kaM ke shAts+tshe da yi tra/ muN+DanA/ d+b+yang+gu
<p>128b.2</p>pa/ g.yog 'khor/ chos drug /rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug /byin len/ rjes su 'brel pa/ bar du gcod pa'i chos/ ldang ba/ mnyams pa/ rang bzhin du 'dug pa/ ko lpags mkhan/ mdoms/ rma'i than kor/ skra chan bas mi breg /skra breg pa/ sor
<p>128b.3</p>lA bar+t+taH/ pra ti bat+mA b+ha ba tiH/ A tra yAtra/ sA ti sA ro b+ha ba ti/ shau TI raH/ uts+tsha ka raH/ ka raN+Da kaH/ ba hiHsam+b+r-i taH/ an+tarbi shA laH/ dzAl bA tA ya nama?/ tsa kr-i kaH/ ka po ta mA lA/ ka Tu ka te la mra/ A yas dArbi kA/ 
<p>128b.4</p>gnyis 'khris pa/ mthu yod pa'am nus pa'am dpyad bzod/ gsum man chad/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sgeg rdzas/ gram pa/ khang pa zlum po/ /phyi rub pa/ nang yangs pa/ skar khung dra ba can/ sgo gtan zung nga can/ stegs bu/ yungs mar/ lcags gzar/ 
<p>128b.5</p>bAd d+hA ba ni kA/ kurmA kr-i ti kha raH/ kun+ta pha la kaH/ ta la ko pa ri/ dz+yeSh+ThaH/ ma d+h+yaH/ ka nI ya me/ dza na pa da tsA ri kA/ karba Ta kaH/ u pa ni man+t+ra Nama?/ a ba d+h+yA ya ti/ k+Shi pa ni/ bi bA tsa ya ti/ shulkaH/ karmA dA nama?/ sam+ba ra
<p>128b.6</p>rkang pa bkru ba'i sa/ rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra ba rtsub pa/ mdung rtse/ khang steng / chen po/ bar ma/ chung ngam 'bring po tha chungs skabs dang sbyar/ yul rgyu ba/ ri 'or ba/ mgron du 'bod pa/ 'phya ba/ gzhogs 'phyas/ rnam par smod/ sho gam/ las su bsko ba/ sdom pa
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>rU TaH/ o shA Tu kaM/ mau na ma?/ e hi swA ga taH/ skad go 'dun la/ ba lA du pa krAn+taH/ A mr-i sha ti/ pa ra m+m+r-i sha ti/ a lam+b+ha na ma?/ ta ra pu TaH/ pra ti shro taH/ A ling+ga nama?/ ka brda kaH/ kA ka NiH/ mA Sha kaH/ kAR+Sha
<p>129a.2</p>chags/ 'dag rdzas/ mi smra ba/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so/ /mthus btsir/ nom pa/ 'ug /brag sprad/ gru btsums/ rgyun las bzlog pa/ mthang sbyar ba/ 'gron bu/ 'gron bu nyi shu'i rin/ ma sha ka 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin/ kaR+sha ba Na 'gron
<p>129a.3</p>pa NaH/ tsI ba ra b+hA N+Di kA/ tsI ba ra ka raN+Da ka ma?/ gar+b+hA yA ta naM/ a d+hi bA sa nama?/ many+tsaH/ pI ThaH/ g+ha TaH/ g+ha Ti kA/ ka ra ki NI kuN+Di kA/ kalpi kaH/ pa rish+tsa dza nama?/ g+haT+Ta nama?/ b+hA r+YA/ pra Na yaH/ pra ka TaH/ pa ri pA TiH/ ha ra ti pra t+yA ha ra ti/ 
<p>129a.4</p>bu stong drug brgya'i rin/ chos gos kyi snod/ chos gos kyi sgro ga /mngal rlug par bya ba/ gnang ngam rung bar bya ba/ khri/ khri'u/ rdza ma/ phru rtog /ril ba spyi blugs/ rung ba/ khyud pa/ bslas pa/ chung ma/ sdug pa/ gsal ba'am mngon pa/ rims kyis/ phrin phar bskyal ba dang phyir bskyal
<p>129a.5</p>A kaR+Sha Nama?/ pA TA pA Ti kA/ byA maH/ hastaH/ bi ta stiH/ ang+gu liH/ a nu that+sa nama?/ a n+ya thA b+hA gI yaH/ ts+tshan+da po Sha d+ha mA ro tsa ya ti A ro tsi taM tsa pra be da ya te/ pra ti bstu/ ud+b+r-i ta ka Thi naM/ ka Thi na stA raH/ saM kalpi ta mArga NaM/ 
<p>129a.6</p>ba/ drang bu/ lan gcig gnyis sprad pa/ 'dom/ khru/ mtho/ sor/ bskur/ gzhan gyi cha/ dad pa'i gso sbyong bgyi bar gsol ba 'debs so gsol ba yang mkhyen par gsol lo/ /nor dang 'dra ba/ sra brkyang phyung ba/ sra brkyang gding ba/ shom pa la sbyor ka byed pa/ 
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>ts+tshan+da dA ya kaH/ a d+hi ka ra Namra/ san+ni hi taM/ a pra ro ha Na d+harma kaH/ ku la pra ti saM be da kaH/ o shI ri kaH/ go laH/ Ti bya kaH/ praNi ta kaM bab+nan+tiH/ a hu saH/ saM ya ma ni kaH/ kri yA kA raH/ pa ri mArdza naM/ pra spo Ta ni/ 
<p>129b.2</p>dad pa 'bul ba/ rtsod pa/ bzhag pa'am gter du bcug pa/ mi skye ba'i chos can/ khyim so sor bsgo ba/ zha lu'am myu gu/ bum pa/ chu la mdzub mos se gol rdob pa/ skur 'dzugs pa'am yal zug khra ba/ mi chung ba/ yang dag par sdom pa/ khrims su byas pa/ byi bdar bya ba/ sprugs pa'am phyi
<p>129b.3</p>kau Ta kaH/ an+tarbAR+ShA/ ts+tshin+na bAR+Shi kaH/ a bAR+Shi kaH/ khaN+Da pul+laH/ lI lA yi ta taM/ san+tA na ba hu l+yaM/ d+harma pa Na naM/ bi pra bA da naM/ bi sam+bA da naM/ pu Ta kaM/ u pa ni man+t+ra NaM/ pU ti muk+taM/ kA li kaH/ yA mi kaH/ 
<p>129b.4</p>ba/ lcags kyi btsa'/ dbyar tshun chad/ dbyar gnas pa las nyams pa/ dbyar gnas su ma bzhugs pa'am lor ma lon pa/ khang pa ral zhing 'grums pa/ lus bsgyur ba/ rgyud mang ba/ chos 'tshong ba/ slu ba/ phur ma/ mgron du gnyer ba/ bkus ta bor ba/ dus su rung ba/ thun tshod du rung ba/ 
<p>129b.5</p>sap+tA hi kaM/ yA badz+dzI pi kaM/ khe Ta ka TA ha ka mra/ kuny+tsi kA/ shUr+pa kaH/ kuN+Da la ka mra/ ba ra t+t+raM/ pai lau ti kamra/ phup+phu saH/ ba le na a nu pra skaM d+yaH/ u da ka dat+taH/ d+ha na kr-I taM/ d+h+wa dzA hri tA/ ts+tshin+da bA si nI/ 
<p>129b.6</p>zhag bdun pa/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba/ mchil ma'i snod/ gtan pa dbye ba'i lcags sbu dgu bo/ zhib ma'am slo ma/ bkru bshal gyi snod/ 'brang pa/ rdol pa/ snod rnying khyer ba/ ljid kyis phab ste 'gro ba/ chu tshogs kyis byin pa/ rin chas nyos pa/ btsan 'phrogs su thob pa/ dang sang du 'dus
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>ba Ta bA si nI/ sa ma dzI bi kA/ pi tr-i rak+Shi tA/ mA tr-i rak+Shi tA/ b+h+rA tr-i ra k+Shi tA/ b+ha gi ni rak+Shi tA/ shwa shu ra rak+Shi tA/ shwa shru rak+Shi tA/ dz+nyA ti rak+Shi tA/ go tra ra k+Shi
<p>130a.2</p>pa/ gos zas kyis 'tshos pa/ kha dum pa/ phas bsrungs pa/ mas bsrungs pa/ ming pos bsrungs pa/ phu nu mos bsrungs pa/ gyos bos bsrungs pa/ sgyug mos bsrungs pa/ gnyen pas bsrung pa/ rus chags kyis
<p>130a.3</p>tA/ /mA lA gu Na pa ri k+Ship+taH/ ta tra k+Sha Ni kaH/ A bA haH/ bi bA haH/ kA ya saM sargaH/ pa riSh+Tha dza mA traM/ dwa ya dwa ya sa mA pat+tiH/ drug sde'i ming la/ nan+daH/ u pa nand/ punarba su/ ts+tshan+daH/ a shwa kaH/ u da yI/ 
<p>130a.4</p>bsrungs pa/ skyes kyi dus btab pa/ thang 'ga' 'phrad pa/ bag mar blangs pa/ bag mar btang ba/ mthang sprad pa/ mthang sprad pa tsam/ gnyis kyis gnyis sprad pa/ dga' bo/ /nye dga' bo/ /nab so/ /'dun pa/ 'gro mgyogs/ 'char
<p>130a.5</p>ma ma bzhi'i ming la/ aM ga d+hA trI/ k+Shi ra d+hA trI/ ma la d+hA trI/ krI Da ni kA d+hA trI/ nad kyi ming la/ byA d+hi/ ro gaH/ pa ri dA haH/ bra NaM/ gaN+Da/ shrA bi gA/ kuSh+ThaM/ bi s+phoTaH/ ki Ti b+haH/ dar+d+duH/ ki lA saM/ bi tsa rtsi kaH/ 
<p>130a.6</p>ka /spang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma/ nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma/ dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma/ rtsen grogs kyi ma ma/ nad/ yongs su gdungs ba'am tsha ba/ rma/ 'bras/ mdze/ 'brum bu/ 'brum bu phra mo/ shu ba/ ngal skyen ba'am sha khra/ rkang shu/
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>kaN+duH/ pA mA/ kats+tshuH/ bi sU tsi kA/ aM bA naH/ hik+kA/ rA dza pak+Sh+maM/ k+Sha ya byA d+hiH/ b+h+ra maH/ kA saH/ shwA saH/ sho ShaH/ lo ling+gaM/ a pa smA raH/ bai sarbaH/ ang+ga b+he daH/ gul+maH/ 
<p>130b.2</p>g.ya' ba/ g.yan pa/ khyi rdo/ gsud pa/ sbos pa/ skyigs bu/ gcod chen po/ nang khong skem pa/ mgo 'khor/ lud pa/ dbugs mi bde ba/ skem pa/ ldog pa/ brjed byed/ me dbal/ yan lag tu zugs pa/ skran/ 
<p>130b.3</p>paN+Du ro gaH/ k+Sha taH/ sam+b+hin+na byany+dza naM/ a Tak+ka raH/ b+ha gnad raH/ b+hasnaM ka/ a shAng+giH/ ts+tshardiH/ mU tra ro d+haH/ shI pA daH/ kla maH/ ang+ga dA haH/ pAr+sh+wa dA haH/ a s+thi b+he daH/ sany+tsa ra byA d+hiH/ 
<p>130b.4</p>skya sbab/ glo 'groms pa/ gle 'dams pa/ bkres ngab/ mtshan bar rdol ba/ gzhang 'brum/ skyug bro ba/ chu 'gags pa/ rkang 'bam/ ngal ba/ lus tsha ba/ rtsib logs tsha ba/ rus pa la thug pa/ nad 'go ba/ 
<p>130b.5</p>dz+wa raH/ pit+taM/ ru d+hi raM/ pra dz+wa raH/ i ka di kaH/ dwai tI ya kaH/ trai tI ya kaH/ tsA tur+tha kaH/ ni t+ya dz+wa raH/ bi pa ma dwA raH/ san+ni pA taH/ a ti sA raH/ pra me haH/ ra dza taM/ ut+pi kA/ u
<p>130b.6</p>rims/ mkhris nad/ khrag nad/ rims drag po/ nyin gcig pa/ nyin gnyis pa/ nyin gsum pa/ nyin bzhi pa/ rtag pa'i rims/ rims mi bzad pa/ 'dus pa/ tshad pa/ gcin nad/ glog pa/ mgo'i glog pa/ mgo'i
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>pya d+haH/ si d+h+ma/ si ta puSh+pi kaM/ shwi traM/ kam+paH/ pa hi rA yA maH/ bA ta pra to daH/ ma n+yA sta m+paH/ kA ma laH/ kA ca pa Ta laM/ saM n+yA saH/ i ti/ u pa sargaH/ pi
<p>131a.2</p>glog pa/ sha bkra/ sha bkra/ sha mtshan/ 'dar bu/ glo langs pa/ gzer thabs/ gnya' rengs pa/ mig ser/ ling thog ser po/ rmya ba/ yams kyi nad/ 'go ba'i nad/ phol
<p>131a.3</p>TakaH/ mU tra kr-its+tshaM/ du ko da raH/ dza lo da raH/ A shI kya paN+Da kaH/ man+thA naM/ ne traM/ ku b+ha paM/ go Ni/ bi sha daM/ byut+pat+ti sa mA p+te ti/ shu bam stu sarba dza ga tAma?// 
<p>131a.4</p>mig /gcin sri ba/ dmu rdzing can nam dmu chu can/ bran pa'i ma ning / srub ma/ srub thab/ phyam pa/ do gal/ rgya che ba/ bye brag tu rtogs par byed pa rdzogs so// //skye 'gro thams cad dge bar gyur cig/ 
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>@#/ sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa bzhugs/ /@##/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ bam po dang po/ rta'i lo la btsad po khri lde srong btsan pho brang gi'i 'on cang rngon bzhugs/ stod smad kyi dmag rnying rjed dang rkun chen btul/ gar log gi pho nyas phyag btsal/ blon chen po zhang khri zur ram
<p>131b.2</p>shag dang / mang rje lha 'od la sogs pas rgyal sa gnang mang po bcad de/ rnga rta dang ba mar phal mo che phyag tu phul/ zhang blon man chad so sor bya dga' stsal ba'i lan la/ nyi 'og gi mkhan po A tsAr+ya dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dA na shI la dang / bo d+hi mi tra dang / bod
<p>131b.3</p>kyi mkhan po rat+na rak+Shi ta dang / d+har+m+ma tA shI la dang / lo tsA ba mkhas par chud pa dz+nyA na se na dang / dza ya rak+Shi ta dang / many+dzu shrI war+m+ma dang / rat+nen+d+ra shI la la sogs pas theg pa che chung las 'byung ba'i rgya gar gyi skad las bod kyi skad du bsgyur zhing ming du btags pa rnams dkar chag tu bris te/ nam du
<p>131b.4</p>yang gzhung lugs de las mi bsgyur zhing kun gyis bslab du rung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/ sngon lha sras yab kyi ring la/ A tsAr+ya bo d+hi sa twa dang / ye shes dbang po dang / zhang rgyal nyen nya bzang dang / blon khri gzher sang shi dang / lo tsA ba dz+nyA na de ba ko Sha dang / lce khyi 'brug
<p>131b.5</p>dang / bram ze A nan+da la sogs pas chos kyi skad bod la ma grags pa las ming du btags pa mang dag cig mchis pa'i nang nas kha cig chos kyi gzhung dang / byA ka ra Na'i lugs dang mi mthun te/ mi bcos su mi rung ba rnams kyang bcos/ skad kyi ming gces so 'tshal gyis kyang
<p>131b.6</p>bsnan nas theg pa che chung gi gzhung las ji ltar 'byung ba dang / gna'i mkhan po chen po nA gA rdzu na dang / ba su ban+d+hu la sogs pas ji ltar bshad pa dang / byA ka ra Na'i sgra'i lugs las ji skad du 'dren pa dang yang bstun te/ mjal dka' ba rnams kyang tshig so sor phral nas gtan
<p>131b.7</p>tshigs kyis bshad de gzhung du bris/ skad rgyad pa bshad mi 'tshal ba sgra bzhin du bsgyur bar rigs pa rnams kyang sgra btsan par bgyis te ming du btags/ skad kha cig don bzhin du gdags par rigs pa rnams kyi don btsan par bgyis te ming du btags nas/ btsad po'i spyan
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>sngar ban+de chen po dpal gyi yon tan dang / ban+de chen po ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang 'tshogs te/ rje blon gdan 'dzom pa la zhus nas d+har+m+ma bsgyur ba'i thabs dang / rgya gar gyi skad la bod kyi skad du ming btags pa rnams gtan la phab ste/ bkas bcad pa/ dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i
<p>132a.2</p>lugs ni don dang yang mi 'gal la bod skad la yang gar bde bar gyis shig /d+har+m+ma bsgyur ba la rgya gar gyi skad kyi go rims las mi bsnor ba bod kyi skad du bsgyur na don dang tshig tu 'brel zhing bden ma bsnor bar sgyur cig bsnor na bde zhing go ba bskyed pa cig yod na/ tshigs bcad la ni rtsa ba bzhi
<p>132a.3</p>pa'am/ drug pa 'ang rung ste/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi nang na gang bde ba bsnor zhing sgyur cig /rkyang pa la ni don gang bsnyegs pa yan chad kyi tshig dang don gnyis ka la gar bde bar bsnor zhing sgyur cig /skad gcig la ming du mar 'dren pa ni ltag 'og dang bstun la gar snyegs pa bzhin du ming
<p>132a.4</p>thogs shig /gau ta mya lta bu gau'i sgra las tshig dang / phyogs dang / sa dang / 'od dang / rdo rje dang / ba lang dang / mtho ris la sogs pa rnam pa du mar snyegs pa dang / kau shi ka lta bu'i rtswa ku sha thogs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / pad+ma la dga' ba dang / 'ug ba dang / mdzod ldan la sogs pa'i sgra'i
<p>132a.5</p>lugs las drangs shing bsgyur na sna grangs mang po zhig tu snyegs la/ bsgyur ba rnams gcig gi nang du ni sna grangs de kun 'dur yang mi btu ba ste/ gcig tu chad par byar yang gtan tshigs chen po med pa rnams ni mi bsgyur bar rgya gar skad so na zhog cig /gar yang drang du rung ba'i tshig byung na/ phyogs
<p>132a.6</p>gcig tu chad par mi bsgyur bar spyir snyegs su rung bar gyis shig /yul dang / sems can dang / me tog dang / rtsi shing la sogs pa'i ming bsgyur na yid gol zhing tshig mi bde ba dang / 'ol phyir bsgyur du rung ba don du de ltar yin nam ma yin gtol med pa rnams la/ mgo la yul zhe'am/ me tog
<p>132a.7</p>ces pa la sogs pa gang la bya ba'i ming gcig bla thabs su snon la rgya gar skad so na zhog cig /grangs la rgya gar skad bzhin du bsgyur na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhes 'byung ba la sogs pa ni stong nyis brgya lnga bcu zhes tha mal par bod kyi skad bzhin bsgyur na don dang yang mi 'gal ba bod kyi skad
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>la yang bde bas grangs bsdom du rung ba rnams bod skad kyi lugs bzhin du thogs shig /pa ri dang / sam dang / u pa lta bu la sogs te/ tshig gi phrad dang rgyan lta bur 'byung ba rnams bsgyur na don dang mthun zhing 'byor ba'i thabs ni/ yongs su zhe'am/ yang dag pa zhe'am/ nye ba zhes sgra bzhin
<p>132b.2</p>du sgyur cig /don lhag par snyegs pa med pa rnams ni tshig gi lhad kyis bsnan mi dgos kyis don bzhin du thogs shig /rnam grangs su gtogs pa'i tshig rnams ni ma 'doms na ming gang bod skad du spyir grags shing tshig tu gar bde bar gdags so/ /'doms na so sor btags pa bzhin
<p>132b.3</p>du thogs shig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos la sogs pa zhes dang sko long gi tshig gi rim pa ni sangs rgyas la zhe sa'i tshig tu bsgyur/ gzhan la tshig 'bring po man tshad tsam du byas te/ sngon lha sras yab kyi spyan sngar mkhan po dang lo tsA ba mkhas pa 'tshogs pas/ d+har+m+ma dkon mchog
<p>132b.4</p>sprin dang / lang+kar gshegs pa bsgyur te/ gtan la phab pa'i lugs bzhin du sgyur cig /skad kyi lugs 'di ltar bkas bcad pa las so so nas su yang 'chos shing 'og tu ming gsar du 'dogs su mi gnang gis/ bsgyur ba dang 'chad pa'i grwa so so nas skad gsar du ming gdags dgos pa zhig yod
<p>132b.5</p>na yang / so so'i grwa grwar ming chad par ma gdags par chos kyi gzhung dang sgra'i lugs las ji skad du 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs dang / chos la ji skad du gdags pa dpyad de/ pho brang du bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs kyi 'dun sa dang / d+har+m+ma zhu chen 'tshal ba'i grwar phul la/ snyan du zhus te bkas bcad
<p>132b.6</p>nas skad kyi dkar chag gi dkyus su bsnan no/ /gsang sngags kyi rgyud rnams gzhung gis gsang bar bya ba yin te/ snod du ma gyur pa rnams la bshad cing bstan du yang mi rung la/ bar du bsgyur zhing spyod du gnang gis kyang / ldem po dag tu bshad pa ma khrol nas sgra ji bzhin du 'dzin cing log par spyod pa
<p>132b.7</p>dag kyang byung / sngags kyi rgyud kyi nang nas thu zhing bod skad du bsgyur ba dag kyang byung zhes gdags kyi/ phyin chad gzungs sngags dang rgyud bla nas bka' stsal te/ sgyur du bcug pa ma gtogs pa/ sngags kyi rgyud dang / sngags kyi tshig thu zhing bsgyur du mi gnang ngo / /skad kyi ming sngon gtan la ma phab pa
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>dang ming du ma thogs pa las theg pa che chung gi gzhung dang sgra'i gzhung las 'byung ba dang sbyar te bshad pa'i dang po'o// //sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dad yon tan gyi ming la sogs ba skad dka' ba rnams thog thog bshad pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs la/ bud+d+haHzhes bya ba'i sgra las drangs
<p>133a.2</p>na gcig tu na/ mo ha ni drA pra mat+ta pra bud+d+ha pu ru Sha ces bya ste/ gti mug gi gnyid sangs pas na mi gnyid sangs ba bzhin te/ sangs pa la snyegs/ yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ bud+d+hai ti kA sha nA da bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha pad+ma bta/ blo bye zhing rgyas bas na pad+ma kha bye zhing rgyas pa dang 'dra bar yang bshad de sangs rgyas zhes
<p>133a.3</p>bya'o/ tshig gi don spyir na chos thams cad thugs su chud cing ma lus par byang chub pa la bya/ b+ha ga bA na zhes bya ba gcig tu na/ b+ha ga na mA ra tsa tuSh+Ta pa twa dwa b+ha ga bAn/ zhes bya ste bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom pa la bya/ yang rnam pa gcig tu na b+hag ni legs pa rnam pa drug gi ming ste/ gzugs dang / 
<p>133a.4</p>grags pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dpal dang / shes rab dang / brtson pa ste 'di drug gi spyi la bya/ bAn zhes 'byung ba ni b+hag s+yA stI ti b+ha ga bAn zhes ldan bar bshad de/ de rnam grangs 'di skad du bya ba las sngar bsgyur ba'i tshig grags pa btsan bar bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dag las
<p>133a.5</p>sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la mtshan 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /zhes kyang 'byung bas na/ 'jig rten pa'i b+ha ga bAn las khyad bar du 'das zhes bla thabs su bsnan te/ bcom ldan 'das zhes btags/ 'jig rten ba'i b+ha ga bAn zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten ba'i gzhung nyid las kyang bcom par mi 'chad de/ legs
<p>133a.6</p>pa dang ldan pa zhes 'chad bas 'jig rten ba'i b+ha ga bAn ni legs ldan zhes gdags/ ta thA ga ta zhes bya ba ta thA ni de bzhin ga ta ni gshegs ba'am byon ba'am mkhyen ba'am gsungs pa la bya ste/ tshig gi don spyir na sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams ji ltar gshegs shing phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang
<p>133a.7</p>bzhin de bzhin nyid ji lta ba mkhyen zhing gsungs ba la bya mod kyi/ sngar grags ba bzhin de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gdags/ ar+han zhes bya ba gcig tu na/ pU dza mar ha tI ti ar+han zhes bya ste/ lha dang mi la sogs pa kun gyis mchod par 'os pas na mchod 'os zhes kyang bya/ yang gcig tu na/ kle sha a ri
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>ha da bAn ar+han zhes bya ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pa zhes kyang bya ste/ rnam pa 'di las 'dir ni don btsan par bya ste dgra bcom pa zhes btags/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha zhes pa samyaka ni yang dag pa/ sam ni sa man+tAm/ sam pUr+N+Na ste ma lus pa'am rdzogs pa/ bud+d+ha ni sangs rgyas pa la bya ste/ spyir na chos
<p>133b.2</p>thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma nor bar thugs su chud cing mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya/ bid+yA tsa ra Na saM pan+na zhes pa bi d+yA ni rig pa/ tsa ra Na ni rkang pa/ saM ban+na ni ldan pa'am phun sum tshogs pa la bya ste/ bslab pa gsum dang sbyar na lhag pa'i shes rab ni rig pa/ 
<p>133b.3</p>lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i khrims ni rkang pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang sbyar na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni rig pa/ lhag ma bdun ni rkang pa ste/ rig pa mig dang 'dra bas mtshon nas rkang pas phyin cing thob par 'gyur bas na rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya/ su ga ta ces bya ba gcig
<p>133b.4</p>tu na/ sho b+ha na ga ta su ga ta su rU pa bta ces bya ste/ legs par gshegs pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/ gzugs legs pa bzhin/ a pu nar prat+yA ga ta su naSh+Ta dz+war bta ces bya ste/ phyir mi ldog ba gshegs pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/ rims nad legs par byang ba
<p>133b.5</p>bzhin/ yA bang+ga ta byag ma nA ta su ga ta/ su pUr+Na g+haT ba ta ces bya ste/ ji tsam du 'gro bar bya ba ma lus par phyin pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/ bum pa legs par gang bzhin pa zhes 'byung / yang na gcig tu na/ d+har+m+ma skan+d+ha las 'byung ba su ga ta i ti su khi to b+ha ga bAn/ swarga ta a bya thi ta/ d+har+m+ma
<p>133b.6</p>sa ma n+wA ga ta/ ta du ts+ya te su ga ta ces 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gyur cing mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan la/ gnod ba mi mnga' zhing gnod pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pas na bde bar gshegs pa'am bde ba brnyes pa la yang bya ste/ 'dir sngar grags ba dang / d+har+m+ma skan+d+ha las 'byung ba dang
<p>133b.7</p>sbyar te bde bar gshegs pa zhes btags/ lo ka bid ces bya ba lo ka ni 'jig rten/ bid ni bid dz+nyA na ste de bzhin gshegs pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du gdul ba'i sems can gyi khams la gzigs shing / skal ba yod ba dang med pa rtogs par mkhyen pas na 'jig rten
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>mkhyen pa zhes bya/ a nu t+ta ra pu ru Sha da mya sA ra thi zhes bya ba/ a nut+ta ra ni bla na med pa/ pu ru Sha da mya sA ra thi ni skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba ste/ sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs ba zhe sdang che ba dang / dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags che ba dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs
<p>134a.2</p>la sogs pa gti mug che ba'i 'dul ba'i sems can rta rgod dang 'dra ba 'dul dka' ba rnams 'jam pos 'dul ba yang 'jam pos btul/ drag pos 'dul ba yang drag pos btul/ gnyi gas 'dul ba yang gnyi gas btul te/ thabs bzang zhing sla bas thabs thabs bzhin du btul nas
<p>134a.3</p>don sgrub pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par kha lo sgyur zhing 'jog pas na/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa zhes bya/ shA sta zhes bya ba shA su a nu Shi Sh+To zhes bya ste/ phyir tshig gi don du na ston zhing slob pa la bya/ ta ni tshig gi don du bya bar zad de/ spyir na lha dang mi la sogs
<p>134a.4</p>pa thams cad kyi ston par gyur bas na ston pa zhes bya/ dzin zhes bya ba dzi ta pA pa ka a ku sha la d+har+m+ma zhes bya ste/ sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i chos las rgyal bas na rgyal ba zhes bya/ tA yi zhes bya ba tA yi ni san+tA na pa la na yoHzhes bya ste/ 'phags pa'i lam thugs su chud pa bstan zhing bshad de/ 
<p>134a.5</p>rgyun mi gcod pa dang / skyob cing skyong ba la bya ste/ pA la skyong ba zhes btags pa zhig kyang gud na yod pa dang ma 'dom par bya ste skyob bar btags/ ma hA r-iShi zhes bya ba ma hA chen po/ r-i Shi ni r-i Shi ga tau zhes bya ste/ shes pa dang ldan pa la'ang bya/ yang gcig tu na/ r-i d+h+ye ti pra Ni d+hA nan zhes bya ba
<p>134a.6</p>ste/ smon pa rnams 'byor zhing 'grub pa la'ang bya/ yang gcig tu na/ kA ya bAg+ma no b+hi r-i dzu she te i ti r-i Shi zhes bya ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid drang por gnas shing srong bas na drang srong chen po zhes pa tags/ aM gi ras zhes bya ba thog ma drang srong nyid kyi lus las byung bas na bdag lus skyes zhes
<p>134a.7</p>bshad pa dang / aM gi ras ni nyi ma ste/ nyi ma'i rigs yin pas na nyi rgyud ces kyang bshad du rung bar 'dul ba'i dngos po dang / bshad pa las 'byung la/ mdo sde dag las sku'i kha dog nyi ma bzhin du lham me lhang nger bzhugs pa'i yon tan lta bur yang bshad pas nyi ma'i rgyud ces btags/ de
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan la/ bi shwa b+hu ga zhes bya ba/ bi shwa ni thams cad/ b+hu dza pA lan a b+h+ya ba ha ra yo zhes 'byung ste/ longs par kun la spyod pa'am sems can thams cad skyob pa la bya ste/ skabs 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yin pas na thams cad skyob ces btags/ kra kuts+tshun+da ces
<p>134b.2</p>bya ba/ kra ni kra ma ste 'khor ba/ kuts+tshun+da ni/ ti kung sa ya ti zhes bya ste/ 'khor ba 'joms pa'am/ sel ba la bya ste/ 'khor ba 'jig ces bya/ yang yi ge kha cig gi nang nas kra kuts+tshun+da ces kyang 'byung ste/ kutshi ta tshan+do/ a ti kran+do smA di ti zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad pas mi dge ba
<p>134b.3</p>dang log pa la dad pa bsal zhing med par byas pa'i mtshan te/ log dad sel zhes bya/ kA sh+ya pa zhes bya ba/ ka sh+ya ga te zhes bya ste/ chad pas bcad pa'am gnod par bya ba'i rigs pa yin/ pa ni pA la ni skyob ba'am skyong ba'i drang srong gi rigs su skyes pa la bya ste/ chad pas bcad cing gnod par bya ba
<p>134b.4</p>las skyob pas na gnod skyob ces kyang bya/ yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ kA sh+ya dI pa to zhes kyang bya ste/ skal ba yod pa'i sems can chos bshad pa'i 'od kyis snang bar bya ba'i rigs ba rnams gcig tu na kA sh+ya dI pa to zhes kyang bya ste/ skal pa yod pa'i sems can chos bshad pa'i 'od kyis snang bar bya ba'i
<p>134b.5</p>rigs pa rnams srung zhing skyob pas na 'od srungs zhes kyang byar rung ste/ sngan chad ming du btags te grags pa bzhin du 'od srungs zhes btags/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ming la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po dang / ye shes dang sku gsum la/ a sa ma sa ma pany+tsa skan+d+ha zhes bya ba a sa ma ni mi mnyam
<p>134b.6</p>pa ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bya/ sa ma ni mnyam pa ste sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag nyid dang mtshungs par gyur ba la bya/ pany+tsa skan+d+ha ni phung po lnga ste zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ste/ sangs rgyas
<p>134b.7</p>rnams la mnga' ba'i phung po 'di dag phal pa la med pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po lnga zhes bya/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu bi shud+d+ha zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin te/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i chos rnams skye zhing 'byung ba dang dbyings su gyur pas na chos kyi dbyings de bzhin
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>nyid la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa sprin dang 'dra ba dngas shing byang ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings dag pa dang 'dra ba san chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ A daR+sha dz+nyA na zhes bya ba me long lta bu'i ye shes yin te chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la dmigs
<p>135a.2</p>pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur bas/ me long phyis pa'i nang du ci yang snang ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba la bya ste/ me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya/ sa ma tA dz+nyAn zhes bya ba thog mas dang po la de kho na nyid
<p>135a.3</p>mngon bar rtogs pa'i tshe/ bdag dang gzhan du mi 'byed cing mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bas gong nas gong du sbyangs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur ba'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas 'phos te/ ye shes su gnas gyur ba la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes
