<p>231b.4</p>ngan tha mar skyes pa yi/ /da lta'i dge slong rang mthong can/ /cung zad yon tan rnyed pa dang / /khengs shing rang mthong gyong bu byed/ /mar gyis ko khengs bskus mnyes na/ /mi dul ba ni gcig kyang med/ /de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis kyang / /mi shes ko khengs 'dra ba 'dul/ /grod skogs
<p>231b.5</p>mar dang lhan cig kyang / /mnye btul ma byas gyong bur 'dug /de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis bskus/ /shes bzhin dran pas ma mnyes na/ /chos mar bskus kyang gong bur 'dug /mnyes pa bzhin du dul bar gyis/ /bslab pas mi ngoms mnyan par byos/ /mkhas pa rnams la dri ba phros/ /
<p>231b.6</p>che 'chos sa ni shor dogs par/ /thos pa mang po ma yin yang / /'ga' tsam goms la'ang mnyen par byos/ /grogs po rnams la 'gran sems bor/ /rgan pa rnams ni rim par khur/ /gzhan la 'phya ba mi dgos kyis/ /rang nyid de ltar ma byed cig /chos kyi spun dang bral nas ni/ /
<p>231b.7</p>mi chos gnyen la mnyes ma byed/ /sems can ngan mag ma skyed cig /khyod kyis bya ba'i las min pa/ /chung ma blang dang bu tshang klag /'khrug pa bya dang khe tshong bya/ /bre zol bya dang srang zol bya/ /sgyu ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'phyar dang rta gad rtsab hral dang / /chos gos med par
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>grong rgyu dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma bsten pa dang / /srog chags gsad dang brdzun smra dang / /chom rkun bya ba'i pho nya dang / /phra ma mi dbyes la sogs pa/ /'chi bar bsams nas mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan shAkyas bka' stsal pa/ /nga yi bstan pa'i dam chos ni/ /mu stegs can gyis mi bshigs
<p>232a.2</p>te/ /seng ge'i khog pa ji bzhin du/ /nga yi slob mas gzhig par 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dam chos ni/ /nan tan snying por byed pa yi/ /gang zag dge slong lag na gnas/ /bka' bzhin byed pa'i dge slong ni/ /'jigs pa med par ngas bshad de/ /dam pa'i chos 'jig ngan sna 'dren/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las/ 
<p>232a.3</p>nams kyang thar par ngas ma gsungs/ /bdud kyi slu bas zin pa la/ /thar pa'i glags ni med 'gyur gyis/ /dang po'i dam bcas ji bzhin du/ /chos kyi klung du 'gro bar byos/ /bu smad 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / /nams kyang gnas par ma byed cig /gal te bu smad 'dod ces te/ /khyim pa'i dngos po byed ce na/ /dang po khyod ni
<p>232a.4</p>su yis bslus/ /dkon mchog gsum bslu ci yi phyir/ /slob dpon mkhan po ci la dgos/ /skye bo'i mchod gnas ci phyir bya/ /'dreg pa'i bye brag gsum yod de/ /sog po rnams ni bcos kyis 'dreg /dud 'gro phal ni las kyis 'dreg /dge 'dun rnams ni yon tan gyis/ /'dreg pa
<p>232a.5</p>yin na gang phyir bregs/ /ston pa'i na bza' chud re zos/ /na bza' chos gos 'o re brgyal/ /dang po 'dod chags bral zhe na/ /ci'i phyir da ni bu smad la/ /mi shes skye bo 'ju ba bzhin/ /khong nas gdung sems yod re che/ /'dod pa rnams la de bzhin 'dun/ /dang po'i dam bca' gang tsug song / /de
<p>232a.6</p>yis mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ram/ /sdug bsngal grong khyer 'jig 'gyur ram/ /ji ltar bshang gci gsher ba la/ /ngan skyugs khyi phag chags pa ltar/ /de bzhin bshang gci gsher ba la/ /'dod ldan ban de phag ltar chags/ /bdag lus bud med mi gtsang par/ /da dung bar du
<p>232a.7</p>ma rtogs par/ /mi rtag sgyu ma'i bu smad la/ /yang dang yang du chags pa ni/ /mi gtsang don du khyi rnams bzhin/ /e ma'o gzu lum sa e ma'o blun/ /e ma'o skye bos khrel du rung / /slob dpon mkhan po khrims dpang rnams/ /khyud skor los kyang mthong mi byed/ /chur ma'i gnyen la dge bshes
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>bzhin/ /skyo ba tsam du 'khor bar byed/ /des ci 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /myur du rgal bar 'gyur zhe'am/ /ga sha khu ljo ma byas tsam/ /glegs bam thag pas khu ljo yi/ /dkri ba'i thag pa ma byas tsam/ /sku gzugs dar ma lha cha rnams/ /byi brun thigs pa du bas non/ /g.yang sa gtsang mar bskyal na rung / /
<p>232b.2</p>gal te legs don ma yin yang / /'bum la khyim par gyur yang ni/ /bde gshegs bslab pa dran byas nas/ /gnas khang so sor 'dug byas la/ /nyes pa bshags shing dge ba spyad/ /bslab la 'grus par brtson par bskyed/ /btsun pa rnams la bkur sti bya/ /rang skyon sba phyir mtshang mi 'bru/ /'on tang sdig
<p>232b.3</p>zhad 'bri la phan/ /sems la lta zhing don la sgom/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /dge slong ma yang ci yi phyir/ /dang po khas blangs dam bcas nas/ /sngar tshul bstan pa'i dge slong bzhin/ /legs par rab tu byung byas nas/ /rang bslus sdig pa'i khur bu drags/ /ston pa'i bka' ni khyad
<p>232b.4</p>du gsad/ /khyim pa skye bo'i 'og na nyal/ /dang po skra ni 'drag pa'i tshe/ /khyim bdag snying du mi sdug gam/ /pha ma sdang ngam mgo rgyan med/ /khyim thab mchis sam nyes skyon byung / /ci yi phyir na tshul khrims dral/ /snying nas dam chos spyod ce na/ /las 'phro ngan cing blo zhan pas/ /mkhas pa'i phul du mi
<p>232b.5</p>'grub kyis/ /sems thag chod la btsun par sgrubs/ /klog dang don la brtson 'grus bskyed/ /skyes pa rnams la mi lta zhing / /rang gi gnas khang dag tu 'dug /thos pa bsags na nam zha yi/ /chos kyi gter ni gzung bar 'gyur/ /bya byed dag la yong ma 'jug /de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin/ /da 'di man chad
<p>232b.6</p>ni/ spyir dge ba spyad cang sdig pa spang bar gdams ngag byed/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i nang nas mdo tsam bstan pa/ dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed par shin tu dka'/ /skyes bus don grub thob par gyur pa la/ /gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na/ /phyis 'di yang dag 'byor par ga la 'gyur/ /
<p>232b.7</p>bdag gi 'byor pa drug gzhan gyi 'byor pa bdun te bcu gsum mo/ /de la bdag gi 'byor pa drug la/ yul gyi dbus su skyes pa dang / dbang po tshang ba dang / gnas la dad par gyur pa dang / smon lam dag pas sdig pa'i grogs po dang ma phrad pa dang / las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang / lta ba ngan pas mi 'phrogs pa'o/ /gzhan
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>gyi 'byor pa la/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung ba dang / dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang / bstan pa gnas pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i grogs po zang zing la mi lta ba dang phrad pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyi don du snying rje chen po dang phrad pa dang / chos byed pa la
<p>233a.2</p>byams pa'i grong khyer du nye bar skyes pa dang / rgyal po chos bzhin byed pa'i yul du skyes pa'o/ /ji ltar mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin rum nas/ /glog 'gyus skad cig bar snang ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mthus kyang brgya lam na/ /'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung / /de ltar dge ba nyam
<p>233a.3</p>chung nyid la rtag /sdig pa stobs chen shin tu mi bzad pa/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa/ /dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod sems yod kyang / /sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug /bde ba 'dod kyang gti mug pas/ /rang gi bde ba dgra ltar
<p>233a.4</p>'joms/ /yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/ /byas dang ma byas mi sdod pas/ /na dang mi na kun gyis kyang / /glo bur tshe la yid mi brtan/ /thams cad bor te chas dgos par/ /bdag gis de ltar ma shes nas/ /mdza' dang mi mdza'i don gyi phyir/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /mi mdza' rnams kyang
<p>233a.5</p>med 'gyur zhing / /mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang med par 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur/ /rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/ /re zhig gson tshe 'di nyid la/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' du ma 'das/ /de dag don du byas pa'i sdig /mi bzad gang yin mngon na
<p>233a.6</p>gnas/ /de ltar bdag ni glo bur zhes/ /bdag gis rtogs par ma gyur pas/ /gti mug chags dang zhe sdang gis/ /sdig pa rnam pa du ma byas/ /nyin mtshan sdod pa yong med par/ /tshe 'di rtag tu 'god 'gyur zhing / /snon pa gud nas 'ong med na/ /bdag lta 'chi bar cis mi 'gyur/ /bdag ni ma lan
<p>233a.7</p>'dug bzhin du/ /gnyen bshes mang pos mtha' bskor yang / /srog gcod pa yi tshor bdag /bdag nyid gcig pus myong bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i pho nyas zin pa la/ /gnyen pas ci phan bshes ci phan/ /de tshe bsod nams gcig skyabs na/ /de yang bdag gis ma bsten to/ /'jigs pa 'di 'dra
<p>233b</p>
<p>233b.1</p>ma 'tshal nas/ /mi rtag tshe 'di'i ched dag tu/ /sdig pa mang po nye bar bsgrubs/ /de ltar 'jigs chen yod pas na/ /dge bshes bsten la bsod nams byos/ /gnyen dang bshes rnams rnam spangs nas/ /gcig pu ga shed 'gro dgos na/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' kun cir rung / /mi dge ba las sdug
<p>233b.2</p>bsngal 'byung / /de las ji ltar nges thar zhes/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu bdag gis ni/ /de nyid rtag tu bsam par rigs/ /da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang / /mi ru skyes pa'i don yod bya/ /long bas phyag dar phung po las/ /ji ltar rin chen rnyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin ji zhig ltar stes nas/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la
<p>233b.3</p>skyes/ /blo 'dir rab tu shugs dbyung ngo / /ding nas brtson pa ma byas na/ /'og nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas grangs med 'das gyur kyang / /bdag ni rang gis nyes pa de'i/ /gso ba'i spyod yul ma gyur to/ /da dung de bzhin bdag byed na/ /ngan 'gro ngan dang
<p>233b.4</p>'chi ba dang / /sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba dang / /dad dang mi lus thob pa dang / /dge goms rung ba de lta bur/ /dkon pa nam zhig thob par 'gyur/ /nad med nyi ma 'di lta bur/ /zas bcas 'tshe ba med kyang ni/ /tshe ni skad cig slu ba ste/ /lus ni thang cig brnyan po
<p>233b.5</p>bzhin/ /bdag gi spyod pa 'di 'dras ni/ /mi lus phyis ni thob mi 'gyur/ /mi lus thob par ma gyur na/ /sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med/ /gang tshe dge spyad skal ldan yang / /dge ba bdag gis ma byas na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal kun rmongs pa/ /de tshe bdag gis ci byar yod/ /dge ba dag kyang ma byas la/ /sdig
<p>233b.6</p>pa dag ni cher bsags na/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/ /bde 'gro'i sgra yang thos mi 'gyur/ /don med dgra yis rma srol btod pa yang / /lus la rgyan dang 'dra bar srel byed na/ /don chen sgrub phyir yang dag brtson gyur la/ /bdag la sdug bsngal ci'i phyir gnod byed yin/ /nya pa zhing pa gdol ba la sogs pa/ /
<p>233b.7</p>rang gi 'tsho ba tsam zhig sems pa yang / /grang dang tsha la sogs pa gnod bzod na/ /yun gyi bde phyir bdag lta ci zhig smos/ /de phyir sdig ni sems las byung bas na/ /bslab pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yis/ /rab tu bsgrims te sems gdul te/ /sems 'di gdul ba ma byas na/ /bslab pa bsrung bar yong mi
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>nus/ /sems kyi glang po yan btang bas/ /mnar med gnod pa byed pa ltar/ /glang chen ma dul myos pa yis/ /'di na de 'dra'i gnod mi byed/ /kun nas dran pa'i thag pa yis/ /sems kyi glang po dam btags na/ /'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur/ /dge ba thams cad lag
<p>234a.2</p>tu 'ong / /sems 'di kho na thul ba yis/ /gnod byed thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur/ /sems can mi srun nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag gzhom gyis ga la lang / /khro ba'i sems ni gcig bcom na/ /dgra de thams cad choms dang 'dra/ /sa stengs 'di kun kos g.yog tu/ /de snyed ko ba ga la yod/ /
<p>234a.3</p>rkang mthil gang gi ko bas ni/ /sa stengs thams cad g.yogs dang 'dra/ /de phyir phyi rol dngos po yang / /bdag gis phyir bzlog mi lang gis/ /bdag gi sems 'di phyir bzlog bya'i/ /gzhan rnams bzlog go ci zhig dgos/ /gang gis chos kyi don po mchog /sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na/ /
<p>234a.4</p>bde 'dod sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod kyang / /de dag don med gyi na 'khyam/ /de ltar bdag gi sems 'di ni/ /legs gzung legs par rtogs par bya/ /sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa/ /brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya/ /ma grangs grol ba'i khrod gnas na/ /bsgrims te rma yi
<p>234a.5</p>bag byed bzhin/ /skye bo ngan khrod gnas pas kyang / /sems kyi rma ni rtag tu bsrung / /sems rma rtag tu bsrung ba yang / /bla ma dang ni 'grogs pa las/ /mkhas pas rjes su bstan pa dang / /'jigs pas skal ldan gus byed la/ /dran pa shin tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir dge bshes mkhas pa bsten/ /
<p>234a.6</p>don med g.yeng bar lta ba ni/ /ban des nam yang mi bya ste/ /skye bo mdzangs pa'ang de bzhin spyod/ /gang zhig mig lam 'ongs na yang / /bltas nas legs par mgu bar bya/ /dgos na thag ring dag tu'ang lta/ /gang zhig bsams nas byar brtsams pa/ /de las gzhan du mi bsam ste/ /der gtad pa yi bsam pa
<p>234a.7</p>yis/ /de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar na ni kun 'grub 'gyur/ /gzhan du gnyis kar mi 'grub po/ /khyi ni cung peng snyeg pa dang / /lha khang bar gyi khyi bzhin du/ /dran drod thams cad mi bya'o/ /ring zhig lon nas dal ba'i mchog /rnyed pa yang dang yang bsams nas/ /dge slong yin na 'khor g.yog dang / /drung du
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>'ongs pa'i lha mi rnams/ /thams cad dge la gzud par bya/ /khyim pa yin na'ang bu dag dang / /chung ma pha ma gnyen 'dun rnams/ /gros btab thams cad dge la gzung / /'on tang byang chub spyod pa rdzogs/ /bran g.yog bkol du mi btub pa/ /zas la sogs pa mi sbyin ltar/ /dge ba mi byed lus 'di la/ /
<p>234b.2</p>bsnyod kyang de'u re gzhan 'gro la/ /sdig lus bsnyod cing gos bskon yang / /phan med sdig byed ji ste gso/ /khyod ma 'grangs pas phung 'og bcug /khyod 'grangs pas na phung mgo btsugs/ /dkon mchog pha ma dga' mdza' dang / /drin yod drin med rnams kyi nor/ /sgyus brkus mthus phrogs
<p>234b.3</p>thabs kyis bslus/ /ma 'grangs ma g.yogs sdig lus khyad/ /mjug tu 'bu sbrang nyod par song / /khyod ma sos pas dmyal bar btang / /bsad pa'i sdig pa khyod las byung / /khyod ma mgu bas 'phrog rlom byas/ /yi dgas gnas su khyod kyis btang / /khyod ma sos pas long chung ste/ /dge bshes
<p>234b.4</p>ma bsten chos ma nyan/ /des na dud 'gro blun por gyur/ /gtan du 'khyams pa khyod kyis nyes/ /khyod ni dge ba spyod gyur na/ /rin chen phung po phangs pa'i gtso/ /khyod la brten nas sangs rgyas chos/ /'bras bu bla med byang chub dang / /bar du'ang bde 'gro skyid pa ni/ /long btags don yod byed pas na/ /'gro
<p>234b.5</p>dang 'ong pa'i rten tsam du/ /lus la gru yi blo zhog ste/ /'di la gla rngan byin nas ni/ /da ni rang gi don byed chug /rmongs pa'i sems khyod ci zhig zer/ /gzugs su 'dzin pa khyod rang yin/ /lus su lta ba khyod rang yin/ /don med shes pa gzhan nas 'ongs/ /'byung bas bsgrubs pa'i khu khrag la/ /khyod
<p>234b.6</p>kyis ngar 'dzin byas nas ni/ /bu dang bu mor khyod kyis bzung / /gzhan gyis 'byung ba'i khu khrag la/ /gzhan zhes dgra ru lta bar byed/ /sdig pas bsgrubs pa'i zang zing la/ /gzhan gyis khyer snyam phrag dog langs/ /don med byis pa'i spyod pa 'dra/ /khyed kyis shes na de min pa'i/ /bzang po'i dpal ta re yod na/ /de
<p>234b.7</p>las ma shes ci byar yod/ /nga yi nyes pa ci yang med/ /nyes pa thams cad khyod las byung / /khyod kyis rtsa ya kun bcom na/ /gang du 'gro ba kho bos lta/ /khyod kyis ngar 'dzin ma byas na/ /nga ni 'byung ba'i bag la zha/ /nga ma gso bar khyed bder sgrubs/ /skyon can khyod kyi nyes pa kun/ /dran drod ma smra so sor 'dug /khyod la
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>gsol bag ci ma lus/ /gzhan yang tshigs su bcad pa la/ /deng bya sang bya le lo phyi shol gyis/ /sngon 'das du sa nas da srid 'gyangs pas chog /'chi bdag dgra dang bang bya brtod nas ni/ /bka' bsngos myur te bya ba'i mi rigs sam/ /skra dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs bgrangs kyang / /
<p>235a.2</p>byis pa sheng ma bye dang 'dra ba ni/ /don la mkhas pas brtags na snying re rje/ /gzhan yang / bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi/ /sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/ /legs spyad gang yin thams cad kyang / /khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig pa med/ /bzod pa lta bu'i
<p>235a.3</p>dka' thub med/ /de bas bzod la nan tan du/ /sna tshogs tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /zhe sdang zug rngu'i sems 'chang na/ /yid ni bde ba'i nyams mi myong / /sgyu mar bsams nas bzod pa bsgoms/ /gal te bcos su yod na ni/ /de la mi dga' byar yang med/ /'on te bcos su med na yang / /de la mi dga' byas ci phan/ /
<p>235a.4</p>la la bdag gi khrag mthong na/ /phyir zhing khong dgrar 'gyur ba'ang yod/ /la la gzhan gyi khrag mthong na/ /'bog cing brgyal bar 'gyur ba'ang yod/ /de ni sems kyi ngang brtan dang / /sdar ma'i tshul las gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin dge ba bsgrub pa yang / /sems thag gcad dam mi gcad zan/ /khyim dang 'bral
<p>235a.5</p>bar mi nus dang / /so nam yal bar dogs pa dang / /dam chos bsgrub par bsam pa dang / /yun gyi bde ba bsgrub pa ni/ /gnyis ka yong ye 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa gtang bar bya ba dang / /zad par dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /dpa' bo bya bar bsam pa dang / /shi bar dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /mang po
<p>235a.6</p>dga' bar bya ba dang / /khro gtum bya ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /bslab la 'grus par bya ba dang / /zang zing btsal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /btsun pa'i phul du byung ba dang / /yul la chags pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /kun gyis bkur bar 'dod pa dang / /spyod lam ngan pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /rgyal po mnyes par bya ba dang / 
<p>235a.7</p>khyim na nyal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya ba dang / /sdig pa spyad pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /de bzhin gang zhig sgrub na yang / /sems thag gcod par byed par bya/ /'on tang dgos pa thams cad 'grub/ /'jig rten mgon pos de skad gsungs/ /mdo sde rnams las bslab pa snang / /rtag tu mdo sde
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>blta bar bya'o/ /de dag gang zhig sgrub na bde/ /rlung med g.yo ba'ang med pa bzhin/ /bsod nams brtson 'grus med mi 'gyur/ /sgyid lug snyom pa'i stobs bcom ste/ /nyin mtshan phyed par bsgrub par bya'o/ /des na 'bras bu med mi srid/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho rgal ba dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dgos
<p>235b.2</p>pa ma lus bos pa bzhin/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu na/ /bdag 'dra ngan pas ci zhig smos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang / /sems can rnyed pa med la smod/ /rnyed pa can la mi snyan brjod/ /rang bzhin 'grogs dka' de dag gis/ /dga' ba ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /des na dben
<p>235b.3</p>par gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis mkhas pa'i rjes bsnyags la/ /bag yod gdams ngag dran byas te/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa bzlog par bya/ /rgyal sras thugs rje chen po ltar/ /rigs pa'i sran du gzugs bya ste/ /byis pa'i spyod pa btang byas nas/ /mdor na bdag dang gzhan rnams la/ /phan
<p>235b.4</p>pa 'ba' zhig lhur bya'o/ /de ltar gdams ngag byas nas kyang / /bdag gis spyad par ma grub cing / /nyams kyis lcogs par ma gyur na/ /tshe rabs kun du phan pa yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /dge ba ma lus rdzogs byed pa/ /'di dag brjod pa'i
<p>235b.5</p>bsod nams gang / /gal te de la gzugs yod gyur/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi ni/ /'jig rten khams su shong mi 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di/ /gtsug lag khang ngam mchod khang ngam/ /mchod rten sku gzugs spyan snga'am/ /gzhan du'ang rung ste 'di skad brjod/ /nyin mtshan lan ni gsum gsum
<p>235b.6</p>brjod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /sgo gsum btud de skyabs su mchi'o/ /mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdig pa'i las las bzlog bgyid cing / /bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung / /lus can rnams kyi bsod nams dag /kun la rjes su yi rang ngo / /bdag ni
<p>235b.7</p>spyis btud thal sbyar te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad dang / /'gro gnas rab tu bzhugs slad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol/ /de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang / /bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang / /des ni sems can thams cad kyang / /bla med byang chub sems ldan shog /sems can thams cad dri med
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>dbang / /yongs rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing / /spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang / /'tsho ba bzang dang ldan par shog /lus can dag ni thams cad kyang / /lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing / /yo byad thams cad mtha' yas pa/ /'khor ba ji srid mi zad shog /bud med thams cad rnam kun du/ /
<p>236a.2</p>phan tshun phrag dog 'gran sems dang / /rang bzhin bzang por skyes gyur nas/ /skyes mchog nyid du 'gyur bar shog /lus can thams cad rig pa dang / /rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog /lus can kha dog ldan pa dang / /gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang / /blta na sdug cing nad med dang / /stobs can tshe dang ldan
<p>236a.3</p>par shog /thams cad thabs la mkhas gyur te/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar ba dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang / /dmu rgod mi nag med par shog /gtsug lag khang dang dben gnas kyi/ /gnas dang nye bar gnas par shog /sangs rgyas chos nor ldan pa dang / /tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa dang / /
<p>236a.4</p>pha rol phyin drug ldan par shog /tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gsal ba dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab sa bcu dag /rgyun mi 'chad par bgrod par shog /bdag kyang yon tan de dag dang / /gzhan kun gyis kyang rgyan ldan te/ /nyes pa'i skyon las grol ba dang / /sems can kun
<p>236a.5</p>mchog byams pa dang / /sems can thams cad yid re ba'i/ /bde ba thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal sel bar byed par shog /'jig rten kun na skye bo gang / /su dag 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams/ /bdag gi ming tsam thos pas kyang / /shin tu 'jigs pa med
<p>236a.6</p>par shog /bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang / /ming tsam thos pas skye bo rnams/ /rab tu 'khrug med rnal ma dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pa rnams/ /tshe rabs kun du rjes 'brangs pa'i/ /mngon shes lnga po thob par shog /sems can kun la rnam kun du/ /rtag tu phan bde byed par shog /'jig rten kun na skye bo
<p>236a.7</p>gang / /sdig pa byed par 'dod gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad gnod med par/ /rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /sman dang dgon pa'i shing bzhin du/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis/ /rang dgar dgag med spyod par shog /sems can la bdag srog bzhin phangs/ /de dag bdag la ches
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>phangs shog /bdag la de dag sdig smin cing / /bdag dge ma lus der smin shog /ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang / /gang na ma grol de srid du/ /de phyir bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig /bdag ni dge slong dpal dbyangs kyis/ /gces pa'i phreng ba las bsdus pa'i/ /gdams
<p>236b.2</p>ngag brtsam par byas pa yis/ /gdams ngag 'di ni sus thos pa/ /gdams pa'i rjes su spyod gyur nas/ /byang chub myur du thob par shog /bod la dge slong ming yang med pa las/ rje byang chub sems dpa' khri srong lde btsan gyis dam pa'i chos brnyes nas dpal lha btsan po dad pa bskyed de/ rab tu byung
<p>236b.3</p>ba'i ming dpal dbyangs zhes bgyi/ btsun pa'i phul du phyin/ mdzangs pa'i zhi rab tu phyin/ /bod kyi mdun sar bsres na dpe zla med pa des mdzad de/ /btsan po la bka' gros dag gsol ba las/ la la ni gnang / la la ni ma gnang bas 'khon nas gyed de lhor bzhud/ gdams ngag 'di slar rje
<p>236b.4</p>blon dang / ser chags yongs dang / bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa lags so/ /mjug 'khon pas legs te/ btsun pas ni bzang po'i spyod pa 'grub/ /bod rje 'bangs ni grogs kyis dma' zhes gda'o/ /gdams ngag gces pa bsdus pa'i 'phrin yig btsun pa dpal dbyangs kyi sa sngon nas las kyis
<p>236b.5</p>'brel cing bshes par gyur pa bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa rdzogs so// //[]@/ lta ba'i rim pa bshad pa bzhugs/ /@##/ pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lta ba'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /gser gyi rdzas ltar gcig las snang / /rnam
<p>236b.6</p>grangs snang ba lnga gsum gnyis/ /shes nas gzhag dang blang bar bya/ /thams cad byang chub snying po'i klong / /pad+ma 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin la/ /rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan/ /rang rgyud rkyen gyis log snang ba/ /skye bo pa dang mu stegs pa/ /drug dang rtag chad snang bar byung / /dmus long tshul gyur
<p>236b.7</p>skye bo yang / /mtho yor mi ltar brtags snang ba/ /dmyal ba'i rang sems mi sogs snang / /yi dgas sdig sems mi gtsang yul/ /byol song gyen thur ngam grog snang / /mi la mthong yul 'di nyid snang / /de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang / /lha yi dge sems rin chen snang / /ci yang snang phyir mthong mi bden/ /
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>skye bo rtog pas phrogs pa yi/ /rnam 'phrul phyi nang lta bur snang / /brtags pa brda yi tha snyad shar/ /rkyen gyis log tshul mu stegs pa/ /khrid byed drug gi bstan pas bslus/ /mdo bsdus mu stegs chad pa la/ /glo bur tsam snang mtha' med lta/ /rtag pa byas snang dngos por 'dod/ /de yang rgyu min
<p>237a.2</p>rgyur smra ba/ /rang bzhin rgyur 'dod dbang phyug rgyu/ /ngo bo nyid la rgyur smra dang / /rdul phran rgyu ru 'dod pa dang / /byed po rgyu ru 'dod pa log /gzhan yang mu stegs zhar byung la/ /phyi rol ba dang yang dag pa/ /gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa/ /gnyis gsum lnga rnams rgyu yi tshul/ /gsum gnyis 'bras bu'i tshul
<p>237a.3</p>snang ba/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa bzhi la lta/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i lta ba yang / /cig shos lta ba las 'phags pa/ /nyan thos rang rgyal mdo sde dang / /kr-i ya u pa yang dag dang / /de bzhin yo ga'i theg pa dang / /ma hA yo ga'i theg pa dang / /a nu yo ga'i theg pa dang / /a ti yo ga'i theg pa dang / /chos tsam lta ba'i nyan thos
<p>237a.4</p>pas/ /mdo sde pa dang bye brag gnyis/ /phyi rol yul la rtsod byed cing / /shes pa skad cig snang bar mthun/ /de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa pa/ /phyi rol bcu gnyis sgyu ma tsam/ /rdul yang phyogs chas ma grub 'phags/ /shes pa skad cig snang dang mthun/ /mtshan nyid theg pa'ang rnam pa gsum/ /rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa/ /de
<p>237a.5</p>bzhin mdo sde dbu ma pa'o/ /rnam rig phyi rol mtho yor mi/ /srab mo rta ltar med bzhin du/ /rang gi rnam shes 'khrul snang 'dod/ /don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod/ /rnal 'byor dbu ma kun rdzob mthun/ /don dam stong pa ma skyes 'dod/ /mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam/ /yul rnams log nas snang bar lta/ /dam par mtha' gnyis
<p>237a.6</p>bral ba yis/ /dbu ma chen por 'dod pa'o/ /kr-i yas don dam chos nyid lta/ /kun rdzob rang rig yon tan lta/ /rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snang ba la/ /skye bos 'khrul pa med par 'dod/ /gnyis ka rgyud kyi spyod pa ni/ /lta spyod gong 'og rjes su mthun/ /yo ga'i don dam rnam dag pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su/ /rtogs
<p>237a.7</p>pa'i byin rlabs lhar snang la/ /skye bos 'di dag lhar mthong 'khrul/ /ma hA yo ga'i don dam du/ /rang gnyis med de de bzhin nyid/ /rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa'i/ /ltar snang ngang la 'khor ba med/ /a nu yo gas don dam du/ /bde chen rtogs pas rig pa'i rtsal/ /kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor snang / /de phyir skye bos brtags
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>pa 'khru la/ /a ti yo ga'i bden gnyis bral/ /thams cad rang byung rang snang ba'i/ /ye shes mtha' dbus bral ba la/ /brtags pa gnyis po gdod nas med/ /de phyir gser la gser mthong ltar/ /ji bzhin ma nor bden mthong yin/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas/ /ji ltar bltas pa der snang phyir/ /dngos po rtag pa
<p>237b.2</p>yod min te/ /yod na kun la mthun snang phyir/ /de phyir rang sems ngo bor snang / /brtags pa gcig yul gcig min pas/ /'khrul pa snang bar the tshom med/ /des na spyod yul gdod nas med/ /rtog sems 'gro ba so so'i sems/ /gcig na dge sdig rnam smin yang / /ma spyad kun gyis myong bar rigs/ /de min yang dag don mi
<p>237b.3</p>rung / /rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir/ /gcig min de nyid ma skyes pas/ /tha dad don du'ang mi rung ste/ /gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o/ /dngos po sna tshogs brtags pa yi/ /ming la grub pa'i gtan tshigs med/ /de phyir mtshan nyid ci yang min/ /ma grub pa la yod rtogs pa/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bus shes 'gyur gyi/ /rgyal ba nyid
<p>237b.4</p>kyis mi mkhyen no/ /snang bas spyod yul ma grub phyir/ /dmigs pa'i shes pa yod mi rung / /spyod yul ma skyes ye shes phyir/ /bsgom bya'i chos nyid logs na med/ /sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral phyir/ /sgom pa po yang ga la yod/ /de ltar sgom mkhan dngos med na/ /mi gnas mi rtog 'jog pa dang / /nam mkha' lta bu rang gsal
<p>237b.5</p>ba'i/ /rang sems yong gis de lta'o/ /ci yang yid la mi byed na/ /yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs/ /lus ngag ma skyes gzhi med phyir/ /skyil krung smra bcad kha na med/ /de bzhin sems kyang dngos bral bas/ /rtog spang sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong / /de ltar rtog pa sgom pa'o/ /yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med/ /ci phyir bdag nyid de
<p>237b.6</p>phyir bas/ /rang gi dbyings las g.yos pa med/ rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzang dang ngan/ /ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing / /de don dran pas 'bral ba'ang med/ /rang byung rang zhir nga smra'o/ /dper na rkun po tshor ma thag /ma bskrad 'bros bzhin gdeng gis zhi/ /lta ba'i shugs las byung ba'i phyir/ /ched du tshor ba bstan mi dgos/ /de min blo
<p>237b.7</p>yi skad cig tu/ /rnam rtog rang gi de nyid blta'o/ /bying ba shes pa ldang mi nus/ /rmugs pa don nyid mi gsal ba'o/ /bying rmugs rab tu bying rmugs dang / /shin tu bying rmugs phyir mi gtang / /de bzhin rgod pa rnam pa gsum/ /le lo snyom las dman la sbyor/ /dogs pa gol dang lhung ba gnyis/ /re ba rtags dang 'bras bu'o/ /
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>'khrug dang 'jug tu mi btub dang / /lus kyi bya byed spyod pa dga'/ /ngag gi ca co smra dga' ba/ /yang dag don las ring ba'i phyir/ /bya byed grong yul gtam mi gleng / /sbyin dang cho ga'i las mi bya/ /dge ba'i las kyang g.yeng 'gyur na/ /sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos/ /nyams dang g.yo dang goms pa dang / /
<p>238a.2</p>brtag pa'i nyams dang sbyar bar bya/ /don du 'di snyam bstan du med/ /de rtogs yang dag nyams dang ldan/ /de tshe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod/ /phyi nang rtags kyang rim pas 'byung / /skyes kyang dga' drod sems ma byed/ /med kyang de la mi dga' med/ /de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na/ /rim 'byung gsang na dngos grub 'byung / /klu gsum
<p>238a.3</p>ldan pa'i skyes mchog la/ /seng ge lta bur 'jig tshogs bral/ /zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing / /snying rje chen po mi 'bral na/ /chos nyid don dang phrad pa'i rtags/ /ci spyod don las ma nyams na/ /goms nas las su rung ba'i rtags/ /'di ldan dbang phye btsums med na/ /snang ba gang yang mi bskyon zhing / /yid la bya ba med
<p>238a.4</p>phyir ro/ /lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang / /chos brgyad spong len med pa dang / /gang la'ang nyon mongs mi skyen/ /'di yang sa la 'gro ba'i rtags/ /yid la byed med 'gags snang med/ /'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la/ /gang yang nyams su mi len cing / /sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing / /dmigs med tshul du rang
<p>238a.5</p>snang ba/ /tha snyad tsam du bsgom zhes brjod/ /yang dag don gyi gdeng med par/ /tshig tsam lta la khungs chung zhing / /bya med chos la blo gtad nas/ /rtsing chos phaT ral spyod byed pa/ /rgyal ba'i bkas kyang mi skyobs te/ /ya nga'i 'bras bu the tshom med/ /rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad ldan na/ /skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /gdeng med lta ba
<p>238a.6</p>mtho 'dod pas/ /rang gi nga rgyal snyems byed pa/ /ri bos srog chags mnan pa ltar/ /nam yang thar ba'i khar mi 'byung / /gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas/ /yang dag don la mi 'dud par/ /mi chos zang zing las byed cing / /rang dbang yod bzhin dbang med ces/ /smra zhing gsang don yal 'jog pa/ /phyi ma gar
<p>238a.7</p>'gro gtol med par/ /gal med le lo'i las byed pa/ /e ma'o rang 'joms dpa' ba ste/ /rgya mtsho mjing gi pha bong ltar/ /thugs rje'i zhags pa dpyangs thag yin/ /rang gis rang bslus snying re rje/ /le lo can la thar lam med/ /lta ba'i rim pa'i man ngag ka ba dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>@/ /gsung rab rin po che'i gtam rgyud dang shAkya'i rabs rgyud bzhugs/ @#/ /dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/ sems can 'khor ba las 'byung bar rtsol ba la bdud bar chad byed kyi mi rtsol ba la ni mi byed do zhes 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi
<p>238b.2</p>khyab pa bstan pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis chos zab mo bshad pa dang / rab 'byor gyis khyod las dang po rjes su mi bsrung ba'i chos ston to zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis nad gso ba'i phyir/ sman pas sman rtsa ba byin pa 'phral du bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma
<p>238b.3</p>yin no zhes bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na chos zab mo 'di la su dad pa nyan thos kyi theg pa can zhig na ni byams pa'i 'dus pa gsum gyi khongs su gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can zhig na ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba thob par 'gyur
<p>238b.4</p>zhes gsungs/ dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las/ ye shes mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las dang bzo gnas la ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa las/ 
<p>238b.5</p>byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mi zad pa ni rgyun mi zad pa'i phyir blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi tshul khrims ni skye ba'i gnas rnams kyi zad par 'gyur ro/ /phyi rol gyi brda mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams
<p>238b.6</p>kyi ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zad pas so/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi ni bsod nams zad pas so/ /gzugs kyi khams kyi ni tshad med pa dang bsam gtan zad pas so/ /gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi tshul khrims ni ji lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa
<p>238b.7</p>skyes pa zad nas zad par 'gyur ro/ /slob pa dang mi slob pa dang nyan thos thams cad kyi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje chen po dang bral bas so/ /gzhan yang theg pa gnyis te/ lha'i theg pa dang mi'i theg pa'o/ /de la sems can thams cad
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /chos la dmigs pa ni/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i byams
<p>239a.2</p>pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun gyi sngon du 'gro ba ltar dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pa
<p>239a.3</p>ni phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na/ sems can gzugs med pa ma gtogs pa thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang las dang 'bras bu dang po'i rim pa shes pa'o/ /sbyin pa ni chos dang zang zing ngo / /snyan par smra ba ni tshig 'jam pa'o/ /don spyod pa ni gzhan dag
<p>239a.4</p>gi bsam pa bzhin rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /don mthun pa ni bdag yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa de nyid la gzhan dgod pa'o/ /mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa ni tshig 'bru zhes bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi skad dang yi ge dang tshig 'brus brjod du
<p>239a.5</p>med pa'i don ni ston to/ /skye ba dang 'gog pa la gnas pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /mi skye ba dang mi 'gog pa la gnas pa ni ye shes so/ /nges pa dang drang ba ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob bstan pa'o/ /gang zag ni skye bo'i gang zag gi sangs rgyas kyi bar brdas bstan te/ 
<p>239a.6</p>de dag la mngon par zhen pa ni ston pa ma yin no/ /chos nyid ni mnyam mo/ /'dod chags la spyod pa nyi khri chig stong de bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug dang cha mnyam la spyod pa ste/ spyir brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /sbyin pa bzhin ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ chos smra ba
<p>239a.7</p>rnams la smyu gu dang / gro ga la sogs pa sbyin pa dang / stan sbyin pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / snyan pa sbyin pa dang / legs par gsungs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'o/ /yang bzod pa bzhi ni ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ chos tshol ba la brtson pas ngan du smra ba bzod
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mthun par 'jug pa'i bzod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa'o/ /mi rtag pa'i don gang zhe na/ med pa'i don dang / mi chags pa'i don to/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas las/ bram ze'i rig byed las mtshan sum cu
<p>239b.2</p>rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis te/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang / sangs rgyas so/ /sman ser 'di yis mig bskus na/ gzugs ci mthong ba thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa gang dag
<p>239b.3</p>yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu btsud do/ /za ma tog bkod pa las/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma lung bstan/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spobs pa lta bu de bzhin
<p>239b.4</p>gshegs pa la yang mi mnga' zhes 'byung / ri'i rgyal po de dag la rang sangs rgyas de dag gnas te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dag phan tshun smra'o/ /dge 'dun gyi las spyod pa'i mi 'os pa las spyod pa las sdig che ba 'byung / 'jam
<p>239b.5</p>dpal rnam par rol pa las/ gang du sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/ de thams cad nyon mongs pa'o/ /kha dog dang gzugs kyi rtags dang spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
<p>239b.6</p>'byung ba ma yin gyis sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/ chos nyid la brten na mdo sde thams cad nges pa'i
<p>239b.7</p>don yin no/ /'jig rten la brten na thams cad drang ba'i don yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i las ni gnyis so/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>shing sa dgu par 'phar ba la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod/ chos de dag kyang mdo 'di nyid las 'byung / ma 'dres pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la sems can gdug
<p>240a.2</p>pa rnams kyis gnod pa byas kyang mi brdzi la/ gnod pa byas pa'i gzhi des sems can de yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dag pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gi phyir ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
<p>240a.3</p>las/ rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bcu yod de/ 'dod pa la mi chags pa dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'thob pa dang / chung ma la sogs pa la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos spong ba dang / bde 'gro'i chos la brten
<p>240a.4</p>pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / lha rnams dga' ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bdun gyi smon lam las/ sems can gyi rnam par shes pa gshin rje'i
<p>240a.5</p>mis drangs te/ gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha phyi bzhin 'brang bas sems can des legs nyes ci byas pa thams cad legs par yi ger bris te/ gshin rje la phul ba dang / gshin rjes dris shing brtags nas/ de la ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du
<p>240a.6</p>bsgo'o/ /mi shi ma thag tu sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od mchod na/ des zhag bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ sum cu rtsa lnga'am/ bzhi bcu rtsa dgu na dran te/ de phyin chad sdig pa mi byed do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las/ 
<p>240a.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rab tu dben pa
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>'dod cing dgon pa'i logs su phyogs te/ gom pa bdun bor na ches bsod nams che zhing / sangs rgyas su yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs ni bag yod pa la gnas so/ /byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing smon lam gyis grub po/ /gang gis
<p>240b.2</p>sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brjod pa bsod nams ches che na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la byang chub sems
<p>240b.3</p>dpa' zhig gis khyod nam 'tshang rgya zhes dris pa dang / nam yang 'tshang mi rgya ba'i dper/ zla ba ni nyin mor 'gyur ba dang / nyin mo ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na ba dag 'tshang rgya'o zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin
<p>240b.4</p>gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa las/ bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu la bskal pa gcig go/ /de'i bskal pa bcu la bskal pa chen po gcig go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim nas byung ba zhig gis mdo sde 'di gzung ba dang / bklag pa la
<p>240b.5</p>sogs par mi rnyed la de la gal te la la zhig gis khyod khyim gyi gnas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug phod na mdo sde 'di sbyin no zhes zer la/ gal te mdo sde rnyed pa lta na khyim gyi gnas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas kyang ltung ba med do/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>240b.6</p>kyi zhing de na tshe gcig gis dgra bcom par 'gyur te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu ming tsam ste/ sems can gyi ris der skye ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa las/ 'di lta ste/ las bsam
<p>240b.7</p>gyis mi khyab pa dang / klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsam gtan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/ 'bru mar gyis bskus nas mar me 'bud do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>pa 'di de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / gzhan dag kyang byang chub la bkod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
<p>241a.2</p>cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba mthong ngam thos na de la mos pa ma gtogs pa lha la sogs pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang la yang ma mos pa'o/ /byams pa seng ge tog me tog pad+ma me tog skar ma rgyal spyad legs lag
<p>241a.3</p>bzangs 'od skar ma la dga' ba/ mngon 'phags shes pa yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba nor dpal ye shes 'byung gnas/ rin po che 'byung gnas kun du snang ba/ yon tan mtha' yas grags pa mos pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i sku tshe dang nyan thos ni bskal
<p>241a.4</p>pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu kun bsdoms pa dang mnyam mo/ /de snyed kyi mdzad pa kun sangs rgyas mos pa gcig pus mdzad do/ /tshangs pa gtsug phud byang chub kyi rim gro ba'i lta gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
<p>241a.5</p>pa'i zham ring na 'brang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zed/ gzugs med pa'i lha'i tshe bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong / sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dben par bya ba'i gtam bya'o/ /
<p>241a.6</p>lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/ de lta mod kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ sems can rnams kyis dmigs so/ /chos kyi mdo bzhi
<p>241a.7</p>rnam par gzhag ste/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /rmi lam bstan pa las/ sa dgu pa
<p>241b.2</p>dang bcu pa las rmi lam log par mthong ba med do/ /phung po gsum pa las kyi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir bklag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos gsum char rnyed na de ni sa brgyad par blta'o/ /me tog gi tshogs las/ byang phyogs na yul gan
<p>241b.3</p>d+ha ra zhes bya ba na lo 'bum du mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba yod do/ /kha che'i yul nas khri phrag lnga/ byang phyogs nas bye ba phrag brgyad dang lnga 'bum/ shar phyogs nas brgya stong phrag mang po/ /lho phyogs su nyis 'bum/ nub phyogs nas 'bum/ rigs kyi bu gang de
<p>241b.4</p>bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de la ma dad cing / yid ma ches nas/ de lta bur ga la 'gyur zhes tshig tu smras na/ lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po 'o dod 'bod pa zhes bya bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang na bstan pa rab tu 'bar
<p>241b.5</p>bar gyur pa de na/ dam pa'i chos spang ba'i skyes bu blun po shin tu mang bar gyur to/ /mi lus thob par dka' ste/ rus sbal dang gnya' shing gi dpes bstan pa 'byung / 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po las/ 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam
<p>241b.6</p>yang blang bar mi bya'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa bzhi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa/ rgyal rigs 'dod pa/ bram ze'i rigs 'dod pa'o/ /gling bzhi pa'i sems can
<p>241b.7</p>thams cad la bskal pa bas lhag par yo byad kun byin pa bas/ yang dag par zhugs pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'tsho ba dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gis dad pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam blangs na de bsod nams che'o/ /rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba 'di
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>dag dang ldan na/ mda' 'phangs pa bzhin dmyal bar 'gro ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos na tshul khrims la smod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas bslabs pa las 'gal na nga rgyal gyis mi 'chags pa dang / 
<p>242a.2</p>shes bzhin du yon bdag dad pas byin pa la spyod pa'o/ /rab tu byung ba rgyags pa 'di bzhi dang ldan na dmyal bar 'gro ste/ bzhi ni mang du thos pas rgyags nas bag med pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur stis rgyags pa dang / mdza' ba shes dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags pa dang / sbyangs
<p>242a.3</p>ba'i yon tan gyis rgyags nas bdag bstod/ gzhan la smod pa'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpar khas 'ches te/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa'o/ /dus lnga brgya tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'ches pa'i khyi'i chos kun tu
<p>242a.4</p>spyod pa dag 'byung / dge slong khyim pa rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes ma gtogs par skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya/ khyim du song nas chos ma gtogs 'du 'dzi'i gtam mi bya/ ngas ni sngon byas pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gsungs/ byang chub
<p>242a.5</p>sems dpa' ltar bcos pa kha cig sdig pa byas pa bshags pas 'byung ba'i sems kyis phyin chad sdom par mi byed/ nyin gcig la lan brgya bar du 'byung ba'i phyir spong ba ni bla'i/ tshul khrims ma dag pas dad pas byin pa la yongs su spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /gal
<p>242a.6</p>te khyed nyan thos gcig gi sems dag rnam par grol bar ma gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du bcug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /khyim pas
<p>242a.7</p>kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa las/ tshong dpon zla ba 'byor pa de la ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo byad kyis kyang ci tsam du yang mi phod do/ /dper na dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>rnam par shes pa'i khams de 'gog pa las 'das nas yongs su phyin pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/ nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzugs yod de/ nang gi gzugs ni zin pa'i mig gang yin pa ni
<p>242b.2</p>phyi rol gyi gzugs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ni gzugs so/ /nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas rmi lam na gzugs mthong gi sha'i mig gis ni ma yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo las 'di gnyis lo khrir dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa bas/ 
<p>242b.3</p>gang zhig der snga dro gcig gi de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du yang dag par smra ba'o/ /dkon mchog sprin las/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni
<p>242b.4</p>don dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa
<p>242b.5</p>rnams kyis ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi bstan bcos thams cad med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes bu du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o/ /byang
<p>242b.6</p>chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /'dul ba'o/ /tshangs
<p>242b.7</p>pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'ga' zhig bskal pa brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang snga dro'i dus gcig zhe sdang med par gnas pa bsod nams shin tu che'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na byang
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la gnas nas/ 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems las su rung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs skyed pa dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa'o/ /gang rnams dngos
<p>243a.2</p>po 'jig pa las 'gags pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /smra bar gyur pa de dag ni lam log par zhugs pa ste/ nga yang de dag gi ston pa ma yin/ de dag yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/ /gal te sems can thams cad kyang / /theg pa dam pa 'dod 'gyur na/ /thams
<p>243a.3</p>cad kyi yang go skabs yod/ /theg pa'i khyad par dag la ltos/ /dngos po ni mig gi rang bzhin gyis dben te/ gang chos thams cad mi sgom pa 'di ni lam sgom pa'o/ /bskal pas bsreg pa na chu bran dang / rdzing bu dang mtsho la sogs pa sngar skam la phyis rgya mtsho chen po skam pa ltar
<p>243a.4</p>dam pa'i chos nub pa'i tshe/ nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi chos sngar nub par 'gyur la/ phyis skyes bu dam pa blo gros rgya mtsho lta bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho
<p>243a.5</p>las byung ba/ /rin po ches ni rin chen sdud/ /ces bya bar bsngags pa/ bsreg pa'i bskal pa byung yang mi 'tshig ste/ /de yang 'jig rten 'jig tshe gzhan du 'gro/ /de bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos 'jig tshe/ /brtson 'grus mchog ldan de dag 'bad cing
<p>243a.6</p>'dzin/ /snod min 'jig rten chos min 'dod rig nas/ /khams pa rgyal ba gzhan gyi drung du 'gro/ /chos rnams 'byung ba med pa bstan pa las/ /lan cig kho nas rgyal bar 'gyur ba min/ /rigs pa'i rim dang bya ba'i rim gyis 'thob/ /bskal pa khrag khrig bye ba
<p>243a.7</p>grangs med du/ /go cha bgos pas 'thob kyi gzhan du min/ /rigs kyi bu bdag bsrung bar 'dod pa des gzhan su'i spyod pa la yang brtag par mi bya ste/ 'di ni 'di 'dra'o/ /'di ni 'di 'dra'o zhes dpya bar mi bya'o/ /chos 'di thos shing mir 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod pa'i
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>yon tan lnga chags khyim pa'ang bla'i/ /bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung gyur zhing / /dmigs lta sbyangs pa'i yon tan rlom pa min/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi zhus pa las/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kun gyi rtsa ba'o/ /
<p>243b.2</p>bsod nams ni sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can dang theg pa dman pa'i bsod nams zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /ye shes ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med par bsngo ba'o/ /shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor/ thabs kyi
<p>243b.3</p>ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg /sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas spyo yang slar mi spyo/ /bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
<p>243b.4</p>pas khros kyang slar mi khro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu rnyed pa'o/ /bsod nams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /ye shes ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la kun dri bya'o/ /thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ 'khor
<p>243b.5</p>los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de la btsun mo yang brgyad khri bzhi stong bu yang brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sdig pa so sor 'chags pa'o/ /bsod nams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /ye shes ni sangs rgyas
<p>243b.6</p>thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa'o/ /shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngoms/ byang chub kyi sems ni chos gnyis kyis bsdus na phyir mi ldog par gnas so/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/ /de la bsam pa ni g.yo med pa dang sgyu med pas
<p>243b.7</p>bsdus so/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni de la chags pa dang khyad par du 'gro bas bsdus so/ /sems kyi dmigs pa ni bdud kyi yul te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ chos bzhi dang ldan na mi khom pa spong bar 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / chos 'dod
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang / bdag gi 'gyod pa mi skye ba dang / gzhan gyi 'gyod pa sel ba'o/ /chos gnyis dang ldan pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams bsal nas mi dge ba'i chos 'gog par 'gyur te/ gnyis ni phung po gsum gyi bsngo ba dang ldan
<p>244a.2</p>pa dang / bag yod par gnas pa'o/ /yang gnyis te/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/ /chos brgyad dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa
<p>244a.3</p>dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsdus pa mang du thos pa/ sems nges par sems la dga' ba/ byang chub pa'i bsam pa la ma rmongs pa dran pa mnyam par gzhag pas gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab bsgom pa la brtson pa/ brtsams pa thams cad bsrung
<p>244a.4</p>ba snying por byed pa/ 'khor gyi nang du 'ong ba la zab mo'i chos kyi gtam gyi bar bgyid de gtam sna tshogs gleng ba gang yin pa de ni dam pa'i chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir ji srid zab mo'i chos grags pa
<p>244a.5</p>de srid du chos nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya pa dang ji tsam gyi gling bzhi par gyur pa la de lta bu'i bye ba phrag brgya/ de na mi rnams par mdor 'chi ba med/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
<p>244a.6</p>byung nas tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par ma byas te/ cho ga nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa ni yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ de dag gi lta ba drang por 'gyur te/ des na sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'i/ klu'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ 
<p>244a.7</p>byad bzhin bzang po la phrag dog mi byed pa de ni lus chen por 'gyur/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhis/ khye'u bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/ dbu ni shar phyogs/ zhal ni byang phyogs/ rgyab ni lho phyogs su bstan la glo g.yas pas phab/ drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>las/ nor gang gi yin pa de ni sbyin bdag yin no/ /byed du bcug pas byin pa ni/ sbyin pa po yin gyi sbyin bdag ma yin no/ /gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa po yang yin la/ sbyin bdag kyang yin no/ /dug dang mtshon cha dang srog chags bsad de sha
<p>244b.2</p>dang / bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang / 'di dag ni bdag gi rim gro dang mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang / 'thob pa'i phyir bsdu bar sbyin pa ni sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /rtsed mo la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan la sbyin pa byin pa ni yongs su ma
<p>244b.3</p>dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun dang chos smra ba dang nad pa dang pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni sbyin pa bla na med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa byed pa ni rnam par smin pa mtshungs so/ /dge ba byas pa ma'i mngal du
<p>244b.4</p>skyes pa na zhag bdun gyi bar du/ bdag de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes te las 'di lta bu zhig gis gyur to zhes bya bar dran no/ /mi dge ba byed pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /lha phreng ba thogs pa dag gnyis kyis gnyis sprod kyi khu ba ni mi 'byung / bu mngal na zhag bdun gnas nas dku
<p>244b.5</p>g.yas nas 'byung ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bar dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha ag tshom dang spu thung ba/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa las/ mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la/ bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod/ byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes
<p>244b.6</p>su 'jug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /rtsom pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil
<p>244b.7</p>gyis non par byed pa de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no/ /sems can thams cad la 'dun cing mi dge ba mi byed pa ni nga rgyal med pa'o/ /bdag tshul khrims la gnas la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / kun nas sdang ba bsal ba'i phyir chos ston pa ni 'dul ba smra ba'o/ /byang chub
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>sems dpa'i sde snod las/ bdag dang sems can dang gang zag la sogs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pas/ bdag la sogs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'o/ /nga ni tshul khrims
<p>245a.2</p>ldan zhes bdag ma bsnyems/ 'di ni tshul khrims ngan zhes gzhan ma brnyas/ tshul khrims tsam gyis gzhan la gang brnyas pa/ /bsnyems phyir de ni tshul khrims 'chal zhes bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa med pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
<p>245a.3</p>bye ma snyed kyi shing la sogs pa thams cad gcig tu spungs te/ bsregs la rgya mtsho chen por sbyangs nas/ de las rdul blangs na 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya bar yang mkhyen la chags pa yang mi mnga'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /tshe de nyid
<p>245a.4</p>kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ rnam par 'thor rlung gis kyang bskyod par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs
<p>245a.5</p>pa'o/ /spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi ni chos la dmigs pa'o/ /bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed do/ /ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do/ /shes rab kyis rgyas par byed do/ /bsngo
<p>245a.6</p>bas dpag tu med par byed do/ /gang zag sbyor ba dman pa la mos pa rgya che ba yang yod/ mos pa dman pa la sbyor ba rgya che ba yang yod/ bud med ni nyes pa mang ba sgyu mkhas pa sems yang ba/ sems 'gyur ba sems mi brtan pa/ sems rab tu g.yo zhing mi brtan pa spre'u'i
<p>245a.7</p>sems spre'u dang mtshungs pa sgyu ma ston pa la mkhas pa ste/ de'i phyir bud med ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni ldog pa bzhi bskyed de/ 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / 'du byed du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal las bzlog
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>pa'o/ /theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bus/ bud med kha dog rgyas pa mthong na 'du shes bzhi bskyed par bya ste/ nyams par 'du shes pa dang / g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / phyi sa khung du 'du shes pa dang / rnag tu 'du shes bskyed do/ /gal te de ltar
<p>245b.2</p>brtags kyang 'dod chags skye ba lta na/ 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ ma 'dra ba la ma'i 'du shes dang / sring mo 'dra ba la sring mo'i 'du shes dang / bu mo 'dra ba la bu mo'i 'du shes bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar du gcod pa dang / 'jig
<p>245b.3</p>par byed pa ni dge slong sdig can las gzhan gang yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos lnga dang ldan na sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten/ dal ba 'byor ba mi rnyed/ dge ba'i chos bsgrubs pa chud gzon/ sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub
<p>245b.4</p>sems dpa'i rjes su mi slob 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /lnga ni rgyal pos bkrab par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos skrag par 'gyur la/ skye bo mang pos bdag cag gi 'di bgyir gsol zhes don bcol ba las bya bar khas 'ches nas mi byed pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / 
<p>245b.5</p>dge bsnyen ma grong ngam/ ljongs sam yul lam pho brang 'khor du gnas par gyur pa la/ de dag gis tshul khrims nyams par byed pa dang / pha ma dang bu pho dang bu mo dang sring mo dang mdza' bo dang / nye du dang sems can gzhan yang rung ste/ chos byed pa'i bar chad byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
<p>245b.6</p>pa'i bstan pa zab mo thos na ma dad cing / kha zer la gzhan yang de las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang / blon po'am 'khor gzhan stobs chen po la brten cing / dbang phyug bsnyems pas skye bo mang po la gshe brgyad/ 'phyas 'dogs 'thing slad byed do/ /rab tu byung ba
<p>245b.7</p>yang chos lnga dang ldan na da ltar 'gyur te/ lnga ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa dang / dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i thibs po dang / gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos smra ba la rim gro dang / smyu gu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / g.yo med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'o/ /
<p>246a.2</p>de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa ting nge 'dzin las/ bu dang bu mo la dgrar 'du shes pa/ chung ma la sring mor 'du shes pa dang / 'di ltar ma gus pas na dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzung 'dod pas/ ngo mi rtag pa thams
<p>246a.3</p>cad spang bar bya/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi stong du ting nge 'dzin 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur te/ lo brgya pa tha ma phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mar gyur pa/ dngos po'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyi 'du shes can gyis mthong
<p>246a.4</p>bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa'i re bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur/ bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/ chos la ser sna byed pas mang du thos par mi 'gyur/ gang zag la brten pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur/ 
<p>246a.5</p>bre mo'i gtam la dga' bas bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ gnas la dga' bas 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur/ rjes su chags pas skyon mthong bar mi 'gyur/ gnod sems la dga' bas nges par mi 'gyur/ sdang zhing zhe 'gras pas phan yon mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
<p>246a.6</p>bka' mi bcag pa dang / mdza' rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa spangs pa dang / nyes par lta ba med pas slob dpon gyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /bsod nams kyi stobs kyi rtog pa brjod pa las/ gang dag shin tu gtang dka' ba/ /nyung du'ang mang po gtong byed na/ /shi yang de ni
<p>246a.7</p>shi ma yin/ /rgyags zad pa yi mgron po bzhin/ /bsod nams min pas phan pa'i sman/ /shin tu gnod pa dag tu 'gyur/ /mthu rtsal nyams la dregs pa yi/ /bag med chang gis rtag myos shing / /gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa/ /de dag shi ba snying nas shi/ /
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>sor mo'i phreng bas/ 'jam dpal skyes bu chos 'dod pa la la zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las/ la la zhig gis bstan te/ zas lan gcig par gyur na/ srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste de ltar gyur na de dag la srog gcod pa dag par mi
<p>246b.2</p>'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du 'gyur/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma byas pa rtag par g.yung drung mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa yod de/ dper na chu dang 'o mar 'dres pa mi
<p>246b.3</p>dmigs pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyibs kyang nyon mongs pas g.yogs mod kyi/ de gnyis 'dres par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do/ /nyon mongs pa med pa nas/ nyi zla sprin las grol ba bzhin snang ngo / /sngon phyugs su gyur pa'i sems can ma rgal ba la da dung so sgra
<p>246b.4</p>khrig khrig zer ba gang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches so/ /de bzhin du sngon las ngan pa byed byed pa ril yid mi ches te/ de dag la skyon ril 'byung ngo zhes 'byung ngo / /bsod nams can de dag ni dad par 'gyur te/ de dag ni skye ba thams cad du legs
<p>246b.5</p>dgu 'grub par 'byung / kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams sgrub pa'i don mi shes nas/ theg pa chen po thams cad la smad pa 'byung ste/ nga la skur pa 'debs pa de la ci ltar bya zhes/ nga yang ngo tsha ba skye'o/ /ma 'ongs pa na sems can gang dag bud+ha'i sku pha ma phrad pa las skyes pa/ 
<p>246b.6</p>rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rkang dang khrag can mi'i lus so zhes zer ba de dag 'jig rten na mi sdug pa'i skyon can zha bo gzhogs nyams pa kham nam pa yan lag ma tshang ba dang / ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /dper na sog bur gyi phung po'i
<p>246b.7</p>nang du me bcug na/ sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig la mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal dang po nga skyes pa'i yul na nan tan lhur len pa zhig ste tshig pa las/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>skyes pa der/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no/ /gang gcig tu stong bar smra ba dang / bdag tu lta ba de gnyis ni/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa dang / khas 'bub pa'o/ /dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas so/ /dbu
<p>247a.2</p>ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go/ /sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma yang sprul pa yin par 'byung / sor mo'i phreng ba dang 'jam dpal gnyis sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'
<p>247a.3</p>ni yal bar 'dor ba bcu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs te/ bcu ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / bla ma thams cad la rim gro bya ba dang / bdud kyi las dang / sems
<p>247a.4</p>can dkrugs pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / phung po gsum po'i yongs su bsngo ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa/ mgar bas ma brdungs/ sbyin pa ni zas la sogs pa sbyin pa'o/ /sbyin pa chen po ni
<p>247a.5</p>bu dang chung ma dang rgyal srid la sogs pa gtong ba'o/ /shin tu sbyin pa ni mgo dang lag pa la sogs pa gtong ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol zhing / 'khor ba las ni ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang
<p>247a.6</p>chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das ba la 'jigs par bgyi'i/ /'khor ba la ni ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas chos shin tu mang po bslab par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gcig tu bzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas
<p>247a.7</p>kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po'o/ /bzhi pa bsgrub pa las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / sems can 'grol ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bzung ba la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni lhag pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ bzhi ni sems can bsdu ba dang / smin par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / 
<p>247b.2</p>chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa brag ca lta bu bzhi ni slong ba la khong khro ba med pa dang / log par zhugs pa la snying rje ba dang / shes rab las ma nyams pa dang / rtsol ba nyams 'og tu chud pa'i sems so/ /sems bskyed
<p>247b.3</p>pa mngon par 'phags pa bzhi ni tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje mngon par 'phags pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu bzhi ni/ bsam pa dang / mdza' ba dang / nan tan dang / theg pa chen po las mi phyed pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa rnyed
<p>247b.4</p>dka' ba bzhi ni/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / theg pa dman pa dang / skye bo mi bgrungs pa dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa bla na med pa bzhi ni phangs pa thams cad gtong ba dang / btang nas mi 'gyod pa dang / 
<p>247b.5</p>rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / byang chub tu bsngo ba'i sems bya'o/ /spyi bor phyin pa'i chos bzhi ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sems can smin par byed pa'o/ /chos gya nom pa dang / dam pa'i mchog
<p>247b.6</p>bzhi ni sems can la khong khro ba med pa dang / gang dag 'gal bar byed pa dag nyid la rab tu thar bar bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / yul rgya chen po 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang / dbul bas phongs kyang chos spyod pa'o/ /dge ba'i chos bzhi ni/ dge ba thams cad la sbyor ba
<p>247b.7</p>dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyes pa dang / ma gsol bar sems can gyi bshes gnyen byed pa dang / yon tan bsgrubs pa la lan re ba med pa'o/ /tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa las/ chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin te/ gang zhe na/ khwa ltar
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>skru zhing mu cor smra ba la gzhan gyi yid dang mi sbyor ba yin/ bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa yin/ tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa yin/ mthun pa 'byed pa yin no/ /gang zag phrag dog can dang / mi brtson pa dang / smra ba la dga' ba dang / bre mo'i gtam byed pa dang / 
<p>248a.2</p>tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba dang bral ba rnams gang na ba de na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas so/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i g.yang sa yin te/ gang zhe na/ 'di sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang / chos spong ba dang / chos smra ba la sdang ba dang / mngon
<p>248a.3</p>par brtson pa med pa dad pas byin pa len to/ /mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir
<p>248a.4</p>ro/ /spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa las/ chos lnga dang ldan na/ skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum dang phrad pa 'thob/ chos kyang thos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te lnga ni/ bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
<p>248a.5</p>su song nas/ gzhan yang de la 'dzud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rgyas par byed du 'jug pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus pa dang bcas shing mthun par 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin sems pa dang / mdo sde
<p>248a.6</p>zab mo kha don byed pa la sogs pas bar chad med par bsgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la mngon par dga' zhing mi gtong mi spong la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang 'dod pa'i ngo bo nyid du mthong
<p>248a.7</p>ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun nas sgo'i le'u las/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /nga yi chos ni gnas gyur la/ /nyin gcig bzhin du nyin re la/ /stong gsum sems can ji snyed pa/ /thams cad mya ngan 'das byas shing / /
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>thams cad de ltar byas kyang ni/ /sems can khams la zad pa med/ /nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jug pa las/ gang zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs
<p>248b.2</p>pa'i phung po lnga med par byas la/ gzhan zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig tsam yang med par byas na/ de bas sdig pa ches grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'ga' zhig gis phyogs
<p>248b.3</p>bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug pa bas/ 'ga' zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la khros te/ 'di dang ma phrad par gyur cig ces 'dug na snga ma bas ches sdig che'o/ /'ga' zhig gis phyogs bcu'i sems can thams
<p>248b.4</p>cad kyi mig phyung ba bas/ 'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la khros te bltas na sdig pa ches che'o/ /'ga' zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang sangs rgyas pa rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams par byas la/ 'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems
<p>248b.5</p>dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na ches sdig che'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/ dmigs pa can thams cad ni 'jig rten pa yin te/ 'jig
<p>248b.6</p>rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags pas so zhes 'byung / dmigs pa med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes 'byung / de gnyis ka yang pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ni bya bar 'byung / bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa las/ chos bzhi ni mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /dgra la yang mi khro
<p>248b.7</p>pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa'o/ /bzhi dang ldan na nor mang bar 'gyur te dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re bar
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>sbyin pa'o/ /bzhi dang ldan na 'gran zla med par 'gyur te/ g.yo med par dge ba 'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la mi khro ba'o/ /
<p>249a.2</p>bzhi dang ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs shing / chos thos la sdug bsngal med par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs sgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod
<p>249a.3</p>par brtson pa'o/ /dpal spong gi mdo las/ 'di ni chos 'dus pa la 'phel ba ste/ nyes pas nyes pa can du mthong na 'chags shing mthol te phyin chad kyang sdom pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa las/ rab 'byor gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
<p>249a.4</p>gzugs rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / gdod ma nas zhi ba dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni ldem por dgongs pa ma yin pa ste/ sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du shes par bya'o zhes smras na/ de ni phyi rol pas kyang phyis
<p>249a.5</p>so so skye bo'i phyogs la gnas pa ste/ log par smra ba'o/ /gang la la zhig gis gzugs la yang yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa tsam du yang dag par mi mthong ba de dag gzugs la gzugs su dmigs pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po las/ chos
<p>249a.6</p>bzhi dang ldan pas dgon par gnas par bya ste/ khyim na gnas pa spong ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba dang / khyim pa spong ba dang / bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o/ /chos gnyis kyis dmyal bar ltung ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ngo / /chos bzhis mtho ris su 'gro
<p>249a.7</p>ste/ sems can la sems snyoms pa dang / bsam pa dag pa dang bdog pa thams cad gtong ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /des bas zhus pa las/ chos bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod pa yin te/ bzhi ni yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / 
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>phangs par 'dzin pa dang / gus pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar gyur pa las/ gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par bstan pa
<p>249b.2</p>las/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mchod pa'i phyir tha na bzhad gad dam/ ku re'am byis pa'i kyal kas rtsed mo byas kyang 'jim pas mchod rten byed na/ de dag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal mthar byas nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje snying po'i gzungs las/ gang
<p>249b.3</p>dag chos thams cad la dngos po med par lta ba de ni skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'gag par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngos lta bur mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs mi 'dor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nges par bshad pa'i rin
<p>249b.4</p>chen byin gyis zhus pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon yongs su sbyong ba ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ lus mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa la ma zhen pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi smod pa dang / len pa la rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/ /byang chub sems
<p>249b.5</p>dpas chos bzhi rtag tu mngon du bya ste/ bzhi ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'o/ /glang po'i rtsal las/ thams cad mkhyen pa bla med pa/ /mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas
<p>249b.6</p>shing / /gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag /me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/ /'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems btud na/ /'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste/ /de la tshad ni yod ma yin/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang
<p>249b.7</p>med/ /de 'dra yi dam la yang med/ /sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'dod pas/ /chos rnams gang yang mi gzung zhing / /chos rnams gang yang mi 'dor ro/ /klu'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/ zhi gnas kyis brgyan na nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /lhag mthong gis
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>brgyan na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes par 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /bad sa'i rgyal po
<p>250a.2</p>'char byed kyis zhus pa las/ sbrang bus rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /phag ni ngan skyugs mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / /khyi ni sha yi don du shan par 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/ /rab tu me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de bla la/ /de bzhin
<p>250a.3</p>lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za bla zhing / /me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg pa bla'i/ /lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya/ /bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams la brten cing / pha ma la brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes
<p>250a.4</p>bu'i skyon gnyis yin no/ /mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/ /rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur pa yi/ /pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/ /mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pas/ /rnga mo bong
<p>250a.5</p>bu'i chos spyod cing / /bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa/ /ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin/ /mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig /kha dog ldan par mthong mod kyi/ /nang na ha la ha la'i dug /drag po chen po yod pa ltar/ /de ni bud med brgyan pa dag /gang dang gang na snang ba
<p>250a.6</p>dang / /gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/ /rkyal pa rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag /phyi sa bzhin du dman par bsgrags/ /ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig /sngangs zhing skrag pa byung gyur kyang / /des ni phyi sa mthong ba na/ /chags pa skyed par byed pa
<p>250a.7</p>ltar/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas/ /dge bar gsungs zhes rjod byed kyang / /de'i sems bud med phyi bzhin song / /byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/ /rnam par dag pa bsdus pa las/ /dge slong chos de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 'di ltar dam pa'i chos spangs pas bskal pa
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>bcur sems can dmyal bar skyes so/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba'i tha ma'i tshe/ khyod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi thos der phan chad bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par 'tshang
<p>250b.2</p>rgya'o/ /mi blun po dag 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gcig pus byang chub thob po zhes zer te/ de dag ni spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /brtson pa la bdud glags tshol gyi mi brtson pa la bdud kyis ci zhig bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las/ 
<p>250b.3</p>byang chub sems dpa' rnams la g.yo dang / ser sna dang phrag dog dang / /phra ma dag gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mi nus so snyam pa'i zhen pa'i sems med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dus ma yin pa dang / ma ldong ba dang / ra ro ba dang / dug dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon dang / 'gyed pa dang / 
<p>250b.4</p>rang gi lag nas ma yin pa 'dod pa'i reg pa'i sbyin pa med do/ /blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa las/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems ni byang chub kyi sems shes pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u las/ lha'i bu khams gsum pa ni sems tsam du zad la sems de yang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ 
<p>250b.5</p>sems kyi chos nyid kyis yongs su btsal kyang mi rnyed do/ /sems gang gis yongs su btsal ba'i sems de yang mi rnyed do/ /sems can mi dmigs pas chos thams cad mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni ji tsam du bdag sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde
<p>250b.6</p>ba de tsam du gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnams la yang spyod la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do/ /bzhi ni dam bcas pa la brtan pas snying po la gnas pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus
<p>250b.7</p>dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /gling chen po bzhi pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi/ gling gzhan du ma yin no snyam na maung gal gyi bu khyod de ltar mi blta'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ gling chen po bzhi pa thams cad du/ ngas sems can rnams kyi mos
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>pa ji lta ba bzhin chos ston to/ /kha cig tu ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ kha cig tu ni yum gyi lhums na gnas pa/ kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa/ kha cig tu ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ngas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
<p>251a.2</p>de ltar 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi rnam par gzhag pa lta bu de ni med kyi de dag thams cad stan gcig la 'dug nas/ mngon par shes pa 'ga' zhig gis mngon sum du byed cing / rnam par thar pa brgyad rjes su 'thob pa dang / 
<p>251a.3</p>ye shes chen po thob nas nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ rang gi lus mes sreg par byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /maung gal gyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni re zhig skye gnas lnga len par 'gyur te/ bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed par 'tsho bar byed
