<p>271a.7</p>zer ro/ /'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bud med kyi gzugs kyis 'tshang rgya bar ston/ 'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bdag nyid khams bzhi po rnams su sgyur bar byed cing / sems can rnams kyi nad bsal bar bdag nyid sman dang shing thams cad du sgyur bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>271b</p>
<p>271b.1</p>pa ni gsor mi rung ba'i nad 'dod chen po ma gtogs par nad thams cad gso bar mdzad do/ /gang mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag gso ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sha'i sku yin te/ bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba 'di ni/ nyan
<p>271b.2</p>thos kyi theg pa yin te tshad ma ma yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis ni thog mar dge sbyong gi chos kyis grog spur rnams la yang snying rje bya'o/ /dge sbyong gi chos kyis chang gi ro bro ba'i btung ba yang dag par spang bar bya'o/ /rmi lam du yang brdzun du smra ba dang / bud med dang phrad pa'i sems
<p>271b.3</p>bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni dbu ma'i lam yin par shes par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyis na rtag pa dang chad pa gnyis ka'i mtha' spangs pa/ dbu ma'i lam du gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
<p>271b.4</p>pa'i mdo chen po las/ gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'i snang ba dang / de nyid bdag yod pa dang / bdag med pa gnyis su med par ngas bstan pa de rjes su dran par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thog mnas bcos ma ma yin la/ nyon mongs pa ni glo bur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas su
<p>271b.5</p>'gyur bar 'dod pas/ nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom par bya'o/ /sa bcu thob par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang legs par brtags nas/ rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas pa ma yin par yod par 'ol byir mthong bar zad do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs
<p>271b.6</p>rgyas thams cad kyis kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo'i tshul gyis bdag gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par yid ches par bya ste/ legs par smras pa chos dang 'tsham pa ni 'jig rten pa yin yang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /bstan bcos
<p>271b.7</p>sam/ rigs sngags sam/ gsang sngags gang ci yang rung ba thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yin par shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge phyi mo ji ltar bka' stsal lags/ bka' stsal pa yi ge'i phyi mo dang chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ de yang dam pa'i
<p>272a</p>
<p>272a.1</p>chos kyi tshul gyis yi ge phyi mo bslabs na/ chos dang chos ma yin pa bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ngas sprul pa yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /'phags pa gang dag yin zhe na/ 'phags pa ni byung ba gang / chags
<p>272a.2</p>pa med pa dang / rung bas chog par 'dzin pa dang / sems can srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol ba ni 'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la zhugs pa ni 'phags pa ste/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang 'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>272a.3</p>pa'i sku la ni/ bsags pa'i khams kyi bag kyang ma mchis/ rigs kyi bu nga 'das nas lo bzhi stong gi bar du 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur te/ de'i rjes la sa'i 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i chos kyi mjug lo brgyad cu lus par 'gyur te/ chos nub tu
<p>272a.4</p>cha ba na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcu'i bar du chos kyi char phab nas nub par 'gyur ro/ /rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /gang las chos ni rtogs 'gyur ba/ /dbang chen lha yi bya ba bzhin/ /de
<p>272a.5</p>la bkur sti phyag kyang bya/ /zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir ngas bstan pa yin gyi/ nyan thos rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no/ /kha cig ni zla ba phyed yin par 'dzin te/ zla ba ni phyed du 'gyur zhing lhag pa yang med de/ zla ba ni ri rab kyi rkyen gyis de ltar snang
<p>272a.6</p>bar zad do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na zla ba dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan phrad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten rnams kyis zla ba gzas zin to snyam du 'dzin te/ sgra gcan ni zla ba la 'dzin par yang mi byed la/ des ni de la gza' bar yang mi nus te/ sgra gcan gyi lag pas zla ba
<p>272a.7</p>bsgribs nas 'od mi snang bar byed par zad de/ zla ba la rma yang med/ nyon mongs pa yang med do/ /mi rnams kyis ni zla ba sdug bsngal zhing 'dug par 'dzin to/ /zla ba ni rang bzhin kho nar 'dug bzhin du/ bdag nyid sgra gcan dang lhan cig 'dug ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>272b</p>
<p>272b.1</p>pa ni 'jig rten gsum du yang dag par snang ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo yang ma yin/ mar gyi ngo yang ma yin pa gnam stong gnyis par nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i skabs su/ gza' mjug rings shar nas kun gyis ma tshor bar skad cig
<p>272b.2</p>kho na la mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i tshe byung nas/ sems can mang po dam pa'i chos la bkod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chen po rnams la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang g.yang sa shin tu
<p>272b.3</p>lkugs par 'dug go/ /dper na dar gyi srin bu rang nyid kyis kun nas dkris nas/ sgom btod pas phyir 'byung mi nus pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang de'i las kyi nyes pas 'dod chen po'i khong nas 'byung bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bud med ji ltar mi bzod pa
<p>272b.4</p>nyon cig /bud med ni gal te skyes pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dam/ gtam snyed dam/ dkrigs snyed dang lhan cig 'dod pa zhen par spyod kyang / sbrang bu'i gcin gyis rgya mtsho brlan cing ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bud med rnams ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo
<p>272b.5</p>chen po 'di yang lho phyogs su song nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i dgongs pa'i tshig gi char 'bebs so/ /de nas lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'jig par shes nas dgun gyi dus dang nye bar gyur pa'i
<p>272b.6</p>sprin bzhin du kha che'i yul du song nas/ sa la nub par gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa bdud rtsi'i mchog gi dam pa'i chos thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ 'dod chen po ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
<p>272b.7</p>bsnyen ma yang rung ste/ tshig ngan pas mdo sde spangs nas/ phyis bzod pa gsol bar yang mi byed pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni/ 'dod chen po'i lam du zhugs pa yin no/ /pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de dag bdag cag 'jigs pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin no snyam du shes kyang / 
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>'jigs par mi lta la/ dam pa'i chos 'byung ngo snyam du mi sems shing de nyid kyi bsngags pa ma yin par yang rjod par byed pa de dag kyang der zhugs pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum med do zhes zer ba de dag kyang der zhugs pa yin no/ /mchog tu
<p>273a.2</p>tshul khrims 'chal pa la byin pa ni 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do/ /'bras bu chen po 'chags shing bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed pa ni mi srid do/ /chad pa dag gis thams cad skrag /kun la srog ni phangs pa yin/ /bdag gi nyams las dpag bya zhing / /brdeg par
<p>273a.3</p>mi bya gsad mi bya/ /gser 'od dam pa las/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing / /dge ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/ de kho na nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku'o/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur ba ni chos kyi sku'o/ /nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gyur
<p>273a.4</p>pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gyur pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o/ /dung phreng gi mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal bar ma gyur pa'i tshe ni kun gzhi zhes bya'o/ /gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/ /stug po bkod
<p>273a.5</p>pa las/ sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/ /gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/ /bum pa snam bu la sogs pa'i/ /lus ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba las/ gang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus kyis chos ston pa ni chos nyid yin te/ tshig gis ni ma yin no/ /bcom
<p>273a.6</p>ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas/ stug po bkod pa las/ 'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung / /mtshan ma gzugs su snang ba las/ /bag chags yod par kun gzhi ste/ /sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas/ /ji ltar 'o ma gyur pa dang / /yon tan zho dang dar bar snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi
<p>273a.7</p>rnam shes kyang / /rnam par gyur na gzugs ltar snang / /gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs/ /kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas pa ste/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/ /gzugs ni gud na yod ma yin/ /sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba/ /de ni kun gzhir gyur pa yin/ /kun gzhi kun du lag pa ste/ /kun tu kha mig mgo yang yin/ /rim ma ma yang na cig car du/ /sa rnams log par rab tu gnas/ /ri rab tsam du gyur pa yi/ /bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi/ /stong nyid lta la
<p>273b.2</p>gnod pa ni/ /nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/ /gnas ma yin par spyad mi bya/ /gnas min gal te spyad gyur na/ /bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba bzhin/ /lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung / /lus can rnams la yod pa yin/ /lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/ /
<p>273b.3</p>stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to/ /stong pa nyid kyi lta thos nas/ /la la'i lta ba mang zhig ni/ /gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te/ /sman pas btang ba'i nad bzhin te/ /ji ltar bsreg bya tshig pa'i me/ /bsreg bya med pas mi gnas so/ /de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/ /stong nyid me yang
<p>273b.4</p>'gag par 'gyur/ /lta ba 'gags pa'i dus su yang / /yang dag ye shes me 'byung ste/ /nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes //sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/ /gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/ /bum pa snam bu la sogs pa'i/ /yul ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /rnam par
<p>273b.5</p>shes pa'i spyod yul gang / /'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung / /rnam par shes par gyur pa ste/ /bum pa la sogs ma yin no/ /'di ltar nor ba snang ba gang / /bum pa la sogs ci yang rung / /de ni kun gzhi gyur pa ste/ /snang ba nor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /'phags pa dpal sbas zhes
<p>273b.6</p>bya ba'i mdo las/ bram ze de ni lus thams cad nas me byung ste/ tshig nas tshig go zhes smras te/ sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo / /de la bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /slob dpon ma bsnyengs shig /bdag gis khyod bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas bram ze'i
<p>273b.7</p>khye'u chos 'dod kyis/ bdag sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub la spyod pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'di'i sems can dmyal ba zhi bar gyur cig ces byas pa dang / de ma thag tu bram ze de sems can dmyal ba nas thar to/ /spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa las/ de bzhin du gzugs
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>nas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na ming sna tshogs su bya ba dpag tu med de rnam grangs 'di ni/ ming thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
<p>274a.2</p>gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur na da ci byar yang med do/ /bkres pa ni nyes pa med kyi/ dug dang 'dres pa'i zas zos pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub
<p>274a.3</p>sems dpas nyan thos kyi theg pa ni mthos kyang bla'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan ni rgyan te/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / snying rje chen po'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang / sems can kun la sems thogs pa med pa'i rgyan dang / chos nyan pa
<p>274a.4</p>tshol bas chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams chub par byas nas/ tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang / chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / /chos zab mo la rnam par sems
<p>274a.5</p>shing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la thabs la mkhas pas rgyan no/ /sangs rgyas phal po che las/ sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
<p>274a.6</p>kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang / snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rab brtan cing / /chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug /skad cig sems
<p>274a.7</p>kyis dus gsum 'byung ba yi/ /zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho zhing mi zad/ /zhing rnams ring dang thung dang gling gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /chos dbyings mnyam
<p>274b</p>
<p>274b.1</p>zhing rnam par 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra/ /mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri med sems kyis shin tu bskyed pa ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang / /rin chen 'od 'phro 'byung ba'i zhing / /'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon
<p>274b.2</p>khebs shing / /rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan/ /thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin/ /rgya mtsho sems las byung ba yi/ /zhing rnams mod pa'i yid la gnas/ /ye nas mi gnas smig rgyu bzhin/ /yongs su rtogs par yang dag bskyed/ /bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang
<p>274b.3</p>zhing / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa 'byung / /yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/ /kha dog kun du snang ba ltar/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang / /klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi gnas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/ /de
<p>274b.4</p>bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/ /zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/ /sems can lus kyi rnam pa dag /ji ltar sems kyis brtag pa ltar/ /de bzhin zhing gi rnam pa yang / /thams cad las kyis rnam par bris/ /ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/ /sems can
<p>274b.5</p>rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/ /mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/ /sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'byung ngo / /ji ltar ri mo
<p>274b.6</p>gzugs kyi rnams/ /ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun/ /sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/ /gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi
<p>274b.7</p>khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir yang re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang / /de bzhin
<p>275a.2</p>gshegs pa zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog
<p>275a.3</p>ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/ sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
<p>275a.4</p>khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed la sogs pa yin no/ /de nyid na'ang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang / /phung po lnga las shin tu brjod/ /de rnams las
<p>275a.5</p>kyi phung chen yin/ /las kyi rtsa ba sems yin te/ /sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du bshad/ /sgyu mar gyur pa 'gro ba 'di'o/ /sems ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra/ /sems ni phung po byed pa ste/ /'jig rten khams ni ji snyed pa'i/ /'jig rten 'di dag
<p>275a.6</p>sems kyis bris/ /gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi dngos/ /chos kyi dngos su blta bar gyis/ /'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i
<p>275a.7</p>khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sems can gyi khams rnams te/ 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / so sor brtags
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>te 'gog pa dang / so sor ma brtags par 'gog pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / chos kyi gnas nyid de/ 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /las sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ nam mkha'i khams dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
<p>275b.2</p>cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ye shes kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags shing rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i ri bo grangs med pa kun du gsal bar gyur cig /
<p>275b.3</p>ye shes kyi phung pos grub pa'i rin po che'i 'od kyi phung po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /ye shes kyi mar mes yongs su grub pa'i rin po che'i mar me grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /ye shes kyi snang ba kun du gtong ba'i rin po che'i lo ma dang ldan
<p>275b.4</p>pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /gzhung de ltar rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang khong du chud par bya ste/ ye shes kyis spos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i spos kyis/ yid kyi las rgya chen po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa kun nas gnas
<p>275b.5</p>par gyur cig /de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi me tog gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun du gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ ye shes kyi me tog chags par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ ye shes kyi me tog chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa zhes bya ba dang / 
<p>275b.6</p>ye shes kyi phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / ye shes kyi phye ma dang / bdug pa dang / ye shes kyi gos dang / chos gos kyi rgyan dang / ye shes kyi gdugs kyi rgyan dang / ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ye shes kyi lhab lhub dang / ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che rnam
<p>275b.7</p>par dag pa brjod du med pa/ kun du gnas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pa la sogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsngos na/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>gcan zhes bya ba yongs su bsngo'o/ /de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/ /sprul pa'i lus ni dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad do/ /'di lta ste/ nam mkha' ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyi skye ba dang / /
<p>276a.2</p>'gag pa 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku'i skye mched kyis phrin las gang sgrub pa de/ thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sa
<p>276a.3</p>gzhan la zhe sdang bskyed pa tsam du kha na ma tho ba'i chos ni 'ga' tsam yang bdag gis ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhan la khong khro bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sgrib pa'i chos brgya stong phrag bcu po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gang zhe na byang
<p>276a.4</p>chub sems dpa' mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / ngan song du gnas pa dang / theg pa dman pa dang 'dre ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po 'dzin pa dang / bdud kyi yul bsten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las ring ba dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa dang / 
<p>276a.5</p>theg pa chen po la yid mi ches pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa'i las drungs 'byin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gleng gzhi sgug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>276a.6</p>rigs dang / ring bar 'dzin par 'gyur ba la sogs pa ste/ sgrib pa'i chos kyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa'i tshe/ thog mar sgra chen po 'di lta bu 'byung ste/ kye ma grogs po dag bsam gtan dang po ni 'dod pa dang / 
<p>276a.7</p>gnod sems med pas shin tu bde ba ste/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sgra de thos nas sems can dag bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas 'dod pa'i khams nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>ba'i bar gyi sgra bsgrags nas/ de bzhin du bsgrubs te skye/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas chu klung chen po bzhi 'bab ste/ 'di ltar chu klung chen po gang gA ni glang po che'i kha nas 'bab bo/ /si ta ni seng ge'i kha nas 'bab po/ /sin d+hu ni glang gi kha nas
<p>276b.2</p>'bab po/ /pak+Shu ni rta'i kha nas 'bab po/ /gang gA ni mdun nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab po/ /si ta ni rdo rje'i bye ma'o/ /sin d+hu ni gser gyi bye ma'o/ /pak+Shu ni bai DUr+ya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab po/ /de dag 'bab pa'i tshe re res kyang mtsho chen po lan bdun
<p>276b.3</p>du g.yas phyogs su bskor te phyogs bzhir 'bab cing rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dod do/ /lan bdun bskor ba'i bar gyi gling de dag kyang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i 'dab ma sna tshogs dang
<p>276b.4</p>ldan zhing snying po sna tshogs can gyis brgyan pa/ mtsho de'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de/ zabs su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/ /de'i ngogs ni rin po che sna tshogs brtsigs pa pha gu ltar 'dug pas kun nas 'khor ba'o/ /ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa/ rin po che'i zhing
<p>276b.5</p>gis 'khor ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor zhing brgyan pa yin/ chu klung chen po bzhi char yang kha'i sgo dpag tshad tsam nas 'bab po/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>276b.6</p>rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku bltar yod ji ltar khong du chud par bya/ smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sku bltar yod pa ni/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
<p>276b.7</p>de nyid 'dzam bu'i gling du 'char ba'i tshe/ thog mar ri rab ri'i rgyal po la snang ngo / /de'i 'og tu ri bo che gzhan la snang ngo / /de'i 'og tu ri nag po la'o/ /de'i 'og tu sa phyogs mthon po rnams la'o/ /de'i 'og tu sa phyogs dma' ba rnams su snang bar byed de/ 
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>'on kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'di ni thog mar snang bar bya'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa med do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang / chos kyi dbyings mtha'
<p>277a.2</p>dang dbung med pa'i ris su 'char bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ thog mar lhag pa'i ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par ston pa'i tshul du 'char bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]
<p>277a.3</p>theg pa la zhugs pa rnams la'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge ba'i rtsa ba nges pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la snod ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /de'i 'og tu log par nges pa'i sems can yan chad sems can thams cad la yang 'char bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'char yang de
<p>277a.4</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag ni/ sems can 'di rnams la bdag cag gis thog mar theg pa chen po snang bar byas te/ de'i 'og tu 'di dag snang bar bya'o snyam du rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par rtog
<p>277a.5</p>pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro/ /yang dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rtog pa med cing / 'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang / ri chen po rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'
<p>277a.6</p>zhing / 'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa tha dad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer tha dad pa yang snang zhing yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid shar kyang / 
<p>277a.7</p>dmus long rnams la snang bar mi 'gyur te/ de mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de mig lam du mi snang du zin kyang / dmus long rnams la kha zas 'ju ba dang / lus kyi grang ba bsal ba dang / lus kyi nad mkhris pa la sogs pa sel bas mi phan pa ma yin te phan 'dogs so/ /
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mig mdongs pa/ lta ba log pa/ sbyor ba log pa/ 'tsho ba log pa/ dmus long lta bur gyur pa'i mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur te/ de ni dad pa'i mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /
<p>277b.2</p>mig lam du mi snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ de dag gi lus la mi bde ba rtse zhil bar 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'i lhag ma sel ba'i sgor phan mi 'dogs ba ma yin te phan 'dogs so/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung
<p>277b.3</p>brjod pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing 'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa tha dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer tha dad pa
<p>277b.4</p>yang snang zhing yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid shar kyang / dmus long rnams la snang bar mi 'gyur te/ de ni mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /mig lam du mi snang du zin kyang / dmus long rnams la kha zas 'ju ba dang / lus kyi grang ba bsal ba dang / 
<p>277b.5</p>lus kyi nad mkhris pa la sogs pa sel bas mi phan pa ma yin te/ phan 'dogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang mi shes la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang khong na yod pa ngo mtshar ches/ bdag gis ci nas kyang sems can
<p>277b.6</p>'di dag rang rang gi 'du shes kyi 'dun pa chen po/ 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'grol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'phags pa'i lam bstan par mdzad do zhe na/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su sel bar mdzad do/ /de ltar 'du shes
<p>277b.7</p>yongs su sel ba'i phyir ro/ /ye shes tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'tsho'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras nam mkha' ni skye ba med pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig kyang rung / 'du yang rung ste/ de bzhin du mi zad mi 'phel bar gnas so/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongs
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>su mya ngan las 'das pa ji lta bu smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu mthar thug par mi brjod mi ston to/ /chu snod gcig cig gam de nas logs shig tu phyung ngam/ stong par
<p>278a.2</p>gzhag par gyur la/ nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan yang snang bar mi 'gyur na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nyes sam/ smras pa ma yin no/ /smras pa de bzhin du sems can snod chag pa lta bu la sogs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das par snang ngo / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chos
<p>278a.3</p>dbyings tshad dang mnyam pa ni/ snod du gzugs brnyan snang ste chag la snang ba min/ de ltar mi mchog dbang po kun du snang / /sems can dad med rnams kyis mya ngan 'das par shes/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
<p>278a.4</p>ston pa shin tu nges pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi rjes su bsngo ba/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i mur phyin pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i bag chags dang / 
<p>278a.5</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang / sems yongs su smin pa'i bag chags dang / sangs rgyas la lta ba'i bag chags dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags dang / dge ba'i bag chags dang / smon lam gyi bag chags dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i
<p>278a.6</p>bag chags dang / chos mnyam pa nyid nges par rtogs pa'i bag chags dang / spyod pa tha dad pa'i bag chags dang / bag chags de dag la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa ma lus par spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos/ bag chags thugs su chud pa/ bla na
<p>278a.7</p>med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos las 'gol ba'i lam ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ dge ba'i ba shes gnyen la brnyas pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>khams na gnas pas skyo ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas su byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bal zhen pa dang / dam pa'i chos spang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las dpags pas 'byed pa byed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems
<p>278b.2</p>dpa' la khro zhing zhe sdang bas te/ de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi las te/ 'di lta ste/ sems 'khrugs pa la brnyas pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba la smod pa dang / chos kyi dpe mkhyud dang / chos kyi snod la khyad du
<p>278b.3</p>gsod pa dang / zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa dang / snod ma yin pa la chos rgya chen po ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang zhing mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bdag
<p>278b.4</p>bstod cing gzhan smod pa dang / zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing spong ba dang / yi ge sna tshogs rang bzor byas pa'i rang bzo la dga' ba dang / grol ba dang dbugs phyin pa la bsnyen cing bkur sti byed kyi ma grol cing dbugs ma phyin pa la mi byed pa'o/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal
<p>278b.5</p>de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa rnams mthong bar ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chu'am me'am rlung ngam
<p>278b.6</p>sngon po la sogs pas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po de dag gis chu'i phung po la sogs pa mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par dpyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par
<p>278b.7</p>'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad na/ nyan thos de dag gis ma mthong zhing shes par ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni mthong ngo / /khong du chud do/ /dper na dge slong 'gog pa'i snyoms
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>par zhugs pa/ dbang po drug gis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de na yod kyang / snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthu des mi shes mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na rnam par dpyod la/ de dag la
<p>279a.2</p>dbang po drug yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung ba dang / cho 'phrul da dag mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /thams cad bdog bzhin du/ lto yi nad kyis shi ba bzhin/ /chos ma bsgoms pa de bzhin no/ /sgra
<p>279a.3</p>gdags ji snyed yod pa dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra skad du/ /sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang / /rnam par rtog pa gang yang med/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rtog med kyang / /rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang / /ji ltar sa bon rnam dag pa/ /zhing bzang la ni skye 'gyur zhing / /de
<p>279a.4</p>bzhin sems bsam rnam dag la/ /sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rtog par mi mdzad do/ /ston la rtog pa mi mnga' yang / /'jig rten khams ni tshad med par/ /thub pas rnam par rtog pa bstan/ /sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang / /
<p>279a.5</p>sku la gnyis su gyur pa med/ /ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/ /tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang / /zla ba gnyis su gyur pa med/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang mdzad pa de snyan gyi
<p>279a.6</p>skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do zhes bya ba nas dbang po thams cad sbyar ba 'byung / sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad ni sems can rnams ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag gis bsod nams 'thob par bya ba'i phyir
<p>279a.7</p>thabs mdzad pa 'byung / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa rnams la ni/ phan tshun du ngan sems kyi sems bskyed pa lta bur kha na ma tho ba'i che ba ngas 'ga' tsam ma mthong ngo / /sems kyi rnam pa 'jig rten kun/ 'jig rten rnam
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>pa sems can kun gyi sems yin te/ rnam pa gnyis kyi grangs su zhugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku yongs su 'byed pa mi mdzad/ sku tha dad par mdzad pa yang mi mnga' bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba
<p>279b.2</p>bzhin sku yongs su ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rnam par rtog pa dang / spros pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbyings kyi ser sna mi mnga' ste/ sems can dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings grag par mi
<p>279b.3</p>'gyur ro/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du tshogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'di snyam du [(]sams [,]bsam [)]te/ bdag kho na'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to snyam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung sgrogs pa yang med/ phyir sdud pa yang med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
<p>279b.4</p>gi phrin las de dag kyang yod cing snang ngo / /dper na rgya mtsho chen po la chu'i phung po tshad med pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad klu'i sems kyi khyad par las byung ngo / /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la/ chos kyi rgyun tshad med pa gang ji snyed pa de thams
<p>279b.5</p>cad sngon gyi dgongs pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par las byung ba'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po la gling bzhi pa'i sems can gyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan lta bur snang ste/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/ /bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi rlabs te/ bcu ni sems zhum pa dang / bsam pa
<p>279b.6</p>'khrugs pa dang / rgya chung ngus mgu ba dang / gcig las mi bzod pa dang / smon lam la lhung bar mi dmigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / zhi ba dang / dad pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang / spyod pa las phyir ldog pa dang / sems can yongs su
<p>279b.7</p>smin par mi byed pa dang / chos la the tshom za ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa las/ chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te gang zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>mos pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / las gsum dag pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs spangs pa dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang / bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang / de bzhin
<p>280a.2</p>gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bdog pa kun la mi lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / yi dam la brten pa'o/ /yon tan gyi chos bcu gnyis mthong bas sbyin par gnas par bya ste/ gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi lam ston pa dang / longs
<p>280a.3</p>spyod sgrub pa dang / 'dod pa'i rigs su skye ba dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / gtong ba'i rgyun 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dgas kyi sgo gcod pa dang / thun mong gi longs spyod las snying po len pa dang / yo byad rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / bdog pa la goms par 'gyur
<p>280a.4</p>ba dang / 'dzin pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gnyis mthong bas tshul khrims bsrung ste/ byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
<p>280a.5</p>kyi lam la 'jug pa dang / bdag gi 'ching ba lhod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag ngan 'gro las thar ba dang / ngan 'gro'i lam spong ba dang / las gsum kha nam tho ba med pa dang / mkhas pas mi smad pa dang / bag yod pa la brten pa dang / sems can la mi 'jigs
<p>280a.6</p>pa sbyin pa dang / sgo gsum gyi sdom pa 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'o/ /bzod pa'i bcu gnyis ni/ 'du byed skad cig pa yin par bzod pa dang / bdag mi dmigs par bzod pa dang / bdag dang
<p>280a.7</p>gzhan bsrungs ba dang / 'khrug pa'i gtam med par bya ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa bsal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba bsal ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bsgrubs pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang / gzhan gyi gnod
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>pa las 'da' ba dang / zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa dang / bdud kyi yul las 'da' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / 
<p>280b.2</p>de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / sems can smin par byed pa dang / gdul bya sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'god pa dang / sems can gyi mi shes pa sel ba dang / gdul bya la ye shes sgrub pa dang / zhing
<p>280b.3</p>sbyang ba dang / mu thug pa med par sems can gyi don byed pa dang / skad cig gcig gis zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ni mi 'khrug cing zhi ba dang / yul la mi rgyug pa dang / sems gnas pa dang / khams gsum
<p>280b.4</p>las 'da' ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis mnan pa dang / de la ma chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan zlog pa dang / dngos po'i 'du shes dang 'bral ba dang / tshad yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la smon pa dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / cang
<p>280b.5</p>shes pa dang / dbang po bsdams pa'o/ /shes rab kyi ni gti mug sel ba dang / nyon mongs pa sel ba dang / mi shes pa med pa dang / ma rig pa drungs 'byin pa dang / sred pa 'joms pa dang / shes rab rdo rje lta bu dang / shes rab nyi ma lta bu dang / shes rab me lta bu
<p>280b.6</p>dang / shes rab nor bu lta bu dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i bsod nams brgya 'gyur gyis sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'i khung bu gcig 'grub/ ba spu'i bsod nams thams cad brgyar
<p>280b.7</p>'gyur bas/ dpe byad gcig /de nas mtshan/ de nas gtsug tor/ de nas chos kyi g.yung drung ste/ des ni sems can thams cad kyis zhus na yang gsung gcig gis lan thebs so/ /nga mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sku gdung brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>za ma tog tu bcug nas/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol du rgyal po mya ngan med 'byung ba la bsdad par sa brkos nas 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po mya ngan med ni nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya nas 'byung ngo / /de nas nga'i ring bsrel byung nas zhag bdun
<p>281a.2</p>mchod de mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / grog pa la sogs pa de ni nga yang skyed mos tshal 'di ni chos kyi rnam pa 'di ston pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang mthong bar shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten dang mthun
<p>281a.3</p>par 'jug pa las/ de dag sna tshogs sku med kyang / /sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/ /sku lus sprul pa mdzad pa nas/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bdud ni bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus kyang / /dge 'dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig
<p>281a.4</p>rten mthun 'jug yin/ /srid pa 'pho ba las/ rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing / /yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa/ /de ni bden pa mchog
<p>281a.5</p>yin te/ /de la 'jig rten mi dgos so/ /byams pa 'jug pa las/ nor kun du bsrung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang / de nyan thos
<p>281a.6</p>kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs par lta ba dang / lhan cig rten par byed na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni yon dbul lo/ /'di la ni mi dbul
<p>281a.7</p>lo snyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni chos bshad do/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o/ /'di ni mi 'chal pa'o zhes phye nas 'chal pa la brnyas par byed na byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /bag yod pa gang zhe na/ bslab pa mi gtong ba dang / dam bcas
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>pa mi nyams pa dang / sems can kun la byams pa dang / sems can mi gtong ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa brtan pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gus pa dang / thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang / 
<p>281b.2</p>gzhan la chos bgo bsha' byed pa dang / zang zing med par chos ston pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang / chog shes pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa dang / rna blags te chos nyan pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bzod pa la gnas pa dang / gnod
<p>281b.3</p>sems kyi tha ba spangs pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa dang / dmigs par lta ba spangs pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la 'dun pa drag pa dang / bre mo'i gtam sdang ba dang / lus dang sems dben par gnas pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa dang / sems mnyen pa dang / tshul khrims mchog
<p>281b.4</p>tu mi 'dzin pa dang / bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / dge sbyong gi tshul la dga' ba dang / gsang por smra ba dang / bzhin khro gnyer med pa'o/ /yang nyan thos kyi sems dang / dmigs pa can gyi sems tha na rmi lam du yang yid la mi byed pa ni bag yod pa'o/ /de bzhin
<p>281b.5</p>gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan gyis sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba gzigs so/ /dmigs pa tshad med pa las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor rtogs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par byang ba la/ rnam par 'jog pa
<p>281b.6</p>yang yod/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dzin pas rnam par byang ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs par rnam par 'jog pa yod de/ de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/ /rkyen
<p>281b.7</p>ni ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni rgyu'o/ /'du byed ni rkyen no/ /de bzhin du bsgre/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ni gnyis te gzhan la rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang / rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /yang gnyis te/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>pa'o/ /kun du 'gro ba la mkhyen pa ni lus kyi las sbyor la ngag gi ma yin pa yang mkhyen to/ /de bzhin du bsgre/ yang 'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa rnams las skye ba yang yod/ rjes su chags pa las skye ba yang yod/ bdag chags pa las skye ba yang yod do/ /
<p>282a.2</p>zhe sdang khong khro ba las skye ba'i rgyu yang yod/ bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/ bag chags las skye ba yang yod do/ /gti mug ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod
<p>282a.3</p>do/ /gang zag bsam pa dman pa la sbyor ba rgya che ba yang yod/ de bzhin du bsgre/ sems can gang dag snod min pa/ /de la sangs rgyas btang snyoms mdzad/ /gang gi dus na 'grol 'gyur ba/ /de yi dus la rab tu gzhes/ /'chags pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang
<p>282a.4</p>mir skye ba dang / gnod sems kyis mdzes pa dang / le los mngon par rtogs pa dang / g.yeng bas nges par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa can gyis rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa dang / bud med kyi lus mdzes par 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
<p>282a.5</p>dang / sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa log par ltung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma rtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rgyu ba shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par bzhag pa ni gnas med do/ /skyes bu
<p>282a.6</p>kha dog lnga can du/ /nam mkha' gzugs su byed kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas gnas min bshad pa 'di/ /gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/ /nang ni zhi ba'o/ /phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o/ /zag pa bzhi ni 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang lta ba'o/ /nye bar len pa
<p>282a.7</p>bzhi ni/ 'dod pa dang / lta ba dang / bdag tu lta ba smra ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/ /sngon dri mchog gi bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ldan du/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khyim 'jig rten du byung ba de mya ngan las
<p>282b</p>
<p>282b.1</p>'da' khar gang zhig gdul bar bya zhes 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mo na sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa sangs rgyas kyis gdul bya gcig cig 'dul ba de la/ bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gnas nas mir skye ste/ de nas
<p>282b.2</p>shi 'phos te mir skyes nas 'dod pa la ma brtses pa theg pa chen po thos pa lta na/ byang chub chen po las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba gzigs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas de thugs rje dang thabs la mkhas pas/ dge slong dag la deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o
<p>282b.3</p>zhes mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan te/ sku gdung gis kyang rgyas par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sku mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas sems
<p>282b.4</p>can mir skyes te lo brgyad lon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang gzugs kyis der gshegs nas/ khye'u de la chos bshad cing lung bstan te/ de'i tshe khye'u de ma gtogs pa mir gyur pa gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de ma mthong ngo / /de nas yang mya ngan las 'das
<p>282b.5</p>pa bstan te/ sku gdung ni lha rnams kyis mchod do/ /nyi zla gcig gis mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan ni bzhi ste/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin
<p>282b.6</p>dang / shes rab dang / gzungs so/ /tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin ni byams pa'o/ /shes rab ni the tshom med pa'o/ /gzungs ni dri ba brjod du med pa'o/ /sa gzhi bai DUr+ya dkar po'i dbyings su 'dug pa/ sangs
<p>282b.7</p>rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /de yi ting 'dzin nyams pa med/ /chos rnams kun dang mnyam par ldan/ /sa chu me la ma yin te/ /rlung dang 'dod khams gzugs med la/ /rgyal ba gnas te bsam gtan min/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
<p>283a</p>
<p>283a.1</p>mi mthong ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o/ /lhag pa'i sems ni ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas shes rab 'thob bo/ /lhag pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob po/ 
<p>283a.2</p>ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /thos pa'i chos gzhan la ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ /'di la bud+d+ha'i chos dang yig 'bru bshad pa ril 'byung / bdud rtsi brjod pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na bdud kyis mi brdzi ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / 
<p>283a.3</p>myur du sangs rgyas su 'grub ste/ lnga ni rtag tu sems can la chos sbyin pa dang / sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa 'chos pa dang / sems can kun byang chub kyi sems la mos par byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal
<p>283a.4</p>gyis zhus pa las/ rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi dbang dang / gdul ba'i sems can gyi dge ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis te/ sku ji ltar gsung dang / 
<p>283a.5</p>mtshan dang chos ston pa la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ sems can rnams kyis de ltar shes so/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa las/ des ni lci ba sar bsres ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sems can kun dang thun mong du/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>283a.6</p>gang yin dang / /gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung / /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yod pa/ /de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor yug tu/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste/ /'jig rten dbang
<p>283a.7</p>phyug byams pa dang / /thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang / /kun du bzang po blo ldan dang / /gsang ba yi ni bdag po dang / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang / /de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/ /de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor
<p>283b</p>
<p>283b.1</p>brgyad bya'o/ /'di byas na yon tan bzhi 'thob ste/ tshe rabs thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'khor mang po dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang / lus sra zhing brtan pa'o/ /chos kyi phung po las/ za ma'am ma ning gis bud med sdu
<p>283b.2</p>gu mthong nas 'dod chags skyes pas/ phal cher nad kyis btab cing 'byin pa rengs par 'gyur te/ de dag gi lus khu chu rgyas pas de ltar 'gyur ro/ /za ma dang ma ning las mtho ris su 'gro ba ni nyung ste/ phal cher dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /'khor bzhi po gang dag
<p>283b.3</p>'dod chags dang mi gtsang ba'i nyes dmigs mi shes pa de dag ni chags pas gdungs pas mdog ngan cing mi sdug go/ /shes pa ni de las bzlog pa'o/ /skyes pa lta bu ma yin pa srin bu'i rigs lnga bud med la yod de/ de dag ni bud med kyi gci ba'i lam na gnas
<p>283b.4</p>te/ re re la yang srin bu brgyad cu brgyad cu yod la/ mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis yod pas rtag tu bud med kyi lus la za'o/ /des na de dag gang yin spyod pa ste/ 'dod pas ngoms mi myong ngo / /'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ni bcu ste/ 'chi ba'i tshe gdung ba dang / 
<p>283b.5</p>'gyod par 'gyur ba dang / mnar med par 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang / /khrims la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa dang / nyan thos kyis spangs pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / mi lus
<p>283b.6</p>'thob par dka' ba dang / lha rnams kyis spangs pa'o/ /bud med kyi sna'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi kha spu la za bas bud med kyi kha spu mi skye'o/ /bud med la srin bu'i tshogs a ba ro phen zhes bya ba yod pas/ 
<p>283b.7</p>bud med kyi kha la za ste/ des na mgul ba dma' ba yin no/ /bud med kyi khar bcug pa yang dang por de dag gis zos nas nyal nyil nu ma'i drung du 'dor te/ des na nu ma 'phyang ba yin no/ /bud med sbrum na srin bu de dag kyang sbrum ste/ des na nu zho mang ba yin
<p>284a</p>
<p>284a.1</p>no/ /bud med 'dod chags mi bzod pas na bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma bca' bar mdzad do/ /yi ge med pa'i za ma tog las/ byang chub sems dpas rtag tu nan tan du bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste gang zhe na/ gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan
<p>284a.2</p>la mi bya'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig bya rgod phung po'i ri la gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa las/ sus 'du byed thams cad mi
<p>284a.3</p>skye bar mthong bas sdug bsngal shes so/ /chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong bas kun 'byung spangs so/ /chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das par mthong bas 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so/ /chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong bas lam
<p>284a.4</p>bsgoms so/ /'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo rin po che mthar phyin pa las/ bud med kyi lus de nyid kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu de bzhin
<p>284a.5</p>gshegs pa gnyis 'byung ba gnas ma yin no/ /cha bzhi dang / drug pa dang / cha brgyad pa dang / cha bcu drug pa dang / zur gsum pa dang / mo'i sgra dang / mo'i dbyangs dang / mo'i spa ba dang / mo'i tshul dang / kun du spyod pa ni mo'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ pho'i yang de dang 'dra'o/ /
<p>284a.6</p>byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba yang yod do/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnas bcu bdun dang / gzugs med pa bzhi la yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba yod par 'byung / dmyal ba'i
<p>284a.7</p>ris la yang bar mdor 'chi ba yod par 'byung ngo / /'chi ba na skye ba'i mtshan ma lam rgyud lnga gang gi mtshan ma mthong ba der skye ba 'byung / zan la bod pa la tshul shing brim pa 'byung / maud gal gyi bus shA ri'i bu'i snam sbyar myur bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
<p>284b</p>
<p>284b.1</p>kyi thad du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir sor mo lngas khab lngas drubs pa byung / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /nga rgyal bskyed pas brnyas pa thob
<p>284b.2</p>'gyur la/ /nga rgyal spangs pa bkur sti 'thob par 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nga rgyal spang bar bya/ sems can thams cad la yon gnas kyi sems nye bar gzhag par bya/ byang chub kyi sems mi
<p>284b.3</p>gtong bar bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar bya/ /chos btsal ba la chog mi shes par bya/ mang du thos pa la brtson par bya/ bstan bcos shin tu brtags pa dag kyang btsal bar bya/ so so'i grub pa'i mtha' rtogs pa la yang bslab par bya/ don
<p>284b.4</p>dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos btsal bar bya zhing don med pa'i bstan bcos 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang / byad stems kyi dang / gzhon nu rtse ba'i bstan bcos dang / rgyan po'i bstan bcos dang / nyo tshong gi dang / 'khrig pa'i bar dang / rig
<p>284b.5</p>byed kyi bstan bcos la sogs pa gang rnam par thar pa dang mi mthun pa thams cad ni spang bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la bstan par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / log par lta ba
<p>284b.6</p>ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin gyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni yin no/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / log par lta bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gzhag par mi nus kyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
<p>284b.7</p>rgyas kyi theg pa pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug par nus so/ /sngon 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dag gi tshad khri phrag bzhi par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
<p>285a</p>
<p>285a.1</p>thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rtsom pa ni 'di lta ste/ bstan bcos la mkhas pa yin no/ /chags pas ni 'gro ba lngar 'grub bo/ /zhe sdang gis ni gsum du'o/ /gti mug gis ni lngar ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni ngan song 'ba' zhig
<p>285a.2</p>gi sa ste/ las las nyon mongs pa rjes su dpag ste/ nyon mongs pa 'das pa las 'di mngon par 'dus byas nyon mongs pa las sems rjes su dpag ste/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spyod pa las chags pa'am/ sdang ba'am rmongs pa'i sems rjes su dpag
<p>285a.3</p>go/ /sems las gang zag 'byung bar rjes su dpag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi 'gro ba 'dod pas mdzad do/ /gang zag 'dis las 'di mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dpa' bar 'gro'o/ /sngon bud+d+ha 'jig rten
<p>285a.4</p>gsum gyi bla mas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bram ze zla ba'i smin ma zhes bya bar gyur pa la/ ma 'ongs pa ni bskal pa bye ba drug cu na bud+d+ha 'jig rten gsal mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ sku tshe ni lo bye ba brgyad cur 'gyur bar lung bstan/ sngon
<p>285a.5</p>bud+d+ha grags ma smin pa'i spyan snga na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ yi dam 'di ltar bcas te ji srid du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams mngon par shes pa myur ba/ bde ba'i
<p>285a.6</p>lam gyis mya ngan las ma 'das pa dang / ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yod pa dang / sems can thams cad srid pa tham par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang grong dang / yul gyi
<p>285a.7</p>tha snyad dang / 'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad bslab par bya'o/ /bud+d+ha shAkya thub pa sngon ston pa spyan bzangs zhes bya bar gyur pa na 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon gyis gnod pa khams gnyis kyang de dang 'dra bas sems can rnams la skyabs med de/ bdag gis
<p>285b</p>
<p>285b.1</p>ni 'du byed thams cad la gnas par mi bya ste/ gnas pa med na g.yo bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan du gyur nas/ sems can la snying rje ba'i sems thob ste/ chos de bstan pas sems can bye ba khrag khrig mi gnas
<p>285b.2</p>pa'i mya ngan las 'das so/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud lnga las rgyal bar nus so/ /lnga gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / phung po dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud do/ /sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad
<p>285b.3</p>skye ste/ sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad 'gag ste/ ji lta ji ltar sems kyi rtog pa de lta de ltar chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan ston par byed do/ /tshe'i tshad kyi mdo las/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor
<p>285b.4</p>'chi ba ni med do/ /sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa las/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam ni bzhi ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa dang / dam pa'i
<p>285b.5</p>chos sgrub pa'i phyir brtson pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mi dpogs pa yin te/ bsam gtan zlog pa dang / sems kyi rnam par 'byed pa dang / sems can la snying rje che ba dang / spobs pa dang skad sna tshogs
<p>285b.6</p>pa'o/ /phan yon bzhi mthong na/ thos pa tshol bar byed de/ rang dang gzhan gyi shes par sbyor ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mi zad pa'o/ /thos nas chos bye brag tu 'byed shes pa dang / thos
<p>285b.7</p>nas bya ba mi byed pa dang / thos nas gzhan la ston pa dang / thos nas byang chub la gtong bar byed pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni chos smra ba'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes
<p>286a</p>
<p>286a.1</p>pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / rang gi chos sgrub pa'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur te/ dran pa rtse gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du brjod pa dang / tshul khrims dag pa dang / 
<p>286a.2</p>lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa'o/ /chos bzhis spobs pa dag 'thob ste/ chos smra ba gzhan gyis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang / zhes dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas khengs pa med pa
<p>286a.3</p>dang / thos pa nyung ngu la brnyas par mi byed pa'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam 'grub ste/ tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dag pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems pa'o/ /'dul
<p>286a.4</p>ba gzhi las/ blta bas mi ngoms pa lnga ste/ rgya mtsho dang / ba glang cang shes dang / ri rab dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas so/ /klu ni gnas skabs lnga rang bzhin du gnas te/ skye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / za ba dang / gnyid log pa dang / 
<p>286a.5</p>nyal po byed pa'o/ /bud med rang bzhin gyis mkhas pa kha cig ni skyes pa gang bdag la chags pa dang / dus dang zla mtshan 'ong ba dang / bu chags pa dang / gag las mngal du zhugs pa dang / bu pho mo shes te/ pho ni g.yas par ro/ /mo ni g.yon par ro/ /rang
<p>286a.6</p>bzhin gyi ma ning ni/ thog ma nas bud med kyang ma yin pa'o/ /zla ba phyed pa ni bud med/ phyed ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o/ /chags pa'i ma ning ni/ gang la pha rol la chags nas dbang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /phrag dog pa'i ma ning ni/ pha rol log par sgrub pa mthong
<p>286a.7</p>nas dbang po 'gyur ba'o/ /nyams pa'i ma ning ni/ nad kyis dbang po nyams pa'am/ mtshon gyis bcad pa'o/ /sor mo'i phreng ba las/ nyan thos kyi theg pa las/ yid ches bstan pa gang yin pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o zhes bya ba'i don de yid rang
<p>286b</p>
<p>286b.1</p>bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/ chos thams cad kyi go de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ rgyal po gzhan gyis khrims byas pa thos nas bdag nyid kyang skye
<p>286b.2</p>dgu skyong ba de bzhin du/ kha che yul gyi 'khor dang / yul b+ha ru ka tsa pa rnams kyang ngo tsha dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsang ste ston par 'gyur gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon bskal pa dpag tu
<p>286b.3</p>med pa'i sngon rol du bud+d+ha ko san ta bzang po mnyan yod kyi drung du byung ba na dam pa'i chos nub kar dge slong sangs rgyas blo gros dgon pa na gnas pa la gcig gis gcig la gos bzang po zhig byin pa nub gcig nas gcig gis gos phrog ste gcer bur phyung nas
<p>286b.4</p>shing la btags so/ /de nas bram ze me tog thu ba zhig gis mthong nas/ kye ma dge sbyong ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ gcer bur byung la dka' thub byas na ngur ba lta zhes gcer bur byung nas rgyu ste/ de nas gcer bur byung ngo / /de nas
<p>286b.5</p>dge slong de bcings pa khrol nas lus sa ser zhig gis byugs te 'gro ba dang / chur zhugs te klad pa'i rma bkrus nas rtswa 'jam pos klad pa bkab pa dang / rang gi lus rma yod pa skra 'jam pos g.yogs pa dang / ba lang gi lci ba ba sogs te me lde ba dang / rma la phog snyam
<p>286b.6</p>byed pa/ bram ze zhig dang shing thun zhig dang / nyam thag pa gzhan dag cig gis mthong nas/ snga ma bzhin bsams te ya mtshan can kun du rgyu dang / dka' thub can rtswa gos gyon pa dang / phyugs bdag dang ba lang gi lci ba'i ri lu can dang / mya ngan du 'gro ba byung / 
<p>286b.7</p>de nas mgo byung ste/ ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang dge slong de'i spyod lam las 'phros te byung ngo / /'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa las/ rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ba dag de ltar chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi 'dod mi dad la
<p>287a</p>
<p>287a.1</p>slar zlog pa dang / gshe ba de ni dge sbyong ma yin pa zhes bya/ mu stegs can zhes bya/ dmigs can zhes bya/ dkrugs ma ba zhes bya/ ngan g.yo can zhes bya/ 'chal pa zhes bya'o/ /skye bo rmongs pa khros pas zil non pa/ /'jig rten mkhas pa'i/ 
<p>287a.2</p>bstan las de ring ste/ de ni log lta rnams kyi nang 'dzin yin/ /de lta bas na mkhas mis 'khrug mi bya/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa las/ 'jam dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad du 'phags pa yin no/ /rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/ 
<p>287a.3</p>'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang dang / gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis te/ 'jam dpal rgyu de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /sku ji lta bar
<p>287a.4</p>gsung dang / mtshan dang chos ston pa la sogs pa yang de 'dra ste/ sems can rnams kyis de ltar shes so/ /'phags pa chos kyi phung po las/ bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ 'chi ba'i tshe gdung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'gyod par 'gyur ba
<p>287a.5</p>dang / mnar med par 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang / tshul khrims can la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa dang / nyan thos kyis spangs pa dang / lhas spangs pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / mi lus 'thob par dka' ba'o/ /
<p>287a.6</p>'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' las/ chos kyi dbyings la 'di dag ni skye bo'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'phags pa'i chos so zhes gdags par mi nus so/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'di ni 'di na 'dug go/ /che ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes gdags par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
<p>287a.7</p>chos kyi dbyings ni bstan du med pa/ gdags su med pa/ gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgyas pa las/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod do/ /gang zhe na/ nad pa sman dang rim
<p>287b</p>
<p>287b.1</p>gro dang mi ldan pa'am/ sman ma yin pa byed pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / ha cang bag med pas mi ma yin pas mdangs phrogs pa dang / me dang / chu dang / seng ge stag wa sbrul la sogs pa dang g.yang du lhung ba dang / dug byad ro langs kyi sbyor ba dang / bkres skom
<p>287b.2</p>ste/ 'di dag ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /gzhan yang grangs med dpag tu med do/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mtha' yas pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon
<p>287b.3</p>phul pa yang tshad med mtha' yas so/ /phyi ma'i tshe dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa dang / bsti stang byed pa des phan yon lnga gzung bar 'gyur te/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang / rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang / ngo tsha shes
<p>287b.4</p>shing khrel yod pa dang / myur du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mthong nas dad pa skye ba'o/ /de chos bzhi dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa dang / de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas sangs
<p>287b.5</p>rgyas dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /d+harma 'di las mchod rten la rgyan phul pa yan chad so so'i yon tan zhib tu 'byung ngo / /'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu las/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe
<p>287b.6</p>dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs
<p>287b.7</p>rgyas 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang / gang gA'i bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ ji ltar rgya mtsho'i bye ma dang / gang gA'i bye ma las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa
<p>288a</p>
<p>288a.1</p>bzhin du nyung ngo / /'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan ba shar dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul pa la rab tu byung
<p>288a.2</p>ba zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten pa'i chos las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob na/ de tsam gyis rab tu byung ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin no/ /'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa
<p>288a.3</p>las/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa ste/ gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba la bzod pa byed pa dang / dbul ba la bdog pa thams cad gtong ba dang / yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khro ba med pa'i steng du bshes gnyen
<p>288a.4</p>du 'du shes pa dang / skye ba la mi rtog pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos zung du 'brel ba bzhi ste/ gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel pa dang / gtong ba dang bsngo ba zung du 'brel pa dang / byams pa dang snying
<p>288a.5</p>rje zung du 'brel pa dang / thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'o/ /'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /ye shes zab mo rdzogs pa'i don
<p>288a.6</p>dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas lam chags pa'i don dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i don dang / skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams rtogs par byed pa'i don dang / sems can gyi khams shes pa'i don dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'i don
<p>288a.7</p>dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba'i don dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /'phags pa sgo mtha' yas ba sgrub pa las/ rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/ /de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya/ /zab mo'i bzod
<p>288b</p>
<p>288b.1</p>la 'dun pa bskyed nas su/ bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/ /'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhi yin pa/ /shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/ /bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon tsam gyis chog bya ste/ /mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par
<p>288b.2</p>gyis/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag gis chos 'di thos nas gnod par gyur pa la gzigs/ bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig /
<p>288b.3</p>gal te 'di ma thos na bskal ba'i bar du bzang 'gror yang mi skye na/ sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa lta ci smos/ chos kyi rnam grangs de dag the tshom dang bcas par thos pas da gzod kho na dmyal ba nas thar nas dga' ldan du skyes so/ /'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus
<p>288b.4</p>pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas pha ma la gnod pa byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang rgan rabs la gnod pa byed par ji ltar mos
<p>288b.5</p>pa dang / ci nus par dus dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa las/ chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang chos rnams 'dogs so/ /mkhas pa rnams ni de la mngon par mi zhen te/ mngon par zhen pa med pas
<p>288b.6</p>mi rtsod do/ /rtsod pa med pa ni dge slong gi chos kyi mchog go/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar dbul bar gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di nga'i mar gyur te/ de bzhin
<p>288b.7</p>gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung du ma btang bas/ nga za gcig zan bcad par gyur te/ de nas 'dod pas btang ngo / /de'i rnam par smin pas 'di ltar gyur to/ /'phags pa rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jog pa las/ dam chos 'di
<p>289a</p>
<p>289a.1</p>la rgyal ba'i sras/ /rnam par mi rtog bsams gyur nas/ /rnam rtog bgrod dka' rnam 'das te/ /rim gyis mi rtog thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dang mthun par 'dug pa las/ sangs rgyas ye shes dpag yas te/ /chos kyi dbyings
<p>289a.2</p>las 'byung yin yang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /zhigs pa med cing skye med la/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur kyang / /bsreg pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'phags pa chos
<p>289a.3</p>dang don rnam par 'byed pa las/ bud med gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam klog na/ de bud med kyi lus brjes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang
<p>289a.4</p>de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba las/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na las bgyis shing ba sogs pa 'gags nas yun ring du lags pa 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas shing yid la mngon du 'gyur
<p>289a.5</p>lags/ 'du byed thams cad stod pa la ji ltar las rnams 'chab mi 'tshal bar gda'/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ 
<p>289a.6</p>dper na mi zhig nyal nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ yul gyi bud med bzang mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod pa rmis la/ de nyal ba las sad nas yul gyi bud med bzang mo de dran no/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo de yod dam/ gsol
<p>289a.7</p>pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'o na gang rmi lam gyi bud med bzang mo la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ci mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
<p>289b</p>
<p>289b.1</p>de ni ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo yang shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags na/ de dang yongs su spyod pa lta ga la mchis te/ 'di ltar mi de ni phongs shing du ba pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur lags so/ /
<p>289b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na/ yid bde bar 'gyur pa'i gzugs rnams la mngon par zhen te/ mngon par zhen par gyur nas rjes su
<p>289b.3</p>chags par 'gyur ro/ /rjes su chags nas kun du chags par 'gyur ro/ /kun du chags nas 'dod chags las byung ba dang / zhe sdang las byung ba dang / gti mug las byung ba'i las lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis mngon par 'du byed de/ las de mngon par 'dus byas par gyur nas 'gag
<p>289b.4</p>go/ /'gag pa na shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ lho phyogs su ma yin/ nub phyogs su ma yin/ byang phyogs su ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og tu ma yin/ phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin no/ /dus gzhan zhig na 'chi ba'i dus
<p>289b.5</p>dang / tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i mi'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo lta bur las de nyid la mngon du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de ltar rnam par shes
<p>289b.6</p>pa tha ma 'gag cing skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang po yang na ni lha'i nang du/ yang na ni mi'i nang du/ yang na ni lha ma yin gyi nang du/ yang na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su/ yang na ni dud 'gro rnams su/ yang na ni yi dgas rnams su 'byung bar
<p>289b.7</p>'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po de 'gags ma thag tu/ gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba/ mngon pa de dang skal pa 'dra ba'i sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu phyin pa yang med la/ 'chi 'pho
<p>290a</p>
<p>290a.1</p>dang skye bar mngon pa yang yod de/ rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa gang tha ma 'gags pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya/ gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba da ni skye ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /rnam
<p>290a.2</p>par shes pa dang po skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa tha ma ni tha mas stong / 'chi 'pho ni 'chi 'phos stong / las ni las kyis stong / rnam par shes pa dang po ni dang pos stong / 
<p>290a.3</p>skye ba ni skye bas stong la/ las rnams chud mi za bar mngon pa yang yod do/ /rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa 'gags ma thag tu bar ma chad par gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo / /'phags
<p>290a.4</p>pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas dang / 
<p>290a.5</p>phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brtsegs pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la/ khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas 'bru tsam
<p>290a.6</p>gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /'phags pa bram ze mo dpal gyis zhus pa las/ dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi yang dag pa'i
<p>290a.7</p>rnam pa ni ma yin no/ /ma rig pa ni phyin ci log rnam par 'byung gi phyin ci log pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mi 'byung ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
<p>290b</p>
<p>290b.1</p>pa 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad der 'dus pas so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka las/ bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi
<p>290b.2</p>pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/ gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par yang ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ bsnan pa med par ma yin/ 
<p>290b.3</p>kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yang ma yin pa nas yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang / /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / /mi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/ /
<p>290b.4</p>'dus byas thams cad de ltar blta/ na mo b+ha ga wa te pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta ye/ oM d+hI shI shru ti smr-i ti gti bi dza ye swA hA/ 'gag pa med pa skye med pa/ /rtag pa med cing chad med la/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/ /spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yin/ /rten
<p>290b.5</p>cing 'brel 'byung sus bstan pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa chos bzhi pa bstan pa las/ chos bzhin dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur te/ rnam par sun 'byin pa ni mi
<p>290b.6</p>dge ba spyod pa na de la 'gyod pa mang ba 'o/ /gnyen po spyod pa ni mi dge ba byas nas dge ba la brtson pa'o/ /sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni sdom pa blangs nas phyin chad mi byed pa'o/ /rten gyi stobs ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems mi
<p>290b.7</p>gtong ba'o/ /'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las/ chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che/ /la las mi yod pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten byas te
<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>snying po 'di bcug na shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /de nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skye'o/ /'phags pa chos bzhi po las/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi srog gi phyir yang nam 'tsho'i bar du mi gtong ba la/ byang chub kyi sems dang / 
<p>291a.2</p>dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / dgon par gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba bas/ gang gis
<p>291a.3</p>snying rje bas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan gyi rgyud la bzhag na/ bsod nams 'di la snga mas char yang mi phod do/ /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ mdo 'di bklags na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bklags par 'gyur/ /'phags pa chos bzhi
<p>291a.4</p>pa'i mdo las/ dge slong gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba bzhi la/ bud med dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / bdag gi gzugs bzang ba dang / dbang phyug pa yo byad 'byor pa'o/ /'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros las/ bsod nams 'dod pas de
<p>291a.5</p>bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya'o/ /shes rab 'dod pas mnyan pa la brtson par bya'o/ /longs spyod 'dod pas gtong ba spel bar bya'o/ /gzugs bzang bar 'dod pas/ bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o/ /gzungs
<p>291a.6</p>'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /bde ba 'dod pas sdig pa spang bar bya'o/ /sems can la bde bar bya bar 'dod pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /skad snyan par 'dod pas bden pa smra bar bya'o/ /yon tan 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
<p>291a.7</p>la bsten par bya'o/ /zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med par bya'o/ /lhag mthong mthong bar 'dod pas chos la stong par brtag par bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas tshad med pa bsgom par bya'o/ /lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas dge ba bcu bya'o/ /
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas/ thos pa la brtson par bya'o/ /yon tan thams cad 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa las/ ser sna spang ba'i phyir dad pas sbyin no/ /dus su sbyin no/ /de bzhin
<p>291b.2</p>gshegs pas gnang ba'i rung ba dngos po gsum yongs su dag par sbyin no/ /sems kyi 'khrug pa'i skyon thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bsti stong byas te sbyin no/ /snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang pa'i phyir rang gi lag nas sbyin no/ /d+harma 'di las sbyin pa re
<p>291b.3</p>re'i rnam par smin pa nges pa rgyas pa 'byung / 'phags pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo las/ nad med mi rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/ /'byor ba mi rtag srog kyang rtag ma yin/ /skye bo mi rtag nyid kyis nyen gyur na/ /'dod pas yon tan dga' ba ji ltar skye/ /'phags pa kun du rgyu sen rings kyis
<p>291b.4</p>zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das la kun du rgyu sen rings kyis gsol pa/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen te gnas pa la nye bar gnas par bya'o/ /srog chags thams cad gsod dang
<p>291b.5</p>gzhan nor rku dang mi tshangs spyod pa dang / /gang gi dbye ba brdzun dang myos skyed btung dang dus min za ba dang / /phreng ba kha dog glu gar rtse 'jo mal stan mthon po rnams/ /deng nas bdag gis spangs te yon tan brgyad kyis dgra bcom tshul du bgyi/ /de bzhin du lan
<p>291b.6</p>gnyis lan gsum du'o/ /bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa 'di sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / byang chub kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / don gyi dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / mya ngan
<p>291b.7</p>las 'das pa'i bde ba bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig /bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod de ltar byed pa legs so legs so/ /'phags pa seng ges zhus pa las/ skye ba kun du byang chub sems/ /rmi lam na yang sems de ni/ /'dor mi
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>'gyur na ma nyal tshe/ /smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang / /gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/ /byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/ /des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/ /'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing / /
