<p>292a.2</p>skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /des ni stobs ni cher 'gyur te/ /rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa las/ 'jam dpal ci la dmigs nas de
<p>292a.3</p>bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi/ lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhi ste gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dang / sems can thams cad thar bar bya ba dang / dkon mchog gi gdung rgyud mi gcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la dmigs nas so/ /
<p>292a.4</p>'phags pa rdo rje snying po'i gzungs las/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can dmyal ba rang gi rtog pa las byung ngam/ 'on te ngo bo nyid las byung / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi rtog
<p>292a.5</p>pas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rig ste/ de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du ngan song gsum du gnod pa tshor zhing sdug bsngal myong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dmyal ba ji ltar mi mthong ba de bzhin
<p>292a.6</p>du sems can dmyal ba pa rnams mi mthong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na bdag sems can dmyal bar ltung ba snyam du rig nas de de na lcags kyi bum pa rab tu khros pa shin tu 'bar bar bdag
<p>292a.7</p>nyid bcug par yang 'du shes par 'gyur ro/ /des de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag cing mi bzad la brnag par dka' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur/ des de na yid kyi gdung ba myong bar 'gyur/ des de na skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ kun du dngang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa
<p>292b</p>
<p>292b.1</p>nas de 'di ltar bdag ni gnyid kyis log par gyur te yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di bdag gis kun du brtags so snyam du dran pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / slar yang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur lags so zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa las/ 
<p>292b.2</p>chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bzod pa 'thob cing bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi ni sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi/ gzugs su ma yin pa dang / chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang / 
<p>292b.3</p>dge 'dun la 'dus byas su mthong gi/ tshogs su ma yin pa dang / shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu pa las/ gang gis mtshan bzung na myur du 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas bcu la/ shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
<p>292b.4</p>yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa na sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa dang / lho phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bkod pa na sangs rgyas yon tan bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa dang / nub phyogs
<p>292b.5</p>na 'jig rten sbyor bas mun pa thams cad bral ba na sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal dang / byang phyogs na 'jig rten mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba na spobs pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par spyod pa dang / shar lho na 'jig rten yun ring por bde
<p>292b.6</p>ba bkod pa na sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs bstod pa dang / lho nub na 'jig rten yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba dang / nub byang na 'jig rten ngan song spangs pa na sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i
<p>292b.7</p>gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba dang / byang shar na 'jig rten mya ngan gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba na sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par kun du 'byung ba dang / steng na 'jig rten gzi brjid dpag tu med pa bkod pa na/ sangs rgyas dge ba
<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>gser gyi nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba dang / 'og na 'jig rten rdul thams cad 'dus pa na sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid 'byung ba'o/ /dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
<p>293a.2</p>las/ dper na chu bo'i rgyun bar chad med par rtag tu 'bab pa bzhin du skyes bu de dag gnyid log gam/ myos sam rab tu myos pa'i 'jug pa na yang de bzhin no/ /de ltar na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs bstan du med pa thogs pa med par 'dod do/ /
<p>293a.3</p>gzugs de ji lta bu yin zhe na/ las kyi ngo bor yod pa nyid yin no/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab yang dag pa'i lam ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi sdug pa'o/ /zhe sdang la byams pa'o/ /gti mug la rten cing 'brel bar
<p>293a.4</p>'byung ba'o/ /'di ltar sa chen po'i chos bcu ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ste/ dmigs pa gcig la mtshan nyid gzhan dang
<p>293a.5</p>gzhan du 'dod pa de dang 'dra'o/ /mchod rten nam dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi skyong nul nyi ma'am/ char pas zad pa slar 'chos na lha phyi bang gsum pa lus dkar gyi nang du skye/ de nas shi 'phos na yang de dang rgyu mthun dkar sham pad+ma'i rtsa lag lta bu'i mdog stong
<p>293a.6</p>phyogs dang rgya yul la sogs par skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi rnams ni ri rab kyi ngos la 'khor ro/ /gzhal med khang dang ldan pa de dag la mu stegs can rnams gza' dang skar ma dang / rgyu skar yin par sems te/ de rnams kyi rags pa bgrangs na bye ba phrag drug yod do/ /
<p>293a.7</p>ri rab kyi ngos gang la nyi ma 'khor ba'i ngos de dang de'i mi'i gnas gang du ri rab kyi grib ma 'bab pa de ltar mtshan mor 'gyur ro/ /byang phyogs na rlung 'khor lo'i gzugs zhes bya ba yod do/ /byang phyogs kyi skar ma de dag 'char du yang mi ster/ nub tu yang mi ster na mu stegs can de
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>dag gis de mthong nas drang srong bdun gyis 'jig rten 'dzin to/ /brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs ma la brgya byin snga rabs shi ste na rag la sogs par song ba'i ming gi dkar chag bris ba ni legs 'byor pa dang / kun dga' dang mi 'chi zhes bya ba la sogs sum cu ste/ de mthong
<p>293b.2</p>nas brgya byin skyo ba skye'o/ /dkon mchog sprin las/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pur dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs
<p>293b.3</p>te/ shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po dang / lus bags kyis klod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du gzhag ste/ phyi rol du ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so/ /sems can gang dag khro ba gnod sems mang ba mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams
<p>293b.4</p>dang / gang dag bdag la rgol ba dang / dgra bo gcugs med par shar gnyer ba rnams byung ngam 'byung ngam 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rung ste/ bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang / gnod sems rab tu zhi bar bya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la bkod par
<p>293b.5</p>bya'o snyam mo/ /de yang gang tsam gyis ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par
<p>293b.6</p>'grub pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par sgrub par mi nus kyis/ nam byang chub
<p>293b.7</p>sems dpas chos mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'o/ /thog ma'i sems nas brtsams te ni ma yin no/ /theg pa chen po chos mngon pa'i mdo las 'byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
<p>294a</p>
<p>294a.1</p>rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi don med par khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa mi mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid shes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / mi dang lha rnams kyi dngos po gcig la rnam par rig pa tha dad par mthong
<p>294a.2</p>ba lta bu dang / dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par rig pa dmigs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dmigs pa lta bu dang / phrad pa med par phyin ci log med par 'gyur ba shes pas ni bden pa'i don la dmigs pa'i
<p>294a.3</p>rnam par shes pa 'bad pa med par bden par shes pa'i phyir phyin ci log med par 'gyur ba dang / shes pa rnam pa gsum pa rjes su mthun pa'i shes pas ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang / bsam gtan pa sems la dbang thob pa rnams mos pa'i dbang gis de
<p>294a.4</p>ltar don de dag snang ba dang / zhi gnas thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa chos la lhag mthong la brtson pa rnams la yid la byed pa tsam du don snang ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob ste/ de la gnas pa rnams la don thams cad mi snang ngo / /dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las/ 
<p>294a.5</p>'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa nges pa'i don du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de/ sems las tha dad pa zhes bgyi'am tha dad pa ma lags
<p>294a.6</p>zhes bgyi byams pa tha dad pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhe na/ gzugs brnyan de rnam par rig pa tsam du zad pa'i phyir te/ byams pa rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyis phye ba ma yin no zhes ngas bshad do/ /bcom
<p>294a.7</p>ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan de sems las tha dad pa ma lags na sems de nyid kyis sems de nyid la ji ltar rtog par bgyid/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos gang la yang rtog par mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de ltar skyes pa'i sems
<p>294b</p>
<p>294b.1</p>de ni de ltar snang ngo / /byams pa 'di lta ste/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gzugs kyis rkyen byas te gzugs nyid mthong yang gzugs brnyan mthong ngo snyam du sems te/ de la ni gzugs de dang gzugs brnyan snang ba de don tha dad par snang ngo / /de bzhin du de
<p>294b.2</p>ltar skyes pa'i sems de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba dang don tha dad par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi gzugs brnyan rang bzhin du gnas pa gzugs la sogs pa gang lags pa de yang / sems dang tha dad pa ma lags pa
<p>294b.3</p>zhes bgyi'am/ byams pa tha dad pa ni ma yin te/ byis pa phyin ci log gi blo can rnams kyis gzugs brnyan de dag la rnam par rig pa tsam de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pas phyin ci log tu sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ bka'
<p>294b.4</p>stsal pa/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du glo bur du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zad dam/ gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/ /yi ge med pa'i za
<p>294b.5</p>ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po las/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste gang zhe na/ gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan la mi bya'o/ /chos gcig pu de bsrungs na byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad
<p>294b.6</p>bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa des srog mi gcod do/ /gang bdag gis nor phangs pa de ma byin par mi len te/ gang bdag gi chung ma phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'gro ba'o/ /
<p>294b.7</p>rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa gang la la zhig 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o snyam du sems pa des chos gcig pu 'di bsrung bar bya'o zhes bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
<p>295a</p>
<p>295a.1</p>gnyer ba de thams cad ni rang gi bde ba'i rgyur don du gnyer gyi/ su yang bdag sdug bsngal bar mi 'dod/ 'gro ba rnams ni bde ba 'dod/ /ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste/ gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag lam byed cig ces nga smra'o/ /rigs
<p>295a.2</p>kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ /gang mdo 'di nyan pa de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang / thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang de
<p>295a.3</p>bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig pu de gang zhes zer ba ni chos gcig pu de gang yang med do/ /gang la chos gang yang rtog pa med pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu yang de
<p>295a.4</p>bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
<p>295a.5</p>pa nyid de/ de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/ de ni rnam
<p>295a.6</p>par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa'o/ /de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhan/ gang zag slob
<p>295a.7</p>pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o/ /kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi gang yin pa'o/ /
<p>295b</p>
<p>295b.1</p>kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa 'di lta ste/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gang yin pa'o/ /
<p>295b.2</p>de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa'o/ /de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/ thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams
<p>295b.3</p>gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /thams cad chud nas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mos par byed de/ rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams skye mched bcu gnyis po dag la gang
<p>295b.4</p>zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni thams cad shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam shes kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas dag par mi sems
<p>295b.5</p>kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa'o/ /de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/ chur ji srid pa zheng yang de srid la zheng du ji srid par chur yang de srid yin no/ /ro bro ba'i mchog ni/ de'i mgur drang por mid pa drang
<p>295b.6</p>zhing ma yo la thogs pa med par mid du rung bar 'gyur pa yin no/ /bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung snyam mam/ gsol pa/ 
<p>295b.7</p>btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu lags shing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags la/ rnam par shes pa gang
<p>296a</p>
<p>296a.1</p>lags pa de ni dbang po drug po lags la/ dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/ /
<p>296a.2</p>kun du sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang / gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/ de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/ /des bsgom pa'i lam bsgoms pa
<p>296a.3</p>de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang / gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/ /des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga po 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / 
<p>296a.4</p>gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgom par bya'o/ /gang dag yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs
<p>296a.5</p>pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa mgo mnyam du zad pa'i gang zag ces bya bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
<p>296a.6</p>dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod do/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa shes rab kyi pha
<p>296a.7</p>rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo/ /gsog go/ /snying po med pa'o/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ya ma brla'o snyam du sems na/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du
<p>296b</p>
<p>296b.1</p>byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ro/ /bskal
<p>296b.2</p>pa bzang po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byang phyogs 'di nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang na lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa de bzhin
<p>296b.3</p>du/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/ /kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub yin no/ /sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang spu
<p>296b.4</p>rnams ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthon mthing la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil pa mdzes par skyes pa yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa ma mdzad du zin na zla ba dang / nyi ma 'di gnyis kyang
<p>296b.5</p>'jig rten na yod par mi 'gyur/ zla ba gcig dang / zla phyed dang / dus dang lo khyud kor rnams kyang 'jig rten na snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyin ci log bzhi las skyes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa las
<p>296b.6</p>yongs su zin pa yin na/ 'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed/ byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/ 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par
<p>296b.7</p>rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin gyi/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi sems yongs su dag na byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin gnas yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems
<p>297a</p>
<p>297a.1</p>dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni bdag gis sems can dbul po 'di dag sbyin pas bsdus nas/ gzhan gyi rdzas la rku bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs par sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma yin la/ gzugs las
<p>297a.2</p>gud na yang chos kyi dbyings med do/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par mi bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir
<p>297a.3</p>dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan ma ni btags pa tsam kun du rtog pa las 'byung ba lags na/ 
<p>297a.4</p>byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'on te srid pa tha ma pa lags/ bcom
<p>297a.5</p>ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang nges pa yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa dang / srid pa tha ma pa yang nges pa yin no/ /yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sar ni sems can dmyal ba rnams
<p>297a.6</p>su mi skye'o/ /'phags pa chos thams cad shin tu rgyas par bsdu ba las/ 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba las kyi sgrib pa ni phra ba'o/ /'jam dpal gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la la la ni bzang bar 'du shes/ la la ni ngan par 'du shes pa de ni dam pa'i
<p>297a.7</p>chos spong ba'o/ /gang chos spangs pa des de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba yin no/ /gnas 'jog las/ bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas par 'dod pas/ nang par langs nas dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan gang
<p>297b</p>
<p>297b.1</p>yang rung pa zhig gi drung du song ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di dus 'di nas bzung ste/ gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang / sang
<p>297b.2</p>nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/ dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/ sems can dang srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur
<p>297b.3</p>yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog nas dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ sems can srog
<p>297b.4</p>chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang / sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du srog
<p>297b.5</p>gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/ dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/ sems can dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog
<p>297b.6</p>gcod pa yang spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob po/ /rjes su sgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /ji ltar srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang / 
<p>297b.7</p>mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang / glu gar dang rol mo'i sgra dang / phreng ba dang / spos nyug pa dang / rgyan dang / kha dog 'chang ba dang / khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan
<p>298a</p>
<p>298a.1</p>chen po dang / dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog pa
<p>298a.2</p>de bzhin du/ bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa
<p>298a.3</p>de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su sgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o/ /'di lta ste/ yul chen po bcu drug la/ ang ga dang / ma ga d+hA dang / ka shi dang / bri dzi dang / mal la dang / pun tra dang / srag pa dang / ka ma dang / 
<p>298a.4</p>a ban ti dang / ku ru dang / pad tsa la dang / bad sa dang / dpa' sde dang / ya ba na dang / kam po rnams so/ /shes rab 'bum pa las/ ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma rig pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir/ 
<p>298a.5</p>chos 'di zab po/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang skyes bu la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ /de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ /rab 'byor gyis
<p>298a.6</p>smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gang phyin ci log las byung ba'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par bsgrubs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing
<p>298a.7</p>sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang lha dang mi'i 'gro ba mngon par grub po/ /'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag thams cad kyang
<p>298b</p>
<p>298b.1</p>rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyod la gtad de/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas gang chos ji snyed bshad pa
<p>298b.2</p>las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs pa ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gsan te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du mi gzung ngo / /dga' bo khyod kyis gal te
<p>298b.3</p>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud gsan tam/ bor bar gyur na ni des ni dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du gzung ngo / /bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sems can dang / srog
<p>298b.4</p>dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po la sogs pa stong pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'dod pa'i 'dod
<p>298b.5</p>chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'og ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /gang ci yang rung ste/ kun
<p>298b.6</p>'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub po/ /bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur
<p>298b.7</p>pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyi/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
<p>299a</p>
<p>299a.1</p>pa nyid la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa ni chags par mi byed do zhes 'doms par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu
<p>299a.2</p>yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i mig des chos thams
<p>299a.3</p>cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ des chos de dag la gnas shing lam mngon par sgrub po/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de sems can yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de
<p>299a.4</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems sam/ 
<p>299a.5</p>gsol pa/ de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de
<p>299a.6</p>dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmi lam nas sprul pa'i bar dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
<p>299a.7</p>bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs sum mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta
<p>299b</p>
<p>299b.1</p>bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang pho drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ni sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang
<p>299b.2</p>chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub
<p>299b.3</p>sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag pa la gsar du zhugs pas 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yin la/ thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ mi dge ba'i
<p>299b.4</p>bshes gnyen gyi lag tu 'ongs na de ltar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang la skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ bka'
<p>299b.5</p>stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag ces bya
<p>299b.6</p>bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba la sogs te mi
<p>299b.7</p>dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
<p>300a</p>
<p>300a.1</p>kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa de 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar te/ de dag gis 'dus byas kyi chos shes pas
<p>300a.2</p>chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i gzhi gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti
<p>300a.3</p>mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba/ de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings chos skyon med pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i zang zing med par chos
<p>300a.4</p>sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ chos ston pa'i tshe chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni zang zing med par chos sbyin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
<p>300a.5</p>bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyis zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
<p>300a.6</p>su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spangs pa gang zhe na/ dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du lhan cig mi gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su skom
<p>300a.7</p>pa'i sems mi skyed/ de'i rgyus gos thob par mi byed pa 'di ni dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spong ba'o/ /shes par bya ba lnga gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang 'dus ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rnam
<p>300b</p>
<p>300b.1</p>par bzlog pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su grub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
<p>300b.2</p>khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su mthong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang
<p>300b.3</p>zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems su sbyong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par
<p>300b.4</p>dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu ba la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stobs bcu nas sangs
<p>300b.5</p>rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag
<p>300b.6</p>ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sa bcu ba la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum du rnam par bkod pa ni yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum
<p>300b.7</p>rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do/ /ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
<p>301a</p>
<p>301a.1</p>gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi
<p>301a.2</p>phal cher nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka bla na med pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis bsgrub
<p>301a.3</p>dka'o/ /lho phyogs la sogs pa bcur yang de dang 'dra bar gzigs so/ /rab 'byor skyes bu glen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon gdags par sems shing / phyir spong bar sems pa de dag kyang chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>301a.4</p>rab 'byor dper na khyi la la zhig jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi
<p>301a.5</p>chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
<p>301a.6</p>bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bya ba'i sems pa 'byung ste/ de yang bdud kyi las so/ /
<p>301a.7</p>de bzhin du glang po che rnyed la rjes btsal bar sems pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po lta bar 'dod pa la ba glang gi rjes btsal bar sems la/ de mthong nas 'di dang rgya mtsho mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na mkhas pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ma lags so/ /
<p>301b</p>
<p>301b.1</p>nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yang bdud kyi las su 'byung / de bzhin du rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa brtsig par 'dod la tshad nyi zla'i gzhal med khang las len pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ khams kyi rgyal
<p>301b.2</p>phran mthong nas snyom pa dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa spangs nas drug cu pa tshol ba dang / nor bu rin thang med pa rnyed nas mching bu dang bsgrun par sems pa de dag mi mkhas pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing theg pa dman pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa yang
<p>301b.3</p>bdud kyi las su 'byung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis yongs su ma bzung na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de dag nye zhor 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
<p>301b.4</p>kyi sa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /nyan thos gang
<p>301b.5</p>pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod cing ston pa dang 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /
<p>301b.6</p>gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 
<p>301b.7</p>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do/ /gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 
<p>302a</p>
<p>302a.1</p>rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams
<p>302a.2</p>cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad
<p>302a.3</p>yod do/ /bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas bslab par bya ba dang / gang la ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bslabs pas rang rang gis
<p>302a.4</p>la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ 
<p>302a.5</p>nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang / ngag gi rnam pa yod do/ /de dag gi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang thun mong du yang gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma
<p>302a.6</p>yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de rnam pa thams cad du mi mnga' zhing mi dmigs so/ /gsol ba/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
<p>302a.7</p>pa dam pa thob pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa las kyi rnam par smin pas bzung ba yin na/ khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa la
<p>302b</p>
<p>302b.1</p>dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/ sbyin pa yongs
<p>302b.2</p>su gtong ba de yang longs spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i rnam pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /smon pa med
<p>302b.3</p>pa ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / 
<p>302b.4</p>don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar shes pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin
<p>302b.5</p>ba gang la yang spyod dam/ gsol pa/ dgra bcom pa la yod yang nyal ba ma mchis na/ de ni rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin pa la spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ la la ni nyan thos
<p>302b.6</p>kyis sprul pa'o/ /la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/ /skyes bu glen pa de dag
<p>302b.7</p>rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bzhi gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
<p>303a</p>
<p>303a.1</p>te/ rab 'byor rgyu dang po des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos zab mo rnams la yid ches pa dang / dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/ rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
<p>303a.2</p>la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin te/ brtson 'grus med cing phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas/ rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir spong bar 'gyur
<p>303a.3</p>ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can yin te/ bdag bstod cing gzhan smod par gyur pas rgyu bzhi pa des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur zhes 'byung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa las bka' stsal
<p>303a.4</p>pa/ 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos dben par gnas bca' bar bya ste/ 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ der mi
<p>303a.5</p>dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i mtshan nas kyang smos te/ mtshan de yang thos te dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la bar bzhugs pa'i phyogs de mngon du byas nas 'dug par
<p>303a.6</p>bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de ni gcig go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag
<p>303a.7</p>tu med pa dang / spobs pa dpag tu med pa de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ mi skye ba gcig las chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag dpag tu med pa gang de la 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
<p>303b</p>
<p>303b.1</p>phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa ma byung ba nas dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos nas yid dga' zhing rangs par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga'i 'khor 'di nyid na 'dug pa yin par 'od srungs khyod kyis rtogs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
<p>303b.2</p>'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das gang chos ci la yang mi sems shing rnam par mi sems pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par blta'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi rtsal
<p>303b.3</p>gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa las bka' stsal pa/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad ni phyin ci log las byung bas smig rgyu dang 'dra'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'du ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'o/ /'bral ba zhes bya ba
<p>303b.4</p>ni chad pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste/ phyin ci log de la yang 'du ba dang / 'bral ba gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa phyin ci log gi dngos
<p>303b.5</p>po dmigs su med de/ de'i 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ phyin ci log ni med pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par brdzun pa slu ba gsog gi chos can te/ de la chos gang yang mi dmigs pas de ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/ /
<p>303b.6</p>phyin ci log ces bya ba 'di ni sems can rnams la slu ba'o/ /'di ni sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa la yongs su rtog pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa
<p>303b.7</p>ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ ci'i
<p>304a</p>
<p>304a.1</p>slad du ma mchis pa ma lags pa la mchis zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ gzugs stong pa bco brgyad kyi phyir yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du bsgre'o/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon
<p>304a.2</p>par gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/ /'di ltar lha'i bu rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni ldum bu las skyes pa ma yin/ chu las skyes pa
<p>304a.3</p>ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no/ /'di ltar me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam mo/ /kau shi kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de gang lags she na/ 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad
<p>304a.4</p>kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nas 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes kyi bar lags so/ /
<p>304a.5</p>de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye bam mchis pa dang / 'gag pa dang / gnas pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de
<p>304a.6</p>ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 
<p>304a.7</p>bzod pa sgrub pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dngos su shes rab
<p>304b</p>
<p>304b.1</p>kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la sogs pa bsnyen pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ stug po bkod pa las/ lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ /stug na gnas la stug na med/ /zhing de dri med bsod nams te/ /stug po snying po shin tu mdzes/ /de bzhin thar pa thar shes
<p>304b.2</p>la/ /zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste/ /stug po de ni yul du brtag /mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang / /stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin/ /yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus/ /sangs rgyas de ni rnam par mdzes/ /stug po thar
<p>304b.3</p>mchog ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang / /stug ste rnal 'byor can gyi gnas/ /mun pa'i rgya las rab 'das nas/ /stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes/ /phyogs 'di bka' las grub pa ste/ /rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /rdul phran rnam par gzhig
<p>304b.4</p>pa dang / /rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te/ /rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas/ /rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod/ /dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams/ /phra sogs che ba'i yon tan dang / /'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang / /bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang / /
<p>304b.5</p>ji ltar 'dod par rung ba rnams/ /thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na/ /rnam par gnas shing rab tu rtse/ /de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rtag tu bag chags ldan gyur pa/ /rnam par shes pa rnam bdun po/ /'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste/ /lha dang lha min
<p>304b.6</p>'bar ba dang / /lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes pa'ang / /de nyid rgyur ni gyur ba ste/ /tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis/ /gang tshe lus 'di bor gyur pa/ /de tshe lus 'di bor ba ste/ /shes bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/ /de ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/ /
<p>304b.7</p>yid ni dro bar rab tu brtags/ /yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/ /lhag ma dbang po lngar yang gnas/ /yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/ /chos rnams ston par byed pa ni/ /mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis/ /bdag kyang chud gzon gzhan chud gzon/ /'jig rten rdul phran
<p>305a</p>
<p>305a.1</p>bsags pa min/ /phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o/ /de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du/ /ci yang rtsom par mi byed do/ /lha yul gnas nas gnas pa la/ /sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtogs/ /phung po gang zag bdag med par/ /rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur
<p>305a.2</p>cing / /chos kyi dngos po yong ma shig /nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung / ston pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar/ /nges don mdo sde dag ni bye brag
<p>305a.3</p>shes/ /gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bstan/ /chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes/ /'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang / /de ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jig mi byed/ /de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu 'byung / /lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgom bzhin/ /
<p>305a.4</p>mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed/ /byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spong / /zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes/ /byis pa chos la sten par yongs mi byed/ /byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig nas/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/ /ji srid du ni byis pa
<p>305a.5</p>legs bsnyen kyang / /de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /byis pa dang ni byis pa mthun 'byor ba/ /ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/ /mkhas pa dang ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang / /mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying khu bzhin/ /byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/ /de
<p>305a.6</p>la gnod pa byung ba byis pa dga'/ /de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnams spangs te/ /ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas/ /mkhas pa 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/ /shes rab dman bsten bdag gi mtho ris nyams/ /byang chub 'thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste/ /
<p>305a.7</p>byis pa rnams dang nam yang yangs mi bsten/ /bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan phan sems can gnyen brtse khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
<p>305b</p>
<p>305b.1</p>lo/ /mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtsod pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi sku mchog mnga' pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba/ /
<p>305b.2</p>shes rab shin tu yangs pa nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/ /don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'di na snod min sems can 'ga' yang med/ /bde gshegs yon tan
<p>305b.3</p>de dag dpag med de/ /mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin/ /yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par rig nas/ mchod yon chen
<p>305b.4</p>po rim gyis gsol te/ zhal zas gsol zhing bdar to/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag /bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te/ /sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ /bka' stsal pa/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis/ /
<p>305b.5</p>sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong / /sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing / /stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang / /de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur
<p>305b.6</p>te/ /'jig rten mgon po de 'dra bas/ /sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku/ /sku ni chos las byung ba ste/ /gzugs kyi sku ni nam du yang / /sangs rgyas gdags par nus ma yin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni
<p>305b.7</p>sku mthong nas/ /'dren pa mthong zhes smra mod kyi/ /nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/ /sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/ /gang gis 'khrul pa ci mthong yang / /de dag gi ni nyes mi brjod/ /ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/ /'bras bu de 'dra 'thob par 'gyur/ /dgon
<p>306a</p>
<p>306a.1</p>pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i phan yon ni bcu ste/ bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang / 'du ba ring ba bas kyang ring du spong ba dang / de la rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par gnas pa dang / zag pa 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhir
<p>306a.2</p>mi byed pa dang / shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang / shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang / sems thar pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun du 'gyur ba dang / myur du rnam par grol ba mngon du byed pa'o/ /lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba spangs te rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de
<p>306a.3</p>ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rab tu byung nas kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing / bden par gnas pa dang / bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ /sngon sangs rgyas gzi brjid tshogs rgyal gyis chos bshad nas/ rgyal po brtan
<p>306a.4</p>byin rab tu byung ngo / /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rim gyis rab tu byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'bras ma rmos ma btab par 'khrung ba dang / chos gos kyang rang byung / g.yog kyang lha rnams kyis byas so/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad
<p>306a.5</p>pa/ /tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste/ /thams cad brjod par nus ma yin/ /tshig gcig rnam par bsgoms na ni/ /de dag thams cad bsgom par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed thams cad kyis/ /chos rnams mang po rab bshad pa/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/ /
<p>306a.6</p>chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /dpag tu med pa byang chub 'dul/ /chos rnams mig yor lta bu yang / /gang gis ngo bo nyid shes pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi lus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku la mi lta'o/ /chos
<p>306a.7</p>'di lus gzugs med pa ste/ /'di la lus gzugs gang yang med/ /chos 'ga' lus gzugs med pa ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas sku lus so/ /gang dag chos kyi skur lta ba/ /de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>mthong / /'khor ba dag ni 'phel byed cing / /so so'i skye bo de dag 'khor/ /so so tha dad 'gro bas na/ /so so'i skye bor brjod pa yin/ /'du shes 'di ni spang snyam du/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /'du shes spros la spyod pa ste/ /'du shes las ni de mi thar/ /su yis 'du shes
<p>306b.2</p>'di dag 'byung / /su yis 'du shes 'di bskyed byas/ /sus ni 'du shes reg par byas/ /sus ni 'du shes 'gag par 'gyur/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos ma brnyes/ /'dir ni don de bsam par gyis/ /de bas 'du shes med par 'gyur/ /
<p>306b.3</p>bsam pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/ /mthar gyis rnam par bsam bya ste/ /bsam pa thams cad rnam spangs na/ /de nas bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di ni dkar chos rnam smin te/ /'du byed med pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyis rnam bsam pa/ /skad cig gcig la rab tu
<p>306b.4</p>shes/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang / /rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang la/ /rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul/ /rdzing bu'i 'gram na gnas pa rnams/ /de dag de las chu 'thungs nas/ /thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni/ /'jig
<p>306b.5</p>rten gyi yang mchod rten 'byung / /de bzhin du pad+ma la sogs pa sprul nas/ de'i dri tshor ba dang de las sgra grag pa mnyan pas kyang dug gsum spong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bde byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin la mchod par lag pa g.yas pa
<p>306b.6</p>ras bcos bus dkris te/ mar me btang nas ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo yang skad che zhing 'jam pas bsgrags pa dang / sa yang g.yos/ lha rnams kyang dad pa skyes nas mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lha phal mo ches byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don mang du byas par
<p>306b.7</p>'byung / chos dang zang zing sbyin pa ni bsngo ba bzhin byas te/ thabs mkhas pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs de thob pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob pa ston par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / longs spyod gang gis sems can
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod de dag dang phrad pa dang / bdag gi lus gang gis sems can thams cad la chos dang zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lus 'dzin par bsngo ba'o/ /gcig la gcig kyang gnod sems byas
<p>307a.2</p>nas ni/ /de la tshul khrims thos pas skyob mi nus/ /bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus/ /sbyin pas mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pas min/ /skyes bu chu mchog gis ni dam pa'i chos/ /'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom/ /de yis rgyal ba
<p>307a.3</p>bkur sti byas ma yin/ /'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/ /rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong me tog zla mdzes bsad/ /nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob cig /de yi spyod la'ang dga' bar ma byed cig /sangs rgyas yon tan dag las sems ma
<p>307a.4</p>btang / /myur du sangs rgyas rgyal po'i dbang por 'gyur/ /mi gtsang bas ni rtag tu 'dod chags tshar gcad do/ /byams pa yis kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom/ /shes rab kyis ni gti mug nyon mongs dra ba bsal/ /ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig rten
<p>307a.5</p>kun na rab tu mdzes/ /rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang 'grub pa dang smon pa dang 'byor pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba'o/ /de la thos pa yongs su tshol ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sde snod dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod dang / byang chub sems
<p>307a.6</p>dpa'i sde snod kun 'dzin cing sgom pa'o/ /sbyangs pa mthong ba gang zhe na/ yi dam la brten pa'o/ /khrel yod pa gang zhe na/ mur cor mi smra ba'o/ /skyes bu dam pa dang bsten pa gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la
<p>307a.7</p>brten pa'o/ /skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/ dmigs pa can dang / le lo can rnams spong ba'o/ /rnyed pa med kyang sems mi 'gong ba gang zhe na/ bdag gis byas pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /khyim pa dang mi bsten pa gang zhe na/ zang zing ci yang
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>rnam par spong ba'o/ /rab tu byung ba la brten pa gang zhe na/ mi rigs pa spong ba dang / rigs pa tshol ba'o/ /de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste/ /tshul yang rgya chen
<p>307b.2</p>bstan pa yin/ /chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ /yon tan rgya cher thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ /rin chen 'od zer rgya che gang / /de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya/ /sems can spyod pa rgya che ste/ 
<p>307b.3</p>de dag bstan pa'am rgya che'o/ /lung gi don yang rgya che bas/ /de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin/ 'thab bral gyi rab 'thab bral/ dga' ldan gyi yongs su dga' ldan/ 'phrul dga'i rab 'phrul dga'/ 
<p>307b.4</p>gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi dbang byed/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal po ded dpon/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don ni mdun gyi rab tshangs pa/ tshangs ris kyi mi mjed kyi bdag po/ 'od gsal gyi 'od gsal/ dge rgyas kyi dge rgyas/ 'bras bu che ba'i 'bras bu che/ gnas gtsang ma'i
<p>307b.5</p>dbang phyug chen po/ /'og min gyi dri med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan 'dod kyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin na/ chos 'dod pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam la dga'i/ theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin no/ /chos kyi kun dga'
<p>307b.6</p>la dga' bas gnas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dbang lnga mthong ba'i phyir thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes te/ lnga ni thos pa las shes rab 'byung ba dang / 'gyod pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rtogs par
<p>307b.7</p>'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / mi 'jigs pas sems can gyi the tshom gcod pa'o/ /yang gnyis kyi phyir te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'thob pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phan yon lnga mthong nas
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>rab tu 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur te/ lnga ni bdag gis las byas pa chud mi za ba dang / bdag gis las byas pa bag chags kyis bsgos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad las sems gtang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis mi smad pa dang / bdag
<p>308a.2</p>grol nas gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i dad pa rab tu thob nas phyin ci log las byung bar mthong ba dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes na chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no/ /chos gnyis
<p>308a.3</p>dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub shes pa'o/ /gnyis dang ldan na rtag pa'i lta bar mi ltung ste/ mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / skyes
<p>308a.4</p>nas zhig cing zhu ste mi gnas par rnam par dbye ba shes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ lus dang sems kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang / bsam pa dang sbyor ba de dag sgrub par mi byed pa dang / ci nas de
<p>308a.5</p>bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bus snyoms par 'jug ste/ de ni dmigs pa can gyis snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan de dag kyang shes
<p>308a.6</p>rab kyi shas che ba dang / lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yin no/ /byang chub tu bsngos pa dang / sems can smin par byed pa yang grub pa yin te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa gcig gis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du thug par mdzad do/ /
<p>308a.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs te 'dug la/ chos zab mo'i gtam gyi bar chad byed de gtam sna tshogs gleng ba gang yin pa de dam pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /gzhan yang mi chos 'dod de nyan pa ni nyung gi ma yin pa'i chos nyan pa ni mang
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1</p>ste/ chos smra ba btang ste/ gtam sna tshogs gleng na der zab mo'i chos la mos pa'i lha rnams ma rangs te/ 'di skad du 'jig rten pa'i gtam gleng zhing 'dug ste/ kye re ngan 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mi grag go zhes tshig ngan bton nas 'khor de nas 'dong ngo / /rgyal po
<p>308b.2</p>ma skyes dgras gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin te chos thams cad ni yid la byed pa las 'byung ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir/ de dag ni ji ltar
<p>308b.3</p>'dod pa bzhin rnam par grub po/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs mchis pa de gang du mchis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
<p>308b.4</p>de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mes yongs su gang bar mthong na der chu'i phung po de gang du song / gsol pa/ de ni ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de ltar las su rung ba las gyur lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ khyod nyan thos kyi sems las su rung ba las/ de ltar gyur
<p>308b.5</p>par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mnga' ba de ltar mi 'dod dam/ nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni bdag nyid chu na gnas so snyam du sems so/ /skam na gnas pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho chen po skam par mthong ngo / /lha rnams sdug
<p>308b.6</p>bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/ /mi rnams kyis ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags/ /dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod ba lags/ /gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags/ /yi dgas sdug bsngal 'di ni bkres dang skom/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba las/ de nas rgyal
<p>308b.7</p>po gsal rgyal spyan sngar 'dug cing rin po che'i gos lag na thogs pa dang gyon pa phud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gos rin po che 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa lags na bzhes su gsol/ bka'
<p>309a</p>
<p>309a.1</p>stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag la brtson par bya ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thad du 'gro zhing dri bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i
<p>309a.2</p>phyir sgrub pa dang / zab mo las mos pa btsal ba'i phyir spro bar bya ba dang / log par lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir spro bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa las/ rigs kyi bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni chos
<p>309a.3</p>yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang nye ba'i sems pa yin pa des na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub po/ /stong pa nyid ces bya ba cis stong zhe na/ chos thams
<p>309a.4</p>cad kyis stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni gnas gsum du rig par bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang po ni dngos po thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i las can no/ /gnyis pa ni chos yongs su tshol ba dang / len pa dang 'dzin par byed la bdag tu zhen pa med pa nyid do/ /
<p>309a.5</p>gsum pa ni chos zab mo mi spong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'jug cing sgyid lug pa med pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni bde ba'i rgyu yin te/ bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa rnyed pa yin/ 
<p>309a.6</p>lta ba drang po phun sum tshogs pa yin/ khyim bdag rnam par rgyal bsrung ba/ chung ma gzugs ldan ma/ shAkya'i bu gnag sbyin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe brjes na yang dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur te/ bzhi ni chos tshol ba dang / sbyin pas chog mi shes pa yin/ sems can
<p>309a.7</p>gzhan bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dzin du 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sgrogs pa yin/ chos zab mo la bzod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i phyir yang mi g.yeng zhing / chos yid la bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin la/
<p>309b</p>
<p>309b.1</p>chos zab mo la bzod cing 'chi ba'i 'du byed pa yin no/ /chos bzhi ni theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i mchog sgrub pa yin te/ bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'jig cing dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba na dam pa'i chos tshol ba la brtson pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
<p>309b.2</p>pa'i mchod rten rnam par 'jig na phyis 'tshes shing lus dang srog la bab kyang chos mi gtong ba yin/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na/ snying rje bskyed pa yin/ snying rje thob nas/ brtson 'grus rtsom zhing / nam zhig bdag sangs rgyas nas/ sems
<p>309b.3</p>can de dag gi sdug bsngal gzhil ba'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya snyam pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba sgrub pa yin la/ sems can gyi gos la sogs pas lan glan pa ni zag
<p>309b.4</p>pa dang bcas pa yin na/ ji ltar des de la lan lon par 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bdag cag gis ni deng slan chad la lar chos bstan na ches thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las brtsams nas bstan par bgyi zhing / nyan thos kyi theg pa ni
<p>309b.5</p>slar gyis bstan par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'ga' zhig byang chub chen po la bzhag na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod de ltar go gyon pa legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa de lta bu
<p>309b.6</p>de la 'phya ba dang / bsting bar byed pa dang / mdo sde de lta bu spong bar byed pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdag nyid kyis bdag dbugs phyung zhing bde bar gnas pa yin no/ /bzhi ni theg pa chen po la zhugs nas longs spyod kyi bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung
<p>309b.7</p>po la gnas pa yin/ chos zab mo'i ye shes 'phags shing lus dang srog gi phyir yang chos mi gtong ba yin/ dge slong dam pa'i chos smra ba dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis stobs pa yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur la/ 
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>tshe brjes nas kyang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang ji ltar smos pas 'jug par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba thob nas rab tu 'byung bar yang 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang 'thob bar 'gyur/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshangs pa'i
<p>310a.2</p>'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa mthong nas bcos pa'i phyir spro zhing tha na 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tsam yang rtsig par byed pa yin/ mchod rten brtsigs pas skye bo mang po 'du ba'i sa lam gyi bzhi mdo lta bu mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs pa 
<p>310a.3</p>'am/ rdo rings sam de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran pa gang yang rung ba byed pa 'di lta ste/ mngon par 'byung ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyis mchod rten brtsigs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye zhing 'thab pa dang / 
<p>310a.4</p>rtsod pa byung ba mthong nas mi 'byed pa dang mthun par bsdum pa'i phyir brtson pa yin/ bstan pa'i chos rab tu 'jig pa ni tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang bsrung ba dang / mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson ba yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe brjes nas
<p>310a.5</p>dge slong tshur shog ces byas pa'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob ste/ bzhi ni bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dga' zhing gzhan yang rab tu 'byung ba 'dzin du 'jug la/ rnam pa thams cad du rab tu 'byung ba la rton par byed de/ rab tu byung nas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
<p>310a.6</p>yang dag par dga' bar byed cing 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/ /chos btsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid kyang brtson zhing gzhan yang brtson par 'jug pa yin/ bdag nyid bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan zhing gzhan yang de la 'god/ bdag nyid yo byad bsnyungs shing shes pa phun sum tshogs la
<p>310a.7</p>gzhan yang de dag la 'god pa yin/ bdag nyid thabs la mkhas shing smon lam gyi stobs can yin la/ gzhan yang de la 'god pa yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub chen po las mi nyams pa yin te/ bzhi ni lhag pa'i sems kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba yin/ chos nyan pas ngoms mi shes pa yin/ mi slu bas bden par smra ba yin no/ /gang dag dge slong bsten byed pa/ /de dag mang du thos par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal pos bkur ba yin/ /de dag 'di ni nga rjes 'brang / /ji ltar na byang chub
<p>310b.2</p>sems dpa' chos las nyams pa yin zhe na/ chos stong pa nyid bstan kyang zang zing sngon du btang ste ston par byed pa yin/ chos de dag ston kyang de de bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin te/ de ltar na chos las nyams pa yin no/ /yab dang sras mjal ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
<p>310b.3</p>tan gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi tshogs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa de snyed du brjod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
<p>310b.4</p>sems bskyed pa yang rung sems can ji snyed pa thams cad la phan ba dang / bde ba'i don du ma skyes pa gcig kyang med do/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang zad mi shes pa bsod nams kyang de snyed du 'gyur ro/ /sems de ltar bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyis mchod pas kyang lan mi
<p>310b.5</p>lon to/ /'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing yin la/ sems bskyed pa ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba rnams mya ngan las 'das par gzhol bar byed pas zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di nyid sngon bgrang du med pa'i sngon rol na/ de bzhin gshegs
<p>310b.6</p>pa dbang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ rnam par rtog pa chos 'byung kun kyang stong / /rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/ /sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te/ /de bzhin stobs
<p>310b.7</p>dang ye shes dang / /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /dkon mchog sprin las/ de de ltar sems mi mkhas pas/ chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni mi dge
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/ sems las byung ba/ sems rkyen du 'gro ba ste/ sems shin tu bcil/ shin tu
<p>311a.2</p>btul/ shin tu khong du chud par byas nas/ chos de dag thams cad kyang shin tu bcil ba dang / shin tu btul ba dang / shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/ rgyu de dang rkyen des sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de de sems nyid la mi gtod
<p>311a.3</p>do/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ gang 'di me tog gi rnam pa'am/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
<p>311a.4</p>'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bzhin du me tog gi shing la sogs pa yang bsngo'o/ /mdo sde dag mchod pa'i rnam pa rgya chen po dag nyan cing bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo'o/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems
<p>311a.5</p>dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus shing lcogs pa zhig la de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thog mar rtsol zhing 'bad de/ brtson 'grus brtsam
<p>311a.6</p>pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslangs te de na 'khor dbye ba yang byas nas theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston to/ /
<p>311a.7</p>zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba dang / mu stegs can dang / ri mo med pa dang / ma dad pa mang ba dang / g.yo dang sgyus glags pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas glags ba dang / 
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa rnams la ma yin/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos la ser sna yang med sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur to zhes btang snyoms
<p>311b.2</p>su 'jug go/ /sems can ci 'dra ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas chos ston zhe na/ sems can dang ba can dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang / snod du gyur ba dang / g.yo med pa dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ma chags
<p>311b.3</p>pa dang / tshul bzang po dang / legs par ston nus pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / ji skad bshad pa bzhin byed pa rnams la ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / de yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis
<p>311b.4</p>zhe sa dang / ri mo dang bcas pa dang / theg pa chen po la gzhol/ 'bab/ bab pa yin te/ des na byang chub kyi sems ma snad pa yin no/ /skyon yang gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / rigs dang rus dang / lta ba la chags pa dang / sdig pa chung ngus/ 
<p>311b.5</p>'jigs par mi lta ba dang / shi bas mi skrag pa dang / mi bsam pa sems pa dang / lam ma yin ba la lam du 'du shes pa dang / 'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang / theg pa chen po dang / de ston pa'i gang zag gi mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / 
<p>311b.6</p>de ston pa'i gang zag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / rtsod pa lhur len ba dang / brlang ba dang / rtsub ba dang / spyi brtol che ba dang / gtugs pa dang / dag mi snyan pa dang / mur cor smra ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba dang / ngag tu smra ba ste/ de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas
<p>311b.7</p>spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o/ /lang kar gshegs pa las/ lang ka'i bdag po/ sa bon gcig las byung yang / myu gu dang / ljang bu dang / 
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1</p>sog ma dang / tshigs dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gra ma'i bye brag yod pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos skye ba'i chos ma rig ba las rab tu byung ba phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la sogs pa thams cad dang khams gsum
<p>312a.2</p>du skyes pa'i chos thams cad la bde ba'i dbyings dang / brjod pa dang 'gro ba'i khyad par dag snang ste/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa yul na mngon par 'dzin par rab tu 'jug pa'i khyad par rab dang 'bring dang / tha ma'i khyad par dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 
<p>312a.3</p>dge ba dang mi dge bar yang snang ngo / /lang ka'i bdag po de dag gi tha dad pa'i khyad par du yang ma zad de/ rnal 'byor ba rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams kyi lam la yang so so rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid snang na/ so so'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i chos dang / chos med pa'i khyad par
<p>312a.4</p>lta ci ste med de yod do/ /blo gros chen po 'jim pa'i gong bu rdul phra rab las tha dad pa zhig yin na ni/ de dag las brtsams pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na brtsams pas tha dad pa ma yin no/ /tha mi dad pa ni khyad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kun
<p>312a.5</p>gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang tha dad na ni de las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tha mi dad na ni 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gags na kun gzhi yang 'gag par 'gyur na/ rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa
<p>312a.6</p>rnams kyi rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'gag gi las kyi mtshan nyid 'gag go/ /rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gags na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang 'gag par 'gyur te/ blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gags na ni smra ba 'di yang mu stegs byed pa'i chad par
<p>312a.7</p>smra ba dang khyad par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs byed rnams kyi smra ba ni 'di lta ste/ yul 'dzin pa rgyun chad pas rnam par shes pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyun chad pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyun yang chad par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs byed pa rnams ni rgyu las
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>rgyun 'byung bar smra ba'i rgyu ma gtogs par mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs dang snang ba 'dus pa las 'byung bar mi smra ste/ rgyu ni gtso bo dang / skyes bu dang / dbang phyug dang / dus dang / rdul phra mor smra ba'o/ /blo gros chen po snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa lhun gyis grub
<p>312b.2</p>par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / rkyen gyis ma brtsams pa dang / nang dang phyi'i las rnam pa dben pa dang / phyi rol sems su lta bas mtshan ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa rnams/ rim
<p>312b.3</p>gyis sa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la rjes su 'jug pa dang / khams gsum pa dag gi sems sgyu mar shin tu mos pas rab tu sgom pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi sems snang ba tsam la 'jug pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
<p>312b.4</p>tu phyin pa gnas pa rjes su 'thob pa skye ba bya ba dang ldan pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gzugs lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rjes su song song ba/ de nyid kyi sprul pa dang ldan pa/ stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang / snying rje dang thabs
