<p>312b.5</p>kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad du nye bar song ba sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rim gyis gnas 'phos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag /snang yang yod pa ma
<p>312b.6</p>yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyang / /bshad pa rnam par 'khrul pa yin/ /gzhan la gang zhig bstan pa de/ /gzhan la bshad par mi rung ste/ /ji ltar nad pa so so la/ /sman pa sman rnams btang ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/ /sems
<p>312b.7</p>tsam du yang rab tu gsungs/ /mgon po rnams ni gang gsungs pa'i/ /so so rang rig spyod yul ni/ rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/ /nyan thos rnams kyi 'ang de bzhin min/ /blo gros chen po gnas yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems snang ba'i gzung ba dang / 
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul yongs su shes par 'dod pas 'du ba dang / 'du 'dzi dang / gnyid dang sgrib pa med par bya'o/ /srod dang tho rangs dang nam gyi gung thun la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/ /mu stegs can ngan pa'i gtsug lag
<p>313a.2</p>dang / gtam dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar bya zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par rtogs par bya'o/ /sna tshogs snang ba yod ma yin/ /snang
<p>313a.3</p>ba las ni sems 'byung ste/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bur/ /kun gzhi mi la snang ba yin/ /blo gros chen pos rang sems snang ba'i rgyur rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyu cig car ram rim gyis 'jug
<p>313a.4</p>pas sam/ ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /bka' stsal pa/ rim gyis te cig car ma yin pa'i dpe a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang / rdza mkhan snod byed pa dang / sa las rtsi shing skye ba dang / rol mo la mkhas pa rim gyis 'byung ba gsungs/ me long du gzugs brnyan snang
<p>313a.5</p>ba rtog pa med pa cig car 'byung ba'i dpes/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can gyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par mi rtog cing snang ba med pa'i spyod yul cig car rnam par spyod do zhes bstan/ blo gros chen po yang nyan thos kyi dngos po rnam par rtog
<p>313a.6</p>pa'i rang bzhin la mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dro ba dang / gsher ba dang / g.yo ba dang / sra ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams byed pa med par 'byung ba rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / rigs pa dang / lung gi tshad
<p>313a.7</p>ma dang / shin tu 'grel pa rnams mthong nas/ de'i rang bzhin la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ngo / /blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpas khong du chud nas bzlog par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la blo gros chen pos gsol ba/ ji ltar
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa'i lta ba ngan pa spangs pa'i blo can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas nas kyang rtag pa dang sgro 'dogs pa dang chad pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs te/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
<p>313b.2</p>kyi tshul la mi skur par 'gyur ba sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa'i mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa dag /sems tsam po la yod pa min/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bus/ /sems ni su dag mi shes pa/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba
<p>313b.3</p>la/ /mi mkhas de dag rab tu spyod/ /rang bzhin med pa ni rang bzhin thar pa med pa la dgongs te/ dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros chen po thams cad kyi rten nas rgyu dang 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di ltar phyi'i dang nang gi
<p>313b.4</p>gi'o/ /de ltar phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang / lag zungs dang / 'khor lo dang / srad bu dang / chu dang / mi'i nan tan la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis rdza ma 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du thags las snam bu dang / rtsi skyong las re lde dang / sa bon las
<p>313b.5</p>myu gu dang / srub ma la sogs pa mi'i nan tan dang / zho las mar 'byung ba 'di ni phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba snga ma las phyi ma 'byung ba'o/ /nang gi ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / las dang / chos 'di dag la sogs pa ni rten cing 'brel
<p>313b.6</p>par 'byung ba'i ming 'thob po/ /blo gros chen po 'di dag las skyes pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched ces bya ba'i chos de dag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste/ de dag ni khyad par med pa las byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'o/ /blo
<p>313b.7</p>gros chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bshad pas/ rgyu rnam par brjod pa nyid bgyis kyi/ rang gi tshul gyis slar gzhil ba'i tshul ma gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang gang las dngos po rnams 'byung
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>ba 'di lta ste/ gtso bo dang dbang po dang / skyes bu dang dus dang / rdul phra mo 'jug pas/ rgyu las byung bar brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rnam grangs gzhan gyis dngos po rnams skye bar bka' stsal mod kyi/ grub pa'i mtha' la bye brag tu dbye ba ni
<p>314a.2</p>ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams kyang ma mchis pa dang / ma mchis pa las skye bar brjod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mchis pa las rkyen rnams kyis 'byung ba dang / byung nas kyang 'jig par gsungs te/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig
<p>314a.3</p>pa'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar gsungs pa 'di yang rgyu med par smra ba rnams brjod pa gsungs kyi rgyur smra ba ni ma lags so/ /'di yod na 'di yod do zhes bgyi ba 'di ni cig car gnas pa rnams la rung gi/ rim gyis 'byung ba la ltos bar gnas pa rnams la ma yin te/ mu stegs kyi brjod
<p>314a.4</p>pa nyid bzang gi khyod kyi bzang po ma lags so/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ mu stegs kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma lags pa'i rgyus 'bras bu mngon par sgrub po/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis rgyu yang 'bras bu la ltos/ 'bras bu yang rgyu la ltos pas/ rgyu rkyen yang 'dre ste/ de bzhin phan tshun thug
<p>314a.5</p>pa ma mchis par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di yod na 'di yod do zhes brjod pa ni 'jig rten rgyu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa dang / rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa'i phyir 'di yod do zhes brjod kyang rgyu dang byed par smra ba dang / rgyu
<p>314a.6</p>rkyen 'dres par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen cing / phyi rol gyi rang gi yul gyi dngos po med par rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa de dag la ni 'di lta bu nyes par 'gyur gyi/ nga'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa la nyes
<p>314a.7</p>par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni skyes bu gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi mthus 'byung ste/ rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyi mthu las ni ma yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo lta ba ngan pa'i mtshan nyid du ltung ba'i bsam pa can/ rang gi sems snang
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>ba tsam du ma rtogs pa rgyu dang rkyen gyi byed pa las skye ba'i mtshan nyid du mngon par chags pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du bstan to/ /blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ 
<p>314b.2</p>ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros chen po 'di ltar rang gi blos rnam par dpyad na/ rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po mi rigs pas na/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med ces bya'o/ /srog dang lus gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa la sogs pa dris na 'jog
<p>314b.3</p>pa ni mu stegs can sems tsam mi shes pa yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi ma yin gyi bud+d+ha'i ni gzhag par lung bstan pa ye shes med de snod la ltos nas re zhig lung mi bstan par bya bar 'gyur/ log pa la bden par chags pas ni phung po lnga 'dus pa dang / 'byung
<p>314b.4</p>ba las gyur pa rnams skye'o/ /blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa yang gnas kyi yul sna tshogs la mngon par chags shing 'dod pa'i rgyus 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor bar 'byung ngo / /sa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams la ni rgyu 'byung ba chen po rnams yod mod
<p>314b.5</p>kyi/ 'byung ba chen po rnams la ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros chen po dngos po dang / rtags dang / mtshan nyid dang / dbyings dang / bya ba'i bdag nyid dang / sbyor ba med pas 'byung ba rnams mi skye'o/ /dngos po la sogs pa'i bya ba 'dus pa las skye bar
<p>314b.6</p>'gyur gyi/ rtags dang mi ldan pa las ma yin no/ /de lta bas na blo gros chen po 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ mu stegs byed rnams kyis rnam par brtags pa yin te/ ngas ni ma yin no/ /brtags pa sna tshogs snang ba
<p>314b.7</p>ni/ /gzhan gyi dbang zhes brjod pa ste/ /rnam pa gzhan du brtags na ni/ /mu stegs smra la gnas par 'gyur/ /rtog pa rtogs zhes bya ba ste/ /mthong ba'i phyir ni rgyu las byung / /rnam rtog gnyis las grol ba ni/ /de nyid yongs su grub pa yin/ /
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>blo gros chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni shes bya'i sgrib ba dang / las kyi bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chos la bdag med pa ma rtogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho ba ma thob pas nyan thos rnams la theg pa
<p>315a.2</p>gsum du bstan te gcig tu ma bstan to/ /blo gros chen po de dag nam nyes pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs shing chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa de ni/ de dag bag chags kyi nyes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis myos par gyur nas/ zag pa med pa'i dbyings nas slar sad de 'jig
<p>315a.3</p>rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i tshogs rnams yongs su bskang nas/ chos kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang byed pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa rnam par gzhag med kyang / /sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/ /theg
<p>315a.4</p>pa tha dad ngas bshad do/ /theg pa gcig tu ngas bshad do/ /sems kyi gnas shin tu gyur te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gzhan dag rab tu thob pa dang / mtshan dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa du ma'i me tog rgyas shing yid kyi mgyogs pa dang mtshungs
<p>315a.5</p>pa sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gzugs brnyan lta bu 'byung ba las gyur pa ma yin pa la 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa 'dra ba gzugs thams cad kyi yan lag sna tshogs 'dus pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su song ba'i lus de ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid
<p>315a.6</p>rtogs pa yin gyis lus zhes bya'o/ /lta ba thams cad rnam bzlog cing / /rtog dang brtags pa spangs pa ste/ /dmigs med skye ba med pa na/ /sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /dngos min dngos po med min pa/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /de
<p>315a.7</p>bzhin sems las grol ba ni/ /sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'/ /mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/ /sna tshogs yid kyi lus rnams ni/ /sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /rnam rtog bag chags 'brel ba yin/ /
<p>315b</p>
<p>315b.1</p>sna tshogs sems las byung ba ste/ /mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang / /'jig rten pa yi sems tsam mo/ /phyi rol snang ba yongs med de/ /sems ni sna tshogs rnams su snang / /lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra ba/ /sems tsam du nangs
<p>315b.2</p>bshad do/ /bud+d+ha'i drung du bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa zhig gis thams cad byas pa'am ma byas pa'am/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ gcig pa'am tha dad pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang po zhig zhus pa las/ bud+d+has lan du de skad ces zer
<p>315b.3</p>ba thams cad ni 'jig rten rgyang pan pa yin te/ kye bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'di ni khyod kyi ste de'i ma yin no/ /bram ze nga ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las srid pa gsum skyes par ston te/ bram ze
<p>315b.4</p>de yang rang gi sems snang ba tsam khong du ma chud pas rnam par rtog pa 'byung gi /phyi rol gyi dngos po dmigs pa las ni ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ mu stegs byed rnams kyi bdag dang / dbang po dang / don gsum phrad pa lta bu nga'i ma yin no/ /kye bram ze nga ni rgyur smra ba
<p>315b.5</p>yang ma yin/ rgyu med par smra ba yang ma yin te/ gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po rab tu bshig ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar ston to/ /khyod lta bu dang bdag tu 'dzin par ltung ba'i rgyud can gzhan dag gis mi rig go/ /
<p>315b.6</p>gzhan yang blo gros chen po bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pas nga la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /kye gau ta ma srid pa gsum po 'di mi shes pa dang / sred pa dang / las kyi rgyu las byung ngam/ de ste rgyu las ma byung / bram ze 'di gnyis ka yang 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'o/ /kye gau ta ma
<p>315b.7</p>dngos po thams cad rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ltung ba'am/ kye bram ze de yang 'jig rten rgyang phan pa nyid yin te/ bram ze ji tsam du yid las rnam par g.yos pa dang / phyi rol gyi don la mngon par chags shing rnam par rtog pa de tsam du 'jig rten rgyang pan no/ /me long
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>la ni ji ltar gzugs/ /snang yang yod pa ma yin ltar/ /bag chags dag ni me long la/ /byis pas sems ni rnam gnyis mthong / /sems kyi snang ba ma shes pas/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam gnyis skye/ /sems kyi snang ba yongs shes nas/ /rnam par
<p>316a.2</p>rtog pa mi 'byung ngo / /sems ni sna tshogs 'gyur ba ste/ /mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi yang spangs/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/ /snang ba'i rnam pa snang ba med/ /srid gsum rnam par rtog tsam pas/ /phyi rol gyi ni don med do/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs snang ba ni/ /
<p>316a.3</p>byis pa dag gis mi rtogs so/ /ji srid du yang dam bca' ba //de srid thams cad 'dres ba can/ /rang sems tsam du blta bya ste/ /rtsod pa btsal bar mi bya'o/ /blo gros chen po gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
<p>316a.4</p>med du zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa med pas 'jug pa'ang med/ ldog pa'ang med par 'gyur na/ blo gros chen po byas pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la 'jug pa dang / ldog pa yang yod de rnal 'byor can brtson pa mi
<p>316a.5</p>'dod pa rnams bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa tshe 'di'i bde bar spyod pas gnas so/ /dro dang gsher dang sra g.yo bar/ /chos rnams byis pas rnam par brtags/ /yang dag ma yin sgro 'dogs te/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan gzhi med/ /rgyun rnams kyi ni lus 'di
<p>316a.6</p>la/ /'di ni rdzas brgyad gzugs yin te/ /lus kyi dbyibs dang dbang por ni/ /byis pa nor ba rnam rtog go/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas dag ni/ /gzung ba'i rnam par rig gsum ste/ /yid dang yid kyi rnam rig dang / /rnam par rtog ni 'dzin pa gsum/ /
<p>316a.7</p>rang gi sems la mngon chags pas/ /sems ni shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyi rol snang ba yongs med de/ /de yi phyir na sems tsam mo/ /dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma bzhin/ /yul rnams kyang ni rmi lam 'dra/ /byed dang las dang bya ba nyid/ /rnam
<p>316b</p>
<p>316b.1</p>pa kun du g.yo ba min/ /kun rdzob tu ni thams cad yod/ /dam pa'i don du yod pa min/ /gang 'di sna tshogs snang ba ni/ /gnas ngan len gyis bsgos pa'i sems/ gzugs su snang ba 'dzin pa ste/ /phyi rol dag na sems 'khrul pa/ /snang ba ri bong rwa
<p>316b.2</p>bzhin te/ /mi rnams kyi ni rnam rtog yod/ /smig rgyu la ni ri dgas bzhin/ /gang rnams rtogs pa de dag nor/ /rnam rtog mngon par chags pa yis/ /rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung / /phyi rol brtags pa'i rang bzhin te/ /gzhan dbang rang gi gzhi las
<p>316b.3</p>skyes/ /bdag la skyes pa'i 'khrul ma mthong / /de yi sems rnams rab tu 'jig /de yi rgyu can de la dmigs/ /yid mi 'jug pa'i gnas yin te/ /sems kyi rgyu yang 'byin par byed/ /rnam par shes kyang de la gnas/ /dngos po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol
<p>316b.4</p>ji srid rnam rtog cing / /rang gi nor ba ma mthong na/ /de srid du ni sems rgyas byed/ /bag chags dag las sems mi byed/ /sems dang bag chags gcig ma yin/ /sems ni tha dad ma yin mtshan/ /bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris/ /yid kyi
<p>316b.5</p>shes las byung ba yi/ /bag chags dri ma bzhin du ltos/ /sems ni ras yug dkar po 'dra/ /bag chags rnams kyis mi mdzes so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i skabs nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa brgyad du gzhag gam/ gzhog
<p>316b.6</p>go/ /bzhag na ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa log la ma bzhag lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de'i rgyu dang dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'dus pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ /blo gros chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa yul bye brag 'byed pa la mngon par chags
<p>316b.7</p>shing 'byung bas/ bag chags kyi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa shin tu rgyas par byed do/ /yid dang lhan cig tu bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pas/ rang sems pa lta bu rjes su 'jug ste/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyur gyur cing / de la dmigs pa
<p>317a</p>
<p>317a.1</p>lus tha dad pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rang gi sems snang ba'i yul la mngon par chags pas/ gcig gi rgyur gcig gyur pa'i sems 'das pa 'byung ste/ blo gros chen po rgya mtsho chen po ltar rang gi sems snang ba'i yul gyi rlung gis bskyod
<p>317a.2</p>pas 'jug cing ldog go/ /de lta bas na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog pas bdun po rnams kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /kun gzhi la ni rten bcas nas/ /yid kyang shin tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /sems dang yid la rten bcas nas/ /rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/ /dkar po la ni dri
<p>317a.3</p>ma snang / /dri ma la ni sems mi snang / nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du/ /de bzhin sems kyang mi snang ngo / /thams cad 'byung 'gyur gzugs med de/ /'byung las ma gyur gzugs yod do/ /dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'byung 'gyur min/ /ji ltar gser
<p>317a.4</p>ni dag pa dang / /chu yang rnyog pa dwangs pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni sprin med ltar/ /rnam rtog dag pa de bzhin no/ /dbus ma 'jigs pa dang sems tsam/ /dbu ma yin pa rgyun chags 'byung / /yon tan rdul phran rdzas 'dus par/ /byis pa rnams ni gzugs la rtog /
<p>317a.5</p>rdul phran re rer yod pa min/ /de yi phyir yang don med do/ /rang gi sems ni snang ba'i dbyibs/ /mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang / /phyi rol snang ba yod min te/ /de yi phyir yang don med do/ /skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu ma dang / /rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer dang / /mgal me
<p>317a.6</p>smig rgyu sna tshogs dag /med kyang mi la rab tu snang / /sems dang rnam rtog rnam rig dang / /yid dang rnam shes nyid kyang ste/ /kun gzhi srid gsum g.yo ba rnams/ /de dag sems kyi rnam grangs yin/ /gang dag 'jungs pa'i nyan thos dang / /mu stegs can gyis byas pa ni/ /
<p>317a.7</p>gang phyir rtog ges bshad pas na/ /de dag don la 'khrul pa'o/ /chos yang dag par sdud pa las/ /chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi 'grogs pa khong du chud par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dman pa la sems pa dang / dman pa
<p>317b</p>
<p>317b.1</p>la smon pa'i sems can dman pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / sems can mi brtson pa mi 'grus pa le lo can brtson 'grus med pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / nga rgyal bdun dang nga rgyal gyis khengs pa'i sems can rnams
<p>317b.2</p>dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems can rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa
<p>317b.3</p>dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / kun du rtog pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa thams cad dang
<p>317b.4</p>lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / ngar
<p>317b.5</p>'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang / 'ja' la kha dog skya bo dang / sngon po dang / dmar po rnams ni rim bzhin sa chu me'i dbang po/ /gzhu'i dbyibs ni rlung gi dbang po zhes 'byung / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong dge ba
<p>317b.6</p>med pa'i tshogs rnam par dag pa/ dbang rab tu thob pas zad par nam mkhar bsams tsam gyis de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sra ba dang / gsher ba dang / tsha ba dang / g.yo ba rnams dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyi sgrib pa med
<p>317b.7</p>par 'gyur yang / sems kyi sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i sgrib pa med par 'pho ba yang ma yin/ bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med pa dang mi ldan par srab la sogs pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i las dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams
<p>318a</p>
<p>318a.1</p>cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang nyid khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba brgyad la/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / stong pa dang g.yo ba med par lta ste/ des 'grol bas
<p>318a.2</p>rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/ phyi'i gzugs rnams la lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / g.yo ba med par lta bas so/ /sdug par mos pa ni stong pa'o/ /mi sdug pa ni lta bar gyur pa'o/ /sdug par mos pas so/ /
<p>318a.3</p>gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa ni stong pa ste rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam pa ni rnam par shes pa thog ma med pa can du bshad la/ gang thog ma med ba de ni stong pa yin te/ de ltar mthong bas so/ /ci yang med do snyam pa ni ci yang zhes bya ba ni dus gsum ste/ de dag med pas
<p>318a.4</p>mthong ngo / /'du shes med 'du shes med min rdzogs par bya ste/ gnas pa ni 'du shes med ces bya ba ni stong pa'o/ /'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ de ltar mthong bas so/ /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni de 'di snyam
<p>318a.5</p>du 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ 'du shes nyid tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid 'du shes pas/ 'di la shes pa po med/ tshor ba po med nas/ de ltar mthong bas so/ /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i zad par gyi skye mched
<p>318a.6</p>bcu la/ zad par sa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mos na yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te/ zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o/ /re re la yang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur bas de'i phyir zad par skye mched ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu la/ mi 'chi ba thob
<p>318a.7</p>pas tshe la dbang ba'o/ /sems tsam du yongs su shes pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba'o/ /lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha'i mdzod rab tu brnyes pa'i phyir yo byad do/ /bag chags dang bcas pa'i las kyi lam bcad pas las so/ /ting nge 'dzin bzlog pa'i bsam
<p>318b</p>
<p>318b.1</p>gtan rnyed pas skye ba'o/ /lhun gyis grub par bya ba la 'jug pa thob pas rdzu 'phrul lo/ /zad par gyi skye mched thob pas mos pa'o/ /bsams pa tsam gyis don 'thob pas smon lam mo/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thob pas ye shes so/ /de
<p>318b.2</p>bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa'i phyir chos so/ /dbang bcu po dag mi mthun pa gang gi gnyen po yin pa dang / de dag gi rgyu yang d+harma 'di las bshad/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang so sor thar ba'i
<p>318b.3</p>sdom pas bsdams pa yang lags la/ so sor thar pa tsam gyis dag par yang mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la rton pa lags so/ /d+harma 'di las sangs rgyas bcu 'byung / cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa las/ 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
<p>318b.4</p>lus yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mthun par ston pa yin/ ji ltar ngag yongs su dag pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod pas chos ston pa yin/ 
<p>318b.5</p>ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su shes pa yin no/ /bud+d+ha'i spyan snga na 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / lha'i bu ded dpon chos gleng ba las/ ded dpon gyis chos zab mo mang du smras pa dang / shA ri'i
<p>318b.6</p>bus bud+d+ha la ded dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba can no zhes gsol pa dang / sngon yang dge ba spel ba yin pa las gleng ba bskal ba grangs med pa'i sngon rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bde bar bud+d+ha ri rab lta bur 'byung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge bas bkod pa byung / 
<p>318b.7</p>de la bud+d+has chos bshad nas bu dang bcas pas chos dang mthun pa'i bzod pa thob/ de nas 'khor de ni chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod pas rgyal po la chos zab mo bshad pa dang rgyal po rangs nas gos dang / rgyan ci yod pa de la yon du byin no/ /
<p>319a</p>
<p>319a.1</p>de nas dge slong des gos la sogs pa ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/ rab tu byung zhing chos spyod mchod pa'i bar/ /gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun/ /byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs
<p>319a.2</p>par ni/ /bu dang chung ma sbyin pa byas pa las/ /gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab ched du/ /rab 'byor sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/ /de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /gang dag sngon chad byung
<p>319a.3</p>ba'i sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag skyon mang khyim ni ma spangs par/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med/ /rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu ston cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod
<p>319a.4</p>'dod pa/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang / /gang zhig rab byung nyid dang mtshan gcig tu/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na/ /gang zhig rab byung bag yod gyur ba
<p>319a.5</p>yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang / /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing / /dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin/ /rab byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang / /lam gyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/ /de ni dge ba cung zad ma yin zhing / /de ni yongs
<p>319a.6</p>su 'dzin pa spangs ba yin/ /khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing / /nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/ /rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /de nas rgyal po de rab tu byung bar 'dod nas/ bud+d+ha la gsol te gnad
<p>319a.7</p>nas bu stong la smras pa/ khyed las rgyal srid 'dzin cing sems can chos bzhin skyong bar spro ba su yod/ /de dag thams cad kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'byung gis mi 'dor bar gsol zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di rab tu byung na gling bzhi ba'i 'gro ba chud zos su 'ong gis/ khyod
<p>319b</p>
<p>319b.1</p>pas gang snying rje brtan pa des rgyal srid zung la 'gro ba chos la tshud cig/ de nas rgyal bu snying rje can sems kyis khas blangs nas/ gzhan ril rab tu byung ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po'i ded dpon chos smra ba'i dge slong de 'jam dpal lo/ /rgyal bu rgyal srid 'dzin pa ni bcom ldan 'das
<p>319b.2</p>shAkya thub pa'o/ /rgyal bu gzhan ni bskal ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas gzhan no/ /ye shes snang ba'i rgyan las/ dper na sa chen po 'di bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas brgya byin longs spyod dang bcas par snang la de ni lha rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i
<p>319b.3</p>gling gi mi rnams la/ kye lha'i dbang po la ltos khyed kyang bsod nams kyis las 'di 'dra bar 'gyur bar gyis shig ces smras pa dang / de dag bsod nams dag byed smon lam yang 'debs so/ /de na brgya byin la sogs pa med kyang sa gzhi dag pas de ltar snang ba
<p>319b.4</p>de bzhin du bsgom pa la shin tu goms shing sems dag pa'i phyir sems can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku mthong ste/ de yang ma skyes ma 'gags snang ba yang ma yin mi snang ba yang ma yin mod
<p>319b.5</p>kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs nas/ bsod nams byed cing yongs su bsngo'o/ /brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan mi g.yo mi sems mi rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi skye mi rtog mod kyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar 'jig rten
<p>319b.6</p>ni snang ste/ sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i rims tha dad pas che ba'i rim pa tha dad par ston to/ /yongs su smin pa dang dad pa'i stobs bskyed pas chos thos bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin theg pa gsum du yang shes rab rnam par grol bar yang 'gyur
<p>319b.7</p>ro/ /las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul ba rnams kyi sngon gyi rnam par smin pas/ gzugs brnyan ltar mi snang bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das
<p>320a</p>
<p>320a.1</p>zhes de snyam du sems so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sa'i mthon dman rim par 'char ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' nas tha na log par zhugs pa yan chad la rim
<p>320a.2</p>gyis 'char ro/ /mdor na mi dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'o/ /dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med cing rten med pa'i byang chub brnyes
<p>320a.3</p>so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ rtsa ba dang rten gang lags/ rtsa ba ni 'jig tshogs so/ /rten ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags so/ /gang brjod du med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to/ /gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
<p>320a.4</p>don de chos kyi don to/ /gang chos kyi don de sangs rgyas kyi don to/ /de'i phyir gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo / /gang gis chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ste/ ji ltar btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar
<p>320a.5</p>mthong ngo / /'jam dpal ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang dmigs pa'o/ /de nas sems dang dmigs pa mi mthong ba de na yang dag pa mthong ba'o/ /de ltar na chos de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par
<p>320a.6</p>mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge chos zag med kyis/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu yin te 'di la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs med de bzhin nyid kyang med/ /'jig rten dag na gzugs brnyan snang bar zad/ /chos yang dag par bsdus
<p>320a.7</p>pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas
<p>320b</p>
<p>320b.1</p>te gnas so/ /de la 'dod pa rnams ni bsam gtan dang po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te/ gang sred pa de dag las dben pa'o/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams ni chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug ste/ gzhi de las mi dge ba bcu 'byung ngo / /'di ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
<p>320b.2</p>rnams zhes bya ste/ de dag la dben pa ni bsam gtan dang po'o/ /rtog pa dang lhan cig pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ste/ rtog pa de dag gang zhe na/ gang dag bsam gtan dang po dang mthun pa'i rtog pa ste/ de cho ga bzhin du rtog cing de dag kyang dul bas na/ de dag ni rtog pa
<p>320b.3</p>zhes bya ste/ shes pa dang khong du chud pa dang / dpyod pa dang rab tu rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du byed pa ni rtog pa'o/ /dpyod pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang mthun pa'i rtog pa de dag nyid la dpyod pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / nye bar dpyod pa dang / kun
<p>320b.4</p>du longs spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du byed pa dang / sems rjes su 'gro ba ni dpyod pa zhes bya ste/ de dag dang lhan cig pa ni rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa bsam gtan dang po'o/ /dga' ba dang bde ba dben pa las skyes pas de'i phyir dben pa las skyes pa'i
<p>320b.5</p>dga' ba dang bde ba zhes bya'o/ /rdzogs par byas te gnas zhes bya ba la/ rdzogs par byas zhes bya ba ni/ sdom pa dang / sdom par byed pa dang / sbed pa dang / sbed par byed pa dang / ro myang ba dang mngon par dga' ba ste/ bsam gtan de la gnas pa'i byang chub
<p>320b.6</p>sems dpa' ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par bya ba'i 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa 'thob ste/ 'dun pa dang 'dod pa des bsam gtan dang po la snying po 'du shes pa ma yin no/ /de bsam gtan gnyis pa rtsom te/ de bsam gtan dang po'i
<p>320b.7</p>rtog pa dang / dpyod pa de dag zhi bar byed/ de dag las sems rab tu zhi bar byed cing / bsam gtan gnyis pa yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu tshol te/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa dang dpyod
<p>321a</p>
<p>321a.1</p>pa med par dga' ba dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de la nang yongs su dang ba ni de'i bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa yin te/ 
<p>321a.2</p>de'i phyir nang yongs su dang ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyud gcig tu gyur zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ rgya mtsho'i chu ltar ro gcig tu 'gyur bar 'thob pa'o/ /'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bab pa rnams
<p>321a.3</p>lan tshwar ro gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag thams cad zhi nas ro gcig tu gyur te/ de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin de las sangs
<p>321a.4</p>rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dga' ba skyes te/ de dkon mchog la dga' bas dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i 'dun pa shin tu 'bar ba dang / shin tu 'od gsal ba dang / shin tu 'od ba 'thob po/ /
<p>321a.5</p>de 'dus pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa la mi chags te/ bsam gtan gsum pa kun du tshol lo/ /de 'di snyam du sems te dga' ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sgrib pa yin no snyam nas/ de dga' ba de las 'dod chags dang btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag
<p>321a.6</p>pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang dag dga' ba med pa bde ba la gnas pa zhes brjod pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dod chags dang bral bar thob pa de gang de dga' ba med pa'i
<p>321a.7</p>gtan du bde ba ma yin gyi zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin zhing de yid brtan du mi rung ngo snyam pa'i sems de lta bu 'thob po/ /de ltar shes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par rab tu 'thob pa'i 'dun pa drag po chen
<p>321b</p>
<p>321b.1</p>po 'thob po/ /'dun pa drag po des bde ba dang sdug bsngal la mngon par chags pa mi skye'o/ /de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ /sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/ 
<p>321b.2</p>btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bsam gtan bzhi ba la snyoms par zhugs pas gnyen po'i sems so/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sems so/ /las su rung ba'i sems so/ /'od gsal ba'i sems so/ /
<p>321b.3</p>dran pa'i sems so/ /bde ba de sems can thams cad kyis mngon par smon te/ de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba la mngon du phyogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa snang ba skye'o/ /de snang ba skyes pa des bsam gtan bzhi pa sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde
<p>321b.4</p>pa yang ma yin pa mang ba de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bde ba las yang chags par mi byed do/ /de la mi chags pas de nam mkha' nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
<p>321b.5</p>par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ mdor na 'di la gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 
<p>321b.6</p>'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'o/ /'byung ba'i gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o/ /'byung ba las gyur pa ni kha dog dri ro reg pa ste/ de ltar gzugs rnam pa brgyad do/ /gzugs de dag gis 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas/ thogs pa'i 'du shes mi 'byung ste nub par 'gyur ro/ /gang
<p>321b.7</p>na gzugs su 'du shes pa de na thogs pa'i 'du shes pa ste/ de bas na gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par 'gyur ro/ /thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub na/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam
<p>322a</p>
<p>322a.1</p>mkha' mtha' yas so snyam du 'jug go/ /de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di snyam du
<p>322a.2</p>sems te/ nam mkha' ni mtha' med pas so/ /gang la mtha' med pa de'i thog ma yod par ga la 'gyur dbus yod par ga la 'gyur te/ de ltar chos thams cad ni thog ma dang tha ma dang / dbus med do snyam mo/ /de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
<p>322a.3</p>sems can rnams la ni snying rje chen po bskyed/ chos rnams la ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi shes pa 'jug ste/ de ni de'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i brtson pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes
<p>322a.4</p>pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam mkhar 'du shes pa ni rnam par shes par 'gyur ba'o snyam nas/ 'di snyam du 'di thams cad ni rnam par shes pa tsam ste/ rnam shes mtha'
<p>322a.5</p>yas de yang yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems so/ /de de ltar snyoms par zhugs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin te/ yongs su grub pa ni ma yin no/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
<p>322a.6</p>te/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /ci yang med ces bya ba la/ ci yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad dang / 
<p>322a.7</p>yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las byung ba rnams ni ci yang zhes bya'o/ /ci yang med pa ni ji skad du brjod pa de dag las chung ngur 'gyur/ phra bar gyur pa ni ci yang med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
<p>322b</p>
<p>322b.1</p>shin tu 'bar ba shin tu 'od gsal ba yin no/ /de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi de dang de thob pa de'i phyir/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mi chags te gong du tshol lo/ /de gong du tshol ba ni 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni gang du 'du shes rnams kyi phra ba la ci yang med par
<p>322b.2</p>yongs su brtags te/ de ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min ma yin no snyam mo/ /de la 'du shes med pa ni stong  pa'i phyir ro/ /'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched mngon du
<p>322b.3</p>gyur te/ de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de de la gnas nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min de la dga' ba ci zhig yod snyam nas/ 
<p>322b.4</p>blo de las gong du bskyed do/ /blo de las gong du bskyed nas/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos mngon du gyur to/ /de chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par mthong ngo / /de chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong nas yang mi 'jig mi rtag go/ /de'i
<p>322b.5</p>phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /de de las gong du lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/ li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu dkon
<p>322b.6</p>mchog 'byung gnas kyis/ bud+d+ha la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhus pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dge ba bcu dang / byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin par bshad pa'i rjes la/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar
<p>322b.7</p>'dod na byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems yongs su dag pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'ong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di snyam du sems
<p>323a</p>
<p>323a.1</p>so/ /ji ltar rang gi sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems yongs su dag gam/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag
<p>323a.2</p>par snang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shA ri'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji snyam du sems/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag ci na dmus long gis ma mthong ba/ dmus long gis nongs kyi nyi zlas ma nongs so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can bsod nams med cing ma rig
<p>323a.3</p>pa'i mig gis nyes kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan mang po sems can gang gis kyang mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nyes so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag na khyod kyis ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshangs pa ral pa can gyis shA ri'i bu la smras
<p>323a.4</p>pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma dag go zhes ma zer cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas brgyan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang yon tan gyis brgyan par bdag cag gis mthong ngo / /
<p>323a.5</p>de nas shA ri'i bus tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'di mthon dman dang / tsher ma dang / gad pa dang / rong dang / ri rtse dang / ngam grog dang / mi gtsang ba dang / bong bas rab tu gang bar mthong ngo / /tshangs pas smras pa/ btsun
<p>323a.6</p>pa shA ri'i bu sems yongs su ma dag cing mthon dman du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag pas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur mthong / shA ri'i bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi bsams pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas
<p>323a.7</p>kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kyi 'khor de rnams 'di lta bu ji zhig yin snyam du sems pa mkhyen nas sa chen po 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos rig par mdzad pa dang / de'i tshe stong gsum
<p>323b</p>
<p>323b.1</p>gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan par snang ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyan gyi zhing ltar snang ngo / /'khor thams cad kyang bdag kyang rin po che'i pad mo la 'khod par shes so/ /de nas shA ri'i
<p>323b.2</p>bu la bka' stsal pa/ mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ sngon ma mthong ba 'di lta bu mthong ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtag tu yang 'di bzhin dag ste/ sems can ngan pa smin par bya bar gnod pa dang nyes pa mang por ston to/ /dper na lha'i bu rnams snod
<p>323b.3</p>gcig nas za ba za mod kyi/ bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin myong ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes kyang sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar dag pa bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa yang de bzhin mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas
<p>323b.4</p>kyi zhing de ltar snang ba'i tshe/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /snang ba bsam du med pa las/ rgyal po sde rab tu 'pham byed kyis sangs rgyas la zhus pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su
<p>323b.5</p>sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe/ de'i gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' bzang ba'i lha dang sa zhes bya ba gnyis shig byung ba las/ bzang ba'i lha ni 'dod pa chung bya ba nyung bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa zhig go/ /sa ni de tsam
<p>323b.6</p>gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa ma yin te/ bzang bas lha'i g.yog byed pa na/ de ha cang grong dang yul dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro zhing der phyin nas kyang bya ba mang ba dang / bzang ba'i lha khyod ha cang bya ba mang ches so/ /spyad pas spang ba la cung zad sgrims
<p>323b.7</p>shig ces byas te yang bskul yang bskul ba dang / khros tshig mi dga' nas/ tshig rtsub mos nal bu sbyar ma'i bu khyod kyi pha ma yang byi bo byed na/ khyod la tshul khrims dang / shes rab ga la yod ces smra zhing slar yang mi 'chags bag la nyal ston to/ /bzang ba'i
<p>324a</p>
<p>324a.1</p>lhas kyang de snod ma yin pa tsam du rig nas bcos te btang ba dang / de tshig pa za nas phrad dgu la bzang ba'i lha la kha phyar btang ngo / /de shi nas bskal pa drug cur nal bur skyes shing skyes ma thag tu srang gi rdog lam du bor nas wa khyi la sogs pas
<p>324a.2</p>za ba dang / 'gro ba mang pos nal bu sbyar ma'i bu zhes kha phya bar gyur to/ /byang chub kyi sems kyis bzung bas sems can dmyal bar ma skyes so/ /bzang ba'i lha ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs bar spyad pa spyod de/ byang chub sems
<p>324a.3</p>dpa' dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/ /snang ba bsam du med pas kyang sngon sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'i drung du tshangs bar spyad cing mnyes par byas pas/ de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen por gyur to/ /de bas na srog dang yang bsngos te/ sdig pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
<p>324a.4</p>bsdam mo/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan par bya ste/ de las yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bud+d+ha dze tan bzhugs/ bud+d+ha bsod snyoms la gshegs pa'i tshe/ khye'u yang dze ta'i tshong 'dus kyi srang gi khang stong zhig na gzhag pa gzigs so/ /
<p>324a.5</p>khye'u yang bskal pa grangs med pa brgya na snang ba bsam du med pa'i bud+d+har 'gyur bar lung bstan to/ /rin po che'i phung po las/ dge sbyong gi dri ma ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i lha rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba dang / bdag bstod pa
<p>324a.6</p>dang / pha rol la brnyas pa dang / ya nga ba'i rnyed pa tshol ba dang dri ma ni rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / dad pas byin pa chung gzon pa dang / ltung pa 'chab ba dang / khyim pa la brten pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang brten pa dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang / rnyed pa yongs su ma rdzogs par
<p>324a.7</p>rtog pa dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa dang / pha rol bsod nams rnyed pa la phrag dog dang / ser sna byed pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor thar pa dang / 'dul bas ma bsdams pa dang / 
<p>324b</p>
<p>324b.1</p>bya rog ltar mur cor smra ba dang / ma gus pa dang / rgod pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / lta ba kun nas ldang ba dang / rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te byung ba dang / 'gal ba dang mthar lta ba la chags pa dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba
<p>324b.2</p>dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du mched pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa dang / sgrib pas kun du bskor ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa 'gal ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo spong ba dang / chos dang 'gal ba gnas pa dang / dkon mchog
<p>324b.3</p>gsum la ma gus pa'o/ /'od srungs sdig pa'i dge slong mang pos nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed do/ /'od srungs mur 'dug dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa nub par byed mi nus so/ /gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las
<p>324b.4</p>skyes bu gti mug pa 'byung ste/ des nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed do/ /'di lta ste/ 'od srungs ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang / ri dgas dang bya gag gis kyang de'i sha za bar mi nus kyi/ 'di ltar seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu
<p>324b.5</p>byung ste/ gang ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za ba dang 'dra'o/ /'od srungs chos bzhi dang ldan pa ni sdig pa'i dge slong du rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa/ ca co can/ bya rgod lta bu/ 'chal ba'i tshig yin no/ /yang bzhi ste/ 'phyar ba/ 'gying ba/ 
<p>324b.6</p>rnyed pa 'dod pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa'o/ /'od srungs dge slong gnyis kyis zhal te bya bar ngas rjes su gnang ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ yongs su dag pa'i dge slong 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba las kyi rnam par smin pa'i
<p>324b.7</p>rjes su 'brang bas ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan zhing / dgra bcom par gyur pa'o/ /dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/ klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pa sa sems pa'i dbang gis sprin gyi phung po gcig las tsha ba'i bdag nyid glog gi phreng ba yang
<p>325a</p>
<p>325a.1</p>gtong ngo / /skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid rgyu'i rgyun kyang gtong ngo / /kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher sham thabs dang bla gos legs par ma bgos pa btul te
<p>325a.2</p>byon pa lhung bzed chag pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ spyod lam mi sdug pa/ lag na 'khar ba thogs pa/ sna leb dang zhar ba dang / theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa nad sna tshogs kyis btab ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong dag
<p>325a.3</p>phal cher bsnyen bkur dang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa bya ba sna tshogs kyis 'brel ba/ 'dul ba por so sor thar pa dral ba yin/ tshe 'dir lhur len pa tshe phyi ma la mi lta bar 'gyur te/ de dag chos kyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhar ba dang / sha tshugs ma legs
<p>325a.4</p>pa'i bar rab tu 'byin pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i de lta bus nga'i bstan pa bltar mi rung ba dang / mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams ni yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud rnams ni dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur ro/ /chos gnyis
<p>325a.5</p>kyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brtson 'grus dang bag yod pa'o/ /mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i las ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni brtson 'grus so/ /shes rab kyi las yod pa thams cad ni bag yod pa ste/ 
<p>325a.6</p>de bas na thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa la bla na med pa'i byang chub las ldog pa med do/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/ des pa'i don gyi mdo gang zhe na/ brjod du med pa'i phyir mdo sde thams cad ni nges pa'i don te/ de ltar na nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa yin
<p>325a.7</p>no/ /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde 'di dag la gang dag mi rton pa de dag ni drang ba zhes bya ste/ ci'i phyir drang ba zhe bya na/ 'di ltar nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba'i chos la gnas pa yin te/ de dag ni drang dgos pa yin no/ /gang gis drang zhe na/ sgras drang ngo / /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde
<p>325b</p>
<p>325b.1</p>dag la rton pa ni sgras drang ba yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis don dam pa brjod du med pa rtogs shing / de dag gis dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la lhag chad med par shes pa'i phyir te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po don gyi rnam pa 'di la de ltar chos nyid 'di la
<p>325b.2</p>rton na mdo sde thams cad nges pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mi rton na mdo sde thams cad drang ba'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mi rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo / /
<p>325b.3</p>drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong mo pa mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de tshe brjes nas longs spyod du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar bsten pa'o/ /yang gsum ste/ dug gsum dang
<p>325b.4</p>bral bar ro/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po gtong ba dang / snying rje ba dang / sbyin pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bas so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni gdung ba dang / bcings pa dang don chung ba dang ngan song gi them skas dang dam pa'i chos rgud pa dang / zang zing dang bcas pa dang sdug
<p>325b.5</p>bsngal gyi gzhi'o//rab tu byung ba ni de dag las bzlog pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas ni dge sbyong gi spyod pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /dge sbyong gi mi 'dum pa rnams kyi sdum bya'o/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na srog dang bsdos te bsrung bar bya'o/ /dge slong na ba
<p>325b.6</p>mthong na rang gi sha khrag gis kyang gso bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang mi 'dre ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med
<p>325b.7</p>par dgon par gnas pa'o/ /byams pa seng ges smras pa/ bzhi ni dge sbyong chom rkun pa ste/ dge slong gi rtags kha dog dang dbyibs la gang gnas shing sdig pa'i chos spyod pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang dben par song ba ste/ mi dge ba rnam par rtog pa dang 'bras
<p>326a</p>
<p>326a.1</p>bu ma thob par rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir 'bras bu thob par khas 'che ba dang bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa'o/ /dper na dug gso ba'i sngags dang sman la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod pa de las gcig gis mi mang po mang bar bya ba'i phyir dug zos nas lan cig thabs des gsos so/ /
<p>326a.2</p>yang de ltar bya zhes dug zos pa las bcos ma khom par shi ba dang / cig shos na re kho bo ni mi dag mi mang yang bla'i dug kyang mi za sman yang mi gtang ngo zhes zer te/ bde blag tu 'dug nas tshe'i mthar phyin pa dang 'dra bar phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba kha cig ni nyes pa byas pa las
<p>326a.3</p>spyod zhes zer ba dang / kha cig snga nas sdom pa gnyis 'byung ba yang de dang 'dra'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'di la dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhin rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'du 'dzi las 'byol bar
<p>326a.4</p>bya/ gnas gang na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhig gnas la/ de la zhe sdang gi sems 'ga' tsam skye bar 'gyur ba lta na yang dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya'o/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi sems can thams cad spyos sam brgyad dam mtshon gyis
<p>326a.5</p>btab pas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la zhe sdang 'ga' bskyed pa de nyams par 'gyur te gal te zhe sdang bskyed na sems ji snyed kyi bskal bar go bgos so/ /dper na lcags ni lcags kyis chod kyi bong ba'am shing ngam rtswas gcod mi nus pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' dge
<p>326a.6</p>ba'i rtsa ba yang zla la zhe sdang bskyed pa ma yin pa gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gang zhig khyim na gnas nas ni/ /stong gsum thams cad rin chen gyis/ /rab tu bkang ste 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon
<p>326a.7</p>la yon du 'bul byed na/ /mkhas pa gang zhig yid 'byung zhing / /nyes pa shes nas khyim spangs te/ /sangs rgyas rjes su slob byed la/ /rab tu 'byung ba tshol byed cing / /rab tu 'byung ba btsal nas kyang / /g.yel ba med par 'dod rnams dang / /khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar/ /
<p>326b</p>
<p>326b.1</p>gom pa bdun ni 'dor byed na/ /bsod nams phung po de la ni/ /snga mas rin gyi char mi phod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tog sna tshogs kyi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba mu khyud kyis sna drangs nas/ gling bzhi pa'i mi ril rab tu 'byung ba dang / ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras dang dpag bsam gyi
<p>326b.2</p>shing yang byung / g.yog kyang lhas byas so/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa bstan pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa na/ mi rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chos
<p>326b.3</p>kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa nas/ mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par ni mi mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do/ /mar me dbul ba las de bzhin gshegs
<p>326b.4</p>pa la mchod pa'i bsam pas mar me tha na glog gi rgyun tsam mam/ tha na them skas kyi gzhi gcig tsam yang snang bar byed na/ de'i rnam par smin pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsam par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me phul na 'chi
<p>326b.5</p>ba'i tshe snang ba bzhi 'thob ste/ gang zhe na mdun na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang / zla ba 'char ba dang / lha'i 'khor gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /mchog tu rnyed par dkon pa ni lnga ste/ mir skye ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
<p>326b.6</p>rab tu 'byung ba dang / de la mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las/ byang chub sems dpa' nam yang 'gog pa'i snyom par 'jug pa la mi 'jug ste/ 'jug par de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
<p>326b.7</p>ma gnang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus dang skabs de ni phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi snying po la 'dun par 'gyur ba de ni de'i dus dang skabs yin no/ /'du shes dang tshor ba thams cad las bzla ba'i phyir de la
<p>327a</p>
<p>327a.1</p>snyoms par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis pa skor bar byed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad la ni/ snyoms par yang 'jug pa 'byung
<p>327a.2</p>sems can gang dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed du sems can rnams sam/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin la/ sbyin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' bsams te/ rjes su yi rangs nas
<p>327a.3</p>dge ba'i rtsa ba theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bsngo na/ de la bsod nams snga mas dpe dang char yang mi phod do/ /mi zhig chom rkun gyis ya nga ba las/ phyis de 'ongs pa ni bla'i bcom ste myur du
<p>327a.4</p>'ongs pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ring mo zhig ste mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni bla'i/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /gang pos gsol pa/ mi shes pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lags te/ sus kyang ma bskyed lags so/ /rgyu
<p>327a.5</p>tshogs shing 'dus pa las 'byung la rgyu ma mchis par gyur pas ni 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams ni rang gi ngang gis 'gags pas na sus kyang 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po 'di dag sgyu ma lta bur mi shes pas de dag las shas cher zhen par gyur te/ yongs su mi
<p>327a.6</p>gtong ba'i blor 'gyur/ yongs su mi gtong bas ser sna 'dzin to/ /ser sna des kyang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/ dngos po de dang 'brel par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug tu ni gnad la gnas par
<p>327a.7</p>ni ma gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar dogs pas te/ 'dod par skyes na myur du thams cad mkhyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po las/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de ni byang chub
<p>327b</p>
<p>327b.1</p>sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te thob pa'i mod la yang sa bcu thob par gyur la/ srog chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
<p>327b.2</p>to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya ba ha/ kha ba ha/ hu lu hu lu/ pad+ma b+he/ a ba ma ba me/ sa rA sa rA Ne/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba tA a
<p>327b.3</p>nu pA la Na/ yut+tot+tA ra Ni/ pa ra tsa kra ni bar Ni/ pu ra ya b+ha ga bA na/ sarba A sha na/ ma ma sarba karma k+Sha pa ya/ bud+d+ha a ti sha ne Na swAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nor dang 'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ pha
<p>327b.4</p>rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/ mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa tshe nur bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags kyi
<p>327b.5</p>tshig 'di dag smras so/ /na maH sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsarba bo d+hi satwA nAn/ na maHsarba ma harte ke b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ hu hu he he/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA badzra ma ti/ dr-i D+ha pa ra badzra ma ti/ ta thA ga ta/ a nu pa ri ba le Ti/ sa ra sa
<p>327b.6</p>ra a yo khi/ b+h+r-i ku Ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu khi/ kri pi kri pa lu ke /sa t+ya pA tsa na/ ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bAn/ badzra pA Ni sarba karma/ A pa ra Ni k+Sha ba ya/ sarba ar+tha ma pa ri pU rA ya/ de hi me ba ram/ bud+d+ha sa t+yen/ bo d+hi satwa sa t+ye na swA hA/ gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang / 
<p>327b.7</p>stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang / lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal ba des ni/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la/ nyin
<p>328a</p>
<p>328a.1</p>mtshan du smyung ba bgyis la/ gzugs bgyid du stsal te/ rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'od ma mda' rgyu'i mdog can dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhi ba'i tshul can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
<p>328a.2</p>bzhugs par bgyi'o/ /g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag ba bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go/ /g.yas g.yon dag tu ni rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod pa bgyid pa gzhag go/ /sgrub pa
<p>328a.3</p>po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing / dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bdug pa ni a ka ru dang / tsan+dan dang / pog dang gu gul dbul lo/ /lan sum
<p>328a.4</p>'bum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs brnyan bgyi ba lags so/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ dgon pa'i gnas su spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o/ /dkar
<p>328a.5</p>bag gi lha bshos kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rnam pa 'di yang yi ger 'drir stsal zhing gos dang rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / gdugs dang bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la
<p>328a.6</p>snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang / dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lci bas bskus la me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs par bgyis te/ bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag
<p>328a.7</p>par bgyi'o/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o/ /ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/ nam sku gzugs dang sa gzhi 'gul ba dang / bdag nyid kyang dga'
<p>328b</p>
<p>328b.1</p>bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas nges 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gi rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam bgyi'o/ /bsam pa thams cad kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa
<p>328b.2</p>bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma dad cing spang bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
<p>328b.3</p>spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba/ ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad lta bar byed/ rtog par byed/ tshim par byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin
<p>328b.4</p>par byed cing / snying rje'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /nam mkha' mdzod las/ byang chub sems
<p>328b.5</p>dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa nges pa'i don blta dka' ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa 'di kun chub
<p>328b.6</p>pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de dag bsod nams ci tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis/ bsod nams dpag tu med par gsungs/ /rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/ /rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni
<p>328b.7</p>rab phyed sku mnyam yang / /gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston/ /chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/ /
<p>329a</p>
<p>329a.1</p>byed med ngo bo nyid med kun du rtog las skyes/ /bde bar gshegs pa de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/ /byang chub mi 'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa brnyes/ /de la rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye
<p>329a.2</p>shes la mkhas shing / mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ci yang ma yin te/ gang rkyen la brten pa de dngos po med pa'o/ /gang rkyen la brten pa de
<p>329a.3</p>yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang rkyen la brten pa de/ bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes pa med/ shed bu med do/ /gang rkyen la brten pa de la yang dag par na gang yang skyes pa med do/ /chos
<p>329a.4</p>gang rkyen la brten pa de la spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir spros pa med pa ma spros pa ni/ skye ba ni yang chos nyid skye/ 'gag pa ni yang chos nyid 'gag /ces bya ste/ de la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ shed bu'i bar gang yang med do/ /chos gang rkyen las byung ba de dag
<p>329a.5</p>la bdag po med pa'i phyir skye ba gang yang med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang / rmi lam dang mig yor lta bu zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba la yang bskyed pa med/ 'gag pa la yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/ rkyen
<p>329a.6</p>rnams yod na skye ba dang / ma tshang na 'gag par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par nang gi chos rnams kyang skye ba la bskyed pa med/ 'gag pa la 'gog par byed pa med de/ /de ltar ye shes la rab tu sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes
<p>329a.7</p>bya ba ni rtag pa dang chad pa ste/ gang de la skye bar yang mi byed/ 'jig par yang mi byed do/ /gang skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de ni/ rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'o/ /de bas na dag pa ste/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa yin no/ /de ltar na rten cing 'brel par
<p>329b</p>
<p>329b.1</p>'byung ba dang / 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas shing / mthar lta ba thams cad dang 'brel ba yin no/ /theg pa chung ngu 'dod pa ni bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis rab tu gnyer/ /byang chub spyod
<p>329b.2</p>mchog yin par spyod par bgyi/ /'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /dper na nam mkha' la gnyen po med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la yang gnyen po med do/ /gang dag gnyen pos mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba de dag ni/ skye ba dang 'jig par lta ba
<p>329b.3</p>yin te/ chos 'di dag ni bskyed par bya zhes skye ba dang 'jig pa la spyod pas/ de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid mi shes so/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces shes par gyis shig /ma rtsod cig /rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi mchog
<p>329b.4</p>rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces gsungs so/ /dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa/ /bdud kyi pho nya bdud kyi phyogs/ /dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i/ /dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ngang tshul ngan pa sdig chos can/ /khyim pa dang ni rten cing gnas/ /bkur
<p>329b.5</p>sti dag dang rnyed la brkam/ /tshul 'di tshol bar mi byed do/ /'jig rten rgyang pan rnams dang 'dre/ /bdag la rab tu stod byed cing / /rab tu nges pa rnams la smod/ /mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung / /dgon pa'i gnas ri spangs nas su/ /rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dga'/ /'jig
<p>329b.6</p>rten pa yi gsang tshig brtson/ /'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/ /mi mkhas de dag dge 'dun la/ /zhal ta byed la rab tu brtson/ /mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du/ /mthun par dpyod par mi byed de/ /rang rang gis ni smra rnams la/ /de dag rtag tu mos par byed/ /dmigs pa
<p>329b.7</p>yis ni rab tu 'gying / /lta ba tha dad kun du gnas/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas/ /de dag g.yang sa bzhin du sems/ /'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na/ /don bcas yi ge ldan pa yin/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni/ /rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /chos rnams la
<p>330a</p>
<p>330a.1</p>ni gnas pa las/ /ded la 'dra ba'i chos rnams ni/ /ji lta bur na yod med ces/ /gshed ma dag kyang 'gyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/ /dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes/ /yang dag bskul ba thob pa dang / /mdo sde 'di la smon par
<p>330a.2</p>'gyur/ /rna ba dang ni sna chad rnams/ /me long bltas kyang mi sdug ces/ /yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang / /de dag dam chos smon par 'gyur/ /dge sbyong gang dag dam pa'i chos/ /rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur te/ /de dag gzhan du tshul 'chos kyang / /gang yang chos 'di
<p>330a.3</p>mi nyan to/ /rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar bgyi/ /skye bo phal chen 'byed 'gyur yang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni byin rlabs kyis/ /sems can de dag chos nyan 'gyur/ /dus de tshe na bdag cag rnams/ /sems can rnams la phan slad du/ /lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/ /
<p>330a.4</p>dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i las ni bzhi ste/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par zil gyis mnan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs
<p>330a.5</p>su bzung ba'o/ /las bzhi po de dag kyang las gcig gis yongs su bsdus te/ gang gis she na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha' las chos zab mo ston pa'i
<p>330a.6</p>tshigs su bcad pa mang po zhig grag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pas nam mkha' mdzod la smras pa/ sgra 'di dag ga las byung snyam bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ brag ca'i
<p>330a.7</p>sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ pha rol gyi sgra go bar byed pa las byung ngo / /smras pa/ brag ca las lus sam sems sam/ gzugs sam kha dog dang / dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ med pa de bzhin te/ brag ca ma grub kyang go bar byed pa de bzhin du nam mkha'
<p>330b</p>
<p>330b.1</p>ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ sgra 'di go bar byed pa su/ gang nas dbyangs 'di byung / smras pa/ ye shes kyi go bar byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ngas yid kyi sems pas bsams na/ bde bar snang ba 'di las byung yang
<p>330b.2</p>sems der 'gro ba yang med/ de 'di ltar 'ong ba yang med mod kyi/ sgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang / rgyu 'bras bu gru par mi 'pho la/ rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung
<p>330b.3</p>ba ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ rgyu rkyen las 'bras bu 'grub pa'i chos 'di gnyis ka yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do/ /gang de lta bu'i 'du ba shes pa de dag ni 'bral ba ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba
<p>330b.4</p>zhes gsungs so/ /gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa brgyad de gang zhe na/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag
<p>330b.5</p>med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas gzhogs slong mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba
<p>330b.6</p>dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pur dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dpa' ba mos pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu 'gro bar gsungs
<p>330b.7</p>te/ de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu song bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ chags pa med
<p>331a</p>
<p>331a.1</p>pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rig sa kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par
<p>331a.2</p>shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis/ rnam par rol cing zag pa med pa'i ye shes la yang rab tu gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi ni mi skyo ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang / dus dang dus
<p>331a.3</p>ma yin par bskul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su shes pa'o/ /yang bzhi ste/ bka' blo bde ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / ngang tshul mnyen pa dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ rnam pa gnyis dang
<p>331a.4</p>ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /gnyis ni mi sdug pa dang / sdug par so sor rtog pa'o/ /de la mi sdug pa ni kye ma lus 'di mi gtsang bas gang ba/ yun thung ba/ byis pa 'drid pa'o snyam mo/ /sdug pa ni lus 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ 
<p>331a.5</p>bsod nams kyi sku/ ye shes kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag pa med pa'i sku gzugs mthong na/ sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba thob par bya'o snyam mo/ /yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mi rtag pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam par ro/ /de la mi rtag pa'i
<p>331a.6</p>rnam par ni/ kye ma lus 'di mi rtag pa/ 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas/ lus kyi phyir ya nga bas mi 'tshe'o/ /rtag pa ni lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdud mi 'chad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs
<p>331a.7</p>su bskyab pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pas/ phyin ci log bzhi spong ste/ lus kyi gtsang ba spong / tshor bas bde ba/ sems kyis rtag pa/ chos kyis bdag tu phyin ci log pa spong ba'o/ /
<p>331b</p>
<p>331b.1</p>gser 'od dam pa las/ sku la rus pa khrag med na/ /ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /thabs kyi ring bsrel gzhag pa mdzad/ /skabs gzhan dag tu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag
<p>331b.2</p>pa zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa ste/ sems can rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'o/ /de la gang zhig mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa
<p>331b.3</p>de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ mi khom pa brgyad yongs su spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi stor ba dang / bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel ba dang / 'khor ba las myur
<p>331b.4</p>du 'da' zhing 'khor ba'i 'ching bas glags par mi 'gyur ba'i spyod pa dam pa 'di yin pas khyed kyis nan tan du sgrub cing g.yel ba med par bya'o/ /de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid tsam du gnas pa de ni/ chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/ /sku snga ma gnyis
<p>331b.5</p>ni btags pa tsam mo/ /chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste/ sku de nyid kyi gzhi byed do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dper na rnam par
<p>331b.6</p>rtog pa'i sems la brten nas/ nyon mongs pa dang las dang 'bras bu rnam pa mang po ston pa bzhin du/ chos kyi chos nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ theg pa gsum gyi chos rnams sna tshogs ston to/ /dper na nyi ma dang zla ba
<p>331b.7</p>la yang rtog pa med/ chu dang me long la yang rtog pa med/ snang ba la yang rtog pa med mod kyi/ gsum 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/ smon lam
<p>332a</p>
<p>332a.1</p>gyi dbang gis sems can skal ba can dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku yang nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na tshad med grangs med pa'i chu dang
<p>332a.2</p>me long dag ni snang ba la brten nas stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag snang ngo / /stong pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i skus ni 'khor rnams la chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par
<p>332a.3</p>smon lam gyi dbang gis sku de gnyis snang ste/ mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang yang chos kyi sku'i gnas pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu sku de nyid la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya
<p>332a.4</p>ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs so/ /chos kyi sku la gnas te/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs so/ /sku 'di gsum la brten nas/ sangs rgyas rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu sangs
<p>332a.5</p>rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku ni so so'i skye bo'i yid dang mthun par rnam pa mang pos mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'i phyir mang po zhes bya'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa gcig pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir gcig ces bya'o/ /chos kyi sku ni mtshan
<p>332a.6</p>ma sna tshogs las yang dag par 'das pa mtshan mar gzung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste/ de bas na gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu sprul pa'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te snang ngo / /longs spyod rdzogs
<p>332a.7</p>pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku la brten te snang ngo / /chos kyi sku yang dag pa ste ci la yang mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu sku de gsum ni rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod/ mi rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod do/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang
<p>332b</p>
<p>332b.1</p>so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos brgyad cu/ gser dang chu dang nam mkha' dag dri ma dang rnyog pa dang sprin dang bral na gser la sogs pa med pa yin pa bzhin du/ chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag
<p>332b.2</p>pa zhes bya ba'i sku nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no/ /rnam par rtog pa yod par snang yang ngo bo nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa yang med do/ /gsum du bgrang ba yod mod kyi/ dngos po gsum du yang med de 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa de ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma
<p>332b.3</p>dang smig rgyu lta bu ste/ gzung ba yang med 'dzin pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba ste/ /yang dag ma yin yongs su
<p>332b.4</p>rtog las byung / /grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag ches 'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/ /gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi
<p>332b.5</p>'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang ba brtsegs
<p>332b.6</p>pa'i gzungs las/ yongs su brtags pa yin pa'i phyir brtags pa yang stong pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyang stong pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa'o/ /glo bur du rgyu
<p>332b.7</p>dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo / /de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de
<p>333a</p>
<p>333a.1</p>ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gcig cing tha mi dad pas gzugs kyi lus mtha' yas pa'i
<p>333a.2</p>sgo kun du ston pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi lha'i bu mo bzang mo'i dbugs gcig
<p>333a.3</p>gis lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra yan lag brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i nga ro 'byung ste/ sgra de byung ba ni sgra rnam pa tha dad pa brgya phrag stong gi dbyangs su grag go/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gcig 'byung yang sems can gyi bsam pa
<p>333a.4</p>bzhin tshad med pa'i sgra rnam par grag go/ /dper na 'og gi chu'i phung po nye bar bzung ba yan chad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad nam mkha' la gnas te/ gzugs med pa la
<p>333a.5</p>spyod pa'i sems can gyi gnas dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi gnas ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' la gnas shing / nam mkha'i dbyings las byung ba'o/ /dper na ri mo'i gzhi chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam
<p>333a.6</p>zhig yod par gyur la/ gzhi de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po ril gyis rdzogs par bris te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang gi tshad dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang gi
