<p>333a.7</p>tshad la sogs pa de'i tshad du bris la/ ri mo'i gzhi de rdul phra rab gcig gi nang du chud par byas pa sems can gang gis kyang mthong ba'am/ shes par ma gyur la 'phrul gyi mig can 'ga' zhig gis mthong nas/ rdul de phye ste sems can la bstan te
<p>333b</p>
<p>333b.1</p>phan btags pa zhig yod na/ de dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ril gyis chud par gnas pa byis pas mi shes pas mi shes pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs
<p>333b.2</p>pas byis pa'i 'du shes kyi mdud pa bkrol nas/ ye shes khong du chud cing mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ dpe 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba shes par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/ byams ma'i bu gang po
<p>333b.3</p>ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nang na song med/ bud med kyang med do/ /sems can de dag thams cad rdzus te skye bar tshangs par spyod pa yid las byung ba'i lus 'od rang la yod pa/ 
<p>333b.4</p>rdzu 'phrul can nam mkha' la 'gro ba lus gser gyi mdog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par 'gyur ba'o/ /skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la/ bzang skyong / dkon mchog 'byung gnas/ ded dpon bzang po/ /mis byin/ phug sbas/ chus byin/ dbang pos byin/ bla ma'i blo gros/ khyad
<p>333b.5</p>par blo gros/ 'phel ba'i blo gros/ mthong ba don yod/ shin tu yang dag zhugs/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ dpe med blo gros/ nyi ma'i snying po/ sa 'dzin/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi zham ring ba dang lhan cig tu bdag dang gcig gam bdag dang gnyis mi mjed kyi
<p>333b.6</p>'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che'i shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur to/ /bai DUr+ya'i gzhi la rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra bas bres/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna
<p>333b.7</p>tshogs bkram pa/ gser gyi skud pas mig mangs ris su bres par gyur te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang med par gyur/ ri nag po yang med par gyur/ btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen
<p>334a</p>
<p>334a.1</p>po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rab kyang med par gyur/ ri rab chen po dang / ri gzhan yang med par gyur/ rgya mtsho yang med par gyur/ 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu chen po yang med par yongs su gnas par gyur to/ /lha
<p>334a.2</p>dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyang med par gyur/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med par gyur to/ /'di ltar de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'khor 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
<p>334a.3</p>'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bkod par gyur te/ gang dag 'khor der 'dus pa de dag ma gtogs so/ /'du shes phyin ci log las byung bar de ltar 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu chos thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa
<p>334a.4</p>'dis gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la gnas pa yin no/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'chad 'dod chos smra bas/ /g.yo dang nga rgyal de bzhin 'phya ba dag /ma lus par ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /de bzhin mkhas pas phrag dog gzhan mi bya/ /
<p>334a.5</p>nam du su la 'ang mi snyan brjod mi bya/ /lta bas rtsod pa nam yang mi bya'o/ /bla med ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes/ /the tshom gnas ni nams kyang mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i mchog ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtha'o/ /chos kyi
<p>334a.6</p>rnam grangs thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs
<p>334a.7</p>'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi mjed 'dir bstan pa la sogs par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdams su gsol zhes bya ba dang / bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis bya ci dgos/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na ngas
<p>334b</p>
<p>334b.1</p>smin par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed yod de de dag ston pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig sa rum nas 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
<p>334b.2</p>mang dang / shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu nas gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sa rum nas 'thon nas bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu rdzogs par 'das kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
<p>334b.3</p>la phyag 'tshal zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam pa du mas bstod do/ /bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la cang mi smra bar 'khod
<p>334b.4</p>par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis phyi dro gcig kho na snyam du shes so/ /rtag tu nga byin rlabs de
<p>334b.5</p>'dra ste/ /bskal pa bsam yas bye ba stong du ni/ /bya rgod phung po 'di las mi 'pho yang / /gud na 'ang bye ba snyed kyi mal cha yod/ /gang tshe 'jig rten khams 'di sems can gyi/ /bskal pas bsreg par mthong zhing rtog pa ni/ /de tshe nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di
<p>334b.6</p>ni/ /lha dang mi yis yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ /de dag rtse zhing dga' ba sna tshogs ldan/ /skyed mos khang bzangs gzhal med che ba yod/ /rin chen ri bo rnams dang de bzhin du/ /me tog 'bras ldan shing ljon rnams kyis brgyan/ /steng nas lha rnams rnga chen rab tu brdung / /
<p>334b.7</p>man+dA ra yi char kyang rab tu 'bebs/ /mkhas pa gzhan gang byang chub 'dir zhugs dang / /nga dang nyan thos rnams las mngon par 'thob/ /nga yi zhing 'di de ltar rtag gnas kyang / /gzhan dag 'di la bskal pas bsreg par rtog /mya ngan brgya yis gang zhing
<p>335a</p>
<p>335a.1</p>gtses pa dang / /'jig rten khams ni shin tu 'jigs par mthong / /lo mang bye bar de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /chos dang nga yi dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi/ /ming ni nams kyang thos par mi 'gyur te/ /sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu de
<p>335a.2</p>'dra'o/ /nam zhig sems can 'jam zhing mnyen pa rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'dir ni skyes gyur te/ /dge ba'i las kyis de ltar skyes ma thag /da ni chos rnams rab tu 'chad par mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe dpag tu med/ /mya ngan las 'da' bar
<p>335a.3</p>bstan pa thams cad yin par bshad pa'i rjes la bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed pa de'i tshe/ de'i lhag pa'i
<p>335a.4</p>bsam pa'i mtshan nyid 'di yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis blta ba dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na 'dug
<p>335a.5</p>cing chos ston par mthong ba dang / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi bai DUr+ya las grub cing mnyam par gnas la/ gser skud mig mangs ris su bres shing rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar mthong ba dang / 
<p>335a.6</p>'di ni yongs su spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gnas par mthong ba ste/ ma pham pa 'di ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o/ /rigs
<p>335a.7</p>kyi bu dag mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo'i gnas thams cad ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag
<p>335b</p>
<p>335b.1</p>par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rkang pa'i mthe bong 'bar bar bya'o/ /lag pa'i sor mo'am/ rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam/ yan lag gcig gam/ lag pa 'bar bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la
<p>335b.2</p>zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ni bsod nams 'du byed pa ches mang du bskyed kyi/ rgyal srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtang ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i
<p>335b.3</p>mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag glang po che dkar po mche ba drug pa
<p>335b.4</p>'tshal te der mchi'o/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ bsti stang du byas btsun par byas te/ nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub
<p>335b.5</p>sems dpa' la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar bshad do/ /nam mkha'i spyan las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la bslab pa'i
<p>335b.6</p>khrims su bca' ba 'cha' bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang zag gnod mi bkur ba rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / ngo tsha shes pa rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / tshe 'di'i zag pa rnams spang ba'i phyir dang / tshe phyi ma'i
<p>335b.7</p>zag pa rnams bsdams pa'i phyir dang / nga'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gang zag lam gol bar zhugs pa kha cig la ni lus dub pa spyad pa'i chad pa bca'o/ /kha cig la ni yid du mi 'ong ba dang 'phrad pa'i chad pa'o/ /kha cig la ni mtshams
<p>336a</p>
<p>336a.1</p>kyi phyi rol du dbyung zhing tha dad du gnas par bya ba'i chad pa'o/ /kha cig la ni dge slong gi tha mar gzhag pa'i chad pa'o/ /kha cig la ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thams cad la bsnyil zhing smad par 'os pa'i chad pa bcad de/ rgyal rigs da
<p>336a.2</p>ltar byung pa khyed dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab pa khrims su bca' ba gtod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la/ gang zag lam gol ba/ gdul dka' ba/ ngo tsha dang / khrel spangs pa/ 
<p>336a.3</p>spyod pa ma dag pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang dag nye du'i stobs sam/ nor gyi stobs sam/ khyim pa'i dpung ngam/ mang du thos pa'i stobs sam/ kha stobs kyis bslab pa dag la skyon yod par spyod cing / khyim na gnas pa'i rtags dang / khyim gyi
<p>336a.4</p>longs spyod dag la snang la yongs su gzung ba bsdus pa de dag dge slong don nyung ngu rnams kyis myur du dge 'dun gyi nang nas bskrad pa dang / bslab pa ji ltar bcad pa bzhin chad pas gcad par mi nus pas/ de dag bslab pa'i khrims su
<p>336a.5</p>bca' ba bzhin bya bar rgyal rigs kyi lag tu gtad de/rgyal rigs de dag gang zag de lta bu rnams la ji ltar khrims bcas pa bzhin chad pas gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i bar du de lta bu'i
<p>336a.6</p>brtson pa dang / pha rol gnon pas nga'i bstan pa bsrung zhing yongs su skyong ba dang / chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba yin te/ lha rnams kyang bsrung
<p>336a.7</p>zhing yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs de dag ni rgyal srid kyang yun ring du byed du 'jug go/ /bsod nams kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bskal pa brgyar byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs
<p>336b</p>
<p>336b.1</p>pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa yal bar 'dor zhing 'dug pa'i rgyal rigs de dag ni lha thams cad kyis bor ba yin/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gtang ba yin te/ rgyal rigs de ni 'jig rten pha rol tu phyin pa lha dang mir skye ba yang med do/ /
<p>336b.2</p>gang nga'i bstan pa yal bar 'dor ba de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod par zhugs pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma gsad par zhugs pa yin/ chos kyi chu bskam par zhugs pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig 'byin par zhugs pa yin
<p>336b.3</p>no/ /rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/ gang zag gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed na/ gang zag de bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma blags te 'di skad ces gsol
<p>336b.4</p>to/ /gang zag de ni bsod nams ma lags pa zla ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa/ tshad ma mchis pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bas rgyal rigs gang dag da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i
<p>336b.5</p>bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'bar gyi bar du gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams mi srun zhing lam gol ba la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams chos bzhin mi slob pa de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du
<p>336b.6</p>'phel bar 'gyur te/ rgyal rigs des snga ma bskal ba brgyar sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs pa nas shes rab bsgoms pa'i bar du gyur la/ theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis zhugs par gyur na/ yang dam pa'i chos yal
<p>336b.7</p>bar 'dor ba'i rgyus de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa de dag thams cad yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul du chos gsum du yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lo nyes dang / 'thab mo dang / nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lhas kyang yal bar 'dor
<p>337a</p>
<p>337a.1</p>zhing btang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul du bka' mi brtsan zhing g.yo dang slu ba dang / brdzun sna tshogs kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi dmag gis kyang de'i nor gyi phung po phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mes tshig par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>337a.2</p>yang na chus khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs de ring por mi thogs par nad tshab po ches thebs nas/ sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shi nas kyang dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya la res 'ga' zhig ring mo zhig na/ legs par spyad pas
<p>337a.3</p>mi nyid thob na myur du mig med pa dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nyam nga bar gnas shing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /shi nas yang dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnas ma yin pa yongs su
<p>337a.4</p>brtags pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe yang mi lus mi 'thob po/ /rgyal rigs ji ltar bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dag kyang de bzhin te/ grong khyer gyi gtso bo'am/ yul gyi gtso bo'am/ ri khrod kyi gtso bo'am/ ljongs kyi gtso bo yang rung / gang zhig bag med
<p>337a.5</p>pa'i rgyu'am/ nor gyi phyir nga'i bstan pa la chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag rnams ci nus kyis mi slu zhing lam gol ba la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams chos bzhin dang 'dul ba bzhin tshar mi gcod pa de thams cad las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>337a.6</p>rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs rnams kyis mi nyid 'thob pa ni dka' lags te/ gang dag myos shing bag ma mchis par mang du gnas la/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du
<p>337a.7</p>gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos la gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams mchod gnas su mi bgyid pa dang / lam gol ba la gnas pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba rnams
<p>337b</p>
<p>337b.1</p>chos dang mthun pa'i chad pas mi 'gums pa de dag ni phung bar 'gyur lags so/ /lha'i bu skya rengs ni smon lam gyi dbang gis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skyes te/ de nyi ma'i mdun dpag tshad khris bcad nas 'gro'o/ /de'i gzhal med khang ni
<p>337b.2</p>dpag tshad nyi shu pa'o/ /de nyin mtshan gcig la gling bzhi dang bar gyi gling brgyad khri dang / klu'i gling drug khri dang / lha ma yin gyi gling bzhi khri dang / nam mkha' lding gi gling brgya dang / mi'am ci'i gling lnga stong nyis brgya dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gling bzhi stong
<p>337b.3</p>drug brgya dang / grul bum gyi gling brgyad brgya dang / yi dgas kyi gling brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po'i gling sum stong dag tu gling re re zhing yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong mang po dag yongs su smin par byed do/ /
<p>337b.4</p>'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nang shar phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho chen po ni bai DUr+ya 'ba' zhig gi ri ar+Na pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni chu'i nang nas dpag tshad nyi shu gyen du 'phags so/ /ri de la ri phug shin tu bkra ba zhes bya ba sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas nas gnas/ 
<p>337b.5</p>'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba zhig yod de/ phug de na dzan dur gnas so/ /de ni nyan thos dang thun mong gi byams pa legs par sbyang bar byas pa yin no/ /ri phug gnyis pa a ma ra zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/ phug de na rta'i
<p>337b.6</p>gnas so/ /ri phug gsum pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba zhig yod de/ phug de na phyugs gnas so/ /ri de la shing gi lha rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / srin mo chen mo mgrin bzangs ma zhes bya ba gnas te/ gnyis ka
<p>337b.7</p>yang 'khor lnga stong lnga stong dang bcas par dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de gsum gyi sbyin bdag byed cing nyin mtshan rtag tu bkur sti bya bar brtson no/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di na lho phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho na shel 'ba' zhig gi ri skye bo'i dpal zhes bya ba yod do/ /
<p>338a</p>
<p>338a.1</p>de ni chu'i nang nas dpag tshad nyi shu gyen du 'phags so/ /ri de la ri phug mdog bzangs zhes bya ba rgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad re re la spre'u gnas/ ri phug gnyis pa spra ba'i han bzang po zhes bya ba rgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad
<p>338a.2</p>re re ba la khyim bya gnas/ ri phug gsum pa d+harma pa ha zhes bya brgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad re re ba la khyi gnas/ ri de la sbyin gnas srin mo snang ba dang / nye snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang gnas te sbyin bdag byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i
<p>338a.3</p>nang na gser 'ba' zhig gi ri byang chub kyi zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas dpag tshad nyi shu nas gyen du 'phags so/ /ri de la ri phug mi lan tra zhes bya ba la 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba la phag gnas so/ /phug gnyis pa dri dpal zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re
<p>338a.4</p>re ba la byi ba gnas/ phug gsum pa ud+ma shrI zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba la glang gnas/ ri de la srin mo chen mo legs srung zhes bya ba dang / be'u su rA k+Sha zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang / ri de rlung lha g.yog pa zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang bcas pa
<p>338a.5</p>snga ma bzhin sbyin bdag byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang byang phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho na 'dzam bu chu bo 'ba' zhig gi ri tog dpal gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ de ni dpag tshad nyi shu chu nas gyen du 'phags so/ /ri de la ri phug a ru na gen go la zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la seng ge
<p>338a.6</p>gnas/ phug gnyis pa laM ka ra zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la ri bong gnas/ phug gsum pa dga' bar 'byung zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la sbrul gnas/ ri de la srin mo dung can ma zhes bya ba dang / sha ta drang srung zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang / chu lha 'bebs byed ces bya ba 'khor
<p>338a.7</p>snga ma snyed dang / gnas snga ma bzhin yon bdag byed do/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bcu gnyis po de dag ni bsod nams che bskal ba che ba yin no/ /smon lam gyi dbang gis nyin mtshan re re zhing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /byi ba dang / ga ba dang / stag
<p>338b</p>
<p>338b.1</p>dang / ri bong dang / glang po dang / dzan du dang / rta dang / pa shu dang / spre'u dang / khyim bya dang / khyi dang / phag ste/ de dag ni lha dang mi'i mchod pa yon tan thob pa yin no/ /skad cig ma dang po la ma'i mngal du sa bon gyi rnam par shes ba nur nur por gnas par 'gyur te/ 
<p>338b.2</p>dper na yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi chung ngu'o/ /zhag bdun pa drug pa la/ nur nur por gyur nas/ mer mer por 'gyur te/ dper na rgya shug gi sa bon tsam du chung ba'i zhag bdun pa las mer mer por gyur nas nar nar bor 'gyur te star ga tsam mo/ /zhag bdun pa brgyad pa la nar
<p>338b.3</p>nar por gyur nas/ gor gor por 'gyur te bil ba'i 'bras bu tsam mo/ /de nas zhag bdun thal nas zhag bdun pa bcu gsum gyi bar du mgo'i mtshan ma dang / lag pa dang brla dang gnas kyi mtshan ma dag dod par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun pa nyi shu pa la pho dang mo'i mtshan ma dod par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun pa nyi shu
<p>338b.4</p>rtsa gcig pa la rus pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun pa sum cu pa la yan lag thams cad dang / khrag dang / pags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga kun rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma'i lto na khrag dang dri mi zhim pa'i nang na gnas so/ /gang ma'i lto na gnas pa na tshe rabs
<p>338b.5</p>snga ma dran nas mchog tu skyo bar 'gyur te/ bdag ma'i lto 'di nas nam 'byung zhig gu/ phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba dag la brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa brtan por bya'o snyam pa las bcas pa dang / ma'i lus kyis gzir ba dang / sa'i reg
<p>338b.6</p>pa dang / lag pa'i reg pa dang / dri ma bkru ba'i sdug bsngal lus dang sems la mchog tu gnas pa dag gis tshe rabs snga ma ril brjed do/ /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po nas/ sha za'i dbang po'i bar nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sa la rgyu ba thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu
<p>338b.7</p>gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ltar 'tshal te/ ma mchis pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar shing ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams rnam pa thams cad du yongs
<p>339a</p>
<p>339a.1</p>su 'dzin pa ma mchis pas chos la mngon par dga' ba de srid du/ bdag cag gis rang gi sug las btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar 'tshal lo/ /chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyis phyug pa yon tan
<p>339a.2</p>phun sum tshogs pa dag dang / de dag gi 'khor dang yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang bar 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams rnam pa thams cad du yongs su 'dzin pa
<p>339a.3</p>ma mchis par chos la gnas shing chos dang mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa de sring sa'i mdangs dang / sems can gyi mdangs dang / chos kyi mdangs nub par mi 'gyur bar gnas lags so/ /de srid du lha dang / klu da nga / gnod sbyin rnams mi'i 'jig rten 'dir mngon par
<p>339a.4</p>dga' lags so/ /de srid du sems can rnams shi 'phos nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du dbang che bar grags pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /de srid du lha rnams kyi nang na sems can dbang che bar grags pa dag gis gang bar 'gyur lags so/ /de srid du byang
<p>339a.5</p>chub sems dpa' chos kyis gnas pa rnams gnas lags so/ /de srid du bdag cag gi stobs dang brtson pa 'di ltar chos ma lags pa'i phyogs tshar dgum par pha rol gnon par 'gyur lags so/ /de srid du sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>339a.6</p>bstan pa la dad par bgyi bar rngo thogs lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i chos kyis gnas pa'i dgon pa dang / 
<p>339a.7</p>nags mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal bor ba/ phrag dog can la sogs pa/ mang pos gnas pa/ bslab pa dang ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba/ khyim pa dang 'dre ba/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags te/ de dag khyim pa'i dpung dang
<p>339b</p>
<p>339b.1</p>nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyis phan tshun snyems shing 'thab mo la dga' bas khyim pa rnams kyi mdun du yang rtsod cing tshig rtsub mo dang / brdzun dag mi srung lags so/ /de'i tshe khyim pa rgyal rigs dang bram ze nas ljongs dang / yul na gnas pa'i bar rnams bcom
<p>339b.2</p>ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la che thong du ma dad par 'gyur zhing / gang dag bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa de dag kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur lags so/ /dkar po'i phyogs zad pa'i dus de lta bu nye bar gnas pan/ byang chub sems
<p>339b.3</p>dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang thugs dgyes shing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu gshegs so/ /lha dang gnod sbyin chos kyis gnas pa dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyang btang snyoms su gnas pa'am/ de nas 'ong bar 'gyur lags te/ 
<p>339b.4</p>de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis sdig pa can gyi gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po nas sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyi bar bzlog pa'i rdo yang mi thogs la/ de'i tshe bdag cag gis dkar po'i phyogs zad pa dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog pa'i rngo mi thogs
<p>339b.5</p>lags so/ /dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las/ sems can rnams ni gzhan gyi dbang du yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du sgro btags nas/ gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo
<p>339b.6</p>nyid rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/ ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad btags pas sems yongs su sgom zhing tha snyad btags pa'i rjes su 'brel pa'am/ tha snyad btags pa'i bag la nyal gyis gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags
<p>339b.7</p>pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen to/ /ji lta ji ltar mngon par zhen pa de lta de lta bur gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des phyi ma la gzhan gyi dbang gis ngo bo nyid rab tu bskyed do/ /gzhi des na
<p>340a</p>
<p>340a.1</p>nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum gyis kun nas nyon mongs shing / 'gro ba ris ldar 'khor zhing kun du rgyu ste 'khor ba las mi 'da'o/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig lan cig 'byung bar gyur na rnam par rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa
<p>340a.2</p>mig gi rnam par shes pa dang spyod yul mthun pa gcig kyang lan cig 'byung ngo / /gal te lan gcig gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang / lan cig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga rnams 'byung bar gyur na yang de la rnam par rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa/ 
<p>340a.3</p>rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang spyod yul mthun pa gcig kyang lan cig 'byung ngo / /byams pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la rnam pa thams cad du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i kun brtags pa'i
<p>340a.4</p>mtshan nyid dang / shin tu bral ba de la de yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po la stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /nyi ma'i snying po las/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang / 
<p>340a.5</p>byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal ba dang / nyan thos mang po gnas shing / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ rjes su bstan pa chen po yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di sngon gyi yang dag
<p>340a.6</p>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do/ /ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongs su gtad de/ 'di yang spro bar 'gyur zhing gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnal 'byor yid la mngon par brtson pa dag yongs su smin par
<p>340a.7</p>'gyur ro/ /gang dag gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lhas gsol ba de lta lags so/ /ba long spyod kyi gling na rdul gyi ri la
<p>340b</p>
<p>340b.1</p>drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'phel bal chad khyir gtad/ lus 'phags kyi gling na ni ba lang gi na'i ri la drang srong 'byung ba klu'i rgyal po zla srung la gtad/ sgra mi snyan gyi gling na rgyal dga'i ri la spos brtsegs klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs
<p>340b.2</p>pa'i khab la gtad/ ba lang spyod kyi gling na 'od zer 'byung ba klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo la gtad/ shar phyogs gling na pad+ma shing n+ya gro d+ha lta bu klu'i rgyal po dbyibs stong la gtad/ sgra mi snyan gyi gling na spos brtsegs 'od zer klu'i rgyal po gnas na rgyu la gtad/ rgya mtsho
<p>340b.3</p>chen po'i nang na nor bu'i snying po'i 'od 'phro ba klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la gtad/ ri rab kyi rtse mo na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i snying po klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la gtad/ 'dzam bu'i gling na dga' 'phel zhes bya ba na gnas brtan gyi phug
<p>340b.4</p>klu'i rgyal po che sbyang la gtad/ yangs pa can na shin tu brtan klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la gtad/ ser skya'i gnas na gser sgron dri zhim klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la gtad/ yul ma ga d+hA na rgyal chen klu'i rgyal po ri bos byin la gtad/ bcom brlag
<p>340b.5</p>na sdug pa'i sprin klu'i rgyal po ce spyang rgyu ba la gtad/ yul 'khor ko sa la na rgyal ba dag pa klu'i rgyal po srin bu la gtad/ phug gi pha rol na btang bzung bden pa'i dri klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la gtad/ yul 'khor sa 'dzin na mthong ba'i lam rgyags
<p>340b.6</p>klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab las gtad/ kha che'i yul na gur gum gyi rtse mo klu'i rgyal po hu lu hu lu la gtad/ yul chu len na 'od zer bye ba'i snying po klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba la gtad/ rgya yul na sred med kyi bu'i 'od kyi rgyal po rgya mtshos byin la gtad/ kha sha'i
<p>340b.7</p>yul na sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs na/ go ma sA la gan d+ha ni klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin la gtad/ de gal te phyogs thams cad du lta bar byed na thams cad du nam mkha' thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur
<p>341a</p>
<p>341a.1</p>ro/ /chung ngur lta bar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa chung ngu nyid du mthong ngo / /tshad med par lta bar byed na tshad med par mthong ngo / /de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga las gshegs snyam mo/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin
<p>341a.2</p>gshegs pa ni ga las kyang ma gshegs so/ /gang du yang mi bzhud do/ /de gang du yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa mi dmigs byon pa mi dmigs so/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus kyi rgyu khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam pas sus ji ltar rnam par brtags
<p>341a.3</p>pa de bzhin du mthong ngo / /bdag gis rang gi sems kyis sangs rgyas su byed do/ /bdag gi sems kyis sangs rgyas mthong ngo / /bdag gi sems nyid sangs rgyas so/ /bdag gi sems nyid lus so/ /sems nyid kyang nam mkha'o/ /bdag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pas sangs rgyas mthong ngo / /sems
<p>341a.4</p>kyis sems mi mthong ngo / /sems su 'du shes pa rnams ni shes pa med pa'o/ /sems su 'du shes pa rnams ni ldan pa'o/ /ldog pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /chos de dag ni shes pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par ma byung ba'o/ /sus sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed cing shes rab gang
<p>341a.5</p>gis stong pa rtogs pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o snyam nas/ dmigs pa yid la byed pa des da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /'on kyang yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yin te/ de ltar mtshan ma med pa'i gzugs thams cad rnam par
<p>341a.6</p>bsgoms pas nges par 'byed pa yongs su dag pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su dag pa yin/ ma rig pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /mdo sde rab tu rnam par 'byed pa las/ shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i lam dang bying ba 'thab mo 'dzin pas bdag
<p>341a.7</p>dang gzhan yang phung bar byed pa de lta bus 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis myur du nub par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di lung bstan te/ shA ri'i
<p>341b</p>
<p>341b.1</p>bu rnyed pa dang bkur stis ni chos 'dul ba 'di myur du nub par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu dge slong chos yongs su ma dag pa ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa mi shes par gzhan dag las chos ston par byed do/ /de de bzhin gshegs pas sems can med pa
<p>341b.2</p>dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos bstan pa de dag la bdag go zhe'am/ sems can no zhe'am/ gso ba'o zhe'am/ gang zag go zhes chos ston par byed do/ /des ni nga la yang skur pa btab pa yin/ chos kyang spangs pa yin/ dge 'dun
<p>341b.3</p>la yang mi snyan par brjod pa yin te/ de'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis shes par nus pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu khyod mos par bya/ khong du chud par bya/ chos yongs su ma dag par
<p>341b.4</p>ston pa'i dge slong de/ mi dge ba'i brtson pa ji tsam dang ldan pa de'i bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'ga' zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling
<p>341b.5</p>gi sems can rnams bsad na de gzhi des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas par mi 'gyur ram/ gsol pa mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi shes par gzhan dag la chos yongs su ma dag par ston
<p>341b.6</p>pa de ni de bas kyang chos mi dge ba mang du mngon par 'dus byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong ba des ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skur pa btab pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon dang ma
<p>341b.7</p>'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kho na ston cing bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos ston to/ /shA ri'i bu
<p>342a</p>
<p>342a.1</p>sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos bstan pa 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rang gi ngang gis 'jig pa ngo bo nyid med pa dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid do/ /
<p>342a.2</p>sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po byung ste/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung ni rgyas par byas te/ dper na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga ji lta ba bzhin no/ /dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgyar gnas par gyur te/ dper na ma 'ongs pa'i dus
<p>342a.3</p>na nga'i ji lta ba bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig /chos dkon mchog gcig /dge 'dun dkon mchog gcig go/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ni bstan pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>342a.4</p>shA ri'i bu gang yang bstan pa 'di la bdud sdig can dge slong gi gzugs su sprul nas/ log par 'dzin pa rnam pa du mar rab tu ston cing skye bo mang po de la 'god pa'i dus de dang de yod do/ /de la 'di lta bu'i log par 'dzin pa yang dag par rab tu ston
<p>342a.5</p>to/ /'di lta ste/ yid kyi gzhi dang lnga cha mthun pa'i gzhi dang skad cig ma dang cha mthun pa'i gzhi dang / thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhi dang / gang zag gi gzhi dang / dmigs pa'i gzhi'o/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyis rab tu ma bstan pa
<p>342a.6</p>log par 'dzin pa de lta bu rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nga ni sbrul ro myags pa'am/ khyi ro myags pa'am/ mi ro myags pas gang ba'i sa phyogs spyod lam gang yang rung bas gnas par spro'i/ shA ri'i bu dge slong tshul khrims 'chal
<p>342a.7</p>pa/ cho ga nyams pa/ 'tsho ba nyams pa/ lta ba nyams pa ni mtshan gcig gam/ nyin gcig gam/ skad cig gam/ tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam yang gnas par mi spro'o/ /shA ri'i bu blun po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo
<p>342b</p>
<p>342b.1</p>sde 'di lta bu thos nas skrag par 'gyur/ kun du skrag par 'gyur/ kun du dngang bar 'gyur/ g.yang sa'i 'du shes su 'gyur/ g.yangs sa chen po'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di las tshul khrims 'chal pa'i skyon ma lus par bshad pas so/ /shA ri'i bu rgyu gang dang rkyen gang
<p>342b.2</p>gis tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spyod pas na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o/ /tshig ngag gi spyod pa dang / dus gsum gyi spyod pa dang / las kyi mtha' mang po'i spyod pa dang / smra ba mang po'i spyod pa dang / gnyid la dga' ba dang / 'du 'dzi
<p>342b.3</p>la dga' ba dang / spros pa la dga' ba dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i gtam ma yin pa zer ba dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / dge slong dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / sman dpyad kyi tha snyad byed pa dang / 
<p>342b.4</p>khyim sun 'byin pa dang / pho nyar 'gro ba dang / khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la dga' ba dang / khyim pa dang 'dre ba dang / khyim pa'i g.yog byed pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'joms pa dang / lo nyi shur ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang / yan lag
<p>342b.5</p>ma tshang ba bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'bru rjen len pa dang / sha rjen len pa dang / gser dngul len pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / spyod lam lhod pa dang / sran chung ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dad pa chung ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid mang ba dang / 
<p>342b.6</p>'gyod pa mang ba dang / khro ba dang / g.yo sgyu mang ba dang / phrag dog che ba dang / ngo tsha ba dang / khrel med pa dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khengs pa dang / 'gying ba dang / kha zas rgyags pa dang / sems mi zhum pas rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal bdun dang / ngan g.yo dang / 
<p>342b.7</p>kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong dang / thob kyis 'jal ba dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi mnga' ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang / tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa dang / tshe phyi ma la ched cher mi 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang
<p>343a</p>
<p>343a.1</p>yid gnyis mang bas na/ tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las mi gtsang ba dang / 'tsho ba mi gtsang ba dang ldan pa de dag ni phyis dang 'dra 'o/ /de dag ni lus zhig ste/ shi nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu
<p>343a.2</p>skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang / dge ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spang bar bya ste/ dper na mi gtsang ba'i snod kyi nang du tsan+dan dmar po bcug na/ de yang mi gtsang bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /'bum pa las/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
<p>343a.3</p>yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
<p>343a.4</p>chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
<p>343a.5</p>'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das zhing / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do/ /'bum pa'i TI ka las/ bcu gnyis pa ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan
<p>343a.6</p>zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi stobs bskyed pa dang / bdag nyid yon tan rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byas shing / rtsol ba chung ngus sa dang po thob par byas nas 'phral kho nar chen po 'bad mi dgos par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
<p>343a.7</p>te/ dus ji srid kyi bar du bstan pa gnas par byed do/ /shan+ta de bas bshad pa/ gal te gnyen por byar yod na/ /de la ci phyir yid mi bde/ /ci ste gnyen por byar med na'ang / /de la ci phyir yid mi bde/ /yid mi bde dang khros rgyal ba/ /gnyen po la ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /
<p>343b</p>
<p>343b.1</p>zhum pa'i phyir ni spro ba med/ /rgud pa chen pos zin par 'gyur/ /de sems pas na yud la'ang / /tshe ni thung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de lta bas na don med pa/ /gnod pa bzhin du goms par spang / /yid mi bde ba spang ba ji ltar 'thob ce na/ yang ba dang / shin tu
<p>343b.2</p>mnyen pa'i sems bor ba ste/ drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu'i sems bor ba zhes gsungs pa dang / sdong po bkod pa las/ nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub par dka' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes
<p>343b.3</p>gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /goms na dka' bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med de/ dper na nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa bzhin du sdug bsngal 'byung ba thams cad la bde bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag
<p>343b.4</p>pa goms par bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du gnas so/ /des na chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis bab kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ yab dang sras mjal ba'i
<p>343b.5</p>mdo las byung ba bzhin no/ /dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo las/ bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni/ /brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas sgra yang mi thos na/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba gal zhig /u dum bA ra'i me tog ni/ /shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar/ /
<p>343b.6</p>de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/ /khyod kyis de ni rnyed gyur na/ /dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu 'byung / /dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/ /dga' bo ston par mthong gyur ba/ /nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig /gnya' shing bug can de yang / rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su
<p>343b.7</p>rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis rus sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba las/ nub byang gi mtshams
<p>344a</p>
<p>344a.1</p>na bud+d+ha yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa stong gsum gyi bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/ skyes bu'i rtsal de lta
<p>344a.2</p>bu byung ba yin no/ /bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du/ /sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing / /byang chub sems kyang ma btang dang / /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po las/ dge sbyong chom rkun bzhi la/ dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags dang
<p>344a.3</p>dbyibs la gnas shing tshul khrims 'chal cing sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang / dben gnas su song ba ste/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la gnas pa dang 'bras bu ma thob pa bzhin rnyed pa la sogs pa la chags pas 'bras bu thob par las 'chi ba dang /bdag
<p>344a.4</p>bstod cing gzhan smod pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du bskal pa bas lhag par bzhugs su gsol/ /bka'
<p>344a.5</p>stsal pa/ gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed kyis cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston du zin kyang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba'am bzlog par mi spyod do/ /bka' stsal pa/ byams pa phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ byang
<p>344a.6</p>chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa 'byung ste/ des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan 'ong bar mthong na/ khro bas lta ba dang nyes pa 'di yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjod par byed de/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ring du mi gnas pa
<p>344a.7</p>smad par bya ba'i zas kham 'ga'i phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed do/ /de dag yi dgas kyi chos kun du spyod de/ snog pa dang / sems dman pa dang ldan pa yin te/ ming gis byang chub sems dpar khas 'che zhing / bdag nyid sdig pa can gyi
<p>344b</p>
<p>344b.1</p>bsam pa dang ldan bzhin du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ zas dang skom sgrub par byed do/ /byams pa dper na/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing wa'i las byed pa ltar de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i bsngags pa brjod cing / 
<p>344b.2</p>sems can 'ga' la yang sbyin pa la sogs pa mi spyod pas/ tshig tsam du 'gyur gyi yon tan yang dag pa blang ba dang 'brel pa'i spyod pas brtson pa ni ma yin no/ /de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rang ba de ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma
<p>344b.3</p>yin no/ /ji ltar gzhan gyi rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan la sbyin dgos na/ de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur pa ltos/ dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bas chos kyi skyes ma gtogs pa
<p>344b.4</p>zang zing gi yo byad 'du 'dzi'i gtam mi bya ste/ de dag ni phan 'dogs pa ma yin no/ /de las dgongs nas/ gang zhig gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te/ /dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang / /gang gis
<p>344b.5</p>sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin/ /rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des/ /tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la/ /char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na/ /gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod/ /ces bstan to/ /byang chub
<p>344b.6</p>sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams ni las yongs su bsal ba byas pas na/ mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/ bdag grol bas gzhan grol bar 'dod pas 'dzem dogs dang ldan pa dang / myur du bsal zhing 'jig rten pha rol la
<p>344b.7</p>'jigs par blta bar bya'o/ /'di la bdag dang sems can dang / /srog dang gang zag ma mchis par/ /bzod pa bla med gang lags pa/ /sbyin pa de ni sbyin chen lags/ /zhi ba'i tshul las mi g.yo ba'i/ /tshul khrims yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /
<p>345a</p>
<p>345a.1</p>gang zhig zhi tshul mdzes rtogs pa/ /de ni tshul khrims mchog yin gsungs/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'ang brtson par byos/ /'dus byas kun kyang spang bar gyis/ /dben par lta ba gang yin pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'grus
<p>345a.2</p>gsungs/ /dngos po'i dngos po med pas na/ /dngos po thams cad bsreg par bya/ /nyon mongs med pa gang yin pa/ /de ni rtogs med bsam gtan yin/ /tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/ /dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste/ /dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin
<p>345a.3</p>pa/ /de ni shes rab dam pa yin/ /gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos ni/ /tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/ /dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste/ /dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin pa/ /de ni shes rab dam pa yin/ /gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/ skye
<p>345a.4</p>bo mang po la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba/ tshul 'chos pa lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' sdig
<p>345a.5</p>pa'i grogs kyis zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog nas/ mar me'i bar gyi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /'od srungs ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba
<p>345a.6</p>yang dag par sgrub pa'i mchod pa bshad pa yin na/ mi blun po de dag ni de las brtson par gyur te/ ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig /bram ze dang khyim
<p>345a.7</p>bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na/ nga'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes de skad gsungs na/ mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor dang / spong ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton spangs nas sku gdung gi mchod pa la brten nas 'tsho bar byed pa la ltos/ 
<p>345b</p>
<p>345b.1</p>gang gis chu'i phung po nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'bru mar gyis bkang ste/ snying po ri rab tsam gyi mar me btsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa can tshul khrims la gnas pa cig gis mkhan po
<p>345b.2</p>'am/ slob dpon las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung nod de/ kha don byed cing gom pa bdun bor ba gang yin pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa la sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med na mchod pa'i las lta ci smos te
<p>345b.3</p>de ni gnas med do/ /gang 'du shes dang mtshan mar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/ /grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi skye ba yin pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/ /'od srungs dus phyi ma lnga brgya tha ma la/ byang chub sems
<p>345b.4</p>dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pa brkam pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ras bcos bu'am rtsig ngos la bris pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas/ dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul
<p>345b.5</p>'thob par sems shing sems su yang 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad tsam po des bdag bstod gzhan la smod par byed cing / gzhi des 'tsho bar yang sems so/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang / mchod pa la ma gtogs pa lung nod
<p>345b.6</p>pa dang / kha ton dang / bsam gtan gces su mi byed do/ /de dag de'i tshe khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag gis mchod pa dang / ri mor bya bar shes nas/ bsod snyoms dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi bar dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ngas ni byang chub sems
<p>345b.7</p>dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims la gnas te mang du thos pa btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na de dag de'i tshe na/ tshul khrims 'chal par gnas shing chos tshol ba spangs te/ mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya bar brtson zhing gzhi des
<p>346a</p>
<p>346a.1</p>'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems pa la ltos/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po las/ gzhan yang de'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs pa/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i
<p>346a.2</p>g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig lhags so/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs
<p>346a.3</p>pa yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig lhags so/ /de la bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /
<p>346a.4</p>rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bde zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i don to/ /sug ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /'di ltar rtag pa thams cad kyi nang na ni nam mkha' mchog tu rtag pa yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang nam mkha' bzhin du
<p>346a.5</p>rtag go/ /ngas ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas kyang dgra bcom pa'i mthar gtugs zin mod kyi/ byang chub kyi shing drung du rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa dang / bdud btul bar bstan pa la 'di ni 'jig rten nges par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir bdud pham par byas te sangs
<p>346a.6</p>rgyas so zhes bya bar sems can rnams kyis shes so/ /ngas ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bdud pham par byas te bdud rtsi rtogs so/ /bla ma bla ma zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyogs thams cad kyi nang na byang phyogs mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ thar pa yang de dang
<p>346a.7</p>'dra ste/ thar pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bla na med pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yul thams cad kyi nang na byang phyogs pa la yul bla na med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du thar pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /chu klung
<p>346b</p>
<p>346b.1</p>zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho la bya ste/ chu klung thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho 'ba' zhig chu klung yin pas/ rgya mtsho ni chu klung zhes bya ba'i grangs su gtogs pa'o/ /sems can yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag ni theg pa chen po thos nas dad par 'gyur te/ 
<p>346b.2</p>dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ni sdig pa'i las grangs med par byas pa rnams klad pa na ba dang / rims kyis gdungs pa dang / zug rngu dang / skur pa tsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu rnam bzhi lta
<p>346b.3</p>bu'i mdo las gsungs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa de ji ltar rtogs par bgyi lags/ chos nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa brtan pa ther zug ces bya'o/ /gal te gang zag tshul khrims 'chal pa zang zing la brkam pa rnams
<p>346b.4</p>de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go zhes zer na/ gang zag de dag ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/ /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ni theg pa chen po pa rnams yin no/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni drang po'i don gyi rnam grangs su gtogs so/ /ye shes
<p>346b.5</p>zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bla dgas te/ chos kyi sku ni tshad ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sha'i sku'o zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa brtags pa las brten te/ rnam par shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin no/ /don zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>346b.6</p>rtag ces bya ba ni chos rtag pa'i don to/ /chos rtag ces bya ba ni dge 'dun rtag ces bya ba'i don to/ /yi ge zhes bya ba ni rang bzo'i yi ge dang tshig sna tshogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin pa rnams so/ /bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
<p>346b.7</p>don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa shin tu rgyas pa'i mchog tu cha phra ste bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang yin no/ /dug gi mchog kyang yin no/ /sangs rgyas nyid chos kyang yin dge 'dun kyang yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzhi gsum pa yin no/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa las
<p>347a</p>
<p>347a.1</p>ni byis pa rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i lta ba bsal ba'i phyir gzhi gsum pa gzhag go/ /bag yod pa ni 'chi ba med pa'i gnas so/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas so/ /'jig rten pa rnams ni bag med pa dang ldan pa yin te shi ba dang 'dra'o/ /
<p>347a.2</p>'jig rten las 'das pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba med do/ /bag yod pa rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu bde ba 'thob pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang dgongs pa'i tshig ni shes par dka' ste/ dper na rgyal po la las blon po la sin+d+ha pa 'on cig ces byas
<p>347a.3</p>na/ zas za ba'i dus su ni lan tshwa khyer te 'ong / /zos zin pa'i tshe ni skom nod/ /skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i tshe ni rta/ g.yul ngor 'gro ba'i tshe ni ral gri khyer te 'ong ste/ rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i tshig rnams shes par byed de/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la
<p>347a.4</p>yang / mi rtag pa rnam pa bzhi yod par theg pa chen po'i blon po rnams kyis shes par bya ste/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa de'i tshe ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom mo/ /chos nub pa dang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>347a.5</p>zhes ston pa de'i tshe ni sdug bsngal bsgom par bya'o/ /nam nga'i lus nad mtha' yas pas gzir to/ /dge 'dun 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes ston pa de'i tshe bdag med pa bsgom mo/ /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i thar pa mtshan ma med pa dang ci yang med pa'o zhes ston
<p>347a.6</p>pa de'i tshe ni stong pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gi phyir sdug bsngal ci yang med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang mi brtan pa dang ther zug ma yin pa dang / zhi ba ma yin pa med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang zhib ste/ 
<p>347a.7</p>nam de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe ni yang dag par rtag pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms pa ni nga'i nyan thos yin/ dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin no/ /mdo 'di ni skyes
<p>347b</p>
<p>347b.1</p>pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa ste/ skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni mi zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni skyes pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang pham pa byed byad pas ji ltar bya ba nyon cig /pham pa byed byed pas ni chos kyi de kho na nyid de
<p>347b.2</p>bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po khong du chud par byas nas/ dam pa'i chos 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams na/ de la byin pa yang ches khyad par can du 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos 'byin pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar che'o/ /drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/ 
<p>347b.3</p>khyim zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang / dge ba'i sdong po sgyel bar byed pas khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba la rnam par rtog pa sngon goms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams par byed pas khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /
<p>347b.4</p>khyim na gnas pa ni rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o/ /me la shing ltar chog mi shes pa'o/ /rlung dmar ltar thug pa med par rtog pa'o/ /kha zas [(]bzad [,]bzang [)]po dang dug ltar 'dres pa'o/ /phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o/ /las kyi mthar thug pa
<p>347b.5</p>med pa'o/ /ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur pa'o/ /dngos po tshol zhing srung bas sdug bsngal myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar rgud cing 'gyur ba'o/ /slong ba mthong na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / longs spyod kyi rgyus dang byang chub ston pa yin par 'du shes pa
<p>347b.6</p>bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pas chung ma la/ rgya dang khog tshe dang rnyir 'du shes pa'o/ /yang gsum ste/ khri mon dang 'ching ba dang gsod pa'o/ /gang zag gis gang zag la tshod gzung bar mi bya ste/ bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dgon
<p>347b.7</p>pa la gnas pa ni chos kun 'dzin pa'o/ /'phags pas bkur ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o/ /dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar zhe na/ lus dang srog la mi lta
<p>348a</p>
<p>348a.1</p>pas sbyin pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis tshul khrims dang / gnod sems med pas byams shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pas bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa las phyir mi ldog pa las brtson 'grus
<p>348a.2</p>dang / sems can yal bar mi 'dor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba sdud pas bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtogs pas shes rab po/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan na dgon par gnas pa gnang ste gang zhe na/ mang du thos pa yin
<p>348a.3</p>te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson zhing chos sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa shas chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa yin te lha dang klu la sogs pa smin par bya ba'i ched dang / dge ba'i
<p>348a.4</p>rtsa ba brtan nas phyis grong la sogs par chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa de bzhi dang ldan par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo las/ nad med mi rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/ /'byor pa mi rtag srog kyang rtag ma yin/ /skye bo mi rtag nyid kyis nyan gyur pa/ /'dod
<p>348a.5</p>pa'i yon tan dga' ba ji ltar skye/ /za ma tog bkod pa las/ yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer chen po na bshad pa dang gci ba'i gnas de na srin bu'i rigs brgya stong du ma gnas pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bung ba'i gzugs su sprul nas/ sangs
<p>348a.6</p>rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba rjes su dran nas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kha na spos kyi dri zhes bya bar
<p>348a.7</p>gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes so/ /oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ na maH sap+tA nAM/ sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ tsa le tsu le tsun+de swAhA/ gang gtsug lag khang la khyim gyi 'du shes 'dzin pa de dag ni bu dang bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor bar
<p>348b</p>
<p>348b.1</p>'gyur ro/ /de dag dge 'dun gyi khri dang / khri'u dang / tshang thur dang / sngas dang / mal stan dag la spyod par ma 'os pa las spyod par byed/ dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la bshang ba dang gci bar byed do/ /mchil ma dag kyang 'dor zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa mi
<p>348b.2</p>shes so/ /dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la mchil ma 'dor ba de dag ni/ lo bcu gnyis su sA la'i tshal du kha khab mig tsam gyi srog chags su skye'o/ /dge 'dun gyi so shing la spyod par mi 'os pa las spyod pa ni rus sbal dang chu srin dang nya'i nang du skye'o/ /dge 'dun
<p>348b.3</p>gyi til dang 'bras la sogs pa mi 'os par spyad na yi dgas su skye'o/ /dge 'dun gyi zas kyis khyi gso bar byed pa de dag ni rigs dman pa dang / dbang po nyams pa dang sgur po dang sprang por skye'o/ /dge 'dun gyis la mi 'os par spyad na/ bskal pa bcu gnyis
<p>348b.4</p>su dmyal ba 'o dod 'bod par skye'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni me'i 'obs lta bu'o/ /dug lta bu'o/ /rdo rje lta bu 'o/ /khur lta bu'o/ /dug la ni gnyen po bya nus kyi dge 'dun gyi la ni gnyen po bya mi nus so/ /rmi lam bstan pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa dang / mtshan ma dang / 
<p>348b.5</p>rtags gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par ngas khyod la bshad do/ /mtshan ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par shes par bya ste/ rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / sku gdung rnyed pa dang / /de bzhin
<p>348b.6</p>gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang / chos thos pa dang / dge slong la chos smra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs mthong ba dang / bdag gcer bur 'dug pa dang / sngon ma mthong ba'i yul du phyin pa dang / chu'i nang na 'dug par shes pa dang / sprin
<p>348b.7</p>las char 'bab par shes pa dang / sa g.yos pa dang / bdag bsad pa las shor ba dang / bdag nam mkha' las 'gro ba dang / glegs bam rnyed pa dang / chos smra ba dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa dang / rin po che thu ba dang / nyi ma dang zla ba gzas
<p>349a</p>
<p>349a.1</p>zin pa dang / gtsug lag khang na 'dug par shes pa dang / sprin las 'brug grag pa dang / glog 'byung ba dang / go mtshon rnyed par mthong ba la sogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ba
<p>349a.2</p>mthong na/ des ni chos la sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa yin pas/ des chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing kha don la brtson pa'i gang zag rnams la yang bsnyen bkur sgrub po/ /des ni sgrib pa de dag par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni sa
<p>349a.3</p>dang po bdun pa dag las byung bar blta'o/ /de'i tshe sa dang po la gnas pa zhig na ni des sbyang ba'i phyir/ lo bdun du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum gdon par bya'o/ /sa gnyis pas ni lo drug /sa gsum
<p>349a.4</p>pas ni lo lnga/ sa bzhi pas ni lo bzhi/ sa lnga pas ni lo gsum/ sa drug pas ni lo gnyis/ sa bdun pas ni lo gcig gdon par bya'o/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'jim pa las byas pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'
<p>349a.5</p>da ni sa dang po par blta'o/ /sa bdun po dag la mthong ba gang yin pa de sa bdun gyi las kyang rig par bya'o/ /sa dgu pa dang bcu pa dag la ni rmi lam log par mthong ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar mthong nas
<p>349a.6</p>bcu par blta ste/ bdud kyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub de bzhin byang chub sems/ /chos bzhi gang yin de dag dpag med do/ /de dag 'jig rten kun gyis rtogs mi
<p>349a.7</p>nus/ /mdog ngan glen nam yang na rnyed med dam/ /brnyas shing dman par bya ba yin na yang / /mi yi khams dang spyod pa shes dka' bas/ /de la gya tshom dag tu skyon mi gdags/ /dgra bcom kun gyis rang sems mi shes na/ /sems can
<p>349b</p>
<p>349b.1</p>spyod pa shes pa smos ci dgos/ /ma skyes dgra yis pha ni bsad gyur cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa bkrongs par sbyor byas kyang / /de sems gcig gis ngan 'gro rnams grol na/ /gang zag dag pa gang yin smos ci dgos/ /gser ni mi
<p>349b.2</p>gtsang nang du bcug gyur kyang / /'bar ba'i rang bzhin nam yang mi 'bri ltar/ /nges pa gang zhig 'jig rten chos spyod kyang / /nam yang bsam pa'i rang bzhin de mi spong / /gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed pa/ /de dag rnyed par ba rnyed legs
<p>349b.3</p>'tsho ba/ /nor 'dod pa dag rgya mtsho chen po ltar/ /de bzhin de dag rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/ /dgon par dga' zhing rtag tu dbang bsdams la/ /brtson 'grus brtsams zhing nye du thag bsrings la/ /byams la gnas shing don dam mkhas gyur ba/ /des ni de
<p>349b.4</p>'dra'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rin po che'i mtha' las/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa nas ma 'dres pa la thug pa de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
<p>349b.5</p>la ni so so'i skye bo nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar dag tha dad par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chu bo gang gA la sogs pa rgya mtshor bab pa 'di'o zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus pa ltar chos kyi dbyings la so so'i skye bo'i chos la sogs pa tha dad par
<p>349b.6</p>gdags par mi nus so/ /'phags pa sgra chen po las/ gling bzhi pa gser la sogs pas gang bar byas pa'am/ rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po bkang ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis
<p>349b.7</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/ srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs 'dogs par byed dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mtshon gang ba byed na ches bsod
<p>350a</p>
<p>350a.1</p>nams che'o/ /ma skyes dgras pha rgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung brgyad cha la mchod pa dang ri mor bya ba'i las byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar lan cig song nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bskal pa nyi shur log
<p>350a.2</p>par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu byung nas/ rang rgyal ba mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa 'jug pa las bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/ bskal pa brgyad khri
<p>350a.3</p>bzhi stong lon nas/ de'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byams pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog ces bya bar gyur bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bka'
<p>350a.4</p>stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas sam/ ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa de dag byas sam/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs te 'dug gam/ mtshams
<p>350a.5</p>med pa lnga byas su zin kyang de byang chub kyi sems ma spangs ma btang ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba la dmigs pa can gyi sems dang mngon par zhen pa'i sems kyang mi bskyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
<p>350a.6</p>dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa'i las byas srid par skyes kyang ji tsam du srid par skyes pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi/ /bsod nams
<p>350a.7</p>de la gal te gzugs yod na/ /zhing rnams gang ba'i bye snyed gang byas kyang / /de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa med/ /rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can ji snyed pa/ /bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas gyur/ /bskal pa mang por
<p>350b</p>
<p>350b.1</p>las gzhan mi byed par/ /bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug med pa/ /de dag byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan/ /gang gis stong gsum rin chen bkang byas la/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la dbul byed pa/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu
<p>350b.2</p>mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te/ /spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid 'gyur la/ /ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar/ /sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang / /mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung ba yis/ /byang
<p>350b.3</p>chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /me tog gcig pu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur/ /ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la/ /bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag
<p>350b.4</p>la la zhig /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bar mchod byed/ /gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu/ /rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te/ /sems kyi gtso bo bskyed pa byas nas kyang / /gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par
<p>350b.5</p>'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la byams pa zhes bgyi/ ming 'di ga las rnyed lags/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs byung ba'i tshe/ dge
<p>350b.6</p>slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bas sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug la ci nas byams pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing / dge slong de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te 'gro'o/ /grong
<p>350b.7</p>la sogs pa'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ma thag tu sems can byams pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur te/ de ni lha rnams kyis a la la sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas/ ming
<p>351a</p>
<p>351a.1</p>de la de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yi rang bas ni byams pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gA'i mchog la bka' stsal pa/ gang gA'i mchog dper na bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du ngas gzugs nas mya ngan las
<p>351a.2</p>'das pa'i bar brtags kyang don dam pa na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa las ni/ de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te/ /bsam mi khyab la dad pa yin/ /rnam
<p>351a.3</p>par smin pa'ang de bzhin no/ /las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa zhes bya ba 'dod chags ni sgrib pa'o/ /zhe sdang dang gti mug ni sgrib pa'o/ /sbyin pa ni sgrib pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
<p>351a.4</p>dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ni sgrib pa'o/ /sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/ /gsol pa/ ji ltar sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi bar sgrib pa
<p>351a.5</p>lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med mod kyi/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams rang gi rtog pas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa yang sgrib par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams kyis sbyin pa byed pa na sems can ser sna can rnams la ma dad do/ /
<p>351a.6</p>ma dad pa des khong khro ba dang / tha ba'i nyes pa bskyed de/ nyes pa des sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la smad par byed de/ smad pas skye bo mang po dag bsngags pa ma yin pa thob pas/ de dag la ma
<p>351a.7</p>dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa bsgom pa ni 'di dag gnod sems kyi gzhi dang ldan zhes bya ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa ni 'di dag le lo can des dad pas sbyin pa chu ra'i chu yang spyad par mi 'os so snyam pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par
<p>351b</p>
<p>351b.1</p>'jog na 'di dag ni sems g.yengs pa'o snyom pas brnyas par byed de/ de dag ji tsam du brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa de tsam du 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /phyis de dag gis gong du byang chub tu spyod pa na mang du thos kyang chos thams cad yi ge med pa la rnam par shes pa
<p>351b.2</p>yod par brtags te/ shes rab tu dmigs nas/ pha rol du son par byed pa de dag ni mi shes pa zhes nga smra'o/ /gal te theg pa chen po la zhugs na yang / bdag cag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo snyam nas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa la smon cing bsam pa ngan pa dang nyes par brjod pa des na ngan
<p>351b.3</p>'gror 'gro ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal sgyu ma lta bu'i sems la gnas pa la ni chos gang yang sgrib pa med do/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dmigs pa de ni phongs par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bka' stsal
<p>351b.4</p>pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su mos pa des ni las kyi sgrib pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/ gang gis de 'drar rang bzhin stong shes nas/ /dngos po kun la mi gnas sgom byed pa/ /de ni
<p>351b.5</p>nyon mongs dra ba kun spangs shing / /srid pa'i 'dod chags bcom pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gang gis stong pa stong shes shing / /stong pa la yang mi sems la/ /gang dag stong nyid mi 'thob bo/ /de dag stong nyid shes pa yin/ /'khor lo bcu pa las bka'
<p>351b.6</p>stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'ga' zhig gis byams pa'am 'jam dpal lam/ kun du spyan ras gzigs sam/ kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su
<p>351b.7</p>song nas/ de dag gi mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas mchod cing smon lam btab pa bas/ 'ga' zhig gis skad cig yud tsam byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la de ltar byas na/ myur du re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu yang dag pa yi snying po ni/ /yon tan mang po phun
<p>352a</p>
<p>352a.1</p>sum tshogs par ldan/ /dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa/ /ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni snod du gyur pa'i sems can lha dang mi'i theg pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing ngan song du gzhol bar
<p>352a.2</p>mi mdzad do/ /bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor pas mi'i chos 'di bcu byas na/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsam yang mi 'grub na/ gong ma lta ci smos/ sngar grub pa yang nyams shing ston par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis
<p>352a.3</p>dpa' yang thang ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa dang / log pa la zhen cing 'jig rten gyi ltas la chags pa dang / 'phags pa la mi gzhol zhing sems rgod pa dang / phra ma dang dbyen byed pa dang 'phags pa la smod cing dbang za ba dang / log par lta bas rgyu
<p>352a.4</p>'bras la skur pa 'debs pa'o/ /yang rnal 'byor pa chos 'di bcu dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin mi 'grub cing grub na yang nyams par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ las su bya ba'i dngos po la dga' zhing chags pa dang / bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang / 
<p>352a.5</p>gnyid la dga' ba dang / gang zag tshol ba la dga' ba dang / gzugs la dga' ba dang / sgra la dga' ba dang / dri la dga' ba dang / ro la dga' ba dang / reg la dga' ba dang / rtog pa dang dpyod pa la dga' ba'o/ /u tra ka dang / ar ka dang / de sha ku
<p>352a.6</p>pa li ka dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan las nyams nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /u pA lis gsol pa/ tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi srungs/ kun la sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ mi brnyas mi smad glo bur
<p>352a.7</p>du nyes pa mi gleng ngo zhes gsungs na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dag la dge 'dun gyis ji lta bu'i thabs bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni mu stegs can dang / khyim pas dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du gnang ba'i skabs ni med do/ /dge 'dun gyis kyang ma rtogs pa dang / chos bzhin
<p>352b</p>
<p>352b.1</p>ma yin par gleng du ma gnang na bskrad pa lta ci smos/ ma rtogs pa dang chos bzhin ma yin par gleng na/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob po/ /u pA li ma rtogs pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin pa 'di bcus gleng na sdig pa chen po 'thob ste/ gang zhe na/ dge
<p>352b.2</p>'dun ma dad pa rgyal po'i spyan sngar gleng ba dang ma dad par kun du rgyu'i nang dang / ma dad par blon po'i mdun dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bud med mang po dang ma rung bar byed pa mang po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i mdun dang / sha khon yod
<p>352b.3</p>pa'i mdun dang / khro bo zhe 'gras pa'i mdun du'o/ /de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin te/ 'phags pa'i chos nyams pas yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun sme bar byed cing / dge sbyong gi las thams cad mi rung bar byed pa yin te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
<p>352b.4</p>gyi longs spyod la spyod du mi gnang mod kyi/ 'on kyang yid mthun pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen par rdzogs te/ sdom pa thob pa ma btang bas khyim pa skye bo thams cad pas mchog go/ /rtsa ba'i sdig nyams kyang de lta bu yin na bcas pa'i sdig phra mo gzhan nyams pa lta
<p>352b.5</p>ci smos te/ de bas na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / khyim pa rnams kyis brnyas pa'am/ chad pas gcad du mi gnang ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs khyim bdag gdol pas bstan pa la skyabs su song zhing rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur kyang rung ba rnams la 'tshe bar
<p>352b.6</p>byed de gshe ba nas srog dang bral ba'i bar du byed de de dag ni mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo / /mar 'tshir gnas sdig bcu po dag /smad 'tshong gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/ /smad 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag /chang 'tshong gnas sdig gcig
<p>352b.7</p>dang mnyam/ /chang 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag /shan pa'i gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/ /shan pa'i gnas sdig bcu gnas pas/ /rgyal po gdol can sdig gcig mnyam/ /theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos la thams cad kyis dad cing bkur sti bya'i de la 'phya zhing skur pa
<p>353a</p>
<p>353a.1</p>'debs pa dang / bar chad dang gegs mi bya ste/ theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam med par byas na gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa gsum las gcig la
<p>353a.2</p>'phya zhing skur na de dag lhan cig mi gnas/ chung ngu na skad cig tsam yang bsnyen bkur dang / chos mnyan par mi bya'o/ /de lta bu la 'dri zhing mnyan par byas na/ de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
<p>353a.3</p>na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ theg pa gsum char gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'ga'i phyir yang gleng ba las thos na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /byams pa la gnas te zhe sdang dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / snying rje la gnas te sems
<p>353a.4</p>can nyam thag pa sgrol ba dang / dga' ba la gnas te ngag gi las mi dge ba bzhi spong ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas te 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad spong ngo / /theg pa gnyis kyi chos la dad nas/ theg pa chen po la ni dad par mi
<p>353a.5</p>'gyur/ theg pa chen po chos la dad pa theg pa'i tshig tu smra bas don du mi 'gyur/ nang ni yang dag chad par lta zhing / theg pa chen po can zhes khas 'che/ mi dge gsum gyi las mi srung ba/ nga yi dam chos ma rung 'jig byed/ gang zag de ni 'chi 'phos gyur nas/ sems
<p>353a.6</p>can dmyal ba'i mtshams med ltung nges/ lus rul pa la dri zhim pos byugs kyang zhim por mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems can theg pa gnyis kyi chos la brtson par ma dad pa mi dge ba bcu ma spangs pas theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo rtogs par mi nus te/ rgyu
<p>353a.7</p>med par smra ba la theg pa chen po bstan kyang bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel pa nyid stong pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims nyams par dga' la sdig pa can/ /theg
<p>353b</p>
<p>353b.1</p>pa chen po'i yon tan mchog thob nas/ /khe dang grags phyir theg chen khas 'che ba/ /bong bu seng ge'i pags pa gyon pa bzhin/ /deng 'dir 'khor rnams kun la bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig myur du byang chub mchog 'dir ni/ /dge bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan
<p>353b.2</p>byos/ /nga yi chos la mi smad shin tu bsrung / /ngas sngon mdo sde gzhan dag las gsungs pa/ /byang chub chen po 'dod pa theg chen spyad/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa spongs shig pa/ /de ni rnam dag 'khor la bstan pa'i chos/ /la la nyan thos theg pa'i chos
<p>353b.3</p>dang ldan/ /la la bden par dga' zhing rang byang chub/ /la la ye shes mchog la dga' 'os pa/ /de bas mos pa bzhin du theg gsum shod/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tsam gyis grol 'dod pa/ /theg chen bshad pa thos na ngan song ltung / /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas
<p>353b.4</p>stong gi tha ma snang mdzad ces bya/ gal te dge bcu'i las yang dag par ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ dge ba bcu'i las 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhes sam/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na brdzun
<p>353b.5</p>du smra ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba ngo tsha med par stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba yin pas tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yin te/ byang chub kyi rgyud dang mya ngan
<p>353b.6</p>las 'das pa'i them skas lta bu yin no/ /dper na spos bsregs na/ spos nyid tshig ste med par song yang dri bsung gis gzhan la bro bar byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong yang bsod nams kyi zhing gshin pa ma yin te/ nyin mtshan du dad pas byin
<p>353b.7</p>pas bsregs te ngan song du 'gro mod kyi sems can dpag tu med pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du 'gyur te mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsung bro bar byed do/ /de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin mod kyi skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pas
<p>354a</p>
<p>354a.1</p>cha lugs dang / spyod lam 'phags pa rnams dang mthun te de mthong ba tsam gyis sems can tshad med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rgyal po la sogs pas gang yang chad pas gcod pa mi dbang ngo / /rgyal po la
<p>354a.2</p>gdams pa las/ nor ni btang gis lus ni bsrung bar bya/ /yan lag btang gis srog ni bsrung bar bya/ /nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gis 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa ni chos kun srung bar byed/ /dper na dbyar dus gtugs ches
<p>354a.3</p>srung ba bzhin/ /chos spyod pa yi phan yon 'di yin te/ /chos spyod pa ni ngan 'gror mi 'gro'o/ /chos ma yin pa spyod cing bag med pa/ /'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gro mi bzad 'gro/ /gang du gnas na shi bas mi tshugs pa/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /
<p>354a.4</p>bar snang ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang ma yin/ /ri yi phug tu zhugs kyang mi phan no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa thob phyin chad 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa las/ yi ge ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/ yi ge ni brjod pa kho
<p>354a.5</p>na lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa 'di lta ste/ dper na mar med pas mar gyi snying khu'i rgyun chad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam du spros pa de ni byang chub
<p>354a.6</p>yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni spros pa med pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni tshul yin no/ /gang na ji tsam du spros pa de tsam du byang chub po/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spros pa thams cad ni dben pa'i phyir te/ byang chub de yang dben pa yin no/ /mtha' gnyis zil
<p>354a.7</p>gyis mnan nas su/ /khams rnams dbu mas spyod par byed/ /de'i phyir bzod pa bstan par bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyis chos stong pa/ /de ni byang chub lam yin te/ /ngas kyang de ni bstan pa yin/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba ni gang lta ba med pa'o/ /lta ba thams cad ni log
<p>354b</p>
