<p>354b.1</p>par lta ba'o/ /gang zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgra bcom pas gang ba srog dang phral ba de bas ni/ 'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches che
<p>354b.2</p>bar nga smra'o/ /shA ri'i bu mdor na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug pa de la mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba med cing dal ba phun sum tshogs pa med do/ /chos bzhi dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/ gang zhe na/ tshar gcod
<p>354b.3</p>pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yin/ chos zab mo dang ldan pa yin/ chos zab mo la sbyor bar byed pa yin/ dus dus su gdams ngag gi tshig dang ldan pa yin/ dus dus su yal bar 'jog pa yin no/ /mngon par shes pa myur ba nyid du bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
<p>354b.4</p>rten mchod pa dang / phyir bcos pa dang / byi dor bya ba lhur blang bar bya ste/ gang zhig byi dor byed pa de ni gzugs kyi smon lam gyi mchog dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par blang ba brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lta ba'i smon lam gyi mchog
<p>354b.5</p>'thob po/ /'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u las/ rnal 'byor pa rnam par grol bar 'dod cing 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/ /stong pa nyid la rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba ni bdud kyi las so/ /
<p>354b.6</p>'dus ma byas pa la rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas skyo ba yang bdud kyi las so/ /nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smod pa yang bdud kyi las so/ /nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyi
<p>354b.7</p>bgrod pa gcig pa'i las su bsgoms te/ gnyis su med par 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pa'i las kyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa las byung ba yang tshol lam rig pa dang / sred
<p>355a</p>
<p>355a.1</p>pa dang / srid pa las byung ba la so sor rtog pas nam rig pa dang / srid pa dang sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang rnam par grol bar shes na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /chos bzhis rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ lus yang ba dang / sems
<p>355a.2</p>yang pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /chos bzhis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du
<p>355a.3</p>'jug cing / pad ma la sogs pas lag pa bkang ste/ sku gzugs dang mchod rten la 'thor ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po mang zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul dang / gzhan gyi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas su
<p>355a.4</p>bsngo ba'o/ /chos bzhis shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang / mi mthun par 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gdams ngag ston pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa'o/ /chos
<p>355a.5</p>bzhis sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa 'thob ste/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po mi bsten pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'o/ /
<p>355a.6</p>chos bzhis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che spar gyis 'thor ba dang / 'bru mar gyi dri zhim pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'khru ba dang / mchod rten la spos dang me tog dang sil snyan
<p>355a.7</p>la sogs pas mchod pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byas pas rim gro byed pa'o/ /chos bzhis dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob ste/ stan rgyu sna tshogs kyi stan 'dul ba dang / gzhan la bsti stang byed
<p>355b</p>
<p>355b.1</p>pas mi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la 'thab mo mi rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ /chos bzhis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gar sems bskyed pa der skye ste/ gzhan dag gis shes pa'i khe dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi byed pa dang / 
<p>355b.2</p>lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su dag pa tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med do/ /kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa las/ sha'i mig
<p>355b.3</p>gis sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo / /lha'i mig gis sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mthong ngo / /shes rab kyi mig gis sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang g.yo ba shes so/ /chos kyi mig gis sems can yang dag pa
<p>355b.4</p>ji lta ba bzhin mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do/ /mi dge ba'i grogs po dang brten pa ni mi dge ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang brten pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /byang chub
<p>355b.5</p>kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin las/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag gi nang nas brgyad stong ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin
<p>355b.6</p>cing yongs su 'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de dag phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tham pa'i tshe/ nga'i byang chub bskal pa
<p>355b.7</p>grangs med pa du mar bsgrubs pa 'di spong bar 'gyur/ 'gal bar byed par 'gyur/ mi ston pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdun gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
<p>356a</p>
<p>356a.1</p>kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su
<p>356a.2</p>gzir ba'i sems can gyi khams mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang po yid du 'ong ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan
<p>356a.3</p>byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi yon tan bsngags pa rdzogs pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems
<p>356a.4</p>bskyed pa gong ma gsum ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub srung ba yin te/ myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
<p>356a.5</p>chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya ste/ lnga ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti la phrag dog med pa dang / srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi bsngags pa ma yin
<p>356a.6</p>pa brjod pa dang / shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang grags pa la mi chags pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa'o/ /chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin te/ lnga ni gzi brjid chung zhing bka' blo mi bde ba yin/ dman pa
<p>356a.7</p>la mos shing thams cad la dman pa'i chos ston pa yin/ shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags nas slong mo ster ba'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yin/ g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa yin/ stong pa nyid la ngag gi las lhur len pas mi 'dra ba yin no/ /byams pa phyi
<p>356b</p>
<p>356b.1</p>ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sgyid lug par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag par blangs pa ston la bsam ba thag pa nas byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas grangs med pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /de dag gis ngan
<p>356b.2</p>song du 'gyur ba'i las gang mngon par 'dus byas pa de yang mdog ngan par 'gyur ba tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/ nad mang ba tsam dang / dman pa'i rigs su skyes pa dang / dbul po dang mtha' 'khob pa dang / log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes pa dang / sems can la
<p>356b.3</p>mya ngan mang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba dang / rgyun du chos mnyan pa mi 'thob pa dang / bsam gtan la sems g.yeng ba dang / tha na rmi lam na sdig pa mthong ba rmis pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig stong sems de ni rigs
<p>356b.4</p>min te/ /ji ltar de yis skye med brtags phyir ro/ /rnam rtog thams cad bdud kyi zhugs pa ste/ /'gyur med chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /skye ba med pa bden pa gcig yin na/ /de la kha cig bden pa bzhi zhes zer/ /byang chub snying por 'dug nas bden cig kyang / /grub
<p>356b.5</p>par ma mthong zhi lta ga la zhig /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan
<p>356b.6</p>mo skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems
<p>356b.7</p>dpa' mthu chen thob der 'tshang rgya ste/ yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med sus thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las thar bar 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyis po ser sna dang phrag dog ni ma gtogs so/ /rab tu zhi ba
<p>357a</p>
<p>357a.1</p>rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin las/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed na dge ba'i rtsa ba des gal te sangs rgyas ma byung bar 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes na yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kyis yongs su gzung
<p>357a.2</p>bar 'gyur te/ nam bag med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ yang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bskul bar 'gyur/ de ni dran pa chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par dag pa'i chos lnga yang yongs su 'dzin te/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa
<p>357a.3</p>dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la brten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub kyi sems la brten pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /bka' stsal pa/ 
<p>357a.4</p>gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad srog gcod de bdog pa thams cad phrog pa las/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tha na byol song la zan kham gcig byin pa'i bar chad byas na ches sdig grangs med par che'o/ /gang chos
<p>357a.5</p>thams cad mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/ /bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang / /nam du'ang long theng mi 'gyur te/ ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro
<p>357a.6</p>ba'i sems cig bskyed pa las/ kha na ma tho ba che ba'i chos de lta bu gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la khro ba'am/ brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa snyed pa skal bar sems can dmyal ba rnams su gnas par go cha bgo
<p>357a.7</p>bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba btab pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan gang gis kyang log pa'i ltung bar byed mi nus so/ /rin chen zla bas zhus pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bu rin chen zla bas gsol pa/ gang
<p>357b</p>
<p>357b.1</p>gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i mtshan bzung na bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur ba de lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes sogs kyi lan du bka' stsal pa/ shar na 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam pa na sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa bzhugs/ 
<p>357b.2</p>lho na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba na sangs rgyas tsan+dan dpal bzhugs/ nub na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po na sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs/ byang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khrugs med na sangs rgyas tog gi dpal bzhugs/ shar lho na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba na
<p>357b.3</p>sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal bzhugs/ lho nub na 'jig rten gyi khams tog dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas rin po che'i mchod sdong bzhugs/ nub byang na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra ldan na sangs rgyas me tog dpal bzhugs/ byang shar na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan na sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa
<p>357b.4</p>chung ngu dang chen pos rnam par rol pa bzhugs so/ /'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas snang ba'i dpal bzhugs/ steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can na sangs rgyas nor dpal bzhugs so/ /dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs las/ dad pa med pa'i mi dag la/ /
<p>357b.5</p>dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/ /sa bon me yis tshig pa las/ /myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no/ /sdong po bkod pa las/ byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/ /dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang mnyam pa bskyed
<p>357b.6</p>kyang / byang chub kyi sems skye zhing de las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o/ /dkon mchog za ma tog las/ byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sbubs kyi nang na 'dug pa bdag tu lta ba ma brtol zhing khams gsum las ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi sgra nyid du rnam par thar pa'i sgo
<p>357b.7</p>gsum gyi sgra 'byin to/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo las g.yo byas te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la yang sangs rgyas kyi rgyur gsungs na/ dge ba sna 'ga' byas te sems bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bskal pa bzang po'i mdo las de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po ba lang rdzir gyur
<p>358a</p>
<p>358a.1</p>pas so rtsi'i 'dab ma phul te/ dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa thag par gyur pas ras kyi kha tshar phul 'od 'phro can grong gi sprang por gyur pas rtsa'i me sgron phul/ gdul dka' shing thun du gyur pas so shing phul te/ dang po byang chub tu
<p>358a.2</p>sems bskyed do/ /spyod pa dang mi yang byang chub kyi sems ni bde ba mtha' yas pa bskyed pa yin te/ ci mngon zhe na/ byams pa'i rnam par thar ba las/ rigs kyi bu dper na rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang gser rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi
<p>358a.3</p>'dor la dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par bzlog go/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan dang bral yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor la/ 'khor ba'i dbul ba
<p>358a.4</p>thams cad rnam par bzlog go/ /sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa dpal 'byung gis bstan pa lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gror mi ltung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal bar mi byed
<p>358a.5</p>do/ /spyod pa thams cad brjed ngas pa med par spyod pa yin no/ /las dang nyon mongs pas thub par dka' ba yin no/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bag med pa'i gnas nas zlog pa'o/ /'khor ba'i grong nas 'dor ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na yid la bya ba rgyun ma chad pas dge
<p>358a.6</p>ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar bya'o/ /khur thams cad kyis mi skyo bas sa lta bu'i sems dang / mi phyed pas rdo rje lta bu dang / las thams cad nyams su len pas bran lta bu dang / brgyal bcom pas phyag dar ba lta bu dang / mi khro bas khyi lta bu dang / dge ba'i bshes
<p>358a.7</p>gnyen gyi ngor lta bas bu mdzangs pa lta bu'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du shes/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sman pa/ rjes su bstan pa la ni sman/ nan tan la ni nad 'tsho ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /seng
<p>358b</p>
<p>358b.1</p>ges zhus pa las/ skye ba kun du byang chub sems/ /rmi lam na yang sems de ni/ /'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/ /smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/ /bka' stsal pa/ grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am/ /gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/ /byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/ /des na
<p>358b.2</p>sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i phung po las/ mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang nyi ma dang char bas dengs kyang bla'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos zong gser du bsgyur du mi rung ste/ mchod rten la ni mchod rten gyi zong cis kyang brel phongs pa
<p>358b.3</p>med pa'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las gang zag gis gang zag la drod bzung na smas par 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig /chos thams cad shin tu rgyas pa'i bsdus pa'i mdo las/ gang chos smra ba la mi gus pa de sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin no/ /gang chos smra ba la mi snyan par brjod
<p>358b.4</p>pa de sangs rgyas yongs su gtong ba yin no/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de la gti mug can de dag 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrubs pa byang chub sems
<p>358b.5</p>dpa' bslab par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing de dag pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la sun 'byin par sems na 'di snyam du sems/ nga ka shi ka'i rgyal por gyur pas phug ron gyi phyir khra la sha byin pa de shes rab 'chal ba can yin nam/ gsol ba/ de ni ma
<p>358b.6</p>lags so/ /ngas byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag gis gnon par gyur tam/ de ni ma lags so/ /mi gti mug can de dag 'di skad du byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul gcig pa yin no zhes zer na/ de dag spyod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin
<p>358b.7</p>no/ /dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/ chos bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa rnams zad par 'gyur te/ nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang / thos pa dang / bkur sti la chags pas khyim pas lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la khro zhing skur
<p>359a</p>
<p>359a.1</p>pa 'debs pa dang / ma zin cing ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba'o/ /thams cad yod par smra ba'i lung las/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'dis mchod rten la phyag byas te sems dang ba la ltos/ btsun pa de lta lags so/ /dge slong 'dis sa ji tsam non pa'i 'od dpag tshad
<p>359a.2</p>brgyad khri bzhi stong na bye ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid stong 'gyur du spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis gsol pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bur che ba gang du yongs su bas par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas/ tshangs
<p>359a.3</p>pa mtshungs par spyod pa la rma phyung ba dang / rmas pa byas pa de lta bu ni ngas ma mthong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'di dag der yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'gal ba la yang sems kyis gnod par mi byan/ sems dang bcas pa'i lus ci smos/ sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi
<p>359a.4</p>mdo las/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas bzhi brgya 'dzin pa dang / dge slong gi sdom pa bslab pa'i gnas nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / dge slong ma'i lnga brgya 'dzin pa las nyams te/ ngan 'gros 'jigs na sman gyi bla la mchod pa sna tshogs byas na ngan song
<p>359a.5</p>las thar ro/ /'phags pa byams pa'i rnam par thar pa las/ dper na mar me gcig khyim mam khang bur bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags pa'i mun pa yang sel ba de bzhin du/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems gcig bskyed ma thag tu bskal ba brjod du med par bsags
<p>359a.6</p>pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa sel to/ /zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/ sems can don brtson byang chub sems dang ni/ /tshul bzhin yid kyis dben sems gang yin dang / /rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/ /yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu/ /
<p>359a.7</p>'od srungs kyi le'u las/ chos bzhis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur te bzhi ni chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos la ser sna byed cing slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang zag la chos kyi bar chad byed de
<p>359b</p>
<p>359b.1</p>'dun pa bzlog cing chos mi ston pa yin/ nga rgyal gyis bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa yin/ chos bzhis byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi ni/ slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la slu ba dang / gzhan 'gyod pa med pa la nye bar sgrub pa dang / theg
<p>359b.2</p>pa chen po la zhugs pa'i gang zag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra ba dang / g.yo dang sgyus gzhan la spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin no/ /chos bzhis byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur zhing skyes ma thag tu mngon du 'gyur te/ bzhi
<p>359b.3</p>ni/ srog gi phyir yang tha na bzhad gad du yang brdzun mi byed pa dang / g.yo sgyu med par sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes shing de dag gi bsngags pa phyogs bzhir sgrogs pa
<p>359b.4</p>dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can smin par byed pa de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no/ /gang zhe na/ chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mod kyang / /las kyi rnam par smin la'ang
<p>359b.5</p>yid ches so/ /bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang / /sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed/ /de yi bsam pa rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas/ /de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin/ /yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang / /las kyi rnam par
<p>359b.6</p>smin la re ba med/ /sngags dang sman gyis zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so/ /de bzhin du thabs dang shes rab kyis zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/ /dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud/ /
<p>359b.7</p>de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs lung / /de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan pa byed/ /lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba'i stong pa yin no/ /'od srungs stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ba'o zhes ngas bshad do/ /byang chub
<p>360a</p>
<p>360a.1</p>sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ling tog gis mig khebs pa dang yang 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /
<p>360a.2</p>log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes pa las 'byung ba ma gtogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs pa gang yin ba de ni rgyu ba 'dri ba lta zhe na/ 'od srungs sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs so/ /ngan song bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
<p>360a.3</p>rje'i 'jig rten dang lha ma yin no/ /rtsod pa med pa'i lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la rim gro byed pa des 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing lus kyi dge ba bcu ni tshor bas kun du ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus
<p>360a.4</p>mi byed pa dang / mig 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lag pa g.yob par mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang / gcin mi gtor ba dang / phyi sa mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying gar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / nam mkha' la mi snyegs pa dang / ji ltar
<p>360a.5</p>'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa las/ sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do/ /rin po che bdun ni/ gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / sbug dang / mu tig
<p>360a.6</p>dmar po'o/ /rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa las/ gang zag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dag gis ni sangs rgyas yongs su gtang ba yin te/ ji snyed kyi khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa de/ de snyed kyi bskal bar
<p>360a.7</p>sems can dmyal bar go bgo dgos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngan song du 'gro bar log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu gzhan ni ngas ma mthong ngo / /ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
<p>360b</p>
<p>360b.1</p>pa drug sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyir yin na/ de la mi blun po dag 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho nas byang chub sems dpa' bslab par bya'o zhes zer zhing pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams sun 'byin to/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ ka shi'i rgyal po gang yin pa des mgo
<p>360b.2</p>byin pa de 'chal ba'i shes rab can yin nam/ gsol pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la la ni bzang bar 'du shes/ la la ni ngan par 'du shes na chos spong ba'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ched du/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi/ 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
<p>360b.3</p>ched du gsungs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba'o/ /nga ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi spobs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu las byung bar smon lam btab pa yin na/ mi blun po de dag ngan song du 'gro bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir de la
<p>360b.4</p>skyon 'dogs par sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i chos smra ba la skyon 'dogs par sems so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bzung ma bklags par smra na chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las/ ma smras par thar pa shin tu dka'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na ma smras par
<p>360b.5</p>'gyur te/ sems can la khong khro ba med pa dang / chos smra ba rnams dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / pha rol mi spong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa thams cad la gus pa'o/ /sprin chen po las/ bram ze chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ser po chen po byang chub sems
<p>360b.6</p>dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la bzod par gsol cig /gang la la lha sbyin gyi yon tan mi shes pa de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba'i phyed thob pa tsam du zad pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /bram ze chen po lhas byin gyi yon tan gyi che ba la ltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang 'dra bar skyes bu chen po yin par blta ste/ 'dul ba'i
<p>360b.7</p>dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang na snang ba der/ skyes bu chen po 'di yang phyi bzhin 'brang zhing snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i drug sde rnams kyis bskor ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rtag tu de mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
<p>361a</p>
<p>361a.1</p>sems can dmyal ba na rtse bar byed de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul yin no/ /lha sbyin ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yang ma yin no/ /lha mo slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Da n+yi 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya nyi shu lon pa na mau rgya'i rigs zhes bya ba byed kyi
<p>361a.2</p>'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ skyes nas yang phyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ de'i ming ji skad ces bgyi/ lha mo dge bsnyen gyi rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi
<p>361a.3</p>'gyur te/ /sems can rnams ni smin mdzad phyir/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston/ /sprin chen po 'di yang lo bzhi bcu'i bar du 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur te/ rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su nyams pa'i dus na/ 'od srungs chen po dang 'dra ba'i
<p>361a.4</p>dge slong du 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur te/ bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa'i bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mang po dag gis gsol pa/ yun ji srid cig na 'od srungs chen po dang 'dra ba'i dge slong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du ni skye/ de'i ming ni ji skad ces
<p>361a.5</p>bgyi bar gzung bar 'tshal/ bka' stsal pa/ nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya phrag mang po 'das pa na/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud du mkhar gyi rgyal po bde spyod ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe lo brgyad cu na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i lhag ma tsam lus pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe
<p>361a.6</p>nga'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir dge slong des ni de bzhin gshegs pa klu rigs sgron ma'i thad du shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa bzung ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ brtson 'grus
<p>361a.7</p>chen po'i gru de ni de ltar lits+tsha bI 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba 'di yin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi mthun pa'i dge slong du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gzhan yang / nga'i nyan thos de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi mthun pa'i dge slong chos kyi sgra chen po lan gsum mngon par
<p>361b</p>
<p>361b.1</p>bsgrags nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i che ba nyid la ltos/ /de'i tshe nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs nub par 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'di nas 'chi 'phos nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas/ bskal pa drug cu rtsa gnyis su sangs rgyas mi 'byung ste/ 
<p>361b.2</p>rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug 'bum 'byung ngo / /bskal pa de dag 'das nas sangs rgyas bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdun po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par dang bzhes bya bar 'gyur te/ der 'di de bzhin gshegs pa ye
<p>361b.3</p>shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag de kho na dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes pa yang dag par mthong ba ni/ shin tu yang dag pa'i lta ba can zhes nga smra'o/ /gsol ba/ ci las dgongs
<p>361b.4</p>te 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes brdzun pa rnams rdzogs par bshad cing / de skad bka' stsal pa de kho na dang rtag pa dang bdag dang sems can du 'du shes pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang ther zug dang brtan pa zhes bya ba dam
<p>361b.5</p>pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ /sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag ni thar pa la zad pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin yongs su mya ngan las 'das par sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu
<p>361b.6</p>lhag pa yang dag par mthong bar 'dod pas ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la rtag pa dang bdag dang sems can du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing thar pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bye ba snyed dag lung
<p>361b.7</p>ston par sprin chen po'i mdo tsheg bar brgyad par sbyar ba'i le'u 'bum pa las lung bstan pa'i rgyud yin no/ /sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba las chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ mi shes pa las 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad 'byung bar rtogs pa dang / ye shes
<p>362a</p>
<p>362a.1</p>mthong ba las 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad 'byung bar rtogs nas/ spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'jug par bya zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos
<p>362a.2</p>nyid du rtogs na yang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni sems tsam ste sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/ /ngas sems
<p>362a.3</p>can chos zab mo la spyod pa ma byas pa rnams rmongs par gyur na mi rung zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rmongs phan chad yod pa med do zhes rnam grangs kyis bstan par bya ba yin zhes gsungs so/ /chos gang zhig skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med pa de ni shi phan chad pa'am
<p>362a.4</p>med pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang skye ba yang med 'gag pa yang med do/ /chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes bya ba ji ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu yin zhe na/ ji ltar nam mkha' gang du yang ma gtogs pa de ltar chos thams
<p>362a.5</p>cad kyang gang du ma gtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa ma chags ma thogs pas/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam pa du ma ma lus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /lus ngan po yi bu thu bo/ /
<p>362a.6</p>gnod sbyin yang dag shes zhes bya/ /rtsod med khro ba med gnas te/ /pha dang bcas te rtag tu ni/ /chos 'di dag la dga' ba gang / /de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi mun
<p>362a.7</p>pa dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi ni thos pas ngoms pa med cing / tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa dang / tshul gcig
<p>362b</p>
<p>362b.1</p>la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug go/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi tshul la rtog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ni bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa 'chib rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po la rjes
<p>362b.2</p>su yi rang zhing byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhol ba'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ba bzhin smra ba yin te/ bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos ba dam pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin
<p>362b.3</p>du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa yin te/ bzhi ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang / mtho ris kyi rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i rgyu
<p>362b.4</p>sgom pa mi spong ba'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du spyod par byed kyang bsam gtan la gnas pa
<p>362b.5</p>las g.yo bar ma gyur na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang med par lta na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang
<p>362b.6</p>po bsrungs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad nyan par byed cing thos pa'i don yang rtogs par byed la/ ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin cing ji ltar gzung ba yang gzhan la ston par byed na mang du thos pa yin no/ /'jam
<p>362b.7</p>dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung la 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung ste/ 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal
<p>363a</p>
<p>363a.1</p>nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ lha'i sku khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' der nyon mongs par mi byed na nyan thos su 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas/ sbyin pa'i
<p>363a.2</p>pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa dang / le los brtson 'grus dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan dang / bems po dang sems dang po lug ltar lkugs
<p>363a.3</p>pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa na de tsam gyis na lam la gnas pa yin no/ /'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ 
<p>363a.4</p>sems can dang chos dang / byang chub kyi chos dge ba'i chos te bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do/ /tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba ni/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ ting nge 'dzin dang
<p>363a.5</p>de las 'das pas shes rab dang / de las 'das pas rnam par grol ba ste/ de lta bus tshul khrims sgrub pa yin no/ /gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ldan zhing theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs
<p>363a.6</p>pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /le lo'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyis rtul par mi byed pa ste/ chos la ltar brtson pa ni brtson 'grus so/ /rmi lam na yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dran pa med pas/ brjed ngas pa ste/ sa de lta bur ma ltung ba nyid theg
<p>363a.7</p>pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas bsam gtan no/ /chos thams cad bems po ste/ rtsa ba la sogs pa dang gnas lugs ji lta ba de bzhin du shes pa ni shes rab bo/ /gang tshe sems ni chags med pa/ /bla med byang chub sems yin te/ /
<p>363b</p>
<p>363b.1</p>sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa/ /de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ /sems bskyed pa ni thams cad na/ /byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing / /byang chub sems las rab brtag pa/ /de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /thabs dang mi ldan shes rab kyis/ /ma byung 'byung
<p>363b.2</p>bar 'gyur ba med/ /shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /mkhas pa rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/ /nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 'di lta ste/ rlung las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa
<p>363b.3</p>brgya rtsa gcig go/ /las rnam pa gsum ste/ tshe dang 'brel pa dang / srid pa bar ma dang 'brel pa dang / tshe gzhan dang 'brel pa'o/ /skyes pa gang zhig skyes pa la 'jug par byed na/ de lus dang bral nas sems can dmyal ba nyam nga bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lug mo'am bong
<p>363b.4</p>mo la 'jug par byed na sems can dmyal ba a tsa zer du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo'am gzhan yang 'os ma yin pa la 'jug na sems can dmyal ba kyi hud zer du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma tshul khrims ral zhing spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug na sems can dmyal ba 'chi ba'i rgyun med
<p>363b.5</p>lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnyis rtsod pa na rgyal po'i blon po'am gzhan yid ches pa'i gnas su bya bas nor blangs pas mdza' bshes sam/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis zhal che yon por bcad na/ sems can dmyal ba lce bcu gcig par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal
<p>363b.6</p>ba dang / nad bu can dang ltogs pa dang mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dag la nor rdzas sbyin par khas blangs pa las ma byin zhing bza' ba dang btung ba khas blangs pa las ma byin na/ sems can dmyal ba kun dga' la re ba med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /don med chos la dga' ba ni/ /bud
<p>363b.7</p>med g.yo dang phrag dog mang / /'jig rten gnyis ni rnam 'jig pa/ /skyes pa rnams kyi mdun na gnas/ /de'i tshig shin tu mi brtan te/ /rtag tu 'dod chags skye la mkhas/ /de yi snying ni gzhan sems la/ /gzhan gyi tshul gyis spro bar byed/ /dang po mnyen zhing srun byed la/ /
<p>364a</p>
<p>364a.1</p>phyi nas sems ni rdo rje 'dra/ /sems ni yang zhing phan pa med/ /bkur sti dag ni dran med byed/ /legs pa brgya ni chud gsan la/ /ma legs gcig pu dran par byed/ /sdig pa'i sa gzhi bud med yin/ /snying ni glog gi ngo bo bzhin/ /skyes pa chags pa'i
<p>364a.2</p>sems yod na/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu ni bud med yin/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /'jigs byed nang na bud med 'jigs/ /gal te bde ba'i mchog 'dod na/ /de ltar bud med rnam par spongs/ /bud med rtag tu spangs pa ni/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol bde/ /gang zhig
<p>364a.3</p>dbul ba spong 'dod cing / /gang zhig bdag ni 'byor 'dod dang / /gang zhig mya ngan 'das 'gro 'dod/ /mi des bud med spong bar byed/ /ji ltar bram ze smra ba las/ /bud med gzhon nu 'dod langs la/ /bag mar ma blangs na mi srog gcad pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur zer zhes pa lta
<p>364a.4</p>bu'o/ /mtshams med pa lnga char byas na lus dpag tshad lnga par gyur ba nas/ gcig byas na gcig gi bar du 'gyur ro/ /mnar med pa de dag kha cig ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi lus nyid las mnar med pa'i me 'byung bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas srid pa par mar
<p>364a.5</p>skyes la/ de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gyur ro/ /bslab pa'i gzhi gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam/ bzhi'am lnga'am gzhan blangs pa dang / bu sring ngam bu sring dang 'dra ba'am/ grogs kyi chung ma 'os pa ma yin pa dag la slu bar byed na/ sems
<p>364a.6</p>can dmyal ba a la la zhes zer bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dgas kyi rigs ni mdor bsdus na sum cu rtsa drug yod do/ /'di lta ste/ lto gug dang / kha khab mig ltar phra ba dang / bshang ba zab dang / dri zab dang / spos zab dang / chu 'thung ba dang / mchil ma za ba dang / phreng
<p>364a.7</p>ba za ba dang / sha za ba dang / khrag zab dang / dud pa za ba dang / drag shul spyod pa dang / glags lta ba dang mthu bo che dang / mi la glags lta ba dang mtshan mo lus 'bar ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / mi gtsang ba za ba dang / bdud kyi sde
<p>364b</p>
<p>364b.1</p>dang / yul dgon du chu dkon pa srog chags dang 'brel cing spyod pa 'tsho ba de la ltos pa de bcad na sems can dmyal bar bya dza ba b+ha sgra 'byin du skye'o/ /klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mkhas pa las chos mnyan nas/ chos 'dul ba de la mi 'jug mi snyan pas sun 'byin na sems can
<p>364b.2</p>dmyal ba mes sreg tu skye'o/ /gnod sems snying la yod pa ni/ /kun gyis bsrung bar mi nus te/ /bshes grogs gnyen gyi mis ma yin/ /chos dang don gyi tshogs kyis min/ /'khrugs med mi zad nor yin te/ /skye bo kun gyi rje bor che/ /bden pa mtho ris
<p>364b.3</p>skas yin te/ /de nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo/ /mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni ji ltar mos pa de ltar 'gro ba yin te/ gal te sa'i khams su mos na nam mkha' yang sa'i khams su mthong nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rin chung dus nyos nas chen por
<p>364b.4</p>'tshe ba dang phrag dog dang / ser snas nyams pa ni yi dgas tshangs pa'i srin por skye ste/ mi bram ze'i gzugs kyis rgyu ba yin no/ /yun rings ngan 'gror bcom pa yi/ /dge ba'i bag chags dga' byed de/ /me tog nyams kyang til dag la/ /bag chags snang
<p>364b.5</p>pa ji bzhin no/ /de dag gis las ngan pa byas pa des rgya mtsho yang thams cad du skams shing ri dang nags tshal dang rgya mtshor bcas pa de yang 'bar bar mthong ngo / /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas
<p>364b.6</p>btsas gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis thos nas/ de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed de tshigs su bcad pa 'di
<p>364b.7</p>dag smras so/ /gzugs la brkam dang sgra la brten pa dang / /dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa dang / /'dod la brkam dang bde la dga' ba yis/ /byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so/ /yang de nyid las byung ba/ byang chub sems ni bdag gi rmi lam thos/ /chos rnams bdag
<p>365a</p>
<p>365a.1</p>ni byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba bstan pa las byung ba'i/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / sems can thams cad kyi
<p>365a.2</p>bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du/ mdo'i sde la sogs pa gsal bar 'chad cing ston kyang / 'di ltar yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so/ /de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
<p>365a.3</p>'dus pa dge slong la sogs pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang / de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgongs par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thob pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang / chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun nges pa'i tshig tha dad
<p>365a.4</p>pa la/ gnod pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun du shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/ /yang de nyid las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad
<p>365a.5</p>kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang / sems can yi ger lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag la chos ston to/ /bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin
<p>365a.6</p>gshegs pa'i tshems dang / sgros dang / zhal gyi rkan dang / ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la/ 'byung ba yang grag go/ /zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung bos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
<p>365a.7</p>skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ las las byung ba ma yin/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/ pha ma las byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin/ sha dang khrag gi pags pas g.yogs pa ma yin/ rus pa dang chu ba'i 'og ris 'brel
<p>365b</p>
<p>365b.1</p>ba ma yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba ma yin/ srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/ chos kyi sku dang gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa'i sku dang / spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i rgyu yin yang / gzugs dang mtshan ma gtso bor byed
<p>365b.2</p>pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs las dben pa chos kyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad du bltar snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dul ba gzhi las/ bud+d+ha
<p>365b.3</p>'od srungs kyi ring la rgyal po kr-i kri byung ste/ bud+d+has kyang der smon lam btab nas dga' ldan du skyes so/ /kr-i kI'i rgyud kyis grong khyer po ta lar rgyal po'i rabs brgya rtsa gcig byas so/ /de dag gi tha mar rgyal po kar+Na zhes bya ba ste/ de las bu gau tam dang / b+ha rad+h+wa dza zhes bya ba gnyis
<p>365b.4</p>yod pa las/ b+har d+h+wa dza ni rgyal po byed do/ /gau ta ma ni pha ma la gsol nas/ drang srong nag sbyin las rab tu byung ste/ drang srong gi gnas dgon pa ma bcas te/ grong po ta la dang nye ba zhig na spyil bu na 'dug pa las/ bzang mo gzugs kyis 'tsho ba mi g.yon chen/ mri na pa zhes bya ba dang mthun
<p>365b.5</p>te nyal bar byas pa las gzhan zhig dang khri ba'i gtam thos nas/ bzang mo mri na pa bsad pa dang / bzang mo'i g.yog gis khus btab ste/ mi kun gyis bsnyags pa dang / mri na las ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i spyil po'i sgor bzhag nas bros so/ /mi kun gyis ral gri
<p>365b.6</p>mthong ba dang / rab tu byung ba mi gsod ces de khrid ba dang / rgyal po b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas ma brtags par gsal shing la btsugs so/ /de nas drang srong nag pos de mthong nas dris te gtam byas nas/ gau ta mas bdag gar skye zhes byas pa dang / de na re bram ze dag na re rigs rgyud med pa
<p>365b.7</p>la 'gro ba med do zhe na/ bu lta yod dam med des smras pa med do/ /de nas drang srong gis byin gyis brlabs te/ char pa dang rlung bsil ba dag gis lus la phog par byas nas sngon gyi 'dod pa la spyod pa dran par gyis shig ces pa dang / khu ba dang khrag 'dres pa'i thigs pa gnyis zags
<p>366a</p>
<p>366a.1</p>pa las sgo nga gnyis byung ste/ nyi mas smin par rgyas pa dang / de brdol nas bu gnyis byung ste bu ram gyi tshal gyir ba zhig tu dong ngo / /pha ni shi'o/ /de nas drang srong gis de gnyis blangs nas gsos ta/ nyi mas smin par byas pa dang / bu ram
<p>366a.2</p>gyi tshal na gnas pa dang / gau ta ma'i bu la ming gsum du grags par btags so/ /de nas b+ha ra d+h+wa dza rabs chad de/ shi nas blon pos pho bo gau ta ma rab tu byung ba rgyal por gzhug go zhes nas drang srong nag po la rmas ba las bsad par gyur to/ /bu gnyis de ni 'dug pa las phu bo rgyal por
<p>366a.3</p>bcug pa las rabs chad do/ /nu bo bcug ste bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar grags so/ /de'i 'phel rgyud las grong khyer po ta la'i rgyal po brgya rtsa gcig go/ /de dag gi tha ma bu ram shing pa rgyal po 'phags skyes po'o/ /de la bu bzhi ste/ ta la la gar ni dang / ka ra kar ni dang / ha sti ni
<p>366a.4</p>yangs pa dang / nu bo ro ka'o/ /de nas 'phags skyes po'i chung ma shi bas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo blangs pa las/ rgyal po des rang gi tsha bo zhig yod na/ rgyal tshab tu gzhug par dam bcas nas byin no/ /phyis bu zhig byung ba dang / rgyal tshab tu ma bcug pa dang / rgyal po de
<p>366a.5</p>yang dag gam zhes bsdigs so/ /de nas 'phags skyes po bred nas/ ji ltar bya zhes pa dang blon pos bu gzhan skrod la de chug ces so/ /de nas rgyal po dang blon pos thabs byas nas bu kun bskrad pa dang / de dag la kun dga' bas/ sring mo yan chad zhag bdun
<p>366a.6</p>gyi bar du grong ta la la'i sgo nas 'drul ma chad par dod pa dang / phyis sgo bcad de lhag ma ma ba kye'o/ /de dag gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo b+ha go ra thi'i drung na drang srong ser skya'i gnas kyi nye 'khor du dong nas spyil po byas te ri dgas bshor zhing 'khod do/ /de nas 'dod
<p>366a.7</p>chags kyis gdungs nas kun ser po bseng bseng bor song nas/ drang srong gis khyod rgyal rigs rgyal thabs las nyams pas g.yas khyim gyi sring mo 'tsho zhing chos so/ /de nas mi 'phel nas kun chos drang srong la mnos nas/ gser gyi ril ba'i chus sa khor bris te/ grong khyer brtsigs
<p>366b</p>
<p>366b.1</p>nas der bzhag go/ /grong khyer gyi bzhi drang srong ser skyas bres pas/ ser skya'i grong khyer ro/ /de nas 'phags skyes kyis de dag gis nus phong bar thos nas shAkyar btags so/ /de nas 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal tshab dang bu bskrad pa yan chad/ ri'i rgyal por
<p>366b.2</p>mthar gyis bcug pa las gzhan ni kun rabs chad do/ /nu pur ko la bu la ka zhes bya ba zhig yod pa'i 'phel rgyud kyis/ ser skya'i grong khyer gyi rgyal po stong lnga bcu rtsa lngar byas so/ /de dag gi tha ma gzhu brten la bu gnyis te/ seng ge man kal
<p>366b.3</p>dang / seng ge'i sgra'o/ /seng ge'i man kal la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang ma dang / zas dkar po dang / dro no da na dang / bdud rtsi zas so/ /bu mo ni gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre mo dang / bdud rtsi ma'o/ /zas gtsang ma la bu gnyis te/ 
<p>366b.4</p>don grub dang dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar po la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa ti sh+ya dang / byi ka'o/ /dro no dan la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang ma 'gags pa'o/ /bdud rtsi zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhas byin no/ /gtsang ma'i bu ni rab tu tshor ba'o/ /
<p>366b.5</p>dkar mo'i bu ni pa tra ma li'o/ /dro no'i bu ni ta li'o/ /bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni she ba la'o/ /bud+d+he'i sras ni rAhu la'o/ /bud+d+ha'i yum sgyu 'phrul chen mo'o/ /yum yar mo sgyu ma ste/ gnyi ga rgyal po gnyi tshad kyi bu mo'o/ /yum ni gcen no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
<p>366b.6</p>dga' ldan gyi gnas nas gshegs pa chos nyid kyis gzigs pa lnga la gzigs te/ rigs dang yul dang rus dang dus dang bud med do/ /rigs ni rgyal rigs dang bram ze gang la btsan par 'dzin pa la gzigs te/ der skye ba ma blangs na 'jig rten la phan pa dang / 
<p>366b.7</p>sems can gyi don du mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang de dang 'dra'o/ /yul ni gang na bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang slong mo ba mang ba 'gro ba yang rabs mang zhing mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa'o/ /dus ni skye bo'i tshe lo brgyad khri las yar 'das na yang skyo ba chung zhing blun/ /brgya
<p>367a</p>
<p>367a.1</p>las mar 'gribs na yang snyigs ma lnga shas che/ rus dang bud med ni shAkya dang sgyu ma chen po lta bu go rims bzhin mang pos bkur ba tshun tshan che ba dang / bdun rgyud tshun tshan la skyon med cing mdzangs dge la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
<p>367a.2</p>mngal na zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa'o/ /ston pa drug 'od srungs rdzogs byed la sogs pa rjes su ston pa drug bram ze ku ta til do la sogs pa drug ma rig pa'i bu u tra ka la sogs pa/ bud+d+ha lhums su zhugs tshun chad don kun grub pa'i phyir don kun grub/ 
<p>367a.3</p>shAkya'i spyi lha sbyin shAkya spel ba la phyag 'tshal du khrid pa las/ des phyi rol du bsu ste/ phyag byas pas lha'i yang lha/ lha la phyag 'tshal du chas pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de na gnas pa'i shAkya mthong zur can mi srun pa kun thub pa bzhin 'khod pas na shAkya thub pa'o/ /
<p>367a.4</p>bdun mtho ba phyag gnyis dpung mgo gnyis lhag pa'o/ /rin po che bdun las 'khor la ni gser las byas pa lte ba zlum po rtsibs stong pa'o/ /nor bu ni be+e DUr+ya dgos 'dod 'byung ba'o/ /ba lang ni thal kar ro/ /rta ni mgrin sngon no/ /bud med ni reg na bde ba'o/ /blon po ni gser
<p>367a.5</p>la sogs pa nor 'bul ba'o/ /dmag dpon ni/ dmag thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams nas/ /zhag bdun na yum dus las 'das so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu na khab
<p>367a.6</p>nas byung ste/ lo drug dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi chud par 'gyur bar drang srong mi dkar bas tshor/ drang srong mi dkar ba ri gis skin ngi la gnas te/ shi khar slob ma la/ bdud rtsi tshol du btang nas phyung ba ka t+ya ya chen po yin/ 
<p>367a.7</p>ji ltar lam brgyags nyung ba dag/ /lam zhugs sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin las bzang ma byas pa'o/ /sems can dag ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ /ji ltar lam brgyags gang bdog pa/ /lam zhugs bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin las bzang
<p>367b</p>
<p>367b.1</p>byas pa yi/ /sems can dag ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /rgyu lngas srog gcod pa byas kyang kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lam du 'gro bar zhugs pa'i mi shes pas srog chags phra mo dang / grog sbur la sogs pa srog dang bral bar byed pa dang / gzhan la mtshon chas gzas
<p>367b.2</p>pa las bsam pa dang mi ldan par gzhan la phog ste/ de srog dang bral ba dang / nad pa la sman pas phan par 'dod pas nyes par ma mthong ste/ sman byin pa las des shi ba dang / de bzhin du mas bu 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir brdeg pa las de srog dang bral ba dang / me sbar ba'i nang du srog chags
<p>367b.3</p>mi 'dod bzhin lhung ba ste/ rgyu rnam pa de lngas srog bcad bar gyur kyang / kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma byin par len pa'i sdom ba ma blangs par ma byin par len pa 'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no/ /glang po che bdun legs par gnas pa ni rkang lag bzhi dang mjug ma
<p>367b.4</p>legs pa dang / rlig pa mdoms kyi nang na 'dug pa dang / sna legs par gnas pa'o/ /ral gri nye ba'i rin po che ni/ yul 'khor gzhan du ral gri rang song ste mi 'debs par mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rgyal po'i bka' nyan pa'o/ /pags pa ni rgya mtsho'i klu'i pags pa yin te/ zheng
<p>367b.5</p>dpag tshad lnga chur dpag tshad bcu ste/ klu rnams kyis rgyal po la 'bul/ grang na dro bar byed/ dro na bsil bar byed/ bud med mi sdug pa mthong bar mi byed do/ /mal cha ni mdor na der nyal na sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshal ni rgyal po der zhugs pa na lha'i bya ba la sogs pa 'du ba'o/ 
<p>367b.6</p>khyim ni grang dro ran thun tshod gang la dge ba bya ba de'i dus su sad par 'gyur ro/ /gos ni me la sogs pas mi rdzi du ba med pa'o/ /lham ni chu la yang mi 'bying dal gyis 'gro na yang dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa'o/ /gnyen pa dag la dga' med cing / /mkhas pa dag la lta 'dod la/ /khyim gyi skyon
<p>367b.7</p>las nges 'byung ba/ /de lta bu ni dge slong yin/ /glu dang ga ra la mi lta zhing / /nyes tshogs rnams la chags med pa/ /gang dag dur khong dga' byed pa/ /de lta bu ni dge slong yin/ /de la mi dge ba'i las kyis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o/ /dge bas ni lha rnams su'o/ /'dren
<p>368a</p>
<p>368a.1</p>mas ni mi rnams su skye'o/ /rgyal po'i chad pas nyan pa dang / bla ma dang pha ma dang / 'phags pa'i nad pa ltogs pa dag gi don du ma byin par len pa na 'bras bu chung ba yin/ dkon mchog gsum las ma byin par blangs pa de dag las kyang / sangs rgyas dang
<p>368a.2</p>chos kyi ni ris mthun par slar phul na dag par 'gyur la/ dge 'dun gyis brkus pa ni tshor ba ma myong ba dag par 'gyur ba med do/ /ma byin par len pa'i sdom pa ma blangs pas ma byin par blangs pa 'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no/ /de yi las ni rnam gsum gyis/ /gnas skabs
<p>368a.3</p>dag tu 'tsho byed cing / /rnam par smin pa bzhi bcu tham/ /drag po dag tu g.yos par 'gyur/ /don med gzhi ni chang yin no/ /sems can dmyal ba'i bzhad gad pa/ /dbang po thams cad rnam nyams shing / /don med pa yi rgyur gyur to/ /tshig la shin tu dga' ba dang / /chags pa
<p>368a.4</p>dang ni 'jig pa dang / /ngag gi skyon dang rlom pa dang / /tshig rtsub bzhi ni de bzhin no/ /chang gis kun du g.yengs pa'i yid/ /bya dang mi bya mi shes pa/ /mi de phyugs dang mtshungs pa yin/ /de lta bas na chang spongs shig /chang gis g.yengs pa'i mi dag ni/ /gson yang shi ba dag dang
<p>368a.5</p>mtshungs/ /gang zhig rtag tu gson 'dod pas/ /rtag par chang ni rnam par spongs/ /chang ni nyes pa kun gyi gzhi/ /rtag par don kun med par byed/ /ngan song kun gyi them skas te/ /mun nag gnas ni chen po yin/ /chang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bzhin yi dgas
<p>368a.6</p>'jig rten dang / /chang gis skyon gyis bslus pa yin/ /mi dag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro/ /dug gi nang na dug ni chang / /de bzhin dmyal ba'i nang na dmyal/ /nad kyi nang na nad mchog ni/ /chos zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ /blo dang dbang po nyams byed cing / /rin chen chos ni zad byed
<p>368a.7</p>la/ /tshangs par spyod pa 'jig byed pa/ /mi zad chang ni skye gnas gcig /rgyal po dang ni bstan bcos mkhas/ /chang gis sdong par byed 'gyur na/ /tha mal mi dag chang 'thung ba/ bslus par 'gyur ba ci zhig smos/ /chang la brten pa'i mi dag ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi sta re yin/ 
<p>368b</p>
<p>368b.1</p>ngo tsha med par byed pa'i mchog /spong ba dag tu nye bar bstan/ /chang gis phrogs par gyur pa'i sems/ /bya ba dang ni mi bya ba/ /mi shes rnam par mi shes shing / /thams cad mi yis mi shes so/ /gang zhig chang la brten byed pa/ /skye bo res 'ga' dga' byed cing / /res 'ga' yongs
<p>368b.2</p>su gdung byed la/ /res 'ga' sdig pa byed la yin/ /blo ni shin tu rmongs bskyed cing / /'jig rten gnyis ni rnam 'jig byed/ /thar ba'i chos la me lta bur/ /srog byed kho na chang yin no/ /mi gang dag ni chang spong ba/ /chos kyi ngang tshul mnyam par gzhag /gang na 'chi ba med pa yin/ /
<p>368b.3</p>gnas mchog dag tu de 'gro'o/ /chang 'thung pa yis bslus pa dag /de ni byed pa dman pa yin/ /mi bzod sems can dmyal bar ltung / /don med ci zhig yongs su gdung / /'thung ba'i tshe na chang zhim ste/ /rnam smin tshe na mchog tu tsha/ /kim pa ka nang kim pa ka /chang zhes mkhas pa rnams
<p>368b.4</p>kyis bshad/ /bdag la 'di yis mi gnod ces/ /blo ldan chang la yid ma rton/ /myangs na bsil yang rnam smin tsha/ /chang ni dmyal bar 'gro bar byed/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams byed pa la/ /sems g.yeng ba dag dga' bar byed/ /phyi nas rnam smin tsha ba ru/ /blo ngan yongs su gdung bar
<p>368b.5</p>'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams la blo mi gtad/ /'dod pa mchog tu slu ba yin/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba drag po ste/ /sems can dmyal ba kun gyi rgyu/ /gang zhig 'dod pa rnams la dga'/ /de yi sdug bsngal mtha' med do/ /'dod pa'i sprul gyis zin pa la/ /bde ba nams kyang ga la
<p>368b.6</p>yod/ /khyed cag 'dod pa mi bzad cing / /drag po sems can dmyal bar 'ongs/ /gnod pa shin tu mi bzad la/ /don med ci zhig yongs su gdung / /gang tshe 'dod pas bslus pa yi/ /khyed cag gis ni sdig byas pa/ /de tshe ci phyir khro mi byed/ /de ring ci zhig yongs su gdung / /
<p>368b.7</p>byas pa bsags pa brtan pa yi/ /las dag gi ni 'bras bu snang / /sdig pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pas/ /de lta bas na sdig mi bya/ /sdig pa sdig pa'i rnam smin ni/ /rtag tu ngan song rnams su smin/ /sdig mi byed la sdig med do/ /de lta bas na sdig pa spongs/ /sdig pa yongs su spangs pa
<p>369a</p>
<p>369a.1</p>la/ /sdig pa'i rnam smin med pa yin/ /sdig pa rang gis byas pa gnod/ /gzhan gyis spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gso ba dang / mchod rten rtsig par 'byung ba dang / bcom
<p>369a.2</p>ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas gnas kyi steng ngam/ mi'i 'jig rten na sems can gyis nga'i sku gdung lag tu thob ste/ mya ngan dang dga' ba dang bcas pa bas bsti stong du phyag 'tshal te/ dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas na bsod nams
<p>369a.3</p>tshad med dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mthong na des ni sangs rgyas mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos mthong ngo / /chos mthong ba des ni dge 'dun mthong ngo / /dge 'dun mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'das pa mthong
<p>369a.4</p>ngo / /dga' bo de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa brten pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste/ sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi gnas su 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag
<p>369a.5</p>cag gis cho ga gang dang sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na/ sku gdung thob cing dad pas mchod par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i thabs su sreg shig
<p>369a.6</p>dga' bos yang gsol ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sreg ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shi nas zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog ste/ gdod lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du 'dzud do/ /sgrom du bcug
<p>369a.7</p>nas/ 'bru mar bsung can gyis sgrom gyi nang bkang nas/ kha legs par bcad de yang zhag bdun du 'jog go/ /de nas sgrom nas phyung ste spos chus bkru'o/ /spos chus bkrus nas bdug spos kyis mchod cing gtams la/ shing bal gyis lus kun dkri'o/ /shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du
<p>369b</p>
<p>369b.1</p>ras dkar po bzang po yug stong gis mthar chags su dkri'o/ /de ltar dkris nas sgrom gyi nang 'bru mar bsung can gyis bkang ste/ rgyal po'i rus bu phyir sgrom du bcug la sgrom gyi kha legs par bcad do/ /shing bsung can gyi rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du drangs te/ shing rta'i ngos
<p>369b.2</p>bzhi yang rgyan 'phyang zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyis kyang shing rta bkra'o/ /grangs med pa'i me tog dang / ba dan dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang spos bzang po sna tshogs dang lha'i rol mos bskor cing mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas shing bsung can phyin ri mo dang
<p>369b.3</p>ldan pa dang / mar bsung can gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus bu bsreg go/ /de ltar bsregs nas ring bsrel bsdus te/ grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten sgo bzhi dod par byas te/ ring bsrel de'i nang du bzhag la/ 'jig rten du bcas pa
<p>369b.4</p>thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas bltar gzhug go/ /dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams cung zad cig gis rgyal po'i thabs thob kyang srid pa las rnam par ma grol 'dod pa lnga dang bsten te/ btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas su bcas/ ngan par lta ba dang / gdug
<p>369b.5</p>pa gsum du bcas/ nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ba spu'i nyag ma tsam yang ma spangs pa/ shi nas 'jig rten du bcas pas de lta bu'i cho ga byed cing mchod rten brtsigs nas/ thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing lta na/ dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ci smos te/ 
<p>369b.6</p>bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med pa nas/ btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas dang 'dod pa lnga yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten gyi chos la ba mo'am ser ba lta bur rtogs nas brtson dka' ba brgal te/ shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
<p>369b.7</p>kyis 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i spyod dka' ba spyad de/ phyogs bcu na dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
<p>370a</p>
<p>370a.1</p>ma bsgrubs pa gang yang med la/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / snying rje chen po dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / stong pa bco brgyad dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / spyan lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa
<p>370a.2</p>bdun dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku tshe dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / spyod dka' ba thams
<p>370a.3</p>cad dang / dge ba bsdu ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i khrims dang / yon tan thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / smon lam chen po thams cad dang / thabs la mkhas pa thams cad dang / de la sogs
<p>370a.4</p>te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub ste/ mi dge ba thams cad yongs su bcad/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su bcad/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang yongs su bcad de/ 
<p>370a.5</p>bden pa bzhi dang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis shin tu rtogs nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam bzhi btul te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur nas/ de lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thams cad nan tan byas pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
<p>370a.6</p>mthun par legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal pas/ mthun par chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi chu chos kyi sku'i spyi bor dbang bskur te/ gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bsgrags so/ /de bas ni da
<p>370a.7</p>ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa ste/ phyogs bcur rnam par sangs rgyas pa mthar phyin pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ste lha dang mi'i nang na dpe zla med pa sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang
<p>370b</p>
<p>370b.1</p>dag par rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad
<p>370b.2</p>nas/ sems can gyi phyir mya ngan las 'das na/ 'jig rten gyi chos bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /dga' bo nga mya ngan las 'das na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar zhag bdun gyi bar
<p>370b.3</p>du zhog la/ gdod lcags kyi sgrom bur chug cig /lcags kyi sgrom bur bcug nas mar bsung can gyis khong la/ kha legs par chod cig /sgrom yang rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu spras zhing brgyan la/ sgrom 'khor bar rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / spos dang me
<p>370b.4</p>tog gis mchod pa gyis shig /de lta bur zhag bdun du mchod nas/ sgrom nas phyung la spos chus legs par khrus shig /de ltar spos chus de bzhin gshegs pa sku legs par bkrus nas shing bal gyis sku legs par dkri zhing / de'i steng du rin thang med
<p>370b.5</p>pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkri zhing / de ltar dkris nas phyis lcags kyi sgrom du chug la/ mar bsung can gyis bkang ste/ kha legs par chod cig /de nas gor shi sha tsan+dan dang / a ka ru dang / shing bsung can thams cad dang bcas sku rin po che sna bdun gyi shing
<p>370b.6</p>rta'i steng du bzhag ste/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan te sreg pa'i gnas su drangs shig /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i gos grangs med pa dang / grangs med pa'i rol mo dang / grangs med pa'i me tog dang / 
<p>370b.7</p>spos kyis nam mkha' yang gang tsam du mchod pa gyis la dugs shig /lha dang mi dang 'khor thams cad kyis ni spos kyi shing tsan+dan dang / a ka ru dang / mar bsung can gyis bsregs la dus shig /de ltar bsregs nas lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus la/ rin po che
<p>371a</p>
<p>371a.1</p>sna bdun gyi bum par bcug ste/ grong khyer chen po'i lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas la ring bsrel la mchod na sems can dag bsod nams chen po thob cing / srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob
<p>371a.2</p>par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo 'khor rnam pa bzhi pos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung gi rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas nas/ gzhan yang mchod rten gsum bya'o/ /gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang / dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten dang / 'khor los sgyur
<p>371a.3</p>ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten te/ 'jig rten du bcas pas skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa na sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ stobs bcu dang / thugs rje chen po dang / 
<p>371a.4</p>mi bsnyengs pa bcu dang / rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang bden pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs rnam pa brgyad kyis khams gsum du bsgrags pa dang / kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis lam rgyud drug snang ba mdzad nas sems
<p>371a.5</p>can gyi bsam pa bzhin dul la ni 'bras bu bzhi dang / theg pa gnyis la spyod par gyur/ la la ni zag pa med pa'i 'dus ma byas pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur/ la la ni 'gog pa mi skye ba'i byang chub kyi sa non par gyur/ la la ni tshad med pa'i gzungs rnams thob par
<p>371a.6</p>gyur/ la la ni spyan lnga dang mngon par shes pa drug thob par gyur/ la la ni ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur/ la la ni mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar gyur/ la la ni lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i shugs rnam
<p>371a.7</p>par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi gzhung bsam gyis mi khyab pas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du/ 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam bzhis rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas te ring bsrel la mchod na bsod nams chen po thob cing so
<p>371b</p>
<p>371b.1</p>so'i skye bo dag khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar cing yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/ de bas na sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das na/ 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi dang 'khor thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i drin chen po dang byams pa tshad ma
<p>371b.2</p>mchis pa rjes su gzung ba'i slad du rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten bgyid cing / ring bsrel la mchod pa bgyid pa ni 'os na/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rnam pa gsum po bgyis pas sems can rnams la sman pa ci mchis na/ mchod rten bgyid cing mchod pa bgyid/ /
<p>371b.3</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos shin tu zab mo rtogs nas/ srid pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral nas/ lha dang mi'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/ /de bas na
<p>371b.4</p>mchod rten byas te/ mchod na bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu 'gro ba mang po 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /dga' bo dgra bcom pa ni skye bo'i phyogs zad de srid pa phyi ma mi len la tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'jig rten
<p>371b.5</p>gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/ de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu de mang ste/ des kyang 'gro ba rnam par grol bar byed do/ /dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa las rnam par
<p>371b.6</p>ma grol mod kyi/ bsod nams kyi shugs kyis gling bzhi la dbang ste dge ba bcu'i las kyis sems can ji srid byed pas sems can de dag gis bkur sti'i gnas yin te/ de bas na 'khor rnam bzhis mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur
<p>371b.7</p>ro/ /dga' bos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ bdag cag 'khor rnam bzhis gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel thob par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ 
<p>372a</p>
<p>372a.1</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ 'khor rnam bzhis gal te rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du nga bsregs na/ grong khyer de'i mi dag rgyal po'i las kyi chad pa dang / rtsod pa tshad med
<p>372a.2</p>pa 'byung ste/ thams cad kyis bsod nams mnyam par mi 'thob bo/ /dga' bo gal te 'khor rnam bzhis grong khyer gyi phyi rol na bsregs na/ 'jig rten dag bsod nams mnyam par 'thob po/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
<p>372a.3</p>mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i 'og tu 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che'i bum par stsal nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gang du brtsigs na thams cad dad pa'i sems skye zhing mchod par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das
<p>372a.4</p>kyis bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te/ bsregs nas 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par chug la rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang lam gyi bzhi mdor rin
<p>372a.5</p>po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten bang rim gsum dang ldan pa 'phang lo dang bcas pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan cing spras pa/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchog tu bya ba'i ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ ngos bzhi'i pu shu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas
<p>372a.6</p>pa thams cad du rgyan gyis rab tu spras pa/ mchod rten de'i rim pa gcig ni yang ngos bzhir sgo re rer btod pa/ skar khung thad kar 'bar ba'i nang du rin po che'i bum pa bcug ste/ 'khor rnam bzhis mchod par bya'o/ /dga' bo rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni rim pa
<p>372a.7</p>bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/ /dga' bo dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten ni rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ de yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o/ /dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten yang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ 
<p>372b</p>
<p>372b.1</p>rim pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khams gsum gyi srid pa'i sdug bsngal las ma grol ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te zhugs la bzhin na/ lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam
<p>372b.2</p>bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ji ltar bgos na thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mya ngan las 'das nas lha dang mi la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/ shin tu mnyam
<p>372b.3</p>par sems kyis khams gsum dang rgyud drug pa thams cad la yang bgos te/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las de bzhin gshegs
<p>372b.4</p>pa'i ring bsrel gyi phyed gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/ de bas na khyed ring bsrel gyi phyed 'dod do zhes ma zer
<p>372b.5</p>cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don snyoms par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba/ ngas khyod la 'gram pa g.yas pa'i tshems mche ba gcig sbyin gyis/ khyod kyis lha'i 'jig rten du mchod rten
<p>372b.6</p>byos la mchod cig dang / khyod kyis bsod nams zad mi shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe na lha dang mi thams cad cho nges 'debs shing ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa la lha dang mi la sogs pa khyed mya ngan ma byed
<p>372b.7</p>cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das kyang ring bsrel dag mchod du yod la/ gzhan yang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa yod do/ /de bas dkon mchog gsum dang bden pa bzhi rtag tu 'jig rten na yod do/ /sems
<p>373a</p>
<p>373a.1</p>can dag dad pas mchod pa'i gnas yod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ring bsrel la mchod pa sangs rgyas dkon mchog yin no/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos kyi sku mthong ngo / /chos mthong ba des ni 'phags pa mthong ngo / /
<p>373a.2</p>'phags pa mthong ba des ni bden pa bzhi mthong ngo / /bden pa bzhi mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ngo / /de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa/ gnas pa mi 'gyur ba mi 'pho ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /bcom
<p>373a.3</p>ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa'i mya ngan chen po ma byed cig /nga ni mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nges tshul khrims sam/ gnas sam/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ dkon mchog
<p>373a.4</p>gsum mam/ bden pa bzhi'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/ rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis las the tshom du gyur pa yod na myur du dris shig /'dri ba 'di ni tha mar 'dri ba ste/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'gyod pa med par bya'o zhes lan gsum gyi
<p>373a.5</p>bar du bka' stsal to/ /de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/ skad brnangs nas yi chad pa tsam du yid la gcags te mya ngan gyis brgyal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchi ma phyis nas cang mi smra ste zhu ba yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir
<p>373a.6</p>zhe na/ 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad ni tshul khrims dang / gnas dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / bden pa bzhi mngon sum du rtogs te/ the tshom med par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnam bzhi po la the tshom med par thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 
<p>373a.7</p>legs so legs so shin tu legs so/ /'khor bzhi po khyed dkon mchog gsum dang / bden pa bzhi shin tu rtogs te/ the tshom med pa ni ji ltar chu dang bas dri ma bkrus pa dang 'dra ste/ khyed kyang brtson 'grus gyis shig dang / myur du 'byung ba'i lam
<p>373b</p>
<p>373b.1</p>thob par 'gyur gyis brgyas pa tsam du mya ngan ma byed cig /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du gser lta bu'i phyag gis na bza' sbyar ma bzhag nas gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu seng ge'i mthong ka dpal be'u phyung ste/ 'khor mang po
<p>373b.2</p>rnams la bstan nas/ lha dang mi dang 'khor mang po rnams la nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bul ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi dang thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la mig mi 'dzums par bltas pas rab
<p>373b.3</p>tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag sdom pa gsum la rig pa dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po la bstan nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i 'od zer tshad med dpag tu med pa khrag khrig brgya stong snyed bkye nas/ 
<p>373b.4</p>phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /de ltar 'od bkye nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du shin tu spyod dka' ba
<p>373b.5</p>spyad de/ lus kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa yang gtubs nas shin tu spyod dka' ba thams cad spyad de/ snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi dbang gis rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ rdo rje lta bur mi
<p>373b.6</p>'jig pa gser btso ma'i kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa tshad med pa'i 'od zer gyis thams cad du snang bar byas pa thob ste/ 'od zer gyis reg gam/ sku mthong ba tsam gyis kyang ma grol ba med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
<p>373b.7</p>yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa shin tu dka' ba ni me tog u dum bA ra dang 'dra ste/ shin tu mthong bar dka'o/ /khyod kyis nang gi tha mar nga'i sku mthong ba 'di la don med par mi bya'o/ /sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus
<p>374a</p>
<p>374a.1</p>rnyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/ de ni gdul bya'i don mdzad nas nga mya ngan las 'dar nye'o/ /khyed la sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig /khyed kyang yongs su dag pa'i las la nan tan byas na/ /
<p>374a.2</p>'bras bu 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yang dang yang lan gsum gyi bar du bka' stsal nas/ gser btso ma lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po rnams la mngon du bstan to/ /de nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gser gyi khri las bzhengs te steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun
<p>374a.3</p>srid du 'phags nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye ya si/ khyed la sogs ba 'khor mang po rnams bsam pa shin tu dag pas/ nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du bka' stsal to/ /de nas nam mkha' las
<p>374a.4</p>babs te/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/ yang 'khor mang po rnams la nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa shin tu dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhengs nas
<p>374a.5</p>nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig srid du 'phags nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig /de bzhin du shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags
<p>374a.6</p>nas lan bdun gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i/ /khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/ gang dag sems bshus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang / /gang dag
<p>374a.7</p>'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med/ /de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu/ /srog chags shi ba rjes blang ste/ /'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min/ /g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste/ /pham nas gson pa de lta min/ /snga ma'i dpung las mi rgyal te/ /dpa' bo'i
<p>374b</p>
<p>374b.1</p>dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong ba las bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ gang dag gi ched de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
<p>374b.2</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems can rnams dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma
<p>374b.3</p>yin pas de'i phyir gang dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
<p>374b.4</p>'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang / yang rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
