<p>374b.5</p>sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang / sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
<p>374b.6</p>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha dang mi dang / lha
<p>374b.7</p>ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge zhes 'byung ba dang / yang rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na
<p>375a</p>
<p>375a.1</p>ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
<p>375a.2</p>bskor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
<p>375a.3</p>rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ /sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes 'byung ba dang / yang rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'
<p>375a.4</p>sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa
<p>375a.5</p>thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
<p>375a.6</p>chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad
<p>375a.7</p>mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'thob ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
<p>375b</p>
<p>375b.1</p>bshad pa na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing / rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta bu ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs
<p>375b.2</p>su mi gtong ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ de yang mi gnas ba'i tshul gyis gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i
<p>375b.3</p>bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang
<p>375b.4</p>chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
<p>375b.5</p>yang dag pa'i tshig brjod nas/ don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dmigs su phebs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /sems can stong pa nyid kyi
<p>375b.6</p>phyir/ yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sems can dben pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/ /sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing / sems can mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ 
<p>375b.7</p>yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung / 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che sdong po brgyan pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan 'byung ba/ song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal
<p>376a</p>
<p>376a.1</p>dpung shig na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ /rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / /bza' shing ra ba'i rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par ldan/ /dri mchog de la brten nas spyan ras
<p>376a.2</p>gzigs kyi dbang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ /de gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po yi/ /yon tan rgya chen tshul 'jug bstod par byed/ /g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par skur ston nas/ /nor bzangs shin tu dul ba lho
<p>376a.3</p>phyogs rgyud du song / /spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/ /rin chen ri yi sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / /rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na/ /pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la brten pa 'dug /lha dang lha min klu dang
<p>376a.4</p>srin po mi'am ci/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor zhing de la chos kyang ston/ /mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par 'gyur/ /bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob 'gyur bar/ /
<p>376a.5</p>'phags pa thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol/ /bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa dri med phyag brkyang ste/ /'od sprin dra brgya chen bzang po rab 'thon nas/ /nor bzang spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi
<p>376a.6</p>dbang phyug mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/ /ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug /'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir 'byung / /kun du bdag nyid rang la
<p>376a.7</p>byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ /'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/ /gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang / /lus la gzir cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang / /nga yi ming thos bcings shing bzung ba'ang
<p>376b</p>
<p>376b.1</p>thar bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yor byas bsad spangs pa/ /de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/ /mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon rnos btab kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur/ /dbang po'i 'khor du
<p>376b.2</p>phyin dang gang rnams rtsod 'gyur pa/ /dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ /grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa/ /de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs
<p>376b.3</p>dgras 'jigs nam phyin te/ /seng ge dom gzig gcan gzan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na/ /sdang ba'i sems rgyun sa chen ltongs su
<p>376b.4</p>thar gyur tam/ /sol dag lci me rab tu 'bar gyur kyang / /gang ba chu yi gter du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/ /rgya mtsho'i chur bor de ni nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/ /chu bos mi khyer me yi dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur/ /
<p>376b.5</p>don med kun du mi 'gyur don rnams grub par 'gyur/ /shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang / /brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bred cing bslus pa dang / /spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/ /nga
<p>376b.6</p>yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob/ /gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang / /gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa rnams/ /nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la byams
<p>376b.7</p>pa'i sems kyang bskyed/ /nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na/ /gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byed pa yi/ /dgra rnams rtag tu de yis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming
<p>377a</p>
<p>377a.1</p>tsam dran byas na/ /klu dbang sprin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang / /grul bum srin po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang / /mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong bzhi bar 'gyur/ /nga yi
<p>377a.2</p>ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / /pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes mdza' ba kun dang yang / /'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ /nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/ /nga yi ming ni rjes su la
<p>377a.3</p>las dran byed na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/ /byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min/ /sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/ /nga yi ming ni la la dag gis dran byas na/ /
<p>377a.4</p>dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/ /bskal ba bye ba mang por dbang po kun ldan 'gyur/ /la la gang gis nga'i rjes dran na/ /sems can dag pa 'di nas
<p>377a.5</p>shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/ /'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/ /'gro ba sems
<p>377a.6</p>can nges 'dul gzhan dang zad nus kyis/ /sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms te/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan/ 'phags pa mdo
<p>377a.7</p>sde sna tshogs kyi mdo btus/ gsung rab rin po che'i gtam rgyud/ 'dus pa shAkya'i rabs rgyud/ mkhan po dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// //
